Title: EID KI NAMAZ KA TARIKA
Content:
EID KI NAMAZ KA TARIKA

Namaz e eid ka tarika ye hai ke 2 rakat wajib eid ul fitr ya eid ul azha ki niyat karke kaano tak haath uthaaye aur Allahu Akbar kahta hua haath baandh le phir sana padhe.

Phir kaano tak haath uthaye aur Allahu Akbar kahta hua haath chhod de.

Phir haath uthaye aur Allahu Akbar kah kar haath chhod de

Aur phir haat uthaye aur Allahu Akbar kah kar haath baandh le.

Yani pahli takbeer me haath baandhe iske baad 2 takbeero me haath latkaaye aur 4thi takbeer me baandh le.

Phir imam اعوذ aur بسم الله aahista padh kar jahar ke saath alhamd o soorat padhe.

Phir ruku kare aur dosri rakat me pehle alhamd o soorat padhe.

Phir 3 baar kaano tak haath lejaa kar Allahu Akbar kahe aur haath na baandhe aur 4thi baar bagair haath uthaye Allah Akbar kahta hua ruku me jaaye.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Eidain me zaaid takbeerein 6 hui 3 pahli qirat se pahle aur takbeer tahreema ke ba'ad aur 3 dosri me qirat ke baad aur takbeer e ruku se pahle aur in me se har takbeer me haath uthaaye jayenge aur har 2 takbeero ke darmiyan 3 tasbeeh ki qadr sakta karein.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Ye 6 takbeeren wajib hain yunhi dosri rakat ki takbeer e ruku bhi wajib hai.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Imam 6 takbeero se ziyadah kahe to muqtadi bhi imam ki pairwi kare magar 13 se ziyadah me imam ki pairwi nahi.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Pahli rakat me imam ke takbeer kahne ke baad muqtadi shamil hua to usi waqt 3 takbeerein kahle. Agarche imam ne qirat shuru kardi ho aur 3 hi kahe. Agarche imam ne 3 se ziyadah kahi ho.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Agar usne (muqtadi ne) takbeerein na kahi ke imam ruku me chala gaya to khade khade na kahe. Balke imam ke saath ruku me jaaye aur ruku mein takbeer kahle.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Imam ko ruku me paaya aur gaalib gumaan hai ke takbeerein kah kar imam ko ruku me paa lega to khade khade takbeerein kahe phir ruku me jaaye.

Warna Allahu Akbar kah kar ruku me jaaye aur ruku me takbeerein kahe.

Phir agar usne ruku me takbeerein poori na ki thi ke imam ne sar utha liya to baaqi saaqit ho gayi.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Imam ke ruku se uthne ke baad shamil hua to ab takbeerein na kahe. Balke jab apni padhe us waqt kahe.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Ruku me jahan takbeer kahna bataya gaya us me haath na uthaye.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Agar dosri rakat me shamil hua to pahli rakat ki takbeerein ab na kahe. Balke jab apni faut shudah padhne khada ho us waqt kahe aur dosri rakat ki takbeerein agar imam ke saath paa jaaye to fabiha.

Warna is me bhi wahi tafseel hai jo pahli rakat ke baare me mazkoor hui.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Imam takbeer kahna bhool gaya aur ruku me chala gaya to qiyam ki taraf na laute na ruku me takbeer kahe.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Pahli rakat me imam takbeeren bhool gaya aur qirat shuru kardi to qirat ke baad kah le ya ruku me, aur qirat ka i'aadah na kare.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Imam takbeeraat e zawaaid me haath na uthaye to muqtadi uski pairwi na kare balkeh haath uthaye.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Namaz ke baad imam 2 khutbe padhe aur khutba e juma me jo chizen sunnat hain is me bhi sunnat hain aur jo wahan makrooh hai yaha bhi makrooh hai.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Imam ne namaz padh li aur koi shakhs baaqi rah gaya. Khwah woh shamil hi na hua tha, ya shamil to hua magar uski namaz faasid ho gayi.

To agar dosri jagah mil jaaye padh le, warna nahi padh sakta.

Haan behtar ye hai ke ye shakhs 4 rakat chaasth ki namaz padhe.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH: Eidulazha tamam ehkaam me eidulfitr ki tarah hai sirf baaz baato me faraq hai.

Isme mustahab ye hai ke namaz se pahle kuchh na khaye agarche Qurbani na kare aur kha liya to karahat nahi aur raaste me buland aawaz se takbeer kahta jaaye.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Jo chizein namaz me haraam hai maslan khana peena salam o jawab e salam wagairah ye sab khutba ki haalat me bhi haraam hain.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Jab khutba padhe to tamam haazireen par sunna aur chup rahna farz hai.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Jo log imam se door ho ke khutba ki aawaz un tak nahi pahunchti unhein bhi chup rahna wajib hai.

Agar kisi ko buri baat karte dekhein to haath ya sarke ishare se mana kar sakte hain zaban se na jaayez hai.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Huzur e Aqdas صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ka naame paak khateeb ne liya to haazireen dil me durood shareef padhein zaban se padhne ki us waqt ijazat nahi.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Yunhi sahba e kiram ke zikr par us waqt رضى الله تعالى عنهم zaban se kahne ki ijazat nahi.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Baad namaz eid musafaha o mu'aanqah karna jaise umooman musalmano me raaij hai behtar hai, ke isme izhaar e musarrat hai.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH:- Baaz log mu'aanqa e eid se mana karte hain. Iski koi asl nahi

Balke ahadees kareema se mu'aanqah saabit hai.

Tafseel ke liye Aala Hazrat Azeemul Barakat Saiyyiduna Imam Ahmad Raza fazil e barelvi رضى الله تعالى عنه ka risala mubaraka
" وشاح الجيد فى تحليل معانقة العيد " Ka mutala karein.

BOOK NAME - FAZAAIL O MASAAIL E EIDUL AZHA O QURBANI

Title: TAKBEER TASHREEQ KE MASAIL
Content:
TAKBEER TASHREEQ KE MASAIL

MASLAH : 9wen zilhijjah ki fajar se 13wen ki asar tak har namaz e panjgaana ke ba'ad jo jamat e mustahabbah ke saath ada ki gayi 1 baar takbeer baland aawaaz se kahna wajib hai aur 3 baar afzal

Ise takbeer e tashreeq kahte hain woh ye hain.

اَللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ اَللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ لَا اِلٰهَ اِلَّا اللّٰهُ وَاللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ اَللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ وَلِلّٰهِ الْحَمْدُ

(Bahar e shari'at)

<!--more-->

MASLAH : Takbeer e tashreeq salam pherne ke ba'ad fauran wajib hai yani jab tak koi aisa fel na kiya ho ke us namaz par bina na kar sake. Agar masjid se baahar ho gaya ya qasdan (jaan boojh kar) wazu tod diya. Ya kalam kiya agarche sahwan to takbeer saaqit ho gayi aur bila qasd wazu toot gaya to keh le.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH : Takbeer tashreeq us par wajib hai jo shahar mein muqeem ho ye jisne uski iqteda ki.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH : Nafl o sunnat o witr ke Ba'ad takbeer wajib nahi juma ke ba'ad wajib hai aur namaz e eid ke ba'ad bhi keh le.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH : Masbooq (jiski rakat chhoot gayi ho) par takbeer wajib hai. Magar jab khud salam phere us waqt kahe aur imam ke saath keh li to namaz faasid na hui aur namaz khatm karne ke ba'ad takbeer ka i'aadah bhi nahi.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH : Aur dino mein namaz qaza ho gayi thi ayyam e tashreeq mein uski qaza padhi to takbeer wajib nahin. Yunhi in dino ki namazein aur dino mein padhi jab bhi wajib nahi.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH : Munfarid (tanha bagair jamat se namaz padhne wala) par takbeer wajib nahi. Magar munfarid bhi keh le ke saahibain ke nazdeek us par bhi wajib hai.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH : Imam ne takbeer na kaha jab bhi muqtadiyo par wajib hai.

(Bahar e shari'at)

MASLAH : Aurato par takbeer tashreeq wajib nahi.

Bahar e shari'at)

Isi tarah musafir par bhi wajib nahi.

Title: 10 MUHARRAM (ASHURA) KI FAZILAT
Content: 10 MUHARRAM (ASHURA) KE DIN KI ITNI FAZILAT KYU ❓ 10 MUHARRAM KE DIN ARSH, KURSI, AASMAN, ZAMEEN, SOORAJ, CHAND,SITARE, AUR JANNAT PAIDA KIYE GAYE. ASHURA KE ROZ AADAM عليه السلام  KO PAIDA KIYA GAYA, ISI DIN UNHE JANNAT ME DAKHIL KIYA GAYA AUR ISI DIN APKI TOUBA BHI QABOOL KI GAYI. ASHURA KE ROZ HAZRATE IBRAHIM عليه السلام PAIDA HUWE ISI DIN UNHE AAG SE NIJAT MILI. ASHURA KE ROZ HAZRATE IDREES عليه السلام KO MAQAME BULAND KI TARAF UTHAYA GAYA. ASHURA KE DIN AYYUB عليه السلام KI TAKLIF RAF 'A KI GAI. ASHURA KE DIN YUSUF عليه السلام GEHRE KUNWE SE NIKALE GAYE. ASHURA KE DIN YUNUS عليه السلام MACHHLI KE PAIT SE NIKALE GAYE. ASHURA KE DIN YAQOOB عليه السلام KI BINAAI KA ZUAF DOOR HUWA. ASHURA KE DIN SULEMAAN عليه السلام KO MULKE AZIM ATA KIYA GAYA. ASHURA KE DIN NOOH عليه السلام KI KASHTI KUHE JUDI PAR THAHRI. ASHURA KE DIN MOOSA عليه السلام OR AAP KI UMMAT KO NAJAT MILI OR FIRON APNI QOUM SAMET GARAQ HUA. ASHURA KE DIN ISA عليه السلام PAIDA KIYE GAYE OR ISI DIN UNHE AASMANO KI TARAF UTHAYA GAYA. AASMAN SE ZAMEEN PAR ISI DIN SABSE PEHLI BARISH NAZIL HUYI. AUR ISI DIN KA ROZA UMMATO ME MASHOOR THA YAHA TAK KE YE BHI KAHA GAYA HAI KI IS DIN KA ROZA MAHE RAMZAN SE PEHLE FARZ THA FIR MANSOOKH KAR DIYA GAYA AUR HUZUR ﷺ NE HIJRAT SE PEHLE IS DIN KA ROZA RAKHA. (MUQASHAFATUL QULUB) Posted By: Mehfile Gulame Mustafa ﷺ

Title: Namaz Ki kunji kya hai
Content:
Namaz ki kunji Taharat (Paaki) Hai.

TAHARAT YAANI PAAKI KA BAYAAN

Namaz ke liye Paaki Aisi Cheez Hai Ki Bina Paaki Ke Namaz Hoti Hi Nahi Balki Jaan Boojh Kar Bagair Taharat Namaz Ada karne ko Hamare Olama Kuffr Likhte Hai Aur Kyun Na Ho Ki Us Be-Waju Ya be-Gusl Namaz padh ne waale Ne Ibadat ki Be Adbi Aur Tauhin Ki Nabi ﷺ Ne Farmaya Hai Ki Jannat Ki Kunji Namaz Hai Aur Namaz Ki Kunji Taharat (Paaki) Hai

Is Hadees Ko Imam Ahmed Ne Jabir Radiallahu Ta'ala Anhu Se Riwayat Kiya ki Ek Roz Nabi ﷺ Subah ki Namaaj Me Surah-E-Room Padh Rahe The Beech Me Shubh Huwa Namaaj ke Baad Farmaya ki Un Logo ka kya Haal Hai Jo Hamare Saath Namaz padte Hai Aur Achhi Tarah Taharat Nahi Karte Unhi ki wajah se Imam ko Kir'At me Shubh Padta Hai

Is Hadees Ko Nasai Ne Shabib ibne Abi Rooh se Unhone Ek Sahabi Se Riwayat kiya ki Jab Bagair Kaamil Taharat Ke Namaz padhne ki Yah Nahusat hai to Be-Taharat Namaz padhne ki Nahusat ka kya puchh na Tirmizi Me Hai ki Huzoor ﷺ ne Farmaya ki Taharat (Aadaah) Imaan Hai Yah Hadees Hasan Hai.

Reference

Title: Wazu me kitne farz hai?
Content:
Wazu Me 4 Farz Hai.

01) Muh Dhona
02) Kohniyoon Samet Dono Haath dhona
03) Sar ka masah Karna
04) Takhno Samet dono Pav ka dhona

Kisi ujw ke dhone, ke yah maani Hai, Ki us Ujw ke har hisse par kam se kam do-do Bund paani bah jaaye.

Bheeg jaane ya tel ki tarah paani chupud lene, ya ek aadh bund bah jaane ko dhona nahi kahenge.

Na usse Ghusl, ya wazu ada ho.

Is baat ka dhyan rakhna bahut jaruri hai.

Log iski taraf dhyan nahi dete Aur namaz e Akaarat jaati hai. (yaani barbaad hoti hai).

Badan me kuch jagah aisa hai ki jaha tak uska khaas khayal na kiya jaaye, un par paani nahi bahega.

Jiski tashri har ujw me ki jaayegi kisi jagah maujaye hadees (hadas ki jagah) par tari pahunchne ko masah kahte hai.

Title: Wazu me dhadi kaise dhoye?
Content:
Dhadi ke Baal Agar Ghane Na Ho, To Chamde Ka Dhona Farz Hai.

Aur Agar Ghane ho to gale ki Taraf dabaane se jis Qadr chehre Ke ghere me Aaye Unka Dhona Farz hai.

Aur jadoo ka dhona farz nahi.

Aur Jo halke se neeche ho unka dhona jaruri nahi.

Aur Agar kuch Hisse me ghane ho Aur kuch cheedre ho.

To jahaan Ghane ho to waha baal Aur jahaan cheedre ho us jagah jild (Khaal) ka dhona farz hai.

Labo ka hissa jo Aadat me lab band karne ke baad jaahir Rahta hai. Uska dhona farz hai.

Agar Koyi Khoob joor se lab band karle ki usme ka kuch hissa chup gaya ki us par paani na pahuncha na kulli ki, ki dhul jaata to wazu na huwa.

Haa wah hissa jo Aam Taur par Aadat me muh band karne se jaahir nahi hota, uska dhona farz hai.

Title: Aurat nafl namaz padh rahi thi or namaz ke dauran haiz aa jaye to namaz ka kya hukm hoga?
Content:
Jawab:

Namaz ke dauran haiz aa jaye, To namaz tod de.

Phir agar farz Namaz thi to qaza nahi, or nafl thi to taharat hasil hone ke ba'ad uski qaza zaroor padhe.

Title: Wazu Me Palak ka har baal dhoona kaisa hai.
Content:
Palak ka Har Baal Pura dhona Farz Hai.

Aur Agar Usme Keechad wagairah koyi Sakht Cheez Jam gayi To Uska Chudda na Farz Hai.

Aankh ke koye par paani bahana Farz hai.

Magar surma ka jirm (kan/particles) koye ya Palak me gaya Aur wazu kar Liya pata na chala Aur namaz padhli.

Yo haraj nahi namaz ho gayi Aur wazu bhi ho gaya.

Aur Agar maalum hai to use chuda kar paani bahana jaruri hai.

Title: Jo Hamesha Ba wuzu rahe Allah ﷻ us shaks ko kitni Fazilato se musarraf farmata hai.
Content:
Aala hazrat imaam-e-ahle sunnat mujaddid-e-deen-o-millat rahbare-e-tariqat paaband-e-shari'at momino ke dil ki dhadhkan.
Imaam Ahmad Raza Khan Qadri faazil-e-barelvi Rahamatullahi​ Ta'ala Anhu irshaad farmate hai ki jo shaks hamesha Ba wuzu rahe Allah ﷻ use 7 Fazilate se musarraf farmata hai.

1: Malaeeka uski shohbat me ragbat kare.

2: Qalam uski nikiya likhta rahe.

3: Uske Aa'za tasbeeh kare.

4: Usse takbeere oula fout naho.

5: Jab wo soye Allah ﷻ kuch farishte bheje ki jinno ins ke Shar se uski hifazat kare.

6: Sakrate mout us par Aasan ho.

7: Jab tak Ba wuzu ho Amaane ilaahi me rahe.

? Fatawa Razviya Sharif

Namaaz ke Ahakam Safa:-07

Khalifa-e-huzoor Tajushari'ah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Sahab

Title: Miswak Karne Ka Tarika❓
Content:
Miswak Daahine (right) Haath Se Karna Chahiye Aur Miswak is Tarah Haath me li jaaye ki Chhungaliyaa Miswak ke Niche Aur beech ki 3 Ungaliyaan Upar Aur Angutha Seere par niche ho Aur Mutthi Na Bandhe.

Daanto ki Chawadayi (horizontal) me Miswak Kare Lambayi (vertical) me Nahi. Cheet Late kar Miswak Na kare.

Pahle Daahini (right) Jaanib Ke Upar Ke Daant Maajeh Phir Baayi Janib Ke Upar Ke Daant.

Phir Daahini (right) Jaanib Ke Niche ke Daant. Phir Baayi Janib Ke Niche Ke Daant.

Jab Miswak Karna hoto use dhoole Aur Miswak Karne ke baad bhi use dhoo daale.

Zameen par padi na chhode. Balki khadi Rakhe.

Aur Use is Tarah Khadi Rakhe ki uske Reshe wala hissa Upar Rahe.

Title: Wazu ki dua❓
Content:
اَللّٰھُمَّ اَعِنِّیْ عَلٰی تِلَاوۃِ الْقُرْاٰنِ وَذِکْرِکَ وَشُکْرِکَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِکَ Wazu Ki Duaayein (1) Wazu me jo duayein padhi jaati hai unka padhna Mustahab Hai. Neeche Mustahab duayein Likhi Jaati Hai. Wazu karte waqt padhe. بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم ‎TARJAMA: Allah Ke Naam Se Shuru Jo bahut Meharban Rahamt wala Aur Darood Sharif Padhe. (2) Dusra Kalima Padhe. اَشْھَدُ اَنْ لاَّ اِلٰہَ اِلاَّ اللہُ وَحْدَہُ لَا شَرِیْکَ لَہٗ وَاَشْھَدُ اَنَّ سَیِّدَنَا مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُہٗ وَرَسُوْلُہٗ TARJAMA: Main Gawahi deta hoon ki Allah Ke Siwa koyi Maabood Nahi Wah Akela Hai Uska Koi Sharik Nahi Aur Gawahi deta hoon ki Hamare Sardaar Muhammed ﷺ Uske Bande Aur Rasool Hai. (3) Kulli Karte waqt Yah dua padhe. اَللّٰھُمَّ اَعِنِّیْ عَلٰی تِلَاوۃِ الْقُرْاٰنِ وَذِکْرِکَ وَشُکْرِکَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِکَ TARJAMA: Aye Allah Tu Meri Madad Kar ki Quran Ki Tilawat Aur Tera Zikr Aur Shukr Karu Aur Teri Achhi Ibadat. (4) Naak me Paani Daalte waqt Yah dua Padhe. اَللّٰھُمَّ اَرِحْنِیْ رَائِحَۃَ الْجَنَّۃِ وَلَا تُرِحْنِیْ رَائِحَۃَ النَّارِ TARJAMA: Aye Allah Tu Mujeh Jannat ki Khushbu Sungha Aur Jahannam Ki Boo se Bachaa. (5) Muh Dhoote waqt Yah dua padhe. اَللّٰھُمَّ بَیِّضْ وَجْھِیْ یَوْمَ تَبْیَضُّ وُجُوْہٌ وَ تَسْوَدُّ وُجُوْہٌ TARJAMA: Aye Allah Tu Mere Chehre ko Ujala Kar jis din ki kuch muh Safed Honge Aur Kuch Siyaah Honge. (6) Dahina (right) Haath Dhoote waqt Yah dua padhe. اَللّٰھُمَّ اَعْطِنِيْ کِتَابِیْ بِیَمِیْنِیْ وَحَاسِبْنِیْ حِسَابًا یَّسِیْراً Tarjama: Aye Allah Mera Naama-E-Aamal Daahine Haath me de Aur Mujh se Aasaan Hisaab kar. (7) Bayaa (left) Haath Dhoote waqt yah dua padhe. اَللّٰھُمََّ لَا تُعْطِنِیْ کِتَابِیْ بِشِمَالِیْ وَلَا مِنْ وَّرَآءِ ظَھْرِیْ TARJAMA: Aye Allah Mera Naama-E-Aamal Na Baayein Haath me de Aur na peeth ke peeche se. (8) Sar ka Masah Karte Waqt Yah dua padhe. اَللّٰھُمَّ اَظِلَّنِیْ تَحْتَ عَرْشِکَ یَوْمَ لَا ظِلَّ الِاَّ ظِلَّ عَرْشِکَ TARJAMA: Aye Allah tu mujhe Apne Arsh ke saaye ke Saaye me Rakh jis din tere Arsh ke Saaye ke Siwa kahi saaya na hoga. (9) Kaano ka Masah karte waqt yah dua padhe. اَللّٰھُمَّ اجْعَلْنِیْ مِنَ الَّذِیْنَ یَسْتَمِعُوْنَ الْقَوْلَ فَیَتَّبِعُوْنَ اَحْسَنَہٗ TARJAMA: Aye Allah Tu mujhe Unme karde Jo Baat Sunte Hai Aur Achhi Baat par Amal Karte Hai. (10) Gardan ka mash karte waqt yah dua padhe. اَللّٰھُمَّ اَعْتِقْ رَقَبَتِیْ مِنَ النَّارِ TARJAMA: Aye Allah Meri Gardan Aag se Aazaad Kar. (11) Daahina (right) paav dhoote waqt yah dua padhe. اَللّٰھُمَّ ثَبِّتْ قَدَمِیْ عَلَی الصِّرَاطِ یَوْمَ تَزِلُّ الْاَقْدَامُ TARJAMA: Aye Allah Mera Kadam Pul siraat par Sabit Rakh jis din us par kadam fisle. (12) Baayaa (left) Paav Dhoote waqt yah dua padhe. اَللّٰھُمَّ اجْعَلْ ذَنْبِیْ مَغْفُوْرًا وَسَعْیِیْ مَشْکُورًا وَ تِجَارَتِیْ لَنْ تَبُوْرَ پڑھے TARJAMA: Aye Allah Mere Gunah ko Baqsh de Aur meri koshish Kamyaab kar Aur meri tijarat halaak na ho. Ya sab Jagah Darood Sharif hi padhe Aur yahi Afzal Hai Aur Wazu se faarig hote waqt hi yah dua padhe. اَللّٰھُمََّاجْعَلْنِیْ مِنَ التَّوَّابِیْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِیْ مِنَ الْمُتَطَھِّرِیْنَ TARJAMA: Aye Allah tu Mujhe Tauba karne walo Aur paak logo me karde

Bahar-E-Sahari'At Hissa 2 Safa 19,20

Title: Wazu Me Makrooh Cheeze Kya Hai ❓
Content: Wazu Me Makrooh Cheeze 01) Aurat ke Wazu, Ya Ghusl Ke Bache Huye Paani Se Wazu Karna. 02) Wazu ke liye Nazis Jagah (NaaPaak jagah) Baithna. 03) Naajis Jagah Wazu ka paani Girna. 04) Masjid Ke Andar Wazu Karna. 05) Wazu ke kisi Ujw Se Lote Wagairah me paani Ka Karta Tapkana. 06) Paani me Retah, Ya Khankhaar Daalna. 07) Qible ki Taraf Thuk, Ya Khankhaar Daalna, Ya Kulli Karna. 08) Be Jarurat Duniyaa ki Baat karna. 09) Jyada Paani Kharch Karna. 10) Itna Kam Kharch Karna Ki Sunnat Ada Na Ho. 11) Muh par Paani Maarna. 12) Muh par Paani Daalte waqt Phunkna. 13) Ek Haath Se Muh Dhoona Ke Yah Raafziyoon Aur Hinduo ka Tarika Hai. 14) Gale ka Masah Karna. 15) Baayein (left) Haath se Kulli Karna, Ya Naak me paani Daalna. 16) Dahine (right) Haath se Naak Saaf karna. 17) Apne Wazu ke liye Koyi lota Wagairah Khaas kar Lena. 18) Teen Naye Paani Se Teen Baar Sar Ka Masah Karna. 19) Jis kapde se Istenja ka paani khushaq Kiya Huwa Ho, Usse Wazu ke Hisse Pochna. 20) Dhoop ke Garm paani Se Wazu karna. 21) Hoot, Ya Aankhe Joor Se Band karna Aur Agar Kuch Sukha Rah jaaye to Wazu na Hoga. Har Sunnat Ka Chhodna Makrooh Hai. Aise hi Har Makrooh Ka Chhodna Sunnat Hai. Bahar-E-Sahari'At Hissa 2 Safa 20 -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Wazu ki sunnatein kitni hai❓
Content:
Wazu 16 Cheeze Sunnat Hai. Wazu Ki Sunnate 1) Wazu ki niyat karna. 2) Bismillah shareef padhna. 3) Pehle dono hatho ko 3 martaba dhona. 4) Miswaq karna. 5) Dahine (right) hath se 3 martaba kulli karna. 6) Dahine (right) hath se 3 martaba naak me pani chadana. 7) Bayein (left) hath se naak saaf karna. 8) Dhadi ka ungliyo se khilal karna. 9) Haath pao ki ungliyo ka khilal karna. 10) Har a'uzu ko 3-3 bar dhona. 11) Pure sar ka ek bar mash karna. 12) Tarteeb se wazu karna. 13) Dadhi ke jo baal muh ke dayire ke niche hai in per geela hath phira lena. 14) A'aza ko lagatar dhona ke ek A'uzu sukhne se pehle hi dusre A'uzu ko dho lena. 15) Kaano ka masah karna. 16) Har makroohat se bachna. Bahar-E-Sahari'At Aur Aalamgiri

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Ghusl ka tarika
Content:
01) Ghusl Ki Niyat Karna

02) Pahle Dono Haatho Ko Gatto Tak 3-3 Baar dhona.

03) Chahe Najaasat ho yaa Na Ho Peshab Paakhane ki Jagah ka Dhona.

04) Badan par Jahaa'n' kahi Najaasat ho Usko Door Karna.

05) Phir Namaz ki Tarah Wazu Karna. Magar Paav Nahi Dhona Chahiye. Haan Agar Chowki, ya Patthar, ya Takhte par Nahaye to Paav dhole.

06) Phir Pure Badan par Tel ki Tarah Paani Chupud le khaas kar joode ke Mosam mein.

07) Phir 3 Baar Dahine Moodhe par Paani Bahaye.

08) Phir 3 baar Baayein Moodhe par Paani bahaye.

09) Phir Sar Aur Tamaam Badan Par 3 Baar Paani Bahaye.

10) Phir Nahane ki jagah Se Alag Haat kar Agar Paav Nahi dhoye the to dhole.

11) Nahane mein Qibla Rukh Na Ho.

12) Tamaam Badan Par Haath Phere.

13) Tamaam Badan Ko Male.

14) Aisi Jagah Nahaye ki Use Koi Na dekhe. Aur Agar Ye Na ho sake to Naaf Se Ghutne Tak Ka Chhipana jaruri hai. Itna bhi na Ho Sake To Tayammum kare Magar Aisa Kam hota hai (Mardo ke liye).

15) Ghusl mein kisi Tarah ki baat Na Kare.

16) Aur Na Koi Dua padhe Nahane ke baad Tauliyaa Ya Rumaal se Badan pochh daale to Koi harz nahi.

Masla- Ghusl khane ki Chhat na ho. Ya Nange Badan Nahaye Ba-sharte ki ehtiyaat ki jagah hoto koi Harz Nahi. Haan Aurato ko Bahut jyada ehtiyaat ki jarurat hai.

17) Aurat ko Baith kar Nahana Behtar hai.

18) Nahane ke Baad Fauran kapde pehen le. Jitni cheeze Wazu mein sunnat Aur Mustahab hai. Utni hi Nahane mein bhi hai.

Magar Satrr Khula ho to Qible ko Muh Karna Nahi Chahiye Aur Tahband Baandhe ho to Harj Nahi.

Title: Tawaf ke liye wuzu karna kya hai❓
Content:
Agar wazu na hoto Namaz, Sajda-E-tilawat, namaz e janaza Aur Quran Sharif Chhune ke liye wazu karna. Farz hai. Tawaf ke liye wazu Wajib hai. Ghusl e Janabat se pahle Aur junub ko khaane peene Aur sone Aur Azaan, iqamat Aur jumuah Aur Arfa me thaharne Aur Safa Aur Marwa ke Darmiyaan sai ke liye Wazu kar lena sunnat hai. Sone ke liye Aur sone ke baad Aur mayyat ke Nahlaane, ya ithaane ke baad Aur sohbat se pahle Aur jab gussa Aa Jaaye us waqt Aur zabaani Quran Sharif padhne Aur jumuah Aur Eid, bakra Eid ke Alawa baaki khutbo ke liye dini kitabo ko chhune ke liye satre galiz.
  1. Yaani peshab paakhane ki jagah ko chhune ke baad,
  2. Jhoot bolne,
  3. Gaali dene,
  4. Buri baat kahne,
  5. Kafir se badan chhu jaane,
  6. Salib Ya bhoot chhune,
  7. Moodhi, ya safed daag waale se chhu jaane,
  8. Bagal khujlaane se jabki usme badboo hoo,
  9. Geebat karne,
  10. Kah-kaha kagaane (yaani joor se hasne),
  11. Lagw (yaani behuda Asha'Aar padhne),
  12. Oont ka gosht khaane,
  13. Kisi Aurat ke badan se apna badan bina rukawat ke chhu jaane se
  14. Aur wazu waale adami ke namaz padhne ke liye in sab surato me wazu karna Mustahab hai.
Bahar-E-Sahari'At Dusra Hissa Safa 21 -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Agar Haath Dhula Huwa Hai. Magar Phir Dhone ki Niyat se Daala.
Content:
Aur Yah Dhona Sawab ka kaam Ho. Jaise Khaane ke Liye. Ya Wazu Ke Liye.

To Yah Paani Istemaal Kiya Huwa Ho gaya.

Ab Kya Yah Paani Wazu Aur Peene ke kaam Raha?

Jawab:

Wazu Ke Kaam Ka Na Raha Aur Us paani ko peena Bhi Makrooh Hai.

Agar Haath dhula Huwa hai. Magar dhone ki Niyat se daala Aur Yah Dhona sawab ka kaam Ho.

Jaise khaane ke liye, Ya Wazu ke liye.

To Yah paani Must'amal (Istemaal kiya huwa) ho gaya.

Yaani wazu ke kaam ka naa Raha Aur us paani ko peena bhi Makrooh hai.

Agar Jarurat Se Haath Paani me daala jaise, paani bade bartan me hai ki Use Jhuka Nahi Sakta.

Na koyi chota bartan hai ki usse nikale, to Aisi Surat me jarurat Bhar haath paani me daal kar usse paani nikale.

Yaa Kuwe me rassi, Dool ghir gaya Aur be Guse nahi nikal sakta Aur paani Bhi Nahi ki haath panv dhokar guse.

To is Surat me paanv daal kar rassi Nikalega to paani Must'amal Na Hoga is masle ko bahut kam log jaante hai logo ko jaanna chahiye.

Bahar E Shari'At Dusra Hissa Safa 42

Title: Asar Namaz ki Sunnat ki Fazilat?
Content:
Asar Namaz ki Sunnat ki Fazilat.

Asar se pahle 4 Rakat e Sunnat padhe.

Hadees: Ahmed wa Abu dawood wa Tirmizi Ibne Umar Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhuma se Raavi Farmate hai ﷺ Us Shakhs par Raham kare jisne Asar se pahle 4 Rakat e padhi.

Hadees: Tirmizi Maula Ali Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu se Raavi ki Huzoor ﷺ Asar se pahle 4 Rakat e padah karte Aur Abu Dawood ki Riwayat me hai ki 2 padhte the.

Hadees: Tabraani kabir me Ummul Mominin Umme salma Radiallahu Ta'Ala Anha se Raavi ki Rasoolullah ﷺ Farmate hai jo Asar se Pahle 4 Rakat e padhe Allah Ta'Ala Uske badan ko Aag par Haraam farma dega.

Dusri Riwayat Tabrani ki Amr ibne Aas Radiallahu Ta'Ala Anhu se hai ki Huzoor ﷺ Ne Sahaba ke Majme me jisme Amirul Mominin Umar Ibne khattab Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu bhi the Farmaya jo Asar se pahle 4 Rakat e padhega use Aag na chuyegi.

Bahare shariat Hissa 04 Safa 11

Title: Witr ki namaz qaza ho gayi to qaza namaz padhna kaisa hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala : Witr ki Namaz Qaza Hogayi Ho to Qaza padhana Wajib hai.

Agarche kitna hi zamana ho gaya ho Qasdan (jaan buzh kar) Qaza ki ho ya bhule se qaza ho gayi ho Aur jab Qaza padhe to usme Dua e Qunoot bhi padhe.

Albatta Qaza me Takbeere Qunoot ke liye haath na uthaye, jabki Logo ke saamne padhta ho.

Kyuki logo ko witr ka chutna maalum hoga.

(Durre Mukhtaar, Aalamgeeri)

Ramzan sharif ke Alaawa Aur dino me witr Jamat se na padhe Aur tadai ke taur par ho to makrooh hai.

(Durre Mukhtaar)

Mas'Ala: Jise Aakhiri Shab me Jaagne par Ehtimaad ho, to Behtar yah hai ki peechli Raat me Witr padhe, warna Baad e isha padhle.

(Hadees)

Mas'Ala: Awwal Shab me witr padh kar so raha hai, Phir peechle ko jaaga. To dobara witr padhna jaayez nahi Aur Nawafil jitne chahe padhe.

(Guniya)

Mas'Ala: Witr ke Baad 2 Rakat Nafl padhna Behtar hai.

Uski Pahli Rakat Me.

إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ

Dusri me

 قُلْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ

padhna Behtar hai.

Hadees me hai ki Agar Raat me na Utha, to yah Tahajjud Namaz ke kayim makam ho jayegi (Yah sab mazamin Ahadees se sabit hai)

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 04 Safa 09

Title: Namaz ki makroohat kya hai❓
Content: Namaz ki makroohat 1) Kapde, badan ya daadhi ke saat khelna 2) Kapda sametna (jaise sajde me jaate waqt aage ya peeche se uthana) 3) Kapda latkaana (yani sar, ya mundhe par iss tarah daalna ki doono kanare latakte ho) 4) Aasteen ka aadhi kalaayi se ziyaada chadhaana 5) Daaman samet kar namaz padhna. 6) shiddat (zordaar) ka paakhana. 7) Peshab maloom hote waqt, ya galbaye riyaah ke waqt namaz padhna. 8) Mard ka judha baandhe huwe namaz padhna 9) Ungliyaan chatkaana. 10) Ungliyo ki kainchi bandhna. 11) Kamar par haath rakhna, 12) Idhar udhar muh pheir kar dekhna, 13) Aasman ki taraf nigah uthaana. 14) Tashahud ya sajdon ke darmiyan kutte ki tarah baithna. 15) Mard ka sajde me kalaayio ka bichaana, 16) Kisi shakhs ke muh ke samne namaz padhna, 17) Kapde me iss tarah lipat jaana ki haat bhi baahar na ho. 18) Pagdi iss tarah baandhna ki beech sar par na ho. 19) Naak aur muh ko chipaana, 20) Bezarurat khankaar nikalna, 21) Bilkasd jamaahi lena aur khud aaye toh harz nahi, 22) Jis kapde par jaandaar ki tasweer (photo) ho usko pehen kar namaz padhna, 23) Tasweer ka namazi ke sar par (yaani chath me hona, ya latka hona, ya sajda karne ki jagah me hona ki uss par sajde waaki ho.) 24) Namazi ke aage, ya dahine, ya baaye, ya peeche tasweer ka hona. Jabki latki ho, ya nasab ho, ya diwaar wagairah mankoosh ho (dewaar par khood kar, ya waise hi kisi jaandaar ki tasweer bani hona) 25) Ulta Quran majeed padhna, 26) Kisi wajib ko tark karna (choodhna) 27) Qiyam ke alaawa kisi aur mauqe par Quran padhna. 28) Ruku me Qirat ko khatm karna, 29) Imam se pehle muqtadi ka ruku wa sujood wagairah me jaana, ya usse pehle sar uthana. Yeh tamaam baatein Makrooh e tahrimi hai.

Title: Jisko Nahane Ki Zarurat Ho Aise Shakhs Ne Haroof E Muqataat Ho.
Content:
(Jaise Alif laam meem. Yaa seen, Haa meem. Wagairah) Aisi Anguthi Pehana Us Ke Liye Kaisa hai?

ANSWER

Ramzan Me Agar Raat Ko Junub Huwa To Achha Hai Ki Farz Tulu Hone Se Pahle Naha le Taaki Roze ka Har Hissa Janaabat se khaali Ho Aur Agar Nahi nahaya to Bhi Roza To Hohi jaayega magar Achha Yah Hai Ki Garaara Kar Le Aur Naak Me Jad tak paani Chadaah le yah Dono farz se pahle Kar le ki Roze Me na ho Sakenge Aur agar nahane me itni der ki ki din nikal aaya Aur namaz Qaza kardi to yah Aur dino me bhi gunah hai Aur Ramzan me to Aur jyaada

Jis ko Nahane ki jarurat ho us ko Masjid me jaana, Tawaafa karna, Qura'an Sharif Chhuna, Agarche Uska Sada Hashiye (Aayat likhi hoti hai uske ird gird jo blank page hai usko hashiya kehte hain) Ya Jild (Binding ko jild kehte hain) ya Choli chuye ya be Chuye dekh kar, Ya jubani padhna , Ya kisi Aayat ka Likhna ya Aayat ka Taveez likhna Ya Aisa Taveez Chuna Ya Aisi Anguthi pahanna Jis me haroof e muqataat Ho (Jaise Alif laam meem. Yaa seen. Haa meem. Wagairah). Haraam Hai

Title: Aurat ko Bagair Izazat Shohar Kisi Bachha ko Doodh Peelana Kaisa hai❓
Content:
Makrooh Hai.

Mas'Ala : 2 Baras ke Andar Bachha ka Baap Uski Maa ko Doodh Chudane ko majbur nahi kar sakta. Aur uske baad kar sakta hai.

(Raddul Muhtaar Safa 338)

Mas'Ala : Aurat ko chahiye ki Bila Jarurat Har Bachha ko doodh na pilaa diya kare Aur pilaayein to khud bhi yaad Rakhe aur Logo se yah Baat kah bhi de.

Aurat ko Bagair Izazat Shohar Kisi Bachha ko Doodh Peelane Makrooh Hai.

Albatta Uske halaak hone ka andesha hai to Karahat nahi.

(Raddul Muhtaar 431) Magar miaad ke andar Rada'At bahar surat saabit.

Mas'Ala : Bachha ne jis Aurat ka doodh piya wah us bachha ki maa ho jaayegi Aur uska Shohar jiska yah doodh hai.

Yaani uski wati se Bachja paida huwa jis se Aurat ka doodh utra Yah doodh peene waale bachhe ka Baap ho jaayega Aur us Aurat ki Tamaam Awlaade uske Bhai bahan khwaah usi Shohar se ho Ya Dusre shohar se uske doodh peene se pahle ki hai Ya Baad ki Ya Saath ki Aur Aurat ke Bhai Mamu Aur usko bahan khala.

Yoonhi uske shohar ke Awlaade Uske bhai Bahan Aur uske Bhai ke chacha Aur uski Bahane uski fufiyaan khwaah shohar ki Yah Awlaade Usi Aurat se ho ya dusri se Yoonhi Har Ek ke Baap maa ke Daad Daadi, Naana Naani.

(Aalamgeeri 343)

Title: Islam Me Ladka Aur Ladki Ko Kitne Saal Tak Doodh Peelane Ki Izajat Hai ❓
Content:
2 Saal Tak Ladka ho Ya Ladki.

Mas'Ala : Bachha ko 2 Baras tak doodh pilaya jaaye is se jyaada ki izajat nahi doodh peene waala ladka ho ya ladki.

Aur yah jo Baaz Awaam me mashhoor hai ki ladki ko 2 Baras tak Aur Lad ke ko 2/5 (Dhai) Baras tak peela sakte hai.

Yah sahi nahi Yah Hukm Doodh peelane ka hai Aur Nikah Haraam hohne ke liye 2/5 (Dhai) Baras ka Jamaana hai.

Ya'ani 2 Baras ke Baad Agarche Doodh Peelana Haraam hai.

Agar 2/5 (Dhai) Baras ke Andar Agar Doodh piladegi Hurmate Nikah saabit ho jaayegi Aur uske baad peeya to Hurmate Nikah nahi.

Agarche peelana jaayez nahi.

Mas'Ala : Muddat puri hone ke baad Bataure Ilaaj bhi doodh peena, Ya peelana Jaayez nahi.

Durre Mukhtaar

Title: Koun Si Baatein Hai Jiski Wajah Se Aurat Se Nikah Kiya Jata Hai❓
Content:
Hadees : Bukhari wa muslim wa Abu dawood wa Nasai wa Ibne maaza Abi Hurrairah Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu se Raavi Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Farmaya Aurat se Nikah 4 Batoo'n ki wajah se kiya jaata hai. ( Nikah me Unka Lihaaz hota hai )

1. Maal
2. Hasab
3. Jamaal
4. Deen Aur tu deen wali ko tarzih de

Hadees : Tirmizi wa Ibne maaza habban wa haakim Abu Hurrairah Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu se Raavi ki Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Farmaya 3 Shakhso ki Allah Ta'Ala Madad farmayega.

1. Allah ki Raah me Jihaad karnw waala.
2. Makaatib ke Ada karne ka irada Rakhta hai.
3. Paarsai ke irade se Nikah karne wala.

Hadees : Abu Yaala jabir Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu se Ravi ki Faramate hai jab tum me koyi nikah karta hai to shaitan kahta hai Haay Afsoos Ibne Adam ne mujhse Apna 2 Tihayi din bacha liya.

Title: Kitni Cheeze Adami Ki Nek-Bakhati Se Hai Aur Kitni Cheeze Bad-Bakhati Se❓
Content:
3 Cheeze Nek-Bakhati Aur 3 Cheeze Bad-Bakhati se.

Hadees : Muslim Wa Nasai Abdullah Ibne Umar Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu se Ravi ki Huzoor ﷺ Ne farmaya Dunya Mata'a hai Aur dunya ki behtar Mata'a ( Maal wa daulat ) Nek Aurat hai

Hadees : Tabrani Kabir wa Ausat me ibne abbas Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu se Raavi ki Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne farmaya jise 4 cheeze mili use dunya wa Aakhirat ki Bhalai mili

1. Dil shukr Gujaar
2. Jaban Yaade khuda karne waali Aur
3. Badan Bala par Saabir Aur
4. Aisi biwi ki Apne nafs Aur maale Shohar me gunaah ki jaayaa'n' na ho

Hadees : Imam Ahmed Wa bazzar wa hakim Sa'ad Ibne bai waqqas Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu se Raavi ki Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Farmaya 3 Cheeze Adami ki Nek-Bakhati se Hai Aur 3 Cheeze Nek-Bakhati se

Nek-Bakhati ki cheeze me Nek Aurat Aur Achha makan ( Yaani Lamba chauda Ya uske Padosi achhe ho ) Aur achhi sawaari Aur Bad-Bakhati ki cheeze Bad Aurat, Bura Makan, Bura Sawaari

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 07 Safa 05,6

Title: Sunnat E Muakkadah Bila Ujr Ek Baar Tark kare Aur Jo Tark ki Aadad kare Uske Liye Kya Hukm hai❓
Content:
Sunnat e Muakkadah Bila Ujr Ek Baar Tark kare Aur Jo Tark ki Aadad kare Uske Liye Kya Hukm hai❓

A - Wo Mustahkke Malaamat hai.
B - Faseeq Hai.
C - Marddushsh shahadat Hai. (Jiski Gawahi Kabul na ho)
D - Mustahakke Naar (Dozakh me Jaane ka Haq daar) Hai.
E - Gumrah Hai.

Sunnat e Baaz Muakkadah Hai Ki Shari'At me us par Taakid Aai Bila Ujr Ek baar Bhi Tark kare To Mustahkke Malaamat Hai Aur Tark ki Aadat Kare to Faseeq, Marddushsh shahadat (Jiski Gawahi Kabul na ho), Mustahkke Naar (Dozakh me jaane ka hakdaar hai) Aur Baaz Aimma ne Farmaya ki wah gumrah Thahraya jayega Aur wah Gunahgaar hai Agarche uska wajib ke Tark se kam hai.

Talwih me hai ki uska tark karib haraam hai. Uska taark (Chorne wala) Mustahak (Hakdaar) Hai ki MAAZ'ALLAH.

Shafat se Mahroom ho jaaye ki Huzoor E Aqdas ﷺ ne Farmaya:

Jo meri Sunnat ko Tark karega usse meri Shafa'At na milegi Sunnat e Muakkadah ko Sunane huda bhi kahte hai.

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 04 Safa 11,12

Title: Jisme Nikah ki Istita'At (taqat) nahi wah kya kare❓
Content:
Hadees : Bukhari wa muslim wa Abu Dawood wa Tirmizi wa Nasai Abdullah Ibne masood Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu se Ravi Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya Ay Jawaano Tum me jo koyi Nikah ki Istita'At Rakhta hai wah Nikah kare ki Yah Ajnabi Aurat ki Taraf najar karne se Nigah ko Rokne wala hai Aur Sharmgaah ki Hifaazat karne wala hai Uar jis me Nikah ki Istita'At (taqat) nahi wah Roza Rakhe ki Roza Kate'a shahawat hai

Hadees : Ibne maza Anas Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu se Ravi ki Huzoor E Aqdas ﷺ Farmate hai Jo khuda se paak saaf ho kar milna Chahe woh Aazad Aurat se Nikah kare

Hadees : Baihaki Abu Hurrairah Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu se Ravi ki Rasoolullah ﷺ ne Farmaya jo mere Tarika ko Mahboob Rakhe wah meri Sunnat par Chale aur meri sunnat se Nikah hai

Title: Jannatul Baqi Ki Ziyarat Karna Kaisa Hai ❓
Content:
Jannatul Baqi ki ziyarat Sunnat Hai.

Roza E Aqdas ki Jyaarat karke waha jaye khususan Juma ke din is Qabristan me 10 hazaar Sahaba-E-Kiram Radiallahu Ta'Ala Anhum Madfun Hai Aur Tabeyin wa Tab'a Tabeyin wa Awliya wa Ulama wa Sulah wagairahum be-Shumar hai.

Yaha Jab Hazir Ho Pahle Tamaam Madfunin Muslimin ki Jyaarat ka Kasd kare Aur Yah Padhe.

Tajruma: Tum par Salam E Kaume Mominin ke Ghar walo Tum Hamare Peshwa ho Aur Ham insha'Allah Tum se Milne waale Hai.

Aye Allah Baqi walo ki Magfirat Farma Aye Allah Ham ko Aur Unhe Baksh de.

Aur Agar Kuch Aur Padhna Chaahte hai to Yah Pade.

Tarjama : Aye Allah Ham ko Aur Hamare Walidain ko Aur Ustado Aur Bhaiyoon Aur Bahno Aur Hamari Awlaad Aur Poto Aur Saathiyoon Aur Dosto ko Aur usko Jiska ham par Haq Hai Aur jisne hame wasiyat ki Aur Tamaam Mominin wa Muslimin wa Mislimaat ko Baksh de.

Aur Darood Sharif wa Surah E Fatiha wa Aayatulkursi wa Surah E ikhlaas wagairah jo kuch ho sake padh kar Sawaab uska najr kare.

Uske baad Baqi Sharif me Jo Mazarat Maroof wa Mash-Hoor hai.

Unki ziyarat kar Tamaam Ahle Baqi me Afzal Amirul-Mominin Sayyedina Usman Gani رضي الله عنه Hai.

Unke Mazaar par hazir ho kar salam kare.

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 142

Title: Huzoor ﷺ  ke zamane me Masjid E Nabvi ki Mikdar kitni thi❓
Content:
Huzoor ﷺ ke zamane me Masjid E Nabvi ki Mikdarr kitni thi❓

Roza E Anwar par Nazar (dekhna) bhi ibadat hai Jaise Ka'aba E Muazzama Ya Quran majid ka dekhna to Adab ke saath uski kasrat karo Aur Darood wa salam Arz karo,

Panjagaana ya kam se kam Subah wa shaam muwaajaha sharif me salam Raz kare ke liye haajir ho,
Shahar me ya shahar se bahar jahaan kahi gumbade mubarak par najar pade Fauran dastbasta udhar muh karke salaat wa salam Arz karo be-iske hargiz hargiz na gujro ki Adab ke khilaf hai.

Jahaan tak ho sake koshish karo ki masjide Awwal yaani Huzoor ﷺ ke zamaana E Mubadaja me jitni thi usme namaaz padho Aur uski Mikdaar 100 Haath Lambai Aur 100 Haath Chaudai. Agarche Baad me Jo kuch izafa huwa hai usme namaz padhna nahi masjid e nabavi hai me padhna hai.

Qabre karim ko hargiz peeth na karo Aur jahan tak ho sake namaz me bhi Aisi jagah na khade ho peeth karni pade.

Riza E Anwar ka na takwa karo ma sajda na itna zhukna ji Ruku ke Baraabar Ho Rasoolullah ﷺ ki Ta'azim unki Ita'At me hai.

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 141,142

Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Huzoor ﷺ Ke Samne Kaisa Khada Hona Chahiye❓
Content:
Jaise Namaz Me Khada Hota Hai waise khada ho. Kamaale adab wa haibat, wa khauf, wa ummid ke saath kandile Aqdas ke Neeche us chaandi ki keel ke saamne. Jo hujra e mutahrah ki dakheeni deewar me chara e anwar ke mukabil (samne) lagi hai. Kam se kam chaar haath ke faasile se Kibla ko peeth Aur Mazar E Anwar ko Muh kar ke Namaz ki tarah haath Baandeh khade ho. Lubaab wa sharahe lubaab wa ikhtiyaar sharah mukhtar wa fatawa Aalamgeeri wagairah Mo'Atabar kitabo me is Adab ke baare me saaf saaf likha hai ki. Huzoor ﷺ ke saamne Aisa khada ho jaise Namaz me khada hai. Yah ibarat Aalmgeeri wa ikhtiyaar ki hai Aur Lubaab me Farmaya. Dastbasta dahna haath Baayein par Rakh kar khada ho. Khabardaar- Jaali Sharif ko bosa dene Ya Haath lagane se Bache, ki Adab ke khilaf hai. Balki Chaar Haath faasile se jyaada karib na jaao Yah Unki Rahmat kya kam hai ki tum ko Apne Huzoor bulaya. Apne Muwaajah-e-Aqdas yaani mazaar sharif ke Bilkul saamne Jagah Bakshi. Unki Rahmar Aur Nigaahe karim Agarche har jagah tumahri taraf thi Ab khususiyat Aur is darja kurb (Najdiki) ke saath hai? Walillahil hamd.

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 139

Title: DUPLICATE MAZAR BANANA❓
Content: Shaikh Ul Islam Imam Ahmad Raza Khan Muhaddise Bareily Alaihir Rahma Ki Bargaah Me Sawal Kiya Gaya. Mas’ala: Kisi Wali'Allah Ka Mazaar Sharif Farzi Banana Aur Is Par Chadar Waghaira Chadhana. Aur Is Par Fatiha Padhna Aur Asl Mazaar Ka Sa Adab O Lehaaz Karna Jayez Hai Ya Nahi? Aur Agar Koi Murshid Apne Mureedo'n Ke Waaste Banana. Apne Farzi Mazaar Ke Khawab Me ijaazat De To Wo Qaul Maqbool Hoga Ya Nahi? Al Jawaab: Farzi Mazaar Banana Aur Is Ke Saath Asl Sa Mu'aamla Karna Na'Jayez O Bid'at Hai. Aur Khawab Ki Baat Khilaaf E Shara ‘Umoor Me Masmoo’ Nahi Ho Sakti. {Fatawa Razviya/Jild:-9/Page:-426} ♏.G.♏ GLOBAL TEAM & MEMBERS...

Title: Quran Sharif Padh Kar Bhool Jaaye Qayamat Ke Din Allah Ta'ala Usko Kaunsa Aazab Dega❓
Content:
Qayamat Ke din koodhi ho kar aayega.

Qayamat me din andaah uthega.

Mas'Ala - Quran padh kar Bhula dena Gunaah Hai.

Huzoor-E-Aqdas ﷺ Farmate Hai ki Meri Ummat ke Sawab mujh par pesh kiye gaye yahan tak ki teenka jo masjid se Aadami nikaal deta hai Aur meri ummat ke gunaah jo mujh par pesh huye to isse badh kar koyi gunaah nahi dekha ki Adami ko Surat ya Aayat di gayi Aur Use bhula diya is hadees ko Abu Dawood wa Tirmizi ne Riwaayat kiya

Dusri Riwayat me hai ki jo Quran Padh kar bhool jaaye Qayamat me din koodhi Ho kar Aayega Aur Quran sharif me hai ki Andaah Uthega

Bahar-e-sahari'At Hissa Teesra safa 87

Title: Yazeed ko kafir kehna kaisa hai❓
Content:
Yazeed ko kafir kehna kaisa hai.

Ek sakhs kehta he ki Imam-E-Azam Abu Hanifa ne yazeed ko na kafir kaha, na musalman kaha?

Jawab

Yazeed Paleed Maa Yastahiqquhu min al azeez il majeed, Qat'an Yaqeenan fasiq o fajir aur kabaair par jari tha is par Ahle sunnat ka ijma hai uske fasiq hone me kisi ka ikhtelaaf nahi.

Yazeed ko kafir kehne aur Laanat bhejne me Ikhtelaf hai.

Hazrat Imam e Ahmad Bin Hambal Aur unke muwafiqeen us par laanat farmate hain aur Hamare Imam-e-Azam Laan o takfeer se ehtiyatan sukoot farmate hain. Ke usse fisq o fujoor mutawatir hai, magar kufr mutawatir nahi.

Isme shak nahi Ke yazeed ne zameen me fasad phailaya, Haramain Tayyebain balke Kaaba e Muazzama aur Rauza-e-aqdas ki sakht be hurmati ki, Masjid sharif me ghode bandhe, unki leed aur peshab mimbar e Paak par pade, 3 din Masjid e Nabawi sharif Be Azan o Namaz rahi.

Makka o Madeena o Hijaz me hazaro sahaba o Tabe'ien be gunah shaheed kiye, Kaaba sharif par patthar phenke, gilaaf sharif phada aur jalaya, Madeena Tayyeba ki Paak daman Parsa Auraten 3 roz tak lashkar par halal kar di.

Rasoolullah ﷺ ke jigar paare ko 3 din begair dana pani rakh kar humrahio ke sath Teg e zulm se pyasa zibah kiya,

Mustafa ﷺ ke ghod ke paale hue Tan e Nazneen par Shahadat k baad Ghode daudaaye gaye k tamam istekhwaan e Mubarak (Haddi shareef) churr ho gaye, sar e Anwar k Muhammad ﷺ ka Bosa gaah tha Kaat kar neza par chadhaya aur manzilo phiraya.

Khandan e Risalat ki parda daar Aurato ko qaid kiya gaya, aur be hurmati k sath us khabees yazeed ke darbar me laaye gaye. Is se barh kar Qata e Rehm aur zameen par fasad kya hoga.

Mal'oon hai wo jo in Mal'oon Harakaat ko fisq o fujoor na jaane.

Magar ehtiyaat isi me hai k uske kufr par sukoot kiya jaaye. Kyu k marne se pehle Uske tauba na karne par jazm nahi aur nahi kufr mutawatir hai.

Yahi Imam-E-Azam ka mazhab hai.

(Mulakkhasan Fatawa Razvia jild6 safah 107)

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Alaihissalam ka meaning kya hai
Content:
Nabi aur frishte ke alawa alaihissalam kisi sahaba ke aaghe lagana kaisa?

Hazrat E Imam E Hussain radiyallahu ta'ala anhu ke aaghe alaihissalam lagana kaisa?

Aur kyu nahi lagana chahiye?

ANSWER

Hamare is daur me ye baat aam hoti jaa rahi hai ke sayyedna Ali e Murtaza, Hasnain kareemain, sayyeda Fatima wa Deegar Aal e Rasool ﷺ ke afrad e kareema ke ilaawa sabiqa Ambiya Alaihimussalam ki Baaz Ahl par Lafz "Alaihissalam" ka istemaal karte hain.

Awaam ke ilaawa khwaas ki bhi Aadat ban gayi hai, ke Shia Firqe ke dekha dekhi ye Marz barh raha hai.

Akaabir Saaleheen Ulama o Mashaikh E Muhaqqiqeen ka yahi Mauqif e Mukhtar hai ke Gair e Ambia o Malaika ke liye Alaihissalam Na Istemal kiya jaaye.

Behtar yahi hai ke aisa itlaaq naho.

Balke Aadat khatam kar di jaye taake Mazhab e Shia se Tashaaboh aur uski Tarweej naho.

Islami qaayeda hai ke Bad'mazhab qaum ke sath kisi tarah bhi Mushabahat naho. Unse Mushabahat ke tamam tareeqe tark karne chahiye.

Wajah zaahir hai ke Sunni Bhola Bhala hai. 

Use Shia Apne Mazhab me laane ki kai Tadbeerein batate hain.

Ek yahi hai ke 12 Imamo ke liye Duaiya Jumla "Alaihis Salam" Tajweez kar rakha hai.

Jo kisi dosre Ummati ke liye Istemal nahi hota hai.

Balke keh nahi sakta Abu Bakar Alaihis Salam, Umar Alaihis Salam, Usman Alaihis Salam, balke in Hazrat ke sath Razi-Allahu Ta'ala Anhu ka Iste'mal hota hai.

Awaamun Naas ye sab kuch dekhte hain aur agar wo khud is taraf mutawajjeh nahi hote, to Jamat e Mujtahideen unko mutawajjeh karti hai.

Aur unko ye dikhati aur samjhati hai. Ke ye Duaiya jumla jo Hazrat e Ambiya e kiram Alaihimus Salam ke Mubarak naamo ke sath bhi bola jata hai.

Hamare aimma ke naamo ke sath bhi bola jata hai.

Isi se zaahir o baahir hai ke ye 12 Afraad zumra e Ambiya me shamil hain.

Aur unki imamat Ma'mooli imamat nahi.

Balke Hazrat e Ambiya e Maa Sabaq ki imamat hai.

Faayeda:

Agar Baaz Ulama ki tahqeeq Baraaye Gair Ambiya Alaihissalato wassalam ya Alaihissalam kehne ko jaayez qarar dete hain.

Aur unke qaul par Koi Amal karta hai to wo pehle un 2 hazrat (Hazrat Abu Bakr, Hazrat Umar) ke sath iska istemaal kare.

Jo Ahl e Sunnat o Jamaat ke nazdeek shia ke 12 imamo se ba ittefaq afzal hain.

Aur wo Hazrat Abu Bakr Aur Hazrat Umar رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہما hain.

Mujawwizeen ne agar jawaaz ka bayan kiya hai to tamam sahaba ulama o sulaha ke liye kiya hai.

Sirf Ahl e Bait e At'haar ke 12 afraad ke liye nahi kiya hai.

In halaat ko dekhte hue hazraat e ahl e bait e at'haar رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہم ke zikr ke waqt lafz e alaihis salam ki dua karne ko tark kiya jaaye.

Taake Shia Awaam e Ahl e Sunnat ko Gumraah na kar sakein.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Fajr Namaz ki Sunnat Farz Namaz ke baad Fauran padhna kaisa hai❓
Content:
Fajr Namaz ki Sunnat Farz Namaz ke baad Fauran padhna Najayez Hai. Mas'Ala : Fajr ki Sunnat Qaza Ho gayi Aur Fajr padhli to Ab sunnato ki Qaza nahi. Albatta Imaam Muhammed Rahmatullahi Alaihi Farmate hai. ki Tulu E Aftab ke baad padhle to behtar hai (Guniya) Aur Tulu se Pesh tar Bil Ittifaq Mamnu Hai (Raddul Muhtaar). Aaj kal Aksar Awaam Farz ke Fauran baad padh liya karte hai yah Najaayez Hai. Padhna ho to Aaftaab Baland hone ke baad Aur jawaal se pahle padhe. Mas'Ala : Fajr Ki Namaz Qaza ho gayi Aur jawaal se pahle padhli To sunnate padhe. Warna nahi Aalaawa Fajr ki aur Sunnate Qaza Ho Gayi to unki Qaza nahi (Raddul Muhtaar).

Bahar-e-sahari'At Hissa 4 safa 13

Title: Makrooh Waqto Me Qaza Namaz NaaJaayez Hai Aur Agar Qaza Shuru Karli To Waajib Hai ki Qaza Tood de
Content:
Makrooh Waqto Me Qaza Namaz NaaJaayez Hai Aur Agar Qaza Shuru Karli To Wajib Hai ki Qaza Tood de.

Mas'Ala : Awaam Agar Subah Ki Namaz Aaftab Nikalne Ke Waqt padhe, To Mana Na Kiya Jaaye.

Durre Mukhtar Jild 1 safa 248

Mas'Ala: Mamnu'a Waqt (Yaane Jin Waqto Me Namaz Mana Hai). Agar Janaza Laaya Jaaye, To Usi Waqt Padhe Koyi Karahat Nahi.

Karahat Us Surat me Hai ki Agar Pahle se Janaza Tayyar tha Aur Itni der ki ki Waqte karahat Aa Gaya.

Aalamgeeri jild 1 safa 49

Mas'Ala: Makrooh Waqto me Qaza Namaz Na Jaayez Hai Aur Agar Qaza Shuru kar Li To Wajib Hai ki Qaza Tood de Aur Agar todi Nahi To Farz Saakit Ho Jaayega Magar Gunahgaar Hoga.

Durre Mukhtar Jild 1 safa 249

Aalamgeeri jild 1 safa 49

Title: Farz Ya Magrib ki Namaz Tanha Ek Rakat Padh Chuka tha Ki Jamat Kayim huyi.To Ab Kya hukm aayega Uspar
Content:
Farz Ya Magrib ki Namaz Tanha Ek Rakat Padh Chuka tha Ki Jamat Kayim huyi.To Ab Kya hukm aayega Uspar

Fauran Namaz tood kar Jamaat me Shamil ho jaaye

Farz ya Magrib ki namaz Ek Raka'At padh chuka tha ki Jamat kaayim huyi fauran namaz tood kar Jamat me shamil ho jaaye. Agarche dusri Rakat padh raha ho.

Albatta dusri Rakat ka sajda kar leta to ab in do namazo me todne ki izajat nahi Aur namaz puri karne ke baad nafl ki Niyat se bhi in me sharik nahi ho sakta ki 3 Rakat e Nafl ki nahi Aur magrib me Agar shamil ho gaya to Bura kiya imaam pehrne ke baad Ek Rakat Aur Milakar 4 kare Aur Imaam ke Saath Salam pher diya To Namaz Faasid ho gayi 4 Rakat Qaza kare (Aalamgeeri)

Bahar-e-sahari'At Hissa 4 safa 33

Title: Tahiyatul wazu ki fazilat
Content:
Tahiyatul wazu: Wadu ke baad Aaja E Khushq hone se pahle 2 Rakat Namaz padhna Mustahab hai.

Sahi Muslim me hai Nabi ﷺ ne Farmaya jo Shakhs wazu kare Aur achha wazu kare Aur zaahir wa baatin ke saath Mutawajje ho kar 2 Rakat padhe uske liye jannat wajib ho jaati hai.

Mas'Ala: Ghusl ke Baad bhi 2 Rakat Namaz Mustahab hai. Wazu ke baad Farz wagairah padhe to Tahiyatul wadu ki jagah ho jaayegi.

(Raddul Muhtaar)

Namaz E Isharaq Tirmizi Anas Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu Se Raavi ki Farmate hai. Rasoolullah ﷺ jo Fajr ki Namaz Jamat se padh kar Zikr e khuda karta raha, yahaan tak ki Aftaab baland ho gaya phir 2 Rakat padhe, to use pure hajj wa Umrah ka Sawab milega.

Bahar-e-sahari'At Hissa 4 safa 2

Title: Jo Shakhs Masjid Me Aayein Use 2 Raka'At Namaz Padahna Kaisa Hai (Tahiyatul Masjid)
Content:
Jo Shakhs Masjid Me Aayein Use 2 Raka'At Namaz Padahna Kaisa Hai (Tahiyyatul Masjid)

Tahiyatul-Masjid: Jo Shakhs Masjid me Aayein Use 2 Raka'At Namaz Padhna Sunnat Hai. Balki Behtar Yah hai ki 4 padeh. Bukhari wa muslim, Sarwar E Aalam ﷺ Farmate Hai. Jo Shakhs masjid me daakhil ho Baithane se pahle 2 Raka'At padhle.

Mas'Ala: Aise waqt me Aaya jis me nafl Namaz makrooh hai. Maslan Baad TuLu E Fajr, Ya baad Namaz E Asr. Wah Tahiyatul Masjid Na padhe Balki Tasbih wa Darood Sharif me Mashgul ho masjid ka hak Adad ho jayega

Mas'Ala: Farz Ya Sunnat Ya koyi Namaz Masjid me padh li Tahiyatul Masjid Ada ho gai. Agarche Tahiyatul Masjid ki Niyat na ki ho, is namaz ka hukm uske liye hai.

Jo namaz ki niyat se na gaya ho balki Dars wa zikr Wagairah ke liye gaya ho, agar Farz ya iqtida ki niyat se masjid me gaya to Tahiyyatul Masjid ke kayim makam hai.

Basharte ki daakhil hone ke baad hi padhe Aur Agar Arse ke baad padega to Tahiyatul masjid padhe.

(Durre Mukhtaar)

 

Bahar-e-sahari'At Hissa 4 safa 19,20

Title: Jisne zohar namaz se pahle 4 Aur baad 4 par Muhafazat ki Allah Ta'Ala Us ko Koun Se Ne'Amat Se Nawazega.
Content:
Jisne zohar namaz se pahle 4 Aur baad 4 par Muhafazat ki Allah Ta'Ala Us ko Koun Se Ne'Amat Se Nawazega.

A) Us par Aag Haraam farma dega
B) Sa'Aadat par us ka khatma hoga
C) Us ke Gunah Mita diye jayenge
D) Woh Dozakh me na jayega

Mas'Ala: Isha Wa Asar ke pahle Aur isha ke baad 4 - 4 Rakat E Ek Salam se padhna mustahab hai. Aur Yah bhi ikhtiyaar hai ki isha ke baad 2 hi padhe Mustahab Ada ho jayega. Yoon hi zohar namaz ke baad 4 Rakat Sunnat padhna mustahab hai ki.

Hadees me Farmaya ki Jisne Zohar namaz se pahle 4 Aur Baad me 4 par Muhafajat ki Allah Ta'Ala us par aag haraam farma dega.

Allama sayyed Tahtawi Farmate hai ki Sire se aag me daahil hi na hoga Aur uske gunah mita diye jaayenge Aur jo is par mutaalbaat hai. Allah Ta'Ala us ke farike ko Raazi kar dega. Yah matlab hai ki use Aisi kaamo ki taufique dega jin par saja na ho.

Aur Allama shami farmate hai ki us ke liye basharat hai ki Sa'Aadat par uska khaatma hoga Aur Dozakh me na jayega.

 

Bahar-e-sahari'At Hissa 4 safa 14

Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Imam se pehle Ruku kiya magar uske sar Uthane se pahle imam ne bhi Ruku kiya.
Content:
Imam se pahle Ruku kiya magar uske sar Uthane se pahle imam ne bhi Ruku kiya. Isne us waqt Ruku kiya ho ki imam Ba-Qadre farz qirat kar chuka ho. To Ab Ruku pe kya hukm hoga❓ Ruku Ho gaya Mas'Ala : Imam se pahle Ruku kiya magar us ke uthane se pahle imam ne bhi ruku kiya to Ruku ho gaya. Basharte ki isne us waqt Ruku kiya ho ki imam Ba-Qadre farz qirat kar chuka ho warna na huwa. Aur is surat me imam ke Saath ya Baad, Agar dobara Ruku'a karega ho jayega. Warna namaz jaati rahi Aur Imam se pahle Ruku khwaah koyi Rukn ada karne me tha. Aur yah takbeer kah kar juhka tha ki khada ho gaya to Agar hadde Ruku me sharik ho gaya Agarche kalil (thoda hi) to Rakat mil gayi. (Aalamgeeri) Muktadi ne tamaam Rakato me Ruku wa sujud imam se pahle kiya to salaam ke baad jaruri hai ki Ek Rakat bagair Qirat padhe. Aur na padi to namaz na huyi, Aur Agar imam ke baad Ruku wa sujud kiya to namaz ho gayi. Aur agar Ruku pahle kiya Aur sajda saath-saath to 4ro Rakat e Bagair Qirat padhe. Aur agar Ruku saath kiya Aur sajda pahle to 2 Rakat baad me padhe. (Aalamgeeri)

Bahar E Shari'At 4tha Hissa Safa No 35

Title: 4 Raka'At waali Namaz jise 1 Raka'At Imam ke Saath Mili To Us par Kya Hukm hoga❓
Content:
4 Raka'At waali Namaz jise 1 Raka'At Imam ke Saath Mili To Us par Kya Hukm hoga❓ Us Ne Jama'At Na paayi. Jama'At Ka Sawaab Milega. Mas'Ala:  4 Raka'At waali Namaz jise Ek Raka'At imam ke saath mili To Usne Jama'At Na paayi, Haan Jama'At ka sawaab milega. Agarche Kada E Akhira me shamil hua ho Balki jise 3 Raka'At e Mili usne bhi Jama'At na paayi. Jama'At ka sawaab milega magar jis ki koyi Raka'At jaati Rahi use itna sawaab na milega jitna Awwal se Sharik hone waale ko hai. Is Mas'Ale ka hasil yah hai ki, kisi ne kasam khaayi fala namaz Jama'At se padhega. Aur Raka'At jaati Rahi to kasam toot gayi kaffara dena hoga. 3 Aur 2 Raka'At waali namaz me bhi 1 Raka'At na mili to Jama'At na mili Aur laahik (jiski beech ki ek ya jyada Raka'At chooti ho) ka hukm puri Jama'At paane waale ka hai. (Durre Mukhtaar)

Bahar E Shari'At 4tha Hissa Safa No 35

Title: Masjid E Nabvi Sharif ki Hajiri ke waqt Mushq Khusbu lagana Kaisa Hai❓
Content:
Masjid E Nabvi Sharif ki Haajiri ke waqt Mushq Khusbu lagana Kaisa Hai❓ Masjid E Nabvi Sharif ki Haajiri se pahle Tamaam Jaruriyaat se jinka lagaav dil batne ka baais (sabab) ho nihayat jald faarig ho. Unke siwa kisi bekaar bato me mashgul na ho, fauran wazu wa Miswaq karo aur Ghusl behtar hai. Safed Paakiza kapde pahno Aur naye behatar hai. Surma Aur khusbu lagao aur Mushq Afzal hai. Ab Aastana e Aqdas ki Nihayat khushu wa khuzu se mutawajjh ho. Rona Na Aaye to rone ka muh banao Aur dil ko joor se Rone par Laao Aur Apni Sang dili se Rasoolullahﷺ ki taraf iltija karo. Jab masjid e Nabvi sharif ke darwaje par haajir ho. Salaat (Darood) wa Salaam Arz kar ke thoda tharo jaise Sarkar E do Aalam ﷺ se hajiri ki izazat maangte ho. Phir bismillah kah kar seedhaa paanv pahle Rakh kar khub adab ke saath daakhil ho. Us waqt jo Adab wa taazim farz hai har musalman ka dil jaanta hai. Aankh, kaan, jabaan, haath, paanv, dil, sab gair ke khyaal se paak karo masjid e Aqdas ke Naksh wa Nigaar na dekho. Agar koyi Aisa Saamne Aaye jisse salam kalaam jaruri ho. To jaha tak bane katra jaao warna jarurat se jyaada na badoh phir bhi dil sarkar hi ki taraf ho. Hargiz-Hargiz masjid e Aqdas me koyi Harf (Baat) Chilla kar na kaho.

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 136

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Koun se waqto me Namaz Padhna jayez Nahi
Content:
Koun se waqto me Namaz Padhna jayez Nahi. Mas'Ala: Koyi So Raha hai Ya Namaz padhna bhul gaya to jise malum ho us par wajib hai ki sote ko jagade aur bhule huye ko yaad dila de. (Durre mukhtaar) Mas'Ala: Qaza ke liye waqt Muayyan (Mukarra) Nahi Umr me jab bhi padega Bariujjama ho jayega. Tulu wa Guroob Aur Zawaal ke waqt ki in 3 waqto me Namaz jaayez nahi. Yaani In 3 waqto ke Alaawa umr me kisi bhi Namaz ki qaza Kisi bhi waqt padh Sakta hai. (Aalmgeeri)

Bahar E Shari'At 4tha Hissa Safa No 37

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Jo Huzoorﷺ Ki Qabr E Anwar ko Ziyarat kare Uske liye kua Hukm hai❓
Content:
Jo Huzoorﷺ Ki Qabr E Anwar ko Ziyarat kare Us ke liye kua Hukm hai❓ Us ke Liye Huzoorﷺ ki Shfa'At Wajib hai. Us ke liye Aisa hai Jaise meri Hayaat (zindagi) me ziyarat se musharraf huwa. Allah Ta'Ala Qura'An me irshad Farmata hai Tarjama: Agar Log Apni Jaano par Zulm kare Aur Tumhare Huzoor Hazir Ho kar Allah se Magfirat Talab kare Aur Rasool bhi Un ke liye istigfaar kare to Allah Ko Tauba kabul karne waala Raham karne wala paayenge. Hadees: Daaraktuni qa baihaki wagairhuma Abdullah Ibne Umar رضي الله عنه se Raavi ki Rasoolullah ﷺ ne Farmaya jo meri Qabr ki ziyarat kare Uske liye meri Shafa'At Wajib hai  Hadees: Tabraani kabir me unih se Raavi ki Rasoolullah ﷺ ne Farmaya Jo meri ziyarat ko Aaye Aur wah Siwa meri ziyarat ke Aur kisi kaam se na Aaya to mujah par haq hai ki qayamat ke din unka Shafi'a banu. Hadees: Daarakutuni wa Tabraani unhi se Raavi ki Rasoolullah ﷺ ne Farmaya jisne hajj kiya Aur meri Wafa'At ke baad meri Qabr ki ziyarat ki to Aisa hai jaise meri Hayat (Zindagi) me Ziyarat se Musharraf huwa. Hadees: Baihaki ne haatib رضي الله عنه se Riwayat ki ki Rasoolullah ﷺ ne Farmaya jisne mere Wafa'At ke baad meri ziyarat ki to goya usne meri zindagi me ziyarat ki Aur Jo Harmain me marega qayamat ke din Aman waalo me Uthega. Hadees: Baihaki hazrate Umar رضي الله عنه se Raavi ki Rasoolullah ﷺ ko main ne Farmate suna jo Shakhs meri Ziyarat karega qayamat ke din main uska Shafi'a Ya Shahid (gawaah) hoga Aur Jo Harmain me marega Allah Ta'Ala use qayamat ke din Aman waalo me Uthayega.

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 135,136

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Tawaf Aur Sayee Me Salam Karna Ya Jawab Dena Kaisa Hai❓
Content:
Tawaf Aur Sayee Me Salam Karna Ya jawab dena Jaayez Hai. Yah Baatein Tawaf wa sai dono me Jaayez hai. 1) Salam Karna 2) Jawab dena 3) Haajat ke liye Kalam karna 4) Fatwa puchna 5) Fatwa dena 6) Paani Peena 7) Hamd wa Naat wa Mankabat ke Ashaar Aahista padhna Aur Sai me khana bhi kha Sakte Hai.

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 64

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: 7 Phero Se Kam Tawaf Karna Kaisa Hai Agarche Tawaf Nafl Ho❓
Content:
Tawaf Agarche nafl ho usme yah baatein haraam hai. 01) Be-Wazu Tawaf karna 02) Koyi Ujw (Ang ) jo satr me daakhil hai uska Chuthai 1/4 hissa khuka hona maslan Raan Ya Aurat ka kaan Ya Kalai wagairah. 03) Bagair majburi ke sawari ya kisi ki goad me ya kandoh par tawaaf karna 04) Bila ujr baith kar sarkna ya ghutno ke bal chalna 05) Ka'aba ko daahine haath par lekar ulta tawaf karna 06) Tawaf me hatim ke andar ho kar gujrna 07) Saath phero se kam karna

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 643,64

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Ba-Wazu Sayee karna Kaisa Hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Mustahab Yah hai ki Ba-Wazu Sayee kare Aur Kapda bhi paak ho Aur Badan Bhi Har Kism ki najasat (Napaaki) se paak ho Aur Sayee Shuru karte waqt Niyat karle. Ek Jaruri Nasihat: Baaz Aurato ko Main ne Dekha Hai ki Niyat Be-baaki se Sayee karti hai ki Unki Kalaiyaan Aur Gala khuka Rahta hai Aur Yah Khayaal Nahi ki Makka-E-Mu'Azzama me Ma'Siyat (Gunah) karna Nihayat sakhat Baat hai ki Yahaan Jis Tarah 1 Neki 1 laakh ke Barabar hai. Yoonhi 1 Gunah Lakh ke Barabar. Balki Ka'aba E Muazzama ke Samne bhi Yah Jahil Aurate Isi Halat se Rahti Hai. Balki Isi Halat me Tawaf karte Dekha hai. Haalanki Tawaf me Satr ka Chupana Hamesha Farz Hone ke Alawa Wajib Bhi Hai. To Farz Dusre waajib ke Tarq se do gunah kiye wah bhi kaha Baitullah ke Saamne Aur Khaas Tawaf ki Halat me. Balki Baaz Be Haya Aurate Tawaf karne me Khususan Hazre Aswad ko Bosa dene me mardo me Ghus jaati hai. Unka Badan mardo ke badan se mas hota Rahat hai. Magar Unko Iski Kuch parwah nahi. Halaanki Tawaf Ya Bosa-e-hazre Aswad wagaira huma sawab ke liye kiya jaata hai. Magar wah Be-Gairat Aurate Sawab ke Badle Gunah mool leti hai. Lehaza in baato ki Taraf Haajiyoon ko khususiyat ke saath Tawajjoh karni Chahiye Aur unke Saath jo Aurate Ho. Sakhti ke Saath Aisi harkato se mana karna chahiye warna khud mard bhi gunahgaar honge.

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 61,62

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Sayee Me Paidal Chalna Kaisa Hai jab ki ujr naho❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Sayee ke liye Taharat Sharth Nahi hai. Haiz wali Aurat junub bhi sayee kar sakta hai. Mas'Ala: Sayee me paidal chalna waajib hai. Jab ki ujr naho. Lehaja Agar sawari Aur dool wagairah par sayee ko ya paanv se na chala. balki ghaseetta huwa gaya to halate ujr me mua'af hai Aur bagair ujr aisa kiya to dam waajib hai. Mas'Ala: Sayee me sattre Aurat Sunnat hai. Yaani Agarche sattr ka chupana farz hai. Magar is halat me Farz ke Alawa sunnat bhi hai ki Agar sattr khula Raha to uski wajah se kaffara waajib nahi. Magar Ek Gunaah Farz ke tark ka huwa dusra sunnat ke tark ka.

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 61

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Tawaf ke Phero me Shaq Pada Ki kitne Hue
Content:
To Agar Farz Ya wajib Hai To Ab Se 7 Phere Kare Aur Agar Kisi Ek adil Shakhs ne Bata Diya ki itne Phere Huye To Kya Hukm hai❓ Jawab: Mas'Ala: Tawaf 7 phero par khatm ho gaya. Ab Agar 8wa phera Jaan-Bujkar Kasdan Shuru kar liya to Yah Ek Jadid (Naya) Tawaf Shuru Huwa. Ise bhi Ab 7 phere karke khatm kare. Yoonhi Agar Mehaz (Sirf) waham wa waswasa ki bina par 8wa phera shuru kiya ki shayad Abhi 6 hi huye ho jab bhi use 7 phere kar ke khatm kare. Haan Agar is 8we ko 7wa gumaan kiya baad me malaum huwa ki 7 ho chuke to isi par khatm karde 7 pure karne ki jarurat nahi. (Durre Mukhtaar) Mas'Ala: Tawaf ke phero me shaq pada ki kitne huye to Agar Farz Ya wajib hai to ab se 7 phere kare. Aur Agar kisi ek adil Shakhs ne bata diya ki itne phere huye to uske qaul par Amal karle. Ab behtar hai Aur 2 adil ne bata diya to unke kahne par jarur amal kare aur tawaf agar farz ya wajib nahi hai to gaalib gumaan par amal kare. (Raddul Muhtaar)

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 53

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Wazu me Waswase dalne wale shaitan ka kya naam hai❓
Content:
Wazu me Waswase dalne wale shaitan ka naam walhaan hai❓ Jab wazu jaata rahe wazu kar lena Mustahab hai. Naabaalig par wazu farz nahi. Magar unhe bhi wazu karana Chahiye taaki Aadat ho. Aur Wazu karna Aa jaye Aur wazu ke Maslose Aagah ho jaaye. Chullu me paani lete waqt dhyaan Rakhe ki paani na gire ki fazul kharchi hogi. Aisa hi jis kaam ke liye chullu me paani le uska Andaaz Rakhe jarurat se jyaada na le. Jaise naak me paani daalne ke liye Aadha challu kaafi hai, to pura challu na le ki fazul kharchi ho. Haath paav seena Aur peeth par baal ho to hadtaal wagairah se saaf kar daale ya tarashwa le nahi to paani jyada kharch hoga. Walhaan Ek Shaitaan ka Naam hai. Jo wazu me waswasa daalta hai uske waswase se bachne ke liye behtarin tadbir yah hai Aauzbillahiminash shaitanirrazim padeh.

Bahar-E-Sahari'At Dusra Hissa Safa 21

Khalifa-e-huzoor Tajushshariah

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Kaun si Baatein Ehram Ki Halat me Haraam hai❓
Content:
Kaun si Baatein Ehram Ki Halat me Haraam hai❓ Ehram Ki Haalat me Yah baatein Haraam hai 01) Aurat se Sohabat (Hambistari) 02) Bosa (Ya'ani Chumna) 03) Masaas (Ya'ani Godme lena) 04) Gale lagana 05) Uski Sharm gaah par najar karna jab ki yah Charo baate Shawat ke Saath ho 06) Aurat ke Saamne Zima'a Aur Bosa Wagairah ka naam lena 07) Fuhush (Ya'ani Be-Huda bakwas) 08) Gunah Hamesha Haraam the Ab Aur Sakhat Haram ho gaye 09) Kisi se dunyavi ladahyi zhagda 10) Jangal ka shikar khud karna 11) Jangal ki Shikar ki taraf shikar karne ki taraf ishara karna 12) Ya Kisi Tarah Batana 13) Banduk ya Baarud ya uske zibah karne ki churi dena 14) Shikar ke Ande todna 15) Par ukhadna 16) Paanv ya baazu todna 17) Shikar ka doodh dhona 18) Shikar ka Gosht ya 19) Ande pakana ya bhunna 20) Bechna 21) Kharidna 22) khana 23) Aur Apna ya dusre ka naakhun katraana Ya Dusre se Apna katarawaana 24) Sar se paanv tak kahise koyi baal kisi tarah Alag karna 25) Muh ya 26) Sar kisi kapde wagairaah se chupana 27) Basta ya kapde ki potli ya gathari sar par Rakhna 28) Imama bandhna 29) Burkha Dastaane pahenna moje ya Jurrabe jo pairke Darmiyaani hisse ko chupayein ( jaha Arbi jute ka tasma hota hai) pahenna Agar Jutiyaan naho to Moje kaat kar pahne ki wah tasma ki jagan na chupe. 32) Sila kapda pahenna 33) Khushbu baalo ya 34) Badan 35) Kapdo me lagana 36) Mallagiri, ya kusum, Ya Za'afraan garaj kisi khushbu ke runge kapde pahenna jab ki Abhi khushbu de rahe ho. 37) Khaalis khushabu Ambar, Za'afraan, Jaaweetri, Lawng, Ilayichi, Daalcheeni, Sooth wagairah khaana. 38) Aisi khushbu Aanchal me bandhna jisme filhaal mahak ho Jaise Mushaq, Ambar, Jaafraan. 39) Sar ya daadhi ko khatmi ya kisi Khushbudaar Aisi cheez se dohna jisse juyein mar jaayein. 40) Wasma (Ek Tarah ka Rung jo neel ke patto se banaya jaata hai. Ya mehndi ki khijaab lagana). 41) Goond wagairah se baal jamaana 42) Zaitoon 43) Ya Teel ka tel Agarche khushbu ho baalo, Ya Badan me lagana. 44) Kisika sar mundana Agarche uska Ehram na ho 45) Junyein maarna 46) Ju pehkna 47) Kisko juyein maarne ka ishara karna 48) Kapda uske maarne ko dhona ya 49) Dhoop me daalna 50) Baalo me paara wagairah uske maarne ko lagaana garaj joon ke maar daalne par kisi tarah ki madad karna ya karaana

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 36/37

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Jo Adami Ba-Wazu (Wazu Se Tha) Ab Use Shaq Hai ki Wazu Hai Ya Toot Gaya.
Content:
Aur Jab Ki Yah Shaq Waswase Ke Taur Par Na Huwa Karta Ho. Tab Aise Waqt Me Kya Karna Chahiye❓ Jawab: Agar Wazu Ke Darmiyaan Kisi Ujwa Ke Darmiyaan Kisi Uzwa ke Dhoone me Shaq Ho jaaye. Aur Yah Zindagi ka Pahla Waakiya ho To Usko Dhoole. Aur Agar Aksar Shak Padta Hai to Uski Taraf Tawajjo Na Kare. Aise Hi Agar Wazu ke baad Shak ho to Uska Kuch Khayaal Na Kare. Jo Adami Ba-Wazu (Wazu Se Tha) Ab Use Shak Hai ki Wazu Hai Yaa Toot Gaya To Wazu Ki Use Jarurat Nahi. Haan Kar Lena Behtar Hai. Jabki Yah Shak Waswase ke Taur par Na Huwa Karta Ho Aur Agar Waswasa Hai To Use Hargiz Na Maane. Is Surat me Ehtiyaat Samaj kar Ehtiyaat Karna Ehtiyaat Nahi Balki Shaitaan Ki Ita'At Hai. Aur Agar Be-Wazu (Bagair Wazu) Tha. Ab Use Shak Hai ki Main ne Wazu Kiya Ya Nahi. To Wah Bila Wazu Hai Usko Wazu Karna Jaruri Hai.

Bahar-E-Sahari'At Safa Dusra Hissa Safa 26

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Surah E Fatiha Sharif Ke Baad Surat Padi Uske baad phir Alhamdu Padhi, To Namaz Ka kya hukm hai ❓
Content:
Surah E Fatiha Sharif Ke Baad Surat Padi Uske baad phir Alhamdu Padhi. To Namaz Ka kya hukm hai❓ Jawab: Mas'Ala: Surah E Fatiha sharif ke baad Surat padi Us ke baad Phir Alhamdu Padi To Sajda-E-Sahw Wajib nahi. Yoonhi Farz ki peechali Rakato me fatiha ki takraar se mutlakan Sajda-E-Sahw wajib nahi. Aur Agar pahli Rakato me Surah E Fatiha ka kai jyaada hissa padh liya tha. Phir iaada (repeat) kiya to Sajda-E-Sahw wajib hai. (Aalmgeeri)

Bahar E Shari'At 4tha Hissa Safa No 43

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Sajda Sahu ke Baad Bhi Attahiyat Padhna kaisa hai❓
Content:
Sajda Sahu ke Baad Bhi Attahiyat Padhna kaisa hai❓ Mas'Ala: Sajda E Sahu ke baad Bhi attahiyat padhana wajib hai. Attahiyat padh kar salam phere Aur Behtar yah hai ki dono Qa'do me Darood Sharif bhi padhe. (Aalamgeeri) Aur yah Bhi Ikhtiyaar hai ki pahle Qa'da me attahiyat wa darood padhe Aur dusre me sirf attahiyat. Mas'Ala: Wajibaat e Namaz me jab koyi wajib bhule se reh jaye, to uski talaafi yaani kami ko pura karne ke liye Sajda Sahu wajib hai. Aur uska tarika yah hai ki attahiyat ke baad dahini Taraf salam pher kar Sajda kare phir attahiyat wagairah padh kar salam pehre.

(Aamma-E-Qutub)

Bahar E Shari'At 4tha Hissa Safa No 42,43

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Jo Ahle Madina Ko Iza (Taklif) dega Us ke Saath Kya Hoga❓
Content:
Jo Ahle Madina Ko Iza (Taklif) dega Us ke Saath Kya Hoga❓ Hadees: Tabraani Ubada Ibne Samit رضي الله عنه se Ravi Hai ki Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Farmaya Ya Allah Jo Ahle Madina Par Zulm kare Aur Unhe daraye. Use khauf me Mubtala kar Aur us par Allah Aur farishato Aur Tamaam Aadamiyoon ki laanat Aur Uska Na Farz kabul Kiya jayega na Nafl isi ki misl Nasai Aur Tabraani ne Saib ibne Khallad رضي الله عنه se Riwayat ki. Hadees: Tabraani kabir me Abdullah ibne umar رضي الله عنه se Raavi ki Rasoolullah ﷺ ne Farmaya jo Ahle madina ko iza (Taklif) dega Allah Ta'Ala use iza dega Aur us par Allah Aur Farishto Aur Tamaam Aadamiyoon ki laanat Aur Uska Na Farz kabul kiya jaayega Na Nafl.

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 135

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Kisi Rakat ka koyi Sajda Rah gaya Aakhir me Yaad Aaya To Ab kya hukm hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Aayte Sajda padi Aur Sajda karna Bhul gaya To Sajda-E-Tilawat kare Aur Sajda-E-Sahw kare. (Aalamgeeri) Mas'Ala: Kisi Rakat ka koyi Sajda Rah gaya Aakhir me Yaad Aaya to Sajda kare phir Attahiyat padh kar Sajda-E-Sahw kare. Aur Sajda-E-Sahw ke pahle jo Afaale Namaz Ada kiye baatil na honge. Haan, Agar Qa'ada ke baad wah namaz waala Sajda Kiya, to sirf wah Qa'ada jaata Raha

Bahar E Shari'At 4tha Hissa Safa No 43,44

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Qada-E-Ula Me Attahiyat ke Baad Itna Padah. Allah Humma Salli Ala Muhammed. To Kya hukm hoga Namaz ka❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Qada-E-Ula Me Attahiyat ke baad itna padha Allah humma Salli Ala Muhammed, Sajda-E-Sahw Wajib Hai. Is wajah se Nahi ki Darood Sharif Padha. Balki Is wajah se ki teesri ke Kiyaam me Takhir huyi. To Agar Itni der tak Sukut kiya jab bhi Sajda-E-Sahw wajib hai. Jaise Qada'a, wa Ruku, wa Sujud me Quran padhne se Sajda-E-Sahw wajib hai, halanki wah kalame ilahi hai. Imam e Azam Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu Ne Nabi ﷺ ko Khwaab me dekha. Huzoor ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya: Darood Padh ne waale par Tumne kyun Sajda-E-Sahw wajib Bataya Arz ki Isliye ki Usne Bhool kar padha Huzoor ﷺ Ne Tahseen Farmayi. (Durre Mukhtaar, Raddul Muhtaar)

Bahar E Shari'At 4tha Hissa Safa No 45

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Junub Ya Haiz Wa Nifas Waali Aurat ka Inteqal Huwa To Us par Kitne Ghusl Hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Junub, ya Haiz wa Nifas waali Aurat ka Inteqal huwa to ek hi Ghusl kaafi hai. Ki Ghusl wajib hone ke kitne hi asbaab ho ek hi ghusl se ada ho jaata hai.

(Durre mukhtaar)

Mas'Ala: Mard ko Mard Nahlaaye Aur Aurat ko Aurat.

Mayyat chota ladka hai, to Aurat bhi nahlaa sakti hai. Aur Chooti Ladki Ko Mard bhi.

Choote se yah murad hai ki hadde Shahwat ko na pahunche ho.

(Aalamgeeri)

Bahar-e-sahari'At 4th Hissa safa 109,110

Title: Qaza namaz ka tarika
Content: Imam e Ahle Suunat Mujaddid E Dino Millat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radiallahu Ta'ala Anhu Farmate Hai. Qaza Namazein Jald Se Jald Ada Karna Laajim Hai. Na Maalum Kis Waqt Maut Aa Jaye. Kya Mushkil Hai Ek din Ki 20 Rakat hoti Hai. (Yaani Fazr ke Farzo ki 2 Rakat Aur zuhar ki 4 Rakat Aur Asar Ki 4 Rakat Magrib ki 3 Rakat Aur Isha ki 7 Rakat 4 Farz Aur 3 witr). In Namazo ke siwaye tulu, wa gurub, wa Jawal ke (ki jis waqt sajda Haraam hai). Har waqt ada kar sakta hai. Aur Ikhtiyaar hai ki pehle Fazr ki sab namazein Ada karle. Phir zuhar, phir Asar, phir magrib, phir isha ki. Ya Sab Namazein Saath-Saath ada karta jaaye aur unka aisa hisab lagaye ki takhmina me baaki na rah jaaye. Jyaada ho jaaye to haraj nahi aur sab ba'qadr taakat rafta-rafta jald ada karle, kaahili naa kare. Jab Tak Farz Namazein Zimma par Baaki Rahta Hai Koyi Nafl Qabool Nahi Kiya Jaata. Qaza Namaz ka tarika Niyat un namazo ki is tarah ho, maslan 100 baar ki Fazr Namaz Qaza hai. To har baar yoon kahe ki sab se pahle jo fazr mujhse Qaza Huyi. Har dafa yahi kahe, Yaani ek ada huyi, toh baakiyoon me jo sab se pehli hai. Isi tarah zuhar wagairah Namaz me niyat kare. Jispar bahut si Namaz-e-qaza ho unke liye Surat-e-Takhfeef aur jald ada hone ki yah hai. Ki khaali rakato me bajaaye Alhamdu Sharif ke teena baar Subhan'Allah kahe. Agar ek baar bhi keh lega, to Farz ada ho jayega. Neez Tasbeehaat Ruku, wa Sujud me sirf ek-ek baar Subhanaa Rabbiyal-Azim Aur Subhanaa Rabbiyal-Aala padh lena kaafi hai. Tashahhud ke baad dono durood Sharif ke bajaye. Allahumma Salle Ala Saiyyedina Muhammadin wa Aalehi. Witro me Bajaye dua e qunoot Rabbig-Feerli kahna kaafi hai. Tulu e Aftab ke 20 minute baad Aur Gurub e Aaftab se 20 Minutes Qabl Namaz Ada kar sakta Hai. Usse pehle, ya uske baad najaayez hai. Har Aisa Shakhs jiske jimma namaze baki hai. Chuup kar padhe ki Gunah ka Ehlaan Jayez nahi. Isi Silsila me Irshad Farmaya. Agar kisi Shakhs ki jimma 30 ya 40 saal ki Namazein Wajibul-Ada Hai. Usne Apne in jaruri kamo ke Alawa jinke Bagair gujar nahi karobaar Tarrk kar ke padhna Shuru kiya. Aur Pakka Irada kar liya ki kal namazein ada karke Aaram lunga. Aur Farz kijiye Aisi Halat me Ek Mahina, Ya Ek din hi ke baad uska inteqal ho jaaye. To Allah Ta'ala Apni Rahmatein Qamila se Uski Sab Namazein Ada kar dega. Al Malfuz Safa 99,100 -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Jab Maut Ka Waqt Karib Aaye Aur Alaamate Paayi jaye To Daahini Karwat Par Lita kar Qible Ki Taraf Muh Kar dena Kaisa Hai❓
Content:
Jab Maut ka waqt karib Aaye Aur Alaamate paayi jaaye. To Sunnat yah hai ki daahini karwat par lita kar Qibla ki Taraf Muh kar de.

Aur Yah bhi Jaayez hai ki cheet litaaye Aur Qibla ko paanv kare ki Yoonhi kible ko Muh ho jaayega.

Magar is Surat me sar ko kuch Uncha Rakhe Aur Qibla ko Muh karna dushwaar ho ki us waqt ki takleef hoti ho to jis halat par hai choor de.

(Durre Mukhtaar)

Mas'Ala: Jaankani ki Halat (Dam Nikalte waqt ki halat) me jab tak Rooh gale ko na Aai use talkeen kare.

Ya'ani uske paas Baland Aawaz se padhe.

Ashahadoo Anla ilaha ilallahu wa ashahadoo an muhammadan Rasoolullah

Tarjama: Main Gawahi deta hoon ki Allah Ta'Ala ke siwa koyi ma'abud (poojne ke kaabil) nahi. Aur Muhammed ﷺ Allah Ta'Ala ke Rasool hai. Magar use iske kahane ka hukm na kare.

Mas'Ala: Jab usne kalima pad liya to talkeen karde (Rook de).

Haan Agar Kalima padne ke baad Usne koyi Baat ki to phir Talkeen kare ki uska aakhir kalama.

La Ilaha Illahu Muahammedoor Rasoolullah ho. (Aalamgeeri)

Title: Attahiyat Ki Jagah Surah E Fatiha Padi To Ab kya hukm hoga❓
Content: Mas'Ala: Pahli 2 Rakato ke qiyaam me Surah E Fatiha Ke baad attahiyat padha Sajda-E-Sahw Wajib hai Aur Surah E Fatiha se pahle padhe to nahi. (Aalamgeeri) Mas'Ala: Peechli Rakato ke kiyaam me attahiyat padha to wajib na huwa. Aur agar Qada-E-Ula me chand baar attahiyat padha Sajda-E-Sahw Wajib ho gaya. (Aalamgeeri) Mas'Ala: Attahiyat padahna bhool gaya Aur salam pher diya. Yaad Aaya, To Laut aayein attahiyat padhe Aur Sajda-E-Sahw kare. Yuhi Agar attahiyat ki jagah Surah E Fatiha padhi Sajda-E-Sahw Wajib ho gaya. (Aalamgeeri) Bahar E Shari'At 4tha Hissa Safa No 45 -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Kafan Ke Kitne darje Hote hai❓
Content:
Mayyat ko kafan dena farz E Kifaya hai.
(Agar kisi ne kafan nahi diya to jis ko ma'alum tha sab gunahgaar huye).

Kafan ke 3 darje hai
1. Jarurat
2. Kifaayat
3. Sunnat

Mard ke liye 3 kapde Sunnat hai
1. Ijaar
2. Lifafa
3. Kamis

Aur Aurat ke liye 5 kapde Sunnat hai

1. Ijaar
2. Lifafa
3. Kamis
4. Odahni
5. Seena band

Kafne kifayat mard ke liye 2 kapre hai
1. Lifaf
2. Ijaar

Aur Aurat ke liye kifayat 3 hai
1. Lifafa
2. Ijaar
3. Odahni

Ya

1. Lifafa
2. Kamis
3. Odahni

Kafne jarurat dono ke liye yah ki jo mayassar aaye Aur kam az kam itna ho ki saara nadan dhak jaaye.
(Durre Mukhtaar, Aalamgeeri Wagair huma)

Bahar-e-Shari'At 4hta Hissa Safa No 113

Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Mayyat ki dhadi (beard) Ya Sar ke Baal Me Kangaah karna Ya Nakhun Tarashna Ya Kisi Jagah Ke Baal Mundana Ya Katrana Ya Ukhadna Kaisa Hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Mayyat ki dhadi Ya Sar ke Baal me kangah karna ya nakhun tarashna ya kisi jagah ke baal mundana ya katrana ya ukhadna Naajayez wa Makrooh e Tahrimi Hai.

Balki yah hukm hai ki jis halat par hai usi halat par dafan karde.

Haan Agar Naakhun tuta ho to le sakte hai.

Aur Agar Naakhun Ya Baal Taraash liye to kafan me rakh de.

(Durre Mukhtaar, Raddul Muhtaar,Aalamgeeri)

Mas'Ala: Mayyat ke dono haath karwato me parkhe seene pe na Rakhe ki Yah Kiffar ka tarika hai.

Jaise namaz me qiyam me yah bhi na kare.

Bahar-e-sahari'At 4th Hissa safa 112

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Mayyat ne jo maal chorra usme se sabse pahle kaun sa kaam karein❓
Content:
1) Kafan,
2) Qarz,
3) Wasiyat,
4) Wariso ka haq

Mas'Ala: Dain wa wasiyat wa Miraas in sab par kafan muqaddam hai. Aur dain wasiyat par Aur wasiyat miraas par.

Ya'ani jo maal Chorre usme se sab se pahle kafan, phir Uske baad Qarz, uske baad wasiyat aur us ke baad wariso ka haq.

(johara)

Mas'Ala: Mayyat ne maal chora to kafan us ke jimme hai. Jis ke jimme zindagi me nafka tha, aur agar koyi aisa nahi jis par nafka waajib hota ya hai magar nadar (Bilkul Garib) hai to Baitul maal se diya jaaye.

Aur Baitul maal bhi waha na ho, jaise yaha Hindustan me to waha ke musalmano par kafan dena farz hai.

Agar malum tha na diya to sab gunahgaar honge aur un logo ke pass bhi nahi to ek kapde ko qadr dusre logo se sawal karle.

(Johara, Durre Mukhtaar)

Mas'Ala: Aurat ne Agarche maal chora uska kafan Shohar ke zimme hai.

Ba-sharte ki maut ke waqt koyi aisi baat na payi gayi jisse aurat ka nafka shohar par se saakit (khatm) ho jaata.

Agar shohar mara aur uski aurat maaldaar hai jab bhi aurat par kafan waajib nahi.

(Aalamgeeri, Durre Mukhtaar)

Bahar-e-Shari'At 4hta Hissa Safa No 114

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Bila zarurat Kafane kifayat Se Kam karna kaisa hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Bila Jarurat kafne kifayat se kam karna Najayez wa Makrooh Hai.

(Durre Mukhtaar)

Ba'az mohtaaj kafne masnoon ke liye logo se sawal karte hai yah Naajayez hai. Ki sawal bila jarurat jaayez nahi Aur yaha jarurat nahi.

Albatta agar kapde jarurat par bhi kadir naho, to baqadre jarurat sawal kare jyaada nahi.

Haan agar bagair maange musalman khud kafane masnoon pura karde to insha'Allah Ta'Ala pura sawal payega.

Fatawa Razwiya

Mas'Ala: Kafan Achha hona chahiye yaani mard Eidain wa Jume ke liye jaise kapde pahanta tha.

Aur Aurat jaise kapde pahan kar maike jaati thi. Us kimat ka hona chahiye.

Hadees me hai murdo ko Achha kafan do ki wah Ek Dusre se Mulakat karte Aur Achha Kafan se Tafakhur (Fakhar) karte.

Ya'ani khush hote hai Safed Kafan Behatar hai ki nabi ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya Apne Murde Safed kapdo me Kafnao

(Guniya,Raddul Muhtaar)

Bahar-e-Shari'At 4hta Hissa Safa No 113,114

Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
