Title: Janaze Ko Ghusl Me Ek Martaba Saare Badan Par Paani Bahana Farz Hai Aur teen Martaba Paani Bahana Kaisa hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Ek Martaba Saare Badan par Paani Bahana Farz Hai Aur teen Martaba Sunnat.

Jaha Ghusl de, Mustahab Yah hai ki parda karle ki siwa Nahlaane waalo Aur Maddagaaro ke Dusra na dekhe.

Nahlaate waqt khwaah us Tarah Litaaye Jaise Qabr me Rakhate Hai.

Ya Qible Ki Taraf Paanv Karke, Ya Jo Aasaan Ho kare.

(Aalamgeeri)

Mas'Ala: Nahlaane waala Paak ho.

Junub, Ya Haiz Waali Aurat ne Ghusl diya To Karaahat Hai.

Magar Ghusl ho jaayega, Aur Be-wazu Nahlaya To Karaahat bhi nahi.

Behtar Yah hai ki Nahlaane waala Mayyat ka Sab se Karibi Rishtedaar ho.

Wah Nahlaaye Aur Agar Nahlaana na Jaanta Ho.

To Koi Aur Shakhs Nahlaaye Jo Amanatdaar wa Parez gaar ho.

(Aalmgeeri)

Mas'Ala: Nahlaane waala Ehtimaad wala shakhs ho ki puri Tarah Ghusl de.

Aur Jo Achhi Baat dekhe, Maslan Chehra Chamak Utha, Ya Mayyat Ke Badan se Khushbu Aayi.

To use Logo ke saamne bayaan kare.

Aur koi buri Baat dekhi, maslan chehra ka Rang siyaah ho gaya, badbu Aayi, ya Surat Ya Aaja me Badlaaw aaya.

To ise kisi se na kahe Aur Aisi Baat kahna Jaayez Bhi nahi.

Ki hadees me irshad huwa murdo ki khubiyaan zikr karo Aur unki buraiyoon se baad Raho.

(Johra Nayyira)

Bahar-e-sahari'At 4th Hissa safa 109

Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Mayyat ko ghusl dene ka tarika❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Mayyat Ko Nahlaana Farz E Kifaya Hai. Baaz (Kuch) Logo ne Ghusl De diya To Sab Se Saakit Ho Gaya.

(Aalamgeeri)

Mas'Ala: Mayyat ko Ghusl / Nahlaane ka Tarika Yah Hai Ki jis Chaarpai, Ya Takhat, Ya Takhate Par Nahlaane ka Irada Ho Usko 3, Ya 5, Ya 7 Baar Dhuni de.

Yaani Jis Cheez me wah Khushbu Sulgati ho use utni baar chaarpai wagairah ke geerd phiraye.

Aur us par mayyat ko lita kar naaf se Ghutno tak kisi kapdese cheepa le.

Phir mayyat ko ghusl / nahlane wala Apne Haath par kapda lapet kar istinja karaye. Phir namaz ka sa wazu karaye. (yaani muh, phir kohniyoon samte haath dhooye).

Phir sar ka masah kare phir dhooye magar mayyat ke wazu me gatto tak pahle haath dhona Aur kulli karana Aur Naak me paani daalna nahi hai.

Haa Koyi kapda, Ya Ruyi Ki Furairi Bheego kar daanto Aur Masudo Aur Hoto Aur Mathno par pher de.

Phir sar Aur daadhi ke baal Ho to Gulekheru (Ek Dawa ka Naam) se dhoye.

Yah na ho to paak saabun islami kaarkhane ka bana huwa besan ya kisi aur cheez se warna khaali paani bhi kaafi hai.

Phir baayin (left) karwat par leeta kar yunhi kate Aur beri ke patte josh diya huwa paani na ho to khaalis paani Gunguna hi kaafi hai.

Phir tek laga kar baithaye Aur narmi ke saath neeche ko pet par haath phere.

Agar kuch nikle dhooh daale wazu aur ghusl ko dohraye.

Mahi phir Aakhir me sar se paanw tak kaapur ka paani bahaye.

Phir uske badan ko kisi paak kapde se Aahista poch de.

Bahar-e-sahari'At 4th Hissa safa 109

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Jo Shakhs 40 Kadam Janaza Le Chale UsKe Kitne Kabir e Gunah Mita diye Jayenge ❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Sunnat Yah Hai Ki ek Ke Baad Digare Charo payoon ko kandaah de. Aur Har Baar 10-10 Kadam Chale.

Aur puri Sunnat Yah Hai ki Pahle Daahine Sarhane Kandah de Phir Dahine Paayati. Phir Baayen Sarhane Phir Bayi Paayati Aur 10-10 Kadam Chale To Kuch 40 Kadam huye.

To hadees me hai Jo 40 kadam Janaaza Le Chale. Uske 40 Kabira Gunah mita diye jaayenge.

Neej Hadees me hai jo ke Charo paayon ko kandaah de Allah Ta'Ala Uski Hatmi (Yakini) Magfirat farma dega.

(Aalamgeeri, Durre Mukhtaar)

Bahar-e-Shari'At 4hta Hissa Safa No 116

Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Kafan pehnane ka tarika kya hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Kafan pahnaane ka tarika yah hai. Mayyat ko ghusl dene ke baad badan kisi kapde se Aahista Poch le ki kafan tar na ho.

Aur kafan ko 1 Ya 3 Ya 4 Ya 7 Baar dhuni de le is se zyada nahi.

Phir kafan yoon bichaye ki badi Chaadar. Phir Tahband, phir kafani, Phir mayyat ko us par litaye Aur kafani pahnaye.

Aur dhaadi Aur Tamaam Badan par khusbhu male Aur mawaaje E Sujud Ya'ani Maatha, Naak, Haath, Ghutne, Kadam par kafur lagaye.

Phir ijaar Ya'ani Tahband lapete pahle baayi jaanib se phir daahini taraf se phir lifafa lapete.

Pahle baayi taraf se, phir daahini taraf se taaki daahina upar rahe. Aur sar Aur paanv ki taraf baandhle ki Udne ka Andesha na Rahe.

Aurat ko kafni Pahna kar us ke baal do hisse kar ke kafni ke upar seene par daal de.

Ki seene par Rahe kyun ki Odhani ki Lambai se beecha kar sar par laga kar muh par nakaab ki tarah daal de. Ki seene par rahe kyun ki Odhani ki lambayi Aadhi peeth se seene tak hai.

Aur Chawdayi kaan ki loo se dusre kaan ki loo tak hai. Aur yah jo log kiya karte hai ki zindagi ki tarah udhate hai yah mahaj bekar wa khilafe sunnat hai.

Phir ba-dastur ijaar wa lifafa lapete. Phir sabke upar seenaaband pistaan ke upar se Raan tak Laakar Baandeh.

(Aalamgeeri,Durre Mukhtaar,Bahar e Shari'At)

Bahar-e-Shari'At 4hta Hissa Safa No 115

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Wahabi Deobandi Ke Peeche Namaz Padhna Kaisa Hai❓
Content:
Wahabi Deobandi ke Aqide Qufri Hai.
Maslan Un Logo ka Aqida Yah Hai Ki Jaisa Ilm Huzoor ﷺ Ko Hasil Hai Aisa Ilm To Baccho, Paagalo Aur Jaanwaro ko Bhi Haasil Hai.

Jaisa ki Unke Peshawa Molavi Asharf Ali Thaanvi Ne Apni Kitaab Hifzul Imaan Me Safa No 8 par Huzoor ﷺ Ke Liye Kul Ilme Gaib Ka Inkaar karte Huye Sirf Baaz Ilme Gaib Ke Baare Me Yoon Likha Hai.

Ki "Is me Huzoor ki Kya Takhsi Hai Aisa Ilm To Zaid wa Umar Balki Har Sabi ( Bachha ) Majnun Balki Jamee'a Haiwanaat wa Bahaayam Ke Liye Bhi Haasil Hai" Maaz'Allahhil Rabbil Aalameen

Isi Tarah Un ke Peshawao ki Kitaabo me Bahut Se Qufri Aqeede Hai.

Jinnhe Wah Haq Maante Hai.

Isiliye Unke Peechhe Namaz Padhna Naajayez Wa Gunah Hai. Agar Kisi ne Galti se Padhli ho to Phir se Padhe.

Agar Dobaara Nahi Padhega To Gunahgaar Hoga.

Bahar-e-Shari'At

Anwaare Shari'At Safa 69,70

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Marte waqt Maaz'Allah Uski Zabaan se kalima E kufr Nikla To Kya hukm denge❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Marte waqt Maaz'Allah Uski Zaban se Kalima E Kufr Nikla To Kufr ka Hukm Na denge. Ki Mumkin hai maut ki sakhti me Aqal Jaati Rahi Ho Aur Be-hoshi me Yah Kalima Nikal Gaya.

(Durre Mukhtaar)

Aur Bahut Mumkin hai ki uski Baat puri samaj me na Aayi ki Aisi Shiddat ki halat me puri baat saaf Taur par Ada karle dushwaar hota hai.

Mas'Ala: Uske zimme Qarz Ya jis kism ke Dain ho Jald se jald Ada karde. Ki hadees me hai Mayyat Apne dain me mukayyad hai.

Yaani kaid haalat me Ek Riwayat me Hai uski Rooh Muallak (Adhar Me) Rahti Hai. Jab tak Kaid na Ada kiya jaye.

Bahar-e-sahari'At 4th Teesra safa 107,108

Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Sahab

Title: Naza Me Sakhti Dekhe To Koun si Quran Ne Paak Ki Surah Padhni Chahiye❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Takleed karne wala koi nek Shakhs Ho, Aisa Na ho jisko uske marne se khushi ho. Aur uske pass us waqt nek aur parez gaar logo ka hona bahut Achhi baat hai.

Aur Us waqt waha Surah E Yaseen Sharif ki Tilawat Aur khushbu Hona Mustahab Hai.

Maslan Loban Ya Agarbttiyaan Sulga de.

(Aalamgeeri)

Mas'Ala: Maut ke waqt Haiz wa Nifas Waali Aurate Uske pass haajir Ho sakti hai.

(Aalmgeeri).

Magar Jiska Haiz wa Nifas Munkata Ho Gaya, Abhi Gusl Nahi kiya Use Aur Junub ko Aana Na Chahiye.

Aur Koshish Kare ki Makan me Koyi Tasveer Ya Kutta Na Ho.

Agar yah Cheeze ho To Fauran Nikal di jaye ki jaha Yah hoti hai Rahmat ke Farishte Nahi Aate.

Uski Naza ke waqt Apne Aur uske liye Dua E Khair Karte Rahe.

Koi Bura Kalima Jabaan se Na Nikale Ki Us waqt Jo Kuch kaha jaata hai Malaika us par Aameen Kahte hai.

Naza me sakhti Dekhe to Surah E Yaseen wa Surah E Ra'd padhe.

Mas'Ala: Jab Rooh Nikal jaye To Ek Chaudi patti jabde ke neeche se sar par le jakar geerah de de. Ki Muh Khula na Rahe Aur Aankhe band kardi jaye Aur Ungliyaan Aur Haath Paanv seedhe kar diye jaye.

Ye kaam Uske Ghar waalo me Jo zyada Narmi ke Saath Kar sakta ho Baap Ya Beta wah kare.

Mas'Ala: Mayyat ke Saare Badan ko kisi kapde se chupa de Aur usko Chaarpai Ya Takhat wagairah kisi Unnchi Cheez par Rakhe Ki zameen ki seel na Pahunche.

(Aalamgeeri)

Bahar-e-sahari'At 4th Teesra safa 107

Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah

Title: Uske Ilm Me Kapda Napaak Hai Aur UsMe Namaz Padhi. Phir Maalum Huwa ki Paak Tha To Namaz Ka Kya Hukm Hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Namaz Me Satrr Ke Liye Paak Kapda Hona Jaruri Hai.

Yaani Itna Naajis Na Ho jisse Namaz Na Ho sake.

To Agar Paak Kapde par Qudrat Hai Aur Napaak pahan kar Namaz Padhi Namaz Na Huyi.

Aalamgeeri jild 1 safa 56

Mas'Ala: Uske Ilm me Kapda Napaak Hai Aur Usme Namaz padhi. Phir Maalum Huwa Ki paak Tha Namaz Na Huyi.

Durre Mukhtar Jild 1 safa 292

Bahar-E-Shari'At Hissa Teesra Safa 38

Title: Witr me shak huwa ki dusri hai ya teesri, to ab kya hukm hoga namaz ka❓
Content: Mas'Ala: Namaz me Shak huwa ki Mukim hai, ya musafir. To 4 padhe Aur dusri ke baad Qada Jaruri Hai. (Aalamgeeri) Mas'Ala: Witr me shak huwa ki dusri hai ya teesri, to isme Dua e Qunoot padh kar Qada ke Baad Ek aur padeh Aur is me bhi Dua e Qunoot padhe Aur Sajda-E-Shaw kare. (Aalamgeeri) Mas'Ala: Imam Namaz padh Raha hai. Dusri me shak huwa ki Pehli hai, ya dusri, Ya 4thi Aur teesri me shak huwa Aur muqtadiyoon ki taraf najar ki. Ki yah khade hoto khada ho jaaun, baithe to baith jaaun. To inme haraj nahi Aur Sajda-E-Sahw wajib na huwa. (Aalmgeeri) Bahar E Shari'At 4tha Hissa Safa No 49,50 Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razavi Amjadi

Title: Attahiyat ke baad Ye shak huwa ki 3 Hui ya 4 Aur Rukn ki qadar khamosh Raha Aur Sochta Raha. Phir Yakin huwa ki 4 Hogayi To Ab kya hukm Aayega❓
Content: Mas'Ala: Attahiyat ke baad Yah shak huwa ki 3 hui ya 4 Aur Rukn ki Qadr khamosh Raha Aur sochta Raha. Phir yakin huka ki 4 hogayi to Sajda-E-Sahw wajib hai. Aur Agar Ek Taraf Salam pherene ke baad Aisa huwa to kuch nahi. Aur Agar use hadas huwa Aur wazu karne gaya tha ki Yah shak waka'e huwa Aur Sochne me wazu se kuch der tak Ruka Raha. To Sajda-E-Sahw wajib hai. (Aalamgeeri) Mas'Ala: Yah Shak wakaqai huwa ki is waqt ki Namaz Padhi, Ya Nahi. Agar waqt baaki hai lautaye, warna nahi. Mas'Ala: Shak ki sab surato me Sajda-E-Sahw Wajib hai. Aur Agar Galba-E-Jan (Gaalib guman) me nahi. Magar jabki sochne me Ek Rukn ka waqfa ho gaya ho to wajib ho gaya. (Durre Mukhtaar) Bahar E Shari'At 4tha Hissa Safa No 49 -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Sana wa Dua wa attahiyat Baland Awaaz se padah to kya hukm hai❓
Content: Mas'Ala: Munfarid (Tanha Namaz Padah ne waala) Ne Sirri namaz me zahar se padha to Sajda-E-Sahw wajib hai. Aur Zahari ne Aahista Padha To nahi. (Durre Mukhtar) Mas'Ala: Sana, Wa dua, Wa attahiyat Baland Awaaz se padha to khilaf e Sunnat huwa. Magar Sajda-E-Sahw Wajib nahi. (Raddul Muhtaar) Mas'Ala: Qirat Wagairah kisi mauke par sochne laga ki Ba-Qadre Ek Rukn. Yaani 3 Baar Subhan Allah Kahne ke Waqfa huwa Sajda-E-Sahw Wajib hai. (Raddul Muhtaar) Bahar E Shari'At 4tha Hissa Safa No 46 -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Ruku Aur Sajde me 3 Baar Se Jyaada Tasbeeh Kahna Kaisa Hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: 3 Baar Tasbih Adna Darja hai ki is se kam sunnat Ada na Hogi. Aur 3 Baar se jyaada kahe to afzal hai.

Magar khatm taak ( be-jood ) Adad par ho, haan Agar Yah imam hai Aur Muqtadi Ghabraate ho to jyaada na kare.

(Fethul qadir 1- 259)

Hilya me Abdullah ibne mubarak رضي الله عنه Wagairah se hai ki imam ke liye Tasbihaat 5 Baar Kahna Mustahab Hai. Hadees me hai ki Farmate hai Huzoor ﷺ jab koyi ruku kare Aur 3 Baar "Subhan Rabbiyal'Azim" kahe to uska Ruku pura ho gaya. Aur yah Adna darja hai. Aur jab sajda kare Aur 3 Baar "Subhan Rabbiyal'Ala" kahe to Sajda pura ho gaya. Yah Adna darja hai. Isko Abu Dawood wa Tirmizi wa Ibne maaja ne Abdulla ibne masood رضي الله عنه Se Riwayat kiya.

Bahar-e-sahari'At Hissa Teesra safa 70

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Iqamat Ke waqt Koyi Shakhs Aaya To Use Khade Ho kar Intezar Karna kaisa Hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala: Iqamat ke waqt Koyi Shakhs Aay To Use Khade Ho Kar Intezar Karna Makrooh Hai.

Balki Baith Jaaye Jab "HayyaAlalfalaah" Par Pahunche us Waqt Khada Ho.

Yoon hi Jo Log Masjid me Maujood Hai Wah Bhi Baithe Rahe.

Us Waqt Uthe Jab Mukabbir ( Takbir Ya Iqaamat Kahne waala ) "HayyaAlalfalaah" par Pahunche. Yahi Hukm Imam ke Liye Hai.

(Aalamgeeri jild 1 safa 53)

Aajkal Aksar Jagah Riwaaj Pad Gaya Hai ki Iqamat ke waqt Sab Log Khade Rahte Hai.

Balki Aksar Jagah to Yahaan Tak Hai ki Jab Tak Imam Musalle par Khada Na Ho us waqt tak Takbeer Nahi kahi Jaati Yah Khilaafe Sunnat Hai.

Bahar-E-Shari'At Hissa Teesra Safa 31

Title: Namaz Me Dusri Rakat ki Qirat Pahli Se Tawil karna Kaisa Hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala :- Namaz Me Dusri Rakat Ki Kira'At Pahli Se Tawil Karna Makrooh Hai.
Jabki Bayyin ( Khula Huwa ) Farq maalum hota ho Aur iski Miqdaar Yah Hai ki Agar dono Surato ki Aayate Barabar Hoto 3 Aayat ki Jyaadati se Karahat Hai Aur Chhoti Badi hoto Aayato ki Ta'adaad ka Ehtebar Nahi.
Balki Huroof wa Kalimaat ka Ehtebar hai. Kalimaat wa Huroof se Bahut Tafaaut ( Farq ) ho Agarche Aayate Geenti me barabar ho.
Maslan Pehlime آلمٌ نَشٌرَحٌ padhi Aur Dusri me لَمٌ يَكُنِ اللَّذِ يٌنَ To Karahat hai.
Agarche dono me 8-8 Aayate hai



(Durre Mukhtar Raddul Muhtaar)

Title: Mazarat e auliya Par aurto Ki Hazri Najayez Hai. But Agar Mazar Sharif Kisi Ladies (aurat) Ka Ho Tab Bhi Jana Najayez Hai?
Content: Aurato ka Qabro par jaana ikhtelaafi Mas'la hai, Aksar Ahl-e-Ilm ise Haraam, Ya Makrooh e Tahreemi Kahte hain, ye ikhtelaaf yu paida hua ke ek zamaane me Qabro par jaana sab ko mana tha. Mardo ko bhi aur Aurato ko bhi. Baad me Huzoor pur Noor ﷺ ne is ki Ijazat ata farma di aur irshad farmaya: "Qabro ki ziyarat kiya karo, wo Akhirat ki yaad dilaati hain". Jo hazrat Qabro par jaane ko jaayez rakhte hain, unka kehna hai ke ye ijazat jo Huzoor ﷺ ne Ataa Farmaayi, Mardo aur Aurato sab ko shamil hai. Aur Jo Hazraat Najayez kehte hain unka istedlal ye hai ke Huzoor ﷺ ne aisi aurato par Laanat farmayi hai jo qabro ki ziyarat ke liye jaayein, lehaza Qabro par jana unke liye Mamnol aur Moojib e Laanat hoga. Aur Ulama ye bhi farmate hain ke Auratein ek to Shara'i Masail se kam waqif hoti hain, dosre unme sabr, Hausla aur zabt kam hota hai. Isliye unke Haq me Gaalib andesha yahi hai ke ye wahan jaa kar Cheekh pukaar karengi, Be-Pardagi hogi, Ya Koi Bidat khadi karengi, Shayed isi Andeshe ki bina par Huzoor ﷺ ne unke Qabro par jaane ko Moojib e Laanat farmaya. Huzoor Sadrush Shariah Irshad Farmate hain: Mazhab e Saheeh ye hai ke Hadees "لعن الله زوارات القبور" Mansookh hai ye Hukm muqaddam hai aur dosri Hadees, Jisme ziyarat e Qubor ki ijazat hai wo Muta'kkhar o Naasikh hai. Wo Hadees ye hai "كنت نهيتكم عن زيارة القبور الا فزوروها" Is Hadees me agarche segha muzakkar hai, magar ye amr muqarrar aur saabit hai ke khitabaat e Shara'iyyah me agarche segha muzakkar hai Auratein bhi isme dakhil hain jab tak daleel e Shara'i se rijaal ki khususiyat saabit na aur Hadees "النساء شقائق الرجال" Iski kashif hai. Lehaza ziyarat e quboor se Aurato ko murtakib e Fel'e Haraam nahi kaha jayega. Agarche hamare nazdeek aslam tareeqa ye hai ke Aurato ko ziyarat e quboor se mana kiya jaaye. Kyuke unme ifraat o tafreet ka Maaddah gaalib hai aur surat e Mas'oola me hijab aur Adaab e e'zaaz ka pura lehaz kiya gaya hai. Lehaaza hukm me aur mazeed khiffat paida ho gayi. (Fatawa Amjadia jild 1 safah 327) Huzoor Sayyedi Ala hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Farmate hain: "Meri Raaye is masle me khilaaf par hai, muddat hui mera fatwa Tohfa e Hanafiyya me Chhap chuka, mai us Rukhsat ko jo Bahr ur Raayeq me likhi maan kar Nazr ba Halaat e Nisaa Siwa e Hazri e Rauza e Anwar ke k Waajib ya Qareeb ba Waajib hai. Mazarat e Auliya ya Deegar Quboor ki ziyarat ko Aurato ka jaana Ba Itteba e Guniya Allama Muhaqqiq Ibraheem Halabi Har giz pasand nahi karta khususan is tufaan e be tameezi raqs o mazameer o surood me jo aaj kal johhaal ne A'raas e Tayyeba me barpa kar rakha hai iski shirkat to mai awaam e rijaal ko bhi pasand nahi rakhta na ke wo jin ko Anjasha Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anh ki Hadi Khwani ba ilhaan e Khush par Aurato ke saamne Mumaana'at farma kar unhe nazuk sheeshiyaan farmaya gaya". (Fatawa Razaviyyah mutarjam jild 23 safah 111) Lehaza Mazkoora Baala Aqwaal e Foqaha Se Ye Saabit ho gaya ke Aurato ke Mazarat par Jaana fi zamaanina Najayez o Haraam hai aur iski Mumaana'at Mahram o Gair Mahram ki Buniyaad par nahi. Balke Unki Parda Nasheeni aur Aaj kal hone waale khoraafaat o bad tameezi ki buniyaad par hai. Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Musalle Kaise Bane Shafi,Hanfi, Hambli, Maliki?
Content:
Musalle Kaise Bane Shafi,Hanfi, Hambli, Maliki? Jawaab: Jab Aap Mareez Hote Hain To Aap Ki Aql Kya Kehti Hai Ke Aap Kis Ke Paas Jaayein? Engineer Ke Paas ? Baniye Ke Paas ? Ya doctor Ke paas ? Zahir Hai Ke Aql Doctor Ke Paas Jane Ka Hukm Karti Hai. Jab Insan Khud Shariat Se Waqif Na Ho Aur Jahannam Me Jaane Se Bachne Ke Liye Shariat Par Amal Karna Chahta Ho. To Masaail Poochne Ke Liye Kis Ki Taraf Ruju Kare ? Alim e Deen Ki Taraf ? Ya Jahil Ki Taraf ? Aql e Saleem Yahi Kehti Hai Ke Us Ki Taraf Ruju Kiya Jaaye Jo Deen Ke Ahkam Me Waqif Ho Aur Alim e Deen Ho. Wo Alim e Deen Ya Khud Deen Me Specialist Hoga Ya Kisi Specialist Ke Nuskhe Ko Batayega Usi Specialist Ko Mujtahid Kehte Hain Aur Us Ke Fatwe Par Amal Karne Ko Taqleed. Islami Shariat Ki Aslan 3 Buniyadein Hain.
  1. ALLAH Ki Kitaab (Qur'an Majeed)
  2. Sunnat e Rasool ﷺ (Hadees e Nabavi)
  3. Ijma e Ummat.
Kitabullah Asl ul Usool Hai Aur Sunnat Kitabullah Ki Tashreeh Hai, Aur Ijma e Ummat Baaz Sunnat Ka Bayan Hai. Kitab o Sunnat Ke Ahkam Ki Koi Na Koi illat Zaroor Hoti Hai. Albatta Kabhi Wo Illat Zahir Hoti Hai Aur Kabhi Makhfi (Poshida), Makhfi Illato Ko Muta'iyyan Karna Bahot Dushwar Hai. Is Kaam Ke Liye Badi Diqqat e Nazar Ki Zarurat Hoti Hai. Ummat Ke Baaz Ahl Ullah Se Allah Ne Ye Khidmat Li Jin Ki Qur'an o Hadees Aur Mizaaj e Shariat Par Gahri Aur Puri Nazar Thi, Ummat Ka Siwaad e Azam Salafan Wa Khalfan Qarnan Baad Qarnin UnKi Imamat Aur Jalalat e Shan Ka Qaayel Hai. Makhfi Illato Ko Muta'iyyan Kar Ke Naye Naye Masaail Ke Ahkam Ma'loom Karne Ka Naam Ijtehad Hai, Aur Ilal e Mutlaqa Par Gair Mansoos Masaail Ko Muntabiq Kar Ke Illat e Mushtarika Ki Bina Par Mansoos Hukm Ko Gair Mansoos Ke Liye Sabit Karne Ka Naam Qiyaas Hai. Lehaza Qiyaas Ki Buniyad Kitabullah o Sunnat aur Ijma e Ummat Hi Hai. Is Se Maloom Hua Ke Aimma Ke Mujtahidaat (Ijtehadi Masaail) Yaani Fiqh Haqeeqat Me Hadees Hi Ka Nateeja Hain. Hadees Ke Muqabil Me Koi Nayi Cheez Nahi Hai, Neez Is se ye Bhi Maloom Hua Ke Ijtehaad Aur Qiyaas Karna Har Ek Ke Bas Ki Baat Nahi Jabke Masaail Par Chaahe Qadeem Hon Ya Jadeed Shar'an Amal Karna Zaruri Hai, Is Liye Ummat Ke Qabil e Etebar Ulama e Deen Ka Kisi Ek Imam Ki Taqleed Par Ijma Hai. Khususan Is Zamaane Me Jabke Shariat Par Ama Karne Ke liye Himmatein Past Hain, Nafs Me Khwahishat Ka Dakhal Hai Aur Khud Raayi Ka Galba Hai. Agar Admi Ko Bilkul Azad Chhor Diya Jaaye Ke Wo Jis Mazhab Aur Jis Imam Ki Pairwi Karna Chahe Pairwi Kare To Chunke Is Zamane Me Khwahishat Ka Galba Hai. Admi apni Garz Aur Khwahish ke mutabiq jo surat har Mazhab Me Se Apne Matlab ki Paayega ikhtiyar kar lega, aur jo uske matlab ke khilaf hoga usko na maanega, aisi surat me Deen to rahega nahi, garz aur nafs parasti reh jaayegi. Ke kabhi us imam ki taqleed karein jo Kisi wajah se nikah ko fasid qarar dete hain aur kabhi us imam ki jo durust qarar dete hain apni garz aur khwahish ke mutabiq aur is tarah amal karna bil ittefaq na jaayez hai. Isi wajah se Ulama ne Aimma e Arba'h me se kisi ek ki Taqleed ko lazim aur zaruri qarar diya hai. Kisi Hadees ka fee nafsihi sahi hona amal ke liye kafi nahi jab tak ye Maloom na ho jaaye ye hadees gair mansookh ya gair mu'awwal hai. Aimma e Arba'h ke aqwaal mukhtalif kitabo me maujood hain jin me un hazraat ne waazeh taur par kaha hai ke hamari har us baat ko maano jo Qur'an o Sunnat ke Muwafiq ho aur jo Khilaf ho usko mat maano. Matlab ye hua ke wo apne aqwal par Amal ki Targeeb de rahe hain aur ye bhi bata rahe hai ke inke aqwal Qur'an o Sunnat ki Mukhalifat nahi karte. Lehaza is se unki Taqleed ka hukm unke apne Aqwal se saabit hua. (Mufti) Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Khadim Ridawi Amjadi Dar Al-Ifta Barkati Islamic Centre Mumbai.

Title: Namaz Ke Wajibat Kitne Hai❓
Content: 1) Takbeer tahreema me lafz Allahu Akbar hona. 2 se 8) Alhamdu padhna yani iski saton 7 aayate ke har ayat mustaqil wajib hai. Inme ek ayat balki ek lafz ka tark bhi tarke wajib hai. 9) Surat milana. Yani ek choti surat jaise اِنَّا اَعْطَیْنَاكَ الكَوْثَر ya teen (3) choti aayatein jaise ثُمَّ نَظَرْ، ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَ بَسَرْ، ثُمَّ اَدْبَرَ وَ اَسْتَكْبَر ya ek ya do aayatein teen choti ke barabar padhna. 10 aur 11) Namaz e farz me do pehli rakaton me qir'at wajib hai. 12 aur 13) Alhamdu or iske sath surat milana farz hai, ki 2 pahli rak'ato me or nafl o witr ki har rakat me wajib hai. 14) Alhamdu ka surat se pahle hona. 15) Har rakat me surat se pahle ek hi bar alhamdu padhna. 16) Alhamdu aur surat ke darmiyan kisi ajnabi ka fasil na hona aameen taaba'i Alhamdu hai or bismillahi taaba'i surat ye ajnabi nahi. 17) Qirat ke baad muttasilan (foran) ruku karna. 18) Ek sajda ke baad dusra sajda hona, ke dono ke darmiyaan koi rukn ka fasil na ho. 19) Ta'deele Arkan. Yaani ruku o sujud o qauma o jalsa me kam az kam ek bar subhan Allah kahne ke barabar taharna. 20) Qauma, yani ruku se sidha khada hona. 21) Jalsa, yani dono sajdon ke darmiyan sidha bethna. 22) Qada e ula, agarcha namaz nafl ho. 23) Farz o witr o muaqqadah sunnaton ke qada E ula me tashahhud se zyada kuch na padhna. 24 aur 25) Dono qa'don me pura tashahhud padhna, yuhi jitne jitne qaide karne pade sab me pura tashahhud wajib hai, ek lafz bhi agar chodega to tarke wajib hoga. 26 aur 27) Lafz assalam 2 baar kehna aur lafz alaikum wajib nahi. 28) Witr me dua e qunoot padhna. 29) Witr me qunoot ki Takbeer. 30 se 35) Eidain ki che (6) zaaid Takbeerein. 36) Aur Eidain Me Dusri Rakat Ki Takbeere Ruku. 37) Aur Is Takbeer Ke liye lafz Allahu Akbar Hona. 38) Aur Har jahri Namaz Me Imam Ka jahr se (Buland Awaz Se) Qirat Karna. 39) Aur Gair Jehri Namazon Me ahista Qirat Karna. 40) Har Farz O wajib ka uski jagah par hona. 41) Har Rakat Me Ruku Ka Ek hi bar hona. 42) Aur Sujud ka 2 hi baar hona. 43) Dusri rakat puri hone se pehle qadah na karna. 44) Aur 4 rakat wali me teesri par Qadah na karna. 45) Ayate Sajda padhi ho, to sajda e tilawat karna. 46) Sahw hua ho to Sajda sahw karna. 47) 2 farz, ya 2 wajib, ya wajib o farz ke darmiyan 3 martabah سبحان اللہ kehne ke barabar waqfa na hona. 48) Imam jab Qirat kare buland awaz se ho ya ahista us waqt muqtadi ka chup rahna. 49) Qirat ke siwa tamam wajibat me muqtadi ko imam ki pairwi karna. Bahar-E-Sahari'At Teesra Hissa Safa 65,66 -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Ek paanv par khada hona Yaani Dusre Paanv ko Zameen se Utha Lena Namaz Ki Halat me Kaisa Hai❓
Content:
Mas'Ala :- Ek Paanv pe khada hona yaani dusre paanv ko zamin se utha Lena Makrooh E Tahrimi Hai. Aur Agar Ujrr ki wajah se Aisa kiya To Harz Nahi

(Aalamgeeri 1-65)

Mas'Ala :- Agar Kiyaam par Qaadir hai Magar sajda nahi kar sakta to use behtar yah hai ki baith kar ishare se padhe khade ho kar bhi padh sakta hai.

(Durre Mukhtar)

Mas'Ala :- Jis Shakhs ko khade hone se katra aata hai ya zakham bahta hai Aur Baithane se nahi to use farz hai ki baith kar padhe.

Agar Aur Taur par uski Rook na kar sake yoonhi khada hone se Chauthayi Satar khul jaayega ya Kiraat Bilkul na kar sakega to Baith kar padeh Aur Agar khade ho kar kuch bhi padh sakta hai to farz hai ki Jitni par qaadir ho khade ho kar padhe baaki baithkar

(Durre Mukhtar, Raddul Muhtaar 1-299)

Title: Ghar Se Bahar Nikalne Ki Dua
Content:

Title: Kuch log Building ke niche yani ground floor par Enterance me Statue banate hai.
Content:
Dargah Sharif ka tharmacol se jaise Garib Nawaz, Haji Ali ect Aur ye bana ke building ka naam mansoob karte hai. Jaisa ye Gareeb Nawaz bldg, Ye Gaus e Paak Bldg. Huzur kya aisa karne ki ijazat hai? Aur kuch to yu karte hai ke kaach me us structure ko rakhte hai. Aur Haar chadate hai aur Agarbatti lagate hai. Ye sab karna kaisa hai? Jawab:
Kisi Mazaar ki Shabeeh Bana kar Rakhne me koi Harj nahi hai, Jaayez o durust hai. Haan! Agarbatti wagaira uske saamne jalaana Fuzool Baat Nazar aati hai.

Title: Kya Aurto ko likhna parhna sikhana haraam hai?
Content:
Sawaal:

Kuch ulama ne kaha ke jaayez hai.

Magar jo Fatawa e razaviya vol 22 page 222 me risala hai.

Murujun nija le khurujin nisa usme to mamnoo samajh me aa raha hai.

Thodi wazahat farma dein.

Jawaab:

Aurto ko likhna sikhana Makrooh hai, Is ki Asl Imam Baihaqi ki Bayan Ki hui wo Hadees hai jo Unho ne Sha'bul Iman me Hazrat Aisha Siddeeqa Razi-Allahu Ta'ala Anha se Naql ki hai ke

"Rasoolullah Sallallahu Ta'ala Alayhi Wa Sallam ne Farmaya Aurato ko Baala Khaano par na basaao, aur unhe likhna na sikhaao, aur kaatna sikhaao aur Surah e Noor ki Ta'leem do"

Magar ye (Mana Karna) Tanzeehi hai.

(1) Hadees me Sanad o Matan ke lehaaz se Suboot e Shakki, Isbaat e Qata'i aur Talab e Kaff, Jaazim hai. Jisse karaahat e Tanzeehi ka suboot hota hai.

(2) Kitaabat (likhna) koi aisi cheez nahi jo Haraam li zaatihi ho (yaani jis ki bina par likhna haraam ho). Balke Fi Nafsihi likhna to ek acchi cheez hai. Uske andar karaahat ek khaariji Amr (fitne ka ehtemaal) ki waja se hai.

(3) Mazkoora Hadees me ye bhi hai ke
"Unhe Kaatna sikhaao aur Surah e Noor ki Ta'leem do".
Isme Hukm Istehbab ke liye hai Na ke Waajib hai.
Aur Is baat se Mana karna ke
"unhe Baala Khaano me na basaao"
Iska Tanzeehi hona bhi suboot hai.

Jiski tauzeeh ye hai ke Hadees me 2 cheezo se roka gaya hai, aur 2 cheezo ka Hukm diya gaya hai.

(1) aurato ko baala khaane me thehraane aur

(2) unhe likhne ki ta'leem dene ki Mumaana'at hai.

Aur (1) kaatna sikhaane aur

(2) surah e Noor ki Ta'leem dene ka Hukm hai.

Zaahir hai ke yahan Amr (Hukm) apne Asli Ma'na (wujoob) me Musta'mal nahi.

Kyuke Khaas "Surah e Noor ki Ta'leem" aur Kaatna Sikhana Waajib nahi.

Balke pehle me Hukm Istehbaab ke taur par hai (yaani surah noor ki ta'leem Mustahab hai) aur dosre me Ibaahat ke liye hai (yaani kaatna sikhaana mubaah hai).

Yuhi Aurato ko Baala Khaane me Thehrana Na Jaayez o Haraam nahi.

Balke Fitne ke ehtemaal ki waja se Makrooh hai aur ye Karaahat tanzeehi hai, na ke tahreemi.

Haan! Jahan Fitne ka Khauf Sahih Ho yaqeenan Karaahat Tahreemi hogi.

Lekin Agar Baala Khaane me thehrana Fitne ka Ehtemaal na rakhta ho to bilkul karaahat na hogi.

Aaj ke zamaane me jab ke Shahro aur Qasbo me kai kai Manzilo (floors) ki imaaratein (buildings) hoti hain aur Lakho ki Ta'dad me log apne Ahl o Ayaal ke sath upar ki manzil me Rehte hain.

Balke neeche ke muqaable me upar ki manzil me rehna Jaan o Maal ki Hifazat ke liye zyada Mauzu hai jaisa ke Hum Mushaahda karte hai.

To is surat me Baala Khaane (upari manzil) me Aurato ko Thehraane me Fitne ka Ehtemaal Nahi.

Lehaaza Karaahat bhi nahi.

Haan jahan Ek Manzil ki imaaratein zyada hon aur Baala Khaane waale makanaat bahot hi kam hon to wahan Aurato ko Baala Khaane me Thehraana Fitne ke Ehtemaal ki waja se Makrooh hoga aur jis tarah ka Ehtemaal hoga Mumaana'at ka hukm bhi waisa hi Hoga.

Qareeb Qareeb yahi surat "Kitaabat e Niswaan" (Aurato ko Likhna sikhaana) me bhi hai.

Agarche Kitaabat Acchi cheez hai.

Qur'an e Pak me Irshad hua
الذي علم بالقلم

(Jisne Qalam se Likhna Sikhaaya)

Hadees e Paak me Aulaad ke Huqooq me Ta'leem e Kitaabat ko bhi shumar farmaaya

ان من حق الولد على والده ان يعلمه الكتاب اي الكتابة

(Ke Haq e Aulaad me se ye bhi hai ke Waalid use Likhna sikhaaye).

Lekin! Chunke Aurato ke Kitaabat Seekhne me Fitne ka ehtemaal hai. Ke wo Khat o Kitaabat ke Zariye Gairo se Rasm o Rawaah kar sakti hai. Isliye Zaraaye (Raasto) ko band karne ke taur par Mana kiya gaya.

Magar ye Mumaana'at Tahreemi nahi.

Balke Karaahat Tanzeehi ke taur par hai.

Isi liye Shaikh Ahmad Shahabuddeen Makki Ne "Fatawa Hadeesiyah" me saraahat ki hai.

ان النهي فيه تنزيها لما تقرر من المفاسد المرتبة عليه....

Jin Ulama ne Kitaabat e Niswaan ke Ta'alluq se "Mana" ka lafz istemaal farmaaya hai. Unho ne isi Tanzeehi par Mamnoo ka itlaaq kiya hai.

Fatawa Razaviyyah Me ek jagah ye Hukm hai ke "Aurato, Larkiyo ko Likhna Sikhana Mana hai"
Dosri Jagah ye Hukm Darj hai "Larkiyo ko Likhna Sikhaana Makrooh".

Dono Ibaarato ka Matlab ek hai. Yaani Mamnoo makrooh par Mahmool hai.

Haan Agar kahin Ehtemaal e Fitna ka Galba ho to Karaahat Tahreem Ke liye hogi.

Garz Hukm ka Daar o Madaar Fitne ke ehtemaal par hai. Agar Fitna ka Ehtemaal Muntafi ho (na paya jaaye) to illat na hone ki waja se Mumaana'at ka Hukm bhi Nahi Rahega. Aur Kitaabat (Likhne) ka Ilm Bilaa Karaahat Jaayez hoga.

Jaisa ke Sahaabiyaat me Ummul Momineen Hazrat AISHA SIDDEEQAH, HAZRAT HAFSAH, HAZRAT SHIFA BINT ABDULLAH, AISHA BINT TAL'HA Razi-Allhu Anhunna wagairaha Ne Kitaabat ka Ilm Seekha aur is se unho ne Islam ki Badi Khidmaat Anjaam di.

Iske baad ke zamaano me bhi bahot si aisi Auratein milti hain jinho ne Ilm e Kitaabat seekha,

HAZRAT AISHA BINT AHMAD QARTABI, MUSH'HIDA BINT AHMAD DENORI, FATIMA BINT ALAUDDEEN SAMARQANDI, MARYAM BINT YA'QOOB ANSARI, FATIMA BINT QAZI MAHMOOD wagairahaa apne waqt ki behtreen kaatibah (writer) theen.

Inka likhna Aisi dhaki chupi baat na thi ke inke zimmedaaro ko khabar na ho. Lehaaza ye baat daleel hai ke in hazraat ke nazdeek "Kitabat e Niswaan" Mutlaqan Mamnu o Makrooh na thi.

Balke Fitne ka ehtemaal na hone ki waja se ye log jawaaz ke qaayel the.

Shifa bint Abdullah Kehti hain ke "Main Ummul Momineen Hazrat Hafsah ke paas thi itne me Rasool e Paak Sallallahu Ta'ala Alayhi Wa Sallam Tashreef laaye aur Irshad farmaya "Kya Hafsah ko Namla ka Mantar na Sikhaayegi. Jaise use Likhna Sikhaaya" Imam Hakim ne Mustadrak me is Hadees ko Sahih Kaha hai.

Is Hadees ke Tahet Mulla Ali Qari ne Khattabi se Adam e Karaahat ka Qaul Naql kiya hai phir us par Mana Waarid kiya hai.

Sahaabiyaat ke ilaawa bahot si Jaleelul Qadr Faqeeha, Aabida, Zaahida aurato ne bhi na sirf Likhna seekha balke Unke Husn e Kitabat ka Tazkirah Muarrikheen ne kiya hai.

Is liye Faisla kun baat yehi kahi ja sakti hai ke Jahan Ehtemaal e Fitna na ho wahaan Hadees e Jawaaz par Amal hoga aur jahan Fitne ka andesha ho Hadees e Mumaana'at par Amal hoga.

Note: Aaj Jab ke Khat o Kitaabat se Ziyaada Mobile Phones wagaira Raabte (Contacts) ke Mazboot Aur Chupe hue Zaraaye Wujood me Aa chuke hain Aur Khat wagaira likhna to Taqreeban khatam ho chuka hai.

Baher Haal is zamaane me khat o kitaabat ke "zariya" banne ki wo Ahmiyat nahi jo Guzishta zamaano me thi.

Aur jab koi zariya fitne ke ehtemaal me qawi (mazboot) rahega Hukm e Mumaana'at me Shiddat Rahegi.

Aur Jab wahi Zariya zamaane ke badalne ki waja se mazboot na reh jaye to Hukm e Mumaana'at bhi Halka ho jaayega.

Balke agar wo zariya taqreeban khatam ya Kam yaab ho to Hukm e Mumaana'at bhi uth jaayega.

Iska Matlab ye nahi ke "Khat o Kitaabat" Is zamaane me Gairo se Rasm o Rawaah ka Zariya nahi hai.

Lekin Itna zarur hai ke Dosre Posheeda Zaraaye iblaag ki waja se ab iski wo haisiyat nahi jo pehle thi.

AL HAASIL agar Khaandaani ya Shaksi Halaat ke Pesh e Nazar Aurato ko Likhna Sikhaane me Mutlaqan Fitne ka Ehtemaal na ho to Jaayez hoga.
Aur Agar Ehtemaal ho to Ehtemaal ke Mutaabiq Hukm e Karaahat hoga.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Allah Mustafa (Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam) Ke Khadmo Me Maut De De, Madfan Bane Hamara Sarkar Ka Madina.
Content:
Hazrat is Dua Ke Tahet Kisi Sunni Barelwi Jannati Ki Maut Madina Munawwara Me Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ke Khadmo me Aati Hai.

To Us Shakhs Ko Jannat Ul Baqi Shareef Me Dafan Hone Ke Liye do Gaz Zameen Ka Tukda Mil Jaata Hai Subhan Allah.

Sawal Ye Hai Madina Paak Me Moujooda Hukumat Najdiyo Ki Hai.
Namaz E Janaza Wa Tadfeen Najdi Hi Karte Hai.

To Kya Us Shakhs Ki Namaz E Janaza Ho Jayegi.

Agar Nahi Hoti To Aisi Surat Me Kya Kiya Jaye?

Jawab:

Mayyat ke wali ko chahiye ke wo Alag apni Namaz Ada karle.

Agar Dafn tak Mauqa na mila to Qabr Ke Saamne Bhi Namaz e Janaza Ada kar sakta hai.

Title: Masjid me sirf farz ada karne ke baad baki ki namaz ghar aakar padhna chahiye. Is par koi hadees e paak ho to jarur batayein.
Content:
Jawab:

Hadees e paak me hai Huzoor e Akram ﷺ ne irshad farmaya.

"logo! Apne gharo me Namaz parha karo kyu ke siwa e farz namaz ke Admi ki afzal Namaz wo hai jo wo apne ghar me parhe".

(Bukhari Shareef)

Sayyedi Aalahazrat Fazil e Barelwi رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــه farmate hai.

"sunan o nawafil ka ghar me parhna afzal aur yahi Rasoolullah ﷺ ki Aadat e Tayyebah.

Magar ab aam amal e ahl e islam sunan ke masjid hi me parhne par hai aur is me Masaale hain ke unme wo itminan kam hota hai jo masjid me.

Aur Aadat e qaum ki mukhalifat mujib e Ta'n o angusht numaai o inteshar e zunoon o fatah e bab e geebat hoti hai.

Aur hukm sirf istehbabi tha to in masaale ki riaayat is par murajjih hai.

Aimma e deen farmate hain aadat k khilaf karna shohrat pasandi o makrooh hai.

(Fatawa Razavia jild3 page 458)

Title: Huzoor gair muqallid ka aiteraz hai ke Imam E Azam ko sirf 17 hadeesein yaad thi.
Content:
Jawab:

Is be maana suwal ka jawab olma e kiram ne barhaa diya hai.

Aur saabit bhi kiya hai ke imam e azam apne waqt ke muhadith e azam the.

Waqt ke aulma wa fuqha aapki bargah me sharf e talammuz hasil kiya karte the.

Khair! Iske jawab me yahan par chand chizein zaroori hain.

Ke imam saheb ki mukhtasar sawaneh e hayat.

Ke jisme apke asatezah, shagird, ham asr aulma wa foqha, aur aap ke ilmi maqam ka tahqeeqi jayezah wagaira cheezon ka zikr bahot zaroori hai.

NAME : Nomaan bin sabit...

KUNNIYAT : Abu hanifa.

WILADAT : 80 Hijri me.

KUNNIYAT KI WAZAHAT :

Ahl e arab DAWAT (shiyahi) ko hanifa kahte hain aur kufa ki jama masjid me 400 dawatein talaba (students) ke liye hamesha waqf rehti thi.

Aur imam saheb ka halqa e dars bahot wasee tha.

Apke har shagird ke pass alag alag apni dawat thi.

Isi liye apko ABU HANIFA.

Yani dawat wale kaha gaya.

Iske alawa aur bhi muta,addid aqwal hain.

BASHARAT E UZMA :

لو كان الايمان عند الثريا لناله رجل من هؤ لاء.

AGAR IMAN SURAIYYA KE PASS BHI HOGA TO ISKI (hazrat e salmaan farsi sahabi e rasool) QAWM KE LOG USKO ZAROOR TALASH KAR LENGE.

ALLAMA JALAL AL DIN SYUTI :

Is hadith ke awwaleen misdaq sird IMAM E AZAM ABU HANIFA hain.

Kyu ke imam e azam ke zamane me ahle faras se koi bhi aap ke ilm wa fazl tak na pahunch saka.

ALM KA SHAHAR KOOFA :

Koofa ko ilm ka gahwara banane me 3 sahaba ka aham kirdaar hai.

Hazrat e ali Ibn e masood Abu moosa ash'ari.

Koofa me hazrat e ibn e masood ki majlis me bayak waqt 4000 afrad hazir hote.

Ek baar hazrat e ali koofa tashreef laaye aur hazrat e ibn e masood apke isteqbal ke liye bahar aaye us waqt poora maidaan hazrat e ibn e masood ke shagirdon se bhara hua tha.

Hazrat e ali ne yeh khoobsoorat manzar dekh kar irshad farmaya.

IBN E MASOOD TUMNE TO KOOFA KO ILM WA FIQH SE BHAR DIYA.

TUMHARI BADAULAT YEH SHA'HAR MARKAZ E ILM BAN GAYA.

IMAM E AZAM AUR FENNE HADITH :

Ahadith fiqh ki buniyad hain.

Quran ke mana aur matlab ke samjhne ke liye bahot zaroori hain.

Isliye imam e azam ne hadith ko hasil karne me bahot mehnat wa jafishani se kaam liya.

Koofa ke bare me imam e bukhari farmate hai.

Ke mai hadith hasil karne ke liye koofa itni baar gaya ke mai khud shumar nahi kar sakta.

Pata chala ke imam e bukhari ke zamane ka ye haal ke wahan bade bade mohaditheen akhaz e hadith ko tashreef layein.

To imam e azam ke zamane me kya haal raha hoga.

IMAM E SHAFAI FARMATE HAIN :

IMAM E AZAM ke zamane me koofa me 93 wo mashaikh hai. Jinse imam e azam ne hadith hasil ki.

Aur unme se aksar tabaee the.

Baz mashaikh jinse imam e azam ne hadith ka ilm hasil kiya unki qadre tafseel yaha hum bataur e namoona pesh karte hain.

IMAM E AAMIR SHABI :

Apne 500 sahaba ka zamana paaya.

Khud farmate hai 20 saal hue ke mere kaan me koi aisi hadith nahi padi jise mai pahle se na jaanta raha hu. (matlab kasrat e hadith ke malik the aap).

IMAM E AZAM ne inse bhi hadithein akhaz ki.

IMAM SHUOBA :

Inhein 2000 hadithein yaad thi.

Sufiyan sauori ne inhein ameer al moominin fi al hadith kaha.

Imam shuoba ko imam e azam se qalbi lagaw tha.

Farmate the.

Ke jis tarah mujhe yaqeen hai ke aaftab rawshan hai.

Isi tarah yaqeen se kahta hu ilm aur abu hanifa dono ham nashin hain.

IMAM A'AMASH :

Tabaee hain.

Shouba aur sufiyan sauori ke ustaad hai.

Imam e azam apse hadith padhte the.

IMAM HAMMAD :

Imam e azam ke azeem ustaaz aur hazrat e anas se hadith suni thi apne aur bade bade tabaeen aulma se bhi ilm hasil kiya.

ABU ISHAAQ SABIEEI (سبيعي) :

Ali bin madieeni ne kaha ke inke hadith k asatiza ki tadaad 300 hai.

Jisme 38 sahaba.

Abdullah bin abbas, Abdullah bin umar, Abdullah bin zubeyr, Nooman bin bashir, Zayd bin arqam Yeh log sare fahrist hain.(imam e azam kd ustaz hain aap)

GARZ :

Imam e azam ko hadith ka ilm hasil karne me wo sharf hasil hua jo digar aulma wa foqha wa mohadithein ko hasil naho saka.

Ke apke mashaikh me sahaba se lekar kibar taba'een, mashaheer mohadithein, ki lammbi jamat dakhil hai.

Apke mashaykh ki tadaad 4000 bayan ki jaati hai.

AISA AZEEM SHAGIRD KE JISKE MASHAIKH 4000 HO USE SIRF 17 HADITHEIN YAAD HOGI?

IMAM E AZAM KI MASAANEED WA KITAB AL AASAR :

Imam saheb ne ilm e hadith wa aasar par mushtamil ek kitaab likhi jisme taqriban 40,000 hadithein maujood hain.

IMAM ABDAL WAHHAB :

Farmate hain ke

Allah ne mujh par ehsaan kiya ke maine imam e azam ki masaaneed e salasa (imam saheb ki likhi hui hadith ki kitab jisme sirf 3 waston se sarkar tak hadith ka silsila pahunch jata hai). ka mutala kiya.

Maine dekha ke aap motabar rawiyoo se riwayat karte hain.

AB RAHI YEH BAAT KE GAIR MUQALLEDIN KA YEH KAHNA KE APKO SIRF 17 HADITHEIN YAAD THI.

Yeh imam e azam se bugz, hasad, aur apna naya mazhab gair muqallidiyat ko farogh dene ke liye imam saheb ki zaat ko majrooh karne ki na paak koshish hai.

Iske alawa aur kuch nahi.

Apne upar padha ke imam saheb ne apni asaar me 40,000 hadithein note karwai.

Apni masaaneed me hazaro hadithein note karwai.

Aur apke asateza ka yeh haal ke unke paas hazaro hadithein hamesha zehan me mahfooz.

Apke shagirdo ka ye haal ke unke paas haditho ka zakhira maujood.

Ek aisa shakhs ke jiske ustaz bhi mohaddith, shagird bhi mohaddith, mashaikh bhi mohaddith.

Magar usi par hadith se jihalat ka ilzaaam.

Aqal me aane wali baat nahi hai.

Apne koofa me 93 mashaikh se hadithein suni.

Gar sabse ek ek hadith bhi soon ke yaad ki ho tab bhi 93 ho jati hai.

Lekin 17 par gakr muqallideen ke pass mazboot dala'eel ho to pesh karein.

Warna ilm e minaare par thookne se thook apne muh par hi laut kar girega.

Baaz ahwaiyah kahte hain ke imam e azam ko sirf 17 hadithein yaad thi.

Jabke imam e azam ke paas hadithon ka zakhira maujood tha.

Hazrat e mulla ali qari imam mohammad bun sama,ek hawale se likhte hai ke.

IMAM ABU HANIFA NE APNI TASANEEF ME 70,000 se zayed hadithein bayan ki hai.

Aur 40,000 ahadith se kitab al aasar ka intekhab kiya.

Ab faisla karna apke hathon me ke

Gair muqallideen ke aitraaz ke jinki buniyaad jhoot aur bugz par hai.

Ise manege ya fir imam e azam ke mashaikh aur apke qareebi zamane walo ki batein.

Jinhon ne apko qareeb se dekha hai unki bata manege.
●●●●●●●●●●●●○
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: HAZRAT TOOT-TE TAARE (STAR) KI KYA HAQIQAT HAI? USE DEKH KAR DUA MAANGNE KO KEHTE HAI ISLAAH FARMAYE.
Content:
Jawab:

Huzur Nabi-E-Kareem sallallaho alaihi wasallam ki Aamad ke waqt arab ka haal ye tha ke unke yaha KUHANAT ka bada charcha tha.

Har jagah is tarah ke log mil jaya karte the jo gaib daani ka daawa karte the.

Yeh unka pesha tha aur yahi unki aamdani ka zariya bhi.

Kisi ki koi chiz ghoom gayi wo kahi ke pass pahunch jata.

Kisi ka koi qareebi rishte daar bimar pad gaya.

Kisi ne naya karobar shuru kiya, usme nafa hoga ya nahi,

Koi safar par nikalne ka irada kiya, garz ke koi bhi kaam karne se pahle wo kahino ke pass pahuch jate aur unse suwal karte.

Aur in kahino ke bare me ahle arab ka yeh aqeedah tha.

Ke inke ma tahat koi jinn hai aur wo gaib ki khabrein aa kar batata hai.

Jab Aaqa e Kareem ﷺ ne ailaan e nabwuwat farmaya aur kaha ke ek farishta hai.

Jo mere pass Allah ka kalam lekar aata hai.

To logo ne aap ko bhi kahin hi kaha aur samjha aur wahi e ilahi ko un kahino ki baton par qayaas kar liya aur yeh samjhne lage ke inke pass bhi koi jinn hai aur wohi aa kar inko batein sikhata hai.

Quran ne is poore waqiye ko aur ahle arab ka batil aqeede ki tardeed ki

(Yaani Ke aaqa e kareem ﷺ ke pass bhi koi jinn hai. Jo gaib ki batein batata hai. Jaisa ke kahin bataya karte the)

aur irshaad hua ke "be shak hum ne niche ke aasmaan

(yaani wo aasman jo zameen se sabse qareeb hai),

taaron ke singhaar se aarasta kiya aur nigah rakhne ko har shaitan sarkash se.

(yaani humne aasman ko har ek na farmaan shaitan se mahfooz rakha ke wo na aa sakein).

Aalam e bala ki taraf kaan nahi laga sakte.

(yaani aasman ke farishton ki guftugu nahi soon sakte. Jaisa ke wo karte the ke farishton ke darmiyan ho rahi guftugu soon kar kahino ko aa kar batate. Magar ab nahi kar sakte ke ab nabi e paak ﷺ tashreef le aaye)

Aur un par har taraf se maar phenk hoti hai.

(yaani angaron ke gole mare jate hain. Agar koi shaitan aasman ki taraf jaye).

Unhe bhagaane ke liye, aur unke liye hamesha ka azaab, magar jo (shaitan) ek aadh baar uchak le chala

(yaani farishton ke darmiyan jo baat ho rahi hai. Use gar koi soon bhi le to)

to raushan angara unke piche laga

(yaani ke use jala ke rakh kar dale.)"

KANZ-AL-IMAN.
(Sura Saffat Aayat No 6,7,8,9,10.)

Is poori baat se ye samjh me aaya ke toot te sitare ki haqeeqat yeh hai ke shayatin farishton ke darmiyan ho rahi baaton ko choori chupke sunne ki koshish karte hai.

Magar unhe شهاب ثاقب yani rauwshan angare se jala diya jata hai aur jalta hua kabhi kabhi hame bhi nazar ata hai aasmano me.

Ab rahi baat yeh ke toot te sitare ko dekh dua mangna kaisa hai.

To yaad rakhein wahan dua nahi mangna hai.

Balke "لا حول و لا قوة الا بالله العلي العظيم" padhna hai.

Yeh kahin se sabit nahi ke us waqt dua qobool hoti hai.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Hazrat kai log bahut bade aawaz se namaz aur Quran padhte hain masjido mein. Aisa karna kaisa aur unke liye kya hukm rahega?
Content:
Jawab:

Agar koi Tan'ha hai, to uske liye hukm hai ke itni aawaz se qirat kare ke khud soon sakein.

Agar isse zyadah aawaz me karta hai ke door tak aawaz jati hai aur aas paas koi maujood nahi, to harj nahi.

Lekin aise mein agar dosre bhi maujood hai aur apne Auraad o Wazaaif, Tilawat o Ibadat mein mashgool hain, to chahiye ke ahista parhe.

Warna parhne wala Gunahgar hoga aur agar log sunne ke liye hi baithe hai, to buland awaz me parhe.

Aise mein agar koi na sune aur dusre kaam karne lage, to wo sunne waala gunahgar hoga.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Jab Bachcha paida hota to uska Chatti chilla karte hai? Iska shariyat me kya hukum hai.
Content: Jawab: Bachche ki paidaish ke saatwen 7 din uska aqeeqa kiya jaye. Uske sar ke baal chilwa diye jayein aur un baalon ke wazan ke barabar chandi, ya uski raqam (gar isteta'at hoto) sadqa karein. Aur ladka ho to do (2) bakre aur agar ladki ho to Ek (1) bakri zabah karein aqeeqe ke taur pe. Sab ko khilaaye, garibon ka khaas khyal rakhein. Tamaam rishtedaron ko khila sakta hai. Yeh jo log kahte hai ke aqeeqa ke janwar se bache ke maa baap, daada daadi, naana naani nahi khaa sakte. Jahilon ki kahawat hai. Balke sabhi khaa sakte hai aur khila bhi sakte hai. Aisa karna Sunnat e Rasool ﷺ hai. Lekin log apni isteta'at ke mutabiq chatti chilla ke ame pe kabhi bhi yeh rasm ada karte hai. Wo bhi jayez hai. Jab chahein karein koi saatwen (7) din hi karna hai aisa zaroori nahi. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Kya Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam kehna khaas aap nabi sallallahu alaihi wasallam ke liye hi hai? Aur alaihis salam kin ko lagane ka hukm hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Ulama ne farmaya hai ke agar apko awaz dene ke waqt adab ka taqaza ye hai ke apko makhsus alfaz aur alqaab se yaad kiya jaaye. To ap par durood o salam pesh karte waqt bhi adab laazim hai, ke Durood o salam ke alfaz makhsus hon.

Aur chunke Allah Ta'ala ne صلوا عليه وسلموا تسليما ki Taleem di hai.

Lehaza is Mubarak Alfaz "Sallallahu Alaihi wa Sallam" ko apke sath makhsus rakhna chahiye.

Lehaza yahi Ma'roof hai ke "Sallallahu Alaihi wa Sallam" ka Istemal Sirf Huzoor ke sath Khas.

Jabke "Alaihissalam" ka Istemaal Ambiya o Malaaika ke sath khaas hai.

Rahi Baat Sirf Durood, Ya Sirf Salam ki, to ye bhi Jaayez.

Balke Ahadees se Saabit hai. Jaise Durood e Ibrahimi Wagairah.

Lehaza Huzoor ﷺ ke Ism e Paak ke Sath Alaihis Salam Bhi Kehna jaayez.

Lekin Ulama Tasreeh Farmate hain ke Durood o Salam Dono Zikr Karna Behtar hai.

Taake Mazkoora Ayat e Kareema par Amal ho jaaye.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Zaid Dawa Karta Hai Ki Mai Aasiq E Rasool Hoon. Par Zaid Namazo Ki Bilkul Pabandi Nahi Karta Hai.

Kya Sirf Namazo Ki Pabandi Na Karne Ke Buniyad Par Bakr ka Aisa Kehna Ki Tum Sachche Aasiq E Rasool Nahi Ho. Toh Aisa Kehne Par Bakr Par Kuch Hukum Lagega?

Aur Zaid Ka Dawaa Karna Aashiq E Rasool Aur Namazo Ki Pabandi Na Karne Par Kya Hukum Hoga?

Jawab:

Mazkoora Mukaalma me Bakr ka Qaul durust hai.

Zaid Ka Ye Daawa Galat hai ke Wo Sachcha Ashiq e Rasool hai ke Rasool e Akram ﷺ ne to irshad farmaya "Meri Ankho ki Thandak Namaz Se Hai" Aur Ishq e Rasool Ka Daawa karne Waala Usi Par Amal Paira nahi.

Ye Kaisa Aashiq e Rasool hai?

Namaz ki baat to door Daarhi Sunnat e Rasool ke Mutabiq Na Rakhne Waala Bhi Sachcha Aqshiq e Rasool nahi ho sakta.

Title: Takdeer kise kahte hai?
Content:
Sawal

Allah Ta'Ala ne Jaisa Hamari Takdeer Me Likh diya hai waisa hame majburan karna padta hai?

ANSWER

Dunya me Jo kuch Hota hai Aur Bande Jo kuch Bhalai Burai Karte Hai. Allah ﷻ Ne Use Apne Ilm Ke Mu'Aafiq Pahle se Likh diya hai Use Takdeer Kahte Hai.

Nahi Allah Ta'Ala Ke likh dene se Hame Majburan waisa karna nahi padta hai. Balki ham jaisa karne wale the Allah Ta'Ala Ne Apne Ilm se Waisa Likh diya.

Agar Kisi ki takdeer me burai likhi to is liye ki wah burai karne wala tha.

Agar wah bhalai karne wala hota to khuda e Ta'Ala Uski takdeer me bhalai likhta.

Khulaasa yah ki Khuda E Ta'Ala ke likh dene se banda kisi kaam ke karne par majbur nahi kiya gaya Takdeer haq hai.

Uska inkaar karne wala gumrah Badmajhab hai.
(Anware Shariat)

Title: Agar Koi Sunni Koi Badmazhab Ke Piche Namaz Padha Raha Hai. Kyuki Iski Majburi Hai. Kyu Ke Wo Hazar Badmazhab Me Akela Sunni Hai. To Wo Niyat Me “PICHE IS IMAM KA” Nahi Bolta Hai Aur Farz Namaz Ka Niyat Karke Namaz Padhta Hai. To Uske Piche Iska Namaz Hoga Ke Nahi?
Content:
Jawab:

Apke Sawaal Hi Me Confusion Hai.

Jab Usne Apni Tanha Namaz Parhne Ki Niyat Ki Hai. To Ab Us Badaqeeda Ke Peeche Namaz Ka Kya Ta’Lluq? Baher Haal!

Aisi Jagah Jahan Badmazhabo Ki Kasrat Ho, To Unki Jamaat Ke Waqt Kahin Chala Jaaye.

Istinja, Ya Wazu Ke Bahaane Chala Jaaye.

Agar Wo Bhi Na Ho Saka, To Wahin Zameen Par Baith Jaaye Jaise Ma’Zoor Ho.

Agar Wo Apni Tanha Namaz Ki Niyat Karega, To Ruku Sujood Me Farq Aayega.

Agar Imam Ka Intezar Karega, To Isme Wajibaat E Namaz Ke Tark Hone Ka Waazeh Khadsha Hai.

Lehaza Agar Wo Aam Insan Hai Aur Koi Bahana Bhi Nahi Kar Sakta Aur Unke Sath Khada Na Ho.

To Fitne Ka Andesha Ho, To Wo Begair Niyat E Namaz Hath Baandhe Khada Ho Jaaye Aur Azkaar Karta Rahe Aur Unke Sath Uthak Baithak Kar Le.

Dil Me Zara Bhi Ye Khayal Na Laaye Ke Mai Is Imam Ki Iqteda Kar Raha Hu.

Baad Me Apni Namaz Parh Le.

Title: Koi Muslim Ladki Bank Me Naukri Kar Sakhti Hai. Agar Kar Sakhti Hai, To Shariyat Ki Kis Hadd Tak.
Content:
Jawab:

Agar Aurat Ki Kifaalat Karne Waala Koi Nahi Hai. To Aurat Khud Koi Jaayez Kaam Kar Sakti Hai.

Magar Uske Liye Kuch Shartein Hai.

1) Kapde Bareek Na Ho Jinse Sar Ke Baal, Ya Kalaai Wagaira Koi Satr Ka Hissa Chamke.

2) Kapde Tang Aur Chust Na Hon, Ke Jo Badan Ki Hai’at Zaahir Karein.

3) Baalo, Ya Gale, Ya Pait, Ya Kalaai, Ya Pindli Ka Koi Hissa Zaahir Na Hota Ho.

4) Kabhi Naa Mahram Ke Sath Thodi Der Ke Liye Bhi Tanhaai Na Hoti Ho.

5) Uske Wahan Rehne Ya Aane Jaane Me Fitne Ka Koi Andesha Na Ho.

Ye 5 Shartein Agar Jama Ho To Kaam Karne Me Harj Nahi Aur Agar In Me Se Ek Bhi Kam Hai To Kaam Karna Haraam.

Aur Agar Shauhar Raazi Hai, Ya Apni Qudrat Ki Miqdar Bandobast Nahi Karta.

To Shauhar Par Bhi Ilzaam Aur Agar Wo Qudrat Bhar Kaam Karta Hai. Magar Phir Bhi Sahi Bandobast Nahi Ho Paata, To Us Par Ilzaam Bhi Nahi.

Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam

ANSWER

Surat e Mas'oola me Agar Us Tasweer ka Chehra itna bada ho ke Zameen par Rakh kar qiyaam ki halat me waazeh nuqoosh nazar aate hain aur Wo Tasweer Namazi ke muhaazaaat me aati ho.

Yaani kahin se uska saamna hota hai chaahe aage ya peeche daayein yaa baayein se to Namaz makrooh e tahrimi hogi.

Use dohrana waajib hai.

Unhe chahiye ke itni badi chaadar se tasweeren dhaki jaayein ke sab mukammal chup jaayein.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Koi Imam (Ya Ameer) Apne Yaha Khushi Ke (Mauke) Mahfil Mein Bad-Aqeeda Ko Dawat De Ke Bulaye Aur Uss Bad Aqeeda Ke Aane Par Usse Mulakat Kare To Shari’at Me Aise Imam Ko Kya Kahte Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Bad Aqeedo Bad Mazhabo Se Jab Muamlaat Jaayez Nahi. To Muwalaat Ba Darja E Awla Najaayez Hain.

Agar Waaqai Us Imam Ne Wahabiyo, Deobandiyo Khinzeero Ko Begair Kisi Wajah E Shara’i Ke Apne Yahan Daawat Di, To Wo Gunahgar Hua.

Ye Sulah E Kulliyat Ki Jaanib Uski Pesh Qadami Hai Aisa Imam Gunahgar Fasiq Hai.

Jab Tak Wo Elaaniya Tauba Na Karein Aur Uski Tauba Par Logo Ko Yaqeen Na Ho Jaaye, Uske Peeche Namaz Makrooh E Tahrimi.

Awam Ko Chahiye Ke Aise Imam Se Ta’lluq Na Rakhein.

Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Kya Waalidain Ki Qabr Ko Choom Sakte Hain. Aur Ye Hukam Auliya E Kiraam Ki Mazaro Ke Liye Kya Rahega.
Content:
Jawab:

Waalidain Laayeq Tazeem Hain. Zindagi Me Bhi Unke Hatho Ko Bosa De Aur Inteqal Ke Baad Unki Qabro Par Haazri De Aur Khoob Isaal E Sawab Karein.

Ta’zeeman Unki Qabr Ko Choomna Bhi Jaayez Hai.

Auliya E Kiraam Ke Mazaraat Par Hazri Dene Ka Tareeqa Ye Hai Ke Qabr Se Kam Az Kam 4 Hath Door Adab Ke Sath Khada Ho Kar Haazri De.

Title: Koi Sunni Shakhs Agar Duniyavi Talluqat Ki Wajah Se Kisi Bad Mazhab Ke Nikah Ya Reception Me Shirqat Kiya To Uske Liye Shariyat Ka Kya Huqm Hai.
Content: Jawab: Badmazhab Jiski Badmazhabi Hadd E Kufr Ko Pahoch Gayi Uska Nikah, Nikah Nahi Balke Haraam Kaari Hai. Is Mahfil Mein Jo Log Hazir Hue Sab Gunahgar Saza Waar, Unhe Chahiye Ke Tauba Aur Ehtiyaatan Tajdeed E Iman O Nikah Bhi Karein. Jis Molvi Ne Unhe Wahabi Jaante Hue Nikah Parhaya Wo Bhi Tauba O Tajdeed E Iman O Nikah Karein. Warna Awaam Unse Ta’lluq Na Rakhein. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Kya Sarkar-E-Do Alam Sallalahu Alaihi Wasallam Ke Naam Ke Sath Alaihissalam Lagana Durust Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Sarkar ﷺ Ke Ism E Mubarak Ke Sath Durood O Salam Dono Ka Zikr Karna Behtar O Afzal Aur Ain Quran Ke Farman Ke Mutabiq Hai.

Quran E Paak Me Irshad Hua:

يايهاالذين امنوا صلوا عليه وسلموا تسليما

Lehaza Huzoor Ke Ism E Muqaddas Ke Sath Sallallahu Ta’ala Alaihi Wa Sallam Ka Istemaal Karein.

Ya Alaihis Salaato Was Salaam Kahein.

Taake Durood o Salam Dono Ka Zikr Ho Jaaye.

Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Kya Islam Mein Khatna Karwana Zaruri Hai?
Content:
Agar Hai To Kitna Umar Mein Karwana Chaiye Aur Khatne Ke Bare Mein.

Hamare Aaqa Salallahu Alaihi Wasallam Kya Farmate Hai?

Jawab:

Khatna Sunnat Hai Aur Ye Shi’aar E Islam Mein Hai Ke Muslim Aur Gair Muslim Mein Isse Imtiyaaz Hota Hai.

Isi Liye Awaam Me Ise Musalmaani Bhi Kehte Hain.

Sahih Bukhari O Muslim Mein Abu Huraira Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anha Se Marwi Ke Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Farmaya Ke:

Khaleelullah Alayhis Salaatu Wassalam Ne Apna Khatna Kiya Us Waqt Unki Umr Shareef 80 Baras Ki Thi.

Khatna Ki Muddat 7 Saal Se 12 Saal Ki Umr Tak Hai Aur Baaz Ulama Ne Ye Farmaya Ke Wiladat Se 7we Din Ke Baad Khatna Karna Jaayez Hai.

Khatna Karaana Baap Ka Kaam Hai.

Wo Na Ho, To Uska Wasi, Uske Baad Dada, Phir Uske Wasi.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Kahin Gali Me Baithe Ho Aur Kisi Sunni Ka Janaza Wahan Se Guzar Raha Ho To Tazeeman Khade Ho Sakte Hai?
Content:
Gali Me Baithe Ho Aur Kisi Sunni Ka Janaza Wahan Se Guzar Raha Ho. To Use Kaandha Dena Zaruri Hai.

Aur Agar Kisi Ne Kaandha De Diya. To Qabrastan Tak, Ya Dafnane Tak Saath Rehna Hoga.

Ya Sirf Kaandha Dekar Kuch Door Tak Chal Kar Laut Sakta Hai?

Jawab:

Is Surat Me Janaze Ke Liye Khada Hona, Ya Shaamil Hona Zaruri Nahi Hai.

Title: Zakat Dene Ki Niyat Se Kuch Raqam Nikali. Fir Pata Chala Jisko Dena Hai Wo Shakhs Kahi Bahar Gaya Hai.
Content:
Aur Kuch Dino Baad Aayega. Ab Ye Raqam Firse Apne Maal Mein Mila Sakte Hai, Ya Seperate Rakhna Hoga? Jawab:

Jab Tak Ke Zakat Ka Maal Mustahiq Ki Milk Me Na Chala Jaaye Zakat Ada Na Hogi.

Agar Khud Ka Maal Hai Aur Abhi Usi Ki Milkiyat Me Hai To Use Istemaal Kar Sakta Hai.

Magar Zakat Jald Az Jald Ada Ki Jaaye Ke Takheer Gunaah Hai.

Title: Agar Koi Kahe Ke Ummati Ambiya Alaihissalam Ke Nekiyo Se Aage Baed Sakta Hai?
Content:
Aur Doosra Shakhs Yeh Kahe Ke Bazahir Ummati Nabi Ke Aamaal Se Baed Sakta Hai.

Jaise Huzur Alaihissalam Ne Ek Hajj Kiya Aur Ummati Ne 10. To Kya Ye Kaha Jaa Sakta Hai, Ke Ummati Bazahir Aamaal Mein Baed Sakta Hai?

Is Tarah In Dono Par Kya Hukm Hai?

Jawab:

Is Tarah Nabi Par Gair E Nabi Ko Fazeelat Saabit Karna Chahta Hai, To Kufr Hai.

Warna Gumrahi Zarur Hai Ke Koi Sahabi Bhi Kisi Nabi Se Amal, Ya Nekiyo Me Nahi Barh Sakta.

To Dosre Ummati Kaise Barh Sakte Hai.

معاذ اللّٰہ

--------------------------------------------------

Title: Halala Kya Hai Aur Uski Waja Aur Hikmat Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Jab Shauhar Apni Biwi Ko 3 Talaqein De De. To Uski Biwi Uske Liye Hamesha Ke Liye Haraam Ho Jaati Hai.

Ab Begair Halala Usse Dobara Nikah Bhi Nahi Ho Sakta.

Jaisa Ke Quran  E  Paak Me Zikr Hai.

فان طلقها فلا تحل له من بعد حتى تنكح زوجا غيره

Halala, Ye Hai Ke Wo Aurat Kisi Dosre Mard Se Nikah Karein Aur Humbistari Bhi Ho.

Uske Baad Agar Is Shauhar Ne Talaq De Diya.

To Baad  E  Iddat Pehle Waale Shauhar Se Nikah Durust Hoga.

--------------------------------------------------

Lehaza Namazo Ko Unke Waqto Par Ada Karein Aur Istegfaar Karein.

To Kya Hum Bhi Usi Tarah Banva Sakte Hai?

Vastu Shastra Ek Aisa Subject Hai Jis Me Directions Ko Dhayan Rakh Kar Kisi Bhi Cheez Ka Construction Kiya Jata Hai.

East, West, North And South In Charo Dishao Me Kya Banane Se Hume Fayda Pohuchega Isko Dekha Jata Hai.

Jawab:

Gairo Ke Tareeqe Par Amal Karna Jaayez Nahi Aur Khususiyat Ke Sath Jo Gair Mazhabi Baat Ho Uska Yaqeen Karna Bahot Sakht Hukm Rakhta Hai.

Lehaza Pandito Ki Bataayi Hui Baato Ko Hargiz Na Maane.

--------------------------------------------------

Title: Jumma Ki Namaz Me Jab Dusri Azan Hoti Hai Aur Imam Shahab Mimbar E Rasool Par Khutba Dene Bethte Hai.
Content:
Tab Azan Me Jab Huzoor ﷺ Ka Naam Aata Hai. Us Waqt Angutha Chumna Kyu Mana Hai?

Jumuah Ke Liye Jaise Hi Khateeb Mimbar Par Jaaye Logo Ko Khamosh Rehna Aur Har Kaam Se Ruk Jana Chahiye.

Lehaza Us Waqt Azan Ka Jawab Bhi Dil Hi Me De. Durust Hai Khateeb Ye Amal Kar Sakta Hai.

Title: Hazrat Kisine Pehle Sharha (Dadhi) Nahi Rakhi Kuch Saalo Baad Usne Sharha Rakhliya.
Content:
Jo Shaks Pehle Se Sharha Rakhta Tha Wo Baad Me Sharha Rahkne Wale Ko Tok Tha Hai Ke Tumhe Yaad Rakhna Chahiye Ke Tum Kya The.

Islam Aise Kehna Kya Hai❓

Aur Baad Me Sharha Rakhne Wale Ki Gawahi Qubool Ki Ja Sakthi Hai Ya Nahi❓

Jawab:

Agar Waaqai Us Shaks Ne Gunaaho Se Tauba Ki Darhi Taa Hadd E Shara Rakh Liya Aur Ab Aainda Use Katarwaane Ka Irada Nahi.

To Kisi Musalman Ko Uske Agle Gunaah Par Malaamat Karna Jisse Usne Sacche Dil Se Tauba Karli Jaayez Nahi.

Aur Agar Wo Gair E Fasiq Hai To Uski Gawahi Bhi Maqbool Hai.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Qul Ki Mitti Kya Hai?
Content:
Kya Qul Ki Mitti Teen Baar Dena Zaruri Hai?

Kya Qul Ki Mitti Same Qabr Se Honi Chahiye.

Jawab:

Qul Ki Mitti Us Mitti Ko Kehte Hain, Jis Par Surah Ikhlas Parh Kar Damm Kiya Gaya Ho.

Us Mitti Ko Maiyyat Ke Sirhaane Rakha Jata Hai.

Ye Koi Zaruri Amr Nahi Aur Na Hi Usi Qabr Ki Mitti Ka Hona Zaruri Hai Aur 3 Martaba Dena Bhi Zaruri Nahi.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Aksar Dekha Jata Hai Ki Jo Shakhs Dadhi Rakha Ho Aur Usse Makrooh Ya Haram Kaam Sehwan Ya Kasdan Ho Jaye.
Content:
To Log Yu Kehte Hai Ki “Dadhi Rakh Kar Aise Kam Karte Ho” Shariat Me Iski Kya Tafseel Hai?

Kya Waqai Me Dadhi Wale Shaks Se Koi Haram Ya Makrooh Kam Ho Jaye To Wo Zyadah Gunahgar Hota Hai.

Ba-Nisbat Us Shakhs Ki Jisne Dadhi Na Rakhi Hai?

Jawab:

Title: Kufr E Fiqhi Or Kufr E Kalami Kise Kehte Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Kalimaat E Kufr Ki 2 Qisme Hain.

1) Luzoom E Kufr: Jisme Kisi Sahi Ma’na Ka Bhi Ehtemaal (Pehlu) Ho.

2) Iltezam E Kufr: Jisme Koi Aise Ma’na Nahi Bante Jo Qaayel Ko Kufr Se Bachaaye.

Luzoom E Kufr Ki Surat Me Bhi Fuqaha E Kiram Ne Hukm E Kufr Diya.

Lehaza Ise Kufr E Fiqhi Kaha Jata Hai.

Lekin Mutakallimeen Isse Sukoot (Khamoshi Ikhtiyar) Karte Hain Aur Farmate Hai.

Jab Tak Iltezam E Kufr Ki Surat Naho Kehne Wale Ko Kafir Kehne Se Sukoot Kiya Jayega Aur Ise Kufr E Kalami Bhi Kaha Jata Hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Wazu Ke Faraiz Aur Wazu Ki Sunnat
Content:
Wazu Me 4 Faraiz Hai.

01 Muh Dhona.

02 Kohniyoon Samet Dono Haath Dhona.

03 Sar Ka Masah Karna.

04 Takhno Samet Dono Pav Ka Dhona.

Kisi Ujw Ke Dhone, Ke Yah Maani Hai Ki Us Ujw Ke Har Hisse Par Kam Se Kam Do-Do Bund Paani Bah Jaaye.

Bheeg Jaane Ya Tel Ki Tarah Paani Chupud Lene, Ya Ek Aadh Bund Bah Jaane Ko Dhona Nahi Kahenge.

Na Usse Ghusl Ya Wuzu Ada Ho. Is Baat Ka Dhyan Rakhna Bahut Jaruri Hai.

Log Iski Taraf Dhyan Nahi Dete Aur Namaz E Akaarat Jaati Hai. (Yaani Barbaad Hoti Hai).

Badan Me Kuch Jagah Aisa Hai Ki Jantak Uska Khaas Khayal Na Kiya Jaaye Un Par Paani Nahi Bahega.

Jiski Tashri Har Ujw Me Ki Jaayegi Kisi Jagah Maujaye Hadees (Hadas Ki Jagah) Par Tari Pahunchne Ko Masah Kahte Hai.

Reference

Bahar-E-Sahari’At Hissa 02 Safa 13.

Wazu Ki Sunnate

01 Wazu Ki Niyat Karna.

02 Bismillah Shareef Padhna.

03 Pehle Dono Hatho Ko 3 Martaba Dhona.

04 Miswaq Karna.

05 Dahine Hath Se 3 Martaba Kulli Karna.

06 Dahine Hath Se 3 Martaba Naak Me Pani Chadana.

07 Baye Hath Se Naak Saaf Karna.

08 Dhadi Ka Ungliyo Se Khilal Karna.

09 Haath Pao Ki Ungliyo Ka Khilal Karna.

10 Har A’uzu Ko 3-3 Bar Dhona.

11 Pure Sar Ka Ek Bar Mash Karna.

12 Tarteeb Se Wazu Karna.

13 Dadhi Ke Jo Baal Muh Ke Dayire Ke Niche Hai In Per Geela Hath Phira Lena.

14 A’aza Ko Lagatar Dhona Ke Aik A’uzu Sukhne Se Pehle Hi Dusre A’uzu Ko Dho Lena.

15 Kaano Ka Masah Karna.

16 Har Makroohat Se Bachna.

Bahar-E-Sahari’At Aur Aalamgiri ○●●●●●●●●●●●●○ Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi ○●●●●●●●●●●●●○

Title: What Is Fard-E-Amali?
Content:
ANSWER
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Fard-E-Amali (Implicit Obligatory Act): This Is A Command Of Which Is Not As Explicit (As Fard-E-E’tiqaadi) But In View Of The Consensus Of The Mujtahideen, (If) The Command Is Based On The Evidence Of Shariah One Is Regarded As Guilty Of Transgression (If Left Out) And One Will Not Be Relieved Of His Responsibility Unless He Fulfills It And Such As The Case When It Is Fard In Any Ibaadat (Worship), Then That (Ibaadat) Will Be Regarded As Invalid And Nullified If That Particular (Action) Is Not Fulfilled.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">To Reject (Deny) It Without Valid Reason Is An Act Of Transgression And Misguidance.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">However, If There Is One Who Based On The Views Of Shariah, Is Worthy Of Arguing A Certain View (This Refers To A Mujtahid) Then He Has The
Right To Differ With It On The Basis Of Any Evidence Of The Shariah.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">(An Example) Of This Is The Differences Between The Righteously Guided A’ima-E-Mujtahideen (Viz. Imam Abu Hanifa – Imam Shafi’i, Imam Ahmed Bin Hambal – Imam Maalik), Where One Imam Considers Something To Be Fard Whilst The Other Does Not.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">For Example, According To The Hanafi School Of Thought The Masah (To Pass Wet Hands Over The Head In Wudu) Of Onefourth Of The Head In Wudu (Ablution) Is Fard And According To The Shafa’i School Of Thought, Even The Masah Of One Strand Of Hair Is Sufficient (To Fulfill The Fard); Whilst According To The Maaliki School Of Thought The Masah Of The Entire Head (Is Fard).
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Another Example Is That According To The Hanafi School Of Thought, To Recite The Bismillah And To Make The Intention For Wudu Is Sunnat, Whereas These Are Regarded As Fard According To The Hambali And Shafi’i Schools Of Thought; I.E. Saying Bismillah Is Fard For Hambalis And Niyyat Is Fard For Shafi’is; And With The Exception Of These, There Are Numerous Other Examples. In Fard-E-Amali, Every Person Should Adhere To The (Principles Of) The Imam Of Whom He Is A Muqallid (Adherent).
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">It Is Unlawful (Impermissible) To Follow Any Other Imam Besides Your Own Imam Without Any Legitimate Reason Of Shariah.

Bahare shariyat.

Title: What Is Fard-E-E’tiqaadi?
Content:
ANSWER
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Fard-E-E’tiqaadi (Explicit Obligatory Act): Refers To A Command Of Shariah Which Is Proven By The Distinct Evidence Of Shariah (In Other Words By Such Proof That Is Beyond Any Doubt). According To Hanafi Scholars, One Who Denies This Is An Absolute Infidel.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">There Is Ijma (Consensus Of The Learned Muslim Scholars) That The One Who Denies Any Fard-E-E’tiqaadi, The Ruling Regarding Which Is Commonly Known And Obvious As To Be Related Directly To An Issue Of Obligation In Religion Then Such A Person Is Not Only Himself An Infidel But One Who Doubts The Infidelity About Such A Denier, Is Himself Regarded As An Infidel.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Nonetheless, One Who Deliberately Leaves Out Even Once, Any Fard-E- E’tiqaadi Such As Namaaz, Ruku, Sujood Without A Valid Reason Permitted By Shariah Is A Faasiq (A Transgressor), Guilty Of Having Committed A Major Sin And Is Deserving Of The Torment Of Hellfire.

Bahare shariyat.

Title: What Is Makrooh-E-Tahreemi?
Content:
Makrooh-E-Tahreemi (Disapproved To The Point Of Being Forbidden):

This Is Comparable To Waajib.

By Committing Such An Action, The Ibadat Becomes Defective And One Who Commits Such An Action Is Regarded As Sinful, Even Though The Sin Of Such An Action Is Less Than That Of Committing A Haraam (Forbidden / Prohibited) Offence.

The Committing Of Such An Offence On A Few Occasions’ Amounts To It Being Regarded A Major Sin (Kabeera).

Bahar e Shariat.

Title: Agar Namaz Padte Waqt Samne Aina Ho Jisme Apna Shakal Wagaira Sab Dikhta Hai To Kya Namaz Ho Jayegi.
Content:
Or Agar Namaz Padte Waqt Apna Mobile Pars Wagaira Samne Niche Rakhte Hai.

To Aajkal Mobile Itna Shaining Hota Hai Ke Usme Apni Shakal Achche Se Dikh Jati Hai.

To Kya Isse Bhi Namaz Ho Jayegi Or Agar Ab Tak Jo Aisa Namaz Pade Hai, To Kya Wo Namaz Hui Hogi, Ya Nahi?

Jawab:

Aaine Me Apni Shakl Ya Kisi Ki Shakl (Aks) Nazar Aaye, To Isse Namaz Faasid Nahi Hogi.

Haan! Agar Iski Wajah Se Namaz Me Khalal Ho Yaani Zahen Bhatke, To Karaahat Hogi.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Magar Dosri Zaban Me Jo Hum Istemaal Karte Hain Wo Sirf Isi Maana Me Ke “Agar ALLAH Chahe” Is Ke Ilawa Aur Koi Dusra Maana Koi Bhi Muraad Nahi Leta.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Aur Talaffuz Me Bhi Hum Zaban Se Ek Sath Hi Kehte Hain Na Ke Tukdo Me.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Jo Aisa Kahe Us Se Ye Kaha Jaaye Ke Bolne Me Bhi 3 Tukdo Me Bola Karein Ek Saans Me Na Bolein.

Content:

Imama Bandhna Sunnat Hai Aur Sar Khula Rakhna Khilaaf E Sunnat Hai.

Sirf Topi Pahenna Sunnat To Nahi.

Magar Musalman Ki Ek Alamat Aur Pehchan Aur Gairo Se Imtiyaaz Aur Adab Ka Mutaqaazi Aur Mustahab Hai.

Title: Kya Koi Banda Kasdan Deri Se Namaz Padhe Matlab Time Ho Chuka Ho Aur Time Khatm Hone Se Pahle Pahle Padle To Aisa Karna Kaisa Hai.
Content:
Banda Gaon Me Rahta Hai Waha Masjid Nahi Hai.

Maslan Agar Zohar Ki Namaz Ka Time 1 Baje Hai Aur Kasdan 3 Baje Padhe.

Jawab:

Agar Masjid Muhalle Me Hai Aur Qasdan Bila Wajah E Sharai Jamaat Tark Karta Hai, To Sakht Gunahgar Hoga.

Rahi Baat Der Se Namaz Parhne Ki, To Agar Namaz Ka Waqt Baaqi Hai Aur Usi Waqt Me Namaz Parhta Hai, To Koi Harj Nahi.

Balke Baaz Auqaat Der Se Parhna Afzal Hai.

Title: Namaz Me Chink Ye Jamai Aye To Kya Hukm Hai?
Content: Jawab: Namaz Me Bilqasd Jamai Lena Makrooh-E-Tahrimi Hai Aur Khud Aaye To Harj Nahi. Magar Rokna Mustahab Hai Aur Agar Rokne Se Na Ruke To Hont Ko Dantto Se Dabaye Aur Is Par Bhi Na Ruke To Dahina Ya Baya Hath Muh Par Rakh De Ya Asteen Se Muh Chupa Le. Qayam Me Dahina Hath Se Dhanke Aur Dusre Mauqa Par Baya Se. (1) (Miraqi Alfalah) Faida: Ambiya عليهم الصلاةوالسلام Is Se Mehfoz Hai, Is Liye Ke Is Me Shaitani Mudahkilat Hai. Nabi ﷺ Ne Farmaya: Ke “Jamahi Shaitan Ki Taraf Se Hai, Jab Tum Me Kisi Ko Jamahi Aye To Jahan Taak Mumkin Ho Roke” (2) Is Hadees Ko Imam Bukhari Wa Muslim Ne Sahi Hain Me Riwayat Kiya, Balke Ba’az Riwayato Me Hai, Ke “Shaitan Muh Me Ghus Jata Hai” (3) Ba’az Me Hai, “Shaitan Dekh Kar Hansta Hai” (4) Ulma Farmate Hain: Ke “Jo Jamahi Me Muh Khol Deta Hai, Shaitan Is Ke Muh Me Thok Deta Hai Aur Jo Qah Qaha Ki Awaz Aati Hai, Wo Shaitan Ka Kehkaha Hai, Ke Is Ka Muh Bigra Dekh Kar Thatha Lagata Hai Aur Wo Jo Ratubat Nikalti Hai, Wo Shaitan Ka Thook Hai” Iske Rokne Ki Behtar Tarkeeb Yeh Hai Ke Jab Jamahi Aati Maloom Ho To Dil Me Khayal Kare Ke Ambiya عليهم الصلاة والسلام Isse Mehfooz Hai, Foran Rook Jaeygi. واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Muslim Family Me Paida Hone Wale Bacche Ke Kaan Me Azan Dena Kaisa Hai?
Content: Farz, Sunnat ya Wajib? Kyuke Bangladesh Ka Ek Bahot Bada Muslim Tabqa Aisa Hai Jo Ladkiyo Ki Wiladat Ke Waqt Unke Kaan Me Azan Nahi Deta Or Ladko Ki Wiladat Pe Azan Di Jaati Hai? To Aisa Karna Shariyat Me Kaisa Hai Jawab: Huzoor Sadrushshariah Badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان Irshad Farmate Hai. Jab Bachcha Paida Ho To Mustahab Ye Hai Ke Uske Kaan Mein Azan O Iqamat Kahi Jaaye. Azan Kahne Se إنْ شَــاءَاللّــهُ تعالی Balaayein Door Ho Jaayegi. Behtar Ye Hai Ke Dahine (Right) Kaan Mein 4 Martaba Azan Aur Baayein (Left) Mein 3 Martaba Iqamat Kahi Jaaye. Bahut Logo Mein Ye Riwaj Hai Ke Ladka Paida Hota Hai, To Azan Kahi Jaati Hai Aur Ladki Paida Hoti Hai, To Nahin Kahte Ye Dena Chahiye. Balkeh Ladki Paida Ho Jab Bhi Azan O Iqamat Kahi Jaaye. (Bahar E Shari’at Hissa 15 Aqeeqah Ka Bayan) والله تعالٰی اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------
