Title: Hazrat Ayesha (Raziallahu Ta'ala anha) Ne Bayan Kiya Ke Agar Tum Se Koi Ye Kehta Hai Ke Mohammad Sallallahu Alaihe Wasallam Ne Apne Rab Ko Dekha To Woh Galat Kehta Hai.
Content: Kyuke Allah Ta’ala Apne Baare Me Khud Kehta Hai Ke Nazre Usko Dekh Nahi Sakti Aur Jo Koi Kehta Hai Ke Rasool Allah Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Gaib Jaante The To Galat Kehta Hai. Kyuke Allah Ta’ala Khud Kehta Hai Ke Gaib Ka Ilm Allah Ke Siwa Aur Kisi Ko Nahi. Sahi Bukhari: 7380 Jawab: (1) Huzoor ﷺ Ne Apne Rab Ka Didaar Kiya. Hadrat Ikramah Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Bayan Karte Hain Ke Sayyedna Abdullah Ibn Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anhuma Ne Farmaaya: Hadrat Sayyedna Muhammad Mustafa ﷺ Ne Apne Rab Ka Deedar Kiya Hai. Main Ne Arz Kiya: Kya Allah Ta’ala Ne Ye Nahi Farmaaya Nigaahein Us Ka Ihaata Nahi Kar Sakteen Aur Wo Nigaaho Ka Idraak O Ihaata Karta Hai? To Hadrat Abdullah Ibn Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anhuma Ne Farmaaya: Tum Par Ta’jjub Hai! Jab Allah Apne Us Noor Ke Sath Tajalli Farmaaye Jo Uska Gair Mutanaahi Noor Hai Aur Beshak Sayyedna Muhammad ﷺ Ne Apne Rab Ka Do Martaba Deedar Kiya Hai. (Tirmizi, Umdatul Qari Sharah Bukhari, Tafseer Ibn E Kaseer, Subul Ul Huda Warrishad, Mustadrak Ala Assahihain, Musnad Ahmad Mu’jam E Kabeer, Tafseer Ibn Abi Haatim, Surah An’aam) Hadrat Abdullah Ibn Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anhuma Ne Bayan Farmaya Ke Hadrat Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Farmaya: Main Ne Apne Rab Ka Deedar Kiya. (Musnad Ahmad) Hadrat Ibn E Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anhuma Se Riwayat Hai Ke Allah Ta’ala Ne Hadrat Ibrahim Ko Khullat Aur Hadrat Moosa Alaihissalam Ko Kalam Aur Sayyed E Alam Muhammad ﷺ Ko Apne Deedar Se Imtiyaz Baksha (Salawatullahi Alaihim Ajma’een), Ka’b Ne Farmaya Ke Allah Ta’ala Ne Hadrat Moosa Alaihissalam Se Do Baar Kalam Farmaya Aur Hadrat Muhammad Mustafa ﷺ Ne Allah Ta’ala Ko Do Martaba Dekha. (Tirmizi) Yahan Chand Baaton Ka Lehaaz Rakhna Zaruri Hai. Ek Ye Ke Hadrat Aisha Siddeqah Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anha Ka Qawl Nafi Me Hai. Aur Hadrat Ibn E Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anhuma Ka Qawl Isbaat Me Hai. Aur Musbat Muqaddam Hota Hai. Kyu Ke Nafi Karne Wala Kisi Cheez Ki Nafi Us Waqt Karta Hai Ke Usne Nahi Suna Aur Musbit Isbaat Is Liye Karta Hai Ke Usne Suna Aur Jaana. To Ilm Musbit Ke Paas Hai. Dosri Baat Ye Ke Hadrat Ummul Momineen Aisha Siddeqah Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anha Ne Ye Kalam Huzoor ﷺ Se Naql Nahi Kiya. Balke Khud Aayat Se Istembaat Farmaya لاتدركه الابصار Nigaahein Us (Allah) Ka Ihaata (Gher) Nahi Kar Sakti. Yahan Par Ihaata (Gherna) Ki Nafi Hai. Ruyat (Dekhne) Ki Nafi Nahi Hai. Sahih Yahi Hai Ke Huzoor ﷺ Deedar E Ilahi Se Musharraf Farmaaye Gaye. Muslim Shareef Ki Hadees E Marfoo’ Se Bhi Yahi Saabit Hai. Hadrat Ibn E Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anhuma Bhi Isi Par Hai. Muslim Ki Hadees Hai. Huzoor ﷺ Ne Farmaaya Ke “Mai Ne Apne Rab Ko Apni Ankh Aur Apne Dil Se Dekha.” Hadrat Hasan Basri Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Qasam Khaate The Ke Huzoor ﷺ Ne Shab E Meraaj Apne Rab Ka Deedar Kiya. Hadrat Imam Ahmad Ne Farmaya Ke Huzoor ﷺ Ne Apne Rab Ko Dekha, Usko Dekha, Usko Dekha. Imam Saheb Ye Farmaate Rahe Yahan Tak Ke Unka Saans Toot Gaya. (2) Huzoor ﷺ Gaib Jaante Hain. Is Hadees Me Jo Ilm E Gaib Ki Nafi Hai Usse Muraad Ilm E Zaati Hai Na Ke Ataai. Warna Wo Uloom E Khamsa (5 Baato Ka Ilm) Jis Ke Baare Me Irshad Hua Ke Wo Sirf Allah Hi Jaanta Hai. Ahadees Se Nabi E Kareem Ke Liye Wo Uloom E Khamsa Saabit Hai. Maan Ke Pet Me Kya Hai Hadrat Ummul Fadl Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anha Se Riwayat Hai Ke Mai. Huzoor E Aqdas ﷺ Ke Samne Se Ho Kar Guzri, Huzoor Ne Farmaya: Tu Haamila Hai Aur Tere Pet Me Ladka Hai, Jab Wo Paida Ho To Use Mere Huzoor Laana.(Lambi Hadees Hai Iske Akheer Me Hai Ke). Ummul Fadl Farmaati Hain: Jab Ladka Paida Hua Mai Khidmat E Aqdas Me Haazir Hui, Huzoor Ne Bachche Ke Daahine Kaan Me Azan Aur Baayein Kaan Me Iqamat Farmaayi Aur Apna Lo’aab E Dehan E Aqdas Uske Munh Me Daala Aur Uska Naam Abdullah Rakha, Farmaya: Le Jaao Khulafa Ke Baap Ko. Jab Hadrat Abbas Ko Is Ki Khabar Hui, Wo Khidmat E Aqdas Me Hazir Hue Aur Arz Ki: Ummul Fadl Ne Aisa Aisa Kaha. Huzoor Ne Farmaya: Baat Wahi Hai Jo Hum Ne Kahi, Ye Khaleefo Ka Baap Hai, Yahan Tak Ke In Me Se Saffaah Hoga. Yahan Tak Ke In Me Se Mehdi Hoga. (Dalailun Nabuwwah Li Ibn E Nu’aim) Hazrat Abdullah Bin Umar رضي الله عنه Se Riwayat Hai Ke RasoolAllah ﷺ Umme Ibaraheem Hazrat Mariya Qabtiya RadiAlllahu Ta'ala Anha Ke Pass Tashreef Le Gaye.Jab Ke Hazrat Ibraheem Aapke Shikam Mubarak Mein The. (Aur Hadees Zikr Ki Aur Usme Hai) Ke Jibraeel Alahi Salatu Watasleem Mere Pass Aaye Aur Mujhe Musdah Sunaya Ke Mariya Ke Pet Mein Mujh Se Ladka Hai. Woh Tamaam Makhlooq Se Zaaid Mujhse Mushabeh, Unho Ne Mujh Se Kaha Ke Main Uska Naam Ibraheem Rakhu Aur Jibraeel Ne Meri Kunniyat Abu Ibraheem Rakhi. Sayyedna Imam Ahmad Raza Muhaddis E Barelvi Quddisa Sirruh Farmaate Hain Imam Suyuti Ne Iski Sanad Hasan Batayi: To Huzoor E Aqdas ﷺ Ne Woh Jaan Liya Jo Pet Mein Tha Aur Woh Jaana Jo Usse Bohot Hai Ke Woh Jaan Liya Jo Pet Ke Bacche Ki Peeth Mein Hai. Aur Woh Jaan Liya Jo Pet Ke Bachche Ke Pet Wale Ke Peeth Mein Hai. Balke Woh Jaan Liya Jo Kayi Pusht Neeche Tak Pet Ke Bachche Ki Peeth Wale Ki Peeth Mein Hai. Isliye Huzoor ﷺ Ne Irshaad Farmaya Ke Khalifon Ke Baap Ko Le Jao Ke Aur Farmaya Isi Me Saffah Hai Isi Me Mehdi Hain. Pata Ye Chala Ke Huzoor Allah Ki Ataa Se Jaante Hain Ke Maan Ke Pet Me Kya Hai. (Huzoor Ko Apne Wisaal Ka Maqaam Aur Waqt Khoob Maloom Tha) Hazrat Abu Huraira رضي الله عنه Se Riwayat Hai Ke RasoolAllah ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya: Aye Ansaar E Madina Hamari Zindagi Wahan Hai Jahan Tumhaari Zindagi Hai Aur Hamara Inteqaal Wahan Jahan Tumhari Maut. (Ahmad, Baihaqi, Tareekh Damishq Kaun Kahan Marega Hadrat Anas Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Se Riwayat Hai Ke Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Sahaba E Kiraam Ridwanullah Ta’ala Alaihim Ajmaeen Ko Elaan Diya To Wo Chale Yahan Tak Ke Badr Me Utre, Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Zameen Par Jagah Jagah Dast E Aqdas Rakh Kar Bataaya Ke Ye Fulaan Kafir Ke Pichharne Ki Jagah Hai Aur Ye Fulaan Ki. Hadrat Anas Farmate Hain: Jis Ke Liye Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Jahan Hath Rakh Kar Farmaya Tha Wahin Uski Lash Giri Usse Aslan Tajaawuz Na Ki. (Muslim, Nasai, Ahmad, Baihaqi) Barish Kab Hogi. Hadrat Abdullah Bin Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta’ala Anhuma Se Riwayat Hai Ke Baadal Chhaya To. Huzoor ﷺ Bar Aamad Hue Aur Irshad Farmaya: Ek Farishta Baadalo Ka Muwakkil Meri Khidmat Me Hazir Hua, Mujhe Salam Kiya Aur Khabar Di Ke Wo Chalayega Baadalo Ko Yamen Ke Ek Naale Ki Taraf Jise Dareeh Kehte Hai. Phir Hamare Paas Uske Baad Ek Sawaar Aaya, Hum Ne Usse Baadal Ki Nisbat Daryaaft Kiya, To Usne Khabar Di Ke Us Din Paani Barsa (Dalailun Nabuwwah Lil Baihaqi) Qiyamat Kab Aayegi Hazrat Abu Saeed Khudri رضي الله عنه Se Riwayat Hai Ke. Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya, Main Kyunkar Chain Lun Halanke Soor Waale Ne Munh Me Le Liya Hai Aur Kaan Lagaye Maatha Jhukaye Huwe Intezaar Kar Raha Hai Ke Kab Soor Phoonkne Ka Hukm Diya Jaye. Lehaza Woh Phoonkega, Sahaba E Kiraam Ridwanullahi Alaihim Ajmaeen Ne Arz Ki Ham Kya Kahein? Farmaya: Kaho Hamein Kaafi Hai Allah Or Behtar Kaam Banaane Wala. Hazrat Zaid Bin Arqam RadiAllahu Tala Anhu Se Riwayat Hai Ke Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya: Main Kaise Chain Lun Halanke Soor Phoonkne Wale Farishte Ne Soor Munh Mein Le Liya Hai. Peshaani Jhuka Li Hai Aur Kaan Lagaye Muntazir Hai Ke Kab Hukm Mile, Sahaba E Kiraam Radi-Allhu Taala Anhum Ajmaeen Ko Jab Maloom Huwa To Un Par Dushwaar Guzra. Huzoor Ne Farmaya Tum “Hasbunallahu Wa Ne’mal Wakeel” Padha Karo. Imam Ajal Abu Zakaria Nawavi Rahmatullah Alaih Apne Fatawa Phir Imam Ibn E Hajar Makki Rahmatullah Ta’ala Alaihi Apne Fatawa Hadeesiya Mein Farmaate Hain. (Maf’hoom) Yaani Aayat Mein Gair E Khuda Se Nafi E Ilm E Gaib Ke Yeh Ma’na Hain. Ke Gaib Apni Zaat Se Be Kisi Ke Bataye Jaanna Aur Aisa Ilm Ke Jamee E Malumat E Ilahiya Ko Muheet Ho Jaaye Ye Allah Ta’ala Ke Siwa Kisi Ko Nahi. Rahe Ambiya Ke Mojize Aur Auliya Ki Karamatein Yahan To Allah Azz Wa Jalla Ke Bataane Se Inhe Ilm Huwa Hai. Yun Hi Woh Batein Ke Aadat Ki Mutabaqat Se Jinka Ilm Hota Hai. Aala Hazrat Farmaate Hain: Mukhalifeen Ka Istedlaal Mehez Baatil Wa Khayaal E Muhaal Hona To Yahin Se Zahir Ho Gaya. Magar Faqeer Ne Apne Rasail Mein Saabit Kiya Hai Ke Istedlaal In Dhalaal Ke Khud Iqraari Kufr O Dhalaal Ka Tamga Hai, Neez Inhe Mein Woh Roshan Kiya Ke Khalq Ke Liye Iddi’aaye Ilm E Gaib Par Fuqha Ka Hukm E Kufr Bhi Darja E Ulaaye Haqiqat E Haq Mein Usi Soorat Ilm E Zaati Aur Darja E Ukhraaye Tarz E Fuqhaa Mein Ilm E Mutlaq Ba Ma’na Marqoom Ke Saath Makhsoos Hai. Jaisa Ke Muhaqiqeen Ke Kalaam Mein Mansoos Hai. Bakr Pur Makr Ka Woh Za’m E Mardood Jis Mein Huzoor ﷺ Ki Nisbat (Kuch Nahi Jante) Ka Lafz E Na Paak Hai Ke Wo Bhi Kalima E Kufr O Dhalal Bebaak Hai. Mazkooarah Ahadees O Aqwal E Fuqaha Ki Roshni Me Ye Baat Bilkul Waazeh Ho Gayi Ke Allah Ki Ataa Se Us Ke Mahboob Bande Bhi Gaib Jaante Hain. Balke Un Guyoob Par Bhi Muttala Hain Jin Guyoob Se Muta’lliq Qur’an Me Saraahat Aayi Hai. Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam ○●●●●●●●●●●●●○ Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi ○●●●●●●●●●●●●○

Title: Jo Namazi Makhraj Se Namaz Nahi Padtha Ho Uski Namaz Hogi Ya Nahi?
Content:
Jawab:

Huroof Makhraj Se Ada Na Karne Ki Wajah Se Fasaad E Ma’na Hua, To Namaz Nahin Hogi.

Makhraj Badalne Ki Wajah Se Ma’na Mein Fasaad Ho Jaaye.

Maslan Surah E Ikhlas Mein احد Badi ح Se Hai Aur ح Se احد Ka Matlab Ek Hota Aur Chhoti ھ Se اھد Ka Matlab Buzdil Hota Hai.

Ab Koi Surah E Ikhlas Mein ح Ko Chhoti ھ Se Padhe Ma’na Fasid Ho Jaayega Aur Namaz Nahi Hogi.

Ye Hai Fasad E Ma’na Ka Matlab Hai.

Jiske Huroof Makhraj Se Ada Nahi Hote Un Par Laazim Hai Ke Makhraj Se Ada Karne Ki Koshish Karein Aur Ustaad Se Seekhein.

Agar Aap Seekhne Ki Koshish Kar Rahe Hain. To Zamana E Koshish Ki Namaz Ho Jaayegi Aur Agar Koshish Nahi Kar Rahe Hai Sikhne Ki, To Fasaad E Ma’na Ki Soorat Mein Namaz Nahin Hogi.

Jin Ke Huroof Makhraj Se Ada Nahin Hote Unhen Chaahiye Ke Paanchon Waqt Ki Namaz Jamat Se Aadha Karein.
والله تعالٰی اعلم

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Hamare Yaha Tez Baarish Horahi Hai. Hum Jab Ghar Se Masjid Jaate Hai Namaz Ke Liye.
Content:
Us Waqt Raste Me Yaani Sadakh Par Paani Jama Hota Hai.

Ab Wo Paani Me Takhne Doob Jaate Hai.

Agar Wazu Ki Haalat Me Hoto, Kya Is Paani Ke Lagne Ke Baad Phir Wazu Karna Hoga.

Kyunki Ye Khayal Bhi Aata Hai Ki Us Paani Me Drainage Ka Paani Bhi Hoga Shayad.

To Ab Kya Hukum Hoga.

Jawab:

Agar Paani Thahar Gaya Aur Usme Nijasat Dikh Rahi Hai.

To Agar Paani Ka Phailaao 100 Hath Mein Hai, To Paani Ke Napaaki Ka Hukm Nahin Hoga.

Aur 100 Haath Ke Phailaao Se Kam Hai.

To Paani Napaak Hai Aur Agar Paani Bah Raha Hai Aur Usme Nijasat Bhi Bah Rahi Hai.

To Woh Paani Napaak Nahin Aur Woh Bahta Paani Kapde, Ya Badan Pe Lag Jaaye.

To Kapda O Badan Napaak Nahi Hoga.

Haan! Agar Us Bahte Paani Se Jism O Kapde Ka Hissa Bhiga Aur Jism O Kapde Pe Nijasat Lag Gayi.

To Ab Jism O Kapde Ka Utna Hissa Napaak Ho Gaya.

Jitne Pe Nijasat Lagi Hai Aur Agar Nijasat Ki Wajah Se Paani Ka Rang, Ya Boo, Ya Maza Badal Gaya.

To Ab Woh Bahta Paani Bhi Napaak Hai.


والله تعالٰی اعلم


--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Agar Akele Me Namaz Par Rahe Ho Tab Buland Awaz Se Qirat Padhna Kaisa Hai.
Content:
Sirf Farz Namaz Nahi. Balki Sunnat Wagerah Me Bhi Buland Awaz Se Parhna Kaisa Hai?

Jawab:

Din Ki Sunnat O Nawafil Mein Aahista Padhna Wajib Hai Aur Raat Ki Sunnato Mein Ikhtyaar Hai Ke Buland Aawaz Se Qirat Kare, Ya Aahista.

Munfarid Ke Liye Zuhar O Asr Ki Farz Namaz Mein Aahista Qirat Wajib Hai Aur Magrib O Isha O Fajr Mein Ikhteyaar Hai.

Aahista Padhe, Ya Baland Awaz Se Padhe.

Magar Magrib Namaz Ki Teesri Aur Isha Namaz Ki Teesri O Chauthi Mein Aahista Padhe.

والله تعالٰی اعلم

Title: Juma Ki 2 Rakat Jo Imam Sahab Ada Karwate Hai Hum Jamaat Se Ada Karte Hai. Woh Farz Hai Ya Wajib Ki Niyat Karni Hogi.
Content:
Phir 4 Rakat Sunnat E Muakkada Jo Hai Uske Baad 2 Rakat Do Nafil Ke Pehle Jo Hai.

Woh Gair Muakkada Hai Ya Sunnat E Muakkada Hai.

Jawab:

Juma Ki 2 Rakat Namaz Jo Jamat Se Padhi Jaati Hai Woh Farz Hai.

Aur Juma Ke Ba’d Ki 4 Rakat Sunnat Muakkadah Hai Aur Iske Ba’ad Wali 2 Rakat Sunnat E Gair Muakkidah Hai.


والله تعالٰی اعلم

Title: ZAID SUNNI MUSLIM HAI USKO DUSRE SUNNI MUSLIM NE DHOKA DE KAR PAISE LIYE.
Content:
AB UN PAISO KO LAUTANE KI JAGAH UN PAISO KO DUSRI TIJARAT MAIN LAGAYE AUR ABHI UMRA / HAJJ KAR RAHA HAI.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">GHUMTA FIRTA HAI JISKO DHOKA DIYA HAI USKO PAISE LAUTANE KA NAAM NAHI LE RAHA.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">TOH KYA IS TARIKE SE HAJJ AUR UMRAH QUBULEY BAARGAH HAI?
JUB KE ZAID KEHTA HAI KE MAIN HAALAF UTHANEY KO TAYYAR HU MAINE EK PAL KE LIYE BHI DIL SE USKO MAAF NAHI KIYA HAI. ZAID BAAR BAAR PAISE TALAB KARNA CHAHTA HAI PER
WO BADA SHAATIR HAI HAR BAAR JOOTH BOL KAR BAAT SE MUQAR JAATA HAI
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">PAISE KE LEN DEN KI KOI LIKHAT PADHAT NAA HONE KI WAJAH SE KOI SABUT NAHI HAI KE KOI KANOONI KARWAI HO SAKE
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">ZAID KO UMEED HAI KR JAWAB HAWALO K SATH MIL JAYEGA TOH USKI BADOLAT BANDE KA DIL FIR JAYEGA AUR WO IS TARIKE SE KISI KO SATAYEGA NAHI
AUR PAISE LAUTA DEGA BARAHEY MEHARBANI JAWAB DENEY KI MEHARBANI KIJYEGA Hajrat.

ANSWER

Qarz Lene Ke Ba’d Qarz Khwaah Ke Shadeed Talab Par Bhi Wus’at Hote Qarz Na Lautaana Huqooq E Ibaad Mein Giriftaari Ka Sabab Hai.
Aur Aisi Haalat Mein Inteqaal Ho Jaaye To Aakhirat Mein Bahut Sakht Hisaab Hoga.
Laazim O Zaroori Hai Ke Pahle Qarz Ada Kare Phir Hajj O Umarah Wagairah Kare.
والله تعالٰی اعلم
--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Kisi Gair Muslim Se Qarz Liya To Use Bhi Ada Karna Zaroori Hai.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Haan Agar Woh Gair Muslim Mu’aaf Karde To Ab Na Dene Mein Kuchh Harj Nahi.

Title: Koi Shakhs Agar Afzaliyat Ke Mamle Me Ye Aqida Rakhta  Ho Ki Baad Az Ambiya Sayyedna Maula Ali KarramAllaho Waj’hul Kareem Afzal Hai’n.
Content:
Lekin Wo Ye Bhi Aqida Rakhta Hai Ki Hazrat Sayyedna Abu Bakar Siddiq RaziAllaho Anho Khalifa E Rashid Hai’n Khalifa E Awwal Hai’n JalilulQadar Sahabi E Rasool Hai’n Huzoor Ke Ghaare Yaar Hai To Kya Afzaliyat Ke Mamle Me Jo Uska Aqida Hai. Wo Ghalat Hai? Kya Us Par Koi Hukm Lagega? ANSWER
Ambiyaa E Kiraam Ke Ba’d Sab Se Afzal Bashar Mein Hazrat E Sayyiduna Siddiq E Akbar رضى الله تعالى عنه Hai.
Hazrat E Ali رضى الله تعالى عنه Ko Siddiq E Akbar رضى الله تعالى عنه Se Fazal Maanna Gumraahi Hai.
والله تعالٰی اعلم

Eid E Milad Ka Juloos Bilkul Saadgi Mein Nikala Jaaye Durood O Salaam Ka Wird Jaari Rahe Aur Log Ba’adab Rahein Aur Ba’wazu Ho.

To Bahut Achhi Baat Hai Aur Aise Paak Juloos Mein Naachna Gaana Dance Karna.

Gaana Bajaana Wagairah NaJaayez O Haraam Hai.

والله تعالٰی اعلم

Title: Sardiyo Ki Taharat Ka Tareeqa Alag Hota Hai?
Content: Jawab: Taharat Mein Dhela Lene Ka Tareeqa Garmi Mein Alag Aur Jaade Mein Alag Hai. Huzoor Sadrushshariah Badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان Irshad Farmate Hai. Paakhaana Ke Ba’ad Mard Ke Liye Dhelon Ke Istemal Ka Mustahab Tareeqa Ye Hai Ke, Garmi Ke Mausam Mein Pahla Dhela Aage Se Peechhe Ko Le Jaaye Aur Dosra Peechhe Se Aage Ki Taraf Aur Teesra Aage Se Peechhe Ko. Aur Jaadon Mein Pahla Peechhe Se Aage Ko Aur Dosra Aage Se Peechhe Ko Aur Teesra Peechhe Se Aage Ko Le Jaaye. Jaadon Mein Banisbat Garmiyon Ke Dhone Mein Ziyaadah Mubaalga Kare. (Bahar E Shari’at Hissa 2 Istinje Ka Bayan) والله تعالٰی اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Chasht Ki Namaz Kab Shuru Hota Hai. Kitni Der Tak Rahta Hai. Chasht Ki Namaz Kitne Rakaat Padhna Hai.
Content: Jawab: Huzoor Sadrushshariah Badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان Irshad Farmate Hai Namaz E Chasht Mustahab Hai. Kam Az Kam 2 Aur Ziyadah Se Ziyadah Chaasht Ki 12 Rakatein Hai. Aur Afzal 12 Hai Ke Hadees Mein Hai Jisne Chasht Ki 12 Rakatein Padhi. Allah تعالى Uske Liye Jannat Mein Sone Ka Mahal Banayega. Namaz e Chasht Ka Waqt Aftab Baland Hone Se Zawal, Yani Nisfunnahaar E Shar’ee Tak Hai Aur Bihtar Hai Ke Chauthaai Din Chadhe Padhe. (Bahar E Shari’at Hissa 4 Sunanan O Nawafil Ka Bayan) والله تعالٰی اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Zaid Ko Raaste (Road) Pe Ek Soone (18k Gold) Ki Baali Mili.
Content:
Usne Kuch Na Soocha Aur Usse Uttahliya Kyu Ki Woh Road Pe Mili.

Tu Usse Uska Maalik Nahi Pata Aur Ab Woh Uska Kya Kare.

Uski Kimat Takriban 4200/- Rupees Hai.

ANSWER
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Zaid Uska Ehlaan Kare Taake Jiski Woh Baali Hai Woh Apni Baali Usse Le Le Aur Gar Ehlaan Ke Ba’d Bhi Koi Lene Na Aaye Aur Ye Gumaan Hai Ke Jiski Baali Hai Woh Ab Ise Talash Nahi Karta Hoga.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">To Kisi Faqeer Ko De De Aur Agar Khud Faqeer Hai To Khud Bhi Istemaal Kar Sakta Hai.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Magar Jab Kabhi Maalik Mil Gaya To Use Kah De Ke Tumhari Baali Sadqa Kardi Ya Main Ne Haalat E Faqeeri Me Le Liya.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Agar Maalik Jaayez Karde To Uski Taraf Se Sadqa Hai Aur Use Iska Sawab Milega.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Aur Agar Sadqa Jaayez Na Kare.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Balkeh Baali Talab Kar Raha Hai To Baali Use De De Aur Agar Baali Khatm Ho Gayi Ho To Utni Qeemat Apni Taraf Se Ada Kare.

Content:

Content:

<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Iddat Ke Andar Jismani Talluqaat Qaaim Kar Sakta Hai Aur Uske Is Amal Se Biwi Nika Mein Aa Gayi.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Balkeh Agar Sirf Bosa Wagaira Liya Jab Bhi Nikah Mein Wapas Aa Jaayegi.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Magar Ab Sirf 2 Talaq Ka Hi Malik Reh Jaayega.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Phir Kabhi Bhi 2 Talaq Dega 3 Talaq Ho Jaayegi.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Aur Agar Iddat Guzar Gayi Ho To Ab Biwi Se Nahi Mil Sakta.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Yani Jismani Talluqqat Qaaim Nahi Kar Sakata Aur Agar Iddat Guzar Gayi Ho To Aurat Kisi Dosre Mard Se Nikah Bhi Kar Sakti Hai.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">والله تعالٰی اعلم

Content:
ANSWER
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Dauraan E Safar Namaz Mein Qasr Hai Aur Agar U.P Mein Jahan Rukna Hai Woh Watan E Asli Hai To Wahaan Pahunchte Hi Muqeem Ho Jaayega Aur Namaz Poori Padhega.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Aur Agar Watan E Asli Nahin Hai Magar Wahan 15 Din Se Zaaid Rukne Ka Iradah Hai Jab Bhi Muqeem Ho Jaayega.

Content:
ANSWER
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Talaq Dene Ke Liye Gawahi Ki Zaroorat Nahi.

Title: Namaz Me Aanhke Band Karna Kaisa? Kya Namaz Me Koi Khararat Hogi?
Content: Jawab: Huzoor Sadrushshariah Badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان Irshad Farmate Hai. Namaz Mein Aankhein Band Rakhna Makrooh Hai. Magar Jab Khuli Rahne Mein Khushu’ Na Hota Ho. To Band Karne Mein Harj Nahi, Balkeh Bihtar Hai. Title: Walima Nikah Ke Baad Kitne Din Tak Kar Sakte Hai
Content:
Aur Kya Walima Ke Liye Shab e Zafaf Zaroori Hai ? Jawab:

Shab E Zafaf Ke Ba’ad 2 Din Tak Walima Kar Sakte Hai.

Aur Shab E Zafaf Mein Hambistari Zaroori Nahi.

Yani Agar Kisi Wajah Se Hambistari Nahi Hui Aur Uske Ba’d Wale Din Walima Kiya To Sunnat Ada Ho Gayi. والله تعالٰی اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Kya Birthday Manana Jayez Hai?
Content:
Birthday Se Muraad Hai Sirf Ghar Mein Birthday Waale Din Cake Laakar Uspar Candle Lagakar Behan Bhaiyo Aur Tamam Mehram Ke Sath Khaana Kaisa.

Title: Hum Log Dubai Me Rehte Hai. Yaha Sab Jyadatar Ahlehadees Tabligi Jamaat Wale Hai.
Content:
Start Me Jab Hamlog Yaha Aye To Majhbori Me Inke Piche Sirf Khadhe Ho Jate The. Ab Nahi Jate Hamare Liye Kya Hukam Hai. ANSWER
Wahabi Deobandi Gair Muqallid Wagairah Badmazhab Jiski Badmazhabi Hadde Kufr Ko Pahunch Gayi Ho Woh Kafir O Murtad Hai.
Unke Peechhe Koi Namaz Jaayez Nahi.
Jitni Namazein Unke Peechhe Padhi Sabko Dobarah Padhna Farz Hai.
Aur Agar Unhe Musalman Jaan Kar Unke Peechhe Namaz Padhi To Taubah O Tajdeed E Imaan Bhi Kare Aur Biwi Rakhte Ho To Tajdeed E Nikah Bhi Kare.
Unke Peechhe Sirf Khade Rahne Ki Bhi Ijazat Nahi.  
واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم

Title: Hinda 60 Saal Ki Hai Aur Apni 40 Saala Beti Ke Saath Umrah Ke Liye Jaane Ka Iraada Rakhti Hai.
Content:
Dono Akele Hai Koi Mehram Nahi Hai.

Tours Wala Kehta Hai 5000 Rs Zaaid Dene Par Woh Log Mehram Ka Intezaam Kar Denge.

Kya Aisa Jaana Durust Hoga?

ANSWER
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Agar Tours Wale Ne Kisi Aise Mard Ka Intezaam Kiya Jo In Dono Ka Shar’ee Mahram Hai.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Yani Us Mard Se In Dono Auraton Ka Nikaah Hamesha Ke Liye Haraam Hai.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Maslan Baap, Beta, Pota, Nana, Dada, Chacha, Mamu Wagairah To Is Soorat Mein Ye Auraten Us Mard Ke Saath Umrah Wagairah Ke Safar Pe Jaa Sakti Hai.

Title: AGAR MAINE KISI KO 10 LAKH KA SONA 13 LAKH MAIN BECH DIYA AUR US BANDE SE YE TAI KAR LIYA KE WO BANDA MUJHE MERE SONE KI KIMAAT 13 LAKH RUPAI DO SAAL KI MIQDAAR MAIN ADA KAREGA
Content:
APNI SAHULIYAT SE PAR DO SAAL KE ANDAR HI ADA KARDEGA HAR MAHINE YA DO MAHINE MAIN THODA THODA KARKE ADA KAREGA MERE 13 LAKH RUPAI TU KYA YE HUM DONO KE LIYE JAYEZ Hoga?

ANSWER
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">10 Lakh Ka Sona 13 Lakh Mein Udhar Bechna Aur Uski Qeemat Ki Adaaigi 2 Saal Mein Qistwaar Tai Paai To Is Mein Harz Nahi.

Title: JIN MARD AURAT KE ZIMME QURBANI HAI WO CHAND RAAT SE PEHLE UNKE LIYE KONSA AMAL HAI JO KARNA HAI, BAAL NAAKHUN KA AUR JIN KE ZIMME NAHI UNKE LIYE KYA HUKM
Content:
ANSWER
<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">BAAL O NAAKHUN KATWANE KA HUKM

<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">HADEES
Ummul Mumineen Umm E Salama رضى الله تعالى عنها Se Riwayat Hai Keh Huzur صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم Ne Farmaya Jis Ne Zilhijjah Ka Chaand Dekh Liya Aur Uska Iraadah Qurbani Ka Hai To Jab Tak Qurbani Na Kar Le Baal O Naakhuno Se Na Le Yani Na Tarashwaye
<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">(Muslim / Tirmizi / Nasai)

<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">MASLAH: Jis Ko Qurbani Karne Ka Iradah Ho Us Ke Liye Mustahab Hai Keh Zilhijjah Ka Chaand Dekhne Ke Ba’ad Naakhun Baal Wagairah Na Kaatein

<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">MASLAH: Agar Kisi Shakhs Ne (31) Din Se Kisi Uzr Ke Sabab, Khwah Bila Uzr Naakhun Na Tarashe Hon, Khat Banwaya Na Ho Keh Chaand Zilhijjah Ho Gaya To Agarcheh Qurbani Ka Iradah Rakhta Ho Is Mustahab Par Amal Nahin Kar Sakta Keh Ab Daswein Tak Rakhega To Naakhun O Khat Banwaye Huye Ektaaliswan (41) Din Ho Jaayega Aur 40 Din Se Ziyadah Na Banwana Gunaah Hai
Fe’l E Mustahab Ke Liye Gunaah Nahin Kar Sakta.
<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">(Fatawa Razviyyah Jild 8 Safah 358)

<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">MASLAH: Jise Dosre Ya Teesre Din Qurbani Karni Hai Us Ke Liye Bihtar Hai Keh Oh Dosre Ya Teesre Din Qurbani Ke Ba’ad Naakhun O Baal Wagairah Kaatein.

<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">MASLAH: Eid Ki Namaz Ke Ba’d Aur Qurbani Se Pahle Naakhun Baal Wagairah Katwa Liya To Is Men Bhi Harj Nahin
<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">JO SAAHIB E ISTETA’AT NA HO USKI QURBANI

<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">HADEES
<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">Hazrat E Abdullah Bin Uamar رضى الله تعالى عنهما Se Riwayat Hai Keh Rasoolullah صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم Ne Farmaya Mujhe Yaum E Azha Ka Hukm Diya Gaya Us Din Ko Khuda Ne Is Ummat Ke Liye Eid Banaya Ek Shakhs Ne Arz Ki Ya Rasoolallah صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم Ye Bataaiyein Agar Mere Paas Meenha Ke Siwa Koi Jaanwar Na Ho To Kiya Uski Qurbani Kar Dun ( Menha Us Janwar Ko Kahte Hain Jo Dosre Ne Use Is Liye Diya Hai Keh Kuchh Dino Uske Doodh Wagairah Se Faaidah Uthaye Aur Phir Maalik Ko Wapas Kar De ) Huzur صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم Ne Farmaya Nahin
<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">Haan Tum Apne Baal Aur Naakhun Tarashwaao Aur Moye Zer E Naaf Mundo Is Men Tumhari Qurbani Khuda Ke Nazdeek Poori Ho Jaayegi Yani Jisko Qurbani Ki Taufeeq Na Ho To Use In Chizo Ke Karne Se Qurbani Ka Sawab Haasil Ho Jaayega
(Abu Daaud, Nasai)
<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">والله تعالٰی اعلم
 
<h6 style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px0px20px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: #3a3a3a; line-height: 1.7; font-family: Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform: capitalize; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2text-indent:0px; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: left;">○●●●●●●●●●●●●○

Title: Hum Jo Raat Me Sote Waqt Khawab Dekh Te Hai. Jo Humari Rooh Bhatak Ti Rehti Hai Idhar Udhar Wo Jojo Dekhti Hai.
Content:
To Wahi Sab Hum Khawab Me Dekhte Hai Kya?

Jawab:

Khwab Ke Baare Mein Aala Hazrat Azeemul Barakat Saiyyiduna Imam Ahmad Raza Fazil E Barailvi رضى الله تعالى عنه Irshad Farmate Hain


Khwab 4 Qism Hai.


Ek Hadees E Nafs Ke Din Mein Jo Khayalaat Qalb Par Gaalib Rahe. Jab Soya Aur Is Taraf Se Hawaas Mu’attal Huye Aalam E Misaal Baqadr E Iste’daad Munkashif Hua.


Unhi Takhayyulaat Ki Shaklen Saamne Aai Ye Khwab Muhmal O Be Ma’na Hai Aur Usme Daakhil Hai Jo Kisi Khalt Ke Galbah Uske Munaasbaat Nazar Aate Hai.


Maslan Sfraawi Aag Dekhe Ya Balgami Paani.


Dosra Khwab Ilqaa E Shaitan Hai Aur Woh Aksar Wahshatnaak Hota Hai. Shaitan Aadmi Ko Darata Ya Khwab Mein Uske Saath Khelta Hai.


Isko Farmaaye Ke Kisi Se Zikr Na Karo Ke Tumhe Zarar Na De. Aisa Khwab Dekhe To Baayein Taraf 3 Baar Thook De Aur اعوذ Padhe Aur Bihtar Ye Hai Ke Wazu Kar Ke 2 Rakat Nafl Padhe.


Teesra Khwab Ilqaa E Firishta Hota Hai.
Isse Guzashta O Maujoodah O Aaindah Gaib Zaahir Hote Hai.


Magar Aksar Parda E Taaweel E Qareeb Ya Ba’eed Mein.


Lihaza Muhtaaj E Tabeer Hota Hai.


Chutha Khwab Ke Rabbul Izzat Bila Wasta Ilqaa Farmaaye Woh Saaf Sareeh Hota Hai Aur Ye Ihteyaaj Tabeer Se Bari.
(Fatawa Razviyyah Jild 29 Safah 87/88 )


Lihaza Jo Khwab Dosre Qism Kaho Jo Dar Asl Shaitan Ki Taraf Se Hai Use Bayan Na Karein.
والله تعالٰی اعلم
--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Aksar Garmiyo Me आला-ए-तनासुल Aur रानो Ke Beech Me Yaani Raano Ki Jhad Waale Hisse Me Paseene Ke Saath Chip Chipi Koi Cheez Nikalti Hai.
Content:
Aur Khujli Ki Wajah Se आला-ए-तनासुल Ke Niche Jo Thaili Hoti Hai Waha Se Koi Chip Chipi Cheez Nikalti Rehti Hai.

To Kya Ye Cheez Napaak Hogi?

Title: Halate Namaz Me Imam Sahab Takbeer Lambi Karde To Hame Bhi Unke Piche Lambi Takbeer Kahni Hai?
Content:
Hamne Takbeer Kahna Imam Sahab Ke Kahne Ke Baad Start Kiya Per Imam Sahab Bahot Jyada Khichte Ho To Hamari Takbeer Unse Pahle Finish Ho Jaye. To Iska Kya Hukam Hai. To Sawal Ye Hai Ki Kya Takbeer Wa Tasmi’ Me Bhi Hame Imam Sahab Ke Piche Hi Rahna Hai Agar Lambi Kare Fir Bhi? Jawab:

Agar Takbeer E Tahreema Mein Imam Se Pahle Takbeer Khatm Kar Li To Us Muqtadi Ki Namaz Nahi Hui.

Aur Agar Takbeer E Tahreema Ke Ilawah Kisi Aur Takbeer Mein Imam Se Pahle Poora Kar Liya To Namaz Ho Jaayegi.

Magar Aisa Qasdan Karna Makrooh Hai Aur Hukm Hai Ke Imam Ke Saath Ya Imam Ke Ba’ad Takbeer Wagairah Khatm Kare.

واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم

-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Jhingha Khana Kaisa Hai?
Content: Jawab: Huzoor Sadrushshariah Badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان Irshad Farmate Hai. Jhinge Ke Mutaliiq Ikhtilaf Hai Ke Ye Machhli Hai Ya Nahi. Isi Bina Par Iski Hiilat O Hurmat Mein Bhi Ikhtilaf Hai. Bazaahir Uski Soorat Machhli Ki Si Nahi Maloom Hoti. Balkeh Ek Qism Ka Keeda Maloom Hota Hai. Lihaza Is Se Bachna Hi Chahiye. Title: Kya Hasne Se Ya Tv Dehkne Se Wazu Toot Jata Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Hasne Se Wazu Nahi Tootta.

Haan Agar Ruku O Sajde Wali Namaz Mein Tez Aawaaz Se Hasa Ke Aas Paas Ke Log Sune To Wazoo Bhi Toot Gaya Aur Namaz Bhi Faasid Ho Gayi.

Yunhi Tv Dekhne Se Wazu Nahi Toota.

Magar Jaandaar Ki Tasweer Ki Video Dekhna Gunaah Zaroor Hai.

والله تعالٰی اعلم

Title: HAJJ AUR UMRAH KE JANEWALE HAZRAT WAHA KE NAJDI IMAM KE PEECHE NAMAZ NAHI PADHTE
Content:
TO UNKE HAJJ UMRAH MEIN KOI KAMI HOGI. YANI HAJJ AUR UMRAH MEIN KYA KOI AMAL, YA KOI HAJJ KI NAMAZ HAI JO IMAM KE PEECHE HI PADHNE PAR HI ADA HOGI.

Jawab:

Hajj O Umrah Ki Koi Namaz Aisi Nahi Jis Ko Jamat Se Padhna Zaroori Ho.

Aur Najdi Imam Ke Peechhe To Koi Namaz Jaayez Nahi.

Title: Balo Me Black Colour Ke Alawa, Koi Dusra Colour Lagana Kaisa?
Content:
Jawab:

Kaale Rang Ke Ilawah Har Tarah Ke Rango Se Baal Daadhi Rang Sakte Hai.

Kaale Rang Se Baal O Dadhi Rangna Haraam Hai.

Hadees Shareef Mein Hai.

Sarkar E Aqdas صلی اللہ تعالی عليه وسلم Irshad Farmate Hai.

Jo Siyaah Khizaab Kare Allah تعالى Roz E Qiyaamat Uski Taraf Nazr E Rahmat Na Farmayega

(Fatawa Razviyyah Jild 9, Safah 31, Hissa 1)

Ek Aur Hadees Shareef Mein Hai.

Ke Jo Siyaah Khizaab Kare Qiyaamat Mein Allah تعالى Uska Munh Siyaah (Kaala Karega)

(Fatawa Razviyyah Jild 9 Safah 105 Hissa 2)

Aala Hazrat Azeemul Barakat Saiyyiduna Imam Ahmad Raza Fazil E Barailvi رضى الله تعالى عنه Irshad Farmate Hai.

Siyaah Khizaab (Kaale Rang Se Rangna) Mutalaqan Haraam Hai.

Shahid E Adal Hai Aurat Ziyaadah Iski Muhtaaj Hai Ke Shauhar Ki Nigaah Mein Aaraasta Ho Jab Use Ye Umoor Tagauur E Khalqillah Ke Sabab Haraam O Mujib E La’nat Huye To Mard Par Badarja E Aula.

(Fatawa Razviyyah Jild 9 Safah 192 Hissa 2)

Lihaza Kaale Rang Se Baal O Daadhi Rangna Mard Ko Jayez Nahi Aur Aurat Ko Bhi Kaale Rang Se Baal Rangna Jayez Nahi Aur Jis Mehendi Se Kaala Rang Chadhta Ho Woh Bhi Jayez Nahi.

Mujaahid Ke Liye Kaale Rang Ki Ijazat Hai.

Iski Poori Tafseel Fatawa Razviyyah Jild 9 Safah 30/31/32/33 Pe Mulahzah Kare.

Aur Aise Rang Se Bhi Bachein Jo Waza E Fussaaq O Fujjar Ho.

والله تعالٰی اعلم

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: KYA YE SAHI HE KE JAHA 40 MOMIN JAMA HOTE HAI. WAHA EK ALLAH KA WALI MAUJUD HOTA Hai.
Content:
ANSWER
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Ye Saheeh Hai Ke Jahan 40 Mumin Mard Muttaqi Parhezgaar Mutasharra Namazi Ho Un Mein Ek Allah Ka Wali Hota Hai.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Fatawa Razviyya Mutarjam Mein Hai.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial;">
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">جماعت میں برکت ہے اور دعائے مجمع مسلمین اقرب بقبول، علما فرماتے ہیں جہاں چالیس مسلمان صالح جمع ہوتے ہیں ان میں ایک ولی ﷲ ضرورہوتاہے۔حدیث میں ہے:اذا شھدت امۃ من الامم وھم اربعون فصاعدا اجازﷲ تعالٰی شھادتھم رواہ الطبرانی فی الکبیر۲؎ والضیاء المقدسی عن والد ابی الملیح۔جب کوئی جماعت حاضر ہو اور چالیس افراد یا اس سے زیادہ ہوں تو اﷲ تعالٰی ان کی شہادت کو جائز قراردیتا ہے۔ امام طبرانی نے معجم کبیرمیں اور ضیاء مقدسی نے ابوالملیح کے والد کے حوالے سے اس کو روایت کیاہے۔(ت) (۲؎ المعجم الکبیر حدیث ۵۰۳ المکتبۃ الفیصلیۃ بیروت ۱/ ۱۹۰)تیسیر شرح جامع صغیر میں فرمایا:قیل وحکمۃ الاربعین انہ لم یجتمع ھذا العدد الا وفیھم ولی۱؎۔کہاگیاہے کہ چالیس کے عدد میں حکمت یہ ہے کہ یہ تعداد کبھی پوری نہیں ہوتی بجز اس کے کہ ان میں کوئی نہ کوئی ولی ضرورہوتاہے(ت) (۱؎ التیسیر شرح الجامع الصغیر حرف الہمزہ مکتبۃ الامام الشافعی الریاض ۱/ ۱۱۰)
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">والله تعالٰی اعلم

Title: Kya Qabro Par Imarath Banana Sahi Hai. Kya Sahi Hadees Hai Iska. Kya Masla Hai. Wazahath Farmaye
Content:
ANSWER
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Qabr Ko Andar Se Pokhta Karna Mana Hai Aur Bahar Se Pokhta Karne Mein Harj Nahi.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Magar Awaam Ki Qabron Ko Pokhta Na Kiya Jaaye.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Jis Tarah Qabr Par Chalna Phirna Baithna Mana Hai. Usi Tarah Qabr Par Deewar Khadi Karna Mana Hai.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Yani Qabr Deewar Mein Shamil Ho Jaaye Ye Jaayez Nahin Aur Kisi Bhi Dargaah Ki Imarat Aisi Nahi Hoti. Ke Qabr Par Deewaar Khadi Ho.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Balkeh Qabr Ke Ird Gird Deewar Banayi Jaati Hai Aur Wahabi Devbandi Gair Muqallid Wagairah Us Hadees Shareef Ko Daleel Bana Kar Mana Karte Hain.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Ye Auliya E Kiraam Se Dushmani Hai Ke Jis Hadees Shareef Se Qabr Ko Deewar Banane Ki Muman’at Hai.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Us Se Qabr Ke Ird Gird Imarat Banane Ki Bhi Mukhalfat Karte Hai.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Allah Ta’ala Unke Shuroor O Gumraahi Se Ham Ahl E Sunnat Ko Mahfooz Rakhe.
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(58,58,58); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">--------------------------------------------------

Title: Ghusl Farz Hone Ke Liye Mani Kitna Nikalna Chahiye.
Content: Maine Kahi Suna Tha Ke Ek Rupaye Ke Sikke Ke Barabar Phailta Hai. Toh Ghusl Farz Hota Hai? Jawab: Agar Shahwat Se ek Qatrah Se Bhi Kam Mani Nikle Ghusl Farz Hai. Aur Ek Sikke Se Zaaid Philaao Wala, Ye Masla Hai Ke Kisi Paak Shakhs Ke Badan Ya Kapde Pe Kisi Ki Ya Khud Ki Mani Lag Jaaye. To Us Hisse Ko Paak Kiye Bagair Namaz Nahi Hogi Aur Ek Sikke Se Kam Hai. To Namaz Ho Jaayegi واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Kya (Ghagra) Pehen Ke Namaz ho Jayegi?
Content:
Jawab:

Agar Is Mein Jism Ka Woh Hissa Jiska Chhupana Namaz Mein Farz Hai.

Woh Chhup Jaata Hai Aur Na Hi Itna Baareek Ho Ke Badan Ki Rangat Chamke.

To Ise Pahan Kar Namaz Padhne Mein Harj Nahi.
واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم


--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Hazrat qamar dar aqrab ka matlab kya hota hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Qamar Dar Aqrab Yaani Chaand jab Burj e Aqrab me hota hai to safar karne ko Bura jaante hain.

Aur Nujoomi ise Manhoos bataate hain aur jab Burj e Asad me hota hai to kapre qata karaane (katwaane) aur silwaane ko bura jaante hain.

Aisi baato ko hargiz na maana jaaye.

Ye baatein khilaaf e shara aur Nujoomiyo ke dhakosle hain.

Title: Agarche Parindo(Birds) Ko Palna Jayez Nahi Hai.
Content:
Fir Bhi IsKe Rewaj Bahot Purana Hai.

Log Iska Shauk Rakha.

Ye Jayez Nahi Hai Is Baat Ki Dalil Kiya Hai❓

ANSWER

Agar Parindo Ko Takleef Na De Aur Uske Khane Peene Ka Khoob Dhiyan Rakhe.


Khane Peene Wagairah Me Kuchh Kami Na Kare To Jaayez Hai.


Aala Hazrat Azeemul Barakat رضى الله تعالى عنه Parinde Wagairah Ke Paalne Ke Baare Me Farmate Hai.


Jaanwaraan E Khangi Misl Kharoos O Makiyan O Kabootar E Ahli Wagairah Paalna Bilaa Shubah Jaayez Hai.


Jabke Unhe Eeza Se Bachaye Aur Aab O Dana Ki Kafi Khabar Giri Rakhe.


Magar Khabar Giri Ki Ye Taakeed Hai Ke Din Me 70 Dafa Dana Paani Dikhaye. Warna Paalna Aur Bhooka Pyasa Rakhna Sakht Gunah Hai.


(Fatawa Razviyya Jild 9 Hissa 1 Safa 71)


Mazkoorah Paabandi Ke Saath Tota, Bulbul Wagairah Bhi Paalna Jaayez Hai.


والله تعالٰی اعلم

Title: Khawab Me Saap Aata Hai To Ghar Ke Bade Bolte Hai Ke Khawab Me Saap Aane Se Jiske Khawab Me Saap Aata Hai.
Content:
Uske Dusman Hote Hai Bahot. Iski Kya Haqiqat Hai.

Kya Ye Baat Such Hai.

Jawab:

Khwab Agar Saheeh Hai, To Saanp Ki Tabeer Dushman Se Hai.

Yani Agar Saanp Aap Ko Takleef De Raha Hai.

To Goya Koi Dushman Aap Ko Takleef Dega Aur Agar Saanp Aap Se Bhag Raha Hai.

To Kisi Dushman Se Aap Ko Nijaat Milegi.

Title: Kya Aurat Ka Dargah Pe Jaana Jaize Hai.
Content:
Mahim Dargah Hazrat Makhdoom Ali R.A Ke Dargah Pe Aurat Kasrat Se Jaati Hai.

Mana Karne Par Jawab Deti Hai.

Hum Toh Maasaab Ke Paas Jaate Hai.

Kya Ye Jayez Hai.

ANSWER

Auraton Ko Mazar Pe Jaana Mana Hai.
Chahe Mazar Kisi Wali Ka Ho Ya Kisi Waliyyah Ka.


Agar Kisi Waliyyah Ke Mazar Pe Jaana Aurton Ke Liye Durust Ho To Qabristaan Me Bhi Jaane Ki Ijazat Ho Jaaye.


Isliye Ke Qabristaan Me To Bahut Si Auraten Bhi Madfoon Hoti Hai.


Magar Is Wajah Se Bhi Mutaakkhreen Fuqha Ne Auraton Ko Qaristan Jaane Ki Ijazat Na Di.


Lihaza Aslam Mazhab Yahi Hai Ke Auraten Mutlaqan Ziyarat E Quboor Se Roki Jaaye.


واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم

Title: Char Rakat Wali Namaz Me Imam Ke Piche Do Rakat Chhut Jaye. Ya Teen Rakat Chhut Jaye To Kaise Ada Kare?
Content:
ANSWER

4 Rakat Wali Namaz Me Sirf 2 Rakat Mili To Imam Ke Salam Ke Ba’d Khada Ho Jaaye Aur Sana O Auzubillah O Bismillah O Soora E Faatiha O Soorat Padh Kar Ruku O Sajde Kar Ke Phir Khade Ho Jaayen Aur Bismillah O Soora E Faatiha O Soorat Padh Kar Ruku O Sajde Kar Ke Baith Jaaye Aur Tashahhud O Durood Dua Padh Kar Salam Pher De.


Aur Agar 3 Rakat Chhut Jaayen To Imam Ke Salam Ke Ba’d Khade Ho Jaayen Aur Sana O Auzu Billah O Bismillah O Soora E Faatiha O Soorat Padh Kar Ruku O Sajde Kar Ke Baith Jaayen Aur Tashahhud Padh Kar Phir Khade Ho Jaayen Aur Bismillah O Soora E Faatiha O Soorat Padh Kar Ruku O Sajde Kar Ke Phir Khade Ho Jaayen Aur Bismillah O Soora E Faatiha Padh Kar Ruku O Sajde Kar Ke Baith Jaaye Aur Tashahhud O Durood Dua Padh Kar Salam Pher De.


والله تعالٰی اعلم

Title: Kya Adab Ke Lihaaz Se Aur Shariat Ke Lihaaz Se Aisa Kehna Sahi Hai?
Content:
न गोरा रंग, दुल्हन की अलामत है ।
न काला रंग, बदसूरती की निशानी ।
कफन सफेद होकर भी,खौफ की अलामत है,
और काबा, काले गिलाफ में भी, आँखों की ठंडक है ।
हर नमाज़ के बाद – पहला कलमा पढ़ो और ये दुआ माँगो के,
ऐ अल्लाह, ये कलमा तेरे पास मेरी अमानत है और – मरते वक्त ये मुझे लौटा देना ।
बेशक, अल्लाह कभी अमानत में खयानत नही करता ।

ANSWER

Ye Kahna Ke


“ऐ अल्लाह, ये कलमा तेरे पास मेरी अमानत है और – मरते वक्त ये मुझे लौटा देना” Munasib Nahi.


Is Tarah Ke Jumle Se Parhez Kare.


واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم

Title: Shohar Agar Biwi Ko Baat Baat Par Zaleel Kare Aur Uski Bilkul Parvah Na Kare.
Content:
Biwi Apna Ghar Bachana Chahti Hain.

Toh Aise Haal Mein Biwi Ko Kaise Jeena Chahiye.

ANSWER

Biwi Par Shauhar Ki Itaa’at Wajib Hai Aur Na Farmaani Na Jayez.


To Agar Shauhar Kisi Galti Par Tambeeh Karta Hai To Use Iska Haq Hai Aur Bila Wajah Karta Hai To Sabr Kare Aur Hattal Imkaan Uski Jayez Khwaahish Ki Takmeel Ki Koshish Kare.


Aur Jo Baatein Uske Mizaaj Ke Khilaaf Ho Usse Bache Aur Usko Raazi Rakhne Ki Har Mumkin Koshish Kare.


Aur Shauhar Ko Bhi Chahiye Ke Biwi Ke Huqooq Ada Kare Aur Uske Saath Achchi Zindagi Guzaare.

Title: Agar Kisi Ne Namaz Me Sirf Ek Sajda Kiya Or Phir Yaad Aaya Ke Ek Hi Sajda Kiya.
Content: To Sajda Sahw Karna Hai. Ya Fir Namaz Daurani Padhegi. Isi Tarha Hi Agar Kisi Ne 3 Sajde Kiye To Uska Kya Hukam? Jawab: Agar Use Namaz Wala Sajda Aakhir Me Yaad Aaya To Woh Namaz Wala Sajda Kare. Phir Tashahhud Padhe, Phir Sajda E Sahw Kare, Phir Tashahhud O Durood E Ibrahimi O Dua E Masurah Ke Baad Salaam Phere. Huzoor Sadrushshariah Badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان Irshad Farmate Hai. Kisi Rakat Ka Koi Sajda Rah Gaya Aakhir Me Yaad Aaya To Sajda Karle. Phir Attahiyat Padh Kar Sajda E Sahw Kare Aur Sajda Ke Pahle Jo Af’aal E Namaz Ada Kiye Baatil Na Honge. Haa Agar Qa’dah Ke Baad Woh Namaz Wala Sajda Kiya,To Sirf Woh Qa’dah Jaata Raha. (Bahar E Shari’at Hissa 4 Sajda E Sahw Ka Bayan) Aur Agar Kisi Ne Ek Rakat Me Bhool Kar Teen Sajde Kiye Woh Bhi Aakhir Me Sajda Sahw Kare. والله تعالٰی اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Kisi Ghar Me Agar Inteqal Hojaye To Wo Ghar Wale Ko Khana Waghira Banane Se Kyu Mana Kiya Jata Hai? Iski Kuch Sharayi Wajah Hai?
Content:
ANSWER

Bahut Mumkin Hai Keh Us Din Ghar Me Inteqaal Ke Sabab Ghar Walon Ko Khana Banane Me Dushwari Ho.


Gham Ki Wajah Se Khana Na Banane Par Bhuke Rahne Ka Andesha Ho Is Wajah Se Agar Koi Unke Liye Khana Tayyar Kare To Woh Khud Na Banaaye Aur Logon Ke Liye Ye Sunnat Bhi Hai Ke Unke Liye Khana Bheja Jaaye.


Aala Hazrat Azeemul Barakat Saiyyiduna Imam Ahmad Raza Fazil E Barailvi رضى الله تعالى عنه Irshad Farmate Hai


Pahle Din Sirf Itna Khana Ke Mayyit Ke Ghar Walo Ko Kaafi Hai Bhejna Sunnat Hai.


Isse Ziyada Ki Ijazat Nahi, Na Dosre Din Bhejne Ki Ijazat, Na Auron Ke Waste Bheja Jaaye Aur Na Aur Us Me Khaaye.
(Fatawa Razviyyah Kitaabul Janaayez)


Haan Agar Koi Bhi Khana Bhejne Wala Nahi Aur Mayyit Ke Ghar Wale Khud Hi Khana Bana Le To Is Me Harj Nahi.


واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم

Title: Khula Ke Baad Bachche Kiske Paas Rahenge Shauhar Ke Paas Ya Bachcho Ki Maa Ke Paas.
Content:
Bachche Chhote Hai.

Unki Parwarish Ka Kharcha Kis Par Hoga.

ANSWER

Khula Ke Ba’d Ladka 7 Saal Aur Ladki 9 Saal Tak Maa Ki Parwarish Me Rahenge.


Phir Baap Ke Paas Aa Jayenge Aur Agar Ladke O Ladki Ke Paas Apna Maal Naho To.


Ladke Ke Baalig Hone Tak Aur Ladki Ki Shadi Hone Tak Unka Nafqah Baap Par Wajib Hai.


Aur Agar Iddat Ke Ba’d Maa Ne Kisi Aise Mard Se Nikah Kiya Jo Ladke Ladki Ka Naa Mahram Hai.


To Maa Ke Liye Haqq E Parwarish Saaqit Ho Jayega Aur Naani Ke Liye Haqq E Parwarish Hai.


Phir Naani Ki Maa Phir Dadi Wagairah.

Title: NAMAZI KAB KURSI PAR NAMAZ PADH SAKTA HAI?
Content:
ANSWER

Khade Ho Kar Namaz Padhne Par Qudrat Ho To Baith Kar Namaz Nahi Ho Sakti.


Agar Thodi Der Bhi Khade Ho Sakte Ho To Utni Der Khade Ho Kar Jab Bilkul Taaqat Na Rahe Khade Rahne Ki To Baith Jaye Aur Ruku Sajde Ke Saath Namaz Ada Kare.


Agar Ruku O Sajde Kar Sakte Hai To Kursi Pe Namaz Na Hogi.


Is Liye Ke Kursi Par Baith Kar Ruku O Sajda Nahi Hota.


Balkeh Ruku O Sajde Ke Liye Isharah Hota Hai.


Jab Ruku O Sajde Pe Qudrat Ho To Isharah Se Namaz Nahi Hogi.


Haan Agar Zameen Par Baith Kar Bhi Ruku O Sajde Karne Ki Taaqat Na Ho To Kursi Par Baith Kar Namaz Ho Jaayegi.


والله تعالٰی اعلم

Title: Koi Banda KhudKhushi Karta Hai To Kya Uski Hayat Waha Tak Hi Thi?
Content:
KhudKhushi Karna To Haram Hai To Phir Islam Me Iska Masla Kya Hai Or KhudKhushi Karne Wali Ki Rooh Kaise Nikali Jati Hai.

Jab Ke Uski Hayat Waha Tak Nahi Thi.

Jawab:

KhudKushi Karne Wale Ki Maut Bhi Allah تعالى Hi Ki Jaanib Se Hai Aur Uski Zindagi Wahi Tak Thi Aur Maut Ka Sabab Woh Khud Hua.

Ke Usne Apne Aapko Maara Aur Uski Rooh Bhi Aam Rooho Ki Tarah Apne Apne Amal Ke Hisaab Se Aalam E Barzakh Me Rahti Hai.

Aur Jo Uske Naam Se Pareshan Karta Hai.
Woh Shaitaan Rahta Hai.

Title: Kya Napak Kapde Dhone Se Kya Ghusl Farz Hojayega?
Content: Jabke Napak Pani Ke Kuch Chinthe Bhi Kapde Pe Lag Jate Hai. Dhote Waqt Jo Paak Hai Kapde Ka Kya Hukum Hoga ? Or Jism Ka Kya Hoga. Jawab: Napaak Kapde Dhone Se Ghusl Farz Nahi. Magar Napak Kapde Ke Chhinte Badan Ya Kapde Pe Pade Ho. To Jitne Hisse Pe Pade Utna Hissa Napaak Hua. Aur Agar Un Chhinto Ka Majmoo’a Dirham Se Zaaid Ho Jaaye. To Bagair Paak Kiye Namaz Nahi Hogi. Badan Ya Kapde Ke Jitne Hisse Pe Pade Ho Utne Hisse Ko Dho Le. Woh Hissa Paak Ho Jaayega Aur Ab Namaz Bhi Ho Jayegi . واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Abdullah Bin Amr Radi Allahu Anhu Se Riwayat Hai.
Content: Rasool-Allah Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ne Mere Upar Zafrani Rang (Saffron Color, Bhagwa Rang) Ke Do Kapde Dekhein To Farmane Lage Ye Kuffar Ke Kapdon Me Se Hai Tum Inhe Mat Pehno (Sahih Muslim, Jild 5, 5436) Hazrat Kya Is Hadees Ke Tahat Waise Colour Ke Kapde Nahi Pahanna Chahiye? Chishti Silsile Wale Aksar Yahi Colour Istemal Karte Hai. Wazahat Farmaye. Jawab: Huzoor Sadrushshariah Badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان Irshad Farmate Hai. Kusum, Ya Za’fraan Ka Ranga Hua Kapda Pahanna Mard Ko Mana Hai. Gehra Rang Ho Ke Surkh Ho Jaaye, Ya Halka Ho Ke Zard Ho Jaaye, Dono Ka Ek Hukm Hai. Aurato Ko Ye Dono Qism Ke Rang Jaayez Hai. In Dono Rango Ke Siwa Baaqi Har Qism Ke Rang Zard, Surkh, Dhani, Basanti, Champeli, Narangi, Wagairah Mardo Ko Bhi Jaayez Hai. Agarche Bihtar Ye Hai Keh Surkh Rang (Laal Rang), Ya Shokh Rang Ke Kapde Mard Na Pehne. Khususan Jin Rango Me Zanana Pan Ho Mard Usko Bilkul Na Pahne. Aur Ye Mumana’at Rang Ki Wajah Se Nahi. Balkeh Aurato Se Tashabbuh Hota Hai, Is Wajah Se Mumana’at Hai. (Bahar E Shari’at Hissa 16 Safah 52) Aala Hazrat Azeemul Barakat Saiyyiduna Imam Ahmad Raza Fazil E Barailvi رضى الله تعالى عنه Irshad Farmate Hai. Aurat Ko Har Qism Ka Rang Jaayez Hai. Jab Tak Ke Us Me Koi Nijasat Naho Aur Mard Ke Liye Do Rango Ka Istisna Hai Mu’asfar Aur Muza’far. Yani Kusum O Kesar, Ye Dono Mard Ko NaJaayez Hai. (Yani Kusum O Za’faraan Se Ranhmga Hua Kapda) Aur Khaalis Shokh Rang Bhi Use Munasib Nahin (Fatawa Razviyyah Jild 9 Safah 76 Nisf Aakhir) والله تعالٰی اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Qurbani Me Dua Ke Waqt Naam Lene Ka Tarika Bataein.
Content:
ANSWER

Qurbani Ka Tareeqa Ye Hai Ke Jaanwar Un Sharaait Ke Muwafiq Ho Jo Mazkoor Hui.

Yani Jo Uski Umar Baatayi Gayi Usse Kam Naho Aur Un Uyoob Se Paak Ho

Jinki Wajah Se Qurbani Najayez Hoti Hai.


Aur Bihtar Ye Ke Umdah O Farbah Ho Qurbani Se Pahle Use Chaarah Paani De De.


Yani Bhooka Pyasa Zabah Na Kare Aur Ek Ke Saamne Dosre Ko Zabah Na Kare Aur Pahle Se Chhuri Tez Kar Le.


Aisa Na Ho Ke Jaanwar Girane Ke Ba’ad Uske Samne Chhuri Tez Ki Jaye.

Jaanwar Ko Baaye Pahlu Par Is Tarah Litaaye Ke Qiblah Ko Uska Muh Ho.


Aur Apna Dahina Paau Uske Pahlu Par Rakh Kar Tez Chhuri Se Jald Zabah Kar Diya Jaye Aur Zabah Se Pahle Ye Dua Padhi Jaye.


إِنِّی وَجَّہْتُ وَجْہِیَ لِلَّذِی فَطَرَ السَّمٰوٰتِ
وَالْأَرْضَ حَنِیفًاوَّمَا أَنَا مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِین
إِنَّ صَلَاتِی وَنُسُكِی وَمَحْیَایَ وَمَمَاتِی لِلَّہِ رَبِّ الْعٰلَمِینَ لَا شَرِيْكَ لَه وَبِذَالِكَ اُمِرْتُ وَ اَنَا مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِيْن اَللّٰهُمَّ لَكَ وَ مِنْكَ بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ اللّٰهُ اَكْبَر


Ise Padh Kar Zabah Kar De Qurbani Apni Taraf Se Ho To Zabah Ke Ba’ad Ye Dua Padhe.


اَللّٰهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ مِنِّىْ كَمَا تَقَبَّلْتَ مِنْ خَلِيْلِكَ اِبْرَاهِيْمَ عَلَيْهِ السَّلَام وَ حَبِيْبِكَ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللّٰه تَعَالىٰ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمْ


Is Tarah Zabah Kare Ke Chaaro Rage Cut Jaye Ya Kam Se Kam 3 Rage Cut Jaye Isse Ziyadah Na Kaate Ke Chhuri Gardan Ke Muhra Tak Pahunch Jaye Ke Ye Bhi Wajah Ki Takleef Hai.


Phir Jab Tak Jaanwar Thanda Na Ho Jaye.


Yani Jab Tak Uski Rooh Bilkul Na Nikkal Jaye Uske Paau Wagairah Na Kaate Na Khaal Utaare Aur Agar Dosre Ki Taraf Se Zabah Karna Hai To مِنِّىْ Ki Jagah مِن Ke Ba’ad Uska Name Le Aur Agar Woh Mushtarak Jaanwar Hai Jaise Gaaye, Oont To Wazan Se Gosht Taqseem Kiya Jaye Mahaz Takhmeena (Andazah) Se Taqseem Na Kare.


(Bahar E Shari’at)


Aur Agar Dua Nahi Padhi Gayi Jab Bhi Qurbani Ho Gayi.


واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم

Title: Agar Koi Shaksh Namaz Ki Halat Me Quran Ki Aayat Ya Tasbihat Itna Aahista Padhta Ho Ke Khud Nahi Soon Sakta To Uski Namaz Nahi Hoti.
Content:

Kya Ye Durust Hai.

Jawab:

Namaz Ke Ilawah Bhi Tilawat E Quran O Auraad O Wazaaif Ke Wird Me Itni Aawaaz Honi Chaahiye Ke Khud Soon Sake.

Agar Itni Bhi Aawaaz Na Hui, To Use Padhna Nahi Kahenge.

Maslan Kisi Ne Is Tarah Quran Shareef Ki Tilwata Ki Ke Usme Itni Aawaaz Na Thi Ke Khud Soon Sake.

To Use Quran Shareef Dekhne Aur Use Chhoone Ka Sawab To Milega.

Magar Tilawat Ka Sawab Nahi.

Title: Ladki Napak Hai Par 4 Se 5 Din Me Use Khoon Ruk Gaya.

Magar Shauhar Ke Liye Jima Karna Us Waqt Jayez Hoga Jab Aadat Ke Din Bhi Poore Ho Jaye.


Haiz Ka Khoon 7 Din Aana Zaroori Nahi.


Balkeh Kam Bhi Aa Sakta Hai Aur Ziyadah Bhi.


Isliye Ke Haiz Ki Kam Se Kam Muddat Teen Din Hai Aur Ziyadah Se Ziyadah 10 Din.

Ya Kisi Gareeb Ko De Diya Jaye.

ANSWER

Aap Uska Ehlaan Kare Taakeh Jiski Woh Raqam Hai Woh Apni Raqam Aap Se Le Le.

Aur Gar Ehlaan Ke Ba’ad Bhi Koi Lene Na Aaye Aur Ye Gumaan Hai Keh Jiski Raqam Hai Woh Ab Ise Talash Nahin Karta Hoga.


To Kisi Faqeer Ko De De Aur Agar Khud Faqeer Hai To Khud Bhi Istemal Kar Sakta Hai.


Magar Jab Kabhi Malik Mil Gaya To Use Kah De Keh Tumhari Raqam Sadqa Kardi Ya Main Ne Haalat E Faqr Me Le Liya.


Agar Malik Jayez Karde To Uski Taraf Se Sadqa Hai Aur Use Iska Sawab Milega.

Aur Agar Sadqa Jayez Na Kare.


Balkeh Raqam Talab Kar Raha Hai To Raqam Use De De.

Aur Agar Raqam Khatm Ho Gayi Ho To Utni Qeemat Apni Taraf Se Ada Kare.


والله تعالٰی اعلم

Title: Zaid Ka Kehna Hai Ki Wo Har Roz Jab Bhi Peshab Ke Liye Jata Hai.
Content:
Tab Use Apne Ala E Tanasul Par Tari Nazar Ati Hai. Wo Tari Asal Me Kya Hai Use Maloom Nahi.

Haa Use Ye Lagta Hai Ki Shayad Ye Ala E Tanasul Ke Andar Ke Hisse Me Jo Pani Hota Hai Wo Bahar Aata Hoga.

To Kya Ye Chiz Napak Hogi?

Aur Us Chiz Ka Kapde Par Lagne Ka Koi Rang, Ya Asar Mehsoos Nahi Hota Hai.

Haa Use Shak Hota Hai Ki Shayad Wo Chiz Lagi Ho Sakti Hai, Shayad Na Bhi Lagi Ho.

Lekin Ehtiyatan Zaid Us Kapde Ko Dho Kar Paak Kar Leta Hai.

Ab Agar Kabhi Usne Us Kapde Ko Paak Na Kiya, To Kya Wo Kapda Napaak Keh Layega?

Jawab:

Aala E Tanasul Se Nikalne Wali Tari NaPaak O Naaqiz E Wazu Hai.

Lihaza Agar Wazu Ke Baad Tari Nikli Wazu Toot Gaya.

Aur Agar Kapde, Ya Badan Par Dirham Se Zaaid Lag Jaaye.

To Paak Kiye Bagair Namaz Nahi Hogi.

Title: Agar Biwi Rozana Apni Behno Se Ghanto Phone Par Baat Kare To Shauhar Use Rozana Baat Karne Se Mana Kar Sakta Hai?
Content:

Aur Apne Mobile Se Baat Karaye To Ye Jayez Hai?

ANSWER

Aurat Par Sab Se Zyada Haq Uske Shauhar Ka Hai.


Lehaza Fitne Ke Andeshe Ki Waja Se Wo Apni Biwi Ko Us Ki Behno Se Rozana Ghanto Baat Karne Se Mana Kar Sakta Hai.


Aur Biwi Par Lazim Hai Ke Wo Apne Shauhar Ka Hukm Maane Aur Us Ki Baato Par Amal Kare.


Agar Biwi Mukhalifat Kare Ya Is Bina Par Talaq Ka Mutaalba Kare To Wo Gunahgar Hogi.


Shauhar Ko Chahiye Ke Wo Narmi Ke Sath Apni Biwi Ko Samjhaayein Aur Zarurat Ke Waqt Biwi Ke Ghar Waalo Se Baat Karaaye.


Aurat Ke Paas Mobile Dena Zaruri Nahi.
