Title: Burqa (Aurton Ka Parda) Burqa Aur Parda Kise Kehte Hain Iski Tareef Batayein.
Content:
Kuch Logo Ka Kehna Hai Ke Burqa Jism Ko Chupane Ka Naam Hai.

Isiliye Hum Aurten Apne Jism Ko Kapdon Se Chupa Dete Hain.

Yani Shrt Shalwaar Jo Bhi Ho Usse Hum Apna Pura Jism Chupa Dete Hain.

To Alag Se Parda Karne Ki Kya Zarurat Hai.

Asal Me Parda Aur Burqa Kise Kehte Hain?

ANSWER

Burqa Ya Naqaab Us Kapde Ko Kaha Jata Hai.

Jisse Aurat Ka Saara Jism Sar Taa Pair Chup Jaaye Aur Zeenat Kahin Se Zahir Na Ho.


Aam Kapdo Me Zeenat Bhi Hoti Hai Use Burqa Nahi Kaha Jaayega.

Title: Zaid Sarkari Sharab Ki Dukan Ka Manager Hai Or Usko Sarkar Ke Zariye Salary Milti Hai.
Content:
To Zaid Ke Yaha Dawat Ka Khana Khana Kaisa Hai.

Agarche Malum Ho Or Zaid Ka Apne Ghar Per Milad Karna Or Uski Shirni Ka Kiya Hukm Hai.

ANSWER

Kisi Shaks Ke Makaan Pe Khaane Ka Mauqa Ho Aur Uska Zariya E Aamdani Halal Bhi Ho Aur Haraam Bhi To Aisi Surat Me Uski Kamaai Ke Gaalib Hisse Ka Etebaar Hoga.


Agar Uski Aamdani Ke Zariye Ka Aksar Hissa Halaal Ho To Uska Khana Durust Hai.


Haan! Yaqini Taur Par Ma’loom Ho Ke Jo Kuch Laaya Gaya Hai Iske Liye Haraam Kamaayi Ki Raqam Hi Istemaal Ki Gayi Hai To Khana Jayez Nahi Hai.


Isi Tarah Uski Amdani Ka Aksar Hissa Haraam Zariye Hasil Hua Ho To Khana Jayez Nahi.


Magar Ye Ke Saahib E Khaana Saraahat Kar De Ke Us Ne Halal Amdani Ka Khana Tayyar Kiya Hai. Tab Khaane Me Koi Harj
Nahi.


Lehaza Jiski Amdani Poore Taur Par Haraam Hai. To Uske Yahan Khana Najaayez O Haraam Hai.


Magar Ye Ke Wo Khud Wizaahat Karde Ke Maine Ye Khana Jayez Halaal Amdani Wale Bhai Ki Kamaai Se Mangwaaya Hai.
Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam

Title: Dadhi Kitne Bhari Honi Chahiye Aur Dadhi Kya Khaskhasi Rakhi Ja Sakti Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Daarhi Mundaana Haraam Hai.
Durr E Mukhtar Me Hai.

“Mard Ko Daarhi Mundana Haraam Hai”

Fath Ul Qadeer, Durr E Mukhtar, Raddul Mohtaar, Bahr Raayeq, Tahtawi Me Hai.

“Darhi Jab Ek Musht Se Kam Ho To Uska Kaatna Jis Tarah Kuch Magribi Aur Zanaane Zankhe Karte Hain Kisi Ke Nazdeek Jayez Nahi Aur Poori Darhi Ka Safaaya Karna Ye Kaam To Hindustaan Yahudio Aur Iran Ke Majoosio Ka Hai.
Aala Hadrat Imam Ahmad Raza Fazil E Bareilwi Quddisa Sirruh Ul Azeez Farmaate Hai.

“Daarhi Katraana Mundaana Haraam Hai”.
(Fatwa Razvia)
Huzoor Sadrussharia Farmate Hai.

“Darhi Barhana Sunan E Ambiya E Saabiqeen Se Hai Mundaana Ya Ek Musht Se Kam Rakhna Haraam Hai”.
(Bahar E Shariat)

Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Haq Muhaddis Dehiwi Alaihir Rahmah Farmate Hai.

“Darhi Mundana Haraam Hai, Angrezo, Hinduwo, Aur Qalandario Ka Tareeqa Hai Aur Darhi Ko Ek Musht Tak Chhor Dena Wajib Hai Aur Jin Foqaha Ne Ek Musht Darhi Rakhne Ko Sunnat Qarar Diya (To Is Waja Se Nahi Ke Unke Nazdeek Wajib Nahi. Balke Is Waja Se Ke Ya) To Sunnat Se Muraad Chaalu Rasta Hai.

Ya Is Waja Se Ke Ek Musht Ka Wujoob Hadees Shareef Se Saabit Hai. (Yaani Hadees E Rasool Ko Bhi Sunnat E Rasool Kaha Jaata Hai).

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa E Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Maine Ek Post Me Padha Hai Ki. Nabi ﷺ Ne Ghar Ke Kaam Kiya Hai.
Content:
Jaise Ki Bartan Dhona Jhadu Lagana Iski Kya Haqiqat Hai Aur Khana Pakana Bhi.

ANSWER

Madarijun Nubuwwah Me Zikr Hai K Huzoor-E-Akram ﷺ Ahl E Khana K Khud Kaam Kaaj Karte Aur Apne Kapde Khud Seete, Apni Na’lain-E-Mubarak Khud Durust Farmaate Aur Apni Bakri Ka Doodh Khud Doohte.


Kapde Se Gard O Gubaar Saaf Farmaate, Ap Apni Sawari K Unt Ko Khud Bandhte, Aur Khud Hi Usko Chaara Wagaira Daalte The.


Atta Gundhne Me Khadim Ki Madad Farmaate, Aur Khadim Ka Sath De Kar Madad Farmaate The. Uske Sath Khana Khaate.


Kitabo Me Milta Hai K Ap Bahot Se Khuddam Aur 10 Gulaam Rakhte The.


Lehaza Ba Nafs E Nafees Kaam Sar Anjaam Dete Aur Kabhi Unhe Hukm Farma Diya Karte Aur Kabhi Unke Sath Mil Kar Kaam Karte The Aur Bazar Se Apna Saman Khud Utha Kar Laate Aur Kisi Dosre Par Uthaane Ke Liye Na Chhorte The.


Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam

Title: Namaz Ke Baad Musalle Ko Ek Side Se Kyu Fold Kiya Jata Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Hadees E Paak Me Hai Huzoor E Aqdas ﷺ Ke Irshad Ka Maf’hoom Hai Ke Shaitan Tumhare Kapde Istemal Karta Hai, To Kapda Utaar Kar Teh Kar Diya Karo, Shaitan Teh Kiye Hue Kapde Ko Nahi Pahenta.

Aur Ek Riwayat Me Hai Ke Kapde Lapet Diya Karo Ke Unki Jaan Me Jaan Aa Jaye Ke Shaitan Jis Kapde Ko Lipta Hua Dekhta Hai, Use Nahi Pahenta Aur Jise Phaila Hua Paata Hai Use Pahenta Hai, Ya Istemaal Me Laata Hai.

Ibn E Abid Duniya Me Hai Ke Jahan Koi Bichauna (Bistar) Bicha Hua Ho Jis Par Koi Sota Na Ho, Us Par Shaitan Sota Hai.

In Ahadees Se Is Ki Asl Nikalti Hai Ke Jab Koi Kapda Istemal Me Na Ho, To Us Ko Lapet Diya Jaaye, Ya Teh Kar Diya Jaaye.

Haalate Haiz Me Sohbat (Mubasharat / Hambistari) Haraam Hai.

Aayat: Allah Ta’alaa Irshaad Farmata Hai.

وَ یَسۡئَلُوۡنَکَ عَنِ الۡمَحِیۡضِ ؕ قُلۡ ہُوَ اَذًی ۙ فَاعۡتَزِلُوا النِّسَآءَ فِی الۡمَحِیۡضِ ۙ وَ لَا تَقۡرَبُوۡہُنَّ حَتّٰی یَطۡہُرۡنَ ۚ فَاِذَا تَطَہَّرۡنَ فَاۡتُوۡہُنَّ مِنۡ حَیۡثُ اَمَرَکُمُ اللّٰہُ ؕ اِنَّ اللّٰہَ یُحِبُّ التَّوَّابِیۡنَ وَ یُحِبُّ الۡمُتَطَہِّرِیۡنَ

Tarjumaa: (Aye Mehboob!) Aur Tum Se Puchhte Hai Haiz Kaa Hukm! Tum Farmaao Ke Wah Naapaki Hai! To Aurto Se Alag Raho Haiz Ke Dino, Aur Inse Nazdiki Na Karo, Jab Tak Paak Na Ho Le, Phir Jab Paak Ho Jaaye To Inke Paas Jao Jahaan Se Tumhe Allah Ne Hukm Diya Beshak Allah Pasand Karta Hai Bahut Taubaa Karne Waalo Ko, Aur Pasand Rakhta Hai Suthro (Paak Rehne Waalo) Ko!
Tarjumaa:- Kanzul Imaan Sura-E-Bakhraa, Aayat No 222

Jab Aurat Haiza (Haiz Ki Haalat Me Ho To Usse Jimaa Karna Sakht Gunaah e Kabira, Najaayez Wa Sakht Haraam Hai!

Is Baat Ka Khayaal Hamesha Rakhe Ki Jab Kabhi Sohbat Ka Iradaa Ho To Pahle Aurat Se Daryaaft Karle, Aur Aurat Par Laajim Hai Ki Agar Wah Haiza Hai, To Mard Ko Is Baat Se Aagaah Karde! Aur Mubasharat Se Baaz Rakhe!

Aur Aurat Par Wajib Hai Ke Agar Wah Haiza Ho To Apni Halat Se Shauhar Ko Waakif Karde Taaki Shauhar Mubasharat Na Kare Warna Aurat Sakht Gunaahgaar Hongi!

Aksar Mard Shaadi Ki Pahli Raat Besabri Ka Mujaahraa Karte Hai, Aur Baa-Wajud Iske Ke Aurat Haiza Hoti Hai Jima Kar Baithte!

Agar Aurat Haiza Ho To Usse Mubasharat Karna Jaayez Nahi, Chaahe Shaadi Ki Pahli Hi Raat Kyu Na Ho!

Isliye Mard Ki Jimmedaari Hai Ke Wah Shaadi Ki Pahli Raat Se Hi Apni Biwi Ko In Masaail Se Aagaah Karde!

Hazrat Imaam Muhammad Gazaali Radi Allaahu Ta’alaa Anhu Irshad Farmaate Hai.

Ilm-E-Deen Jo Namaz, Roza, Taharat Wagairah Me Kaam Ataa Hai, Aurat Ko Sikhaaa! Agar Na Sikhayega To Aurat Ko Baahar Jaakar Aalim-E-Deen Se Puchhna Wajib Aur Farz Hai!

Agar Shauhar Ne Sikhaa Diya Hai, To Uski Ijazat Ke Bagair Baahar Jaana Aur Kisi Se Puchhna Aurat Ko Durust Nahi.

Agar Deen Sikhaane Me Kasur Karenga To Khud Gunaahgaar Honga Ki Hak Taalaa Ne Irshad Farmaya.

Aye Imaan Waalo! Apni Jaano Aur Apne Ghar Waalo Ko Jahannam Ki Aag Se Bachaao!

Kimiyaa-E-Saadaat, Safaa No 265

Halat-E-Haiz Me Aurat Se Sohabat Karna Sakht Haraam Hai! Jo Ki Quran Majeed Se Saabit Hai!

Allah ﷻ Aur Uske Rasool ﷺ Ne Aise Shakhs Se Bezari Ka Izhaar Farmaya Hai, Jo Haiza Aurat Se Hambistri Karta Hai!

Book: Kareen-E-Zindagi

Title: Shirk Kise Kehte Hai?
Content:
Khudaye Ta’ala Ki Zaat Wa Sifaat Me Kisi Ko Shareek Ṭhehrana Shirk Hai.

Zaat Me Shareek Ṭhehrana Ka Matlab Yah Hai, Ki Do Yaa Do Se Zyada Khuda Maane.

Jaise Essai (Christian) Ki Teen Khuda Maan Kar Musharik Hue Aur Jaise Hindu Ki Kai Khudaa Manne Ke Sabab Musharik Hain.

Aur Sifaat Me Shareek Ṭhehrana Ka Matlab Yah Hai Ki Khudaaye Ta’ala Ki Sifaat Ki Tarah Kisi Doosare Ke Liye Koi Sifaat Sabit Kare.

Masalan Sunna Aur Dekhna Wagaira Jaisa Ki Khudaye Ta’ala Ke Liye Bagair Kisi Ke Diye Jaati Taur Par Sabit Hai.

Usi Tarah Kisi Doosare Ke Liye Sunna Aur Dekhna Wagaira Zaati Taur Par Maane Ki Bagair Khuda Ke Diye Use Yah Sifatein Khud Haasil Hain To Shirk Hai.

Aur Agar Kisi Doosare Ke Liye Ataayi Taur Par Maane Ki Khudaye Ta’ala Ne Use Yah Sifatein Ataa Ki Hain, To Shirk Nahi.

Jaisa Ki Allah Ta’ala Ne Khud Insan Ke Baare Me Para 29 Ruko 19 Me Farmaya Jiska Tarjamaa Yah Hai Ki

“Hamane Insan Ko Sunane wala, Dekhane wala Banaya!”

Book-Anware Shariat Hindi P18

Title: 1) Ghar Banane Ke Liye Koi Khas Mahine Me Kaam Shuru Karna Chahiye?

2) Zamin Kharid Ne Ke Baad Jab Ghar Banana Ho Tab Kya Amal Karna Yaa Karvana Chahiye.

AUR IS KE ILAWA KOI GHAR BANANE KE MAMLE ME JANNA JARURI HO TO BATA KAR REHNUMAI FARMAYEGA.

ANSWER

Har Kone Me 7 Roz Tak Azan De.


Bareilly Shareef Ki Keele (nail) Aati Hain.

Is Ke Liye Koi Khas Din Muqarrar Nahi.


Agar Peer (Monday) Ke Din Se Shuru Karein To Behtar Hai.

Title: Haiz Ke Baad Humbistari (Sohbat / Jima / Mubashrat) Kab Jayez Hai?
Content: Jawab: Hamare Imam, Imam E Azam Abu Hanifa Radi Allaahu Ta’ala Anhu Ke Nazdik Aurat Ko Haiz Ka Khoon (10) Das Dino Ke Baad Aana Band Ho Jaye To Ghusl Se Pahle Bhi Sohbat Karna Jayez Hai. Lekin Behtar Yah Hai Ke Aurat Ghusl Karle Uske Baad Hi Mubasharat Ki Jaye. Hadis: Hazrat Saalim Bin Abdullaah Aur Hazrat Sulemaan Bin Yasir Radi Allaahu Ta’ala Anhuma Se Haiz Waali Aurat Ke Baare Me Puchha Gaya Ki. “Kya Uska Shauhar Use Paak Dekhe To Ghusl Se Pahle Sohbat Kar Sakta Hai Yaa Nahi”? Dono Ne Jawab Diya. “Na Kare Yahaan Tak Ki Wah Ghusl Kar Le.” Mo’attaa Imam Maalik, Jild No 1, Baab No 26, Hadis No 90, Safa No 79 Masala: Das (10) Din Se Kam Me Khoon Aana Band Ho Gaya Ho To Jab Tak Aurat Ghusl Na Kare Sohbat Jayez Nahi. Bahaare Shariyat, Jild No 1, Hissaa No 2, Safa No 47 Masala: Aadat Ke Din Pure Hone Se Pahle Hi Haiz Ka Khoon Aana Band Ho Gaya To Agarche Aurat Ghusl Karle Sohbat Jayez Nahi. Maslan Kisi Aurat Ki Haiz Ki Aadat Chaar Din Wa Chaar Raat Thi Aur Is Baar Haiz Aaya Teen Din Wa Raat To Chaar Din Wa Raat Jab Tak Pure Na Ho Jaye Sohbat Jayez Nahi. Bahare Shariyat, Jild No 1, Hissaa No 2, Safa No 47

Title: YAH KEHNA KAISA KE HUZOOR ﷺ  HAMARE “SAHAB” HAI?
Content:
HUZOOR ﷺ PAR ITLAQE SAHAB KHUD QURAN E MAJEED ME WAARID HAI.

وَٱلنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ

Al-Najm – النجم, Aayat Number – 1 & 2

TARJUMA – IS PYAARE CHAMAKTE TAARE MUHAMMAD KI QASAM JAB YAH MERAAJ SE UTRE TUMHARE SAHAB NA BAHKE NA BERAAH CHALE.

MAGAR NAAME AQDAS KE SAATH IS TAUR PAR LAFZE SAAHAB KA MILANA YAH AARAIYO AUR PADRIYO KA SIAAR HAI.

WAH ISE MAAROOF TAAZEEM ME LAATE HAI, JO ZAID WA UMAR KE LIYE RAYEZ HAI.

SHAIKH SAHAB, HARJA SAHAB, PADRI SAHAB, PANDIT SAHAB.

LIHAZA IS SE AEHTRAAZ CHAHIYE.
HAA YU KAHA JAYE KE HUZOOR ﷺ HAMARE SAHAB HAI, AAKA HAI, MAALIK HAI, MOULA HAI!

FATAWA RAZVIYA SHAREEF, JILD-14, SAFA NUMBER-613 Aur 614
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Title: Khade Hokar Peshab Karna Kaisa?
Content:
Jawab:

Hadis- Ummul Moominin Siddikaa Razi Allaahu Taalaa Anhaa Farmati Hain Ki Jo Tum Se Kahe Ki Huzoore Akdas ﷺ Khade Hokar Peshab Farmaate Use Sachcha Na Janna, Huzoor Peshab Na Farmaate The Magar Baith Kar!

Tirmizi Sharif

Hadis- Amirul Moominin Farooqe Azam Raji Allaahu Taalaa Anhu Rivaayat Karte Hai.

Rasulullaah ﷺ Ne Mujhe Khade Hokar Peshaab Karte Dekha Farmaya- Aye Umar! Khade Hokar Peshab Na Karo, Us Din Se Maine Kabhi Khade HoKar Peshab Na Kiya!

Baihaqi Sharif

Hadis- Rasulullaah ﷺ Ne Khade Hoker Peshab Karne Se Mana farmaya!

Ibne Maajah

Hadis- Teen Baatein Jafaa Wa Be-Adbi Se Hain!

1- Yah Ki Aadmi Khade Ho Kar Peshab Kare!
2- Yah Ki Namaz Me Apni Peshaani Se (Mitti Ya Pasina) Ponchhe!
3- Yah Ki Sajda Karte Waqt Phooke!

Musanad Bajjaar

In Ahadees Se Malum Hua Ki Khade Hokar Peshab Karna Ilshaadaate Rasul Ki Khilaaf Warji Aur Hukme Shara Se Muh Modnaa Hai !

FATAWA RAZVIYA, Jild 2, Safa 146-147

“Peshaab Ke Chhinte”

Quam-E-Bani israil Me Peshab Ke Ehkaam Bade Sakht The! Us Qaum Me Agar Jism Ke Kisi Hisse Par Peshab Ke Chhinte Lagte To Jism Ki Utni Chamadi Kaat Kar Nikaal Di Jaati Thi!

Allaahu Akabar…

Hadis Sharif Me Hai Ki Qabr Me Aksar Azaab Peshab Ke Chhinton Se Nahi Bachne Ke Karan Hota Hai!

Wo Bhai Bahan Is Masail Se Ibarat Le Jo Istinjaa Khane Me Aur Digar Makamat Me Peshaab Ke Chhinton Se Nahi Bachte!

Khaasakar Hamare Navjavan Jo Bade Hi Chust Kapade Pahante Hai Aur Istinjaa Ke Wakt Khade-Khade Faarig Ho Jaate Hai!
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

ANSWER

Jandar Ki Tasweer Ka Hukm Us Ke Chehre Se Diya Jayega.

Chahe Wo Cartoon Chehra Ho Ya Kaisa Bhi.

Agar Chehra Waazeh Hai Aur Sajde Ki Jagah Par Rakh Kar Khade Ho Kar Dekha Jaaye To Chehra Saaf Samajh Me Aaye To Aisi Tasweer Ke Samne Namaz Makrooh E Tahrimi Hogi.

Title: Ba Jamat Namaz Me Imam Sahab Ke Takbeer E Inteqal Kahte Waqt Muqtadi Imam Saheb Ke Takbeer Khatam Karne Se Pahle Hi Takbeer Khatam Kare.

Jaise Rakat Ke Dusre Sajde Se Uth Kar Qayam Me Khade Hone Tak Imam Saheb Lambi Takbeer Padhte Hai.

Allahu Akbar Us Dauraan Muqtadi Takbeer Ko Imam Saheb Se Pahle Khatam Kare.

Jawab:

Takbeer E Tahreema Imam Ke Mukammal Karne Ke Baad Mukammal Karna Zaruri Hai.

Warna Imam Ke Peeche Namaz Shuru Hi Na Hogi.

Haan Baqiya Takbeeraat Me Bhi Imam Ke Baad Hi Takbeer Mukammal Kare.

Magar Pehle Mukammal Kar Liya To Bhi Namaz Ho Jayegi.

ANSWER
<h6 style="box-sizing:border-box; border:0px; font-size:1rem; font-style:normal; font-weight:400; margin:0px0px20px; outline:0px; padding:0px; vertical-align:baseline; clear:both; color:rgb(0,0,0); line-height:1.7; font-family:Raleway,sans-serif; text-transform:capitalize; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2text-indent:0px; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:left;">Jamaat Me Imam Ka Sutra Muqtadio Ka Sutra Hai.

Title: Hazrat Ek Sawal Aur Hai Hamara. Jo Mai Bhut Parishan Hu
Content:
Jaise Hum Sunte Hai Aur Hadish Se Sabit Wa Hai Ke Sajde Me Banda Allah Ke Bhut Qarib Hota Hai Aur Har Dua Qubul Hoti Hai.

Magar Kaise Sajde Me Dua Mangu.

Bhut Sare Log Bolte Hai Ke Namaz Me Jo Sijda Hoti Hai Sajde Ki Tasbih Padhne Ke Baad Dua Karein To Dua Jald Qabul Hoti Hai.

Kya Aisa Karne Se Namaz Ki Niyat Tutegi Na.

Bhut Log Bolte Hai Namaz Mokammal Karne Ke Baad Sajde Me Jakar Dua Karein

ANSWER

Namaz Ke Ilawa Sajde Me Duaayein Karein Aur Sajde Me Wahi Dua Karein Jinka Ta’lluq Akhirat Se Ho.


Yaani Gunaho Se Magfirat, Jannat Wagairah Ke Liye Sajde Me Dua Karein.

Khalifa E Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Peeri Aur Mureedi Par Sawal
Content:
1. Peeri Muridi Ki Haqiqat Kya Hai. Kyun Kisi Ko Apna Peer Banana Chahiye. Kya Huzoor Aleyhis Salaam Ka Farmaan Hai? 2. Peer / Murshid Ki Pehchaan Kaise Kare Ki Kya Yeh Peersaheb Nek Hai Yah Sirf Dikhawa Hai? 3. Yeh Taalib Hona Kya Hai? 4. Kya Taalib Hone Ke Liye Murshid Ki Ijazat Zaruri Hai? 5. Agar Musrhid Duniya Mein Ho Ya Na Ho Tau Ijazat Kaise Le? 6. Kya Ek Se Zyada Se Mureed Ya Taalib Ho Sakte Hai? 7. Kaunsi Umr Mein Mureed Hona Chahiye? 8. Agar Bachpan Mein Mureed Hoye Aur Hosh Sambhal Ne Ke Baad Yeh Laga Ki Mujhe Inse Nahi Kisi Aur Se Mureed Hona Hai Toh Kya Hukm Hai? 9. Kya Woh Shaks Nuksaan Mein Hai Jo Bina Mureed Hue Duniya Se Gaya? 10. Jis Tarha Jism Ka Baap Walid Hota Hai Us Tarha Rooh Ka Baap Peer Hota Hai Kya Yeh Kehna Sahi Hai? Jawab: 1. Mureed Hona Ye Hai Ke Kis Jaame’ Sharaait E Peer Ke Rubaru Taubah Kar Ke Nek Kaamo Ka Pokhta Wa’dah Kare Aur Isi Ko Bai’at Hona Bhi Kahte Hain. Bai’at Ka Zikr Kayi Ahadees Mein Hai Aur Bai’at-E-Rizwan Ka Zikr To Quran Mein Bhi Hai. والله تعالٰی اعلم 2. Jis Peer Mein Ye 4 Shartein Maujood Ho Woh Sahih Peer Hai Aur Us Se Mureed Hona Jayez. Huzoor Sadrushshariah Badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان Irshad Farmate Hain. Jab Mureed Hona Ho To Achhi Tarah Tafteesh Kar Le. Warna Agar Badmazhab Hua To imaan Se Bhi Haath Dho Baithenge. Peeri Ke Liye 4 Sharten Hain.Qabl Az Bai’at Unka Lihaaz Farz Hai.
  1. Sunni Sahihul Aqeedah Hona.
  2. Itna Ilm Rakhta Ho Keh Apni Zaroorat Ke Masaail Kitaabon Se Nikaal Sake.
  3. Faasiq E Mu’lim Na Ho.
  4. Uska Silsilah Nabi صلی اللہ تعالی عليه وسلم Tak Muttasil Ho.
(Bahar E Shari’at Hissa 1 Safah 79) والله تعالٰی اعلم 3. Apne Peer Ki Bai’at Par Qaaim Rahte Huye Kisi Dosre Peer Se Mureed Hona Taalib Kahlata Hai. والله تعالٰی اعلم 4. Taalib Hone Ke Liye Mrshid Ki Ijazat Zaroori Nahin. Haan Agar Murshid Maujood Ho To Bihtar Hai Keh Ijazat Le Le. والله تعالٰی اعلم 5. Agar Mushid Ka Inteqaal Ho Gaya Ya Bhaut Door Hai To Is Soorat Mein Ijazat Ki Koi Zaroorat Nahin. 6. Ek Hi Waqt Mein 2 Peero Se Mureed Hona Sahih Nahin. Haan Agar Murshid Ka Inteqal Ho Gaya Ya Bahut Door Hai To Kisi Jaame’ Sharaait E Peer Se Taalib Ho Jaye. والله تعالٰی اعلم 7. Mureed Hone Ke Liye Umar Ki Koi Qaid Nahin Ek Din Ka Bachcha Bhi Mureed Ho Sakta Hai. والله تعالٰی اعلم 8. Bachpan Mein Jis Peer Se Mureed Hua Agar Us Mein Sharaait E Peer Maujood Hain To Bai’at Todna Jayez Nahi. Haan Taalib Ho Sakte Hain. والله تعالٰی اعلم 9. Mureed Hone Se Jo Faaidah Hai Duniya O Aakhirat Mein Us Faaidah Se Mahroom Raha. والله تعالٰی اعلم 10.Kah Sakte Hain. والله تعالٰی اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Kuffr Kise Kehte Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Zaruriyat-e-Deen Me Se Kisi Ek Baat Ka Inkaar Karna Kufr Hai.

Zururiyaat-e-Deen Bahut Hai Unme Se Kuch Yah Hai:

Khudayeta’ala Ko Ek Aur Waajibul-Wajood Manna.

Uski Zaat Wa Sifaat Me Kisi Ko Shareek Na Samajhna,

Zulm Aur Jhooṭ Wagaira Tamaam Aiboo Se Usko Paak Manna, Uske Malaika Aur Uski Tamaam Kitaabo Ko Manna, Quran Majeed Ki Har Aayat Ko Haak Samajhna.

Huzoor Sayyed-e-Aalam (Sallallaaho Ta’aalaa Alaihi Vasallam) Aur Tamaam Ambiya-E-Kiraam Ki Nabuwat Ko Tasleem Karna.

Un Sabko Azmat Wala Janna ,

Unhe Jaleel Aur Chhoṭaa Na Samajhna Unki Haar Baat Jo Katai Aur Yakeeni Taur Par Saabit Ho Use Haak Janna.
Huzoor (Sallallaaho Ta’aalaa Alaihi Wasallam) Ko Khaatamun-Nabeeyeen Manna.

Unke Baad Kisi Nabi Ke Paida Hone Ko Jaayez Na Samajhna,

Qiyaamat Hisaab Wa Kitaab Aur Jannat Wa Dozakh Ko Haak Manna,

Namaz Wa Roza Aur Hajj Wa Zakat Ki Farz’iyat Ko Tasleem Karna.

Zina, Choori Aur Sharaab Noshi Wagaira Haraam Kata’i Ki Huramat Ka Itiqaad Karna Aur Kafir Ko Kafir Janna Wagaira.

Anware Shari’at Hindi P19

Title: Shariat Ke Mutabik Machhi (Fish) Ke Masail
Content:
1- Machhli Ke Halal Ho Jane Ka Sabab Aur

(A) Jo Machhli Jaal Me Pakdi Gayi Aur Mar Gayi

(B) Jo Machhli Jaal Me Pakde Jane Ke Baad Bhi Zindah Hai. Fir Use Zabaah Kiya Gaya

Yahaan Zabaah Karne Ka Asal (Asl) Tarika Bhi Bata Diya Jaaye.

(C) Jo Machhli Saanp Ki Tarah Hoti Hai Aur Jaal Me Fansne Ke Baad Bhi Zinda Rehti Hai.
Fir Use Zameen Pe Patak-Patak Ke Maar Diya Jaata Hai. Fir Tukde Karke Pakaaya Jata Hai.

(D) Jo Machhli Ko Paani Ki Tanki Me, Paala Jata Hai, Ya Rakhaa Jata Fir Bechne Ke waqt, Zinda Hi Kaat Diya Jata Hai.

Jawab:

Jaal Daal Kar Pakdi Gayi Machli Khana Halal Hai.

Chaahe Zinda Ho Ya Mar Gayi Ho.

Haan Agar Mar Kar Phool Gayi To Aisi Machli Khana Jayez Nahi.

Machli Ko Zibah Nahi Kiya Jata Na Hi Us Me Khoon Hota Hai.

Lehaza Use Kaat Kar Paka Kar Khana Jayez Hai.

Pani Me Saanp Agar Hai To Uska Khana Halal Nahi.

Machli Se Mutalliq Hukm Har Machli Ke Baare Me Hai Chahe Tank Me Ho Ya Dariya Me.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa E Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: QADA E ULA ME ATTAHIYAT KE BAAD “ALLAHUMMA-SALLI-ALAA-MUHAMMAD” SIRF ITNA PADHA TO NAMAZ KA KYA HUKM HAI?
Content: Jawab: QADA E ULA ME ATTAHIYAT KE BAAD ITNA PADHA “ALLAHUMMA-SALLI-ALAA-MUHAMMAD” “SAJDA-E-SAHW” WAJIB HAI. IS WAJAH SE NAHI KI DAROOD SHAREEF PADHA. BALKI IS WAJAH SE KI TEESRI KE QIYAM ME TAAKHEER HUYI. TO AGAR ITNI DER TAK SUKOOT KIYA JAB BHI “SAJDA-E-SAHW” WAJIB HAI. JAISE QAADA, RUKU, WA SUJOOD ME QURAN PADHNE SE “SAJDA-E-SAHW” WAJIB HAI. HALAKI WAH KALAAM E ILAAHI HAI. IMAM-E-AAZAM رضي الله تعالي عنه NE NABI صلی الله تعالٰی عليه وسلم KO KHWAAB ME DEKHA, HUZOOR صلی الله تعالٰی عليه وسلم NE IRSHAD FARMAYA: DUROOD PADHNE WALE PAR TUMNE KYU SAJDA WAJIB BATAYA, ARZ KI : IS LIYE KI USNE BHOOL KAR PADHA. HUZOOR صلی الله تعالٰی عليه وسلم NE TAHSEEN FARMAYI! DURRE MUKHTAAR, RADDUL MUHTAAR, WAGAIRAH, JILD-1, SAFA NUMBER-694 BAHARE SHARIAT, URDU, HISSA-4, SAFA NUMBER-48, BAHARE SHARIAT, HINDI, HISSA-4, SAFA NUMBER-65 KANOONE SHARIAT, HISSA-1, SAFA NUMBER-104

Title: Baal Ko Colour Kar Diya Fir Pata Chala Ke Colour Se Namaz Aur Ghusl Nahi Hota Hai?
Content: To Kya Us Colour Par Mehandi Laga Sakte Hai Kya? Jawab: Agar Kaale Rang Ke Ilawah Kisi Dosre Rang Se Baal Colour Kiya, To Is Mein Harj Nahin. Haan, Agar Colour Paint Ki Tarah Jirm Daar Hai, Keh Baalon Ke Oopar Chipak Gaya Hai. Jaise Nakhun Pe Lagane Wala Colour, Keh woh Nakhun Ke Oopar Chipak Jata Hai. To Is Soorat Mein Ghusl O Wazu Nahin Hoga Aur Agar Rang Badla Jaise Mehendi Lagaane Se Rang Badalta Hai. To Is Soorat Mein Ghusl O Wazu Ho Jayega Aur Namaz Bhi Ho Jayegi. Aur Kaale Rang Ka Colour Haraam Hai. واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa E Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: JINDAGI KA AISA BIMA YAANE JEEVAN BIMA (Life-Insurance) JISME APNA NUK’SAAN NA HO
Content:
BALKE ZYADA MILE, AISA JEEVAN BIMA (LIFE-INSURANCE) KARANA KAISA?

JAWAB:

JIN’DAGI KE BIMA KE BAHUT SI SOORTE HOTI HAI, BAAZ ME NAFA-NUQ’SAAN DONO HOTE HAI.

YAH NA’JAYEZ HAI.

AUR BAAZ AISI SOORAT HAI KE NUQ’SAAN NAHI HOTA.

YAH BIMA AGAR KUF’FAAR SE HO TO, JO KUCH ZYADA MILE LENA JAYEZ HAI WARNA NAHI!

FATAWA AMJADIYA, JILD-AWWAL, SAFA NUMBER-239

Title: Kya Aurto Ki Jannat Ya Dozakh Unka Shohar Hai?
Content:
ANSWER

Hadees:
RasoolAllah ﷺ Ne Hazrate Hussain Bin Mohsin Ki Fuffi Se Farmaya:


Teri Jannat Ya Dozakh Tera Shohar Hi Hai!

Title: Koun Shakhs Hai Jinse Qayamat Ke Din Allah Ta’ala Kalam Karega Na Unko Paak Karega Na Unki Taraf Nazar Farmayega Aur Unke Liye Dard Naak Azaab Hai Woh Koun Log Hai❓
Content:
ANSWER

3 Shakhs Hai Jinse Qayamat Ke Din Allah Ta’ala Kalam Karega Na Unki Taraf Nazar Farmayega Aur Unke Liye Dard Naak Azaab Hai


1) Budah Zeenakaar
2) Badsha Qajjaab (Jhoota Badshah)
3) Mohtaaj Mutakabbir (Takabbur Karne Wala Mohtaaj)


MUSLIM SHAREEF


Jo Allah Ke Liye Tawaajo’a’ Karta Hai.


Allah Usko Baland Karta Hai.


Wah Apne Nafs Me Chhota Magar Logo Ki Najro Me Bada Hai Aur Jo Badhai Karta Hai Allah Usko Past Karta Hai.


Wah Logo Ki Najar Me Zalil Hai Aur Apne Nafs Me Bada Hai Wah Logo Ke Nazdik Kutta Ya Suwar Se Bhi Haqeer Hai.


Baihaqee
Bahar E Shari’At Hissa 16 Safa No 626


Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Sahab

Title: Wahabi Deobandi Ke Peshwa Asharf Ali Tahnvi, Sayyed Ahmed, Kahlil Ahmed,Rashid Ahmed Inke Kufri Ibarato Ko Jante Hue Unke Kufr Me Jo Shak Kare To Kya Hukm Hai❓

ANSWER

Sarkar-E-Aala Hazrat Azimul Barakat Mujaddide Dino Millat Asha Imam Ahmed Raza Khan رضي الله عنه Se Sawal Kiya Gaya Ki

Ismail Dehalvi Ko Kaisa Samajhna Chahiye.

Nahi Albatta Gulam Ahmed Qadyani, Sayyed Ahmed,Kahlil Ahmed Ambethi,Rashid Ahmed Ganggohi,Asharf Ali Thanvi Ke Kufrr Me Jo Shaq Kare.
Woh Khud Kafir


Man Shaqqa Fee Kufrehi Wa Azaabehi Faqad Qafara


Al Mahfuz Safa 137


Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Sahab

Title: Kitne Shakhs Hai Jin Par Allah Ta’Ala Saya Karega Us Din, Ki Uske Saaye Ke Siwa Koyi Saya Nahi❓
Content:
ANSWER

Hadees: Bukhari Wa Muslim Wagairahuma Unhi Se Raavi Ki

Huzoor ﷺ Farmate Hai 07 Shakhs Hai

Jin Par Allah Ta’Ala Saaya Karega Us Din Ki Uske Saaye Ke Siwa Koyi Saya Nahi.


1. Aadil Imam Yani Sahi Insaf Karne Wala Imame Barhak.


2. Aur Wah Jawaan Jiski Parwarish Allah Ta’Ala Ki Ibadat Me Huyi.


3. Wah Shakhs Jis Ka Dil Masjid Ko Laga Huwa Hai.


4. Aur Wah 2 Shakhs Ki Aapas Me Allah Ta’Ala Ke Liye Dosti Rakhte Hai Usi Par Jama Huye Usi Par Juda Huye.


5. Aur Wah Shakhs Jise Kisi Maaldaar Aur Haseen Aurat Ne Bulaya Usne Kah Diya Main Allah Se Darta Hoon.


6. Aur Wah Shakhs Jisne Kuch Sadka Kiya Aur Use Itna Chupaya Ki Baayein Ko Khabar Na Huyi Ki Daahine Kya Kharch Kiya.


7. Wah Shakhs Jisne Tanhai Me Allah Ta’Ala Ko Yaad Kiya Aur Aankho Se Aansu Bahe.


Bahar-E-Shari’At Hissa Teesra Safa 146
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Sahab

Title: Kya Pregnant Aurat Ko Jiska 4tha Ya 5wa Mahina Chal Raha Ho Umrah Ko Leja Sakte Hain?
Content:
Aur Jo Log Ramzan Shareef Mein Umrah Karne Jaate Hain.

Wo Kya Shawwal Ka Chand Makkah Shareef Ya Madina Shareef Mein Dekhe To Hajj Karna Farz Hojata Hai?

Jawab:

Prengnant Aurat Umrah Ke Liye Ja Sakti Hai.

Ramzan Shareef Me Umrah Ke Liye Gaya Aur Wahan Shawwal Ka Chand Dekhle Aur Hajj Karne Ki Istetaat Hai To Hajj Farz Hai Aur Hajj Ki Istetaat Nahi To Hajj Farz Nahi.

Title: QANOON-E-SHARIYAT ME JUMME KI SHARAYAT ME PEHLI SHART YE HAI KI ‘JAHA JUMMA QAYAM KIYA JAYE WO JAGAH SHEHASSALAMUALAIKUM , MUFTI SAHAB SE MERA SAWAL HAI,
Content:
QANOON-E-SHARIYAT ME JUMME KI SHARAYAT ME PEHLI SHART YE HAI KI JAHAN JUMMA QAYAM KIYA JAYE WO JAGAH SHEHER HO, ZILA HO, YA TEHSEEL HONA ZARURI HAI.

JAHAN PAR HAKIM NA HO WAHAN JUMMA QAYAM KARNA JAYEZ NAHI.

AB YAHAN PAR HAR JAGAH HAR MASJID ME JUMMA HO RAHA HAI.

JABKE YAHA NA TEHSIL HAI NA ZILA HAI NA SARKARI ADALAT HAI.

ANSWER

Agar Waaqai Wo Shar’an Shaher Ya Fina-E-Shaher Nahi To Wahan Juma Nahi.

Khalifa E Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri

Title: Kin Jagaho Par Peshaab Pakhana Karnaa Mana Hai.
Content:
Jawab:

Kuwe Ya Hauz Ya Chashmaa Ke Kinaare, Pani Me Agarache Bahataa Hua Ho, Ghaaṭ Faldaar Darakht Ke Neeche, Aise Khet Me Ki Jismein Kheti Maujood Ho, Saayaa Me Jahaa Log Uṭhate Baiṭhate Ho, Masjid Ya Eidgaah Ke Pehloo Me, Kabristaan Ya Raaste Me, Jis Jagah Jaanvar Bandhe Ho Aur Jahaan Wazu Ya Gusl Kiya Jata Ho.

In Sab Jagaho Me Pakhana Peshaab Karna Mana Hai.

Anwaare Shariat Hindi P34

Title: Kin Cheezo Se Istinja Karna Mana Hai ?
Content:
ANSWER

Kisi Kism Ka Khana, Haḍḍi, Gobar Leed, Koyla, Aur Jaanvar Ka Charaa In Sab Cheezon Se Istinja Karna Mana Hai.


Anwaare Shariat P33

Title: Istinja Ka Tarika Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Peshaab Ke Baad Istinja Karne Ka Tarika Yah Hai Ki Paak Miṭṭi Kankar, Ya Faṭe Puraane Kapde Se Peshaab Sukhaaye.

Fir Paani Se Dho Ḍaale Aur Pakhana Ke Baad Istinja Karne Ka Tarika Yah Hai Ki Miṭṭi, Kankar, Ya Patthar Ke Teen, Paanch, Ya Saat Ṭukdo Se Pakhaanaa Ke Jagah Saaf Karle, Fir Paani Se Dho Ḍaale.

Anwaare Shariat Hindi P33

Title: Agar Najasate Khafifa Lag Jaye To Uska Kya Hukm Hai?
Content:
ANSWER

Najasate Khafifa Kapde Ya Badan Ke Jis Hissa Me Lagi Hai Agar Uski Chauthaayi Se Kam Hai.


Masalan Daaman Me Lagi Hai To Daaman Ki Chauthaayi Se Kam Hai.


Ya Aasteen Me Lagi Hai To Uski Chauthaayi Se Kam Me Lagi Hai.


Ya Hath Me Hath Ki Chauthaayi Se Kam Lagi Hai To Maaf Hai Aur Agar Poori Chauthaayi Me Lagi Ho To Bagair Dhoye Namaz Na Hogi.


Anware Shariat Hindi P39

Title: Namaz Me Ruku Aur Sajde Me Jo Teen Teen Bar Tasbi Padhi Jati Hai.

Title: Agar Najasate Galiza Badan Ya Kapde Par Lag Jaye To Kya Hukm Hai?
Content:
ANSWER

Agar Najasate Galiza Ek Diraham Se Zyada Lag Jaye. To Uska Paak Karna Farz Hai.


Ki Bagair Paak Kiye Namaz Paḍhli To Namaz Hogi Hi Nahi Aur Agar Najasate Galliza Ek Dirham Ke Barabar Lag Jaye To Uska Paak Karna Wajib Hai.


Ki Bagair Paak Kiye Paḍhli To Namaz Makrooh Taharimi Hui.

Yani Aise Namaz Ka Dobaara Paḍhna Wajib Hai.


Aur Agar Najasate Galiza Ek Diraham Se Kam Lagi Hai To Uska Paak Karna Sunnat Hai.


Ki Bagair Paak Kiye Namaz Paḍhli To Ho Gayi Magar Khilafe Sunnat Hui.


Aise Namaz Ka Dobara Paḍhna Behtar Hai.


Bahaare Shariat
Anware Shariat Hindi P39

Title: Najasat E Galiza Kya Cheeze Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Insaan Ke Badan Se Aisi Cheez Nikle Ki Usse Wazu, Ya Ghusl Wajib Ho Jata Ho To Wo Najasat e Galiza Hai.

Jaise Pakhana, Peshaab, Behtaa Khoon, Peep, Munh Bhar Kai Aur Dukhti Aankh Ka Paani Wagairaa.

Aur Haraam Chaupaaye Jaise Kutta, Sher, Lomdee, Billi, Gadhaa, Khachchar, Hathee Aur Sooar Wagairah Ka Pakhana Choohaa, Peshaab Aur Ghode Ki Leed Aur Har Halal Chaupaaye Ka Pakhanaa Jaise Gaai, Bhains Ka Gobar, Bakari Aur Oonṭ Ki Menganee, Murgee Aur Batakh Ki Beeṭ, Hathee Ke Soonḍ Ki Ratoobat Aur Sher Kutta Wagaira Darinde Chaupaayon Kaa Luaab.

Yah Sab Najasat e Galiza Hai.

Aur Doodh Pita Ladka Ho, Ya Ladki Unka Peshaab Bhi Najasat e Galiza Hai!

Title: Qayamat Ki Kuch Nishaniya Bayaan Kijiye?
Content:
ANSWER

Jab Duniya Me Gunaah Zyada Hone Lage.

Haraam Kamo Ko Log Khullam Khullaa Karne Lage, Maa Baap Ko Taklife De, Aur Gairo Se Mel Jol Rakhe, Amaanat Mein Khayanat Kare, Zakat Dena Logo Par Giraan Guzre.

Duniya Hasil Karne Ke Liye Ilm-E-Deen Paḍha Jaye.

Naach Gaane Ka Ravaaj Jyada Ho Jaye. Badkaar Log Kaum Ke Peshwa Aur Leader Ho Jaaye.

Charvaahe Wagairah Kam Darje Ke Log Badi Badi Buildingo Aur Koṭhiyo Me Rehne Lage To Samajh Lo Ki Qaiyaamat Kareeb Aa Gayi Hai.

Anware Shariat Hindi P15

Title: Qayamat Kise Kehte Hai?
Content:
ANSWER

Qayamat Us Din Ko Kehte Hai.

Jis Din Hazrate Israafeel Alaihissalaam Soor Fookenge Soor Seeng Ke Shakl Ki Ek Cheez Hai.


Jiski Awaaz Sunkar Sab Adami Aur Tamaam Jaanvar Mar Jayenge.

Zameen, Aasmaan, Chaand, Sooraj Aur Pahaad Wagairah Duniyaa Ki Har Cheez Ṭooṭ Fooṭ Kar Fanaa Ho Jayegi.

Yaha Tak Ki Soor Bhi Khatam Ho Jayega.

Aur Israafaeel Alaihissalaam Bhi Fanaa Ho Jayenge.


Ye Waqiya Muharram Ki Daswi Tarikh Juma Ke Din Hoga.


Anwaare Shariat Hindi P15

Title: Be Wazu Paara-e-Amm Ya Kisi Doosre Parah Ka Choona Kaisa?

Title: Aise Mard Wa Aurat Ki Jin Par Ghusl Farz Hai. Wah Quran Ki Taaleem De Sakte Hai Ya Nahi.
Content:
Jawab:

Anwar E Shariat Hindi P41

Title: Kya Jis Par Ghusl Farz Ho, Kya Wo Masjid Me Nahi Ja Sakta
Content: Jawab: Jis Par Ghusl Farz Ho Oose Masjid Ke Us Hissa Mein Jaana Haraam Hai, Ki Jo Daakhile Masjid Hai. Yaani Namaz Ke Liye Banaya Gaya Hai Aur Wah Hissa Ki Jo Fanaye Masjid Hai. Yaani Istinja Khaana, Ghusl Khaana Aur Wazu Gaah Wagairah To Us Jagah Jaane Me Koi Harj Nahi. Basharte Ki Unme Jaane Ka Raasta Daakhile Masjid Se Hokar Na Guzarta Ho. Anware Shariat Hindi Page 41

Title: Jise ehtalam hua aur aise mard wa aurat ki jin par ghusl farz hai unke liye kya hukm hai?
Content: Jawab: Aise logon ko ghusl kiye bagair namaz padhna. Quran majeed dekh kar ya zubani padhna, uska chhoona aur masjid me jana haraam hai. Anware Shariat Hindi Page 40

Title: Haiz wa nifas ka hukm kya hai?
Content: Jawab: Haiz wa nifas ki halat me roza rakhna aur namaz padhna haraam hai. Un dino me namaze maaf hai unki qaza bhi nahi. Magar rozo ki qaza aur dino me rakhna farj hai aur haiz wa nifas wali aurat ko Quran majeed padhna haraam hai. Kha'waah dekh kar padhe, ya zubaani aur uska chhoonaa agarache uski jild ya haashiyaa ko Hath, ya ungli ki nok ya badan ka koi hissa lage sab haraam hai. Haan juzadaan me quran majeed ho to us juzadaan ke chhoone me harj nahi! Anwaare Shriat Hindi Page 40

Title: Haiz aur nifas kise kehte hai?
Content:
Baliga aurat ke aage ke maqaam se jo khoon aadhi taur par nikalta hai aur bimari, ya bachcha paida hone ke sabab se naho to use haiz kehte hai.
Uski muddat kam se kam teen din aur zyada se zyada das (10) din hai. Isse kam, ya zyada ho to bimari yani istihaza hai, aur bachcha paida hone ke baad jo khoon aata hai use nifas kahte hai. Nifas me kami ki jaanib koi muddat mukarrar nahi aur zyada se zyada uska maana chaalees (40) din hai. Chaalees (40) din ke baad jo khoon aaye vah istihaza hai. Anware Shariat Hindi Page 40

ANSWER

JAHA GAANA-BAJANA HOTA HO WAHA JAANA HI NAHI CHAHIYE.
AUR AGAR LAA ILMI ME WAHA CHALA GAYA TO HUKM YAH HAI KE AGAR QUDRAT RAKHTA HO TO BAND KAR DE WARNA WAHA SE CHALA AAYE.


AUR KHAANA NA KHAAYE, AUR AGAR PESHTAR YAH MALOOM HO KE WAHA NAACH WAGAIRAH HAI TO NA JAAYE.


AALIM HO YA GAIR AALIM DONO KO AISI JAGAH JANA MANA HAI!

Title: Aankh Dukhte Me Jo Aansu Bahta Hai Usse Wazu Par Kya Hukm Hai❓
Content:
ANSWER

Wazu Toot Jaata Hai.


Khaarish Ya Fudiyoon Me Jab Ki Bahane Waali Ratbut Na Ho Aur Sirf Chipak Ho Agar Kapda UsSe Baar Baar Chhukar Hi San Jaye Paak Hai.


Soote Me Raal Jo Muh Se Geere Chahe Wah Pet Se Aaye Ya Badboodaar Ho Paak Hai Aur Murde Ke Muh Se Jo Paani Bahe Wah Naajis Hai.


AANKH Dukhte Me Jo Aansu Bahta Hai Naajis Hai Us Se Wazu Toot Jaata Hai.

Isse Bachna Bahoot Jaruri Hai.


Is Masle Me Bahot Se Log Gaafil Hai.

Aksar Dekha Gaya Hai Ki Kurta Wagairah Se Is Haalat Me Aankh Ko Pochh Liya Karte Hai Aur Apne Khayal Me Use Aur Aansu Ke Jaisa Samajte Hai.
Yah Unki Sakht Galti Hai Aur Agar Aisa Kiya To Kurta Wagairah Naapaak Ho Jayega.


Bahar-E-Sahari’At Safa Dusra Hissa Safa 26


Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariyah

Title: Ruku Sajde Waali Namaz Me Agar Baalig Admi Itni Joor Se Hasse Ki Aas Paas Waale Sunle To Wazu Aur Namaz Par Kya Hukm Hai❓
Content:
Jawab:

Wazu Toot Jayega Aur Namaz Bhi Faasid Ho Jayegi.

Behoshi,Junoon,Gashi Aur Itna Nasha Ki Chalne Me Paav Ladkhadaye In Cheezo Se Wazu Totta Hai.

Ruku Sajde Waali Namaz Me Agar Baalig Aadmi Itni Joor Se Hasse Ki Aas Paas Waale Sunle To Wazu Toot Jayega Aur Namaz Bhi Faasid Ho Jayegi.

Aur Agar Itni Joor Se Hassa Ki Khud Usne Hi Suna Aur Aas Pass Waale Na Soon Sake To Wazu Nahi Jayega Namaz Jaati Rahegi.

Aur Agar Muskuraya Ki Daant Nikle Aur Awaaz Bilkul Nahi Nikli To Usse Na To Namaz Jayegi Aur Na Wazu Tootega.

Bahar-E-Sahari’At Safa Dusra Hissa Safa 25

Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariyah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Bimar Late Kar Namaz Padh Raha Tha Agar Nind Aagayi To Wazu Par Kya Hukm Hai❓
Content:
Jawab:

Wazu Toot Jayega.

Wazu Toodne Waali Cheejo Ka Bayan.

Garm Tandoor Ke Kinaare Paav Latkaaye Baith Kar So Gaya, To Wazu Karlena Munasib Hai.

Bimar Late Kar Namaz Padh Raha Tha.

Agar Nind Aagayi To Wazu Toot Jayega.

Unghane, Ya Baithe-Baithe Zhooke Lene Se Wazu Nahi Jata.

Namaz Wagairah Ke Intezaar Me Kabhi-Kabhi Nind Aa Jati Hai Aur Naazi Nind Ko Door Karna Chahta Hai.

To Kabhi Aisa Gaafil Ho Jata Hai Ki Us Waqt Jo Baatein Huyi Unki Use Bilkul Khabar Nahi.

Balki 2/3 Awaazo Me Uski Aankh Khuli Aur Apne Khayal Me Wah Yah Samajta Hai Ki Soya Na Tha.

To Uske Is Khayal Ka Ehtibaar Nahi.

Agar Koi Mohtabar Admi Kahe Ki Tu Gaafil Tha.

Yaha Tak Ki Tu Aisa Gaafil Tha Ki Tujhe Pukaara Gaya Lekin Tune Jawab Nahi Diya, Ya Baatein Punchi Jaye Aur Wah Bata Na Sake.

To Us Par Wazu Laazim Hai.

Bahar-E-Sahari’At Dusra Hissa Safa 24,25

Title: Aaj Bibi Fatima Ke Nikah Ka Din Hai. Dil Me Koi Bhi Murad Rakh Ke “9” Logo Ko Sms Karo.
Content:
Hazrat Bibi Fatima Ke Sadqe Murad Puri Hogi(Insha'Allah) Nazar Andaz Nahi Karna.

Murad Ke Liye Nahi Per Maa Fatima (RadiAllahu Ta'ala anhu) Ki Mohabbat Me Hi Logo Ko Batao Ki Aaj Unke Nikah Ka Din Hai.

Kya aise message bhejna sahi hai.

ANSWER

Is Qism Ke Bid’ati Massages Na-Daan Dost Aksar Forward Karte Rehte Hain Aur Neeche Khas Taur Par Likha Hota Hai Ke 10 Logo Ko Aage Forward Karna Warna Ye Ho Jaayega Aur Bahot Bura Hoga.

10 Saal Tak Bad-Qismati Dastak Degi Wagaira Wagaira.


Sawal Ye Hai Ke Kya Hamari Khwahishat Itni Barh Gayi Hain Ke Hum Aise Massage Forwarding Se Apni Khwahishat Pura Karna Chahte Hain?


Ya Hamare Nadar Lalach Ka Paara Itna Upar Chala Gaya Hai Ke Sahi Aur Galat, Neki Aur Badi Ki Pehchan Karna Bhool Gaye Hain.


Ya Phir Humne Apne Iman Ka Daayera Khwahishat Ke Madd O Jazr Tak Mahdood Kar Diya?


Kis Raaste Par Hum Chal Pade?


Iske Zariye Hum Kya Ta’ssur Dena Chahte Hain?


Kya Mahez Ek Massage Se Hi Hamari Qismat Aur Bad-Qismati Ka Faisla Ho Jana Hai?


Musibatein Tal Jaani Hain?


To Phir Islam Me Kalima, Namaz, Roza, Zakaat, Hajj Aur Dosre A’maal Kis Kaam Ke?


Ya Phir Aisa To Nahi Ke Hum Ba-Haisiyat Musalman Gunaaho Me Itna Dhans Chuke Hain Ke Ab Chor Raasta Talash Karna Chahte Hain.


Ek Forward Ka Button Dabaayein Aur Jannat Pahoch Jaayein, Musibatein Tal Jaayein, Azmaaishein Khatam Ho Jaayein, Qismat Badal Jaaye.


Hamare Akhbaraat Me Bangali Baba Ki Koi Kami Thi?


Jin Ke Muakkil Shaitan Se Pehle Ghar Ghar Pahoch Chuke Hote Hain, Ab Is Qism Ki Khurafaat Ko Hum Barh Charh Kar Phaila Rahe Hain.


Modern Technology Ka Istema Karein Islam Is Se Nahi Rokhta, Dost Ahbab Se Acchi Baatein Share Karne Se Bhi Islam Nahi Rokta.


Lekin Ye Mann Ghadat Khurafaat, Phailaane Waale, Islam Dost Nahi Ho Sakte.


Ye Massage Kahan Se Kaun Design Karta Hai Kisi Ko Koi Khabar Nahi, Bas Forward Karne Waale Hum Musalman Hi Hain.


Allah Ta’ala Aise Khurafaat Se Bachne Ki Hum Musalmano Ko Taufeeq Ataa Farmaaye.


آمین بجاه شفیع المذنبین ﷺ

Khalifa E Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Balgam Ki Kai Agar zyada Aayi To Usse Wazu Par Kya Hukm Hai❓
Content:
Jawab:

Wazu Nahi Tootega

Wazu Todne Wali Cheezo Ka Bayan.

Khoon, Paani, Khaana, Ya Peet Ki Muh Bhar Kai Ho.

To Usse Wazu Toot Jata Hai.

Muh Bhar Kar Kai Ka Matlab Yah Hai Ki Uska Aasani Se Rukna Mushakil Ho.

Balgam Ki Kai Agar zyada Bhi Ho, To Usse Wazu Nahi Tootega.

Agar Khoon Se Thuk zyada Naho, To Bahte Khoon Ki Kai Se Wazu Toot Jata Hai.

Aur Jama Huwa Khoon Hai, To Wazu Nahi Jayega Jab Tak Muh Bhar Kar Naho.

Kai Me Sirf Keede, Ya Saanp Nikle To Wazu Nahi Totega Aur Agar Uske Saath Kuch Paani Bhi Hai.

To Dekha Jayega Ki Ratubat, Ya Pani, Ya Pani Muh Bhar Hai Ya Nahi.

Agar Muh Bhar Hai, To Wazu Toot Jayega Warna Nahi.

Title: Namaz Ke Aakhri Waqt Me Niyat Bandh Kar Namaz Padhne Lage Aur Salam Pherne Se Pahle Qaza Ka Waqt Lag Gaya To Kya Namaz Ho Jayegi?
Content:
Jaise Namaz E Fajr Me Der Se Namaz Padhne Aane Walo Ke Sath Hota Hai Ke Salam Pherne Se Pahle Tulu E Aaftab Ho Jata Hai Aur Qaza Ka Waqt Lag Jata Hai.

Jawab:

3 Namazo Ka Hukm Ye Hai Ke Agar Salam Se Pahle Waqt Khatm Ho Jaaye woh Namaz Nahin Hogi.

1) Fajr
2) Juma
3) Eidain

Baaqi Namazo Me Agar Waqt Mein Takbeer E Tahreema Kaha Aur Waqt Khatm Ho Gaya Aur Namaz Poori Kar Li Jab Bhi Ada Hai.

Lihaza Agar Duraan E Namaz Hi Fajr Ka Waqt Khatm Ho Gaya To Ye Namaz Nahin Hui Ise Dobarah Padhein.

Title: JIS MAKAN ME AAINA E QADDE AADAM (YANI AADMI KI HIGHT KE BARABAR) CHARO TARAF SHISHE LAGE HUN
Content:
TO US MAKAN ME NAMAZ PADHNA KAISA HAI?

ANSWER

AAINA SAMNE HOTO NAMAZ ME KARAHAT NAHI. KI SABABE KARAHAT TASWEER HAI AUR WO YAHAN MAU’JOOD NAHI.


AUR AGAR ISE TASWEER KA HUKM DEN TO AAINA KA RAKHNA BHI MISLE TASWEER NAZAYEZ HO JAYE.

HALA KI BIL IJMA’A JAYEZ HAI AUR HAQEE’QAT AMR YE HAI KI WAHAN TASWEER HOTI HI NAHI.

BALKI KHUTOTE SHUAA’I (खुतूते शुआई) AAINA KI SAQALAT KI WAJAH SE LAUT KAR CHAHRA PAR AATE HAIN.


GOYA YE SHAKHS KHUD APNE KO DEKHTA HAI NA YE KI AAINA ME USKI SURAT CHAPTI HO!


FATAWA AMJADIA, JILD-AWWAL, SAFA-184

Title: SAJDE MEIN PESHANI ZAMEEN PAR JAM GAYI, AUR NAAK KI NOK ZAMEEN SE CHOO GAYI AUR NAAK KI HADDI NA LAGI TO AISE ME NAMAZ KA KYA HUKM HAI?
Content:
ANSWER

SAJDA MEIN PESHANI KA ZAMEEN PAR ZAMNA FARZ HAI, AUR NAAK IS TARAH ZAMANA KE JO HISSA NAAK KA NARAM HAI.

ISKE DABNE KE BAAD NAAK KI HADDI ZAMEEN PAR ZAM JAAYE YAH WAAJIB,

AGAR NAAK KI NOK ZAMEEN SE CHOO GAYI AUR HADDI NA LAGI.

NAMAZ WAJIBUL I’AADA HUYI.

HADEES ME IRSHAD HUWA YAANI PESHANI ZAMEEN PAR LAGNE KA YAH MATLAB HAI KE NAAK KI HADDI BHI ZAMEEN PAR LAG JAAYE.

FATAWA AMJADIYA, JILD-AWWAL, SAFA NUMBER-84

Title: Imam Qazi Se Istfada Hua Ke Aurto Ka Maqabir Ko Jana Jayaz Hai Ya Nahi?

ANSWER

Esi Jagah Jawaz Wa Adam Jawaz Nahi Puchte


Yeh Puchho Ke Isme Aurat Par Kitni Laanat Padti Hai.


1 Jab Ghar Se Qabur Ki Taraf Chalne Ka Irada Karti Hai Allah Aur Farishto Ki Laanat Me Hoti Hai.


2 Jab Ghar Se Bahar Nikalti Hai Sab Tarafo Se Shaitan Use Gair Leta Hai.


3 Jab Qabr Par Pohchti Hai Mayyat Ki Ruh Us Par Laanat Karti Hai


4 Jab Wapas Ati Hai Allah Ki Laanat Me Hoti Hai.

Title: Jung E Qustuntaniyah Me Awal Jung Me Yazid Sharik Nahi Tha
Content:
Kya Farmate Hai Ulma E Deen Is Zail Me Sahi Bukhari Sharif Me Hai Ke Hizri 48 Me Jo Jung E Qustutaniyah Hui Thi Jis Me Yazid Ek Daste Ka Amir Tha.


Uske Bare Me Meri Ummat Ka Pehla Lashkar Jo Qaisar Ke Shehar Par Hamlawar Hoga,


Isko ALLAH Ta’la Ne Bakhsh Diya Hai.


Is Hadees Ki Buniyad Par Boht Se Log Yazid Ko Magfur Kahte Hai.


Jab Ke Aqal Qatai Gawara Nahi Karti.


Lehaja Mazkura Mafhum Hadees Ke Bare Me Sharhin Kiram Ki Kya Murad Hai?

ANSWER

Hadees Ke Alfaaz Karima Yeh Hai


“اول جیش من امتی یغجزون مدینۃ قیصر مغفور لھم۔”


Meri Ummat Ka Pehla Lashkar Jo Qaisar Ke Shehar Par Hamla Karega Bakhsh Dia Jayega.
Aap Ne Bukhari Sharif Ke Hawale Se Likha Hai Ke Hizri 48 Me Jo Jung Hui Thi Jiske Ek Daste Ka Yazid Imaam Tha Yeh Sab Bukhari Sharif Me Nahi Aur Na Hadees Ki Kisi Kitab Me Hai Aur Na Hziri 48 Wali Jung Me Yazid Sharik Tha.


Yeh Sab Kisi Yazidi Ne Dajal Wa Fareb Kia Hai.

Hadees Ke Asal Alfaaz Me Do Lafz Qabil E Gaur Hai.


Pehla Lashkar,Dusra Shehar Qaisar, Shehar Qaisar Se Agar Qaisar Ka Koi Bhi Shehar Murad Liya Jaye Jo IsKe Had Wa Saltnat Me Ho To Is Hadees Ka Misdaaq Gazwa Muta Ke Mujahidin Hai.


Jo Huzur ﷺ Ke Ahad Mubarak Me Hua Tha.

Jisme Sahaba E Kiram Ne Qaisar Ki Qalmar Wa Sham Par Pehla Hamla Farmaya Tha.


Aur Agar Is Se Murad Dara Salatnat Hai To Huzur Aqdas ﷺ Ke Ahad Mubarak Me Qaisar Ka Dar Satlanat Jams Tha,

Jo Hazrat Syedna Farooq E Azam Radiallahu Ta’la Anho Ke Ahad Pak Me Fatah Hua, Aur Agar Kisi Ko Zid Ho Ke Madina Qaisar Se Murad Qustuntaniyah Hi Ho To Sab Se Pehle Qustuntaniyah Par Lashkar Kashi Hazrat Muawiyah Ne Hizri 32 Mme Kia Hai.

Al Bidaya Wa Nihayaa Me Hai :


و فیھا غزا معاویۃ بلاد الروم حتی بلغ المضیق مضیق قسطنتنیہ
البدایہ والنھایہ ص ۲۴۲ ج ۵


Aur Dusra Hamla Basr Bin Abi Artaat Ne Hizri 43 Me Kiya.


فیھا غزا بسر بن ابی ارتاۃ بلاد الروم فتو غل فیھا حتی بلغ مدینۃ قسطنطنیہ
البدایہ والنھایہ


ٓAur Chotha Hamla Khalid Bin Walid Saifullah Radiallahu Ta’la Anho Ke Sahabzade Hazrat Abdul Rehmaan Ne Hizri 44 Me Kiya.


البدایۃ و نھایۃ باب قو لہ تحالی ولا تلقوا بایدیکم الی لتھلکۃ Main Hai
البایۃ والنھایۃ


Is Lashkar Me Hazrat Syedna Abu Ayub Ansari Radiallahu Ta’la Anho Bhi They,

Yazid Ki Sipa Salari Me Qustantaniyah Par Jo Hamla Hua Tha Wo Hizri 50 Ya Hizri 52 Me Hua Tha,


IsSe Yeh Zahir Ho Gaya Ke Yazid Ne Qutantaniyah Ki Jis Jung Me Shirkat Ki Wo Pehli Jung Nahi Thi.


Balke Yaato 6thi Ya 4thi Thi.

Phir Wo Khabis Is Basharat Ka Kaise Musthaq Ho Sakta Hai, Aur Hadees Me To Saaf Tasrih Hai Ke Pehla Lashkar Jo Shehar Qaisar Par Hamlawar Hoga Us Ki Magdfirat Kar Di Jayegi.


Yazid Pehle Lashkar Me Kisi Tarah Sharik Nahi Tha.

Pehle Humle Ke Waqt Jo Hazrat Mauwiyah Ne Kiya Tha Uski Ummar Ba Mishkil 7 Sal Ki Thi.


Yeh Khabis Hizri 25 Me Paida Hua Tha.
Wallauallam.


Fatwa E Shareh Bukhari Jild 2

Title: AGAR KISI SHAKHS KA BAAP-DADA, GAIRE SAYYAD HAI, AUR WALIDA-DADI, SAYYAD.
Content:
TO AISE ME WAH SHAKHS SAYYAD HUWA YA GAIR E SAYYAD?

ANSWER

SHARA ME NASAB BAAP SE LIYA JATA HAI.

JINKE BAAP-DADA, PATHAN YA MUGAL YA SHAIKH HUWA, WO UNHI QAUMO SE HOGA.


AGARCHE USKI MAA AUR DAADI SAB SAYYA’DANI HUYI.


NABI صلی الله تعالٰی عليه وسلم NE SAHEEH HADEES ME FARMAYE HAI:

JO APNE BAAP KE SIWA DUSRE KI TARAF APNE AAP KO NISBAT KARE, IS PAR KHUD ALLAH TAALA AUR SAB FARISHTO AUR AADMIYO KI LAANAT HAI.


ALLAH TA'ALA QAYAMAT KE DIN NA ISKA FARZ QABOOL KARE NA NAFL.


MUKHTASARAN BUKHARI WA MUSLIM WA ABU DAUD WA TIRMIJEE WA NASAAI WAGAIRHUM NE YAH HADEES MOULA ALI KARMALLAHU TA'ALA WAJHU SE RIWAYAT KI HAI.


HAA ALLAH TA'ALA NE YAH FAZEE’LAT KHAAS, IMAAM HASAN WA IMAAM HUSAIN WA UNKE HAQEEQI BHAI BEHNO KO ATAA FARMAYA, RADIYALLAHU TAALA ANHUM AZMAEEN, KE WOH RASOOLALLAH صلی الله تعالٰی عليه وسلم KE BETE THAHRE.


FIR UNKI JO KHAAS AULAD HAI UNME BHI WAHI QAYEDA AAM ZAARI HUWA KE APNE BAAP KI TARAF MANSOOB HUWA.


IS LIYE SIBTAEEN KARIMAIN KI AULAD SAYYAD HAI NA KE BANATE FATIMA رضي الله تعالي عنها KI AULAD KE WOH APNE WALIDOON HI KI TARAF NISBAT KI JAYENGI.


FATAWA RAZVIYA SHAREEF, JILD-13, SAFA NUMBER-361
BAHARE SHARIAT, HINDI, HISSA-5, SAFA NUMBER-69

Title: Jaise Sunni Alim E Deen Ki Purani Kitaab O Me Ahle Bait Ke Aage Alahi Salam Likha Hota Hai.
Content:
Aisa Likhna Durust Hoga?

ANSWER

Hamare Is Daur Me Ye Baat Aam Hoti Jaa Rahi Hai Ke Sayyedna Ali E Murtaza, Hasnain Kareemain, Sayyeda Fatima Wa Deegar Aal E Rasool ﷺ Ke Afrad E Kareema Ke Ilaawa Saabiqa Ambiya Alaihimussalam Ki Baaz Ahl Par Lafz “Alaihissalam” Ka Istemaal Karte Hain.


Awaam Ke Ilaawa Khwaas Ki Bhi Aadat Ban Gayi Hai Ke Shia Firqe Ke Dekha Dekhi Ye Marz Barh Raha Hai.


Akaabir Saaleheen Ulama O Mashaikh E Muhaqqiqeen Ka Yahi Mauqif E Mukhtar Hai Ke Gair E Ambia O Malaaika Ke Liye Alaihissalam Na Istemal Kiya Jaaye.


Behtar Yahi Hai Ke Aisa Itlaaq Naho Balke Aadat Khatam Kardi Jaaye Taake Mazhab E Shia Se Tashaaboh Aur Uski Tarweej Naho.


Islami Qaayeda Hai Ke Badmazhab Qaum Ke Sath Kisi Tarah Bhi Mushaabahat Naho, Unse Mushabahat Ke Tamam Tareeqe Tark Karne Chahiye.


Wajah Zaahir Hai Ke Sunni Bhola Bhala Hai Use Shia Apne Mazhab Me Laane Ki Kai Tadbeeren Bataate Hain.


Ek Yahi Hai Ke 12 Imamo Ke Liye Duaaiya Jumla “Alaihis Salam” Tajweez Kar Rakha Hai.

Jo Kisi Dosre Ummati Ke Liye Istemal Nahi Hota Hai.


Balke Keh Nahi Sakta Abu Bakar Alaihis Salam, Umar Alaihis Salam, Usman Alaihis Salam, Balke In Hazrat Ke Sath Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Ka Iste’mal Hota Hai.


Awaamun Naas Ye Sab Kuch Dekhte Hain Aur Agar Wo Khud Is Taraf Mutawajjeh Nahi Hote To Jamaa’t E Mujtahideen Unko Mutawajjeh Karti Hai.


Aur Unko Ye Dikhati Aur Samjhati Hai Ke Ye Du’aaiya Jumla Jo Hazrat E Ambiya E Kiram Alaihimus Salam Ke Mubarak Naamo Ke Sath Bhi Bola Jata Hai.


Hamare Aimma Ke Naamo Ke Sath Bhi Bola Jata Hai.


Isi Se Zaahir O Baahir Hai Ke Ye 12 Afraad Zumra E Ambiya Me Shamil Hain Aur Unki Imamat Ma’mooli Imamat Nahi.


Balke Hazrat E Ambiya E Maa Sabaq Ki Imamat Hai.


Faayeda:
Agar Baaz Ulama Ki Tahqeeq Baraaye Gair Ambiya Alaihissalato Wassalam Ya Alaihissalam Kehne Ko Jaayez Qarar Dete Hain Aur Unke Qaul Par Koi Amal Karta Hai To Wo Pehle Un Do Hazrat (Hazrat Abu Bakr, Hazrat Umar) Ke Sath Iska Istemal Kare.


Jo Ahl E Sunnat O Jamaat Ke Nazdeek Shia Ke 12 Imamo Se Ba Ittefaq Afzal Hain Aur Wo Hazrat Abu Bakr Aur Hazrat Umar رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہما Hain.


Mujawwizeen Ne Agar Jawaaz Ka Bayan Kiya Hai To Tamam Sahaba Ulama O Sulaha Ke Liye Kiya Hai.

Sirf Ahl E Bait E At’haar Ke 12 Afraad Ke Liye Nahi Kiya Hai.


In Halaat Ko Dekhte Hue Hazraat E Ahl E Bait E At’haar رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہم Ke Zikr Ke Waqt Lafz E Alaihis Salam Ki Dua Karne Ko Tark Kiya Jaaye.


Taake Shia Awaam E Ahl E Sunnat Ko Gumraah Na Kar Sakein.


Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah

Title: Niyaz Me Haram Paise Ka Milna?
Content:
1) Tabarruk Par Niyaz Di Jaati Hai Kisi Bhi Tehwar Par, Toh Ab Usmein Sabhi Logo Ka Paisa Hota Hai – Halal, Haram

Toh Kya Use Khaa Sakte Hein?

2) Agar Hamein Pata Nahi Ki Niyaz Mein Paisa Halal Hai, Ya Haram.

Toh Kya Kare ?

3) Maine Bhi Langar Mein Paisa Diya, Toh Mera Toh Halal tha.

Lekin Main Confirm Hoon Ki Ismein Haram Ka, Satte Ka Maal Bhi Hai.

Toh Usey Khaaye, Ya Nahi?

Aur Aaj Kal Lagbhag Har Jagah Aisa Hi Ho Raha Hai.

Hazrat Iska Jawab Inayat Farmaye Taake Hum Gunah Se Mehfooz Rahein.

Jawab:

Agar Waaqai Maloom Hai Ke Ye Paisa Jo Liya Ja Raha Hai, Wo Haram Kamaai Ka Hi Hai. To Use Na Liya Jaaye.

Title: WO SAHABI-E-RASOOL KOUN THE JINKO RASOOLALLAH صلی الله تعالٰی عليه وسلم NE SAYYADUL ANSAAR KE KHITAAB SE NAWAZA THA.
Content:
AUR UNKI WAFAAT PE RASOOLALLAH صلی الله تعالٰی عليه وسلم NE FARMAYE KI YAH WAH SHAKHS HAI KI ISKE LIYE ARSH HIL GAYA,

AUR ISKE LIYE AASMAAN KE DARWAZE KHOL DIYE GAYE, AUR ISKE JANAZE PAR SATTAR HAZAAR (70,000) FARISHTE HAAZIR HUWE,

IS SHAKHS KO QABR NE EK MARTABA DABOCHA FIR KUSHADA HO GAYI?

ANSWER

HAZRAT ABDULLAAH BIN UMAR RADIYALLAHU TAALA ANHUMA KAHTE HAI KI RASOOLALLAH صلی الله تعالٰی عليه وسلم NE (Hazrat Sa’ad Bin M’aaz Ki Wafaat) PAR FARMAYA KI YAH WAH SHAKHS HAI KI ISKE LIYE ARSH HIL GAYA, AUR ISKE LIYE AASMAAN KE DARWAZE KHOL DIYE GAYE, AUR ISKE JANAZE PAR SATTAR HAZAAR (70,000) FARISHTE HAAZIR HUYE, IS SHAKHS KO KABR NE EK MARTABA DABOCHA FIR KUSHADA HO GAYI,


MISHKAAT, JILD-1, SAFA NUMBER-26


HAZRAT SA’AD BIN M’AAZ ANSAAR KE QABEELA AOUS KE SARDARE AAZAM THE, RASOOLALLAH صلی الله تعالٰی عليه وسلم NE INKO SAYYADUL ANSAAR KE KHITAAB SE NAWAZA THA.


NOTE:- WAAZEH RAHE KI DABOCHNA DO QISM KA HOTA HAI, EK DUSHMANI KA DABOCHNA: JAISE EK DUSHMAN APNE DUSHMAN KO DABOCHA KARTA HAI, AUR EK PYAAR ME DABOCHNA: JAISE MAA APNE BACHCHE KO PYAAR ME DABOCH LIYA KARTI HAI, TO HAZRAT SA’AD BIN M’AAZ KO KABR NE MUHABBAT WA PYAAR ME DABOCHA THA.


MISHKAAT, JILD-1, SAFA NUMBER-26
JAWAHIRUL HADEES, (Musannif-Shaikhul Hadees Hazrat Abdul Mustafa Aazmi Alaihirrahmatu Warrizwan) PAGE NUMBER-161 &162.

Title: Ehram Ke Liye Niyat Sharth Hai Aur Bagair Niyat Labbaik Kaha Ehram Pe To Kya Hukm Aayega❓
Content:
Jawab:

Ehram Ke Liye Ek Martaba Jaban Se Labaik Kahna Jaruri Hai.

Aur Agar Uski Jagah Ya Koyi Aur Zikre Ilahi Aur Ehram Ki Niyat Ki To Ehram Ho Gaya.

Magar Sunnat Labbaik Kahna Hai.

Gunga Hoto Use Chahiye Ki Hoot Ko Jumbish De.

Ehram Ke Liye Niyat Sharth Hai.
Agar Bagair Niyat Labbaik Kaha Ehram Na Huwa.

Yoonhi Tanha Niyat Bhi Kaafi Nahi Jab Tak Labbaik Ya Uske Kayam Makaam Koyi Aur Cheez Naho.

Ehram Ke Waqt Labbaik Kahe To Uske Saath Niyat Bhi Ho Yah Baarah Malum Ho Chuka Hai.

Ki Niyat Dil Ke Irade Ko Kahte Hai. Dil Me Irada Na Ho To Ehram Hi Na Huwa Aur Behtar Yah Hai Ki Jabaan Se Bhi Kahe Maslan Kiraan Me Aur Tamatto’a Aur Ifrqad Me Kahe.

Bahare Sharee’at Hissa 06 Safa 34/35

Title: Jo Namaz Me Idhar – Udhar Tawajjo Karta Hai Uske Liye Kya Hukm Hai❓
Content:
ANSWER

Bajjaj Ne Jabir Ibne Abdullah رضي الله عنه Se Riwayat Ki Farmate Hai.

Huzoor ﷺ Jab Admi Namaz Ko Khada Hota Hai Allah ﷻ Apni Khaas Rahmat Ke Saath Uski Taraf Mutawajjah Hota Hai.

Aur Jab Idhar-Udhar Dekhta Hai Farmata Hai Aye Ibne Adam Kis Taraf Tawajjo Karta Hai.

Kya Mujhe Se Koyi Behtar Hai Jis Ki Taraf Tawajjo Karta Hai.

Phir Jab Dobaara Tawajjo Karta Hai Aisa Hi Farmata Hai,

Jab Teesri Baar Tawajjo Karta Hai Allah Ta’Ala Apni Is Khaas Rahmat Ko Usse Pher Leta Hai.

BAHAR-E-SHARI’AT Hissa Teesra Safa 131

Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah

Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Sahab

Title: Daahine (Right) Haath Se Istinja Karna Kaisa Hai❓
Content:
Jawab:

Kaagaz Se Istinja Mana Hai.

Agarche Us Par Kuch Likha Ho Ya Abu Zahal Aise Kafir Ka Naam Likha Ho.

Daahine (Right) Haath Se Istinja Karna Makrooh Hai.

Agar Kisi Ka Bayaa’n’ (Left) Haath Be-Kaar Ho Gaya Ho To Uske Liye Daahine Haath Se Istinja Karna Jaayez Hai.

Peshab Ke Aale {Tanasul,Ling,Penis} Ko Daahine Haath Se Chuna.

Ya Daahine Haath Me Dhela Lekar Usse Istinja Karna Makrooh Hai.

Jis Dhele Se Ek Baar Istinja Kar Liya Use Dubaara Kaam Me Laana Makrooh Hai.

Magar Dusri Karwat Uski Saaf Ho To Usse Kar Sakte Hai.

Bahar-E-Sahari’At Hissa Dusra Safa 95

Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razavi Amjadi

Title: Khade Ho Kar, Ya Lait Kar, Ya Nange Ho Kar Peshab Karna Kaisa Hai❓
Content:
ANSWER

Jab Aadmi Pakhane Ko Jaaye To Mustahab Hai Ki Paakhane Se Baahar Yah Padele.


Dua: Bismillahi Allahumma Inni Aauzu Biqa Minal Khubusi Wal Khabais.


Tarjama: Aye Allah Main Teri Panah Maangta Hoon Naapaki Aur Shaitanose.


Phir Baaye (Left) Paav Daakhil Kare.


Nikalte Waqt Pahile Daahina (Right) Paav Baahar Aur Baahar Nikaal Kar Yah Padeh


Dua:Gufraanaka Alhamdu Lillah Hillazi Azhaba Anni Maa Yuzeeni Wa Am Siqa Alayya Ma Yan Fauni


Tarjuma: Allah Se Magfirat Ka Sawal Karta Hoon Hamd Hai Allah Ke Liye Usne Mere Pait Se Wah Cheez Nikaali Jo Mujhe Taklif Deti Thi Aur Wah Cheez Roki Jo Mujhe Nafa Degi.


Khade Ho Kar Ya Lait Kar, Ya Nange Ho Kar Peshab Karna Makrooh Hai.


Bahar-E-Sahari’At Hissa Dusra Safa 92,93


Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Sahab

Title: Ramzan Sharif ke Hadees aur Fazilat
Content:
Ramzan Sharif ke Hadees aur Fazilat
 
Hadees– Hazrate Abu Hurairah Radiyallahu ta'ala Anhu Farmate hain ke Huzoor Sallallahu Ta'ala Alaihiwasallam Farmate hain.

Jab Ramzaan aata hai, aasman ke darwaze khol diye jaate hain.

Ek riwayat Mein hai ke “Jannat ke darwaze khol diye jaate hain.

Ek Riwayat Mein hai ke “Rehmat ke darwaaze khol diye jaate hain.

(BUKHARI & MUSLIM SHARIF)

Hadees– Hazrate Abu Hurairah Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu Se riwayat hai ke Huzoor-e-Aqdas sallallaahu Ta'ala Alaihi wasallam ne farmaya ke Ramzan Aaya ye barkat ka mahina hai Allah Ta'ala iske roze tumpar farz kiye, Isme Aasman Ke Darwaze khol diye jaate hai aur dozakh ke darwaaze bandh kar diye jaate hai aur sarkash shaitaano ke tauqe daal diye jaate hai.

(NASAI SHARIF)

Hadees– Hazrate Sahal ibne saad Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu Se Marwi hai ke Rasoolullah Sallallahu Ta'ala Alahi Wasallam Farmate hain

Jannat Mein 8 darwaze hain, unme ek darwaze ka naam RAIYYAAN hai Uss darwaaze Se wohi jayenge jo roze rakhte hain.

(BUKHARI)

Hadees– Hazrate Abu Hurairah Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu se Riwayat hai ke Rasoolullah Sallallahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam ne Farmaya

Jo Imaan ki wajah se Aur sawab ke liye Ramzan ka Roza Rakhega uske Gunah bakhsh diye jayenge aur jo imaan aur sawab ki Niyat se ramzan ki raato ke qayaam karega. ( Nawafil padhega) uske agle gunah maaf kar diye jayenge.

(BUKHARI,Muslim Sharif)

Hadees– Hazrate Abu Hurairah Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu se Riwayat hai ke Huzoor-E-Aqdas Sallallahu T’aala Alahi Wasallam Irshad Farmate hain.

Agar kisine ek din nafl Roza rakha Aur Zameen Bhar use sona diya jaaye jab bhi uska sawab poora na hoga. Uska Sawab to qayamat hi ke din milenge.

(TIBRANI)

Hadees– Hazrate Abu Hurairah Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu se Riwayat hai ke Rasool-E -Akram Sallallahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam ne farmaya

Har cheez ke liye zakat hai aur badan ki zakat Roza hai aur Roza Aadha sabr hai.

(Ibne Majah)

Hadees– Hazrate Abu Masood Gaffari Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu se Riwayat hai ke Huzoor-E-Aqdas Sallallahu T’aala Alaihi Wasallam ne Irshad Farmaya

Agar Bandon ko maloom hota ke ramzan kya cheez hai to Meri ummat tamanna karti ke poora saal ramzan hi ho.

(Ibne Khuzaima)

Hadees– Hazrate Salmaan Farsi Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu se Riwayat hai ke Huzoor-e-Aqdas Sallallahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam ne Irshad Farmaya

Ramzan ki Raat Mein Qayaam (Namaz padhna) Tato’o ( Sunnat hai) Jo Isme Neki ka koi kaam kare to aisa hai jaise aur kisi mahine Mein farz ada kiya aur Isme jisne farz ada kiya to aisa hai jaise aur dino Mein 70 farz adaa kiye.

(Baihaqi)

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Roze Ki Niyat Ke Masail
Content:
Roze Ki Niyat Ke Masail Masla– Ada E Roza-e-Ramzan aur nazre mu’aiyyan aur nafl ke roze ke liye Niyat ka waqt Gurube Aaftab se Zuhuwe Kubra (Shuru Zawaal) Tak hai. Masla– Zuhuwe Kubra (Shuru Zawaal) Niyat ka waqt Nahi. Balke isse pehle Niyat ho jaana zaroori hai aur khaas Zuhuwe Kubra (Shuru Zawaal) ke waqt Niyat ki to Roza na hua. Masla– Niyat dil ke irade ka naam hai, Zubaan se kehna sharth Nahin. Magar zubaan se keh lena mustahab hai. Masla– Agar raat Mein Niyat kare to, yu kahe. Niyat: “Nawaytu An Asooma Ghadan Lillahi Ta’aala Min Fardi Ramadaan Haadha” Translation: ‘I have made that I will keep for Allah, the Fard Fast of this Ramadan, tomorrow’ aur din Mein Niyat kare to ye kahe. Niyat: “Nawaytu An Asoomu Haadhal Yawma Lillahi Ta’aala Min FardiRamadan Translation: ‘I have made Niyat, that today, for Allah I will keep the Fard Fast of Ramadan’ Masla– Raat Mein Niyat ki phir uske baad raat hi Mein khaaya, piya. To Niyat Nahin gayi, wahi pehli hi Niyat kaafi hai. Phir Niyat karne zaroori Nahin. Masla– Din Mein Niyat Kare. To Zaroori hai Ke Ye Niyat Kare ke Main Subha Sadiq Se Rozadaar hu Aur Agar Ye Niyat Hai ke Abse Rozadaar Hu Subha Se Nahin To Roza Na Hua. Masla– Din Mein woh Niyat saheeh hai ke subah sadiq se Niyat karte waqt Roza ke khilaaf koi amr na paya gaya ho. Lihaza agar subah sadiq ke fauran baad Qasdan (Jaan Bujhkar) khaya, piya uske baad roze ki Niyat ki to Roza na hua aur agar subah sadiq ke baad bhool kar kha pi liya ab Niyat ki to Roza ho jayega. Masla– Roza Todhne ki Niyat se Roza Nahin tutega jab tak todhne waali cheez na kare. Roza Todhne ka pakka irada kiya. Magar todha Nahin to Roza Saheeh hai. Masla– Agar raat mein roze ki niyat ki phir pakka irada kar liya ke Nahi rakhega, to woh Niyat jaati rahi. Agar nayee Niyat na ki aur din bhar bhooka, pyasa raha, to Roza na hua. Masla– Sehri khaana bhi Niyat hai khaah (chaahe) ramzan ke roze ke liye ho, ya kisi aur Roza ke liye. Masla– Sehri khaate waqt ye irada hai ke subah ko Roza na hoga. To yeh sehri khaana Niyat Nahi. Masla– Ada E Ramzan aur nazrein mo’aiyyan aur Nafl ke alawa baaqi roze maslan qaza-e-ramzan aur nazre gair mo’aiyyan aur Nafl ki Qaza (yaani Nafl Roza rakhkar todh diya tha uski qaza) inn sab mein ain (exactly) subah chamakte waqt ya raat Mein Niyat karna zaroori hai. Masla– Gurube Aaftab Se Zuhuwe Kubra (Shuru Zawaal) tak sirf teen qism ke roze ki Niyat ho sakti hai.
  1. Ada-e-Ramzan.
  2. Nazrein Mo’Aiyyan.
  3. Nafli Roze
Inke Alawa Jitne roze hain maslan– Qaza-e-ramzan wagairah to inki Niyat ka waqt Gurube Aaftab ke baad se Subah Sadiq ke chamakte waqt tak hai. To agar kisine ramzan ke qaza roze ki Niyat subah sadiq ke baad ki, Roza na hua. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Month Of Safar Has Begun. Huzoor (Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam) Said That In Safar Maximum Calamities And Troubles Come Down.
Content:
For Hifaazat Please Pray YA BASITU YA HAFIZU 11 Times After All Namaz!

Pass This Info To All Your Family And Friends So That They Too Can Benefit From It!

Ya Basitu Ya Hafizu.

Kya Ye Msg Sahi Hai?

Jawab:

Safar Dosra Islami Maheena Hai.

Ahadees Me Ise Manhoos, Ya Bimari Wala Maheena Kehne Ki Mumaana’t Aayi Hai.

Rasoolullah ﷺ Irshad Farmaate Hain Ke Chhoone Wali Bimari, Parinda (Ullu), Aur Safar Ki Nahusat Koi Cheez Nahi.

Allah Ne Har Jaan Paida Ki Hai Usi Ne Uski Zindagi Uske Masaaib Aur Uska Rizq Likha.

Hadrat Shah Abdul Haq Muhaddis E Dehlwi Alaihir Rahmah Farmate Hain

Log Yahi Samajhte Hain Ke Is Maheene Me Hawaadis, Aafatein Aur Balaayein Naazil Hoti Hain. Ye Aqeeda Bilkul Galat Hai Aur Is Ki Koi Asl Nahi Hai.

(Ashi’atul Lam’aat)

Mazkoora Hadees Se Ye Sabit Hua Ke Safar Ke Maheene Ko Nahusat Wala Maheena Kehna Galat Hai.

Sarkar ﷺ Ne Is Maah Ki Nahusat Ki Nafi Farmayi Hai.

Lehaza Awam E Ahl E Sunnat Ko Is Galat Aqeede Se Bachna Chahiye.

Aap Is Baat Ko Sochein Ke Jis Maah E Safar Ko Sahabi E Rasool ﷺ Hadrat Abdur Rahman Bin Auf Se Nisbat Ho, Hadrat Data Ali Hijweri Se Nisbat Ho, Mujaddid E Alf E Saani Se Nisbat Ho, Sayyedi Aala hadrat Se Nisbat Ho.

Jis Maah Ko Itne Azeem Awliya O Sufiya E Kiraam Se Nisbat Ho, Wo Maheena Kaise Manhoos Ho Sakta Hai?

Ye Sab Baatein Mahez Tawahhumaat Par Mushtamil Hain Aur In Ki Haqeeqat Maa Siwa E Afsaanwi Rang O Roop Ke Kuch Nahi.

Na Kisi Maheene Me Nahoosat Hai, Na Kisi Taarikh Me Aur Na Hi Din Me.

Maheena, Din, Raat Banane Wali Zaat Allah Kareem Ki Hai Aur Nahoosat To Hamaare A’maal Ki Bina Par Hoti Hai.

Tafseer E Roohul Ma’ani Me Hai Ke Agar Dino Me Nahoosat Hoti.

To Qaum E Aad Par Musalsal 7 Din Azab E Ilaahi Naazil Hota Raha.

To Is Hisab Se Kya Hafte Ke Saato Din Manhoos Maan Liye Jaayein?

Agar Dino Ka Koi Asar Hai Bhi To Wo Hukm E Khuda Se Hai.

Lehaza Unke Liye Mustaqil Taur Par Taseer Ka Qaayel Shirk Ke Ghade Me Dafn Kar Deta Hai.

Un Waaqi’at Ko Jo Aksar Auqaat Insan Ke Bure A’maal Ka Kaffara Hote Hain.

Unhe Dino Ki Taseer Ya Unki Nahoosat Nahi Jaanna Chahiye.

Hame Is Baat Ka Khayal Rakhna Chahiye Ke Har Masla Ulama E Ahl E Sunnat Se Ma’loom Karein.

Taake Wo Aap Ko Quran O Hadees Ki Roshni Me Jawab Dein.

Phir Us Jawab Ko Tasleem Karein Isi Me Deen O Dunia Ki Bhalaai Hai.

Akhir Me Rahi Baat Asmaa E Husna Ke Wazeefe Ki, To Ye Be Shak Baa’is E Khair O Barkat Hai.

Magar Nahusat Waale Maheene Ki Hadees Ko Muhaddiseen Ne Mauzu (Man Ghadat) Qarar Diya Hai.

Allah Ta’ala Hum Sab Ko Apne Deen Ka Ilm Hasil Karne Aur Deen Ko Samajhne Ki Taufeeq Ataa Farmaaye.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa E Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Nashe Me Talaq De Di To Kya Hukm Hai❓
Content:
ANSWER

Talaq Ke Liye Sharth Yah Hai Ki Shohar Aaqeel Baalig Ho.

Naa Baalig Ya Maznoon, Na Khud Talaq De Sakta Hai Na Uski Taraf Se Us Ka Wali.

Magar Nasha Waale Ne Talaq Di To Waqe’a Ho Jayegi Ki Yah Aqeel Ke Hukm Hai.

Aur Nasha Khwaa Sharab Peene Se Ho Ya Bing Wagairah Kisi Aur Cheez Se.

Afyoon Ki Peyk Me Talaq De Di Jab Bhi Waqe’a Ho Jayegi.

Talaq Me Aurat Ki Jaanib Se Koyi Sharth Nahi Naabalig Ho Ya Majnuna.

Baharhaal Talaq Waqe’a Hogi.
(Durre Mukhtaar, Aalamgeeri)

Kisine Majboor Karke Use Nasha Pila Diya Ya Haalate Ijtiraar Me Piya (Maslan Pyaas Se Mar Raha Tha Aur Paani Na Tha) Aur Nasha Me Talaq De Di To Sahih Yah Hai Ki Waaqe’a Na Hogi.

(Raddul Muhtaar)
Bahar E Shari’At 8wa Hissa Safa 10

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Jo Aurat Bagair Kisi Harj Ke Shohar Se Talaq Ka Sawal Kare UsKe Liye Kya Hukm Hai❓
Content:
ANSWER

Imam Ahmed Wa Tirmiji Wa Abu Dawood Wa Ibne Maja Wa Daarmi Soban رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــه Se Raavi Hai.


Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Farmaya Jo Aurat Bagair Kisi Harj Ke Shohar Se Talaq Ka Sawal Kare Us Par Jannat Ki Khushbu Haraam Hai.


Bukhari Wa Muslim Badullah Ibne Umar رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــه Se Riwayat Karte Hai Ki


Unhone Apni Zauja Ko Haiz Ki Haalat Me Talaq Dedi Thi.

Hazrat Umar رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــه Ne Rasoolullah ﷺ Se Is Waki’a Ka Zikr Kiya Huzoor Ne Us Par Gajab Farmaya Aur Yah Irshad Farmaya Ki Usse Raja’at Karle Aur Roke Rakhe Yahaan Tak Ki Paak Ho Jaaye.


Phir Haiz Aaye Aur Paak Ho Jaaye Uske Baad Agar Talaq Dena Chahe To Taharat Ki Halat Me Zima Se Pahle Talaq De.


Imaam Malik Muatta Me Riwayat Karte Hai Ki

Ek Shakhs Ne Hazrat Abdullah Ibne Abbas رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــه Se Kaha
Main Ne Apni Aurat Ko 100 Talaq Dedi Aap Kya Hukm Dete Hai.

Farmaya Tere Aurat 3 Talaqo Se Baayin Ho Gayi Aur 97 Talaq Ke Saath Tune Allah Ki Aayato Se Thatta Kiya.


Bahar E Shari’At 8wa Hissa Safa 08


Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Sahab

Title: Suraj / Chand Grahan Ki Namaz Kaun Si Hai❓
Content:
Jawab:

Suraj Grahan Ki Namaz Sunnt E Muaqqada Hai Aur Chand Grahan Ki Mustahab Hai.

Suraj Grahan Ki Namaz Jamat Se Padhani Mustahab Hai Aur Tanha-Tanha Bhi Ho Sakti Hai.

Aur Jamat Se Padhi Jaaye To Khutbe Ke Siwa Tamaam Sharaite Jumuah Iske Liye Shart Hai.

Yaani Wahi Shakhs Uski Jamat Kayam Kar Sakta Hai Jo Jumuah Ki Kar Sakta Hai.

Wah Na Hoto Tanha-Tanha Ghar Me Ya Masjid Me.
(Durre Mukhtaar)

Grahan Ki Namaz Usi Waqt Padhe Jab Aaftaab Grahan Ho Yaani Jab Grahan Lag Raha Ho, Grahan Chhoot Ne Ke Baad Nahi.

Aur Agar Grahan Chutna Shuru Ho Gaya Magar Abhi Baaki Hai Us Waqt Bhi Shuru Kar Sakte Hai Aur Grahan Ki Haalat Me Us Par Abr (Badal) Aa Jaaye Jab Bhi Namaz Padhe.

Aise Waqt Me Grahan Laga Ki Us Waqt Namaz Mana Hai To Namaz Na Padhe.

Balki Dua Me Mashgul Rahe Aur Isi Haalat Me Doob Jayein To Dua Khatm Karde Aur Magrib Ki Namaz Padhe.

(Johara, Raddul Muhtaar)

Bahar-E-Shari’At Teesra Hissa 4 Safa 92,93

Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri

Title: Namaz Ke Faraiz Kitne Hai❓
Content:
Jawab:

(1) Takbeere Tahrima. (Namaz Shuru Karne Ke Liye Jo Takbeer Kahte Hai Use Takbeere Tahreema Kahte Hai).
(2) Kiyaam. (Namaz Me Khade Hone Ki Haalat Ko Kiyaam Kahte Hai).
(3) Qiraat
(4) Ruku
(5) Sajda
(6) Qa’da Aakhira (Namaz Me Baithne Ki Haalat Ko Qa’da Kahte Hai).

Wah 2 Hote Hai.

1) Qa’da-E-Ula
2) Qa’da-E-Aakhira

Jis Qa’da Ke Baad Salaam Pherna Ho Use Qa’da-E-Aakhira Kahte Hai.

Aur Jiske Baad Salaam Nahi Pherna Ho Use Qa’da-E-Ula Kahte Hai.

(7) Khuruj Beesun-E-Hi. (Yaani Apne Irade Se Namaz Khatm Karna).

Bahar-E-Shari’At Teesra Hissa Safa 58,59

Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Mard Ke Liye Sajde Ki Halat Me Baaju Karwato Se Juda Hona Kaisa Hai?
Content:
Jab Ki Tanha Namaz Padhta Ho❓

ANSWER

Mard Ke Liye Sajde Me Sunnat Yah Hai Ki Baaju Karwato Se Juda Ho Aur Pet Raano Se Aur Kalaaiyaan Zamin Par Na Beechaye.

Magar Jab Saf Me Ho To Baaju Karwato Se Juda Na Honge.

(Hidaya 1 – 90, Aalamgeeri 1 – 70 , Durre Mukhtar 1 – 338)

Hadees Me Hai Jis Ko Bukhari Wa Muslim Ne Anas رضي الله عنه Se Riwayat Kiya Ki Farmate Hai.

Huzoor ﷺ Sajde Me Aytidaal (Darmiyani Halat) Kare Aur Kutto Ki Tarah Kalaaiyaan Na Beechayein Aur Sahi Muslim Me Barra Ibne Aajib رضي الله عنه Se Marvi Hai Ki

Huzoor ﷺ Farmate Hai Jab Tu Sajda Kare To Hatheli Ko Zamin Par Rakh De Aur Kalaiyaan Utha Le.

Abu Dawood Ne Ummul Momin Maimuna رضي الله تعالي عنها Se Riwayat Ki,

Jab Huzoor ﷺ Sajda Karte To Dono Haath Karwato Se Door Rakhte Yaha Tak Ki Haatho Ke Neeche Se Agar Bakri Ka Bachha Gujrana Chahta To Gujar Jaata.

Aur Muslim Ki Riwayat Bhi Isi Ke Misl Hai

Dusri Riwayat Bukhari Wa Muslim Ki Abdullah Ibne Malik Ibne Abu-Hurrairah رضي الله عنه Se Yoon Hai Ki Haatho Ko Kushada Rakhte Yaha Tak Ki Bagal Mubarak Ki Safedi Zahir Hoti.
Bahar-E-Sahari’At Hissa Teesra Safa 71

Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Roza Kin Cheezon Se Nahi Toota Hai?
Content: Masla– Bhool kar khaaya Piya HumBistari ki, Roza na toota chaahe wo Roza Nafl ho ya farz. Masla– Kisi Rozdaar ko bhool kar khaate – peete dekhe to yaad dilaana wajib hai, yaad na dilaya to Gunehgaar hua. Masla– Makkhi, ya Dhua, ya Gubaar halaq Mein jaane se Roza Nahin tootta. Masla– Tel, ya surma lagaya to Roza na toota agarche tel ya surma halaq Mein Mehsoos hota ho. Balke thook Mein surma ka rang bhi dikhayi deta ho jab bhi Nahi toota. Masla– Ghusl Kiya aur paani ki thandak andar Mehsoos huyi, Roza Nahin toota. Masla– Kulli ki aur paani bilkul phek diya sirf kuch tari munh Mein baaki reh gayi thi, thook ke saath Use nigal gaya, Roza Nahi toota. Masla– Kaan Mein paani chala gaya, Roza Nahin toota. Masla– Tinke se kaan khujaya aur Uss (tinke) Par kaan ka mayl lag gaya. Phir wahi Mayl laga hua tinka Kaan Mein daala agarche chand baar kiya ho, Roza Na toota. Masla– Daanton Se Khoon Nikalkar Halaq Tak Pahuncha. Magar Halaq Se Niche Na Utra To Roza Na Toota Aur Agar Halaq Se Niche Utra Magar Itna Kam Tha Ke Halaq Mein Mazah Mehsoos Na Hua Jab Bhi Roza na toota. Masla– Thook, Balgum, Naak ki Reet wagairah nigalne se Roza Nahi toota. Masla– Bhoole se Khana kha raha tha yaad aate hi fauran luqma phek diya ya Subha-sadiq se pehle kha raha tha aur subha hote hi Ugal diya, Roza na gaya aur Nigal gaya to dono Surton Mein Roza jata raha. Masla– Ehtlam (Night Fall) hua, ya Geebat ki to Roza na gaya. Agarche Geebat bahut sakht kabeera hai. Quran-e-Majeed Mein Geebat karne ki Nisbat Farmaya jaise Apne Murda Bhai ka Gosht khaana (Surah-e-Hujraat Aayat 12) Aur Hadees Mein Farmaya Geebat Zina se bhi Sakht Tar (Bahut Sakt) hai. Agarche Geebat ki wajah se Roze ki Nooraniyyat jaati rehti hai. Masla – Janabat (Napaaki) ki halat Mein Subha ki Agar saare din Naapak raha, Roza na gaya magar itni der tak Qasdan Ghusl na karna ke Namaz Qaza ho jaaye Gunah wa Haraam hai. Hadees Mein hai ke Junub (Napaak) jis Ghar Mein hota hai usme Rehmat ke Farishte Nahin Aate. Masla – Daanton Mein koi Cheez Chane se kam thi aur use Nigal gaya, Roza na toota. Masla – Injection Gosht Mein lagwaya jaaye ya rag Mein, dono Surton Mein Roza na tootega. Masla – Aankhon Mein dawa daalne se Roza Nahi tootta. Masla – Khoon Nikalwane ya chadhwaane se Roza Nahin tootta isi tarah Glucose chadhane se bhi Nahi toota. Masla – Qasdan Qai (Ulti) ki, agar munh bhar na ho, to Roza na tootega. Masla – Be-ikhtiyar Qai (Ulti) ho gayi, to thodi ho, ya Zyaada, Roza na toota. Masla – Khud-bakhud Ulti huyi, phir use Nigal gaya to agar munh bhar na ho, Roza na gaya. Masla – Balgum ki Qai kitni hi ho use Roza Nahin tootega. Masla – Rozdar ke jism par Zakhm hai aur usse peep baha to Roza na gaya. Masla – Roze ki haalat Mein itr lagaya, ya usko soonga, ya phool soonga, ya baal katwaya, ya Naakhun kaata, ya sar ya badan ke kisi aur hisse par baam ya tel ki Maalish ki ya Powder wa Cream wagairah lagaaya to inn sab surton Mein Roza na gaya. Masla – Roze ki Haalat Mein Aankh ka Operation karaya. Ya aur kisi azu (Parts) ka Operation karaya, Roza na gaya. Masla – Aansu ya Paseena munh Mein chala gaya aur use nigal gaya to agar Qatra-2-Qatra hai Roza na toota. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Roza kin cheezo se toot jata hai?
Content: Masla – Jaan-bujhkar Khaane-Peene, HumBistari karne se Roza Toot jaata hai. Masla – Huqqa, Sigaar, Cigerate, Charat (Charas) wagairah Peene se Roza toot jaata hai. Masla – Paan, ya Tumbaku khaane se Roza toot jaata hai. Masla – Shakar (Sugar) wagairah aisi Cheezein jo munh Mein rakhne se ghul jaati hai. Munh Mein rakhi aur Thook nigal gaya, Roza toot gaya. Masla – Daanton ke darmiyaan koi Cheez Chane ke barabar, ya zyaada thi use kha gaya, ya kam hi thi magar Munh se nikaal kar phir khali to dono Surton Mein Roza toot gaya. Masla– Daanton se khoon nikalkar halaq se neeche utra aur uska mazah halaq Mein Meinhsoos hua. Roza toot gaya. Masla – Roze Mein Daant Ukharwaya aur khoon nikalkar Halaq se neeche utra Roza toot gaya. Masla– Naak Se Dawa Chadhayi Ya Kaan Mein Tel Dala Ya Chala Gaya Roza Toot Gaya Masla – Kaan Mein Jaanbujh kar paani daalne se Roza toot jaata hai.(Fatawa e Razwiya). Masla – Kulli kar raha tha Be-ikhtiyaar paani Halaq se Utar gaya. Roza toot gaya. Masla – Naak Mein Paani Chadhaya aur Dimaag ko chadh gaya Roza toot gaya. Masla – Aansu ya Paseena Munh Mein chala gaya aur nigal gaya to agar do Qatre se zyaada hai aur uski Namkeeni poore Munh Mein Meinhoos huyi, Roza toot gaya. Masla – Jaanbujh kar Munh bhar Qai (Ulti) ki to Roza toot gaya. Masla – Be-Ikhtiyaar Bhar Munh Qai (Ulti) ho gayi phir use Nigal gaya Roza Toot Gaya Masla – Ye Gumaan tha ke Subah Nahin hui aur khaya ya piya baad ko Maloom hua ke Subah ho chuki thi Roza na hua. Masla – Ye Gumaan tha ke Aaftaab Doob gaya Aur Iftaar kar liya Baad ko Maloom hua ke na Dooba tha Roza na hua. Masla – Jiska Roza toot gaya. Maslan Galti se Paani Wagairah koi Cheez Halaq Mein ja rahi to jo kuch Din Baaki re gaya use Roze ki tarah Guzaarna Wajib hai. Masla – Naswaar Naak Mein lagaakar Upar Kheechne se Roza toot jaata hai. Masla – Lobaan, Agarbatti wagairah ke Dhue ko Jaanbujhkar Naak Ya Munh se Kheecha, Roza toot gaya. Masla – Manjan, Ya Toothpaste wagairah kar raha tha aur uske kuch Ajza Halaq se neeche utar gaye Roza toot gaya. Masla – Inhaler (jo ke Dama ke Mariz Aksar Istamal karte hain) Roze ki haalat Mein Istamaal kiya Roza toot gaya. Isi Tarah Sardi Ke Inhaler Se Bhi Roza toot Jayega. Masla – Cheenk Aane ke liye Naak Mein Sufoof (Powder) Rakhkar upar ko Saans Kheechne se Roza toot Jayega. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Hazrate Aamina رضي الله تعالي عنها (Huzoor Ki Walida Majida) Ke Wisaal Sharif Huwa Tab Huzoor E AQDAS ﷺ Ki Umar Sharif Kya Thi❓
Content:
ANSWER

Huzoor E AQDAS ﷺ Ki Umar Sharif Jab 6 Baras Ki Ho Gayi To Aap Ki Walida Majida Aapko Saath Lekar Madina Munawwara Apke Daada Ke Nanihaal Abu Adi Bin Najjar Me Rishtedaro Ki Mulakaat Ya Apne Shohar Ki Qabr Ki Ziyaarat Ke Liye Tasharif Le Gayi.


Huzoor ﷺ Ke Waalid E Maajid Ki Baandi Umme Eyman Bhi Is Safar Me Apke Saath Thi.


Waha Se Wapasi Par ABWAA Naami Gaon Me Hazrate Bibi Aamina Ki Wafa’At Ho Gayi Aur Wah Wahi Madfun Huyi.


Waalid E Maajid Ka Saaya To Wiladat Se Pahle Hi Uth Chuka Tha Ab Waalida Maajida Ki Aagoshe Shafkat Ka Bhi Khatma Ho Gaya.


Lekin Hazrate Aamina Ka Yah Durre Yatim Jis Aagoshe Rahmat Me Parwarish Paa Kar Parwana Chadne Waala Hai.

Wah In Sab Jaahiri Asbaabe Tarbiyat Se Be-Niyaaz Hai.


Hazrate Bibi Aamina Ki Wafa’At Ke Baad Hazrate Umme Eyman Apko Makka Laayi Aur ApKe Dada Abdul Muttalib Ko Supurd Kiya Aur Dada Ne Aapko Apne Aagoshe Tarbiyat Me Intihaayi Shafkat Wa Muhabbat Ke Saath Parwarish Kiya Aur Hazrate Umme Eyman Apki Khidmat Karti Rahi.


Jab Apki Umar Sharif 8 Baras Ko Ho Gayi To Apke Dada Abdul Muttalib Ka Bhi Inteqal Ho Gaya.


Seeratul Mustafa Baab Pehla Safa No 64


Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah 

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Sahab

Title: Jumma Ki Namaz Ki Jamat Kayam Karne Ke Liye Imam Ke Alawa Kam Se Kam Kitne Mard Hone Chahiye. Tab Jumma Hogi❓
Content:
Jawab:

Jamat – Imam Ke Alawa Kam Se Kam 3 Mard.

Agar 3 Gulam Ya Musafir Beemaar Ya Gunge Ya Anpad Muqtadi Ho To Jummah Ho Jayegi Aur Sirf Aurate Aur Bachhe Ho To Nahi.

(Aalamgeeri, Raddul Muhtar)

Khutbe Ke Waqt Jo Log Maujood The Wah Bhaag Gaye Aur Dusre 3 Shakhs Aa Gaye To Inke Saath Imam Jummah Padhe.
Yaani Jummah Ki Jama’At Ke Liye Unhi Logo Ka Hona Jaruri Nahi Jo Khutbe Ke Waqt Haajir The. Balki Unke Gaur Se Bhi Ho Jayegi.
(Durre Mukhtar)

Bahar E Shari’At Hissa 4tha Safa No 82

Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah 

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Sahab

Kya Ye Nikah Hogaya Aur Agar Nahi Hua To Zaid Par Kya Hukm Hai?

ANSWER

Apni Sagi Bhanji Se Yaani Apni Bahen Ki Beti Se Nikah Haraam Hai.


Zaid Par Farz Hai Ke Fauran Usse Alag Ho Jaaye Aur Sacche Dil Se Tauba Kare.

Title: Uske Ilm Me Kapda Na-Paak Hai Aur Us Me Namaz Padhi.
Content:
Phir Maalum Huwa Ki Paak Tha To Namaz Ka Kya Hukm Hai❓

Jawab:

Namaz Me Satrr Ke Liye Paak Kapda Hona Jaruri Hai.

Yani Itna Naajis NaHo Jisse Namaz NaHo Sake.

To Agar Paak Kapde Par Qudrat Hai Aur Na-Paak Pahan Kar Namaz Padhi Namaz Na Huyi.

Aalamgeeri Jild 1 Safa 56

Uske Ilm Me Kapda Na-Paak Hai Aur Us Me Namaz Padhi.

Phir Maalum Huwa Ki Paak Tha Namaz Na Huyi.

Durre Mukhtar Jild 1 Safa 292
Bahar-E-Shari’At Hissa Teesra Safa 38

Title: Zaid Pichle 4 Jummah Se Namaz Nahi Padh Raha Hai.
Content:
Yani Usne Ek Bhi Jummah Kayam Nahi Kiya Ab Zaid Par Shariyat Ka Kya Hukm Hai?

Jawab:

Zaid Pe Jummah Ki Namaz Farz Hone Ke Bawajood Jaan Boojh Kar 4 Jummah Nahin Padha, To Woh Sakht Gunhgaar Mustahiqq E Azaab E Naar Hai.

Zaid Par Laazim Hai Keh Sachche Dil Se Taubah Kare Aur Us Din Ke Zuhar Ki Qaza Padhe.

Title: Hum Tamam Baade Shahro Me Jate Hai. Lagbhag 90% Sunni Mic Ka Istemal Karte Hai.
Content:

Ham Sari Namaz Bina Jamat Ke Padte Hai.

Jumme Ki Mic Ke Sath Jamat Se Hi Padni Padti Hai.

Kya Kare Juma Chor Kar Zohar Padhe.

ANSWER

Pahli Saff Mein Ya Aisi Jagah Namaz Padhein Ke Imam Ki Asl Awaaz Wahan Aati Ho Aur Imam Ki Asl Awaaz Pe Ruku O Sajda Wagairah Arkaan Ada Karein.

Title: InshaAllah Jumma Ko Umrah Ke Liye Rawana Hona Hai.
Content:
Ghar Ki Auraton Ke Liye Sawal Hai.

Ab Period Ka Waqt Aye Tho Umrah Ki Arkaan Karna Chahiye.

Ya Dawai Kha Ke Period Ko Postpone Kar Sakte Hai.

Jawab:

Yahan Se Nikle To Ehram Ki Niyat Karle.

Agar Period Hai To Bhi Usko Ehram Bandhna Zaruri Hai.

Aur Jab Haiz Khatam Ho Jaaye To Wo Tawaaf O Sai Kar Ke Ehram Se Baaher Nikle.

Aur Agar Dawa Khali To Wo Tawaaf Wagaira Kar Ke Umrah Pura Kar Sakti Hai.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa E Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Zaid Ki Khala Ne Zaid Ko Dudh Pilaya Tha Aur Ab Zaid Ki Khala Apni Beti Ka Nikah Zaid Se Karna Chahti Hai.
Content:
Kya Ye Nikah Ho Sakta Hai?

Rehnumayi Farmaye

ANSWER

Zaid Ki Umar Dhaai Saal Se Kam Thi Aur Zaid Ki Khala Ne Is Umar Mein Apna Doodh Pilaayi To Zaid Ki Us Khala Ki Beti Se Zaid Ka Nikah Nahin Ho Sakta.

Title: Hazrat Isme Aapne Likha Hai Ki Zaid Ki Umar Dhai Saal Ki Thi Aur Tab Doodh Pilaya Hoto Nikah Nahi Ho Sakta.
Content:
Par Maine Kisi Kitab Me Padha Tha Ki Baccha 2 Saal Ka Ho Tab Tak Hi Doodh Pilaye.

Matlab 2 Saal Ke Baad Bacche Pe Maa Ka Doodh Haraam Ho Jata Hai.

Kya Ye Sahi Hai?

ANSWER

Doodh Pilaane Ki Muddat 2 Saal Hi Hai.

2 Saal Se Ziyaadah Aurat Apna Doodh Nahin Pila Sakti.

Magar Hurmat E Raza’at Saabit Hone Ke Liye Muddat Dhaai Saal Taka Hai.

Title: Masjid Ke Imam Sahab Namaz Ke Waqt Jamat Shuru Hone Ke End Waqt Pe Aate Hai
Content:

Imam Ko Waqt Ki Pabandi Chahiye Taake Awam Waqt E Muqarrara Par Jamaat Ke Sath Namaz Ada Kar Sake Aur Apne Kaam Kaaj Me Lag Sake.
