Title: Musalman Bachchon Ke Naam Kaise Rakhe Jaye?
Content: MASLAH:- Bachcha paida hone ke shukuriye me jo Jaanwar zabah kiya jaata hai usko aqeeqah kahte hai. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Jab bachcha paida ho to mustahab ye hai ke uske kaan me azan o iqamat kahi jaaye azan kahne se إنْ شَــاءَاللّــهُ balaayein door ho jayengi. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Behtar ye hai ke daahine kaan me 4 martabah azan aur baayein kaan me 3 martabah iqamat kahi jaaye. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- 7wen din uska naam rakha jaaye aur uska sar munda jaaye aur sar mundne ke waqt aqeeqah kiya jaaye. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Baalon ko wazan karke utni chaandi ya sona sadqa kiya jaaye. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Hindustan me amooman bachcha paida hone par chhatti ki jaati hai, baaz logo me is mauqe par najayez rasmein barti jaati hain. Maslan aurato ka gana bajana aisi baaton se bachna aur unko chhorna zaroori o laazim hai. Balkeh musalmaano ko woh karna chahiye jo huzur e aqdas صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ke qaul o fe'l se saabit hai. Aqeeqah se bahut zaaid rusoom me sarf kar dete hain aur aqeeqah nahin karte. Aqeeqah karein to sunnat bhi ada ho jaaye aur mehmano ko khilane ke liye gosht bhi ho jaaye. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Aaj kal logon me yaum e paidaaish (birthday) manane ka bahut zor hai is mauqa par bhi bahut si najayez rasmen barti jaati hain. Maslan gana bajana wagairah is khas taqreeb me muam batti jalana, taaliyan baja baja kar english zbaban me mubarakbaad dena ye sab chizein yahoodiyo o nasraaniyo ki rasmein hain hamen in sab se bachna zaroori hai. MASLAH:- Yaum e paidaaish (birthday) ke mauqe par aisi taqreebaat jo manhiyyaat e shari'ah se paak hon in me harj nahin. Maslan moulood shareef ki mahfil buzurgaan e deen ke name esaal e sawab aur niyaz ki taqseem wagairah. Balkeh ye chizen baa'is-e-khair barakat hain aur nek o paakeezah zindagi ke liye nek faal hai. MASLAH:- Bachcha ka achcha naam rakha jaaye hindustan me bahut logo ke aise naam hai jinke kuchh ma'na nahi ya unke bure ma'na hain aise naamo se aiteraaz karein. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Ambiya e kiram عليه الصلوة و السلامKe asmaa e tayiibah aur sahaba o taab'een o buzurgaan e deen ke naam par naam rakhna behtar hai. Ummeed hai ke unki barkat bachche ke shamil haal ho. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Abdullah o Abdur Rahman bahut achhe naam hai. Magar is zamane me aksar dekha jaata hai ke bajae Abdur Rahman us shakhs ko bahut se log rahman kahte hain aur gair e khuda ko rahman kahna haraam hai. Isi tarah Abdul Khaliq ko khaliq aur abduma'bud ko ma'bud kahte hain is qism ke naam me aisi najayez tarmeem hargiz na ki jaaye. Isi tarah bahut kasrat se naam me tasgeer ka riwaj hai. Yani naam ko is tarah bigaadte hain jisse hiqaarat nikalti hai aur aise namo me tasgeer hargiz na ki jaaye. Lihaza jahan ye guman ho ke naam me tasgeer ki jaayegi ye naam na rakhein jaayein dosre naam rakhe jaaye. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Baaz Asma e Ilahiyyah jinka itlaaq gairullah par jaayez hai. Unke saath naam rakhna jaayez hai. Jaise Ali, Kabeer, Rasheed, Badee' (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Aisa naam rakhna jiska zikr na quran majeed me aaya ho na hadeeson me ho na musalmano me aisa naam musta'mal ho is me ulama ko ikhtelaf hai, behtar ye hai ke na rakhe. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Mara hua bachcha paida ho to uska naam rakhne ki haajat nahi bagair naam rakhe dafn karde. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Bachcha paida ho kar mar gaya to dafn se pahle uska naam rakha jaaye. Ladka ho to ladko ka sa aur ladki ho ladkiyo ka sa naam rakha jaaye aur maloom na ho saka ke ladka hai ya ladki to aisa name rakha jaaye jo mard o aurat dono ke liye ho sakta ho. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Jo name bure ho unko badal kar achcha naam rakhna chahiye. Hadees me hai qiyamat ke din tum apne aur apne baapon ke naam se pukare jaaoge. Lihaza apne naame achhe rakho. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Huzoor Aqdas صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ne bure naamo ko badal diya 1 shakhs ka naam "asram" tha usko badal kar "zar'ah" rakha aur "aasiya" ( عاصيه) name ko badal kar jameela rakha yasaar, rabaah, aflah, barakat naam rakhne se bhi mana farmaya. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Abdul Mustafa, Abdunnabi, abdurrasool, naam rakhna jaayez hai ke is nisbat ki sharaafat maqsood hai aur uboodiyyat ke haqeeqi ma'na yahan maqsood nahi hain. Rahi abd ki izafat gairullah ki taraf ye quran o hadees se saabit hai. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:-Aise naam jin me tazkiyyah e nafs aur khudsataai nikalti hai unko bhi Huzoor e Aqdas صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ne badal daala “birrah“ ka name zainab rakha aur farmaya apne nafs ka tazkiyyah na karo. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Shamsuddin, Zainuddin, Muhiyyuddin, Fakhruddin, Naseeruddin, Sirajuddin, Nizamuddin, Qutbuddin wagaiha asma jinke andar khud sataai aur badi zabardast ta'reef paai jati hai nahin rakhne chahiye. Raha ye ke buzurgaan e deen o aimma e saabiqeen ko in naam se yaad kiya jaata hai to ye jaanna chaahiye ke un hazrat ke naam ye na the. Balkeh ye unke alqaab hain ke jab woh hazrat maraatib e aaliya o manasib e jaleelah par faiz huye to musalmano ne unko is tarah kaha. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Gulam ahmad, Gulam rasool, Gulam farooq, Gulam ali, Gulam hasan, Gulam husain wagiraha asma jin me ambiya o sahaba o auliya ke namo ki taraf gulam ko izafat karke naam rakha jaaye ye jaayez hai. Iske adam e jawaz ki koi wajah nahin, ba'az wahabiyya ka in namo ko najaayez balkeh shirk batana unki bad-baatini ki daleel hai. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH: Muhammad bakhsh, Ahmad bakhsh, Nabi bakhsh, Peer bakhsh, Ali bakhsh, Husain bakhsh aur isi qism ke dosre name jin me kisi nabi ya wali ke name ke saath bakhsh ka lafz mila kar rakha gaya ho jaayez hai. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Gafooruddin, Gafoorullah, naam rakhna naajaayez kyuke gafoor ka ma'na hai mitane wala. Allah تعالى gafoor hai ke woh bando ke gunaah mita deta hai. Lihaza gafooruddin ke ma'na huye deen ke mitane wala. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Taaha, Yaseen naam bhi na rakhe jaayein ke ye muqatta'aat e quraniya se hai. Jinke ma'na maloom nahin. Zaaheer ye hai ke ye asmaa e nabi صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم se hain aur ba'az ulama ise asma e ilahiyyah se kaha. Baharhaal jab ma'na maloom nahin to ho sakta hai ke iske aise ma'na ho jo Huzoor صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ya Allah تعالى ke saath khas hon. Aur in naamo ke saath Muhammad mila kar muhammad taaha, muhammad yaaseen kahna bhi muman'at ko daf'a na karega. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Muhammad nabi, Ahmad nabi, Muhammad rasool, Ahmad rasool, Nabiyuzzaman naam rakhna bhi najaayez hai. Balkeh ba'az naam nabiyyullah bhi suna gaya hai. Gair e nabi ko nabi kahna hargiz hargiz jayez nahin ho sakta. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH: Muhammad bada pyara naam hai is naam ki badi ta'reef hadeeso me aai hai. Agar tasgeer ka andesha na ho to ye naam rakha jaaye aur ek soorat ye hai Ke aqeeqah ka ye naam ho aur pukarne ke liye koi dosra naam tajweez kar liya jaaye aur hindustaan me aisa bahut hota hai ke ek shakhs ke kai naam hote hain. Is soorat me name ki barakat bhi hogi aur tasgeer se bhi bach jaayenge. TAMBEEH Aaj kal musalmano me aise naam raaij ho gaye hain jinka koi matlab nahin. Yunhi fussaq o fujjar ke naam par apne bachcho ka name rakhte hain aise naamo se bhi bachna chahiye aur aisa naam rakhna chahiye jo bama'na aur bihtar ho. (Bahar e shari'at) BOOK NAME - FAZAAIL O MASAIL E EIDUL AZHA O QURBANI -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Aqeeqah ke masail
Content: MASLAH:- Aqeeqah ke liye 7wa din behtar hai aur 7we din na karein to jab chahein kar sakte hain sunnat ada ho jaayegi. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH: Ba'az ne kaha Hai ke 7wen din, ya 14wen din, ya 21wen din. Yani 7 din ka lihaz rakha jaaye, ye behtar hai aur yaad na rahe to ye kare ke jis din bachcha paida hua us din ko yaad rakhein. Usse ek (1) din pahle wala din jab aaye to woh 7wa din hoga. Maslan juma ko paida hua to jumeraat 7wa din aur saneechar ko paida hua to juma 7wa din hoga. Pahli soorat me jis jumeraat ko aur dosri soorat me jis juma ko aqeeqah karega us mein 7wen din ka hisaab zaroor aayega. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Ladke ke aqeeqah me do (2) bakre aur ladki me ek (1) bakri zabah ki jaaye. Ladke me narr Jaanwar aur ladki me maadah munasib hai aur ladke ke aqeeqah me bakriyaan aur ladki me bakra kiya jab bhi harj nahin. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Aqeeqah me gaaye zabah ki jaaye to ladke ke liye do (2) aur ladki ke liye ek (1) hissa kaafi hai. Yani 7 hisso me 2 hisse, ya 1 hissa. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH: Gaaye ki Qurbani hui usme aqeeqah ki shirkat ho sakti hai. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Bachcha ka sar mundne ke ba'ad sar par zafraan pees kar laga dena behtar hai. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH:- Aqeeqah ka Jaanwar unhi sharaait ke saath hona chahiye jaisa Qurbani ke liye hota hai. Uska gosht fuqara aur azeez o qareeb o dost o ahbaab ko kachcha taqseem kar diya jaaye. Ya paka kar diya jaaye, ya unko bataur ziyaafat o dawat khilaya jaaye ye sab sooraten jaayez hain. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH: Behtar ye hai ke uski haddi na todi jaaye. Balke haddiyo par se gosht utaar liya jaaye, ye bachcha ki salamati ki nek faal hai aur haddi tod kar gosht banaya jaaye is me bhi harj nahin. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH: Gosht ko jis tarah chahein paka sakte hain. Magar meetha pakaya jaaye to bachche ke akhlaaq achhe hone ki faal hai. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH: Ba'az ka ye qaul hai ke siri paaye hajaam ko aur ek (1) raan daai ko de, baaqi gosht ke teen (3) hisse karein, Ek (1) hissa fuqara ka ek (1) ahbaab ka aur ek (1) hissa ghar wale khaayein. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH: Kul gosht ghar ke liye rakh liya, to isme bhi harj nahin. MASLAH: Awam me ye bahut mashhoor hai ke aqeeqah ka gosht bachche ke maan baap, dadi, dada, nani, nana na khayein, ye mahaz galat hai iska koi suboot nahin. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH: Ladke ke aqeeqah me do (2) bakriyo ki jagah ek (1) hi bakri kisi ne ki to ye bhi jaayez hai. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH: Ba'az log shadi wagairah ke moqa par gaaye ya bakriyaan gosht ke liye zabah karte hain. To usme aqeeqah ki niyat bhi kar lete hain. Isme harj nahin aur jin logo ki taraf se aqeeqah kiya unki taraf se aqeeqah ki sunnat ada ho jaayegi . MASLAH: Baa'z ka wahi hukm hai jo Qurbani ki khaal ka hai apne sarf me laaye, ya masakeen ko de, ya kisi aur nek kaam masjid, ya madarsa me sarf kare. (Bahar e shari'at) MASLAH: Aqeeqah me Jaanwar zabah karte waqt Aqeeqah ki dua padhi jaati hai. Aqeeqah ki dua padh sakte hain aur yaad na ho to bagair padhe bhi zabah karne aqeeqah ho jaayega. (Bahar e shari'at) BOOK NAME - FAZAAIL O MASAIL E EID UL AZHA O QURBANI -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Unn Surton Ka Bayan Jin Mein Sirf Roze ki Qaza Laazim Hai
Content: Masla– Ye Gumaan Tha Ke Subah Nahin Huyi Aur Khaaya ya Piya Ya HumBistari Ki Baad Ko Maloom Hua Ke Subah Ho Chuki Thi To Sirf Qaza Laazim Hai. Yaani Iss Roze Ke Badle Mein 1 Roza Rakhna Hoga. Masla– Bhoolkar Khaaya Piya Ya HumBistari Ki Ya Ehtlaam(Night Fall) Hua Ya Ulti Hui Aur Inn Sab Surton Mein Ye Gumaan Kiya Ke Roza Toot Gaya. Ab Jaan Bujhkar Kha Liya To Sirf Qaza Farz Hai. Masla– Kaan Mein Tel Tapkaya Ya Naak Se Dawa Chadhayi Ya Subah Ko Niyat Nahin Ki Thi Din Mein Zawaal Se Pehle Niyat Ki Aur Niyat Ke Baad Khaa Liya Inn Sab Surton Mein Sirf Qaza Laazim Hai Roze Ka Kaffara Nahin. Masla– Guroob Samajhkar Iftaar Kar Liya Haalaki Din Baaki Tha Sirf Qaza Laazim Hai. Masla– Naabaalig Bachche Ne Roza Rakhkar Todh Diya To Uspar Qaza Nahin. Masla– Qai (Ulti) Aayi Ya Bhoolkar Khaya Piya Aur Inn Sab Surton Mein Use Maloom Tha Ke Roza Na Gaya. Phir Kha Liya To Kaffara Laazim Nahin (Qaza Zaroori Hai). -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Unn Surto Ka Bayan Jinme Roze ki Qaza Ke Saath Roze Ka Kaffara Bhi Laazim Hai
Content: Masla: Ramzan Mein Roza daar Mukallaf (Jispar Roza Farz ho) Muqim Ne Ke Adaaye Roza-e-Ramzan Ki Niyat Se Roza Rakha Aur Geeza Ya Dawa Khaayi, Ya Paani Piya, Ya Koi Cheez Lazzat Ke Liye Khaayi Ya Pi, Inn Sab Surton Mein Qaza Ke Saath Kaffara Bhi Laazim Hai. Masla: Jis Jagah Roza Todhne Se Kaffara Laazim Aata Hai. Usme Shart Hai ke Raat Hi Se Roza-e-Ramzan Ki Niyat Ki Ho. Agar Din Mein Niyat Ki Thi Aur Todh Diya To Kaffara Laazim Nahin. Masla: Kaffara Wajib Hone Ke Liye Bhar Pait Khaana Zaroori Nahin. Thodasa Khaane se Bhi Wajib Ho Jayega. Masla: Tel Lagaya, Ya Geebat Ki Phir Ye Guman Kar Liya Ke Roza Toot Gaya. Phir Usne Kha Pi Liya Jab Bhi Kaffara Laazim Hai. Masla: Jin Surton Mein Roza Todhne Par Kaffara Laazim Nahin, Unme Shart Hai Ke Ek Hi Baar Aisa Hua Ho Aur Gunaah Ka Irada Na Kiya Ho Warna Unme Kaffara Dena Hoga. Masla: Sehri Ka Niwala munh Mein Tha Ke Subah Tulo’o Ho Gayi Aur Use Nigal Gaya Kaffara Wajib Hai. Masla: Bhoolkar Kha Raha Tha, Yaad Aa Gaya Aur Nigal Gaya, Kaffara Wajib Hai. Masla: Ehtlaam (Night Fall) Hua Aur Use Maloom Tha Ke Roza Na Gaya. Phir Kha Liya To Kaffara Laazim Hai. Masla– Ramzan Ka Roza Qasdan (Jaanbujhkar) Todhne Se Kaffara Laazim Aata Hai. Kaffara Ka Bayan Roza Todhne ka Kaffara ye hai ke Ek Raqba (Loundi ya Gulaam) Azaad kare aur ye na ho sake jaise iss Zamane Mein Gulaam milte hi Nahin. To lagataar (pe dar pe) 60 Roze rakhe, agar ye bhi na kar sake to 60 Miskeeno ko Bhar-Bhar pait Dono waqt Khana Khilaaye aur Roze rakhne ki soorat Mein, Agar Beech Mein Ek Din ka Roza Bhi choot gaya to Ab se 60 Roze Rakhe pehle ki Ginti Nahin. 59 rakh chuka tha aur 60’va na rakh saka, Bimaari wagairah kisi Uzr se to phir se 60 Roze Poore lagaatar rakhe. Pehle Roze Shumaar na honge Albatta Aurat ko agar Haiz ki Wajah se jitne Naaga (Gap) hue. Ye Nahin Geene jayenge, yaani pehle ke Roze aur Haiz ke baadwale Roze Dono Milkar 60 ho jaane se Kaffara Adaa ho Jayega. Kaffara Laazim Hone Ki Shartein Roza Todhne Se Kaffara Laazim Hone Ki Chand Shartein Hai. Jab Ye Sab Paayi Jaaengi Tab Kaffara Laazim Hoga Warna Nahin. 1) Ramzan Ke Mahine Mein Ramzan Ka Roza Adaa Karne Ki Niyat Se Roza Rakha Ho 2) Roza daar Muqim Ho Musaafir Nahin 3) Mukallaf (Aaqil-o-Baalig) Ho, To Agar Bachche Ya Pagal Ne Todha To Kaffara Nahin. 4) Raat Hi Se Roza-e-Ramzan Ki Niyat Ki Ho, To Agar Din Mein Roze Ki Niyat Ki Phir Use Todh Diya To Kaffara Nahin. 5) Roza Todhne ke baad koi aise Amr na Waaqei hua ho jo Roze ki Munafi (Khilaaf) Ho. Jaise Aurat ko Haiz wa Nifas Aa gaya ho, ya Roza Todhne ke baad itna Bimaar ho gaya ho ke use Roza na Rakhne ki Ijaazat ho to Kaffara Laazim na hoga. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Roze ke makroohat ka bayan
Content:
Hadees– Hazrat Abu Hurairah Radiyallahu T’aala anhu se Riwayat hai ke Rasoolullah sallallaahu t’aala alaihi wasallam ne farmaya “JO BURI BAAT KEHNA AUR USPAR AMAL KARNA NAHI CHHOODE TO ALLAH T’aala Ko Uski Kuch Hajat Nahin Ke Usne Khaana Peena Chhodh Diya Hai.

(BUKHARI ,TIRMIZI SHARIF)

Hadees: HAZRAT ABU HURAIRAH Radiyallahu t’aala anhu se Riwayat Hai ke Rasoolullah sallallaahu t‘aala Alaihi Wasallam Ne Irshaad farmaya “roza Uska naam Nahin ke khaane peene se baaz Rehna ho roza to ye hai ke bekaar aur behooda baaton se bacha jaaye.

(Haakim)

Masla: Jhoot, Geebat, Chugli, Gaali dena Behooda baat kisi ko takleef dena ke ye cheezein waise bhi na jaayez-o-haraam hain.

Roze Mein aur zyaada haraam. aur inki wajah se roze Mein karahat Aati hai

Masla: Roza dar ko bila uzr kisi cheez ka chakhna ya chabana makrooh hai.

Masla: Chakhne ke liye uzr ye hai ke maslan kisi aurat ka shouhar bad-mijaaz hai ke namak kam wa zyaada hoga to naraaz hoga to iss wajah se chakhne Mein harj Nahin.

Masla: Chakhne ke wo maana Nahin ke jo aaj kal aam rivaaj hai. Yaani Kisi cheez ka mazah maloom karne ke liye Usme se thoda kha lena ke Yu to karahat kaisi Roza hi toot jaayega.

Balki kaffara ke sharait Paaye jaayein to kaffara  bhi Lazim hoga.

Masla: Chakhne se murad ye hai ke zubaan par rakhkar Mazah maloom karle aur use thook de Uss Me se Halaq Mein Kuch Na Jaana Paaye Warna Roza Toot jayega.

Masla: T.V dekhna, Cricket, Badminton, mobile aur computer game, carom, football, volley ball, chess, hockey ,tennis,card, ludo wagairah khelna aur dino Mein bhi Na jayez-o-gunah hai.

Ramzan sharif Mein aur sakht gunah aur isse Roza Bhi makhrooh hota hai.

Masla: Gulaab ya itr wagairah sunghna daadhi, mooch Mein tel lagaana aur surma lagaana makhrooh Nahin.

Masla: Roze Mein miswaak karna makhrooh Nahin. Balki jaise aur dino Mein sunnat hai roze Meiin bhi sunnat hai.

Masla: Roze Mein manjan, toothpaste wagairah ka istemal makhrooh hai aur agar ye cheezein halaq se neeche utar gayi to Roza toot gaya.

Masla: rozahdar ke liye kulli karne aur naak Mein paani charhaane Mein mubaalga karna makrooh hai.

Mubaalga karne ke ye matlab hai ke bhar munh paani le.

Masla: Thandak pahunchaane ke liye kulli karna ya gusl karne makhrooh Nahin.

Masla: Munh Mein thook ikattha karke nigal jaana makhrooh hai.

Title: Hazrat Zaid Ko Sadak Par Se Foreign Currency Ke Kuch Sikke Mile.

Zaid Mazkoorah Raqam Faqeero Ko De De Aur Agar Khud Faqeer Hai To Khud Bhi Kharch Kar Sakta Hai.

To Sabke Liye Kya Hukm Hai.

Kya Kha Pee Sakte Hai Woh?

ANSWER

Iske Zyada Haqdaar Fuqra Masakeen Hain.

Behtar Hai Ke Jo Ameer Hain Wo Na Khaayein.

Title: Jisne Bhi Nabi ﷺ Ka Sapna Dekha Kya Woh Wali Ho Jayega.
Content:
Dusri Baat Kya Jo Dekha. Woh Kya Kisi Se Keh Nhi Sakta Kya.

ANSWER

Sarkar E Aqdas  ﷺ Ki Khwab Mein Ziyaarat Baade Sharf Ki Baat Hai Aur Sarkar E Aqdas ﷺ Ki Rahmat Auliya E Kiraam Par Hai Aur Auliya E Kiram Ke Sadqe Ham Jaise Gunahgaar Par Bhi.

Sarkar E Aqdas ﷺ Auliya E Kiram Ko Bhi Khwab Mein Ziyaarat Se Nawazte Hai.

Basa Auqaat Gunahgaro Ko Bhi Apni Ziyarat Se Nawazte Hain.

To Ye Kahna Saheeh Nahin Keh Sarkar E Aqdas ﷺ Ki Jo Shakhs Bhi Khawab Mein Ziyarat Karle Woh Allah تعالى Ka Wali Hai.

Jisko Ziyarat Hui Behtar Hai Ke Kisi Ko Na Bataye Aur Agar Bata Diya To Is Mein Bhi Kuch Harj Nahin.

Title: Sehri aur iftar ka Bayan
Content:
Hadees: Hazrate Anas  Radiyallahu t’aala anhu se Riwayat hai ke huzoor-e-aqdas sallallaahu Ta'ala alaihi wasallam ne farmaya “SEHRI KHAO KE SEHRI KHAANE MEIN BARKAT HAI.

(Bukhari, Muslim)

Hadees: Hazrat Abdullah ibne umar Radiyallahu ta'ala anhuma se Riwayat hai ke Huzoor-e-akram sallallaahu Ta'ala alaihi wasallam Ne farmaya “ALLAH AUR USKE FARISHTE SEHRI KHAANE WAALON PAR DUROOD BHEJTE HAIN.

(TIBRANI)

Hadees: Hazrat Abu saeed khudri Radiyallahu ta'ala anhu se Riwayat hai ke Huzoor sallallaahu Ta'ala alaihi wasallam ne farmaya

Sehri kul ki kul barkat hai oose na  chhodhna agarche ek ghoont paani bhi peele. Kyun ki sehri khaane waalon par allah aur uske farishte durood bhejte hain.

(Musnad Imam Ahmed bin hambal)

Hadees – Hazrate Sahal Bin Sa’ad RadiYallahu Ta'ala anhu Se Riwayat Hai Ke Huzoor E Aqdas SallalLaahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam Ne Farmaya Hamesha Log Khair Ke Sath Rahenge Jab Tak Iftar Mein Jaldi Karenge.

(Bukhari, Muslim Sharif)

Hadees– Hazrate Abu Hurairah Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu se Riwayat Hai Ke Huzoor sallalLaahu Ta'ala Alaihi wasallam Ne Farmaya Ke

Allah Ta'ala Ne Farmaya Mere Bandhon Mein Mujhe Zyada Pyaara Woh Hai Jo Iftar Mein Jaldi Karta Hai.

(Tirmizi)

Hadees–  Hazrate Salman Bin Aamir Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu Se Riwayat Hai Ke Huzoor-E-Aqdas SallalLaahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam Ne Irshad Farmaya

Jab Tumme Se Koi Roza Iftaar Kare To Khujoor Ya Chhohare Se Iftar Kare Ke Woh Barkat Hai.

Agar Woh Na Mile To Paani Se Ke Woh Paak Karne Wala Hai.

(Abu Dawood, Tirmizi Sharif)

Masla– Sehri Khana Aur Usme Taakhir Karna Mustahab Hai. Magar Itni Taakhir Makrooh Hai ke Subah Ka Shak Ho Jaye.

Masla– Iftar Mein Jaldi Karna Mustahab Hai. Magar Iftar Uss Waqt Kare Ke Gurub Ka Gaalib Gumaan Ho.

Jab Tak Gumaan Gaalib Na Ho Iftar Na Kare.

Agarche Mu-azzin Ne Azaan Keh Di Hai Aur Badal Ke Dino Mein Iftar Mein Jaldi Na Kare.

Masla– Baaz Log Fajr Ki Azan Tak Sehri Khaate Rehte Hai Unka Roza Nahin Hota.

Masla– Subah Saadiq Tak SEHRI Kha Sakte Hai.

Magar Ehtiyatan 5 Minute Pehle Khaana Pina Mauqoof Kar Dena Behtar Hai.

Masla– Kisi Bhi Roze Ke liye Sehri Shart Nahin.

Ye Jo Awaam Mein Mashoor Hai ke Nafli Roze Ke Liye Sehri Zaroori Hai.

Iski Koi Asl Nahi Balke Bagair Sehri Bhi Ye Roze Ho Jayenge.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Ramzan Ke Roza Kab Na Rakhne Ki Ijazat Hai
Content: Masla: Safar Wa Hamal (Pregnant) Aur Bachcha Ko doodh Peelana Aur Marz Aur Budhapa Ye Sab Roza Na Rakhne Ke Liye Uzr Hai. In Wujooh Se Koi Roza Na Rakhe To Gunehgaar Nahi. Masla: Safar Se Muraad Safar-e-Sharai Hai. Yaani Itni Door Jaane Ke Irada Se Nikle Ke Yaha Se Waha Tak 92 Kilometer Ya Usse Zyada Ho. Masla: Din Mein Safar Kiya To Us Din Ka Roza Iftar Karne Ke Liye Aaj Ka Safar Uzr Nahin. Albatta Agar Todhega To Kaffara Laazim Na Hoga Magar Gunehgaar Hoga. Masla: Hamal wali (pregnant) Aurat Ko Apni Jaan Ka Khauf Ho To Ijaazat  Hai Ke Wo Uss Waqt Na Rakhe. Masla: Mareez ko Marz Badhjaane, Ya Der Mein Achcha Hone, Ya Tandrust ko Bimaar Ho Jaane Ka Gumaane Gaalib Ho. To Inn Sabko Ijazat Hai Ke Us Din Roza Na Rakhe. Masla: Inn Surton Mein Gaalib Gumaan Ki Qaid Hai Mehez Weham (khyaal) Kaafi Nahi. Masla: Kisi Kaafir Ya Faasiq Doctor Ke Kehne Par Roza Todhna Jaayez Nahi. Agar Todhega To Kaffara Laazim Aayega. Masla: Jin Logo Ne Inn Uzro Ke Sabab Roza Todha Unpar Farz Hai ke Inn Rozo Ki Qaza Rakhe. Magar Hukm Ye Hai Ke Uzr Jaane Ke baad Doosre Ramzan Aane Se PEHLE Qaza Rakhle. Hadees Mein Farmaya Jispar Peechle Ramzan Ki Qaza Baaki Hai Aur Wo Na Rakhe Uske Iss Ramzan Ke Roze Qubool Na Honge Aur agar Roze Na Rakhe Aur Doosra Ramzan Aa Gaya. To Ab Pehle Iss Ramzan Ke Roze Rakhle Qaza Na Rakhe. (Yaani Ramzaan Ke Baad Rakhe) Masla: Khud Uss Musafir Ko Aur Uske Saathwale Ko Rozah Rakhne Mein Zarar (Nuqsaan) Na Pahunche To Roza Rakhna Safar Mein Behtar Hai Warna Na Rakhna Behtar. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Roze Ka Fidya Ke Masail
Content: Masla: Har Roze Ka Fidya Baqadre Sadqa-e-Fitr Hai. (Yaani 2 Kilo 50 gm Gehu, Ya Uski Qeemat) Masla: Shaikh-e-Faani. (Yaani Budha jiski Umr Aisi Ho Gayi Ke Ab Roz Baroz Kamzor Hi Hota Jayega). Jab Wo Roza Rakhne Se Aajiz Ho. (Yaani Na Ab Rakh Sakta Hai, Na Aainda Usme Itni Taaqat Aane Ki Koi Ummeed Hai Ke Roza Rakh Sakega Use Roza Na Rakhne ki Ijaazat Hai). Aur Har Roze Ke Badle Mein Fidya. (Yaani Dono Waqt Ek Miskeen Ko Bhar Pait Khana Khilana Uss Par Wajib Hai). Ya Har Roze Ke Badle Mein Sadqa-e-Fitr Ki Miqdar Miskeen Ko De De. Masla: Agar Aisa Budha Garmiyon Mein Ba Wajah e Garmi (Garmi Ki Wajah Se) Ke Roza Nahin Rakh Sakta. Magar Jaadho (Sardi) Main Rakh Sakega, To Ab Na Rakhe Aur Inke Badle Ke Jaadho Mein Rakhna Farz Hai. Masla: Agar Fidya Dene Ke Baad Itni Taaqat Aa Gayi Ke Roza Rakh Sakega, To Fidya Sadqa-e-Nafl Hokar Reh Gaya. Unn Rozo Ki Qaza Rakhe. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Itikaf (Ehtekaaf) ka bayan
Content:
Hadees– Ummul Momineen Siddiqa Radiyallahu T’aala Anha Se Riwayat Hai Ke Rasoolullah SallalLaahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam Razmzan Ke Aakhri Ashra (Aakhri 10 din) Mein Etikaf Farmaya Karte.

(Bukhari, Muslim)

Hadees– Hazrate Abdullah Ibne Abbas Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhuma Se Riwayat Hai Ke Huzoor Sallallaahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam Etikaf Karne Wale Ke Baare Mein farmaya Woh Gunaahon Se Baaz Rehta Hai Aur Nekiyon Se Use iss Qadar Sawab Milta Hai. Jaise Usne Tamaam Nekiyaan Ki.

(Ibne Maajah)

Hadees– Hazrate Husain Radiyalllahu Ta'ala Anhu Se Riwayat Hai ke Huzoore Aqdas Sallallaahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam Ne Irshad Farmaya Jisne Ramzan Mein 10 Dino Ka Etikaf Kar Liya To Aisa Hai. Jaise 2 Hajj Aur 2 Umrah Kiye.

(Baihaqi)

Masla– Masjid Mein Allah Ke Liye Niyyat Ke Saath Theherna Etikaf Hai Aur Uske Liye Musalman Aaqin (Aql Wala) Hona Aur Janabat (Napaaki) Aur Haiz Aur Nifaas Se Paak Hona Shart Hai, Baalig Hona Shart Nahin.

Etikaaf Ki 3 Qismein Hai.

1)      Wajib

2)      Sunnate Mu-akkida

3)      Mustahab

1) Etikaf-e-wajib

Ye Mannat Ka Etikaf Hai Jaise kisi Ne Mannat Maani Ke Fulah Kaam Ho Jayega. To Mai 1 Din Ya 2 Din Etikaf Karuga To Ye Etikaf Wajib Hai.

Iska Poora Karna Zaroori Hai.

Etikafe Wajib Ke Liye Roza Shart Hai. Bagair Roza Ke Saheeh Nahin.

2) Etikaf-e-Sunnate Mu-akkida

Ye Ramzan Ke Poore Ashraye Aakhira Yaani Aakhiri 10 Din Mein Kiya Jaaye.

Masla– 20’svi Ramzan Ko Suraj Doobte Waqt Etikaf Ki Niyyat Se Masjid Mein Maujood Ho Aur 30’svi Ko Suraj Doobne Ke Baad Ya 29’svi Ko Chaand Hone Ke Baad Nikle.

Masla– Agar 20’svi Taarikh Ko Baad Namaz-E-Magrib Etikaf Ki Niyat Ki To Sunnat-e-Mu-akkida Adaa Na Hogi.

Masla– Ye Etikaf Sunnat-e-Mu-akkida Kifaya Hai ke Agar Sab Chhodh de to Sab Pakre Jayein Aur Agar 1 Ne Bhi Kar Liya To Sab Choot Jaayein.

Masla– Iss Etikaf Mein Bhi Roza Shart Hai. Magar Wahi Ramzan Ke Roze Kaafi Hai.

3) Etikaf-e-Mustahab

Etikafe Wajib Aur Etikafe Sunnat-e -Mu-akkida Ke Alaawa Jo Etikaf Kiya Jaaye Wo Mustahab Hai.

Etikafe Mustahab Ke Liye Roza Shart Nahin, Ye Thodi Der Ka Bhi ho Sakta Hai.

Masjid Mein Jab Jab Jaaye Iss Etikaf Ki Niyat Karle Chahe Thodi Hi Der Masjid Mein Rehkar Chala Aaye Jab Masjid Ke Bahar Aa Jayega Etikaf Khatm Ho Jayega Aur Uski Niyyat Ye Hai.

Urdu Mein Iss Tarah Kahein Maine- Allah Ke Waaste Etikaf-e-Mustahab Ki Niyat Ki.

Masla : Mard ke Etikaf ke liye masjid zaroori hai.

Masla : Aurat apne ghar ki Uss jagah Mein Etikaf kare jo jagah Usne namaz ke liye mukarrar kar rakhi ho.

Masla : Agar aurat ne namaz ke liye koi jagah mukarrar Nahin Kar rakhi hai to ghar Mein etikaf Nahin kar sakti.

Albatta agar iss waqt yaani jab ke etikaf ka irada kiya kisi jagah ko namaz ke liye khaas karliya to Uss jagah etikaf kar sakti hai.

Masla: Aurat ke liye ye mustahab hai ke ghar Mein namaz padhne ke liye koi jagah mukarrar karle aur Use paak aur saaf rakhe.

Masla: Mutakif  (Etikaf karne wala) ko masjid se bagair uzr nikalna haram hai. Agar nikla to Etikaf toot jaayega, chaahe bhool kar hi nikla ho jab bhi.

Masla: Aurat  agar apne Etikaf ki jagah se nikli to Etikaf jaata raha, chaahe ghar hi Mein rahe.

Masla : Mutakif (Etikaf karne wala) masjid hi Mein khaaye peeye soye in Umoor ke liye masjid se bahar hoga to Etikaf jaata rahega, magar khaane peene Mein yeh Ehtiyaat lazim hai ke masjid aaluda na ho.

Masla : Mutakif ke siwa aur kisi ko masjid Mein khaane peene sone ki ijazat Nahin aur agar yeh kaam karna chaahe to Etikaf ki Niyat karke, masjid Mein jayein aur namaz padhein ya zikr-e-ilahi kare phir yeh kaam kar sakta hai.

Masla: Mutakif na chup rahe na baat kare balki quran-e-majid ki tilawat hadees ki Qeerat aur durood sharif ki kasrat kare, ambiya wa auliya wa saaleheen ke halat padhe.

Masla: Etikaf jis wajah se bhi toote Qasdan ya bila Qasd baharhaal qaza wajib hai.

Masla: Sunnat-e-muakkida Etikaf agar todha to jis din todha faqat Uss ek (1) din ki qaza hai poore das (10) dinon ki qaza wajib Nahin.

Masla : Agar nafl Etikaf todh De to iski qaza Nahin.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Taraweeh Namaz Ke Masail
Content:
Masla: TARAWEEH NAMAZ MARD WA AURAT SABKE LIYE SUNNAT-E-MUAKKIDA HAI ISKA TARK JAYEZ NAHI.

Masla: Jamhur ka mazhab ye hai ke Taraweeh Namaz bees (20) rakatein hain aur yehi ahadees se sabit.

Masla: Taraweeh ka waqt isha namaz ke farz padhne ke baad se subha sadiq nikalne tak hai.

Masla: Taraweeh Namaz Mein jamaat sunnat-e-kiffaya hai ke agar masjid ke sab log chhodh denge to gunehgar honge. Aur agar kisi ek (1) ne ghar Mein tanha padhli to gunehgar Nahin.

Masla: Taraweeh Namaz masjid Mein ba jamat Padhna Afzal Hai.

Agar Ghar Mein Jamat Se Padhi, To Jamat ke tark ka gunah na hua, magar woh sawab na milenga jo masjid mein padhne ka tha.

Masla: Agar fout ho jaayein, to inki qaza nahin aur agar qaza tanha padhli to Taraweeh namaz Nahi balki nafl mustahab hai.

Masla: Taraweeh Namaz Mein ek (1) baar quran-e-majid khatam karna sunnat-e-muakkida hai.

Logon ki susti ki wajah se khatam ko tark na kare.

Masla: Agar muqtadiyon par girani ho, to attahiyat ke baad  “ اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وآلِ ” par iktefa kare.

Masla: Agar ek (1) khatm karna ho, to behtar hai ke sattawis (27) shab mein khatm ho.

Phir agar Iss Raat Mein ya iske pehle khatm ho to Taraweeh ki namaz aakhir ramzan tak Barabar padhte rahe ke sunnat-e-muakkida hai.

Masla: Afzal ye hai ke ek imam ke peeche Taraweeh Namaz padhe aur do (2) ke peeche padhna chaahe, to behtar hai ke poore Taraweeh ki namaz par imam badle maslan aanth (8) ek (1) ke peeche aur baarah (12) doosre ke.

Masla: Ramzan sharif Mein witr jamat ke saath padhna afzal hai.

Khwah Usi imam ke peeche ji ke peeche isha wa Taraweeh namaz padhi hai ya doosre ke peeche.

Masla: Ye jayez hai ke ek (1) shakhs isha, wa witr padhaye doosra Taraweeh ki namaz.

Masla: Agar isha jamat se padhe aur Taraweeh ki namaz tanha, to witr ki jamat mein sharik ho sakta hai .

Masla: Agar isha tanha padhli, agarche Taraweeh namaz ba'jamat padhi to witr tanha padhe.

Masla : Muqtadi ko ye jaayez Nahin ke baitha rahe jab imam ruku karne ko ho, to khadha ho jaaye ke ye munafiqeen se mushabahat hai.

Allah Ta'ala irshad farmata hai “Munafiq jab namaz ko khade hote hain to thake jise."

(Sura-e-nisa aayat no 142).

Masla: Taraweeh Namaz ramzan ki har shab Mein bees (20) rakat sunnat-e-muakkida hai.

Baaz log ye karte hai ke che (6) din ya dus (10) Din Mein poora quran sharif soon kar poore ramzan Taraweeh ki namaz Nahin padhte.

Woh gunehgar aur fasiq hai.

Woh ramzan-ul-mubaraq ki baqiya (Baaqi) raaton Mein bhi Taraweeh namaz padhe.

Luqma dene ke masail

Masla: Imam agar bhool  jaaye to luqma dena jaayez hai aur agar imam ne luqma le liya to Uss par sajda-e-sahw Nahin.

Masla : Fauran luqma dena makrooh hai. Thoda tawaqquf (theherna) chahiye ke shayed imam khud nikaal le.

Masla: Imam ko makrooh hai ke muqtadiyon ko luqma dene par majboor kare.

Balki kisi doosri sureh ki taraf  muntaqil ho jaaye, ya doosri aayat shuru karde bashart ye ke Uska Wasl mufside namaz naho .

Masla: Gari (imam) ko pareshan karne ki Niyat se luqma dena haraam hai.

(Fatwa-e-razwiya)

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Agar Koi Tehrik (Tabligi Jamat) Haq Per Hai. Magar Us Tehrik Ke Alim Se Kuch Galtiya (Kufar) Ho Jaye.
Content:
Jisse Tehrik Par Kufr Ka Fatwa Lag Jaye.

Magar Tehrik Ke Jo Follower Hai Unka Tehrik Ke Alim Ki Galtiyo Se Koi Connection Naho.

To Kufr Ka Fatwa Sirf Tehrik Ke Aalim Per Lagega Ya Uske Follower Per Bhi?

Ek Tabligi Ka Ye Sawal Hai?

ANSWER

Tableegi Jamat Haq Par Nahin.

Ye Jamat Deobandi Mazhab Phailaane Ke Liye Qaim Ki Gayi Hai Aur Ye Jamat Din O Raat Khoob Zor O Shor Se Deobandi Mazhab Phaila Rahi Hai.

Is Jamat Ka Baani O Ameer Kubra E Wahabiya (Qasim Nanotwi, Rasheed Ahmad Gangohi, Khaleel Ahmad Ambethwi, Ashraf Ali Thanwi) Ko Sirf Musalman Hi Nahin.

Balkeh Musalman Ka Peshwa Aur Wali Maante Hain Aur Jo In Kubra E Wahabiyyah Ko Peshwa Mane Ya Kam Az Kam Musalman Jaane Woh Khud Kaafir O Murtad Hai.

Balkeh Jo In Kubra E Wahabiyah Ke Kufr O Azab Mein Shak Kare Woh Bhi Kaafir Hai.


Jo Sunni Tableegi Jamat Mein Shamil Hua Agar Use Tableegi Jamat Aur Uske Ameer Ke Kufriyaat Maloom Hain.

Phir Bhi Use Musalmaano Ki Jamat Samjhe Aur Uske Ameer Ko Musalam Samjhe To Be Shak Uspe Bhi Hukm Kufr Hai.

Aur Agar Maloom Nahin Hai Aur Us Jamat Ko Musalman Ki Jamat Aur Uske Ameer Ko Musalman Samjha.

To Uspe Hukm Kufr Nahin Magar Gumraah Zaroor Hai.


والله تعالٰی اعلم


Tableegi Jamat Ki Tafseel Allama Arshadul Qadri عليه الرحمة Ki Kitab “Tableegi Jamat” Ka Mutala Karein.


--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Jiski Dhadi Ghani Ho, To Kya Wazu Me Muh Dhoote Waqt Uska Jild Tak Pani Pahunchana Farz Hai?
Content: Ya Fir Sirf Dadhi Bheeg Jane Se Hi Wazu Me Ye Farz Adaa Ho Jayega Aur Ghusl Me Iska Kya Huqm Hai? Jawab: Agar Dhadi Ghani Nahin Hai Yani Chehre Ki Jin Hisso Pe Dhaadi Ke Baal Hain. Un Hisso Ki Jild (Khaal) Bhi Dikh Rahi To Jild (Khaal) Par Paani Bahana Farz Hai. Haan, Agar Dhadi Ghani Hai Keh Jild Nahin Dikhti. To Wazu Karne Mein Jild Tak Paani Pahunchana Zaroori Nahin. Agar Jild Tak Paani Nahin Bhi Pahuncha Jab Bhi Wazu Ho Jayega. Magar Ghusl Mein Dono Hi Sooraton Mein Jild (Khaal) Tak Paani Pahunchaana Farz Hai. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Shab E Qadr Ki Fazilat
Content: SHAB E QADR ke fazail Mein surah-e-qadr nazil hui, Allah Ta'ala ne isi shab Mein quran-e-haqim yaqbaargi lauhe Mehfooz se aasmaane duniya ki taraf nazil farmaya. Is Shab Mein Ibadat Karna Hazaar Mahino Ke Ibadat Se Behtar Hai. Is Shab Mein Hazrat Jibrael Alaihissalaam Aur Beshumaar Farishtein Duniya Ki Taraf Utarte Hain. Aur Jo Log Ibadat, Wa Riyazat Mein Mashgool Rehte Hain. Unhein Salaam Pesh Karte Hain Aur Unke Liye Istigfaar Karte Hain Aur Ye Farishte Subha Sadiq Tak Rehte Hain. Is Shab Ki Fazilat Mein Ahadees Bahot Hai. Yaha Kuch Zikr Ki Jaati Hain. Hadees: Hazrat Abu Hurairah Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu Se Riwayat Hai Ke Huzoor e Aqdas Sallal laahu Ta'ala Alahi Wasallam Ne Irshad Farmaya Ramzan Mein Ek Raat Aisi Hai jo Hazaar MAHEENON Se Behtar Hai. Jo iski Bhalaiyo Se Mehroom Raha Wo Beshak Mehroom Hai. (Nasai) Hadees: Hazrat Anas Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu Se Riwayat Hai Kehte Hai. Ramzan Aaya To Huzoor e Aqdas Sallallaahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam Ne Irshad Farmaya Ye Maheena Aaya Is Mein Ek Raat Hazaar Maheenon Se Behtar Hai. Jo Isse Mehroom Raha Wo Har Cheez Se Mehroom Raha Aur Uske Khair (Bhalai) Se Wahi Mehroom Hoga Jo Poora Mehroom Hai. (Ibne Majah) Hadees: Hazrat Salman Farsi Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu Se Riwayat Hai Huzoor E Aqdas Sallallaahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam Ne Farmaya- Aye Logo! Tumhare Paas Azmat Wala Barkat Wala Maheena Aaya Wo Maheena Jisme Ek Raat Hazaar Maheenon Se Behtar Hai. (Baihaqi) Hadees: Hazrat Abu Hurairah Raduyallahu Ta'ala Anhu Se Riwayat Hai ke Huzoor E Aqdas Sallallaahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam Ne Irshad Farmaya Jo Iman Ki Wajah Se Aur Sawab Ke Liye Shab e Qadr Mein Ibadat Karega Uske Agle Gunaah Bakhsh Diye Jaayenge. (Bukhari,Muslim) Lijhaza Iss Raat Mein Zyada Se Zyada Ibadat Karni Chahiye, Ye Raat Bahut Buzurgi Aur Fazilat Wali Hai. Iska Har Har Lamha Ibadat Mein Guzarna Chahiye, Is Raat ko Idhar Udhar Ghoom Kar Behuda Baaton Mein Guzaar Dena Sakht Mehroomi Hai. Baaz log Aisi Raaton Mein Raat Ke Aakhir Hisse Tak Jaagte Hain. Phir So Jaate Hain Aur Din Mein Uthte Hai. Iss Tarah unki Fajr Ki Namaz Qaza Ho Jo Jaati Hai. Jo Ke Jaayez Nahin. Jin Logo Ko Fajr Mein Bedaar Hone Ka Yaqeen Na Ho, unko Aise Waqt Mein Sona Hi Mana Hai. Aise Logo Ko Chahiye Ke Isha Ki Namaz Jama’at Se Padhkar So Jaaye Aur Fajr Ki Namaz Jama’at Se Padhe Ke Hadees Sharif Mein Hai ke Huzoor e Akram Sallallahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wasallam Ne Irshad Farmaya Jisne Ba Jama’at Isha Ki Namaz Padhi Goya Aadhi Raat Qayam Kiya (Ibadat Kiya) Aur Jisne Fajr Ki Namaz Jamat Se Padhi Goya Poori raat Qayam (Ibaadat) Kiya. (Muslim Sharif) Is Tarah Unko Raat bhar Ibadat Karne ka Sawaab Mil Jaayega Aur Fajr Ki Namaz Qaza Na Hogi. Is Raat Mein Qasrat Se Nawafil Padhe Aur Agar Zindagi Ki Qaza Namaze Ho To Behtar Ye Hai Ke Nawafil Ki Jagah Qaza Namaze Padhe Aur Taakhir Se Adaa Karne Ke Apne Rab Se Maafi Maange. Aala Hazrat Azimul Barkat Imam Ahmed Raza Fazil-e-Bareilvi Radiyallahu Ta'ala Anhu Irshad Farmate Hain Qaza Har Roz Ki Namaz Faqat 20 Rakaton Ki Hoti Hai 2 Fajr ki, 4 Zohar Ki, 4 Asar Ki, 3 Magrib ki, 4 Isha, 3 Witr. Agar Waqte Buloog Na Maloom Ho To Iske Liye Mard 12 Baras Aur Aurat 9 Baras Ki Umr Se Namaz Ka Aisa Hisaab Lagaye ke Takh Meena Mein Baaqi Na Reh Jaaye. Zyaada Ho Jaaye To Harj Nahin Aur Wo Sab Baqadre Taaqat Rafta rafta jald Ada Karein Kaaheeli Na Karein. Jab Tak Farz Zima Rehta Hai Koi Nafl Qubool Nahin Kiya Jaata. Niyat Unn Namazo Ki Iss Tarah Ho Maslan 100 Baar Ki Fajr Ki Qaza Hai. To Har Baar Yu Kahe Ki Sab Se Pehli Jo Fajr Mujhse Qaza Hui. Har Dafa Yehi Kahe. Yaani ek (1) Adaa Huyi, To Baakiyon Mein Jo Sabse Pehli Hai. Isi Tarah Zohar Wagairah Har Namaz Mein Niyat Karein. Jis par Bahut si Namaz e Qaza Ho Uske Liye Takhfeef Ki Surat Ye Hai ke 1) Farz Ki Teesri Chouthi Rakaaton Mein Surah-e-Fatiha Ki Tilaawat ki Jagah 3 Baar Subhanallah Kehkar Ruku Mein Jaaye. 2) Nez Tasbeehaate Ruku Aur Sujood Mein Sirf ek (1) Baar Subhana Rabbiyal Azeem Aur Subhana Rabbiyal A’ala Padhlena kaafi Hai. (Yaad Rahe Ye Tasbeehaat Ruku Mein Jaane Ke Baad aur Uthne Se Pehle Adaa Karein) 3) Attahiyyat Ke Baad Dono Durood Sharif Aur Dua Ke Bajaaye ALLA HUMMA SALE ALAA SAYYEDINA MUHAMADEU WA AALIHI Keh Kar Salaam Pher De. 4) Witro Mein Bajaye Dua e Qunood Ke 3 Baar Rabbig phirli Kehna Kaafi Hai. Tulu, Guroob Wa Zawaal Ke Alawa Qaza Namaze Har Waqt Ada Ki Ja Sakti Hai. (Fatawa-e-Razviya Jild 3, Safa No 621-622) ALLAH TAALA Ham Sab Logo Ko Iss Raat Ke Ehtaram Ki Taufeeq Ataa Farmaaye. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmed Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Ungliyo Ke Ishara Karke Kaha Tujhe Itni Talaqe 1,2,3. To Kitne Talaq Ka Hukm Lagega❓
Content:
ANSWER

Ungliyo Se Ishara Karke Kaha Tujhe Itni Talaqe To 1, 2, 3 Jitni Unliyo Se Ishara Kiya Utni Talaqe Huyi.


Yaani Jitni Ugliyaan Ishare Ke Waqt Khuli Ho Unka Aytebaar Hai.


Band Ka Aytebaar Nahi Aur Agar Wah Kehta Hai. Meri Murad Ungliyaan Ya Hatheli Thi To Yah Kahyal Diyaanat Motabar Nahi.


Aur Agar 3 Ungliyoon Se Ishara Karke Kaha Tujhe Uski Misl Talaq Aur Niyat 3 Ki Hoto 3.


Warna 1 Bayeen Aur Agar Ishara Karke Kaha Tujhe Itni Aur Niyat Talaq Ki Hai Aur Lafz Talaq Na Bola Jab Bhi Talaq Ho Jayegi.


(Durre Mukhtar)

Title: Agar Peshab Ke Baad Peshab Ke Qatre Tapakne Ki Bimari Ho To Kya Kare Namaz Kaise Ada Karein?
Content: Jawab: Jis Ko Peshab Ke Ba’ad Qatre Aate Ho Us Par Istebra Wajib Hai. Yani Koi Aisa Kaam Kare Jis Se Ruke Huye Qatre Nikal Jaayein. Huzoor Sadrushshariah Badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان Irshad Farmate Hain. Peshab Ke Ba’ad Jisko Ihtemal Hai Ke Koi Qatra Baaqi Rah Gaya Ya Phir Aayega Us Par Istebra (Yani Peshab Karne Ke Ba’ad Aisa Kam Karna Ke Agar Qatra Ruka Ho To Gir Jaaye) Wajib Hai. Istebra Tahalne Se Hota Hai. Ya Zameen Par Zor Se Paaon Maarne. Ya Dahine Paaon Ko Baayein Aur Baayein Ko Dahine Par Rakh Kar Zor Karne. Ya Balandi Se Neeche Utarne. Ya Neeche Se Balandi Par Chadhne. Ya Khankaarne. Ya Baayein Karwat Par Letne Se Hota Hai Aur Istebra Us Waqt Tak Kare Ke Dil Ko Itminaan Ho Jaaye. Tahalne Ki Miqdaar Baaz Ulama Ne 40 Qadam Rakhi Hai. Magar Sahih Ye Hai Ke Jitne Mein Itminaan Ho Jaaye Aur Ye Istebra Ka Hukm Mardon Ke Liye Hai Aurat Ba’ad Faarig Hone Ke Thodi Der Waqfah Kar Ke Taharat Karle. (Bahar E Shari’at Hissa 2 Safah 115 Istinje Ka Bayan) Aur Jise Qatra Aane Ki Aisi Bimaari Hai Ke Use Har Waqt Qatre Aate Hi Rahte Hain Aur Usko Itni Moohlat Nahin Milti Ke Wazu Kar Ke Farz Namaz Ada Kar Sake. To Namaz Ka Poora Ek Waqt Shuru Se Aakhir Tak, Isi Haalat Mein Guzar Jaane Par Usko Mazoor Kaha Jaayega. Jab Uzr Saabit Ho Jaaye, To Qatra Aane Se Wazu Nahin Tootega. MASLAN: Qatra Har Waqt Aata Hi Hai Wazu Kar Ke Zuhar Ki Farz Namaz Padh Raha Hai Ke Qatra Aa Gaya Namaz Faasid Ho Gayi. Kuch Der Ba’ad Phir Wazu Kar Ke Farz Namaz Padhna Shuru Kiya. Phir Darmiyaan E Namaz Qatra Aa Gaya. Is Tarah Zuhar Ka Poora Waqt Guzar Gaya Aur Zuhar Ki Farz Namaz Wazu Ke Saath Na Padh Saka. To Ab Uzr Saabit Ho Gaya, Uzr Saabit Hone Ke Ba’ad Us Uzr Se Wazu Nahin Tootega. Huzoor Sadrushshari’ah Badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان Irshad Farmate Hain Har Woh Shakhs Jisko Koi Aisi Bimaari Hai Ke Ek Waqt Poora Aisa Guzr Gaya Ke Wazu Ke Saath Namaz E Farz Ada Na Kar Saka Woh Mazoor Hai. Uska Bhi Yahi Hukm Hai Ke Waqt Mein Wazu Kar Le Aur Aakhir Waqt Tak Jitni Namazein Chahe Us Wazu Se Padhe. Us Bimari Se Uska Wazu Nahin Jaata. Jaise Qatre Ka Marz. Ya Dast (Julaab) Aana. Ya Hawa Kharij Hona. Ya Dukhti Aankh Se Paani Girna. Ya Phode, Ya Naasoor Se Har Waqt Rutoobat Bahna. Ya Kaan, Naaf, Pistaan Se Paani Nikalna Ke Ye Sab Bimariyaan Wazu Todne Wali Hain. In Mein Jab Poora Ek Waqt Aisa Guzar Gaya Ke Har Chand Koshish Ki Magar Taharat Ke Saath Namaz Na Padh Saka To Uzr Saabit Ho Gaya. (Bahar E Shari’at Hissa 2) Мαzєє∂ Ιяѕнα∂ Fαямαтє Нαιи Mazoor Ka Wazu Us Chiz Se Nahin Jaata Jis Ke Sabab Mazoor Hai. Haan, Agar Koi Dosri Chiz Wazu Todne Wali Paai Gayi, To Wazu Jaata Raha. Maslan: Jisko Qatre Ka Marz Hai. Hawa Nikalne Se Uska Wazu Jaata Rahega Aur Jisko Hawa Nikalne Ka Marz Hai Qatre Se Wazu Jaata Rahega. (Bahar E Shari’at Hissa 2 Safah 94 Istehaza Ka Bayan) Isi Ѕαfαн Ρє Мαzєє∂ Ιяѕнα∂ Fαямαтє Нαιи Farz Namaz Ka Waqt Jaane Se Mazoor Ka Wazu Toot Jaata Hai. Jaise Kisi Ne Asr Ke Waqt Wazu Kiya Tha, To Aftab Ke Doobte Hi Wazu Jaata Raha. (Yani Mazoor Ko Har Waqt Ke Liye Naya Wazu Karna Hoga) JAB BEEMARI THIK HO JAAYE AUR UZR BAAQI NA RAHE. TO WAZU KE TAMAM EHKAAM WAHI HAIN JO EK SEHAT MAND KE LIYE HAIN. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Itna Baarik Kapda Jisse Badan Chamakta Ho Usse Namaz Padhi.
Content:
To Namaz Ka Kya Hukm Hoga?

ANSWER

Namaz Na Huyi.


Itna Baarik Kapda Jis Se Badan Chamakta Ho Satrr Ke Liye Kaafi Nahi.

Us Se Namaz Padhi To Na Huyi.

Yoonhi Agar Chaadar Me Se Aurat Ke Baalo Ki Seeyaahi Chamke Namaz Na Hogi.

Baaz Log Baarik Saadiyaa’n’ Aur Tahband Baandh Kar Namaz Padhte Hai Ki Raan Chamakti Hai.

Un Ki Namaaze Nahi Hoti Aur Aisa Kapda Pahanna Jisse Satrre Aurat Na Ho Sake Alaawa Namaz Ke Bhi Haraam Hai.


Reference

Bahar-E-Shari’At Hissa Teesra Safa 37

Title: Aurat Ne Mannat Maani Ki Kal Namaz Padhegi, Ya Roza Rakhegi. Dusre Din Haiz Aa Gaya To Ab Kya Hukm Hoga
Content:
Jawab:

Uski Qaza Kare.

Mas’Ala: Mannat Maani Ki Falaa’n’ Makaam Par Namaz Padega Aur Us Se Kam Darje Ke Makaam Par Ada Ki Ho Gayi.

Maslan Masjid e Haram Me Padhne Ki Mannat Maani Aur Masjid e Qudus, Ya Ghar Ki Masjid Me Ada Ki.

Aurat Ne Mannat Maani Ki Kal Namaz Padhegi, Ya Roza Rakhegi.

Dusre Din Haiz Aa Gaya To Qaza Kare.

Aur Agar Yah Mannat Maani Ki Halat e Haiz Me 2 Raka’At Padhegi To Kuch Nahi.

(Durre Mukhtar)

Mas’Ala: Mannat Maani Ki Aaj 2 Rakat Padhega Aur Aaj Na Padhi To Is Ki Qaza Nahi, Balki Kaffara Dena Hoga.

(Aalamgeeri)

Note :- Iska Kaffara Wahi Hai Jo Kasam Todne Ka Hai.

Yaani Ek Gulam Aazad Karna.

Ya 10 Miskino Ko Dono Waqt Pait Bhar Kar Khana Khilana.

Ya Kapda Dena.

Ya 3 Roze Rakhna.

Bahar-E-Sahari’At Hissa 4 Safa 19

--------------------------------------------------

Title: Ek Shakhs Ka Kapde Ka Karobar Hai. Wo Karobar Misal Ke Tor Par Cash Me 50rs Aur Udhar Me Taishuda Muddat Par 80rs Me Bechta He.
Content:
Agar Udhar Payment Me Jyada Deri Ki Surat Me Khariddar Ko Extra Raqam Percentage Aur Din Ke Hisab Se Deni Padti Hai.

Jo Pehle Se Sab Ko Pata Hoto Hai.

Bechne Wale Apna 80rs Alag Rakh Leta Hai Aur Extra Raqam Alag Rakh Ke Aakhir Saal Usko Bina Saeab Ki Niyat Se Khairat Karta Hai.

Ab Sawal Ye Hai Ki.

1. Aisa Karobar Karna Kaisa?
2. Kya Karobar Se Milne Wala Nafa Jayez Hai.
3. Kya Gair Muslim Jo Extra Dete Hai Usko Bhi Sadqa Karna Padega.

Note: Extra Raqam Lene Ki Wajah Market Rule Hai.

Dukandar Kisi Dusre Se Kharidenge To Yahi Chiz Dukandar Ke Sath Hogi Aur Agar Extra Raqam Lene Se Mana Karde To Payment Dukandar Ko Waqt Par Nahi Milega.

ANSWER

Ye Surat Sood Ki Hai Ke Udhaar Me Jitne Din Barhte Jaayein Raqam Barhti Jaaye.

Agar Musalman Se Len Den Hai To Haraam Hai.

Aur Kafir Ko Zaayed Raqm Dena Bhi Na Jaayez Hai.

Jab Ke Kafir Se Zaayed Raqm Begair Gadr O Bad Ahdi Ke Lena Jaayez Hai.

Title: Alhamdu Padh Kar Ruku Me Chala Gaya, Na Koi Surah Padi Na Dua-E-Qunoot Padha. To Witr Namaz Ka Kya Hukm Hai❓
Content: Jawab: Ruku Se Laute Aur Surah Wa Dua-E-Qunoot Padhe Aur Phir Ruku Kare Aakhir Me Sajda-E-Sahw Kare. Dua-E-Qunoot Padhna Bhool Gaya Aur Ruku Me Chala Gaya, To Na Qiyam Ki Taraf Laute, Na Ruku me, Na Ruku Me Padhe. Aur Agar Qiyaam Ki Taraf Laut Aaya Aur Dua-E-Qunoot Padha Aur Ruku Na Kiya To Namaz Faaseed Na Hogi. Magar Gunahgaar Hoga Aur Agar Sirf Alhamdu Padh Kar Ruku Me Chala Gaya Tha To Laute Aur Surat Wa Dua-E-Qunoot Padhe. Phir Ruku Kare Aur Aakhir Me Sajda-E-Sahw Kare. Yoonhi Alhamdu Bhool Gaya Aur Surah Padhli, To Laute Aur Surah Fatiha Aur Surah Wa Dua-E-Qunoot Padh Kar Phir Ruku Kare. (Aalmgeeri) Bahar-E-Shari’At Chautha Hissa Safa No 08 -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Biddat Kya Hai?
Content:
Istilahe Shara (Islami Boli) Mein Biddat Aisi Cheez Ke Ijaad Karne Ko Kehte Hai.

Jo Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ke Zahiri Zamane Mein Na Ho, Khwah Woh Cheez Deeni Ho, Yaa Duniyawi.
Ashi'atul Lamaat Jild Awwal Safa 125

Biddat Ki 3 Qisme Hai.

(1) Biddat E Hasna
(2) Biddat E SayyeAa
(3) Biddat E Mubaah

Biddat E Hasna - Wah bidat hai jo Quran Wa hadees ke wasul wa Qawaaid ke Mutabik ho Aur Unhi par Qiyas kiya gaya ho.

Uski 2 Qisme Hai.

Awwal Biddat E Waajiba - Jaise Quran wa hadees Samajhne ke liye Ilm e nahw ka seekhna Aur Gumraah phirke maslan khaarji, Raafji, Qadyaani Aur wahabi Wagairah par Radd ke liye Dalaayi Kaayam Karna.

Dosra Biddat e Mustahabba - Jaise Madarso ki taamir Aur har wah nek kaam jiska Rawaaj ibtidaa-e-zamaana me nahi tha.

Jaise Azaan ke baad Salaat Pukarna. Durre Mukhtar Baabul Azaan me hai ki Azaan ke baad Assalatu Wa Sallamu Alaik Ya Rasoolullah ﷺ Pukarna Maahe Rabi-Ul-Aakhir San 781 Hijri me jaari huwa Aur Yah biddat e Hasna Hai.

Biddat e sayyeAa - Wa biddat hai Jo Quran wa Hadees ke Usul wa Qawaid ke Mukhtalif ho.

Biddat e SayyeAa ke 2 Qisme Hai

Awwal Bidat e Muharram - Jaise Hindustan ki Mukhajja Taajiyadari.(Fatawa-E-Aziziya Risala Taajiyadaari Aala Hazrat) Aur Jaise Ahle Sunnat wal jama'At ke khikaaf Naye Aqeede waalo ke Mjaahib.

AshiAtullm Aat jild Awwal Safa 125

Dosra Biddat e Makrooha - Jaise Jumma wa Eidain ka Khutba Gaire Arbi me Padna.

Biddat e Mubaah - Jo Cheez Huzoor ﷺ ke jaahiri zamana me naho Aur jiske karne na karne par Sawab Wa Azab naho use biddat e Mubaah Kahte Hai.

Jaise khaane peene me Kushaadgi Ikhtiyar karna Aur Rail gaadi wagairah me Safar karna.

Anwaare Shari'At Safa 21, 22

-------------------------------------------------- 
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah 
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri 
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Hazrat Kuch Log Jo Ye Kehte Hain Ke Fatawa Razawiya Aam Karenge. Kehte Hain Ke Kahin Aala hazrat Ne Ojhdi Ko Najayez Nahi Kaha Hai. Uska Khana Jayez Hai.
Content:
ANSWER

Yahi Chand Afrad Ojhdi Ko Jayez Maante Hai.

Halaanke Fatawa Razawiya Me Hai Ke Saail Ne Poocha

Qurbani Ka Gosht Laa Mazhab Yaani Hindu Wagaira Ko Dena Jaayez Hai Ya Nahi?

IsKe Jawab Me Imam E Ahl E Sunnat Ne Farmaya:

Bhangi Wagaira Kisi Kafir Ko Qurbani Ya Aur Koi Sadqah Dena Jaayez Nahi Hargiz Na Dein.

Phir Poocha: Qurbani Ki Aant Qurbani Ke Gosht Me Shamil Ki Jaawe Ya Kya?

IsKe Jawab Me Imam E Ahl E Sunnat Ne Farmaya “Ojhdi Aante Jin Ka Khana Makrooh Hai.

Taqseem Na Ki Jaayein.

Balke Dafn Kardi Jaayein Aur Agar Bhangi Utha Le Mana Ki Haajat Nahi”.

(Fatawa Razawiya Jild 6 Safah 167)

Ye Irshad E Imam Ba Aala Nida Munaada Ke Ojhdi Aur Aant Ajza E Gosht Se Nahi.

Kyu Ke Gosht Ko To Farma Diya Ke Kafir Ko Dena Jaayez Nahi,

Har Giz Na Den.

Aur Ojhdi Aur Aant Ko Farmaya Ke Bhangi Utha Le To Mana Ki Haajat Nahi.

Agar Wo Ajza E Gosht Se Hote To Zarur Mana Ki Haajat Hoti Aur Bhangi Ko Le Jaane Dena Jaayez Na Hota.

Neez Saail Ne Poocha “Badan E Haiwaan Ma’kool Ul Lahm Me Kya Kya Cheezein Makrooh Hain?

Iske Jawab Me Imam E Ahl E Sunnat Farmate Hain

7 Cheezein To Hadeeso Me Shumar Farmaayi Gayi

1) Murara Yaani Pitta,
2) Masaana Yaani Phunkna,
3) Haya Yaani Farj
4) Zakar
5) Unsayain
6) Guddah
7) Dam Yaani Khoon E Masfooh

Hamare Imam E Azam رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہ Ne Farmaya Khoon To Haraam Hai.

Qur’an E Azeem Me Iski Tahreem Mansoos Aur Baaqi Cheezein Main Makrooh Samajhta Hu Ke Saleemut Taba’ Log In Se Ghin Karte Hain Aur Inhe Gandi Samajhte Hain.

Aur Allah Ta’ala Farmata Hai.

(Surah A’raaf Aayat 157)

Ye Nabi ﷺ In Par Sab Gandi Cheezein Haraam Farmayega.

Haashiya Allama Tahtawi Me Hai. قال ابو حنيفة الخ. Is Tarah Yanabee’ Me Hai كما سيا تي Aur Mukhtar O Mo’tamad Ye Hai Ke Karaahat Se Muraad Karaahat E Tahrimi Hai.

Yahan Tak Ke Imam Malik Ul Olama Abu Bakr Mas’ood Kashani Quddisa Sirruh Ne Ba Lafz E Hurmat Ta’beer Ki, Alamgeeri Me Hai.

اما بيان ما يحرم اكله من اجزاء الحيوان سبعة

Aur Ahl E Ilm Par Mustatar Nahi Ke Istedlal Bil Fahwa Ya Ijra E Illat E Mansoosa Khaassah Mujtahad Nahi

كما نص عليه العلامة الطحطاوي طبعا لمن تقدمه من الاعلام

Aur Yahan Khud Imam E Azam رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہ Ne Ashiya E Sittah Ki Illat E Karaahat Par Nass Farmaya Ke Khabaasat Hai.

Ab Faqeer Mutawakkilan Alallahi Ta’ala Koi Mahall E Shak Nahi Janta Ke Kursh Yaani Ojhdi Im’aa Yaani Aante Bhi Is Hukm E Karaahat Me Dakhil Hain Aur Beshak Kursh (Ojhdi) Wa Im’aa (Aante) Masaana Se Agar Khabaasat Me Zaayed Nahi To Kisi Tarah Kam Bhi Nahi Masaana.

Agar Ma’dan E Baul Hai.

Shakanba Wa Raoda Wa Makhzan E Fars Hai.

Ab Chaahe Ise Dalaltun Nass Samajhiye Khwa Ijra E Illat E Mansoosah”.

(Fatawa Razwiya Jild 8 Safah 324,326)

Ab Arz Hai Ibaratun Nass Se Jab Karaahat E Tahrimi Sabit Hai.

To Dalalatun Nass Se Karaahat E Tahrimi Hi Saabit Hogi? Ya Kuch Aur?

Yu Hi Mantooq Me Agar Hukm Karaahat E Tahrimi Ka Hai To Maskoot Me Ba Ijra E Illat E Mansoosah Yahi Hukm E Karaahat E Tahrimi Sabit Hoga Ya Kuch Aur?

Agar Karaahat E Tahrimi To Ye Fatawa Razaviya Aam Karenge Ka Naara Lagaane Waale Aur Maslak E Alahazrat Ki Wafa Daari Ko Mahsoor Karne Waale Chand Afraad Ojhdi Ko Barmala Jaayez Keh Kar Imam E Ahl E Sunnat Quddisa Sirruh Ke Mukhalif Aur Maslak E Alahazrat Ke Baaghi Hue Ya Nahi?

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah

Title: Jis Tarah Fajar Maghrib Or Isha Me Imam Buland Awaz Se Surah Padte Hai
Content:
Toh Zohar, Asar, Maghrib Ki Teesri Rakat Or Isha Ki Teesri Aur Chauthi Rakat Me Surah Buland Awaz Se Kyu Nahi Padhte?

Jawab:

1) Sirri O Jahri Namazo Ki Wajah Sab Se Barh Kar Yahi Hai Ke Huzoor ﷺ Se Isi Tarah Saabit Hai.

Dosri Wajah Ye Bayaan Ki Jaati Hai Ke Namaz Ke Farz Hone Ke Waqt Makkah Me Chand Hi Sahaba The Aur Kuffar E Quraish Unhe Takleefein Diya Karte The.

Unhe Ibaadato Se Rokte The.

Lehaza Jis Waqt Ye Apne Gharo Me Hote (Zohar O Asr Ke Waqt) To Namaz Me Sirri (Ahista) Qirat Ki Jaati Aur Jis Waqt Kuffar Sote Rehte (Fajr O Isha) Ya Bazaaro Ki Janib Chale Jaate (Maghrib Ke Waqt) To Namazo Me Qirat Jahri (Buland Awaz Se) Ki Jaati.

Aur Hijrat Ke Baad Bhi Yahi Ma’mool Raha Agarche Wo Sabab Baaqi Na Raha.

Lehaza Is Par Huzoor ﷺ Ne Mudaawmat Farmayi To Ye Hum Par Wajib Ho Gaya.

Jab Kisi Baat Ka Shariyat Ne Hukm Diya Ho, To Us Me Chu Chira Karna, Ya Sabab Poochna Nahi Chahiye, Ke Allah O Rasool Ne Wahi Hukm Diya Jo Hamare Liye Mufeed Aur Isi Par Iman Kaafi.

Phir Bhi Sirri O Jehri Qirat Se Mutalliq Kuch Baatein Zikr Kar Deta Hu.

Namaz Ke Aksar Af’aal O Ahkaam Un Chupi Hui Chizo Aur Hikmato Par Mabni Hain Jin Ki Haqiqat O Halaat Sirf Ahl E Quloob Par Zahir Hoti Hai.

Phir Aam Log Bhi Ahkam Me Unke Sath Shareek, Jaise Din Ki Namaz Me Ikhfa (Ahista Qirat) Wajib Aur Raat Ki Namazo Me Jahr (Awaz Ke Sath), Kyu Ke Raat Lutf Ki Nishani Hai Aur Uski Tajalli Lateef Aur Din Qahr Ki Alamat Hai Aur Uski Tajalli Shadeed, Aur Jehr Ki Tajalli Sirr Se Bahot Qawi Aur Garam Hai.

Lehaza Ta’deel Ke Liye Tajalli E Qahri Ke Sath Thandi Tajalli Rakhi Gayi Aur Lutfi Ke Sath Garam, Jumuah Aur Eidain Me Din Hone Ke Bawajood Jahr Ka Hukm Hua Ke Hazireen Ki Kasrat Ki Wajah Se Uns Hasil Hota Hai Aur Dahshat Khatam Hoti Hai.

Namaz Asl Me 2 Hi Rekaat Hai.

Phir Ba'Halat E Iqamat Maghrib Me 1 Aur Zohr, Asr O Isha Me 2 Rakatein Zaayed Kardi Gayi.

Lehaza Farz Ki 2 Hi Rakat Me Qirat Farz Hai.

--------------------------------------------------

Title: Baaz Aurte Khaas Kar Budhe Aurte Yani Dadi Nani Ye Kehte Hai Ke Kale Rang Ka Shirt/Kurta Pant/Pajama Joota Ya Topi Nahi Pehenni Chahiye Achi Baat Nahi Hoti.
Content:
Hazrat Kya Ye Sahi Hai Aur Kya Koi Rang Aisa Hai Jis Ko Islam Ne Mana Kiya Pehenne Aur Kon Sa Rang Pehenna Acha Hai?

ANSWER

Jooto Ke Rang Ke Hawaale Se Koi Hadees Meri Nazar Se Nahi Guzri.

Haan Kuch Logo Ke Hawaale Se Ye Maloom Hota Hai Ke Chunke Ka’ba Shareef Ke Ghilaaf Ka Rang Kaala (Black) Hai Is Liye Wo Kaale Joote Nahi Pahente.

Ye Koi Shara’i Daleel Nahi Hai.

Lekin Un Ki Imani Kaifiyat Ka Ek Haal Hai Ke Wo Adaban Kaale Joote Nahi Pahente.

Albatta Peela Joota Pahenna Pasandeeda Hai.

Hadrat Maula Ali Karramallahu Ta’ala Waj’hahul Kareem Farmate Hain Ke Jo Peele Rang Ka Joota Pehnega Us Ke Afkaar (Tentions) Me Kami Hogi (Yaani Gam Aur Fikrein Kam Hongi).

Aur Kaala Joota Pahenna Na Pasandeeda Hai Ke Is Se Huzn O Malal Me Izaafa Hota Hai.

Jaleelul Qadr Sahaabi Hadrat Abdullah Bin Zubair Siyaah Joote Pahenne Se Mana Farmate The Ke Is Se Afkaar (Huzn O Malal Fikrein) Paida Hote Hain.

Title: Agar Kisi Ke Paas Chandi Naho. Sirf Sona Ho Aur Nisab Se Kam Ho (Maslan 4 Tola Ya 6 Tola)
Content:
Or Kuch Rupaye Bhi Ho (2-4 Hazar).

To Kya Uspe Zakat Farz Hogi Or Agar Sirf Rupaye Ho To Kitne Rupaye Par Zakat Farz Hai.

Jawab:

Kisi Ke Paas Sona Aur Chaandi Hai.

Agar Dono Nisaabein Hain To Ye Zuroori Nahi Ke Sone Ko Chaandi Ya Chandi Ko Sona Qaraar De Kar Zakat Ada Kare.

Balke Har Ek Ki Alaheda Wajib Hai.

Agar Dono Me Se Koi Bhi Ba Qadre Nisaab Nahi To Sone Ki Qeemat Chandi Ya Chaandi Ki Qeemat Ka Sona Farz Kar Ke Milaaye.

Agar Sone Ki Qeemat Ki Chaandi, Chaandi Me Milaaye To Nisaab Ho Jaati Hai Aur Chaandi Ki Qeemat Ka Sona Me Milaaye To Nahi Hoti.

Ya Bil Aks (Is Ka Ulta ,To Waajib Hai Ke Jis Se Nisaab Poori Ho Wo Kare).

Isi Tarah Agar Kisi Ke Paas Sona Chandi To Nahi.

Magar Jama Shuda Paise Hain To Un Paiso Ki Nisab Bhi Sona Ya Chandi Me Se Jis Se Ho Jaaye Wo Saahib E Nisaab Hoga Aur Saal Guzarne Par Us Par Zakat Farz Hogi.

Waazeh Rahe Ke Jama Shuda Paise Bhi Sona Chaandi Ke Hi Hukm Me Hain.

Lehaza! Chandi Sona Aur Rupiya Milakar

Jiska Nisaab Bane Chandi Ke Aetbaar Se Bane To Zakat Ada Ki Jaye.

Ya Sone Ke Nisaab Ko Pahuche To Sone Ke Aetbar Se Diya Jaaye.

Khalis Rupiye Jo Sone Ya Chandi Ke Nisaab Ki Qimat Ko Pahuch Jaaye Uski Zakat Hai.

Nisaab Se Kam Me Zakat Nahi.

Aap Usme Sadqa De Sakte Hai.

Sadqa Dene Ke Liye Nisaab Ka Hona Zaruri Nahi.

--------------------------------------------------

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri

Title: Kya Hum English Roman Me Aise Lafz Likh Sakte Hai?
Content:
InSha Allah
MaSha Allah
Alhamdulillah
SubhaanAllah
JazakAllah
Assalamu Alaykum

Likh Sakte Hai.

Kisi Mawlana Ka Kehna Hai Ke Iski Ijazat Nahi Hai Aur Iska Urdu Ya English Tarjuma Likha Jaye.

Jawab:

Arabi Ke Ilawa Dosri Zaban Me Jab Arabi Ke Alfaz Likhe Jaate Hain. To Unme Lafz Nahi, Balke Talaffuz (Pronunciation) Ka Etebaar Kiya Jaata Hai.

Jaise Lafz ”سُــــبْحانَ الله ” Me Arabi Likhne Me Huroof Jitne Hain, English Roman Me Wahi Huroof Nahi Likhe Jaate.

Balke Pronunciation Ke Etebaar Se ”Sub’HanAllah” Likha Jaata Hai.

Jab Ye Baat Samajh Me Aa Gayi, To Lafz E إنْ شَــاءَاللّــهُ Me Bhi Koi Shaks Aisa Nahi Jo Koi Dosra Maana Leta Ho.

Har Koi Jis Zaban Me Bhi Likhega Us Ka Maqsood Yahi Hota Hai “Agar Allah Chaahe” Aur Agar Har Zaban Me In Aur Sha Ko Alag Alag Likha Jaaye. To Phir Ye Bhi Eteraaz Hoga Ke Bolne Me Bhi In Aur Sha Ko Alag Alag Bola Jaaye.

Halaanke Har Koi Ek Sath Ek Saans Me InshaAllah Kehta Hai.

Lehaza Ye Dosri Zabaan Me Likha Jaaye To Ijazat Hai.

Jaise Urdu Me Bhi Lafz E In Sha Allah Mila Kar Hi Likhna Ma’roof Hai.

Aise Hi English Me Bhi Koi Zaruri Nahi Ke Alag Alag Likha Jaaye.

Magar Arabi Me Jab Likha Jaaye To 3 Tukdo Me Alag Alag Hi Likha Jaaye.

Jawab:

Ek Waqt Mein 4 Biwi Se Ziyadah Nahin Rakh Sakte Maslan Zaid Ki 4 Biwiyaan Hain.

Phir Un 4 Biwiyo Me Se 2 Talaq De Di Aur Phir Kisi Dosri 2 Auraton Se Shadi Kar Li.

Is Soorat Mein Zaid Ki Ek Waqt Mein 4 Hi Biwi Hai Magar Us Ki Shadi Ki Tadaad 6 Ho Gayi.

Is Misaal Ko Saamne Rakh Kar Masla Samjhein Ke Jin Buzurgon Ki Shaadi Ki Tadaad 4 Se Ziyadah Hai, Woh Isi Taur Pe Hai Yani Shadi Ki Kul Tadaad Aur Ek Waqt Mein Sirf 4 Biwi Ye Is Se Kam Rahti.

Hazrat E Imam Husain رضى الله تعالى عنه Se Mutalliq 40 Shadi Ki Riwayat Meri Nazar Se Nahin Guzri.

Albattah Imam E Hasan رضى الله تعالى عنه Ne Taqreeban 100 Nikah Farmaya.

Title: Ek Muslim Ke Ghar Me 2 Gair Muslima Aurate Kaam Karti Hai Aur 1 Muslim Aadmi Kaam Karta Hai.
Content:
To Ghar Ki Malkin Ne Muslima Aadmi Se Kaha Ki Waha Quran Shareef Rakhi Hui Hai.

Utha Kar Gair Muslima Aurat Ko Dedo Usne Utha Kar Laya.

Lekin Gair Muslima Aurat Ko Nahi Diya.

Bola Jao Ghar Ki Malkin Se Bolo Ki Mai Waha Rakh Diya Hu Aake Utha Le.

Wo Aurat Jakar Batati Hai Ki Wo Aadmi Aisa Bola Hai.

Lekin Malkin Chillane Lagti Hai. Us Aurat Ko Aur Bolti Hai Jakar Utha Kar La Aur Wo Aurat Gair Muslim Hai Aur Napak Hai.

To Iska Gunehgaar Kaun Hai AADMI, AURAT, MALKIN

Jawab:

Agar Quran Shareef Juzdaan Mein Nahi Tha Aur Malkin Ke Hukm Se Us Musalman Mard Ne Gair Muslima Aurat Ko Diya Aur Us Gair Muslima Aurat Ne Quran Shreef Ko Bila Haail Chhooa.

To Is Soorat Mein Malkin Aur Musalman Mard Dono Gunahgaar Hue.

Gair Muslim Aurat Ka Apne Kufr Ki Wajah Se Pooara Wajood Hi Gunaah Mein Dooba Hai Usse Is Amal Ki Kya Shikaayat.

Title: Kya Shafai Maslak Ke Piche Hanfi Maslak Ki Namaz Mukammal Hoti Hai?
Content:
ANSWER

Aala Hazrat Azeemul Barakat Saiyyiduna Iamam Ahmad Raza Fazil E Barailvi رضي الله تعالي عنه Se Sawal Hua Keh Hanfi Shaf’ee Ke Peechhe Namaz Padhe To Jaayez Hai Keh Nahin Aur Agar Shaf’ee Namaz Padha Raha Hai Aur Hanfi Aaya To Jama’at Mein Shareek Ho Ya Nahin Jawab Mein Irshad Farmate Hain:


Agar Shaf’ee Taharat O Namaz Mein Faraiz O Arkaan E Mazhab E Hanfi Ki Ri’aayat Karta Hai.

Uske Peechhe Namaz Bila Karahat Jaayez Hai.

Agarche Hanfi Ke Peechhe Afzal Hai Aur Agar Haal E Ri’aayat O Adam E Ri’aayat Ma’loom Naho To Qadr E Karahat Ke Saath Jaayez Aur Agar Aadat E Adam E Ri‘aayat Ma’loom Hoto Karahat Shadeed Hai Aur Agar Ma’loom Ho Keh Khas Is Namaz Mein Ri’aayat Na Ki To Hanfi Ko Uski Iqteda Jaayez Nahin.

Uske Peechhe Namaz Na Hogi Soorat E Awwal O Dom (Ya’ni Pahli Aur Dosri Soorat) Mein Shareek Ho Jaaye Aur Soorat E Som (Ya’ni Tisri Soorat) Mein Sharik Naho Aur Chaharum (Ya’ni Chauthi Soorat) Mein To Namaz Hi Batil Hai.
(Fatawa Razwiya Jild 3 Safah 228)


Lihaza Agar Zaid Ko Ma’loom Hai Keh Shaf’ee Imam Mazhab E Hanfi Ke Sharaait O Faraaiz Ki Ri’aayat Taharat O Namaz Mein Karta Hai.

To Uske Peechhe Namaz Padhe Aur Agar Kuchh Na Ma’loom Hoto Bhi Iqteda Karle Aur Agar Ma’loom Ho Keh Ri’aayat Nahin Karta Hai.

To Iqteda Na Kare Aur Agar Iqtida Karli Hai To Phir Se Padhe Aur Agar Yaqeen Hai Keh Ri’aayat Nahin Kiya Maslan Dekh Liya Hai Keh Mazhab E Hanfi Me Jo Chizein Farz Hain Un Mein Se Koi Farz Ada Nahin Kiya Maslan Chuthai Sar Ka Masah Nahin Kiya Sirf Kuchh Baal Bhiga Liya To Aisi Soorat Me Uske Peechhe Hanfi Ki Namaz Nahin Hoi Aisi Namazon Ko Phir Se Padhna Zaid Par Farz Hai.


Hanfi Ko Hanfi Imam Ki Iqtida Karni Chahiye Ke Ye Afzal Hai.

Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah

Title: Kisi Ne Khuda Se Pucha Aye Khuda Tune Hazrat Ali Ka Mawlud (Birth) Kaabe Ke Andar Kyu Karwaya?
Content:
Khuda Ne Kaha:-
Soon, Aye Bande Sirf Ye Zaahir Karna Mera Maqsud Tha

Jab “DULHAN” Mustafa Ke Ghar Se Hai,
To “DULHA” Khuda Ke Ghar Se Hona Chahiye !

Yaume Wiladat Maula Ali Alahe Salaam Mubarak

Jawab:

Sab Se Pehli Baat To Ye Jo Qaul Zikr Kiya Gaya Man Gharat Aur Jhoot Par Mabni Hai Aur Allah Ta’ala Ki Janib Jhoot Baandhna Sakht Haraam.

Balke Munjir Ilal Kufr Hai.

Aqlan Bhi Ye Baat Jihaalat Par Mabni Hai.

Kya Ma’az-Allah Jis Tarah Hum Apne Ghar Me Rehte Hain.

Allah Ta’ala Bhi Apne Ghar Me Rehta Hai?

Yahan Allah Ke Ghar Se Muraad Allah Ka Zikr O Ibadat Karne Ka Khaas Muqaam Hai.

Jahan Bandah Allah Ki Ibadat Kare

Ab Sawal Me Zikr Jumle Par Gaur Karein

Agar Us Se Muraad Yahi Hai Ke Allah Ta’ala Us Ghar Me Rehta Hai.

To Aisa Iman Rakhna Kufr Hai.

Qur’an E Paak Ki Aayat Ka Mafhoom Hai.

Ke Beshak Sab Se Pehla Ghar Jo Logo Ki Ibadat Ke Liye Banaya Gaya Wo Makkah Me Hai.(Yaani Khana E Kaabah)

Aur Mazeed Ye Ke Hazrat Ali Karramallahu Ta’ala Waj’hahul Kareem Ki Wiladat Kaabah Me Hui Ya Nahi.

Is Baare Me To Ulama O Muhaddiseen Ka Kaseer Ikhtelaaf Hai Aur Raajeh Yahi Ke Apki Wiladat Kaabah Me Na Hui.

Magar Hazrat Hakeem Bin Hizaam RaziAllahu Ta’ala Anh Se Mutalliq To Kaseer Riwayat Hain Ke Apki Wiladat Khana E Kaabah Me Hui.

Neez Kaabah Ke Andar Wiladat Hona Koi Mamooli Baat Nahi.

Agar Aisa Hi Hota To Ye Baat Dhaki Chupi Na Rehti.

Balke Mash’hoor Aur Apke Fazail Me Mazkoor Hoti.

Halanke Motabar Muhaddiseen O Muwarrikheen Ne Hazrat E Ali Karramallahu Ta’ala Waj’hahul Kareem Ke Fazaail Ka Kai Safahaat Par Mushtamil Zikr Farmaya.

Magar Kahin Maulood E Kaabah Ka Zikr Na Kiya.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa E Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Hazrat Shariyat Ke Hissab Se Kya Hukka Parlour Kholna Jayez Hai ? Kya Iski Kamaayi Halaal Hai ?
Content:
1) Kya Isme Grahakon Ke Liye Free WIFI Bhi Rakha Jasakta Hai ?

2) WiFi Ka Grahak Kya Istemaal Karta Hai. Us Se Parlour Ke Maalik Par Kuch Hukm Lagega?

3) Aur Agar Us Hukka Parlour Me Grahakon Ke Liye TV Bhi Lagaya Gaya Ho. To Kya Us Hukka Parlour Ki Kamaayi Halaal Hogi ?

4) Aur Agar Grahakon Me Ladke Ladkiyan Bhi Aate Ho. To Kya Us Hukka Parlour Ki Kamaayi Halaal Hogi ?

ANSWER

Is Zamaane Me Khususan Shehro Me Gallib Yahi Hai Ke Hukka Lahw O La’ib Ke Taur Par Istemal Kiya Jata Hai.

Haan Baaz Honge Jo Islah E Sehat Ke Liye Istemal Karte Honge.

Is Liye Hukka Palour Kholna Na Chahiye.

Haan Chunke Wo Ek Jaayez Cheez Ka Iwaz Hota Hai.

Is Liye Us Ki Kamaai Haraam Nahi.

1) Agar Maloom Ho Ke Wo Shakhs Wifi Ke Zariye Fisq Ka Hi Kaam Karega To Use Na Diya Jaaye. Bahar Haal Malik Se Muaakhza Nahi Hona Chahiye.

2) Tv Aur Is Tarah Ke Tamam Alaat E Lahw O Laib Rakhna Na Jaayez Aur Jitne Log Us Ko Istemal Karenge Hotel Wala Bhi Gunahgar Hoga.

Aur Tv Dekhaane Ka Bhi Iwaz Le To Khas Tv Dikhane Ki Kamaai Na Jaayez Hogi.

Haan Paise Sirf Hukka Ke Badle Me Le To Wo Kamaai Halal Hai.

Magar Tv Dikhaane Ka Gunah Zarur Hoga.

3) Ladke Ladkio Me Mahaarim Bhi Ho Sakte Hain. Isi Tarah Miyaan Biwi Bhi Ho Sakte Hain.

Jab Ke Ye Aam Hai To Is Me Harj Nahi,

Haan Agar Khaas Aubaash Aur Nalaayeq Qism Ke Log Jo Masti O Fisq O Fujoor Karne Hi Ke Liye Aate Hon Unhe Roka Jaaye.

Waazeh Rahe Ke Jitne Kaam Haraam Hain Unke Badle Me Paise Le To Wo Kamaai Haraam Hogi Aur Agar Jaayez Cheez Ke Badle Raqam Le To Wo Kamaai Halal.

Aur Rahe Haraam Af’aal Aur Najaayez Kaam To Us Ka Gunah Hoga.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa E Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: SHARIYAT ME NAMASTE KAHENA KAISA OR ISKE MAYENE NAHI JANTE HAI.
Content:
KAHENA KAISA OR JANTE HUE KAHENA KAISA.

ANSWER

Alahazrat Azeemul Barkat Sayyedna Imam Ahmad Raza Fazil E Barielwi Quddisa Sirruhul Azeez Se Daryaft Kiya Gaya Ke Jawab E Salam O Kuffar O Hanaadik (Hinduism) Kin Alfaz Me Diye Jaayein Aur Khud Bhi Zarurat O Be Zarurat Un Ko Salam Kare To Kis Taur Se?

Is Ke Jawab Me Aap Tahreer Farmate Hain “Kafir Ko Be Zarurat Ibteda Ba Salam Naa Jaayez Hai.

نص عليه في الحديث والفقه

Aur Hindustan Me Wo Tareeq E Tahiyyat Jaari Hain Ke Ba Zarurat Bhi Unhe Salam E Shara’i Karne Ki Hajat Nahi.

Maslan Yahi Kaafi Ke Lala Saab, Babu Saab, Munshi Saab, Ya Be Sar Jhukaaye Sar Par Hath Rakh Lena Wagaira Zaalik.

Kaafir Agar Be Lafz E Salam, Salam Kare To Aise Hi Alfaz E Raayeja Jawab Me Bas Hain Aur Ba Lafz E Salam Ibteda Kare To Ulama Farmaate Hain Jawab Me Wa Alaik Kahe.

Magar Ye Lafz Yahan Makhsoos Ba Ahl E Islam Thehra Hua Hai Aur Wo Kafir Bhi Ise Jawab E Salam Na Samjhega.

Balke Apne Sath Istehza Khayal Karega To Jis Lafz Se Munaasbat Jaane Jawab De Le.

AgarChe Salam Ke Jawab Me Salam Hi Keh Kar. (Fatawa Razvia)

Lehaza Ba Darja E Majburi Namaste Ya Namaskaar Bol Sakta Hai.

Lekin Yu Hi Bila Zarurat Kehna Naa Jaayez Hai.

Bachna Behtar Hai. Aur Jab Ke Is Ka Maana Ye Ho Ke Mai Sar Jhukaata Hu Tumhare Liye To Aisa Kehne Se Mana Kiya Jaayega.

Jab Us Ne Sar Jhukaaya Nahi Sirf Kaha Hai Aur Awam Is Ka Matlab Bhi Nahi Jaanti To Sakht Hukm Na Hoga.
Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam

Title: Aksar Logo Ka Naam Kisi Na Kisi Ambiya Kiram Ya Kisi Muazzaz Maqaam Ya Kisi Azmat Wali Shakhsiyat Ke Naam Par Hota Hai.
Content:
Aur Unki Galat Harkato Ke Baiz Log Unka Naam Lekar Unhe Galiyan Dete Hain.

Iss Par Gali Dene Wale Par Kya Huqm Hai

Aur Agar Kehne Wala Kafir Hai Aur Mubarak Naam Ki Azmat Se Naashina Hai.

Aur Agar Wo Muslim Huqoomat Me Hai.

To Kya Uski Shikayat Wahan Ki Police Ko Ki Ja Sakti Aur Jiske Saamne Ye Behurmati Ki Gayi Unn Par Gairate Imaani Ke Tehat Kya Hukm Hoga.

Hanlanki Jiske Saamne Naamke Saath Gali Di Gayi To Uss Sunne Wale Ne Kehne Wale Ki Takfeer Ki Aur Ussko Aaina Dikhaya.

Lekin Kya Faqat Usski Itni Hi Zimmadari Banti Hai.

Kya Shariat Me Takfeer Karne Wale Ki Kuchh Giraft Hogi, Ke Usko Kuch Zayaada Karna Tha.

ANSWER

Jiska Naam Ambiya E Kiram Ke Naam Par Ho Uska Naam Adab Se Liya Jaaye.


Maslan Kisi Ka Naam Muhammad Hai To Adab Se Ye Naam Liya Jaaye.


Magar Uski Galat Harkat Par Naam Lekar Gaali Di To Us Par Hukm E Kufr Nahin.

Isliye Keh Yahan Gali Dene Wale Ki Muraad Sarkar E Aqdas صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم Ko Gali Dena Ya Sarkar E Aqdas صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم Ke Naam Ki Tauheen Karna Nahin.


Balkeh Iski Muraad Woh Shaks Hai. Jiska Naam Muhammad Hai Aur Usne Kuchh Galat Kiya Jiski Wajah Se Gaali Di.


Jisne Gaali Dene Wale Musalmaan Ki Is Wajah Se Takfeer Ki Woh Taubah Kare.
Aur Jo Pahle Se Kaafir Hai Usse Iski Kiya Shikayat Woh To Pahle Hi Allah تعالى Aur Uske Rasool صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم Ka Inkar Karke Kaafir Hai.


--------------------------------------------------

Title: शादी के बाद शौहर का नाम अपने नाम के साथ लगाना कैसा है?
Content:
पूरा पढ़िए, और हक़ीक़त जानिए


जो औरतें शादी के बाद अपने वालिद का नाम हटाकर अपने शौहर का नाम अपने नाम के साथ लगाती हैं वह ज़रा ग़ौर करें कि यह “हराम” है।


जी हाँ, हराम है।


मिसाल के तौर पर किसी बहिन का नाम शादी से पहले “फ़ातिमा मक़सूद अली” था, उसकी शादी हुई “साजिद सिद्दीक़” से, अब उसने अपने वालिद का नाम हटाकर, नाम रख लिया “फ़ातिमा साजिद सिद्दीक़” या “फ़ातिमा साजिद”।


तो यह हराम है क्योंकि दीन ए इस्लाम इसकी इजाज़त नहीं देता कि कोई अपने वालिद का नाम हटाकर अपने शौहर का नाम या अपने शौहर के ख़ानदान का नाम अपने नाम के आगे लगाए।


यह कुफ़्फ़ार का तरीक़ा है हमें इसको अपनाने से बचना चाहिए ।


रसूलुल्लाह (स.अ.व) ने इरशाद फ़रमाया कि जिसने अपने नाम को अपने बाप के नाम के अलावा, अपने नाम में किसी दूसरे का नाम जोड़ा(जो उसका बाप नहीं) तो उस पर अल्लाह की और फ़रिश्तों की लानत है।


सुन्नन इब्ने माजा: 2599


हज़रत ए अबु ज़र (रज़िo) रिवायत करते हैं कि उन्होंने सुना कि रसूलुल्लाह (स.अ.व) ने इरशाद फ़रमा रहे थे कि अगर किसी ने अपने वालिद के सिवा अपनी शिनाख़्त किसी और से मिलाई तो उसने कुफ़्र किया और जिसने उस शख़्स से ख़ुद को जोड़ा जो उसका बाप नहीं है तो वह अपना ठिकाना जहन्नुम में बना ले।

सहीह बुख़ारी :3508
सहीह मुस्लिम :61
यह कुफ़्फ़ार का तरीक़ा था आज हमारी बहिनें बड़े शौक़ से इस अमल को अपना रही हैं।
याद रहे बाप का रिश्ता किसी नये रिश्ते के आने के बाद ख़त्म नहीं होता। और औलाद की शिनाख़्त और पहचान उसके वालिद से ही होगी।

अपने शौहर का नाम अपने नाम के साथ लगाना यह कुफ़्र और हराम का बा’इस है।
शौहर और बीवी का रिश्ता ख़ून का रिश्ता नहीं होता है और नाम सिर्फ़ ख़ून के रिश्ते से ही जोड़ा जाता है।
अगर किसी वजह से उसकी तलाक़ होती है तो इस सूरत में वह कितने नामों को बदलेगी।


अगर शौहरों का नाम अपने नाम के साथ लगाना सही होता तो रसूलुल्लाह (स.अ.व) की बीवियों ने भी अपने नामों के साथ ज़रूर लगातीं क्योंकि उनके शौहर तो दुनिया के अफ़ज़ल तरीन शख़्स थे।


हज़रत ए ख़दीजा (रज़िअल्लाहु अनहा) हमेशा ख़दीजा बिनते ख़ुवालिद रहीं।


हज़रत ए आयशा सिद्दीक़ (रज़िअल्लाहु अनहा) हमेशा आयशा बिनते अबु बक्र सिद्दीक़ रहीं।


यहाँ तक कि रसूलुल्लाह (स.अ.व) की वह बीवियां जिनके बाप काफ़िर थे आपने उनके नाम का लकब भी कभी नहीं बदला।


जैसे- सफ़िया बिन्ते हुअयी (रज़िअल्लाहु तआला अनहा)। (हुअयी यहूदी था और रसूलुल्लाह (स.अ.व) का जानी दुश्मन था)।


जन्नत में औरतों की सरदार हज़रत ए फ़ातिमा (रज़िअल्लाहु तआला अनहा) हमेशा फ़ातिमा बिन्ते मुहम्मद (स.अ.व) रहीं उन्होंने हज़रत ए अली (रज़ि) का नाम अपने नाम के साथ नहीं जोड़ा।


जिस बहिन ने भी ग़ल्ती से ऐसा किया है वह अल्लाह से सच्ची तौबा करे और अपने वालिद का नाम वापस अपने नाम के साथ जोड़ ले।


हमें अपने आमालों का हिसाब अल्लाह को देना है और यह सरासर अल्लाह और उसके रसूल (स.अ.व) की नाफ़रमानी है।


अल्लाह हमें समझने और इस पर अमल करने की तौफ़ीक़ दे आमीन

ANSWER

Haan Apna Nasab Tabdeel Karna Haraam Hai.

Ke Jaise Koi Shaikh Tha Shauhar Khan Hai To Apne Apko Khan Kahe.

Title: Hazrat Jo Aaj Kal Bissi Chalate Hai Log, Wo Chalana Kaisa? Jaisa Ke Example 10 Log Mil Kar 1000rs Ek Ke Paas Jama Karte Hai.
Content:
Phir 10 Logo Ki Naam Ki Chitti Banayi Gayi.

Phir Usme Se Ek Chitti Utha Kar Naam Dek Kar Usko Pure 10,000 De Diye.

Ye Har Mahine Aisi Hi Chalta Raha Pure 10 Mahine.

Is Me Logo Ko Faida Bhi Hota Hai.

Inko Ek Khatta Paisa Mil Jata Hai.

Unka Koi Bhi Kaam Nikal Jata Hai.

Chitti Me Aaye Hue Shakhs Ko Paiso Ki Zarurat Naho To Wo Kisi Or Ko De Deta Hai.

Unme Se Ek Ko Jisko Zyada Zaurat Hai Paiso Ki To Aisi Log Lakho Ki Bhi Bissi Chalate Hai.

To Is Me Sharai Hukum Kya Hoga.

Kya Aisa Kar Sakte Hai?

ANSWER

Agar Beesi Aisi Hai Ke Us Me Jitni Raqm Lagaayi Jaaye Wo Puri Milti Hai.

Koi Nuqsan Nahi Hota To Jaayez Hai.

Aur Agar Kam Ya Zyada Paise Dene Padein To Jaayez Nahi.

Title: RAJJAB KE MAHINE KA KHAAS AMAL
Content:
Rajjab Ki Pehli Tareekh Ko Fajar Ki Namaz Ke Baad Ek Mutthi Aata (Wheat Flour) Nikalna Hai Aur Dusre Dibbe Me Ya Kisi Dusre Bartan Me Rakhna Hai.


2nd Day Bhi Aapko Aata Nikalna Hai,

Magar 2 Muthhi

3 Rajjab Ko 3 Muthhi Aata

4 Rajjab Ko 4 Muthhi Aata Rozana 4 Din Tak Nikal Kar Ek Bartan Me Jama Karein Aur 4 Tareekh Ko 11 Baje Se Pehle Pehle Fatiha Dilana Hai Wo Is Tarah Ke.

Aate Ko Bade Thaale Me Daal Kar Barbar Barabar 2 Hisse Karna Hai Aadhe Ka Halwa Aur Aadhe Ka Parathha Banana Hai.
Aur 4 Qutub Ke Naam Par Fatiha Dilana Hai.

4 Qutub Ke Naam Ye Hain.

1. Qutubddeen Khawaja Abdul Kareem

2. Qutbuddeen Khawaja Abdur’Rasheed

3. Qutbuddeen Khawaja Abdur’Raheem.

4. Qutbuddeen Khawaja Abdul Jaleel.

In Chharon Ke Naam Par Fatiha Dilana Hai 12 Baje Se Pehle Pehle.

Ye Band Rozi Khulne Aur Rozi Ki Barkaton Ka Khaas Amal Hai.

Jise Aala Hazrat Ne Fatawa Razviya Me Irshaad Farmaya Hai.

Kya Aisa Koi Amal Fatawa Razaviya Me Hai?

Jawab:

Mere Ilm Me Aisa Koi Amal Fatawa Razavia Shareef Me Is Tafseel Ke Sath Zikr Nahi.

Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam

Haan! Shama Shabistan E Raza Me Ek Amal Zikr Hai Ke Hamesha Pure Maheene Ek Ek Mutthi Atta Jama Karein Aur Maheene Ke Akhir Me Chaaro Aqtaab Ke Naam Fatiha Karein Aur In Charo Aqtaab Ki Tareekh E Wisaal 4 Rajab Hai.

Title: Kuch Log Mahaz Thodi Si Taklif Ki Wajah Se Namaz Baith Kar Padhte Hai.
Content:
To Unka Aisa Karne Se Qiyaam Maaf Ho Jayega.

Aur Jo Thodisi Taklif Ki Wajah Se Namaz Baith Kar Padhi Unpar Kya Hukam Hai.

ANSWER

Khade Hone Se Mahaz Kuch Taklif Hona Uzr Nahi.


Balki Qiyaam Us Waqt Saaqit Hoga (Yaani Maaf Hoga) Ki Khada Na Ho Sake, Ya Sajda Na Kar Sake, Ya Khade Hone, Ya Sajda Karne Me Zakhm Bahata Hai.

Ya Khade Hone Me Qatra Aata Hai. Ya Chauthai (1/4) Satrr Khulta Hai. Ya Qira’at Se Majbure Mahaz Ho Jaata Hai.


Yoonhi Khada Ho Sakta Hai. Magar Usse Marz Me Zyaadati Hoti, Ya Der Me Achha Hoga, Ya Naa Qabil E Bardasht Taklif Hogi To Baith Kar Padhe.

Aaj Kal Umuman Yeh Baat Dekhi Jaati Hai Ki Jahaan Zara Bukhar Ya Khafif Si Taklif Huyi Baith Kar Namaz Shuru Kardi.


Haalanki Wahi Log Usi Halaat Me 10-10, 15-15 Minute.

Balki Zyaada Khade Hokar Idhar Udhar Ki Baate Kar Liya Karte Hai.

Unko Chahiye Ke In Masail Se Aagaah Ho Aur Jitni Namaze Bawujud Qudrate Qiyaam Baith Kar Padhi Ho.

Unka Lautaana Farz Hai.


Yoonhi Agar Waise Khada Na Ho Sakta Tha Magar Laathi, Ya Deewar, Ya Admi Ke Sahaare Se Khada Hona Mumkin Tha To Wo Namazein Bhi Na Huyi.

Unka Pherna Farz Hai.

Title: Ye Baat Meri Yaad Rakhlena Aur Agar Koi Inkar Kare To Aye Ali Aur Hussain Ke Muhibban
Content:
Unlogo Ko Meri Taraf Bhejdena Aur Kehna Hawala (Reference) Unse Lelo!

Zimmedari Aapki Nahi Zimmedari Meri Hai Aur Meri Zimmedari Par Garaj Ke Duniya Ko Batate Firo!

Kya?

Ye Sunne Waali Baat Hai, Ummul Momineen Hazrat Aaisha Siddiqa RadiAllahu Ta’ala Anha Ghar Baithi Hain.

Walid-E-Girami Sayyeduna Abu Bakr Siddiq RadiAllahu Ta’ala Anhu Paas Baithe Hain.

Ummul Momineen Hazrat Aaisha Siddiqa RadiAllahu Anha Puchti Hain: “Ya Abat! Inni Ara? Yu Kassiru Kann Nazra Ila Wajhe Aliyyun?”

Abbajaan! Mai Hamesha Dekhti Hun, Jab Kabhi Aap Majlis Me Ikatthe Baithe Hon, To Aap Tik Taki Baandh Kar Hazrat Ali Ka Chehra He Takte Rehte Hain Iski Wajah Kya Hai?

Ye Baat Gharke Andar Horahi Hai, Aur Khud Bahar Saare Jahan Ko Bata Diya!


Sayyeduna Siddiq-E-Akbar RadiAllahu Anhu Jawab Dete Hain: Beta, “Wallazi Nafsi Beyadihi”, Us Rab Ki Kasam Jiske Kabza-E-Qudrat Me Meri Jaan Hai.

“Samne Tu RasoolAllahi SallAllahu Alaihi Wa Aalihi Wa Sallam Ya Qool,

“AN NAZRU ILA WAJHE ALIYYUN IBADATUN”

Farmaya Beti Aaisha Maine Rasool-E-Pak SallAllahu Alaihi Wa Aalihi Wa Aalihi Wa Sallam Ki Zuban-E-Pak Se Suna, Aapne Farmaya:
“ALI KE CHEHRE KO TAKNA BHI IBADAT HAI."

Agar Kisiko Door Se Dekhne Ka Mauka Mile Aur Maula Ali Sher-E-Khuda Doorse Kahi Jaarahe Hon Aur Unke Chehre Pe Nazar Na Pad Sake, To Uska Kya Hoga, Usko Ye Sa’aadat Milegi Ya Nahi Milegi?

Allah Ki Izzat Ki Qasam! Hazrat Aaisha Siddiqa Ki Dusri Riwayat Hai. Hadees Ki Dusri Kitab Me Farmati Hain: Haan Jo Ali Sher-E-Khuda Ka Chehra-E-Pak Na Dekh Sake, Usko Bhi Sunlo, Farmaya Huzoor Ne Ye Bhi Farmaya:

“AN NAZRU ILA ALIYYUN IBADATUN”

Chehra To Na Tak Sake, Jidhar Ali Jaarahe Hon, Bus Unko Jaate Hue Taklena (Dekhlena) Bhi Ibadat Hai!!

Jisne Chehra Dekhliya Ibadat Karli, Jisne Ali Ki Pusht Dekhli Ibadat Karli!

Ab Aapke Liye Puchraha Hun, Ek Teesra Sawal Kiya Maine Ummul Momineen Se Ke Wo To Sharaf Unlogo Ko Tha Jo Us Zamane Me The.

Aur Hum Jo Aaj Hain Na Zahiran Chehra-E-Pak Tak Sakte Hain Na Pusht Mubarak Dekh Sakte Hain.

Zahiran Nahi Dekhsakte. To Hum Bhi To Baithe Hain Hame Bhi Koi Milega Ke Nahi Us Bargah Se Khayrat?

Hazrat Aaisha Siddiqa Ki Teesri Riwayat Hai, Teesre Muqaam Par Farmati Hain: Haan Tumhe Bhi Ajr Milega! Kyunki Huzoor Ne Ye Bhi Farmaya:

“ZIKRU ALIYYUN IBADATUN”*

Khuda Ki Qasam Jo Ali Ko Dekh Na Sake Sirf ALI KA ZIKR Karle Ye Bhi Ibadat Hai!

Ali Ka Zikr Karna Ibadat Hai, Arey Muhibban-E-Ali, Ali Ka Zikr Karna Ibadat Hai, Isliye Aao Thodi Der Milkar Ibadat Kare Khuda Ki, Kaho ALI ALI.”

(SallAllahu Alaihi Wa Ala Aalihi Wa Sahbihi Wa Baarak Wa Sallam, KarramAllahu Wajhahul Kareem,
Ridwanullahi Ta’ala Alaihim Ajmaeen)

Shaykh-Ul-Islam Dr. Tahir-Ul-Qadri

Beshak Hazrate Ali Karmullah Wajhul Kareem Hi Azeem Shakhsiyat Hi.

Mufti Sahab Riwayat Ek Baar Padhkar Rehnumai Karde?

Kye Dr TAHIRUL QADRI K Refrence Say Hi.

ANSWER

Jo Puri Riwayat Bayan Ki Gayi Wo Mere Ilm Me To Nahi Haan Al Mustadrak Ki Riwayat Me Ye Zikr Hai Ke “Ali Ko Dekhna Ibadat Hai” Yahan Ibadat Sawaab Ke Ma’na Me Hai.

Magar Is Se Ye Jumla Kehna Ke Aao Ibadat Karein Khuda Ki Kaho Ali Ali, Bahot Sakht Jumla Maloom Hota Hai.

Aur Khusoosan Tahirul Kadri Jis Par Hamare Ulama Ne Kufr Ka Fatwa Saadir Kiya Hai.

Us Ki Baato Tareero Bayanaat Ko Sunne Parhne Se Parhez Karein Aur Apne Iman Ki Hifazat Karein.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa E Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Hazrat Ibne Abbas Radiallaho Anho Se Jo Waqiya Se Marvi Hai. Jisme Hazrat Abu Bakar Radiallaho Anho Farmate Hai.
Content:
Ki Jo Bhi Huzur Sallalaho Alaihi Wasallam Ko Poojta Ho Wo Sunle Ke Huzur Ab Nahi Rahe.

Is Hadees Ki Tafseer Aur Wajahat Farma Kar Mashkoor Karein.

Wahabi Log Is Hadees Ko Bata Kar Kehte Hai Ki Abu Bakra Radiallaho Anho Ka Bhi Yahi Aqida He Ki Huzur Nahi Rahe.

Title: Muqtadi Dua-E-Qunoot Se Farig Na Huwa Tha Ki Imam Ruku Me Chala Gaya. To Ab Kya Hukm Hoga Muqtadi Par❓

Title: Hazrat Baag-E-Fidak Maangne Rasool (ﷺ) Ki Beti.
Content:
Hazrat Abu Bakar Siddik (RadiAllahu Ta'ala anhu) Ke Adalat Me Gayi.

Toh Unhe Haq Kyu Na Mila.

Agar Beti Rasool (ﷺ) Ki 4 Hai.

To Haq Mangne Ek Hi Kyu Gaye?

Agar Beti Rasool (ﷺ) Ki 4 Hai.

To Kisi Aur Beti Ke Bachche Kyu Nana Ke Godh Me Nahi Khele?

Agar Beti Rasool (ﷺ) Ki 4 Hai.

To Kisi Aur Beti Ke Bachche Karbala Me Nana Ki Shariyat Bachane Kyu Na Pohoche?

Jawab:

Ye Rafizio Ki Mann Ghadat Riwayat Hai Ke Hazrat Fatimatuz Zahra رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہا Hazrat Abu Bakr رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہ Ke Paas Baag E Fidak Ka Mutaalba Karne Gayin Aur Aapne Na Di.

Balke Ahadees Se Sabit Hai Ke Huzoor ﷺ Ne Sayyeda Ko Baag E Fidak Na Diya.

Tafseel Ke Liye Fatawa Faizur Rasool Jild 1 Safah 91 Ka Mutaala Karein.

Huzoor ﷺ Ke Aur Sahebzadio Se Jo Aulaad Huin Un Ka Inteqal Bachpan Me Ho Gaya.

Yaani Aur Kisi Sahebzadi Se Huzoor ﷺ Ke Nawase Itni Umr Ko Na Pohche Jo Godh Me Khelte.

Aur Isi Tarah Waqia E Karbala Ke Waqt Bhi Koi Maujood Na The.
