Title: Hazrat Ek Islami Behen Ka Sawal Hai.
Content:
Meri Saas Ke Meri Hamesha Ladai Hoti Rehti Hai Phir Un Ki Galti Hote Huwe Bhi Me Bade Samajh Kar Mafi Mang Leti Hu Mere Aur Sasu Maa Ke Darmiyan Jab Jhagde Huwe Woh Kisi Rishtey, Gharelu, Kaam, Ya Apne Rishtey Dar Se Baat Karna Ki Bunyad Pe Nahi Huwee…Sirf Aur Sirf Khana Peene Pe Jhagde Hote Hain.

Kiya Mera Itna Bhi Haq Nahi Hai Ke Me Din Bhar Kaam Karke Sakoon Se Pet Bhar Ke Khana Khao Q K Me Jab Apne Bacho Ko Doodh Pilatee To Mera Seena Khichta Tha Aur Din Bhar Kaam Karne Ke Bad Jab Dastar Khawn Par Bait Te To Me Intizar Karti Ke Mujhe Ab Khana Milega Q K Khana Meri Saas Maa Hi Parosti Hain Aur Meri Saas Mujhe Dihan Bhi Nahi Dete Ke Usse Khana Dena Chayee Aur Mehfil Me Family Ke Sath Baith Kar Khana Mangna Mujhe Uncomfortable Lagta Hai.

Lekin Mere Husband Samajh Jate Aur Apne Plate Ka Khana Mere Plate Me Dal Dete Aur Kehte Yeh Khana Mene Ziyada Le Liya Hai Tum Please Khalo.Aur Me Samajh Jati Mere Husband Meri Pait Bharne Ke Liye Aisa Karte Hai. Aur Mere Husband Apni Maa Ko Bohut Pyar Karte Hai Aur Har Din Wahi Gharpe Khich Khich Chothi Chothi Bato Pe Jaghde Karna Tana Marna Kafi Dino Se Bardasht Karrahi Hu…Aur Mera Beta Mehez 2yrs Ka Hai Uske Sath Bhi Unka Rawayaa Khuch Dosre Pote Ke Barabar Nahi Hai Aur Mere Sasur Hamesha Mujhe Kehte Ke To Sabr Kar Aur Dosri Jaghe Ya Meri Nanad Ke Ghar Pe Shikayat Karte Aur Aise Me Mere Khuda Ke Elawah Mera Is Haqiqat Ko Koi Nahi Samajh Raha Hai..To Kiya Me Apne Husband Se Alag Hone Ka Mutalba Kar Sakti Hu ?

Kya Phir Mujhe Ek Bete Ko Apne Maa Se Juda Karne Ke Wajhe Se Sharriyat Me Pakad Hoti…Yah Aap Batao Me Kiya Karu Me Din Ba Din Ghutan Mehsus Karrahi Hu.Aur Husband Ke Liye Rozi Ke Liye Duwa Ki Darkhast Jazak Allah

ANSWER

Agar Aurat Ke Liye Alag Rehne Ke Liye Us Ghar Me Aisi Jagah Hai Jahan Tanhaai Ho Sakti Ho Yaani Khilwat Paayi Ja Sakti Ho Ab Aurat Ko Shauhar Se Dosra Ghar Lene Aur Us Ke Maan Baap Se Alag Karne Ka Haq Nahi. Is Surat Me Shauhar Ko Uske Walidain Se Juda Karne Par Pakad Hogi.

Aurat Ko Chahiye K Wo Sabr Kare, Aur Zaban Darazi Na Kare, Na Jawab De. Balke Unse Apne Walidain Jaisa Bartaao Kare, Aur Un Ke Gussa O Gazab Ko Bardasht Kare.

Rozana Fajr Ki Sunnat Aur Farz Ke Darmiyaan 100 Martaba Sub’HanAllahi Wa BiHamdihi Sub’HanAllahil Azeem Wa BiHamdihi Astaghfirullah. Parhen إنْ شَــاءَاللّــهُ الْعَــزيْز Rizq Me Barkat Hogi.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Dar Al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Hum Dargah Shareef Par Kyu Jaate Hai? Uske Kya Fawayid Hai? Mazarat Par Haziri Dene Ka Silsila Kab Se Shuru Hua?Aur Mazarat Par Aurto Ka Hazir Hona Kaisa Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Auliya Allah Ki Araam Gaah Allah Ki Khaas Rehmat Ke Nuzool Ki Jagah Hai.

Waha Jaayein To Hum Par Bhi Kuch Rehmato Ke Cheente Pad Jaaye.

Dosri Baat Ye Ke Huzoor E Akram Sallallahu Aliahiwasallam Ne Mazarat Par Hazri Dene Ka Hukm Farmaya Hai.

Mazarat Par Jaye To Maut Ko Yaad Kare Ke Hame Bhi Ek Din Qabr Me Jaana Hai.

Aur Auliya E Kiraam Ki Bargah Me Hazir Ho Kar Unke Waseele Se Dua Maangi Jaaye To Dua Jald Qubool Hoti Hai.

Qabro Par Hazri Ka Silsila Huzoor E Akram Sallallahu Aliahiwasallam Ke Zamana E Aqdas Hi Se Hai.

Hadees E Paak Me Hai Ke Huzoor E Akram Sallallahu Aliahiwasallam Jannatul Baqi O Uhod Ziyarat Ke Liye Tashreef Le Jaya Karte The.

Is Fitne Ke Zamaane Me Huzoor E Akram Sallallahu Aliahi wassallam Ke Darbar Ki Hazri Ki Siwa Kisi Mazar Par Jaana Aurto Ke Liye Jaayez Nahi.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah

Title: Hazrat Log Kehte Hai Anghoti Ka Phatthar Naam Ke Hisab Se Hona Chahiye.
Content:
Ya Date Of Birth Ke Hisab Se Hona Chahiye. Maslan Koi Fala Din Paida Hiwa Aur Uska Naam Fala Fala Hai. Toh Usko Neelam Accha Rahega Kisi Ko Panna, Kisi Ko Moti Wagairah. Aur Yeh Bhi Kehte Hai Ke Agar Aisa Na Kare Toh Nuksaan Hota Hai? Ab Sawal Yeh Hai Ke
  • Kya Anghoti Ke Phattar Me Nafa Ya Nuksaan Dene Ki Takat Hai?
  • Kya Is Mamle Me Shariyat Ka Koi Hukm Hai?
  • Kya Yeh Sirf Toham Parasti Hai Ya Wakayi Burju Aur Sitaro Ka Insaan Ke Urooj Aur Zawal Me Hissa Hota Hai.
ANSWER
1. Angoothi Mein Asr Allah تعالى Ne Rakhi Hai Us Mein Ata E Ilahi Ke Bagair Koi Asr Nahin Jis Tarah Dawa Mein Marz Shifa Ka Asar Hai Ye Asar Allah تعالى Ne Hi Us Mein Rakhi Hai To Jis Tarah Dawa Se Faaidah Haasil Karna Jaayez Hai Usi Tarah Paththar Se Bhi Faaidah Haasil Karna Jaayez Keh Paththar Mein Bhi Allah تعالى Ne Hi Faaidah O Nuqsaan Ka Asar Rakha Hai To Is Aqeedah Ke Saath Paththar Ka Iste’maal Bataur E Nag Karne Mein Kuchh Harj Nahin.
Haan Agar Mu’assir Haqeeqi Paththar Hi Ko Koi Samjhe Ya’ni Allah تعالى Ne Paththar Mein Asar Nahin Rakha Balkeh Paththar Mein Khud Bakhud Faaidah O Nuqsaan Ka Asar Hai To Ye Zaroor Kufr Hai Magar Kisi Musalman Ka Aisa Aqeedah Hargiz Nahin Ye Wahabi Devbandi Gair Muqallid Wagairah Ka Zabardasti Ilzaam Hai Keh Sunni Masalmaan Paththar Mein Nafa O Nuqsaan Be Ata E Ilahi Maante Hain.
Ata E Ilahi Ke Ba’d Bhi Paththar Mein Asar Manna Shirk Hai To Wahabi Devbandi Wagairah Dawa Mein Marz Se Shifa Ka Asar Maante Hain To Oh Bhi Kaafir Huye Aur Agar Ata E Ilaahi Maane Ke Ba’d Dawa Mein Marz Se Shifa Ka Asar Maanna Un Ke Nazdeek Kufr Nahin To Ata E Ilaahi Ke Saath Paththar Mein Nafa O Nuqasaan Manne Mein Kiyon Kar Kufr Hoga.
Wahabi Devbandi Gair Muqallid Wagairah Ham Sunniyon Ke Aksar Amal Mein Shirk O Kufr Ki Qabaahat Maloom Hoti Hai Aur Wahi Amal Oh Khud Karen To Kufr Nahin Balkeh Apne Aap Ka Dunyaa Ka Bada Muwahhid Kahte Hain.
Allah تعالى Unke Sharr Se Mahfooz Rakhe
●•●┄─┅━━━━★✰★━━━━━┅─┄●•●
2.Agar Use Muassir Haqeeqi Na Maane Balkeh Ye Aqeedah Ho Keh Is Men Jo Kuchh Bhi Asar Hai Oh Allah تعالى Ke Diye Se Hai To Is Mein Kuchh Harj Nahin Aur Agar Muassir Haqeeqi Paththar Hi Ko Maan Le Ma’aazallah To Ye Kufr Hai. والله تعالٰی اعلم
●•●┄─┅━━━━★✰★━━━━━┅─┄●•●
3. Aala Hazrat Azeemul Barakat Saiyyiduna Imam Ahmad Raza Fazil E Barailvi رضى الله تعالى عنه Irshad Farmate Hain.
Kawaakib (Taaro) Mein Koi Sa’aadat O Nuhoosat Nahin Agar Unko Khud Muassir E Haqeeqi Jaane Mushrik Hai Aur Un Se Madad Maange To Haraam Hai Warna Unki Ri’aayat Zaroor Khilaaf E Tawakkul Hai.
(Fatawa Razviyyah Jild 9 Safah 265 Nisf Aakhir)

Title: Hazrat Ek Dost Ki Biwi Hai. Wo Hamesha Se Shohar Ko Shadi Ke Baad Se Dara Dhamka Ke Rakhti Hai Ke Uske Waleed Or Waleeda Ko Na Mile.
Content:
Kuch Problem Ki Waja Se Dost Uske Waleed Waleeda Se Alag Rehne Chala Gaya Tha.

Ghar Chhod Ke Biwi Ko 7 Me Leke.

But Ab Problem Solve Ho Gaya.

Walidain Wapis Ghar Rehne Ke Liya Bula Rahe Hai.

To Wife Mana Karti Ke Nahi Jana Hai Aapke Walidain Ke Waha.

Mera Dost Ab Dusri Shaadi Karna Chahata Hai.

But Wo You Bhi Bol Raha Hai Ki 1st Wife Bhale Jaysi Bhi Hai Usko Nahi Chodna Hai Or Dusri Bivi Koi Alag State Ya Alag Country Me Leke Rakhega.

To Aisa Karne Se Koi Gunah To Nahi Hoga Na?

Jawab:

Hadees E Paak Me Hai Ke Biwi Par Sab Se Zyada Haq Uske Shauhar Ka Hai Aur Mard Par Uski Maan Ka.

Kaisa Shauhar Hai Ke Usne Apni Biwi Ke Khushnoodi Ke Liye Apne Maan Baap Se Dushmani Karli.

Agar Biwi Na Farmaan Hai Ke Shauhar Ka Hukm Nahi Maanti Zabaan Darazi Karti Hai. To Wo Faasiqh Naashizah Gunahgar Hai.

Baher Haal Agar Dosri Biwi Ke Naan O Nafqah Sukna Par Bhi Qadir Hai Aur Nikah Ki Istetaat Rakhta Hai To Dosri Kar Sakta Hai.

Title: Gair E Sahaba Ko Radi Allahu Ta'ala Anhu Likhna Kaisa?
Content:
Kya Aisa Bolna Ya Likhna Sirf Sahaba Ke Liye Maqsoos Hai?

ANSWER

Gair E Sahaba Ke Liye Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Ka Lafz Istemal Karna Jaayez Hai.

Durr E Mukhtar Ma’ Shaami Jild 5 Safah 480 Me Hai “Shaba Ke Liye Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Kehna Mustahab Hai Aur Taabe’in Wagaira Ke Liye Rahmatullah Ta’ala Alaih Mustahab Hai.

Aur Is Ka Ulta Yaani Sahaba Ke Liye Rahmatullah Ta’ala Alaih Aur Tabe’in Aur Un Ke Ilawa Ulama O Mashaikh Ke Liye Raajeh Mazhab Par Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Bhi Jaayez Hai.

Hadrat Allama Shahabuddin Khifaaji Rahimahullah Naseemur Riyaz Me Farmate Hain “Ambiya E Kiram Alayhimussalato Wassalam Ke Ilawa Aimma Wagaira Ulama O Mashaikh Ko Gufraan O Raza Se Yaad Kiya Jaaye.To Gafarallahu Ta’ala Lahu Ya Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Kaha Jaaye ”

Lehaza Ma’loom Hua Ke Gair E Sahab Ke Liye Bhi Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Ka Istemaal Jaayez O Durust Hai.

Isi Wajah Se Shaikh Abdul Haq Muhaddis Dehlawi Rahimahullah Ne Ashi’at Ul Lam’aat Me Hadrat Owais E Qarani Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Likha Hai (Jab Ke Aap Tabe’i Hain)

Hadrat Imam E A’zam Abu Haneefa Aur Imam Shafa’i Ko Allama Ibn E Abideen Shami Rahimahullah Ne Shami Me Kai Jagaho Par Razi-Allahu Anh Likha Hai. Halaanke Imam Shaf’i Tabe’i Bhi Nahi.

Allama Ibn E Hajr Asqalani Ne Fathul Bari Sharh E Bukhari Me Imam E Bukhari Ko Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Likha Hai.

Imam Nawavi Ne Sharah E Muslim Me Imam Muslim Ko Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Likha Hai.

Allama Khifaaji Ne Allama Qazi Eyaaz Ko Naseemur Riyaz Me Razi-Allahu Anh Likha Hai.

Hadrat Shaikh Abdul Haq Muhaddis Dehlawi Ne Ashi’atul Lam’at Aur Akhbar Ul Akhyaar Me Kai Maqamaat Par Huzoor Gaus E Pak Ko Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Likha Hai.

Allama Abul Hasan Ali Bin Yusuf Shutnoni Rahimahullah Ne Bahjatul Asrar Shareef Me Bahot Se Maqamaat Par Gair E Sahaba Ko Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Likha Hai.

Hidaaya Me Sahib E Hidaya Ko Un Ke Shagird Ne Kai Maqamaat Par Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Likha Hai.

In Tamam Shawahid Se Roz E Raushan Ki Tarah Waazeh Ho Gaya K “Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh” Ka Lafz Sahaba E Kiram Ke Sath Khas Nahi Hai.Agar Ye Lafz Un Ke Sath Khas Hota Yaani Gair E Sahaaba Ko Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Likhna Jaayez Na Hota To Itne Bade Bade Muhaqqiqeen Jo Apne Zamaane Me Ilm Ke Aftab O Mahtaab The Ye Log Gair E Sahaba Ko Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Har Giz Na Likhte.

Yahan Tak Aam Deobandi Wahabi Jo Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Ko Sahaba Ke Sath Khas Samajhte Hain Aur Gair E Sahaba Ko Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Kehne Par Ladte Jhagarte Hain Un Ke Peshwa Kasim Nanotvi Aur Raseed Gangohi Ko Bhi Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anhuma Likha Gaya Hai.

Jaisa Ke Tazkiratur Rasheed Jild 1 Safah 38 Par Hai Ke “Maulana Muhammad Kasim Saheb O Maulana Rasheed Ahmad Saheb Razi-Allahu Anhuma Chand Roz Ke Baad Aise Hum Sabaq Bane Ke Akhirat Me Bhi Sath Na Chhoda”.

Qur’an E Kareem Se Bhi Is Baat Ki Ta’eed Hoti Hai Ke Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Ka Lafz Sahab E Kiraam Ke Sath Khas Nahi Hai.


Surah Al Baiyyenah Me Hai

“رضي الله عنهم ورضوا عنه ذلك لمن خشي ربه”

Yaani Razi-Allahu Anhum Wa Razu Anh Un Logo Ke Liye Hai Jo Apne Rab Se Darein.

Jaisa Ke Tafaseer Me Waazeh Hai Ke “Raza Yaani Razi-Allahu Anhum Wa Razu Anh Un Logo Ke Liye Hai Jin Ke Dil Me Rab Ki Khashiyyat Ho".

Aur Rab Ki Khashiyyat Ulama Hi Ka Khaassa Hai.

Balke Aimmah Farmate Hain Ke Alim Sirf Wahi Shaksh Hai Jise Khuda E Azza Wa Jalla Ki Khashiyyat Hasil Ho (Tafseer E Khazin, Mualimut Tanzeel Wagairah)

Saabit Hua Ke Razi-Allahu Ta’ala Anh Sirf Baa Amal Ulama O Mashaikh Ke Liye Hai.


Magar Ye Lafz Chunke Urf E Aam Me Bada Muaqqar Hai.

Yahan Tak Ke Bahot Se Log Ise Sahaba E Kiraam Hi Ke Liye Khas Samajhte Hain.

Lehaza Ise Har Ek Ke Liye Na Istemal Kiya Jaaye.

Balke Ise Bade Bade Ulama O Mashaaikh Hi Ke Liye Istemal Kiya Jaaye Jaise Ke Hamare Buzrgo Ne Kiya Hai.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Ye Bayan Kiya Gaya Hai Ke Aaj Ke Zamane Me Gaus-E-Azam Ke Deewano Ki Zarurat Nahi Hai.
Content:

Aur Ye Bhi Kaha Gaya Hai Ke Jo Aala Hazrat Ko Na Maane Wo Sunni Hi Nahi Hai.

Ye Kaha Tak Durust Hai.

Aur Sath Hi Sath Jo Muqarrir Hai Uspar Kya Huqum Hoga?

ANSWER

Jo Waaqai Aala Hazrat Ka Deewana Hoga, Wo Gaus-E-Paak Ka Deewana Hoga.


Aur Huzoor Gaus-E-Paak Se Muhabbat Karne Wala Aala Hazrat Se Hargiz Bugz Nahi Rakh Sakta.


Aur Jo Sunni Hoga Wo Yaqeenan Aala Hazrat Se Muhabbat Rakhega.

Title: Ek Alim E Deen Hai Jiske Zani Hona Ba Zahir Hai Aur Maal Bhi Haram Khata Hai.

ANSWER

Phir Bhi Agar Muzakki Ya Muzakki Apne Rishte Daar Me Jis Ke Naam Ki Takhti Lagaye Harj Nahi Hona Chahiye.

Lekin Munasib Nahi Maloom Hota.

Title: Hamare Yaha Ek Shakhs Hai Jo Sarkari Naukri Karte Hai.
Content: Wo Kabhi Kabhi Unke Sath Kam Karne Walo Ke Sath Puja Aarti Karte Hai. Jispe Kayi Baar Unhe Mana Bhi Kiya Gaya. Par Wo Bolte Hai Naukri Me Aisa Karna Padta Hai. Mai Dilse Ye Kaam Nahi Karta Hu. Bas Dikhawe Ke Liye Karta Hu. To Ab Hame Kya Karna Chiyye Unse Qate Talluk Kare Aur Unke Yaha Abhi Shadi Hai. To Unke Yaha Jana Kaisa Aur Unke Upar Is Baat Ka Kya Hukam Hoga. Jawab: Agar Waaqai Wo Shakhs Bhuto Ki Puja Karta Hai. Agarche Dikhawe Ke Liye Kare, Wo Shakhs Kafir O Murtad Ho Gaya. Title: Hazrat Aaj Kal Ye Baatein Bahut Uthai Jarahi Hai.
Content:

Gair Qaumo Me Bhi Bahut Firqe Hai.

Lekin Sirf Musalman Qaum Aisi Hi Puri Duniya Me Jo Aapasi Firqo Me Ladh Rahi Hai.

In Dono Sawal Me Ye Kehte Hai Ke Hum Siyasi Ehtebar Se Aisa Keh Rahe Hai.

Apna Deen Chorne Ke Liye Nhi.

Baraye Karam Is Baat Par Zaroor Roshni Daliye Or Koi Sharai Hawala Sath Hoto Or Behtar Hoga.

ANSWER

Haq Ne Kabhi Baatil Ka Sath Qubool Na Kiya Na Usko Haq Jaana.

Huzoor E Akram ﷺ Ne Gazwa E Badr Ke Mauqe Par Badmazhabo O Yahudiyo Ki Madad Qubool Na Farmaayi.

Shariat Siyaasat Se Barh Kar Hai.

Siyaasat Me Hame Ye Hargiz Gawara Nahi Ke Hum Kisi Badmazhab Ko Haq Jaane.

Haan Siyaasi Chaara Jui Ke Liye Unhe Kafir Jante Hue Kaam Kiya Jaaye To Jawaaz Ki Surat Ulama Bayan Farmaate Hain.

Jumuah O Eidain Ki Jamaat Ke Liye Masjid Shart Nahi.

Zakat Wagaira Sadaqat Ke Mustahiq Fuqara Masakeen Hain.

Is Raqm Ko Begair Heela E Sharai Ke Madrasa Ya Masjid Me Lagane Se Zakat Ada Hi Na Hogi.

Haan Agar Heela E Sharai Kiya Jaaye To Masjid O Madrasa Ki Ta’meer Wagaira Me Uske Istemal Ki, Ulama Ne Ijazat Di Hai.

To Jhoot Ka Wabaal O Gunaah Un Ke Sar Hoga Aur Waada Khilafi Ka Hukm Lagega.

Title: Muharram Ki 10 Aur 9 Tareek Ko Roza Rahane Ka Sawab Kya Kya Hai.
Content:
1000 Shahido Ka Sawab 1000 Bar Hajj Karne Ka Sawab 1000 Bar Umrah Karne Ka Sawab 2 Saal Ke Gunha Maaf 2 Saal Ibadat Karne Ka Sawab.

ANSWER


مذکورہ روایت میرے علم میں نہیں. چند صحیح روایتیں بیان کی جاتی ہیں.   عاشورا یعنی دسویں  محرم کا روزہ اور بہتر یہ ہے کہ نویں  کو بھی رکھے۔
        حدیث ۱:  صحیحین میں  ابن عباس رضی اﷲ تعالیٰ عنہما سے مروی، کہ رسول اﷲ صلی اﷲ تعالیٰ علیہ وسلم نے عاشورا کا روزہ خود رکھا اور اس کے رکھنے کا حکم فرمایا۔

حدیث ۲:  مسلم و ابو داود و ترمذی و نسائی ابوہریرہ رضی اﷲ تعالیٰ عنہ سے راوی، رسول اﷲ صلی اﷲ تعالیٰ علیہ وسلم فرماتے ہیں : ’’رمضان کے بعد افضل روزہ محرم کاروزہ ہے اور فرض کے بعد افضل نماز صلاۃ اللّیل ہے۔‘‘ 
        حدیث ۳:  صحیحین میں  ابن عباس رضی اﷲ تعالیٰ عنہما سے مروی، فرماتے ہیں : میں  نے نبی صلی اﷲ تعالیٰ علیہ وسلم کو کسی دن کے روزہ کو اور دن پر فضیلت دے کر جستجو فرماتے نہ دیکھا مگر یہ عاشورا کا دن اور یہ رمضان کا مہینہ۔
        حدیث ۴:  صحیحین میں  ابن عباس رضی اﷲ تعالیٰ عنہما سے مروی، رسول اﷲ صلی اﷲ تعالیٰ علیہ وسلم جب مدینہ میں  تشریف لائے، یہود کو عاشورا کے دن روزہ دار پایا، ارشاد فرمایا: یہ کیا دن ہے کہ تم روزہ رکھتے ہو؟ عرض کی، یہ عظمت والا دن ہے کہ اس میں  موسیٰ علیہ الصلاۃ و السّلام اور اُن کی قوم کو اﷲ تعالیٰ نے نجات دی اور فرعون اور اُس کی قوم کو ڈبو دیا، لہٰذا موسیٰ علیہ السّلام نے بطور شکر اُس دن کا روزہ رکھا تو ہم بھی روزہ رکھتے ہیں ۔ ارشاد فرمایا: موسیٰ علیہ الصلاۃ والسّلام کی موافقت کرنے میں  بہ نسبت تمھارے ہم زیادہ حق دار اور زیادہ قریب ہیں  تو حضور (صلی اﷲ تعالیٰ علیہ وسلم) نے خود بھی روزہ رکھا اور اُس کا حکم بھی فرمایا۔
        حدیث ۵:  صحیح مسلم میں  ابوقتادہ رضی اﷲ تعالیٰ عنہ سے مروی، رسول اﷲ صلی اﷲ تعالیٰ علیہ وسلم فرماتے ہیں : ’’مجھے اﷲ (عزوجل) پر گمان ہے کہ عاشورا کا روزہ ایک سال قبل کے گناہ مٹا دیتا ہے۔

Title: Kya Gulab Ke Phool Ka Istemal Shadi Me Karna Galat Hai?
Content:
Mera Puchne Ka Matlab Hai Ki Dulha Dulhan Ke Liye Jab Shadi Ki Raat Me Kamara Sajaya Jata Hai.

To Is Me Farsh Par Ya To Bistar Par Lal Gulab Se Sajaya Jata Hai.

To Kya Koyi Harz Hai Is Baat Me.

ANSWER

Baaz Hadeeso Me Aaya Hai Ke Huzoor E Akram ﷺ Ke Paseena E Mubarak Se Gulab Ka Phool Paida Hua.


Aur Ek Jagah Marwi Hai Aap ﷺ Ne Farmaya Gul E Sufaid Mere Paseene Se Shab E Meraj Paida Hua, Gul E Surkh Jibreel Ke Paseene Se Aur Gul E Zard Buraaq Ke Paseene Se.


Neez Marwi Hai Ke Huzoor ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya Ke Meraj Se Wapsi Par Mere Paseene Ka Qatra Zameen Par Gira To Us Se Gulaab Paida Hua.

Jo Koi Meri Khusbu Sunghna Chaahe Wo Gulaab Ko Soonghe.


Ek Aur Riwayat Me Hai Ke Jab Mere Paseene Ka Qatra Gira To Zameen Hansi Aur Gulaab Ke Phool Ko Ugaya. (Madaarijun Nabuwwah)

In Hadeeso Ko Muhaddiseen Agarche Apni Istelaaho Ke Ba Mujab Kalaam Karte Hain.

Magar In Riwaayato Me Jo Kuch Aaya Hai Wo Nabi E Mukhtaar ﷺ Ke Darya E Fazl O Karam Ka Ek Qatra Hai.

Jin Ke Sath Allah Ta’ala Ne Apne Habeeb ﷺ Ko Mukarram Farmaya.

Lehaza Phoolo Ka Ehteraam Kiya Jaaye Khusoosan Gulaab Ke Phool Aur Unhe Pairo Ke Neeche Na Aane Diya Jaaye.

Huzoor E Mufti E Aazam رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہ Bhi Kisi Ko Gulaab Ki Be Hurmati Karte Dekhte To Mana Farmaate Aur Ye Sher Parha Karte.



Unhi Ki Boo Maya E Saman Hai
Unhi Ka Jalwa Chaman Chaman Hai
Unhi Se Gulshan Mahek Rahe Hain
Unhi Ki Rangat Gulaab Me Hai.

Title: Zaid Aur Hinda Dono Balig Hai Aur Dono Se Apas Main Mulaqat Aur Ghumna Firna Hota Raha
Content:
Ab Surate Haal Ye Hai Ke Larki Ab Hamal Se Hai Pichle Ek Mahine Se.

Ab Dono Nikah Karna Chah Rahe Hai.

To Kya Is Dauran Dono Ka Nikah Hosakta Hai?

Jawab:

Jo Aurat Ma’az Allah Zina Se Hamila Ho Us Se Nikah Saheeh Hai.

Khwaah Us Zaani Se Ho, Ya Us Ke Gair Se.

Farq Itna Hai Ke Zaani Jis Ka Hamal Hai Wo (Nikah Ke Baad) Us Se Qurbat Kar Sakta Hai Aur Gair E Zaani Agar Nikah Kare.

To Taa Waza E Hamal (Paidaish Hone Tak) Qurbat Nahi Kar Sakta.

لئلا یسقی ماءہ زرع غیرہ ۱؎ درمختار ، وصحح نکاح حبلی من زنا ۲؂تنویر الابصار۔

Taake Dosre Ki Kheti Ko Apne Paani Se Sairaab Na Kare.

Durr E Mukhtaar

Zina Se Haamila Ka Nikah Saheeh Hai.

Tanveer Ul Absaar
Mulakkhasan Fatawa Razaviya Shareef

Shauhar Ki Biwi Ka Hamal Shauhar Ka Hi Thaherta Hai.

Huzoor ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya:


الولد للفراش وللعاھر الحجر

Yaani Bacche Ka Nasab Nikah Waale Ka Hai Aur Zaani Ke Liye Mahroomi Hai.

Title: Aurat Agar Bagair Mahram Ya Shohar Ke Hajj Ko Gayi To Kya Hukm Hai❓
Content:
Jawab:

Hajj Ho Jaayega Par Gunahgar Huyi.

Mas’Ala: Aurat Ka Gulam Uska Maharam Nahi Ki Uske Saath Bhi Nikah Ka Haram Hona Hamesha Ke Liye Ki Agar Aazad Kar De Us Se Nikah Kar Sakti Hai.

Zohara

Mas’Ala: Baandhiyaan Ko Bagair Mahram Ke Safar Jaayez Hai.

Zohara

Note: Is Zamane Me Fatwa Is Par Hai Ki Bagiar Mahram Ke Baandhi Ko Safar Najayez Hai.

Qadri

Mas’Ala: Agarche Zina Se Hamesha Ke Liye Haram Ho Jaata Hai.

Maslan Jis Aurat Se Maaz’Allah Zina Kiya.

Uski Ladki Se Nikah Nahi Kar Sakta.

Magar Us Ladki Ko Uske Saath Safar Karna Jaayez Nahi.

Durre Muhtaar Safa 145

Mas’Ala: Aurat Bagair Mahram, Ya Shohar Ke Hajj Ko Gayi To Gunahgaar Huyi.

Magar Hajj Karegi To Hajj Ho Jayega.

Zohara

Mas’Ala: Aurat Ka Na Shohar Hai.

Maharam To Us Par Yah Wajib Nahi Ki Hajj Ke Jaane Ke Liye Nikah Kar Le.

Aur Jab Maharm Hai To Hajj e Farz Ke Liye Maharm Ke Saath Jaaye.

Agarche Shohar Izazat Na Deta Ho Nafl Aur Mannat Ka Hajj Ho To Shohar Ko Mana Karne Ka Ikhtiyaar Hai.

Zohara

Mas’Ala: Mahram Ke Saath Jaye, To Uska Nafqa Aurat Ke Jimme Hai.

Lihaza Ab Sharth Yah Hai Ki Apne Aur Uske Dono Ke Nafqe Par Qadir Ho.

Durre Muhtaar
Raddul Muhtaar

(3) Jaane Ke Jamaane Me Aurat Iddat Me Na Ho, Wah Iddat Wafaat Ki Ho, Ya Talak Ki Baayin Ki Ho Ya Rajaee Ki.

(4) Qaid Me Na Ho. Magar Jab Kisi Ki Haq Ki Wajah Se Qaid Me Ho Aur Us Ke Ada Karne Par Qadir Ho.

To Yah Ujr Nahi Aur Baadsha Agar Hajj Ke Jaane Se Rookta Ho Yah Ujrr Hai.

Title: Kai Log Games Khelte Hain Mobile Pe Ya Video Games.Unke Liye Shariyat Me Kya Hukm Hain?
Content:
ANSWER

Video Games Ek Maghribi Bimaari Hai Jo Un Mumaalik Ke Baad Ab Hind O Pak Me Riwaaj Pazeer Hai.

Pehle Us Ke Shaayeqeen Hamare Yahan Ek Do Rupe De Kar Apne Shauq Ki Takmeel Karte The Aur Ab Har Ghar Taqreeban Video Game Ghar Ban Chuka Hai.

Yahan Tak Ke Faarig Auqaat Me Acche Bhale Deeni Zauq Rakhne Waale Baa Reesh Hazraat Bhi Is Waba Me Jakde Nazar Aate Hain.

Ye Khel Chand Wajoohaat Se Shar’an Jaayez Nahi.

1) Is Khel Me Na To Koi Deeni Maslihat Muzmar Hai Aur Na Hi Jismani Faayeda Posheeda Aur Jo Khel In Dono Faayedo Se Khali Ho Wo Jaayez Nahi.

2) Ye Allah Ke Zikr Se Gaafil Karne Waala Hai.

3) Sab Se Shadeed Nuqsan Ye Hai Ke Is Khel Ki Aadat Parne Par Chhorna Dushwaar Ho Jaata Hai.

4) Aksar Game Behuda Tasweer Aur Photo Par Mashtamil Hote Hain. Jo Ke Shar’an Naa Jaayez Hai.

5) Is Khel Se Dili Far’hat Aur Lazzat Hasil Hoti Hai Aur Naa Jaayez Cheezo Se Lazzat Hasil Karna Bhi Haraam Hai.

In Mazkoora Wajoohaat Ki Bina Par Ye Khel, Baari Ta’ala Ke Irshad Ka Misdaw Hai.

(وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَشْتَرِي لَهْوَ الْحَدِيثِ لِيُضِلَّ عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ وَيَتَّخِذَهَا هُزُوًا ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُهِينٌ)

[Surah Luqman : 6]

Yaani Aur Kuch Log Khel Ki Baatein Khareedte Hain Ke Allah Ki Raah Se Bahkaa Den Be Samjhe Aur Use Hansi Bana Len, Un Ke Liye Zillat Ka Azaab Hai.

Hazrat Hasan Farmaate Hain Ke Ayat E Mazkoora Me “لهو الحديث” Se Muraad Har Wo Cheez Hai Jo Allah Ki Ibadat Aur Us Ki Yaad Se Hataane Waali Ho.

Jaise Fuzool Lahw O La’ib, Fuzool Qissah Kahani, Hansi Mazaq Ki Baatein, Waahiyaat Mashgale Aur Gana Bajaana Wagaira.

Waazeh Rahe Ke Mazkoora Aayat Ka Shan E Nuzool Agar Che Khas Hai.

Magar Umoom E Alfaz Ki Waja Se Hukm Aam Rahega.

Yaani Jo Khel Fuzool Aur Waqt O Paise Zaaye Karne Waala Hai.

Wahi Ayat E Mazkoora Ki Wa’eed Me Dakhil Hai.

Chunke Video Games Me Ye Sari Kharaabiyaan Maujood Hain.

Is Liye Ye Game Na Jaayez Hai.

Is Me Waqt Aur Paise Lagana Naa Jaayez Hai Aur Is Ko Tark Kar Dena Wajib Hai.


Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam

Title: Soodkhor Ka Azab Ke Baare Me Shariyat Me Aur Hadeese Mubaraka Me Jo Sakhti Aur Azab Bataye Gaye Hai.
Content:
Use Baraye Meharbani Tafseer Me Inayat Farmaye

ANSWER

Sood Ki Hurmat Qur’an O Hadees Se Waazeh Taur Par Saabit Hai.


Allah Tabarak Wa Ta’ala Ne Irshad Farmaya


وَأَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْبَيْعَ وَحَرَّمَ ٱلرِّبَوٰا۟ ۚ 

Aur Allah Ne Halal Kiya Baie’ Ko Aur Haraam Kiya Sood.

(Surah Al Baqarah)

Jab Sood Ki Hurmat Ka Hukm Naazil Hua To Logo Ka Dosro Par Jo Kuch Bhi Sood Ka Baqaaya Tha Us Ko Bhi Lene Se Mana Farma Diya Gaya.


 يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَذَرُوا۟ مَا بَقِىَ مِنَ ٱلرِّبَوٰٓا۟ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

Aye Iman Waalo Allah Se Daro Aur Chhor Do Jo Baaqi Reh Gaya Hai Sood Agar Musalman Ho.

(Surah Al Baqarah)

Sood Ko Qur’an E Kareem Me Itna Bada Gunaah Qarar Diya Gaya Hai Ke Sharab Noshi, Khinzeer Khane Aur Zina Kaari Ke Liye Qur’an E Kareem Me Wo Lafz Iste’mal Nahi Kiye Gaye Jo Sood Ke Liye Iste’mal Kiya Gaya.


Allah Ta’ala Ka Irshad Hai.


 فَإِن لَّمْ تَفْعَلُوا۟ فَأْذَنُوا۟ بِحَرْبٍ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۖ 

Phir Agar Aisa Na Karo ( Sood Se Na Baaz Aao) To Yaqeen Kar Lo Allah Aur Allah Ke Rasool Se Ladaai Ka.

(Surah Al Baqarah)

Sood Khane Waalo Ke Liye Allah Aur Us Ke Rasool ﷺ Ki Taraf Se Elaan E Jung Hai, Aur Ye Aisi Sakht Wa’eed Hai Jo Kisi Aur Bade Gunaah Par Nahi Di Gayi.

Mash’hoor Sahabi E Rasool Hazrat Abdullah Ibn E Abbas RaziAllahu Ta’ala Anh Ne Farmaya Ke Jo Shakhs Sood Chhorne Par Tayyar Na Ho.

To Khaleefa E Waqt Ki Zimme Daari Hai Ke Wo Us Se Tauba Karaye Aur Baaz Na Aane Ki Surat Me Us Ki Gardan Uda De .

Allah Tabarak Wa Ta’ala Ne Sood Khane Waalo Ke Liye Qiyamat Ke Din Jo Ruswaai Aur Zillat Rakhi Hai Us Ko Allah Ta’ala Ne Apne Kalam E Majeed Me Irshad Farmaya


 ٱلَّذِينَ يَأْكُلُونَ ٱلرِّبَوٰا۟ لَا يَقُومُونَ إِلَّا كَمَا يَقُومُ ٱلَّذِى يَتَخَبَّطُهُ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ مِنَ ٱلْمَسِّ ۚ 

Wo Jo Sood Khate Hain Qiyamat Ke Din Na Khade Honge. Magar Jaise Khada Hota Hai Wo Jise Aaseb Ne Chhu Kar Makhboot Bana Diya Ho.

(Surah Al Baqarah)

Sood Ko Jaayez Qarar Dene Waalo Ke Liye Irshad Hua


ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا ٱلْبَيْعُ مِثْلُ ٱلرِّبَوٰا۟ ۗ 

(Ye Zillat Amez Azab) Is Liye Ke Unho Ne Kaha Baie’ Bhi To Sood Hi Ki Maanind Hai.

(Surah Al Baqarah)

In Ayaat E Kareema Me Allah Tabarak Wa Ta’ala Ne Insano Ko Halak Karne Waale Gunah Se Sakht Alfaz Ke Sath Bachne Ki Ta’leem Di Hai Aur Tauba Na Karne Waalo Ke Liye Jung Ka Elaan Farma Diya,

Neez Farmaya Ke Kal Qiyamat Ke Din Sood Lene Dene Waale Zaleel O Ruswa Honge Aur Jahannam Me Daale Jayenge.

Nabi E Akram ﷺ Ne Bhi Sood Se Bachne Ki Bahot Takeed Farmayi Hai Aur Sood Lene Aur Dene Waalo Ke Liye Sakht Wa’eeden Sunaai Hain.

Jin Me Se Kuch Ahadees Zikr Ki Jaati Hain.

Huzoor E Akram ﷺ Ne Hajjatul Wida Ke Mauqe Par Sood Ki Hurmat Ka Elaan Farmaate Hue Irshad Farmaya.

(Aaj Ke Din) Jahiliyat Ka Sood Chhor Diya Gaya, Aur Sab Se Pehla Sood Jo Mai Chhorta Hu Wo Hamare Chacha Abbas (RaziAllahu Ta’ala Anhu) Ka Sood Hai.

Wo Sab Ka Sab Khatam Kar Diya Gaya Hai.


Asl Me Hazrat Abbas RaziAllahu Ta’ala Anh Sood Ki Hurmat Se Qabl Logo Ko Sood Par Qarz Diya Karte The.

Is Liye Huzoor ﷺ Ne Farmaya Ke Aaj Ke Din Mai Unka Sood Jo Dosre Logo Ke Zimme Hai Wo Khatam Karta Hu”

(Muslim Shareef)

Huzoor E Akram ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya

7 Halaak Karne Waale Gunaah Se Bacho! Sahab E Kiraam Ne Arz Kiya.

Ya RasoolAllah ﷺ Wo 7 Bade Gunah Kaun Se Hain (Jo Insano Ko Halak Karne Waale Hain).

Huzoor E Akram ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya

(1) Shirk Karna,

(2) Jaadu Karna

(3) Kisi Shakhs Ko Naa Haq Qatl Karna

(4) Sood Khana

(5) Yateem Ke Maal Ko Hadapna

(6) (Kuffar Ke Sath Jung Ki Surat Me) Maidan Se Bhagna,

(7) Paak Daaman Aurato Par Tohmat Lagana.

(Bukhari, Muslim)

Huzoor E Akram ﷺ Ne Sood Dene Aur Lene Waale, Soodi Hisab Likhne Waale Aur Soodi Shahadat Dene Waale Sab Par Laanat Farmayi Hai.

Sood Lene Aur Dene Waale Par Huzoor E Akram ﷺ Ki Laanat Ke Alfaz Hadees Ki Har Mash’hoor O Ma’roof Kitabo Me Maujood Hai.

(Muslim, Tirmizi, Abu Dawood, Nisai)

Huzoor E Akram ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya

4 Shaks Aise Hain Ke Allah Ta’ala Ne Apne Liye Laazim Kar Liya Hai Ke Un Ko Jannat Me Dakhil Nahi Karega Aur Na Un Ko Jannat Ki Ne’mato Ka Zaayeqa Chakaayega

(1) Sharab Ka Aadi

(2) Sood Khane Waal

(3) Na Haq Yateem Ka Maal Udaane Waala.

(4) Maan Baap Ki Na Farmani Karne Wala.

(Kitaab Al Kabaair Lizzahbi)

Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya

Sood Ke 70 Se Zyada Darje Hain Aur Adna Darja Aisa Hai Jaise Apni Maan Se Zina Kare.

(Haakim Al Baihaqi, Tibraani)

RasoolAllah ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya

Ek Dirham Sood Ka Khana 36 Martaba Zina Karne Se Zyada Hai.

(Ahmad, Tibraani)

Allah Tabaarak Wa Ta’ala Hum Tamam Logo Ko Halal Kamaane Halal Khaane Ki Taufeeq Ataa Farmaaye, Haraam Kamaane Aur Khaane Se Bachaye.
آمین بجاه شفیع المذنبین ﷺ

Title: Kuch Jagah Par Namaz E Ashura Ka Ehtemam Hota Hai. Is Ki Kya Sharai Haisiat Hai
Content:
Jawab:

Kisi Nafl Namaz Ki Jamaat Tadaa’i Ke Sath (Elan Karke Ya Logo Ko Bula Kar) Makrooh Hai.

Rahi Baat Ashura Ke Din Nafl Namaz Ki To Is Se Mana Nahi Kiya Jayega. Ke Namaz Allah Ki Ibadat Hai.

Aur Is Se Rokna Hargiz Jaayez Nahi Ke Kahin Namaz Se Rokne Walo Me Shamil Na Ho Jaayein.

Haan Ye Masla Bataya Jaaye Ke Jamaat Ke Sath Is Roz Nafl Namaz Na Parhi Jaaye.

Rahi Baat Ashura Ke Din Nafl Namaz Ki To Sayyedi Alahazrat Quddisa Sirruhul Azeez Ki Janib Mansoob Ye Amal Tahreer Hai Ke “Ashura Ke Din Ghusl Kar Ke 2 Rekaat Is Tareeqe Se Parhe Ke Dono Rekaato Me Surah Fatiha Ke Baad 10, 10 Baar Surah Ikhlas Parhe Aur Salam Ke Baad Ek Baar Ayat Al Kursi Aur 9 Martaba Durood Shareef Aur Us Ke Baad Dua E Ashura Parhe."

إنْ شَــاءَاللّــهُ الْعَــزيْز

Aayinda Ashura Tak Zinda Rahega.

Title: Kisi Ne Waada Kiya Or Waada Pura Nahi Kiya. To Shariyat Ka Kaya Hukm Hoga?
Content:
ANSWER

Waada Khilaafi Amali Jhoot Me Shumar Hota Hai Aur Ahed Ko Pura Karna Sidq Aur Sach Kehlata Hai.


Islam Ne Badi Takeed Ke Sath Ahed Ko Pura Karne Ka Hukm Diya Aur Waada Khilafi Ki Mazammat Farmayi Hai.

Quran E Paak Me Irshad Hua


وَأَوْفُوا۟ بِٱلْعَهْدِ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلْعَهْدَ كَانَ مَسْـُٔولًا


Aur Ahed Pura Karo, Beshak Ahed Se Sawal Hona Hai.

17-Al-Isra : 34


Quran Ne Un Logo Ki Tareef Farmayi Jo Apne Waade Paas O Lihaaz Rakhte Hain. Irshad Hua.


وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَٰنَٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ


Aur Wo Jo Apni Amanato Aur Apne Ahed Ki Hifazat Karte Hain.


70-Al-Maarij : 32

Khud Allah Ta’ala Ki Is Sifat Ka Baar’ha Zikr Hua Ke Wo Waada Khilaafi Nahi Farmata.

Huzoor E Akram Sallallahu Ta’ala Alayhi Wa Sallam Ne Apne Irshadat Ke Zariye Bhi Ifa E Ahed Ki Ahmiyat Aur Waada Khilaafi Ki Mazammat Bayan Farmaayi Hai.


Hadees E Paak Me Hai Ke RasoolAllah Sallallahu Ta’ala Alayhi Wa Sallam Ne Irshad Farmaya:

Munafiq Ki 3 Alaamate Hain
1)Jab Baat Kare To Jhoot Bole,
2) Jab Waada Kare To Khilaaf Warzi Kare,
3) Aur Jab Us Ke Paas Amanat Rakhwai Jaaye To Us Me Khiyanat Kare.

(Muslim Shareef)


Gaur Farmayein Ke Hamare Aaqa Sallallahu Ta’ala Alayhi Wa Sallam Ne Waadah Khilaafi Ko Nifaaq Me Shumaar Farmaya

Is Se Andaza Kiya Ja Sakta Hai Ke Waada Khilafi Kis Qadr Mazmoom Baat Hai.


Ye Niyat Ki Bad Diyaanati Aur Jhooti Niyat Ka Nateeja Hai.

Kyu Ke Admi Gunahgar Us Waqt Hai Jab Ke Waada Ya Ahed Karte Waqt Us Ki Niyat Hi Wafa Ki Na Ho.

Ya Baad Me Wafa Ki Niyat Par Qaayem Na Rahe.

Aur Wo Dunia Me Bhi Ruswa Hota Hai Aur Akhirat Me Us Ki Ruswaai To Hogi Hi.


Haan Agar Niyat Waada Pura Karne Ki Hai.

Magar Halaat Ke Hatho Be Ikhtiyar Hone Ki Wajah Se Waada Pura Na Kar Saka To Us Par Muaakhaza Nahi.


Aur Allah Ta’ala Har Ek Ke Dilo Ke Halaat Ko Khoob Janne Wala Hai. Ke Kaun Apne Waade Me Saccha Hai Kaun Jhoota.

Allah Ta’ala Hamesha Is Gunah E Azeem Se Mahfooz Rakhe. Ameen

Title: Firoza, Aqeeq Aur Dusre Sab Patthar Hame Kisi Bhi Tarah Ka Faida Ya Nuksan Pahucha Sakte Hai?
Content:
ANSWER

Angoothi Me Asr Allah Ta’ala Ne Rakha Hai.

Us Me Ata E Ilahi Ke Bagair Koi Asr Nahi.

Jis Tarah Dawa Me Marz Se Shifa Ka Asar Hai.

Ye Asar Allah Ta’ala Ne Hi Us Me Rakha Hai.

To Jis Tarah Dawa Se Fayida Hasil Karna Jaayez Hai.

Usi Tarah Patthar Se Bhi Faaida Haasil Karna Jaayez Ke Patthar Me Bhi Allah Ta’ala Ne Hi Faaida O Nuqsaan Ka Asar Rakha Hai.

To Is Aqeede Ke Sath Patthar Ka Istemal Bataur E Nag Karne Me Kuch Harj Nahi.

Haan Agar Mu’assir E Haqeeqi Patthar Hi Ko Koi Samjhe.

Ya’ni Allah Ta’ala Ne Patthar Me Asar Nahi Rakha.

Balke Patthar Me Khud Bakhud Faaida O Nuqsaan Ka Asar Hai To Ye Zaroor Kufr Hai.

Magar Kisi Musalman Ka Aisa Aqeeda Hargiz Nahi Ye Wahabi Devbandi Gair Muqallid Wagaira Ka Zabardasti Ilzaam Hai Ke Sunni Masalman Patthar Me Nafa O Nuqsan Be Ata E Ilahi Maante Hai.

Ata E Ilahi Ke Baad Bhi Patthar Me Asar Manna Shirk Hai.

To Wahabi Devbandi Wagaira Dawa Me Marz Se Shifa Ka Asar Maante Hain.

To Wo Bhi Kaafir Huye Aur Agar Ata E Ilaahi Maanne Ke Ba’ad Dawa Me Marz Se Shifa Ka Asar Maanna Un Ke Nazdeek Kufr Nahi.

To Ata E Ilaahi Ke Saath Patthar Me Nafa O Nuqsaan Manne Me Kyu Kar Kufr Hoga.

Wahabi Devbandi Gair Muqallid Wagairah Ko Hum Sunniyo Ke Aksar Amaal Me Shirk O Kufr Ki Qabaahat Maloom Hoti Hai Aur Wahi Amal Wo Khud Karein To Kufr Nahi Balke Apne Aap Ko Dunya Ka Bada Muwahhid Kahte Hain

Allah Ta’ala Unke Sharr Se Mahfooz Rakhe. AMEEN

Lehaza Agar Use Muassir E Haqeeqi Na Maane Balke Ye Aqeeda Ho Ke Is Me Jo Kuch Bhi Asar Hai Wo Allah Ta’ala Ke Diye Se Hai.

To Is Me Kuch Harj Nahi Aur Agar Muassir E Haqeeqi Patthar Hi Ko Maan Le Ma’azAllah To Ye Kufr Hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta’ala A’lam

Title: Kya Ye Baat Kehna Durust Hai Ke Kisi Dusre Mazhab Ko Bura Na Kaho.Unka Adab Karo Unki Izzat Karo.
Content:
Kya Unki Izzat Karna Sahi Hai.

Na Shariyat Ke Hisab Se Hadith Ke Hawale Se.

ANSWER

Jo Baatil Mazaahib Hain Unhe Bura Nahi To Aur Kya Kaha Jayeg.

Magar Galiyaan Dene Se Mana Kiya Gaya Ke Qur’an E Pak Ka Irshad Hai.



ولا تسبوا الذين يدعون من دون الله فيسبوا الله عدوا بغير علم



Aur Unhe Gaali Na Do Wo Jin Ko Wo Allah Ke Siwa Poojte Hain Ke Wo Allah Ki Shan Me Be Adabi Karenge Zyadti Aur Jihalat Se.

Maf’hoom Ye Hua Ke Un Ke Baatil Khudaao Ko Agar Tum Gaali Doge To Wo Dushmani O Adaawat Me Allah Ko Gaali Denge.

Lehaza Ye Kehna Ke Sab Mazhab Sahi Hain Aur Un Ki Izzat Karni Chahiye Ye Bada Sakht Jumla Hai.

Aisa Kehne Waala Tauba Kare.

Haan Unhe Gaaliyaan Na Di Jaayein.

Title: Hajj Ke Waqt Jis Ke Sar Par Baal Na Ho Use Ustara Phirwana Kaisa Hai?
Content:
ANSWER

Wajib Hai.

Jis Ke Sar Par Baal Na Ho Use Ustara Phirwana Wajib Hai Aur Agar Baal Hai Magar Sar Se Fudiyaan Hai Jin Ki Wajah Se Munda Nahi Sakta Aur Baal Itne Nade Bhi Nahi Ki Katrawaaye To Is Ujr Ke Sabab Us Se Mundana Aur Katrawaana Saakit Ho Gaya.

Ya’ani Maaf Ho Gaya.

Use Bhi Mundane Walo Aur Katarwaane

Walo Ki Tarah Sab Cheez Halaal Ho Gayi.

Magar Behtar Yah Hai Ki Ayame Nahar Ke Khatm Hone Tak Ba-Dastur Rahe.

(Aalamgeeri)

Bahare Shari’at Part 06 Safa 85

Title: Kya Jummah Mubarak Kehna Koi Hadees Me Hai Ki Jummah Mubarak De Sakhte Hai?
Content:
ANSWER

Mubarak Ma’na Hai Barkat Wala.

Ye Dua Hai Aur Hum Kisi Din Ki Mubarak Baad Den To Us Ka Ma’na Ye Hai Ke Ye Din Ap Ke Liye Baa Barkat Ho.

Jumuah Ke Din Ki Fazeelat Har Ek Par Zaahir Hai.

Lehaza Agar Hum Is Ki Mubarakbaad Den.

(Yaani Is Din Ke Barkat Hasil Hone Ki Dua Karein) To Is Me Koi Harj Nahi.

Haan Jo Inkar Kare Us Par Daleel Lazim Hai Ke Kisi Cheez Ke Jaayez O Halal Hone Ke Liye Daleel Ki Zarurat Nahi.

Balke Haraam O Na Jaayez Hone Ke Liye Daleel Ki Zarurat Hai.

Title: Qayamat Ke Din Sabse Pehle Kis Cheez Ka Hisab Liya Jayega ❓
Content:
Hadees: Tabraani Ne Ausat Me Aur Ziya Ne Anas رضي الله عنه Se Riwayat Hai Ki.

Huzoor ﷺ Ne Farmaya Ki Sab Se Pahle Qayamat Ke Din Bande Se Namaz Ka Hisaab Liya Jayega.

Agar Yah Durust Huyi To Baaki A’AMAAL Bhi Theek Rahenge Aur Yah Bigadi To Sab Bigade Aur Ek Riwayat Me Hai Ki Wah Khaayib Wa Khaasir Huwa.

Hadees: Imaam Ahmed Wa Abu Dawood Wa Nasai Wa Ibne Maaza Ki Riwayat Tamim Daari رضي الله عنه Se Yoon Hai.

Agar Namaz Puri Ki Hai To Puri Likhi Jayegi Aur Puri Nahi Ki (Yaani Us Me Nuksan Hai) Malaika Se Farmaya Gaya Dekho Mere Bande Ke Nawafil Hoto Unse Farz Pure Kardo.

Phir Zakat Ka Isi Tarah Hisaab Hoga.

Phir Yoon Hi Baaki A’amaal Ka.

Title: Hazrat Nabi E Kareem Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam Ka Namaze Janaza Kisne Padhaya Hai ?
Content:
ANSWER

Janaaza e Aqdas Par Namaz Ke Baab Me Ulama Mukhtalif Hain.

Kuch Logo Ke Nazdeek Ye Namaz Ma'roof Na Hui.

Balke Log Giroh Dar Giroh Haazir Aate Aur Salaat O Salam Arz Karte.
Aur Bahot Ulama Yahi Namaz E Ma'roof Maante Hain Ke Sayyedna Siddeeq e

Akbar رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہ Taskeen E Fitan O Intezam E Ummat Me Mashgool.

Jab Tak Un Ke Dast E Haq Parast Par Bai't Na Hui Thi Log Fauj Dar Fauj Aate Aur Janaza E Anwar Par Namaz Parhte Jaate.

Jab Bai't Ho Chuki Aur Hazrat Abu Bakr E Siddeeq Wali E Shara'i Hue.

To Unho Ne Janaza e Muqaddas Par Namaz Parhi.

Phir Kisi Ne Na Parhi.

Is Liye Ke Wali Ke Namaz Parh Lene Ke Baad Phir Namaz e Janaza Ke I'aada Ka Ikhtiyar Nahi.

Hazrat Abdullah Bin Mas'ood رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہ Se Riwayat Hai Ke Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Farmaya:

"Jab Mere Ghusl O Kafan Se Faarig Ho Mujhe Na'sh E Mubarak Par Rakh Kar Baaher Chale Jao.

Sab Se Pehle Jibr'eel Mujh Par Salaat Karenge Phir Mikaail Phir Israafil Phir Malak Ul Maut Apne Saare Lashkaro Ke Sath.

Phir Giroh Giroh Mere Paas Hazir Ho Kar Mujh Par Durood O Salam Arz Karte Jaao".

(Baihaqi, Tibraani Mo'jam e Ausat Ba Hawaala Fatawa Razavia Jild 4 Safah 54)

Title: Huzoor Bahut Se Ahle Hadees Ye Kehte Hai Ke Jis Cheez Ko Deen Kaha Jayega
Content:
Jise sawab Kaha Jayega Usme Koi New Baat Laana Biddat Hai.

Jawab:

Biddat Kehte Hain Kisi Nayi Cheez Ko Wujood Me Laana.

Biddat Ki Buniyadi Taur Par Do Qisme Hai.

1) Biddat E Hasanah (Yaani Acchi Biddat)

2) Biddat E Saiyye'ah (Yaani Buri Biddat)

Jaisa Ke Hadees E Paak Me Irshad Hua

"Jo Admi Islam Me Koi Acchi Biddat Laaye Phir Us Ke Baad Us Par Amal Kiya Jaaye, To Jo Log Bhi Us Par Amal Karenge Un Ke Ajr Ke Misl Us (Jaari Karne Waale) Ke Liye Bhi Likha Jaayega.

Aur Khud Un Amal Karne Waalo Ke Ajr Me Se Kuch Kam Na Hoga.

Aur Jo Koi Islam Me Koi Buri Biddat Jaari Kare Phir Us Ke Baad Log Use Apne Amal Me Laayein.

To Un Sab Ko Jo Gunah Hoga Wo Us (Jari Karne Wale) Ke Naama E Amaal Me Bhi Likha Jaayega.

Jab Ke Amal Karne Waalo Ke Gunah Me Kuch Kami Na Hogi"
Muslim Shareef

Is Hadees Se Istedlal Karte Hue Deen Me Koi Naya Accha Amal Jaari Karna Jo Shari'at Ke Buniyadi Usoolo Ke Mukhalif Na Ho Na Sirf Jaayez Balke Mustahab Amal Hai.

Jaisa Ke Hadrat Umar E Farooq Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anh Ne Ramzan Ul Mubarak Me Baa Jama'at Namaz e Taraweeh Karne Ke Apne Amal Ko Khud Farmaya: "Ye Acchi Biddat Hai". 

Bukhari Shareef

Isi Tarah Bahot Se Af'aal Jo Huzoor ﷺ ki Hayat e Tayyebah Me Us Tarah se Nahi The Aur Sahaba e Kiraam Alaihimur Ridwaan Ya Un Ke Baad Ummat e Muslimah Me Riwaaj Pa Gaye.

Jaise: Quran e Majeed Ko khaleefa e Awwal Hadrat Siddeeq e Akbar Radi-Allahu Ta'ala anh Ke Daur e khilafat Me kitabi Shakl Me Jama Karna, Ya Us Ke Baad Hajjaj Bin Yusuf Ke Daur Me Quran e Paak Par E'raab Lagana, Fiqh, Nahw, Eid Miladun Nabi, Durood o Salam, Iman e Mufassal o Iman e Mujmal, 6 Kalime, Masjido me Minaar o Gumbad o Mehraab, Tasawwuf o Tareeqat o Ma'rifat, Soyem, Chehlum, Khatam, Urs, Giyaarahwi Shareef Wagaira.

Aise Af'aal hain jo Ummat me Riwaaj Pazeer Hue Aur Kisi Shara'i Hukm Se Takraao Aur Mukhaalifat Na rakhne ki Wajah Se Ye Kaam Hadees e Nabawi ﷺ ki Roshni me Biddat e Hasanah ke Zimn Me Aate Hain.

Isi Tarah Jo Umoor Shariat Se Takraao Rakhte Hain Wo Biddat e Saiyye'ah Yaani Buri Biddat Ke Zumre Me Aate Hain Aur Shara'i lehaaz Se Mamnoo Hain.

--------------------------------------------------

Title: Masjid E Nabvi Me Huzoor ﷺ Ke Roze Ki Jaliyo Ke Samne Kaisa Khada Hona Chahiye?
Content:
Jawab:

Jaise Namaz Me Khada Hota Hai Waise Khada Ho.

Kamaale Adab Wa Haibat Wa Khauf Wa Ummid Ke Saath Kandile Aqdas Ke Neeche Us Chaandi Ki Keel Ke Saamne Jo Hujra E Mutahrah Ki Dakheeni Deewar Me Chara E Anwar Ke Mukabil (Samne) Lagi Hai Kam Se Kam Chaar, Haath Ke Faasile Se Kibla Ko Peeth Aur Mazar E Anwar Ko Muh Kar Ke Namaz Ki Tarah Haath Bandhe Khade Ho.

Lubaab Wa Sharahe Lubaab Wa Ikhtiyaar Sharah Mukhtar Wa Fatawa Aalamgeeri Wagairah Mo’Atabar Kitabo Me Is Adab Ke Baare Me Saaf Saaf Likha Hai Ki

Huzoor ﷺ Ke Saamne Aisa Khada Ho Jaise Namaz Me Khada Hai.

Yah Ibarat Aalmgeeri Wa Ikhtiyaar Ki Hai Aur Lubaab Me Farmaya

Dastbasta Dahna Haath Baayein Par Rakh Kar Khada Ho.

Khabardar Jaali Sharif Ko Bosa Dene Ya Haath Lagane Se Bache Ki Adab Ke Khilaf Hai.

Balki Chaar Haath Faasile Se Jyaada Karib Na Jao.

Yah Un Ki Rahmat Kya Kam Hai Ki Tum Ko Apne Huzoor Bulaya.

Apne Muwaajah-E-Aqdas Yaani Mazaar Sharif Ke Bilkul Saamne Jagah Bakshi.

Un Ki Rahmat Aur Nigaahe Karim Agarche Har Jagah Tumhari Taraf Thi.

Ab Khususiyat Aur Is Darja Kurb (Nazdiki) Ke Saath Hai?

Walillahil Hamd

Bahare Shari’at Hissa 06 Safa 139

Title: Maine Aksar Dekha Hai Ki Jumma Ki 2 Rakat Farz Namaz Padh Kar Kai Log Jate Hai.
Content:
Na To Wo Hazrat Sunnat e Muakkada Padte Hai.

To Kya Aise Me Unki Jumma Ki Namaz Ho Jayegi.

Ya Jab Tak Sunnat e Muakkada Nahi Padte Hai.

Tab Tak Jumma Ki Namaz Ada Nahi Hoti.

Jawab:

Farz Ke Baad Jo Sunnat Hai Use Farz Ke Sath Muttasil.

Yaani Mila Kar Parhni Chahiye, Yaani Farz O Sunnat Ke Darmiyan Zyada Waqfa Na Karein.

Warna Sawab Me Kami Ho Jaati Hai.

Lehaza Agar Jo Log Sunnat Ghar Ja Ke Parhte Hai.

Unhe Chahiye Ke Wo Farz Ke Fauran Baad Sunnat Parh Liya Kare Aur

Is Beech Me Koi Munafi-E-Namaz Kaam Bhi Na Kare.

Baher Haal!! Jumuah Ki Namaz Ho Jaayegi.

Haan! Agar Sunnat Na Parhe Aur Is Ki Aadat Bana Le To Wo Gunahgar Fasiq Hai.

Title: Gharo Me Kuch Keedhe Makode Hote Hai Jaise Macchar, Cockroach, Chuhe Wagaira.
Content:
Jisse Kuch Log Darte Bhi Hai.

Ab Usse Maara Jaaye. To Iss Fel Ko Zulm Kaha Jaayega Ya Nahi?

Kya Ye Fel (Gunah E Kabira Ye Sagira) Kehlayega?

Jawab:

Jo Izaa Dene Wale (Nuqsan Pohchane Wale) Janwar Hai Un Ke Maarne Par Gunah Nahi.

Isi Tarah Jinhe Khana Halal Hai, Unko Maarna Jaayez Hai.

Jaise Tiddi Halal Janwar Hai, Use Khane Ke Liye Maar Sakte Hain Aur Zarar Se Bachne Ke Liye Bhi Use Maar Sakte Hai.

Chunti (Ant) Agar Nuksan Pohchati Hai. To Maarne Me Harj Nahi, Warna Makrooh Hai.

Ju (Jo Baalo Me Hote Hain) Ko Maar Sakhte Hain, Agarche Usne Kaata Na Ho.

Khatmal Ko Marna Jaayez Hai, Ke Ye Takleef Deh Janwar Hai.

Aise Chuha Wagaira.

Title: Agar Koi Quran Sharif Ki Tilawat Oonchi Awaaz Me Kar Raha Ho To Hamein Sunna Farz Hai?
Content:

ANSWER

Jaha Ek Se Zaayed Hazrat Tilawat Kar Rahe Ho To Sab Par Ahista Tilawat Karna Wajib Hai.

Aisi Jagah Awaz Se Tilawat Karne Wala Gunahgar Hoga.

Aur Agar Koi Tanha Tilawat Kar Raha Ho Aur Awaz Se Parhta Ho To Dosre Shaksh Par Khamosh Reh Kar Sunna Wajib Hai.

Mic Ki Awaz Agarche Asl Awaz Nahi Magar Ehteram Isi Me Hai Ke Khamoshi Se Tilawat Suni Jaaye.

Title: Mayyat ko dafan karte waqt qabar me Ahadnama Ya surah mulk
Content:
Ya Quran Sharif Ki ayate rakhna kaisa hai. Kya isse murde ko faida hoga ?

Jawab:

Qabar me ahad naama o shjara wagairh rakh sakte hain aur maiyyit ke munh ke samne qibla ki janib ki deewar me taaq bana kar us taaq me rakhein aur is amal se maiyyit ke bakhshish ki ummeed hai.

واللہ تعالیٰ اعلم

Jawab : شجرہ یا عہد نامہ قبر میں رکھنا جائز ہے اور بہتر یہ ہے کہ میّت کے مونھ کے سامنے قبلہ کی جانب طاق کھود کر اس میں رکھیں ، بلکہ درمختار میں کفن پر عہد نامہ لکھنے کو جائز کہا ہے اور فرمایا کہ اس سے مغفرت کی امید ہے اور میّت کے سینہ اور پیشانی پر بسم اﷲ الرحمن الرحیم لکھنا جائز ہے۔ ایک شخص نے اس کی وصیّت کی تھی، انتقال کے بعد سینہ اور پیشانی پر بسم اﷲ شریف لکھ دی گئی پھر کسی نے انھیں خواب میں دیکھا، حال پوچھا؟ کہا: جب میں قبر میں رکھا گیا،عذاب کے فرشتے آئے، فرشتوں نے جب پیشانی پر بسم اﷲ شریف دیکھی کہا تو عذاب سے بچ گیا۔ (3) (درمختار، غنیہ، عن التاتار خانیہ) یوں بھی ہو سکتا ہے کہ پیشانی پر بسم اﷲ شریف لکھیں اور سینہ پر کلمہ طیبہ لَا اِلٰہَ اِلَّا اللہ مُحَمَّدٌ رَّسُوْلُ اللہ صلی اللہ تعالیٰ علیہ وسلم مگر نہلانے کے بعد کفن پہنانے سے پیشتر کلمہ کی انگلی سے لکھیں روشنائی سے نہ لکھیں ۔ (4) (ردالمحتار)

(Bahar e shari'at hissa 4)

Title: Muqtadi ki kitni qisme hai❓
Content:
Muqtadi Ki 04 Qisme hai.

1) Mudrik

2) Laahik

3) Masbuk

4) Laahik masbuk

1) MUDRUK Use khete hai jisne awwal rakat se tashahhud tak imam ke saath padhi.

Agarche pehli rakat me imam ke saath ruku hi me sharik huwa ho.

2) LAAHIK Wah ki imam ke saath pehli Rakat Me iqtida ki. Magar baad-e-iqteda uski kul Rakate Ya Baaz faut ho gayi.

Khwaah ujr se faut ho. Jaise galat ya bheed ki wajah se Ruku sujud karne na paya, ya namaz me use hasad ho gaya, ya mukim ne musafir ke peeche iqtida ki, ya namaze khauf me pahle geeroh ko jo Rakat imam ke saath na mili khwaah bila ujr faut ho.

Jaise imaam se pahle ruku sujud kar liya.

Phir uska iaada bhi na kiya to imam ki dusri Rakat uski Pehli Rakat hogi. Aur 3ri, 2ri, 4thi Aur Aakhir me 1 Rakat padhni hogi.

3) MASBUK Wah hai ki imam ke baaz Rakate padhne ke baad Shaamil huwa Aur Aakhir tak shaamil raha.

4) LAAHIK MASBUK Wah hai jiski kuch Rakate shuru ki na mili, phir shaamil hone ke baad laahik jo gaya.

BAHAR-E-SHARIAT Hissa 3 Safa 112

Title: Huzoor Hatheli Ke Lakhiro Ko Dekh Kar Zindagi Ke Bare Main Bolna Kaisa? Iski Kuch Haqiqat Hai Ya Nahi?
Content:
Jawab:

Sayyedi Alahazrat رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہ Irshad Farmate Hain Ke

Kahino Aur Jotishio Se Hath Dikha Kar Taqdeer Ka Bhala Bura Daryaft Karna Agar Ba Taur e Eteqad (Us Par Aqeeda Rahte Hue) Ho.

Yaani Jo Ye Bataayein Haq Hai.

To Kufr e Khalis Hai.

Isi Ko Hadees Me Farmaya

فقد كفر بما نزل على محمد ﷺ

Title: Logo Me Mashur Hai Ke Ye Deobandi Ya Tabligi Hai To Uski Dukan Ka Chicken Ya Gosht Khana Kaisa?
Content:

(3) Kya Har Chicken Ya Gosht Bechnewale Musalman Ke Aqaid Ki Tehkik Hamare Uper Zaroori Hai?


(4) Agar Tehkik Zaroori Hai. To Kis Tarah Kare?


ANSWER


Wahabiya Diyaabna Jin Ki Bad Mazhabi Hadd e Kufr Ko Pahunch Chuki Ho Un ka Zabah Kiya Hua Gosht Halal Nahi Balke Haraam Hai.

Yu Hi Agar Sunni Ne Zabah Kiya.

Magar Us Wahabi Ne Use Apni Dukan Me Rakha Aur Kuch Der Ke Liye Bhi Agar Sunni Ki Nazar Se Ojhal Hua.

To Gosht Haraam Ho Jaayega, Us Ka Khana Halal Nahi

Lehaza Jab Ke Kisi Ke Aqeede Se Muta'lliq Mushtabeh Ho.

To Us Ki Dukan Se Gosht Na Liya Jaaye Aur Is Zamane Me jab Ke Badmazhabo Ki Bhi Kasrat Hai.

Aqaaid Ka Maloom Kar Lena Behtar Hai.

Tahqeeq Ho Jaaye Ke Ye Sunni Sahihul Aqeeda Hai.

Yaani Wo Dosre Firqe Baatila Ko Kaafir Samajhta Hai.

Jin Ki Badmazhabi Hadd e Kufr Ko Pahunch Chuki.

To Us Ki Dukan Se Gosht Lene Me Harj Nahi.

Title: Kya wali ALLAH (walio) se direct mangna sahi hai.
Content:
Agar sahi hai toh koi dalil dejiye (quran aur hadees se).

Jawab:

Salf e Saaliheen ne Quboor e Auliya par haazri dene waale zaayereen aur dua karne waalo ke liye 2 tareeqe bayan kiye hai.

1) Pehla tareeqa ye hai ke Dua mangne waala Allah Ta'ala ka mohtaj aur faqeer hai aur apni haajat Allah ta'ala se talab karta hai.

Magar dua me saahib e mazar ki ruhaaniyat, buzurgi aur unki khidmaat e jaleela ka waseela pesh karte hue Allah Ta'ala se maangta hai aur ye arz karta hai ke

"Aye mere Maula! Is sahib e mazar ki barkat se aur us Rahmat o inayat ke sadqe jo tu ne is sahib e mazar par ki hai aur ise Azmat o buzurgi ataa farmaayi hai. Meri falaan Hajat ko poora Farma.

Kyu ke haqeeqi Ata karne waala aur muraadein poori karne waala tu hai."

2) Dosra tareeqa ye hai ke Dua mangne waala saahib e mazar ko mukhatab karte hue kahe ke

"Aye Allah Ta'ala ke Maqbool bande! Meri falaan muraad Allah Ta'ala se Talab keejiye, Allah Ta'ala mujhe Meri Matloob shai Ata Farmaaye."

Is tarah bhi sawal Allah Ta'ala hi se kiya jaata hai. Kyu ke Haqeeqi mushkil kusha wahi zaat hai.

Lekin ye usloob ikhtiyar karna ba tareeq e majaaz hai. Jiske tahet saahib e qabr ko ba taur e waseela pesh kiya jaata hai.

Ye tareeqa bhi is liye jaayez hai ke Allah Ta'ala is par Qadir hai ke jise chaahe us ki ilteja sunwa de.

Kyu ke hamara Aqeeda hai ke koi Qabr waala ho ya zinda chalta phirta insan, Allah Ta'ala ki taraf se Rahmat ke Bagair nahi soon sakta.

Ye Amr ba'eed nahi hai ke Allah Ta'ala dua karne waale ki awaaz ko qabr waale tak pohcha de aur phir saahib e Qabr Aalam e Arwaah me Allah Ta'ala se us haajat mand ke maqaasid ko poora kar dene ki ilteja kare.

Is tareeqe me bhi haajat mand bil waasta Allah Ta'ala hi se maang raha hota hai.

In Naazuk Eteqaadi umoor ko badi ehtiyaat ke sath Awaam e Muslim ke saamne bayan karna chahiye.

Baaz hazraat mazaraat par haazri dete waqt aise Amaal o Afaal karte hain jo jumhoor ummat ke shiaar ke khilaaf hain.

Iska nateeja ye hota hai ke Mukhaalifeen ko eteraaz ka mauqa mil jaata hai.

Isme qusoor dar haqeeqat hamare baaz aimma o khutaba ka hota hai.

Jo aise naazuk aqaaid me ehtiyaat malhooz nahi rakhte aur be jaa taweelaat aur ulte seedhe dalaail awaam ki taaid ki khatir bayan karte rehte hai.

Isse naaqis logo ke zahen uljhaao ka shikar ho jaate hain.

Hamara ye aqeeda hai ke hayaat e shaikh o murshid se dua karane ki surat me bhi haajat mangna Allah Ta'ala hi se Mutasauwwar hota hai.

Kyu ke wo bhi to Allah Ta'ala hi se mangte hai.

Koi Allah ka wali ya shaikh ye nahi kehta ke mai Haqeeqatan ye sab kuch dene waala hu.

Balke wo to ye kehte hain ke tum bhi Allah se maango aur hum bhi usi se tumhare liye dua karte hain.

Title: Jari mari qabrastan mein mayyat ko dafnate waqt qul ki mitti di jati thi par ab qabrastan ke intezamiya qul ki mitti dene se rok rahe hai
Content: Kya wo saheeh kar rahe hain. Hazrat Rehnumai Farmayein. Jawab: Aala hazrat azeemul barakat saiyyiduna Imam Ahmad Raza fazil e barailvi رضى الله تعالى عنه se sawal hua ke bawaqt e dafn e maiyyat ke dua wagairah parh ke chhote chhote dhela wagairah par dam kar ke qabr ke andar rakhna jaayez hai ya nahi? ISKE JAWAB ME IRSHAD FARMATE HAIN Koi harj nahin jabke jagah na ghere. (Fatawa razviyyah jild 4 safah 161) Huzoor sadrushshariah badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان irshad farmate hain قل هوالله Parh kar qabr ke andar mitti rakhne me harj nahi. (Fatawa amjadiya jild 1 safah 333) Dosri jagah farmate hain Kuchh kankariyo par quran majeed parh kar dam kar ke qabr me bagarz e tabarruk rakhein is mein aslan harj nahi, balke behtar hai. (Fatawa amjadiya jild 1 safah 330) Qul ki mitti rakhne me quran shareef ki soorat ki tilawat ki jaati hai. Lihaza isko rokna quran ki tilawat se rokna hai aur ise isal e sawab bhi karte hain isse bhi rokna hua. Lihaza isko rokna munasib nahi. والله تعالٰی اعلم -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Momin aur Musalman me kya Farq hai?
Content:
Jawab :

Iman aur Islam dono Mutaraadif hai.

Inferaadi surat me har ek ka dosre par itlaaq hota hai.

Lekin jab dono jama ho jaayein to Iman ka Ta'lluq Baatini umoor se hota hai, jabke Islam ka ta'lluq zaahir se.

Iski waazeh misaal "Hadees e Jibreel" aur Qissa e Wafd e Abd ul Qais me hai


"Hadees e Jibreel" me Iman ki Tareef Baatini umoor se ki gayi hai.

Farmaya: "Iman ye hai ke tum Iman lao Allah aur Malaika par,  Usse liqaa par, aur uske Rasoolo par aur Iman Laao Ba's Ba'ad al Maut par"

(Bukhari)

Aur "Qissa wafd e Abdul Qais" me iman ki tareef zaahiri umoor se ki gayi hai.

Farmaya: "kya tum jaante ho Allah Wah'dahu par Iman kya hai?

Logo ne kaha:  Allah aur uska Rasool behtar jaante hain.

Farmaya: Is baat ki shahadat ke Allah ke siwa koi Ma'bood nahi aur Ye ke Muhammad ﷺ Allah ke Rasool hain aur Namaz Qayem karna aur zakat dena aur Ramzan ke Roze rakhna.

ilaa Akhirih"

(Bukhari)


Lekin Hadees e Jibreel me Islam ki Tareef inhi zaahiri umoor se ki gayi hai is waja se ke usme Islam aur Iman dono jama ho gaye.

Isliye Iman ki Tareef me baatin ka lehaaz rakha gaya hai aur Islam me zaahir ka.

Isi liye Ahl e Ilm Farmate hain ke Iman ke darja Islam se bada hai.

Lehaza Momin aur Muslim me Is Tarah Nisbat hai ke Har Momin Muslim Hai.

Lekin Har Muslim Ka Momin hona zaruri nahi.

Kisi Buzurg ne Islam o Iman ki Ek jumle me yu tareef ki ke

"Islam ye hai ke Allah ko Maane" aur "Iman ye hai ke Allah ki Maane". 

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Zaid Ne Sawal kiya hai ke wo Umar e Qaza ki Namaz Adda Karna Chata hai Wo Kaise Adda Kare.
Content: Jawab: Bagair uzr e sharai ke namaz qaza kar dena gunah e kabeera hai. Farz ki qaza farz hai, aur wajib ki qaza wajib. Qaza ke liye koi waqt moaiyyan nahi, jab bhi umr me padhna chahe padh sakta hai. Magar jaldi karni chahiye aur tulu, zawal, ghuroob ke waqt na padhe, ke in waqto me namaz Jayez nahi. Jo namaz jaisi chooti wo waise hi padhi jayegi. Maslan safar me namaz qaza hui, ab us ko jab bhi padhega qasr hi padhega. Agarche iqamat (jo ke musafir e sharai na ho) ki halat me padhe. Aur jo namaz iqamat ki halat me qaza hui, wo namaz jab bhi padhega poori padhega. Agarche safar (92 kilometer ke safar ke irade se apni basti se bahar hua) me padhe. Magar qaza padhne ke waqt, gar koi uzr hai. To us uzr ka lehaz kiya jayega, ke jab qaza hui thi, to khada ho kar namaz padh sakta tha. Magar ab jab us qaza ko ada karna chahta hai to pair se mazoor hai. To baith kar hi padhega, ya ishare se padh sakta hai. To ishare padhega aur sehat hone ke baad i'aadah (Repeat) nahi hai. Ek ya chand (6 waqt ki namazon se kam) chooti to pahle qaza ko ada karna zaroori hai. Agar bahot si chooti hain ke use yaad bhi nahi ke kitni chhoti. To apne baligh hone ke zamane ko yaad kare aur fir gaur kare andaza lagaye ke kitni padhi hogi aur kitni chhooti. Jo chhootin hain unme se kitni safari hain aur kitni hazari aur fir jitne pe dil jam jaaye usse kuch zyadah padh jaaye. Tarteeb yeh hogi ke pahle farz Namazein mukammal kare, fir wajib aur ek ek namaz padhta jaye aur niyat qaza ki kare aur mukhtasar andaaz me padhe ke jaldi jaldi sab ada ho jayein. Uska mukhtasar tariqa Har roz ki namaz ki qaza 20 Rekaato ki hoti hai. Fajr ki 2 rakat farz, Zohar ki 4 rakat farz, Asar ki 4 rakat farz, Maghrib ki 3 rakat farz, Isha ki 4 rakat farz aur Isha ke 3 Witr. Qaza me yu Niyat karni zaruri hai ke Niyat ki Mai ne pehli Fajr jo Mujhse qaza hui, ya pehli zohar jo mujhse qaza hui. Isi tarah hamesha har namaz me kiya kare aur Jis par qaza namaz bahot kasrat se hain wo asani ke liye. Agar yu bhi ada kare to jaayez hai ke har Ruku aur har sajde me 3, 3 baar سبحٰن ربی العظیم. سبحٰن ربی الاعلٰی ki jagah sirf ek baar hi kahe. Magar ye hamesha har namaz me yaad rakhna chahiye ke jab Admi pura pahoch jaaye, us waqt سبحٰن ka س shuru kare aur jab العظیم ka م khatam kare us waqt ruku se sar uthaye. Isi tarah sajde me bhi jab pura pahoch jaaye us waqt tasbeeh shuru kare aur jab tasbeeh khatam ho jaaye us waqt sajda se sar uthaye. Dosri takhfeef ye ke farzo ki teesri aur chauthi rakat me surah Fatiha ki jagah sirf "سبحٰن اللہ" teen baar keh kar ruku me chale jayein. Magar wahi khayal zaruri hai ke seedhe khade ho kar tasbeeh shuru karein aur tasbeeh puri khade khade keh kar ruku ke liye sar jhukein. Ye takhfeef sirf farzo ki teesri aur chauthi rakat me hai. Witro ki teeno rakaato me Surah Fatiha aur Surah dono zaruri parhi jaayein. Teesri takhfeef ye ke pichli "التحيات" ke baad dono duroodo aur dua ki jagah sirf "اللهم صل على محمد واٰله" Keh kar salam pher den. Chauthi takhfeef witro ki teesri rakat me dua e qunoot ki jagah "الله اكبر" keh kar sirf "اللهم اغفرلي" kahe. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Khabardar Ye Shirk Hai
Content:
Allah tala farmata hai.
ख़ुदा बेशक उसको तो नहीं बख्शता कि उसका कोई और शरीक बनाया जाए हॉ उसके सिवा जो गुनाह हो जिसको चाहे बख्श दे और (माज़ अल्लाह) जिसने किसी को ख़ुदा का शरीक बनाया तो वह बस भटक के बहुत दूर जा पड़ा
(Quran: An-Nisa 4:116)

Hamare Mashre mE ek aisa Shirk faila huwa huwa Hai.

Jisko Hamare kuch bhai Jane Anjane me Har Subha Subha Apne Dukan Apni Tijarat me isko Anjaam dete hai wo ye hai ke Jab bhe koi pehla Kharidar (grahak) aata hai tab mol bhao ke waqt Dukandar ke mu se ye nikalta hai ke.

" Bhai "Bhoni" ka waqt hai le lO"

Ya phir...

" Aaj Subha se ab tak "Bhoni" nahi huwI"

Kya hai ye bhoni ?
Bhai ye Mushrikeen ke mabood ka naam hai ye mushreeko ka Aqeeda hai wo apne pahele kharidar ko mante hai aisa samjhte haI

Astagfirullah

Aaj Hamare Muslim bhai bhi is Shirk ka shikar ho rahe hai jab ke Allah Ta'Ala farmata hai.

"Bhala wo Apna Rizzak band karde to wo kaun hai jo tum ko Rizzak de ? "
(Quran: 67:21)

Allah hame sahe samjah de aur shirk se bachaye Aur Allah par he bhrosa rakhe Aaameen Ya Rabbal Aalameen.

Forward to All & Get sawab e Jariya

Title: Zaid Ke Room Me Ek Wali Ki Mazaar Ki Photo Lagi Hai. Kya Us Room Me Namaz Padhna Jayaz Hai?
Content:
Aur Jumeraat Ke Din Chirag Jalana Kaisa Hai?

Title: Hazrat Ek Group Me Bahas Ho Rahi Thi. Sab Ek Ho Jao Firka Parsti Choro?
Content:
Us Pe Usne Ye Daleel Bhi Bheja Iska Jawab Inayat Farma De..

Beshaq Jo Log Apne Deen Ke Tukde Tukde Kar Chukey Hai Aur Firqo Firqo Me Taqsim Ho Chukey Hai Unn Logon Ke Saath (Aye NABI Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam) Aapka Koi Ta'alluq Nahi, Unka Muamla Toh Sirf ALLAH Ke Hawale Hai.
{Surah Al-Aan'aam(6) Ayat-159}

Jawab :


Mazkoora Aayat Ka Sahi Tarjama Ye Hai.


إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَرَّقُوا۟ دِينَهُمْ وَكَانُوا۟ شِيَعًا لَّسْتَ مِنْهُمْ فِى شَىْءٍ ۚ إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُمْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
وہ جنہوں نے اپنے دین میں جُدا جُدا راہیں نکالیں او رکئی گروہ ہوگئے اے محبوب! تمہیں ان سے کچھ علا قہ نہیں ان کا معاملہ اللہ ہی کے حوالے ہے پھر وہ انہیں بتادے گا جو کچھ وہ کرتے تھے
6-Al-An'am : 159

Yaani Wo Log Jinho Ne Khud Apne Deen Me Alag Alag Raahein Nikaal Li.

Na Ke Wo Log Jo Ke Sahaba Ke Naqsh e Qadam Par Hain.

Hum Alag Nahi Hui.

Balke Ye Naye Naye Firqa e Batila Khud Hum Se Apne Aqaaid Ki Buniyaad Par Alag Ho Gaye.

Title: Hazrat Namaz Mein Ya khaana khate waqt topi pehna kaha se sabit hai.
Content: Kya Ye sunnat tarika hai. Ya sirf adab ke lihaz se hai ? Jawab : Namaz me sar dhankne se Muta'lliq Huzoor sadrushshari'ah badruttariqah عليه الرحمة والرضوان irshad farmate hain. Susti se nange sar namaz parhna ya'ni topi pahenna bojh ma'loom hota ho ya garmi ma'loom hoti ho makrooh e tanzihi hai aur agar tahqeer e namaz maqsood hai. Maslan namaz koi aisi muhtam bishshan chiz nahi jiske liye topi imamah pahna jaaye to ye kufr hai aur khushu o khuzu ke liye sar bar'hana (nange sar) parhi to mustahab hai. Namaz me topi gir padi to utha lena afzal hai. Jabke amal e kaseer ki haajat na pade warna namaz fasid ho jaayegi aur baar baar uthani pade to chhor de aur na uthane se khuzu maqsood ho to na uthana afzal hai (Bahar e shari'at hissa 3 safah 171 makroohaat ka bayan) Hadees shareef me hai sakar e aqdas صلی اللہ تعالی عليه وسلم irshad farmate hain ke hamare aur mushrikeen ke maa bain ye farq hai ke hamare imaame topiyo par hote hain (Tirmizi shareef / Bahar e shari'at hissa16 safah 41 libas ka bayan) Aur rahi baat khana khate waqt to ye khane ke Adaab se hai ke Sar dhank kar khaya jaaye aur topi pahenna Momin ki shan aur kuffar se imtiyaz ka ek Nishaan o Alaamat hai. Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Waada Kar Ke Pura Na Karna Aur Waada Khilafi Karne Ka Kya Hukm Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Deen e Islam Ne Apne Manne Waalo Ko Jhoot Bolne Se Mana Kiya aur Sach Kehne Ki Takeed Ki Hai.

Jis Tarah Jhoot Bolna Bura Hai.

Usi Tarah Jhoota Amal Bhi Bura Hai Aur Us Ki Mumaana'at Aayi Hai.

Jis Tarah Qaul (Baat) Ki Sachchaai Matloob Hai.

Usi Tarah Amal Ki Sachchaai Bhi Matloob Hai.

Waada Khilaafi Amali Jhoot Me Shumar Hota Hai Aur Waada Pura Karna Amali Sidq (Sachchaai) Kehlata Hai.

Islam Me Badi Takeed Ke Sath Ahed Ko Pura Karne Ka Hukm Aur Ahed Shikni Ki Mazammat Hai.

Lehaza Quran e Majeed Me Allah Ta'ala Ka Irshad Hai.

واوفوا بالعهد ان العهد كان مسؤولا

Maf'hoom: Ahed Ko Pura Karo, Kyu Ke Qiyamat Ke Din Ahed Ke Baare Me Insan Jawab Deh Hoga.

Quran Ne Un Logo Ki Tareef Ki Hai, Jo Apne Ahed Ka Paas o Lehaaz Rakhte Hain.

Irshad e Baari Ta'ala Hai.

والذين هم لاماناتهم وعدهم راعون

Aur Jo Log Apni Amaanato Aur Apne Waado Ki Paasdari Karne Waale Hain.

Khud ALLAH Tabaarak Wa Ta'ala Ne Apni Sifat Ka Kai Jagaho Par Zikr Farmaya Hai Ke ALLAH Waada Khilafi Nahi Farmata.

Rasoolullah ﷺ ne Apne Irshadat Ke Zariye Bhi Ifaa e Ahed ki Ahmiyat Aur Waada Khilafi Ki Buraai Bayan Farmayi Hai.

Yahan Tak Ke Huzoor ﷺ ne Munaafiq Ki Nishaaniyo Me Se Ek Nishani Waada Khilaafi Bataaya,

Hadees e Paak Me Hai Rasoolullah ﷺ ne Farmaya:

Munafiq Ki 3 Alaamate Hain

① Jab Baat Kare To Jhoot Bole
② Jab Waada Kare To Khilaf Warzi Kare
③ Aur Jab Us Ke Paas Amaanat Rakhwaai Jaaye To Usme khayaanat Kare.

Muslim Shareef

Waada khilaafi Ko Huzoor ﷺ Ne Nifaaq Ki Alaamat Me Shumar Farmaya.

Is Se Andaza Kiya Ja Sakta Hai Ke Waada Khilafi Kis Qadr Mazmoom Baat Hai.

Ye Niyat Ki Baad Diyaanati Ka Aur Jhooti Niyat Ka Nateeja Hai.

Kyu Ke Admi Gunahgar Us Waqt Hai, Jab Waada, Ya Ahed Karte Waqt Us Ki Niyat Hi Wafa Ki Na Ho, Ya Baad Me Wafa Ki Niyat Par Qayam Na Rahe.

Agar Niyat Waada Wafa Karne Ki Hai.

Magar Halaat Ke Hatho Be Ikhtiyaar Hone Ki Waja Se Waada Wafa Na Kar Saka, To Us Par Muaakhza Nahi.

Waada Khilafi Ek Akhlaaqi Jurm Bhi Hai Aur Shar'an Bhi.

Allah Ta'ala Hame Waada khilaafi Se Mahfooz Farmaye.
آمین بجاه شفیع المذنبین ﷺ

Title: Aurate kabrastan me kyu nahi ja sakti?
Content: Jawab: Aurato ka Qabro par jaana ikhtelafi Mas'la hai. Aksar Ahl e Ilm ise Haraam, Ya Makrooh e Tahrimi Kahte hain, ye ikhtelaf yu paida hua ke ek zamane me Qabro par jaana sab ko mana tha. Mardo ko bhi aur Aurato ko bhi. Baad me Huzoor pur Noor ﷺ ne iski Ijazat ataa farma di aur irshad farmaya: "Qabro ki ziyarat kiya karo, wo Akhirat ki yaad dilaati hain". Jo Hazrat Qabro par jaane ko jaayez rakhte hain, unka kehna hai ke ye Ijazat jo Huzoor ﷺ ne Ataa Farmaayi, Mardo aur Aurato sab ko shamil hai. Aur Jo Hazrat Najaayez kehte hain, unka istedlal ye hai ke Huzoor ﷺ ne aisi aurato par Laanat farmayi hai jo qabro ki ziyarat ke liye jayein. Lehaza Qabro par jana unke liye Mamnol aur Moojib e Laanat hoga. Aur Ulama ye bhi farmate hain ke Auratein ek to Shara'i Masail se kam waqif hoti hain, dosre unme sabr, Hausla aur zabt kam hota hai. Isliye unke Haq me Gaalib andesha yahi hai ke ye wahan jaa kar Cheekh pukaar karengi, Be Pardagi hogi, Ya Koi Biddat khadi karengi. Shayed isi Andeshe ki bina par. Huzoor ﷺ ne unke Qabro par jaane ko Moojib e Laanat farmaya. Huzoor Sadrush Shariah Irshad Farmate hain: Mazhab e Saheeh ye hai ke Hadees "لعن الله زوارات القبور" Mansookh hai ye Hukm muqaddam hai aur dosri Hadees Jisme ziyarat e Quboor ki ijazat hai wo Muta'kkhar o Naasikh hai. Wo Hadees ye hai "كنت نهيتكم عن زيارة القبور الا فزوروها" Is Hadees me agarche segha muzakkar hai. Magar ye amr muqarrar aur saabit hai ke khitabaat e Shara'iyyah me agarche segha muzakkar Hai. Auratein bhi isme dakhil hain, jab tak daleel e Shara'i se rijaal ki khususiyat saabit na aur Hadees "النساء شقائق الرجال" Iski kashif hai. Lehaza ziyarat e quboor se Aurato ko murtakib e Fe'l e Haraam nahi kaha jayega. Agarche hamaare nazdeek aslam tareeqa ye hai ke Aurato ko ziyarat e quboor se mana kiya jaaye, kyuke unme ifraat o tafreet ka Maaddah gaalib hai aur surat e Mas'oola me hijaab aur Adaab e e'zaaz ka pura lehaaz kiya gaya hai. Lehaza hukm me aur mazeed khiffat paida ho gayi. (Fatawa Amjadia jild 1 safah 327) Huzoor Sayyedi Aala hazrat Farmate hain: "Meri Raaye is masle me khilaaf par hai, muddat hui mera fatwa Tohfa e Hanafiyya me Chhap chuka, mai us Rukhsat ko jo Bahr ur Raayeq me likhi maan kar Nazr ba Halaat e Nisaa Siwa e Hazri e Rauza e Anwar ke Wajib ya Qareeb ba Wajib Hai. Mazaraat e Aulia ya Deegar Quboor ki ziyarat ko Aurato ka jaana Ba Itteba e Guniya Allama Muhaqqiq Ibraheem Halabi Har giz pasand nahi karta khususan is tufaan e be tameezi raqs o mazameer o surood me jo aaj kal johhaal ne A'raas e Tayyeba me barpa kar rakha hai is ki shirkat to mai awaam e rijaal ko bhi pasand nahi rakhta na ke wo jin ko Anjasha Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anh ki Hadi Khwani ba ilhaan e Khush par Aurato ke saamne Mumaana'at farma kar unhe nazuk sheeshiyaan farmaya gaya". (Fatawa Razaviyyah mutarjam jild 23 safah 111) Lehaza Mazkoora Baala Aqwaal e Foqaha se Ye Saabit ho gaya ke Aurato ke Mazaraat par Jaana fi zamaanina Najaayez hai aur iski Mumaana'at Mahram o Gair Mahram ki Buniyaad par nahi. Balke Unki Parda Nasheeni aur Aaj kal hone waale khuraafaat o bad'tameezi ki buniyaad par hai. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Hazrat Dua mangna kitna zaroori hai?
Content:
Aur agar koi insaan dua nahi mangta to kya agarche uska yakeen yeh ho ki jo mere taqdeer me likha hai wo Allah Ta'Ala mujhe ataa karnewala hai. Sawal karne ka maqsad dua ki ehmiyat ko samjna hai. Dua maange, ya fir sirf hame di hui nemato ka shukr adaa kare. Is baat ko Samajhna hai. Jawab de kar hamari islaah kare. Jawab Beshak Allah Ta'ala ne jo bhi Ne'matein Ataa Farmaayi hain Us Par Sabr Karna aur Rab Ta'ala ka Shukr Baja Lana Har Musalman Par Laazim hai. Magar Dua Se Inkar karna aur Na Maangna Sakht Mahroomi hai, ke Dua se Taqdeer (Qaza e Muallaq, ya shabeeh ba mubram) Badal bhi sakti hai. Aur Dua Karna Allah Ko Raazi karne ka Ek Haseen waseela hai. Dua Jis Tarah Allah Ta'ala Se Munajaat Karne, Us Ki Qurbat Hasil Karne, Us Ke Fazl o Inaam Ke Mustahiq Hone Aur Bakhshish, Wa Maghfirat Ka Parwana Hasil Karne Ka Nihayat Aasan Aur Mujarrab Zariya Hai. Isi Tarah Dua Allah Tabaarak wa Ta'ala Ke Pyare Habib ﷺ Ki Sunnat, Us Ke Pyare Bando Ki Aadat Aur Dar Haqeeqat Ibadat. Balki Maghz-E-Ibadat Aur Gunahgaar Bando Ke Haqq Me Allah Ta'ala Ki Taraf Se Ek Bahot Badi Ne’mat Wa Sa’adat Hai. Quran-E-Kareem, Wa Ahadees e Mubaraka Me Jagah Jagah Dua Maangne Ki Targeeb Dilayi Gayi Hai. Dua Se Mutalliq Quran-E-Kareem Me Farmane Baari Ta’ala Hai : Tarjuma-E-Kanzul Iman :
"Aur Tumhare Rab Ne Farmaya Mujh Se Dua Karo Main Qubool Karunga Beshak Wo Jo Meri Ibadat Se Unche Khinchte (Takabbur Karte) Hain An Qareeb Jahannum Me Jayenge Zaleel Ho Kar." (Al Qur’an : Parah: 24 , Al'Mominoon : 60)
Ek Maqaam Par Irshaad Farmaya : Tarjuma-E-Kanzul Iman :
"Aur Aye Mehboob Jab Tum Se Mere Bande Mujhe Poochein To Main Nazdeek Hoon Dua Qubool Karta Hoon Pukarne Wale Ki Jab Mujhe Pukare To Unhein Chahiye Mera Hukm Maane Aur Mujh Par Imaan Laaye Ke Kahin Raah Paayein." (Al Qur’an : Parah : 2 , Al' Baqarah : 186)
Neez Nabi-E-Kareem ﷺ Ne Kaseer Ahadees Mubaraka Me Baar Baar Dua Mangne Ki Targheeb Dilaayi Hai. Chunanche Irshaad Farmaya : “Dua Ibadat Ka Maghz Hai” Aur Na Maangne Ki Surat Me Rabbe Jaleel Ka Nihayat Sakht Hukm Bhi Sunaya : “Jo Mujh Se Na Mangega Main Us Par Ghazab Farmaunga”. Sarkar e Aqdas ﷺ Ka Farman e Aalishan Hai : Jo Musalman Aisi Dua Kare Jis Me Gunah Wa Qata e Rehmi Ki Koi Baat Shamil Na Ho. To ALLAH Ta'ala Use Teen (3) Cheezon Me Se Koi Ek Zaroor At’aa Farmata Hai: 1) Us Ki Dua Ka Nateeja Jald Hi Us Ki Zindagi Me Zahir Ho Jata Hai. 2) ALLAH Ta'ala Koi Musibat Us Bande Se Door Farma Deta Hai. 3) Us Ke Liye Aakhirat Me Bhalayi Jama Kar Di Jaati Hai. Ek Riwayat Me Hai Ke Banda Jab Aakhirat Me Apni Duaon Ka Sawab Dekhega Jo Duniya Me Mustajaab (Yani qubool) Na Hui Thi. To Tamanna Karega: Kaash ! Duniya Me Meri Koi Dua Qubool Na Hui Hoti. (Tirimizi : 5/243 , Hadees : 3382 Al Jama ul Sageer : Safha : 377 , Hadees : 6069) (Tirimizi : 5/292 , Hadees : 3490) Hazrate Sayyeduna Abu Hurairah ﺭﺿﻲ ﺍﻟﻠﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟٰﯽ ﻋﻨﻪ Se Riwayat Hai Ki Nabi-E-Kareem ﷺ ne irshad farmaya “Dua Momin Ka Hathiyaar, Deen Ka Stuoon Aur Zameeno Aasman Ka Noor Hai.” (Mustadrak: Jild 2 , Safha 162) Ameerul Momineen Hazrate Sayyeduna Umar bin Al-Khattab ﺭﺿﻲ ﺍﻟﻠﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟٰﯽ ﻋﻨﻪ Farmate Hain Ke “Beshak Dua Zameeno Aasman Ke Darmiyan Ruk Jaati Hai Aur Jab Tak Tum Apne Nabi ﷺ Par Durood-E-Paak na Parh Lo, Us Me Se Koi Cheez Buland Nahi Hoti.” Ameerul Momineen Hazrate Sayyeduna Ali ﺭﺿﻲ ﺍﻟﻠﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟٰﯽ ﻋﻨﻪ Se Marwi Hai Ki “Har Dua Rok Di Jaati Hai Jab Tak ALLAH Ke Mehboob ﺻﻠﯽ ﺍﻟﻠﮧ ﺗﻌﺎﻟٰﯽ ﻋﻠﯿﮧ ﻭﺍﻟﮧ ﻭﺳﻠﻢ Par Durood Na Parh Liya Jaaye.” (Jamia At Timizi : Hadees 486) (Tabrani : Jild 1, Safha 211). -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Kya khawateen kisi majboori ki wajah se apne baal kaat sakti hai?
Content:
Jaise ke baal ka tootna wagerah. Treatment ke tor par

Jawab:

Musalman Aurato ke liye Sar ke baal lambe rakhna wajib hai aur bila uzr o zarurat katwaana sakht najaayez hai.

Hadrat Ali Radi-Allahu Ta'ala anh se Marwi hai ke Nabi kareem ﷺ ne aurat ko sar moondne se mana kiya hai.

Mulla Ali qari Farmate hain: "Aurat ke liye sar ke baal moondna isliye haraam hai ke Aurato ki Mendhiyaan Hai'at aur husn o jamal me mardo ki daarhi ki tarah hain. 

Agar maqsad e zeenat ke bagair sirf zarurat ki waja se baal kaate jaayein, maslan zyada lambe ho jaayein aur un ko sanwaarna mushkil ho jaaye wagaira to ba qadr e zarurat kaat lene me koi harj nahi hai."

Isi tarah agar baal girte hain to kuch baal kaatne se uska ilaaj ho sakta hai to kaat sakte hain.

Magar baal kaatne ka maqsad agar kaafir o fasiq aurato, ya mardo ke sath mushabahat ikhtiyar karna ho.

To bila shak o shubah ye Haraam Amal hai.

Kyu ke Nabi e Kareem ﷺ ne Umoomi taur par kuffaf ke sath Mashabahat ikhtiyar karne aur Aurato ko Mardo ki Mushabahat ikhtiyar karne se mana farmaya hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi 
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Shari'at me Aurat ko parda karne ka Huqm diya gaya hai.
Content:
To Parade ke liye Aurat ko kya karna hai Aur kya nahi karna hai?

1) Aurat ko parde ke sath Ghar se bahar nikal ne ki Ijazat kab hai?

2) Aurat ka Burka pahan kar Restaurant me khane ke liye jana kaisa?

3) Aurat ka Burka pahan kar Sea beach (Chaupati/marine lines) par ghumne jana kaisa?

4) Aurat ko shar'an kaisa Libas pahan na chahiye ?

5) Abhi Auratein Jo Jeans T-shirt langees Burka ke under pahan kar Garden me Walking ke liye, Aur Gym me exercise ke liye Jati hai wo kaisa?

6) Abhi Jo Auratein Beauty Parlor me shajati-shawarti hai wo kahatak durust hai?

7) Shar'an Aurato ko kiske liye shajne sawarne ki Ijazat hai?

Jawab:

Sawal me parde se mutalliq pooche gaye 7 nukaat se pehle kuch zaruri aur ahem cheezo ka samajhna zaruri hai.

Parde ka hukm bila shubah ek deeni aur shara'i amr hai.

Aur ek mohlik aur khatarnak fitne yaani behayaai, uryaani, siyah kaari aur fahhaashi ke sadd e baab aur uski rok tham ke liye parde ka hukm diya gaya hai.

Ye fitna insaniyat aur insani society ke liye zahr e qatil aur qaumo ki barbadi ka pesh khaima hai.

Isliye Shari'at e mutahhara ne behayaai aur fahhaashi ke tamam zariyo se Islami Mua'ashre ko mahfooz rakhne ke liye parde ka hukm diya.

Parde ke ehtemam ke liye Quran e paak me taqreeban 7 aayatein aur Ahadees ke Zakheero me 70 se zaayed Hadeesein maujood hain.

Jo Aurto ke liye parde ke silsile me Rahnumai ka kaam deti hain.

Ab Apke pooche gaye sawalat tarteeb waar zikr kiye jaate hain.

1) Ayaat aur riwayaat me Gaur o fikr karne se ye baat saamne aati hai, ke Aurat ke liye asl parda uske ghar ki chaar diwaari hai.

Kyuke aurat ki misaal ek chupe hue khazaane ki hai jisko sirf wahi Shakhs kaam laa sakta hai, jo uska Shar'an maalik ho.

Aurat ko apne ghar ki chaar diwaari hi me baithe rehne ka hukm diya gaya.

Surah Al Ahzaab Aayat 33 ka tarjamah hai

"aur tum apne gharo me qarar se raho"

is aayat se maloom hua ke aurat ka asl shara'i parda gharo me baithna hai.

Taake unka koi bhi hissa mardo ke saamne zaahir na ho.

Hadees shareef me Rasoolullah ﷺ ka irshad e giraami manqool hai.

Aurat parde me rehne ki cheez hai, chunanche jab koi aurat (apne parde se) baaher nikalti hai to Shaitan usko mardo ki nazar me accha karke dikhata hai.

Lehaza in Nusoos ko buniyad bana kar Ummat e Muslimah ke fikr e saleem rakhne waale daanishwaro aur daanaao ne jinhe duniya Fuqaha e kiram ke naam se janti hai, ye fatwa jaari kiya ke aurat ka bila zarurat e Shara'i ghar se nikalna haraam aur gunah e kabeera hai.

2,3) Islam ek Mutashaddid mazhab nahi.

Jisme hukm ka sirf ek hi pehlu ho ke auratein gharo hi me baithi rahein.

Balke Islam ne unki Shara'i zarurato ki bina par unko ghar se baher nikalne ki ijaazat di hai aur wo Shara'i Hudood me rehte hue apne Mahaarim o shauhar ke sath kisi restaurant me khana bhi kha sakti hai aur Mahaarim o Shauhar ke sath Hudood ki paasdaari karte hue jaayez sair o tafreeh ke liye bhi jaa sakti hai.

Albatta is fitna e behayaai ke pesh e nazar aurat par ghar se baaher nikalte waqt kuch paabandiyaan lagaai hain.

Surah al Ahzaab aayat 59 ke irshad e baari ta'ala ka tarjama hai.

"Aye Habeeb (ﷺ) apni beebiyo se aur apni saahebzaadio se aur dosre Musalmano ki bibiyo se farma dijiye ke (sar se) neechi kar liya karein apne (chehre) ke upar thodi si apni chaadarein".

Iski tafseer me Hadrat Adullah bin Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anhuma parde ki kaifiyat naql karte hue farmate hain ke.

Aurat jab kisi zarurat e Shara'i ki wajah se baaher nikle, to ek badi chaadar ke zariye sar aur chehra dhaanp kar nikle aur saaf raasta dekhne ke liye ek ankh khuli rahe.

4) Quran e Majeed o Ahadees e Taiyyeba ke Mutaala se Maloom hota hai ke libas chaahe mard ka ho, ya aurat ka. Wo aisi cheez ka naam hai jo insani jism ke khadd o khaal numaaya (zahir) kiye begair uski satr poshi kare.

Aur agar libas aisa ho ke insani jism ke khadd o khaal usse zahir o numaaya hon to Shari'at e Islamiya use libas shumar hi nahi karti.

Balke aisa libas pahenne waalo ko bar'hana (nanga) qarar deti hai.

Shar'an aurat aur mard dono ke liye yahi libas hai.

Jo libas is me'yaar par pura na utre wo mamnoo hai aur jo is me'yaar par pura utre wo Mubaah aur Halal hai.

Libas Mulki ya Gair Mulki, Ilaqaai, ya pardesi nahi hota.

Libas Shara'i aur Gair Shara'i hota hai, chaahe kisi bhi tarah ka ho.

5) Agar aurat apne saare jism ko burqa me lapet kar aur jism ko mukammal dhaanp kar nikle ke tamam badan chup jaaye, to andar usne kaise kapre pehne hain isse koi garz nahi.

Fatwa uske baatin par nahi, balke zahir par hoga.

6) Shariat ne Aurat ko apne Shauhar ke liye makup ki ijazat di hai, dosro ke liye nahi.

Magar islami Ta'leemat se doori ki wajah se hamare Mu'ashre ki khawateen iske bar aks (opposite) chal rahi hai  jo ke najaayez o haraam hai.

7) Aurat ko sirf apne shauhar hi ke liye sajne sanwarne ka hukm hai, aur wo shauhar ke liye singhaar nahi karegi, to phir kiske liye Bane sanwaregi?

Quran Majeed ne waazeh taur par Hukm diya hai ke biwi apne shauhar ke liye makeup karegi aur uske ilaawa biwi apne rishtedaaro ke liye bhi Ban sanwar nahi sakti hai.

Surah al Noor Aayat 31 ka Mutaala Karein ke jis me Allah Ta'ala ne Farmaya ke:

Wo Apne Banaao singhaar ko (kisi par) zaahir na kiya karein siwa apne shauharo ke ya baap dada ya apne shauharo ke baap dada ke ya apne beto ya apne shauharo ke beto ke ya apne bhaaiyo ya apne bhateejo ya apne bhaanjo ke ya apni (hum mazhab, Musalman) Aurato ya apni mamlooka baandio ke ya mardo me se wo khidmat gaar jo khwahish o shahwat se khaali hon ya wo bacche jo (kam umri ki waja se abhi) aurato ki parde waali cheezo se agaah nahi hue (ye bhi Mustasna hain).

Is Aayat ki raushni me pata chala ke biwi ko apne shauhar ke liye har waqt ban sanwar kar rehna chahiye.

Jab biwi aisa karegi to shauhar usse hamesha khush rahega aur kisi dosri aurat ki taraf maayel nahi hoga.

Agar muaamla iska ulta ho to phir dono ke Ta'alluqat kharab ho jaate hain, fitna fasaad hota hai.

Magar afsos ye hai ke aaj ke Muaashre me aurat jab baaher jaane lagti hai.

To khoob banaao singhaar karti hai, makeup karti hai aur ghar ke andar shauhar ke saamne sahi libas bhi nahi pahenti hai, jo ke haraam hai.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi 
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Istekhara Ka Tarika Aur Niyat
Content:
Istekhara ki bahot si Suratein Bayan ki jaati hain.

Magar saheeh tareen aur Itmenaan bakhsh istekhara ka tarika wahi hai jo hadees me zikr hai ke

''جب کوئی کسی امر کا قصد کرے تو دو رکعت نفل پڑھے پھر کہے۔

*اَللّٰھُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَسْتَخِیْرُکَ بِعِلْمِکَ وَاَسْتَقْدِرُکَ بِقُدْرَتِکَ وَ اَسْأَ لُکَ مِنْ فَضْلِکَ الْعَظِیْمِ فَاِنَّکَ تَقْدِرُ وَلَا اَقْدِرُ وَ تَعْلَمُ وَلَا اَعْلَمُ وَاَنْتَ عَلَّامُ الْغُیُوْبِ اَللّٰھُمَّ اِنْ کُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ اَنَّ ھٰذَا الْاَمْرَ خَیْرٌ لِّیْ فِیْ دِیْنِیْ وَمَعَاشِیْ وَعَاقِبَۃِ اَمْرِیْ اَوْقَالَ عَاجِلِ اَمْرِی وَاٰجِلِہٖ فَاقْدُرْہُ لِیْ وَیَسِّرْہُ لِیْ ثُمَّ بَارِکْ لِیْ فِیْہِ وَاِنْ کُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ اَنَّ ھٰذَا الْاَمْرَ شَرٌّ لِّیْ فِیْ دِیْنِیْ وَمَعَاشِیْ وَعَاقِـبَۃِ اَمْرِیْ اَوْ قَالَ عَاجِلِ اَمْرِیْ وَاٰجِلِہٖ فَاصْرِفْہُ عَنِّیْ وَاصْرِفْنِیْ عَنْہُ وَاقْدُرْ لِیَ الْخَیْرَ حَیْثُ کَانَ ثُمَّ رَضِّنِیْ بِہٖ .

اور اپنی حاجت کا ذکر کرے خواہ بجائےھٰذَا الْاَمْر

کے حاجت کا نام لے یا اُس کے بعد۔

Niyat :- namaz e istakhara

نويت ان اصلى لله تعالى ركعتي صلوة الاستخاره متوجها الى جهة الكعبة الشريفة الله اكبر

Title: Namaz ka hukm Hamal wali aurat pe kya hai?
Content:
Hamal ke dauran peshab ki jagah se paani nikalte rehta hai.

Toh kya iss surat mein namaz ya tilawat hosakti hai?

Rehumanyi Farmaiye.

Jawab:

Haamila Aurat Par Namaz Farz Hai.

Agar Is Dauran Har dam Aage ke maqaam se Rutoobat nikalti hai,

To wo sailaan e Reham hai Aur Isse Wazu Toot Jaata Hai.

Lehaza Jab ye paani nikle to wazu dobara karna hoga.

Aur Agar Ma'zoor hai ke Hamesha pani nikalta hi rehta hai ke poore Ek Namaz ke waqt me itna waqt bhi nahi milta ke Wazu karke Farz Namaz bhi ada kar sake to Wo Ma'zoor hai.

Har Namaz ke Waqt Wazu karke Us Waqt me jitni chahe Namazein aur Auraad o Wazaaif o Tilawat e Qur'an wagaira kar sakti hai aur jaise hi us Namaz ka waqt khatam ho jaaye wazu jaata rahega.

Phir dobara wazu karna hoga.

Title: Hazrat Kya Hum Faal (Falnama) Kholsakte Hain?
Content:
Faal (Falnama) Hota Kya Hai?
Aur Kya Uspar Jo bhi Jawab Aaye Uspar Amal Kar Sakte Hain?

Aur Agar Usmein Jawab Manaa Ke Talluk se Aaye, Toh kya Bachna Zaruri Hai.

Hazrat Baraye Karam Rehnumai Farmaye

Jawab:

Quran e Azeem se Faal Dekhne me Aimma e Mazaahib e Arba'ah ke 4 Aqwaal Hain.

1) Baaz Hanaabila Mubaah Kehte Hain.

2) Shafaiyyah Makrooh e Tanzeehi Kehte Hain.

3) Maalikiyyah Haraam Kehte Hain.

4) Hamaare Ulama e Hanafiyyah Farmaate Hain NaJaayez o Mamnoo o Makrooh e Tahrimi Hai.

Qur'an e Azeem is Liye Na Utaara Gaya.

Hamara Qaul, Qaul e Malakiyyah Ke Qareeb Hai.

Balke Ind Al Tahqeeq Dono Ka Ek Haasil Hai.

Jab Ke Aaj Kal Ke Dhongi Baba Jo Faal Kholte Hain aur Us Par Yaqeen Karna na Jaayez o Haraam Hai Ke Faal Kholne Dekhne se Muttaliq Aala Hazrat Ka Irshad hai.

Agar Faal Kholne wala Waqai O Yaqeen Ke Saath Koi Cheez Batata, To Woh Musalman Hi Nahi Rehta.

Kyu Ke Hadees E Paak Ka Irshad Hai Ke Usne Us Cheez Ke Saath Kufr Kiya, Jo Muhammad ﷺ Par Utari Gayi, aur Dekhnewala Yaqeen Nahi Rakhta, Phir bhi Ajkal Jo Faal Kholne Ka Rivaj Hai Gunaho Aur Buraiyon Se Khaali Nahi.

Aise Shakhs ki Imamat Najayez (Jo Faal Dekhta Kholta Ho)

Fatawa E Razaviya 10/119

Title: Auliya Allah Ke Mazaar paak Par Urs ke Mouke Par Ghusl Diya Jata Hai Iski Sharai Dalil Kya Hai
Content:
Mazaar Par Ghusl Dena Kaha se Sabit Hai.

Jawab:

Mazaar shareef ka Ghusl mazaar shareef ko dhona hai.

Ye saaf safaai hai ise adaban ghusl kahte hai.


Safaai ko nisf imaan farmaya gaya hai aur safaai ke fawaaid se kisi ko inkar nahi.


Magar wahabi deobandi ko kya kahiye ke safaai ke mutalliq quran hakeem me aayatein bhi hain aur bakasrat ahadees bhi.

Magar qurani aayat bhi nazar andaaz aur ahadees se bhi bekhabar aur auliya o ambiya se dushamani me itni moti moti daleel bhi nazar na aai aur kyu nazar aati.

Auliya e kiraam o ambiya e kiraam ki dushamani me andhe ho chuke hai.

To andho ko ambiya o auliya ki azmato ke dalaail nazar nahin aate.

Log apne ghar makan dukan ko dhote hain uski safaai karte hain us waqt daleel ki baat nahin aati aur jahan auliya kiram o ambiya kiram ki nisbat ki baat aai daleel talab ki jaati hai.

Ka'ba shareef ka bhi ghusl hota hai iski bhi hai koi daleel?

Jab Allah Ta'ala aur uske rasool صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ne mana nahi farmaya to ye log kaun hote hain mana karne wale.

Allah Ta'ala unke makr o fareb se bachaaye
آمین بجاه شفیع المذنبین ﷺ

Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Hinda ka Shohar Sharabi Hai Shadi ko 11wa Saal Chal Raha Hai.
Content:
11 Saal se aur Bigadta hi Jaraha Hai.

Har Time Jagda Fasad Gaali Galoch Karta Rehta Hai.

Uske 2 Judwa Bete Hai. Jinki Umr 4 Ya 5 Saal Hogi.

Ab Hinda Ko Dar Hai ke Isko Dekhke Bachchon Pe Asar Na Padh Jaye

Ab Hinda Talaq Maang Rahi Hai.

Kya Yeh Hinda Sahi Kar rahi Hai?

Talaq ke Baad Bachchon Ko Use Dekhna Ho, Ghoomne Le Jana Ho.

Toh Woh Le Ja Sakta Hai, Aksar Nashe Me Rehta Hain.

Huzoor Rehnumai Farmaye

Jawab:

Agar Waaqai Shauhar Use izaa (Taklif) Deta Hai.

To usse Talaq Ka Mutaalba Kar Sakti Hai.

Yaani Aurat ki Janib Se Maal Ho Aur us Maal Ke Badle Wo Apne Shauhar se Talaq Ka Mutaalba Kare.

Jise Khula Kehte Hain.

Baap ko Apne Beto se Mulaqat Karne Se Roka Nahi Jayega.

Haan, Agar Bachcho Ko Gumraah Karne Ka Khadsha e Saheeh Ho, to Bachcho Par Nigrani Rakhe.

Title: Masjid Ko ALLAH Ka Ghar Mat Kaho Aur Us Par Ye Dalil Dete Hai Ki
Content:
Saari Kainaat Ka Maalik ALLAH Hi Hai.

Saari Zameen Usike Ke Kabze Me Hai,

Aur Jab Shariyat e Mohammadi (ﷺ) Me Ham Ummatiyo Namaz Ke Liye Zameen Ka Har Hissa Waqf Kiya Gaya Hai.

Sirf Masjid Ko ALLAH Ka Ghar Kyu Kehna?

Jawab :

Hadees e Paak Me Masjid Ka Lugwi Maana Muraad hai.

Yaani, Puri Ru-e-Zameen Par Kisi Bhi Jagah Namaz Jaayez Hai.

Rahi Baat Us Imarat ki Jise Masjid Kaha Jata Hai. Uski Hurmat o Azmat Apni Jagah Hai.

Isi Wajah se to Masjid Me Dunia ki Baatein Karna Na Jaayez Hai.

Masjid Me Jima Karna Na Jaayez Hai.

Agar Puri Zameen is Tarah Masjid Ho.

To Ghar Me Bhi Jima Karna Haraam Ho Jaaye.

Insan Kahin Peshab, Pakhana Bhi Na Kar Sake.
