Title: Ek Jagah Jaha Aas Paas ki Tamam Masjido Par Deobandio Ka Qabza Hai Aur Unki Hi Imamat Hai
Content:
Paach Waqta Namaz Main Sunni Hazrat Apne Ghar Par hi Namaz Ada Karte Hai.

Agar 6 se 7 Log Ek Jagah Ho Aur Un 6, Logo Main Kisi Ki Bhi Daarhi Ek Musht Nahi.

Kuch to Clear Shave Karte Hai.

To Kuch Dhaarhi Karwate Hai.

Aisi Surat Main Kya Unme se Koi Imam Ban Ke Namaz Parha Sakta Hai?

Jawab:

Darhi Ek Musht se Kam Katarwana ya Clean Shave Karna Gunah Aur is Par Aadat Bana Lene Wala Fasiq e Mo'lin Hai.

Lehaza Agar un Me se Sab Fasiq e Molin Hain to Sab Tanha Tanha Namaz Ada Karen.

Un Me se Koi Bhi Imamat ka Haqdaar Nahi.

Title: Kisi Sunni Masjid Main Jumma Padhne Gaya. To Dekha Ke Imam Fasiq Hai
Content:
Yani Daarhi Katane Walo Main se Hai Aur Unki Daarhi Choti Choti.

To is Surat Main Kya Majbooran Unki Imamat Main Jumma ki Namaz Ada Ki Jasakti Hai ?

Jawab:

Title: Kya Bachcha band karne ke liye jo operation hota hai, wo Jaayez Hai.
Content:
Islam me Iski asl haqiqat kya hai.

Jawab :

Mustaqil taur par Wiladat na hone ke liye operation karana haraam hai.

Jabke koi uzr e sharai na ho.

Aur iska haraam hona kai wujuhaat ki wajah se hai.

Isme Allah ki paida ki hui cheez ko badalna hai, aur ye Quran O Hadees ki Nass se najaayez o haraam hai.

Quran e Azeem me hai.

وَلَءَامُرَنَّهُمْ فَلَيُغَيِّرُنَّ خَلْقَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّخِذِ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنَ وَلِيًّا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَقَدْ خَسِرَ خُسْرَانًا مُّبِينًا

4-An-Nisa : 119

Yaani shaitan bola mai unko behkaunga to wo Allah Ta'ala ki paida karda cheezo ko badlenge.

Bukhari o Muslim ki hadees hai.

"Allah ki La'nat un aurato par jo Allah ki paida ki hui cheez (jism ki qudrati banawat) ko badalne wali ho.

Mazeed ye ke isme insan ki ek rag ya jism ke ek uzw (hisse) ko kaata jaata hai aur be-zarurat e sharai dosre ke samne satr e galeez khola jata hai aur usko dosra Shakhs Chhoota (touch) bhi hai. Aur ye sab baatein bhi haram hain.

Al Haasil nasbandi aur operation shariat e islamia me hargiz jaayez nahi.

Lehaza isse nafrat o ehteraz lazim hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Mulakkhas az Fatawa Mustafawiyyah

Title: Safar Ke Dauran Namazein Kaise Ada Kare?
Content:
Kya Rukh Ki Koi Pabandi Rahegi?

Niyat Kaise Kare?

Kya Namaz Waqt Ke Pehle Ada Kar Sakte Hai?

Aur Agar Namaz Choot Jaye Safar Ke Dauran To Qaza Kaise Kare?

Rahnumai farmaye.

Jawab :

Safar Ke Dauran Bhi Namazein Usi Tarah Ada Ki Jaayein Jis Tarah Ada ki Jaati Hain.

Agar 92 Kilometer Ya Us Se Zyada Ke Safar Ke Irade Se Shaher se Nikle to Shar'an Musafir Hai.

Is Waqt Shaher Se Nikalte Hi 4 Rekaat Wali Farz Namaz 2 Rekaat Parhna Wajib Hai.

Jise Qasr Kehte Hain.

Safar Ke Dauraan Bhi Qibla Ki Janib Rukh Karna Shart Hai.

Agar Waaqai Aisi Jagah Hai Ke Jahan Koi Bataane Wala Nahi Aur Na kisi Tarah Pata Lagana Mumkin Hai Ke Kis Janib Qibla Hai to Taharri Kare.

Yaani Dil Ko Ek Janib Jamaaye Jis Janib Dil Jam Jaaye Ke is Taraf hi Qibla Hai us Taraf Rukh Kar Ke Namaz Parhe.

Magar Yaad Rahe ke Wahan Koi Bataane Wala Maujood Tha Aur Us Se Na Poocha to Namaz Na Hogi.

Niyat Usi Tarah Ki Jaaye Jis Tarah Ki Jati Hai.

Namaz Ka Uske Waqt Me ada Karna Zaruri Hai.

Agar Waqt se Pehle Namaz Parh Li To farz Ada Na Hoga. Waqt Aane Par us Namaz ko Parhna farz Hoga.

Agar Namaz Qaza Ho Jaaye to Jis Waqt ki Qaza Hui Hai Utni Rekaat Hi Parhna Wajib Hai.

Jaise Zohar ki Namaz Chhut Gayi to Baad Me 2 Rekaat Farz Qaza Kare.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi 
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Eid E Ghadeer ka matlab Kya hai. Ulma e Ahle Sunnat ka Is per Kya Aqida hai.
Content:
Baraye Meharbani Tafseel se batayein.

Jawab :

Tareekh ul Khulafa me Ye Riwayat hai ke Ek din Hazrat Ali Karramallahu Ta'ala Waj'hah ul kareem ne ek khule hue Maidan me bahot se logo ko jama karke farmaya ke Main tum logo se puchta hu ke Rasoolullah ﷺ ne Yaum e Gadeer e Khum me mere Muta'lliq kya irshad farmaya tha?

To us Majma se 30 Admi khade hue aur un logo ne gawahi di ke Huzoor ﷺ ne us roz farmaya tha "Main jiska Maula hu Ali bhi uske Maula Hain, Ya Ilaahal Alameen!

Jo Shakhs Ali se Muhabbat rakhe tu bhi usse Muhabbat rakh aur jo Shakhs Ali se Adaawat rakhe tu bhi usse Adaawat Rakh.

Isi Ko Shia Eid e Gadeer Kehte hain aur Khurafaat karte hain ke Is Din Jo Bhi Gunaah Kare Sab Muaaf hai.

Shia Yahudi se bhi bahot aage nikal gaya hai.

Shia ko is Eid ka bahot be chaini se intezar rehta hai.

Shia ne kabhi Baqra eid ke liye itni be chaini se intezar nahi kiya jitni shiddat se intezar shia ko eid e gadeer ka hota hai.

Yu samajh lijiye ye log Eid e gadeer Candle light dinner ki tarah manate hain ye Eid Zina khaano me Manaai jaati hai.

Ye Eid Khalis Shia ki hoti hai aur ye sirf ek raat ki hoti hai band kamre me batti bujha kar manaai jaati hai, jaise jaanwar ko apni maan bahen ka pata nahi hota isi tarah shia ko bhi nahi hota.

Is eid me shia mard apni maan bahen se zina karne ko eid e gadeer kehte hain aur jab puri raat ye zina kare to subah ye log meethi cheeze khate aur baant te hain.

Yahi inke nazdeek eid e Gadeer kehlaati hai.

Balke ek riwayat me hai ke Isi Din Hazrat Usman e Gani ki Shahadat hui jiski khushi me Ye Log Gunaaho ko Bhi Halal Kar lete hai.

Astagfirullah!

Ye log 18 zul hijjah ko eid e gadeer manate hai.

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi 
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Kya Hajj e Badal Karne ke Liye Aisa Shakhs Hona Zaroori Hai Jisne Pehle Se Hajj Kar Liya Ho?

Hazrat rehnumai farmaiye

Jawab:

Hajj e Badal Karne Waale Ke Liye Zaruri Nahi Ke Pehle Us Ne Hajj Kiya Ho.

Agar Hajj Kisi Par Farz Hai aur Apni Jagah Dosre ko Hajj e Badal Ke Liye Bheje to Makrooh e Tahrimi Hai.

Aur Agar Hajj Farz na tha Phir Bhi Hajj e Badal ke liye bhejna Khilaaf e Awla hai.

Baher Haal behtar ye hai ke Kisi Aise Shakhs ko Hajj e Badal ke Liye Bheja Jaaye Jisne pehle Hajj kiya ho aur Arkaan e Hajj Sahi Tarah se Maloom ho.

Taake sahi Tareeqe se Hajj Mukammal Hojaye.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Tamaam Halal Cheezo Me Khuda ke Nazdik Jyada Na Pasandida Kya Hai❓

Hadees:  Imam Ahmed Jabir Radiallau Ta'Ala Anhu Se raavi ki.

Huzoor ﷺ Ne farmaya ki Iblis Apna Takhat Paani par Beechata hai Aur apne lashkar ko bhejta hai. Aur sab se jyada martaba wala uske najdik wah hai jiska fitna bada hota hai.

Title: Kya Aurat peer ban kar dusron ki bai'at kar sakti hai❔
Content:
Jawab:

Aurat peer bankar dusron ko bai'at nahin kar sakti.

Rasoollullah ﷺ ne farmaya: hargiz wah qaum falaah nahi pa sakti jinhone kisi aurat ko waali banaya.

Sahih Bukhari, Volume 6, Page 8

Imam Aarif Billah Syyidi Abdul Wahhab Sharaani علیہ الرحمہ farmate hain.

“Ahle kshf ne daayee ilallah ke liye mard hone ke shart hone par ijmaa kiya hai.”

Meezanushshriyah, Volume 2, Page 189

Imam Ahle sunnat Mujaddid e Deeno Millat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan علیہ الرحمہ farmate hain.

“Auliya e karaam ka ijmaa hai ki daaee ilallah ka mard hona zaroori hai.

Lihaza salfe saliheen se aaj tak koi aurat na peer bani na bai'at kiya.”

Fatawa Razaviya, Volume 21, Page 494

Title: Kya ek shakhs do (2) peeron ka mureed ho sakta hai
Content: Ek shakhs do (2) ka mureed nahin ho sakta, haan dosre ka talib ho sakta hai. Imam e Ahle sunnat Mujaddid e Deeno Millat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan علیہ الرحمہ farmate hain : Jo shakhs kisi jamea sharayat ke hath par bai'at ho chuka ho, to dusre ke haath par bai'at na chahiye. Akabire tareeqat farmate hain: Jo mureed do (2) peeron ke darmiyan Mushtarak ho woh falaah nahin pata. Khusoosan jab usse kushudkar bhi ho chuka ho. Hadees me Irshad hua : Jise الله تعالى kisi shay me rizq de wah usko lazim pakde. ShuabulImaan, Volume 2, Page 89 Fatawa Razawiya, Volume 26, Page 579 Mazeed ek maqaam par farmate hain. Auliya-e-karaam farmate hain: Ek shakhs ke do (2) baap nahin ho sakte, Ek aurat ke do (2) shohar nahin ho sakte, Ek mureed ke do (2) shekh nahin ho sakte. Fatawa Razawiya, Volume 26, Page 580 Sadrushshari'ah Badruttareeqah Hazrat Allamah Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi علیہ الرحمہ farmate hain : Mureed to Ek (1) ka ho chuka, Ek mureed ke do (2) peer nahin hote, haan dusre se taalib ho sakta hai. Fatawa Amjadiya, Volume 4, Page 352

Title: Kya Bade Ka Gosht Khana Sunnat hai?
Content:
Kya Hadees-e-Muabaraka me bhi iska zikr hai?

Bade Ka Gosht se murad Gaaye, Bail aur Bhains hai.

Jawab:

Gaaye ke gosht khaane se Muta'lliq kahin Saraahat nahi milti.

Lekin iska Matlab hargiz nahi ke Uska zibah Mana hai.

Balke gaaye zibah karne ka jawaaz Quran o hadees se sabit hai.


Gaaye ki hillat Shariat e Qadeema hai.

Allah Ta'ala Quran e Azeem me Farmata hai .


ھل اتٰک حدیث ضیف ابراہیم المکرمین o اذ دخلوا علیہ فقالواسلٰما قال سلم قوم منکرون o فراغ الی اھلہ فجاء بعجل سمین


Yaani kya Aayi tere paas khabar ibrahim ke izzat daar mehmano ki, jab wo uske paas aaye bole Salam, kaha salam anjaane log hain phir jaldi karta apne ghar gaya, so un ke khane ko le aaya ek farbah Bachhda bhuna hua.

Ahadees se saabit hai ke Huzoor ﷺ ne apni azwaaj e mutahharaat ki taraf se gaaye ki qurbani ki, aur qurbani ka gosht khane ka hukm farmaate, Magar khud Huzoor e Aqdas ﷺ ne tanawul farmaya ya nahi, is baare me Hadees me saraahat Mere ilm me nahi.

Haan Hadees e Muslim kitab ul zaqat ke buryerah رضی الله عنہ  ke liye gaaye ka gosht sadqe me aaya wo huzur ﷺ  ke pass laya gaya aur Huzur ﷺ se arz kiya gaya ye sadqa hai ke buryerah ko aaya  farmaya iske liye sadqa hai aur humare liye hadiya.


Isse bazahir tanawal farmana maloom hota hai .


Mulakkhasan Fatawa Razvia wa Hashiya Hujjatul Islam)

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Ghar ke rehne wale namazo ki pabandi karein aur rozana quran e majeed se kuch tilawat karein.

Title: I have been told that Qurbani is not required for children even if one has the affordability. Is this accurate?
Content:
Can one also do Qurbani for members of family who have passed-on?

Al-Jawaab

1. The correct opinion upon which Fatwa is given in the Hanafi Mazhab is that Udhiya (Qurbani) is not waajib upon a non-baaligh (child) nor is it waajib on his behalf upon the child's father or guardian.

This is in Bahare Shariat with reference to al-Durr al-Mukhtar.

If, however, one wishes to do Qurbani on behalf of the non-baaligh children then there is no harm but rather reward and Allah knows best.

2. It is rewarding to do Qurbani on behalf of those who have passed away.

Imam Tirmizi has recorded in his Jaami' and Sunan that Sayyiduna Ali Radi Allahu Anhu would do Qurbani on behalf of the Messenger of Allah peace and blessings be upon him.

If the deceased requested that Qurbani be done on his or her behalf then the meat must be given to the poor and if not then it can be eaten by themselves and whoever they wish to give it to and Allah knows best.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi 
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Aajkal Jab Medical Science aur Govt. Bhi yeh Keh Rahi Ho ki Tambaku Ka Sevan Cancer aur us Jaisi Kai Namurad Bimariyo Ko Dawat Dene Ka Kam Karta Hain,
Content:
Toh Yeh to Wajeh Ho Gaya Ki Tambaku ka Istemal Badan ko Taklif Denewala Hain.

Jo Allah Ki Ata ki Gayi Azeem Neamat aur Amanat hain is Surat e Haal Main Kya Yeh Apni Jano Ko Jaanbuz ke Takleef Dena Na Hoga?

Jo Islam Main Jaha Tak Mera Manna Hain Jaiz na Hoga aur Dusra Iski Tadap aur Na Milne ki Surat Main Iske Aadi Shaksh ki Mental Condition Change Ho Jati Hai.

Uska Chidiyapan Badh Jana Ya Gussa ho Jana Ya fir is Bad Aadat ko Pura Karne ke liye Udhari Badhana Ya Chori Tak Kar Lena.

Yun Apne Halal aur Jayez Rizq Main se Gharwalo ki Jaroorat Puri Karne ke Badle Fizul Kharch Aur Shehat Bigadne Wali Chiz ka istemal Karna Kya Sahi Hoga?

Khudara rahenumai farmaiye.

Jawab:

Tambaku ki Thodi Miqdar Har ek ke liye Muzir Nahi Balke Baaz Auqaat wo Mufeed bhi Hota hai, aur Yaqeeni Taur Par Koi ye Nahi Kehta Ke is se Ek Aam Insan Mar Jaayega Ya Mohlik Bimari me Mubtala Hoga.

Jis Tarah Zaher Wagaira Ke ye Yaqeen Hota Hai Ke iske Istemal se Insan ki Maut Ho Sakti Hai.

Halaanke Kabhi wo Nahi Marta. Phir Bhi ye Haraam Hai.

Ise Acchi Tarah Samjhein.

Title: Mira Datar ka chilla Mein Fatiha Padhne Log Jate Hai Aur Baki Dusre Masle Bhi Le Ke Jate Hai.
Content:
Jabki Waha Unjha Sharif Ki Eit Layi Hui Hai to Kya Ye Galat Hai?

Jawab:

Urf-E-Aam me kisi buzurg ka chilla us jagah ko kehte hain jahan us buzurg ne taweel Muddat tak ibadat o riyazat ki ho, us jaga Ma'rifat ki bahot si manzilein taye ki hon to yaadgar ke taur par us jagah ko makhsus kar dete hain.

Aur chunke wahan Allah ke ek wali ne ek zamane tak zikr o fikr kiya hai jiski waja se wo maqaam baais e khair o barkat hota hai.

Wahan log husool e faiz ke liye hazir hote hain.

Jaise pakistan ke shaher lahore shareef me Hazrat data ganj bakhsh hijweri Alaihir rahmah war Rizwan ke Mazar e pak ke qareeb Hazrat Khwaja e khwajgaan Khwaja Gareeb nawaz Moinuddin Hasan Chishti sanjari Alaihir Rahmah war Rizwan ne ek zamana tak ibadat o riyazat ki, saheb e Mazar se fuyooz o Barakaat hasil kiye to wo jaga khas kardi gayi hai aur aaj bhi log us makan se mustafeez hote hain.

Lehaza jis maqaam ke baare me waaqai ye sabit ho ke yahan Allah ke kisi wali ne ibadat o riyazat ki hai to us jagah ka ehteram us buzurg se nisbat hone ki waja se kiya jana mustahsan hai.

Aur yu hi kisi jagah ko bila suboot e sharai kisi buzurg ka chilla mash'hoor kar diya jaaye to uski koi haisiat nahi.

Balke wo deegar jagaho ki tarah se Aam jagah hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Kya mahe muharram 10ve roz yani ashura ka roza 2 niyato se rakha jaa sakta hai.
Content: Jaise ke kisi ne nafl roze ki mannat mangi ho or Ashura ko roza bhi rakhna hai. To kya 2 roze rakhne honge, ya ek me 2 niyat kar sakta hai. Allah ke fazal se uski mannat puri hogayi hai to kya kare or Jawab Agar Mannat Maana hai to Us par Roza rakhna Wajib hai Aur Jab Roza rakhe. To usi mannat ki niyat Raat hi me Fajr se pehle kar lena zaruri hai aur Ashura ke din rakhega, to Allah ki Rahmat se Ummeed hai ke us din ki bhi Barkatein Hasil hon. Wajib aur nafl ki niyat ek sath nahi kar sakta. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Hajj karne wale par 10vi Zilhijjah ko kitne Ghusl hai ?
Content: Jawab: Hajj karne wale par 10vi Zilhijjah ko 5 Ghusl Hai. (1) Muzdalfa me Tahrne (2) Mina me daakhil hone (3) Jamre par Kankariyaan Maarne (4) Makke me daakhil hone (5) Aur Kaaba Sharif ke Tawaf karne ke Liye Ghusl Hai. Jab ki 3,4 Aur 5 yah teen peechle kaam bhi 10ve hi ko kare Aur Jume ka din hai. To jume ka Ghusl kare. Aise hi Agar Arfa ya Eid jume ke din pade to yaha walo par 2 Ghusl hai. Jis par chand Ghusl ho Sab ki Niyat se Ek Ghusl kar Liya, To Sab Ada Ho jayega Aur sab ka sawab milega. Aur Aurat par nahana Zaruri ho Aur Usne Abhi Ghusl Nahi Kiya Hai Aur Isi Beech Use Haiz Shuru Ho gaya. To Chahe Ab Naha Le, Ya Haiz khatam hone ke baad Nahaye Use Ikhtiyaar Hai. Agar Kisi par Ghusl Wajib ho Aur wah Juma ya Eid ke din nahaya Aur Juma aur Eid Wagairah ki niyat karli. To sab Ada ho gaya Aur Usi Ghusl se Juma Aur Eid ki Namaz Padh sakta hai. (Bahar e Shari'at) -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Janna chahta hoon ki Azan ke pahle aur Azan ke baad ki dua ka Mic pe padhna
Content:
Aur Farz Namaz ke baad me Buland awaz se jahri Taur pe Durood Sharif ka padhana sahi hain ya ek Nayi Ijaat hain.

Kyunki mu'ashre ke kayi bade buzurg jo sahiul aqida sunni hain woh yeh kahte hain ki yeh unhone apne zamane me na dekha tha.

Balki kuch yeh bhi kahte hain ki yeh sirf Sunni Masjido ki alag pehchan batane ke liye Izafa kar diya gaya hain.

Hazrat aur yeh ki kya isko na sirri taur pe padha jana kam Afzal, ya na maqbul ho shakta hain ?

Jawab: :

Durood e paak ke parhne ke liye kisi waqt ki qaid nahi, balke har waqt ijazat hai.

Ab agar koi Azan se Qabl, ya baad me, ya iqamat se qabl durood parhe, to isme harj nahi.

Haan, ye zaruri hai ke azan aur Durood e paak ke darmiyaan fasl kare.

Yaani is tarah parhe ke logo par waazeh ho jaaye ke ye azan ka juz nahi.

Title: 1. Kya Quran E Paak Me Huzoor ﷺ Ki wiladat Aur khushi manane par koyi dalil hai.
Content:
2. Kya Huzoor ﷺ Apni Milad Manai

3. Kya Sahaba E Ikram Ridwanullahi Anhum ne bhi Milad Manai

4. Jahnde lagana kaha se sabit hai ?

Jawab:

In Badmazhabo ka Yah kaam hota hai ke din Raat isi me lage Rahte hai ki Aashiqan e Rasool ﷺ ke dilo se Ishq ko kam kaise kiya jaaye Aur Tarah Tarah ke Sawalo me Ulajhaya jaaye Aur Musalmano ke dilo se Kaise Imaan ko kheencha jaaye.

Ibn e Kaseer Bayan karte hai.

Iblis 4 baar Buland Awaaz se Roya pahli Baar Jab Allah ne Use laeen Thahra kar Us par La'anat ki.

Dusri baar Jab use Zamin par bheja gaya.

Teesri Baar Huzoor E Aqdas ﷺ ki Wiladat ke waqt.

Chauthi baar Jab Surah E Fatiha Nazil huyi.

Isse pata chala ke Chikhna chillana Aur Iski mukhalifat karna Iblis ka Tariqa hai wahabi deobandi Usi ki Awlaad hai.

1) Quran E Paak me Allah Ta'Ala Irshad Farmata hai

قُلْ بِفَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَبِرَحْمَتِهِۦ فَبِذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَفْرَحُوا۟

Aye Habib Aap Farmadijiye ke Allah ke Fazl Aur Uski Rahmat Milne par Musalmano ko Chahiye ke Khushiyaa'n Manayein 

Is Aayat me Ye hukm diya gaya ki jab Allah ka Fazl Aur Uski Rahmat nazil ho to momino ko us par khusiya manana chahiye Aur Nabi Rahmatullil Aalamin Hain Quran Me Isrhad huwa.

وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَٰكَ إِلَّا رَحْمَةً لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ

Hum ne Tumhe Nahi Bheja Magar Rahmat Saare Jahaan ke liye.

Huzoor E Aqdas ﷺ ka is Dunaya me Tashrif Laana Rahmat hai Aur Pehli Aayat me Allah Ta'Ala Hame Rahmat milne par Khushiaya manane ka hukm de Raha hai.

2) Hazrat Abu Qatada رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــه Se Riwayat hai ke Rasool E Akram ﷺ Se peer (Monday) ke din Roza Rakhne ke Baare me pucha gaya.

To Huzoor ﷺ Ne Irshad Farmaya: Isi Roz Meri Wilaadat Huyi.

Is Hadees se Sabit Huwa ke Huzoor ﷺ ne Har peer (Monday) ke din Roza Rakh kar Apni Milad ka khud Ehtimaam kiya.

3) Sayyeduna Hazrat e Amir E Muaawiya رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــه Farmate Hain ke Ek Roz Rasool ﷺ ka Apne Sahaba ke Halqe se guzar huwa Huzoor ﷺ Ne Farmaya kyun baithe ho ?

Unhone kaha ham Allah Ta'Ala ka zikr karne Aur usne hame jo islam ki hidayat Ata farmayi us par hamd wa sana bayan karne Aur Apne Nabi ﷺ ko bhej kar ham par jo Ehsaan kiya hai uska shukr ada karne ke liye baithe hain.

Aap ne Farmaya ke: Allah ki kasam kya tum Isi ke liye baithe the ?

Sahaba Ne Arz kiya: Allah ki Kasam Ham sab isi ke liye Baithe The.

Is par Huzoor ﷺ Ne Farmaya: Abhi mere pass Jibrail علیہ السلام Aaye the Unhone kaha ke Allah tumhari wajah se farishto par Fakhr kar Raha hai.

Is hadees se Sabit huwa ki Sahaba E kiram Huzoor ﷺ Ki Milad par shukr Ada karte the.

4) Imam Suyuti رحمـــــه الله تعــــالى Bayan karte hain ke Huzoor ﷺ ke Tashrif laane ke waqt Hazrat Jibrail علیہ السلام 

70 Hazaar Farishto ke jhurmut me Huzoor ﷺ ke Aastana e Mubarak par Tashirf laaye Aur Jannat se 3 jhande bhi lekar Aaye.

Unme se 1 Jahnda Purab (east) me 1 Pashchim (west) me Aur 1 Kaaba e Muazzama par.

Isse Saabit huwa ki Eid Milad Un Nabi par Jahnde lagana Farishto ki Sunnat Hai.

Wallahu Ta'Ala Aalam

Hush-ar Tak Daa-leyn-gay Hum Pai-Da-Ish-e-Maula Kee Dhoom
Miss-Lay Faa-Ris Najd Kay Qil Aey Gira-Tay Jayeinge

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi 
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: QABRISTAN ME ABHI JO RASTA ZIMMEDARO NE BANA RAKHA HAI PEHLE WAHA PAR BHI KABRE THI
Content: KUCH SALO PAHLE. MAGAR AB WAHA RASTA HAI OR USSE GUZAR KAR HI MAYYAT KO DAFNA NE KE LIYE LE JANA PADTHA HAY. US RASTE PAR CHALNA KAISA HAI. Jawab: Agar Waaqai jo naya Raasta banaya hai, wahan Qabrein thi. Agarche bahot purani aur boseeda, to wo raasta banana, najaayez o haraam hai. Us par chalna firna, Baithna, sona, Namaz e Janaza parhna Jaayez nahi. Kyuke us raaste par chalna firna, Namaz wagaira parhna dar asl Qabr par chalna firna, Namaz wagaira parhna hoga. Hadees Shareef me hai Rasool e Akram ﷺ farmaate hain "Mujhe Aag ya Talwaar par chalna Qabr par chalne se zyaada pasand hai". Ibn e Maajah Huzoor Sadrushshariah Badruttariqah Allama Muhammad Amjad Ali Alaihir Rahmah war Rizwaan Farmaate hain. "Qabristan me jo Naya Raasta nikala gaya usse guzarna Na Jaayez hai Khwaah naya hona use Ma'loom ho ya uska Gumaan ho". Bahar e Shariat BaHawaala Alamgeeri o Durr e Mukhtar Jab Qabristan me naye Raaste ka sirf Gumaan hone par is par chalna firna, uthna, baithna jaayez nahi. To jis Raaste ke baare me ye yaqeen ho ke ye Qabro ko Mismaar karke banaya gaya, to us par chalne firne baithne wagaira par kis Qadr sakht Hukm hoga. Lehaza jo naya raasta Qabro ko mismaar karke banaya gaya hai, use hargiz istemal na kiya jaye. Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Jo ke inhi chaar imamo ke hi Mutabiq hoga. Lekin inki pairwi karne waale honge ye nahi kaha ja sakta.

Kyu ke Bahot se masail me ikhtelaaf hai aur Unme se Ek hi durust hoga.

Ummeed hai ke usi Maslak ke mutabiq hon Jo Maslak e Hanafi Hai. Insha'Allah!

Ye Yaad Rahe ke Ye Ikhtelaaf furoo'i Masail par hai. Warna aqaayed me Isa Alaihissalam Usi Maslak e haq par honge Jise aaj pehchan ke liye Maslak e Alahadrat kaha jata hai.

Title: Hajj aur Umrah me Kankari Saath Se Kam Jaayez Nahi.
Content:
Agar Sirf 3 maari Ya Bilkul Nahi To Dam Laajim Hoga Aur Agar 4 Maari To Baaki Har kankari ke Badle Kya Hukm hoga.

Jawab:

Baaki kankari ke liye Sadqa de. Saath se kam jaayez nahi.

Agar Sirf 3 maari Yaa Bilkul nahi To Dam laajim hoga Aur Agar 4 Maari To Baaki Har Kankari ke badle Sadqa de.

(Raddul Muhtaar)

Kankari Maarne me pai dar pai hona Shart Nahi.

Magar Wafka khilaf'e Sunnat hai.

Maslan Ek Kankari Maar kar Ruk gaya phir kuch der baad Dusri Ya Teesri Maari.

(Raddul Muhtaar)

Sab Kankariyaan Ek Saath phenki to Yah Saato Ek ke kaayim Makaam (Jagah) huyi.

(Raddul Muhtaar)

Reference Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 84.

Title: Jamra ke pass se kankariyaan Uthana kaisa hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Makrooh Hai.

Kankariyaan zameen ki jins ( Qism ) se ho Aur Aisi Cheez ki jisse tayyammum jayez hai kankar, patthar, mitti Yahan tak ki Agar khaak phenki jab bhi Rami ho gayi magar ek kankari phekne ke kaayim makaam huyi.

Moti, Ambar, Mushaq wagairah se Rami jaayez nahi. Yuhi jawaahir Aur sone chaandi se bhi rami nahi ho sakti ki yah to nichawar huyi, maarna na huwa. Mingni se bhi Rami jaayez nahi. Jamra ke pass se kankariyaan uthana makrooh hai ki waha ki kankariyaan Rahti hai jo makbul nahi hoti Aur madud ho jaati hai Aur jo makbul ho jaati hai utha li jaati hai.

(Raddul Muhtaar)

Agar maalum ho ki kankariyaan naajis ( Naa-paak ) hai to unse rami karna makrooh hai Aur maalum na ho to nahi Magar dooh lena mustahab hai.

Is Rami ka waqt aaj bhi fajr (Subah Saadik ) se 11vi ki fajr tak hai.

Magar sunnat yah hai ki tulu e Aftaab se jawaal tak ho Aur jawaal se gurub tak mubaah aur Gurub se Fajr tak makrooh.

Yoonhi 10vi ki namaz e fajr ka waqt shuru hone se tulu e Aftaab tak makrooh Aur agar kisi Uajr ke sabab ho maslan charwaho ne raat me rami ki to karaahat nahi.

Reference Bahare shari'at Hissa 06 Safa 84

Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah

Title: Hajj Me Sar Mundane Ya Baal Katrawaane ka Waqt (Din) Kaun sa hai
Content:
Jawab:

10vi Zil Hajjah, 11vi Zil Hijjah aur 12 Zil hijjah Qurbani ke baad Qibla Muh Baith kar mard Halk kare yaani tamaam sar mundaye ki Afzal hai.

Ya Baal Katrawaaye ki Rukhasat (Chhut) hai.

Aurat ko Baal Mundana Haraam hai. Ek Pora Barabar Baal katrawade.

Balki khud Apne baal Ek pora barabar kaat de. Mufrid Agar qurbani kare, to uske liye mustahab hai ki qurbani ki jab bhi haraj nahi Aur tamatto Wa Kiran waale qurbani ke baad halk karna wajib hai.

Yaani agar Qurbani se pahle sar mundayega, to dam wajib hoga.

Baal katrawaye to sar me jitne baal hai.

Unme ke chauthai 1/4 baalo me se katrwaana jaruri hai.

Yaani sar ke har-har baal se chauthai hissa baal katrwaana jaruri hai.

Lehaza Ek pore se jyaada katrawaaye ki Baal chote bade hote hai.

Mumkin hai ki chauthai baalo me sab Ek-Ek porna na kate, Sar mundane, ya baal katrawaane ka waqt Ayyam E Nahar hai.

Ya'ani 10,11,12 Aur Afzal pehla din Ya'ani 10vi Zil hijjah.

Aalamgeeri

Bahare sharee'at Hissa 06 Safa 85

Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah

Title: Mureed hona wajib hai ya sunnat ?
Content:
Neez mureed kyun karwate hain ? Mureed hone ka kya fayida hai❔

Jawab:

Aalahazrat علیہ الرحمہ is suwaal ke jawab me irshad farmate hain :

Mureed hona sunnat hai aur isse Huzoor ﷺ se ittisaale musalsal.

Tafseere Azeezi dekho.

Ayate Kareema

(Raasta unka jinpar tune inaam kiya) me iski taraf hidayat hai.

Para 1, Surah Fateha, Aayat 6

Yahan tak farmaya gaya :

Jiska koi peer nahin uska Peer shaitaan hai.

Awariful Maarif, 78
Risala Qushariyat, Page 181

Sehate aqeedat ke sath silsila sahih muttasila me agar intisab baqi raha to nazar wale to uske barakaat abhi dekhte hain, jinhe nazar nahin wah naza me qabr me hashr me iske fawayed dekhenge.

Fatawa Razawiya, Volume 26, Page 570

Title: Wahabi deobandi gair muqallid wagairah se aam awaam ka behas karna kaisa hain ?
Content:
Jawab:

Awaam ko unse bahas karne ki ijazat nahi.

Balkeh ahl e ilm bhi unse khaah makhaah bahas karne se bachein, unse bahas karne se koi faaidah nahin hai is liye keh quran o hadees se saabit hai keh woh log islam ki taraf palat kar nahin aayenge.

Hadees shareef mein hai

Hazrat e abu sa'eed khudri رضى الله تعالى عنه se riwayat hai keh rasoolullah صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ne irshad farmaya.

"mashriq se kuch log namoodaar honge quran kasrat se padhenge lekin unke halaq se neeche nahin utrega deen se aise nikal jaayenge jaise teer nishana ko paar karke nikal jaata hai phir deen mein laut kar wapas nahin aayenge jab tak teer laut kar apne challe par na aa jaaye arz kiya gaya unki alamat kiya hogi?
Farmyaa sar mundana ya sar mudaye rakhna"

(Bukhari shareef jild 2 safah 1128 kitaburrad alal jahmiyya)

Is hadees shareef se saaf zaahir hai keh woh log islam ki taraf nahin lautenge

Aur chunkeh inke aqaaid bhi ahl e risalat ke munaafiqo ki tarah hain to ye log quran hakeem ki is aayat ke bhi misdaaq hain

صُمٌّۢ بُكْمٌ عُمْىٌ فَهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ

2-Al-Baqara : 18

Translation: Bahre goonge andhe to woh phir aane wale nahin

(Kanzul imaan)

Aala hazrat azeemul barakat saiyyiduna imam ahmad raza fazil e barailvi رضى الله تعالى عنه
se sawal hua ke

"ye dua karna ke Allah wahabiyo ko hidayat kare jaayez hai ya nahin"

Iske jawab mein irshad farmate hain

Wahabiya ke liye dua fuzool hai ثم لا يعودون unke liye aa chuka hai wahabi kabhi laut kar na aayega aur jo hidayat paa jaaye woh wahabi na tha ho chala tha
(Almalfooz hissa 3 safah 36)

IN IBARAAT SE SAABIT HUA KEH WOH LAUTNE WALE NAHIN.

LIHAZA UNSE BAHAS BILKUL FUZUL HAI AUR IS MEIN KOI FAAIDAH NAHIN

Hamare kuchh sunni hazraat kahte hain keh ham to sunni hain hamara kuch nahin bigdega unse,

Halankeh Hamein hukm hai keh imaan chale jaane ka har waqt khauf rakhna chahiye

Aaj hamari awam be dharrak unse bahas o mubasah mein lag jaati hain aur pichhle zamaane mein ulama bhi unse bachte the.

Aala hazrat azeemul barakat saiyyiduna imam ahmad raza fazil e barailvi رضى الله تعالى عنه se sawal hua ke

"mutasallib sunni ko ie'teraaz ki nazar se khubasa ki kitaabein dekhna jaayez hain ya nahin"

Iske jawab mein irshad farmate hain

Faqat mutasallib hona kaafi nahin balkeh aalim ho, poora maahir ho, wasee' nazar ho, iske saath mutasallib sunni bhi ho, kiya ie'temaad rakhta hai apne nafs par? aur jo apne nafs par ie'temaad kare us ne bade kazzaab (bahut bade jhoote) par ie'temaad kiya.

(Almalfooz hissa 4 safah 18)

DOSRI JAGAH HAI

Aala hazrat azeemul barakat saiyyiduna imam ahmad raza fazil e barailvi رضى الله تعالى عنه irshad farmate hain

Imam sa'eed ibn e jubair رضى الله تعالى عنه raasta mein tashreef liye jaate the ek badmazhab mila imam se kaha main kuchh arz karna chahta hun farmaya main sunna nahin chahta. Usne kaha sirf ek baat, aapne chhungliya ke pahle pore pe angootha rakh kar farmaya ولا نصف كلمة aadhi baat bhi nahin sununga logo ne sabab poochha farmaya

از ایشاں منہم ہے

phir farmaya akabir ki to ye haalat hai. aur ab ye haalat hai keh jaahil sa jaahil juta parrta hai aariyon se wahabiyon se, aur kuchh khauf nahin karta.

Jo tamam funoon ka maahir ho tamaam pech jaanta ho, poori taaqat rakhta ho, tamam hathiyaar paas hon, usko bhi kiya zaroor keh khwah makhwah bhediyon ke jangal mein jaaye.

Haan agar zaroorat hi aa pade to majboori hai Allah par tawakkul kare in hathiyaaron se kaam le

(Almalfooz hissa 4 safah 3) 

Sarkar e aqdas صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ne hamein hukm farmaye hai keh unse door raho to unse door rahne mein hi hamare imaan o aqeede ki hifazat hai

Hadees shareef mein hai

Hazrat e abu hurairah رضى الله تعالى عنه se riwayat hai keh rasoolullah صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ne irshad farmaya:

Aakhiri zamane mein kuchh farebi jhoote paida honge jo tumhare paas aisi baatein le kar aayenge jin ko na tum ne suna hoga na tumhare baap dada ne to unse door bhago aur unhein apne se door rakho kahin woh tumhein gumraah na kar den kahin woh tumhein fitne mein na daal den.

(Muslim shareef jild 1 safah 10)

Dekhiye gaib daan nabi Sarkar e aqdas صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم farma rahe hain keh woh log tumhare paas aisi baatein laayenge jo na tum ne suni hai na tumhare baap dada ne,

Is zamane mein dekh lijiye keh badmazhab apni badmazhabi ki baat hamare paas laa rahe.

Sarkar e aqdas صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ka farmaan harf ba harf sahih aur iske aage hi Sarkar e aqdas صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ne hamein hukm farmaya keh unse door bhago aur unko door bhagaau is par hamara amal kamzor hai.

Sarkar e aqdas صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم ke is farmaan mein kitni hikmate hain jo ahl e ilm pe posheedah nahin.

Farmaya unko door bhagaao khud door bhago isko is misal se samajhiye keh aap ke saamne saanp aa jaaye to aap pahle koshish karenge keh usko bhaga de ya maar de.

Magar woh taqatwar nikla aur qareeb hai ke aap par hamla kar de to ab yahan ek hi soorat bachegi keh khud bhaagein.

To hadees shareef ka mafhoom ye hua keh agar aap ke paas badmazhab aaye to usko bhagaiye kisi bhi tarah se use apne qareeb na aane den aur agar kisi tarah woh musallat ho jaaye to ab imaani farz ye hai keh khud ko usse door bhag aayein.

YAAD RAKHIYE KEH SARKAR E AQDAS صلى الله تعالى عليه وسلم HAM IMAAN WALE SUNNIYO KO HUKM FARMAYE HAIN KEH UN SE DOOR RAHEIN KEH IMAAN KI DAULAT HAMARE PAAS HAI

Hadees shareef ka ye mafhoom nahin keh badmahabon se kaha gaya ho keh tum sunniyo ke paas mat jaana
BALKEH HAM KO YE HUKM HUA KEH UN SE DOOR RAHEIN

Woh to insaani shaitaan hain woh chahte hain keh aap se mel jol rakhe aur is tarah hamra imaan cheen le, unki madad ke liye jinnat ke shaitaan ki poori fauj bhi hai aur har waqt hamare imaan ko lootne ke firaaq mein hai.

Allah تعالى hamein maslak e haq maslak e ahl e sunnat o jamat jisko pahchhan ke liye is zamane mein maslak ala hazrat kahte hain is maslak par mazbooti se qaaim rakhe aur isi maslak pe maut ata farmaye.

والله تعالٰی اعلم

Title: Ghadeer-e-khum me Rasool (sallallahu alaihiwassalam) ne Hazrat Ali ka bazu buland karke mann kunto maula fahaza Ali yun maula kaha.
Content:
Uske fauran Baad Jibrail Ameen (alaihissalaam) ne Quran me aai 2nd last aayat leke nazil hui. Jo sureh Maida ki ayat no. 3 hai.

Alyawma akmaltu lakum deenakum waatmamtu Aaalaykum nia'amatee waradeetu lakumu alislama deenan famani idturra fee makhmasatin ghayra mutajanifin liithmin fainna Allaha ghafoorun raheemun.

Jiska matlab ab jaake deen mukammal hua.

Is Ayat aur hadees pe Ahle Sunnah ke aulmao ka kya kehna hai.

Jawab:

Ayat e kareema ٱلْيَوْمَ أَكْمَلْتُ لَكُمْ دِينَكُمْ وَأَتْمَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ نِعْمَتِى وَرَضِيتُ لَكُمُ ٱلْإِسْلَٰمَ دِينًا ۚ فَمَنِ ٱضْطُرَّ فِى مَخْمَصَةٍ غَيْرَ مُتَجَانِفٍ لِّإِثْمٍ ۙ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ Hajjatul wida ke din nazil hui.

Bukhari o muslim ki hadees me hai ke hazrat umar رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہ ke paas ek yahudi aaya aur usne kaha ke aye ameer ul momineen apki kitab me ek aayat hai.

Agar wo hum yahudio par nazil hui hoti to hum roz e nuzool ko eid manate, farmaya: Kaun si aayat ? Usne yahi aayat parhi.

Apne farmaya: Mai us din ko janta hu jisme ye nazil hui thi aur us ke maqam e nuzool ko bhi pehchanta hu wo maqam Arafaat ka tha aur din Jumuah ka.

Title: Khabar e mustafeez kise kahte hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Jis islami shaher me hakim e sharai qazi e islam ho ke Ahkam e hilal usi ke yahan se saadir hote hain aur khud Aalim aur un ahkam me ilm par Aamil o Qaaim ya kisi Aalim e deen muhaqqaq mo'tamad par etemaad ka muntazim o mulazim hai.

Ya jahan qazi e shara nahi to mufti e islam marja e awam o matba ul ahkam ho ke ahkam e roza o eidain usi ke fatwe se nifaz paate hain.

Awam e kalAn'aam ba taur e khud eid o ramzan nahi thehra lete, wahan se muta'ddid jama'atein aayein aur sab yak zaban apne ilm se khabar den ke wahan fulaan din bar bina e ruyat roza hua ya eid ki gayi.

Is par qazi e islam ruyat e hilal ka hukm de sakta hai.

Ise khabar e mustafeez kehte hain.

Title: Kya nabi e Karim ﷺ ne apni aankho se Allah عزوجل ko dekhe sahi Hadith aur Al Quran ke mutalik
Content:
Jawab:

Hadrat Ikramah Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anh Bayan karte hain ke Sayyedna Abdullah ibn Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anhuma ne Farmaaya:

Hadrat Sayyedna Muhammad Mustafa ﷺ ne apne Rab ka Deedar kiya hai.

Main ne Arz kiya: Kya Allah Ta'ala Ne ye Nahi farmaaya Nigaahein uska Ihaata nahi kar sakteen Aur wo Nigaaho ka idraak o ihaata karta hai?

To Hadrat Abdullah ibn Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anhuma ne farmaaya:

Tum par ta'jjub hai! Jab Allah apne us Noor ke sath Tajalli farmaaye jo uska gair mutanaahi Noor hai aur beshak Sayyedna Muhammad ﷺ ne apne Rab ka do martaba deedar kiya hai.

(Tirmizi, umdatul qari sharah bukhari, tafseer ibn e kaseer, subul ul huda warrishad, mustadrak ala assahihain, musnad ahmad mu'jam e kabeer, tafseer ibn abi haatim, surah an'aam)

Hadrat Abdullah ibn Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta'ala anhuma ne Bayan farmaya ke

Hadrat Rasoolullah ﷺ ne farmaya: main ne apne Rab ka Deedar kiya. (Musnad ahmad)

Hadrat ibn e Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anhuma se Riwayat hai ke Allah Ta'ala ne Hadrat ibrahim ko khullat aur Hadrat moosa Alaihissalam ko kalam aur Sayyed e Alam Muhammad ﷺ ko apne deedar se imtiyaz bakhsha (salawatullahi alaihim ajma'een).

Ka'b ne farmaya ke Allah Ta'ala ne Hadrat Moosa alaihissalam se do baar kalam farmaya aur hadrat Muhammad mustafa ﷺ ne Allah ta'ala ko do martaba dekha.

Tirmizi

Yahan chand baaton ka lehaaz rakhna zaruri hai.

Ek ye ke Hadrat Aisha Siddeqah Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anha ka Qawl Nafi me hai.

Aur Hadrat ibn e Abbas Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anhuma ka qawl isbaat me hai

Aur Musbat Muqaddam hota hai.

Kyu ke Nafi karne wala kisi cheez ki nafi us waqt karta hai ke Usne nahi suna
Aur musbit isbaat is liye karta hai ke usne suna aur jana.

To ilm musbit ke paas hai.

Dosri baat ye ke hadrat ummul momineen Aisha Siddeqah radi-Allahu Ta'ala anha ne ye kalam huzoor ﷺ se naql nahi kiya.

Balke Khud Aayat se istembaat farmaya

لاتدركه الابصار

Nigaahein us (Allah) ka ihaata (gher) nahi kar sakti.

Yahan par Ihaata (gherna) ki Nafi hai.

Ruyat (dekhne) ki nafi nahi hai.

Sahih yahi hai ke Huzoor ﷺ Deedar e ilahi se musharraf farmaye gaye.

Muslim shareef ki hadees e Marfoo' se bhi yahi saabit hai.

Hadrat ibn e abbas Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anhuma bhi isi par hain.

Muslim ki hadees hai Huzoor ﷺ ne farmaya ke "mai ne apne Rab ko apni Ankh aur apne dil se dekha".

Hadrat Hasan Basri Radi-Allahu Ta'ala Anh Qasam Khaate the ke Huzoor ﷺ ne shab e meraaj apne Rab ka deedar kiya.

Hadrat imam Ahmad ne Farmaya ke Huzoor ﷺ ne apne Rab ko dekha, usko dekha, usko dekha.

Imam saheb Ye Farmaate rahe yahan tak ke unka saans toot gaya.

Title: 1. Farz ka matlab kya hai❓
Content: 2. Kya Sujood faraiz mein se ek farz hai❓ 3. Agar namaz mein koi farz chhut jaaye to kya hukm hai❓ 4. Agar zaid ko salaam ferne ke baad yaad aaya ke uska sajda chhut gaya to kya hukm hai❓ 5. Agar zaid ko salaam ferne se pehle qadah e akhira mein baithne ke waqt yaad aayaa ke uska pehli rakat, ya dusri rakat ka sajda chhuta. To kya hukm hoga uss chhute hue sajda ka❓ 6. Agar zaid ne Attahiyat padhliya aur uske baad yaad aaya ke uska koi sajda chhut gaya. To kya hukm hoga uss chhute hue sajda ka❓ Jawab: 1) Farz wo hai ke begair uske ibadat Mukammal hogi hi nahi. 2) Namaz me har rekaat me dono sajde Farz hain. 3) Agar Namaz me koi farz chhoot gaya to Namaz na hogi. 4) Salam pherne ke baad yaad aaya ke ek sajda reh gaya. To jab tak koi Munaafi e namaz amal nahi kiya, to wo Sajda karle Aur Phir qaada kare Attahiyat parh kar sajda e sahw kare. Phir Attahiyat wagaira parh kar salam phere. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Dhadi ek mutthi honi chahiye ye kahan se sabit hai?
Content:
Dhadi nahi katni chahiye aur munchhe katrana chahiye iska hawala hai to de.

Jawab:


Daarhi Mundaana haraam hai.


Durr e mukhtar me hai "mard ko daarhi mundana haraam hai".

Fath ul Qadeer, Durr e Mukhtar, Raddul Mohtaar, Bahr Raayeq, Tahtawi me hai..

"Darhi jab ek musht se kam ho to uska kaatna jis tarah Kuch Magribi aur zanaane zankhe karte hain kisi ke nazdeek jaayez nahi aur poori darhi ka safaaya karna ye kaam to hindustaan ke yahudio aur iran ke majoosio ka hai.

Alahadrat Imam Ahmad Raza fazil e bareilwi Quddisa sirruh ul azeez farmaate hain "Daarhi katraana mundaana haraam hai"

(Fatwa Razviya)

Huzoor Sadrussharia farmate hain

"Darhi barhana sunan e Ambiya e saabiqeen se hai mundaana ya ek musht se kam rakhna haraam hai"

(Bahar e shariat) 

Hazrat Shaikh Abdul haq muhaddis dehlwi Alaihir Rahmah farmaate hain

"Darhi mundana haraam hai angrezo, hinduwo, aur qalandario ka tareeqa hai aur darhi ko ek musht tak chhor dena wajib hai aur jin foqaha ne ek musht darhi rakhne ko sunnat qarar diya (to is waja se nahi ke unke nazdeek wajib nahi. Balke is waja se ke ya) to sunnat se muraad Chaalu Rasta hai ya is waja se ke ek musht ka wujoob Hadees shareef se saabit hai.

(Yaani Hadees e Rasool ko bhi Sunnat e Rasool kaha jaata hai).

Title: Ek Family Mein Ek Beta, Ek Beti aur Miya Biwi Hai,
Content:
Un Ke Paas Rehne Ke Liye Khud Ka Ek Ghar Hai, Us Ke Ilawa Do Choti Property Bhi Hai.

Lekin wo Property Unhone Apne Bete ki Shaadi Aur Us Ke Liye Ghar Kharidne Ke Liye Rakhi Hai.

Hazrat To Kya us Property pe Zakat Ada Karni Hogi Aur Agar wo Property Bhade Pe De to Kya Bhade pe Zakat Dena Hoga.

Hazrat Ek aur Sawal, unki Beti ki Shadi Kuch Mahine Baad Hai.

Kisi ne Unki Beti ko Kuch Sone ke Zewar Tohfe Mein Diye Hai, To Kya us Per Bhi Zakat Ada Karni Hogi.

Unke Paas Kuch Cash Bhi Hai Jo Unhone Apni Beti ki Shadi ke Liye Bacha ke Rakhe Hai.

Kya Uspe Bhi Zakat Deni Hogi.

Hazrat Rehnumai Farmaye Jazakallah.

Jawab:

1) Agar Property Bechne Ki Niyat se Rakhi Hai. To Us Property ki Qeemat Par Zakat Hogi Aur Kiraaye Par Dene Ki Niyat se Khareedi to us Property Par Zakat Nahi.

Haan! Jo Kiraaye Ke Paise Aayenge aur Saal Mukammal Hone Par Jitni Raqam Bachegi us Par Zakat Hogi.

Agar Malik e Nisab Ho.

2) Beti ko Jo Zewaraat Mile Hain, Agar Uski Qeemat Nisab ko Pahochti Hai. To Us Par Bhi Zakat Farz Hai.

3) Jo Paise Jama Rakhe hue Hain, Agar Wo 612 Gram Chandi Ki Qeemat Ke Barabar, Ya usse Zyada Hoon to Us Par Bhi Zakat Hai.

Title: Talaq Ki Kitne Qisme Hai❓
Content:
Jawab:
  1. Hadan
  2. Ahasan
  3. Bidai
Jis Tohar (Mahine ke paaki ke din) me wati (mubasharat) na ki ho, usme ek talaq e Rajai de Aur chore rahe yaha tak ki iddat gujar jaaye. Yah Ahasan Hai. Aur Gair moutuh ko talaq di, Agarche haiz ke dino me di ho, ya moutuh (jisse wati yaani mubasharat kar liya ho) ko 3 tohar me 3 Talaq e di bashart ki na un toharo me wati (mubasharat) ki ho, na haiz me ya 3 mahine me 3 Talaq e Us Aurat ko di jise haiz nahi aata. Maslan nabaalig, ya hamal waali hai, ya Ayaas (wah umar jab se haiz, yaani maahwaaari aana band ho jaati hai) ki umar ko pahunch gayi to yah sab surate Talaq Hadan ki Hai. Hamal waali, ya Seene Ayaas waali ko wati (mubasharat) ke baad Talaq dene me karaahat nahi. Yoon hi agar usko umar 9 saal se kam ki ho, to karaahat nahi aur 9 baras ya jyaada ki umar hai. Magar abhi haiz nahi aaya hai, to afzal yah hai ki wati (mubasharat) wa talaq me ek mahine ka faasla ho. Bidai yah ki Ek Tohar me 2 ya 3 Talaq dede, 3 dafa me, ya 2 dafa, ya 1 hi Dafa. Khwaah 3 baar lafz kahe, ya yoon kah diya ki Tujhe 3 Talaq e, ya 1 hi talaq di. Magar us Tohar me wati (mubasharat) kar chuka hai. Ya Moutuh ko haiz me talaq di, ya tohar hi me talaq di, magar usse pahle jo haiz aaya tha usme wati (mubasharat) ki ya us haiz me talaq di thi, ya yah sab baatein nahi, magar Tohar me talaq e baain di. Durre Mukhtar Bahar-e-sahari'at 4th Hissa safa 09 -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Namaz E Janaza ka tarika?
Content:
Namaz e janaza me 2 farz hai.
  1. Qayam (khade hona)
  2. 4 Takbeer kehna
Namaz e janaza me 3 sunnatein hai.
  1. Sana padhna
  2. Durood E Ibrahim Padhna
  3. Namaz e janaza ki dua padhna
Namaz e janaza ki niyat Niyat ki maine namaz e janaza farz e kifaya ki sath 4 takbeero ke Waaste Allah Ta’ala ke dua is Mayyat Ke liye peeche is imam ke muh mera kaaba shareef ke taraf. Pehli takbeer Niyat Ke Baad Jaise hi imam Jaise hi pehli takbeer kahenge Allah hu akbar kehte hue hath bandna hai aur Sana padhna hai. Dusri takbeer Jab imam dusri martaba Allah hu akbar kahe to bagair hatho ko uthaye durood e ibrahim padhna hai. Teesri takbeer Jab imam teesri martaba Allah hu akbar kehe to bagair hatho ko uthaye namaz e janaza ki dua padhna hai. Chauthi takbeer Jab imam chauthi martaba Allah hu akbar kahe to dono hatho to Chhod kar salam phere. Note: Sunnat tarika yahi hai ke apne dono hatho ko Chhod kar salam phere. Namaz e janaza ki dua
Namaz e janaza mein padhi jane wali dua

اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِحَيِّنَا وَمَيِّتِنَا وَشَاهِدِنَا وَغَائِبِنَا وَذَكَرِنَا وَأُنْثَانَا وَصَغِيرِنَا وَكَبِيرِنَا
Allahummighfir lihayyina wa mayyitina wa shahidina wa gha'ibina wadhakarina (wazakrina) wa unthana ( wa unsana) wa saghirina wa kabirina
Tarjumah : Ya Allah maghfirat farma hamare zindo ki aur hamare murdo ki aur hamare hazir ki aur hamare gayab ki aur hamare mardo ki aur hamari aurato ki aur hamare choto ki aur hamare bado ki.

Title: Namaste Kehna Kaisa Or Is Ke Mana Nahi Jante Hai Kehna Kaisa Or Jante Hue Kehna Kaisa
Content:
Jawab:

Alahadrat Azeemul Barkat Sayyedna Imam Ahmad Raza Fazil e Barielwi Quddisa sirruhul Azeez se Daryaft kiya gaya ke jawab e salam o kuffar o hanaadik (Hinduism) kin alfaz me diye jaayein aur khud bhi zarurat o be zarurat unko salam kare to kis taur se?

Is ke jawab me Aap Tahreer farmate hain "kafir ko be zarurat ibteda ba salam naa jaayez hai. نص عليه في الحديث والفقه

Aur hindustan me wo tareeq e tahiyyat jaari hain ke ba zarurat bhi unhe salam e shara'i karne ki hajat nahi.

Maslan yahi kaafi ke Lala saab, babu saab, munshi saab, ya be sar jhukaaye sar par hath rakh lena wagaira zaalik.
kaafir Agar be lafz e Salam salam kare to aise hi alfaz e raayeja jawab me bas hain aur ba lafz e salam ibteda kare to ulama farmaate hain jawab me wa alaik kahe.

Magar ye lafz yahan makhsoos ba ahl e islam thehra hua hai aur wo kafir bhi ise jawab e salam na samjhega.

Balke apne sath istehza khayal karega to jis lafz se munaasbat jaane jawab de le agar che salam ke jawab me salam hi keh kar.
(Fatawa Razviya)

Lehaza ba darja e majburi namaste ya namaskar bol sakta hai.

Lekin Yu hi bila zarurat kehna naa jaayez hai.

Bachna behtar hai Aur jab ke iska Maana ye ho ke Mai Sar jhukaata hu Tumhare liye to aisa Kehne se mana kiya jaayega.

Jab usne sar jhukaaya nahi sirf kaha hai aur awam iska matlab bhi nahi jaanti to sakht hukm na hoga.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Masjid me CCTV lagana kaisa ? Kya lagana Sahi Hai?
Content:

CCTV cameras, ya kisi dosre camera ke zariye screen par jo kuch nazar aaye tahqeeq ye hai ke uska hukm tasweer ka hai, aur bila zarurat jandar ki tasweer khenchna khechwana jaayez nahi.

Hadees shareef me hai ke "qiyamat ke din sab se sakht azaab tasweer banane walo par hoga".

Aala hazrat fazil e bareilwi quddisa sirruh ul azeez farmate hain.


صورت گری مطلقاً حرام ست سایہ دارباشد یابے سایہ دستی باشد یاعکس، درزمان برکت نشان سیدالانس والجان صلی اﷲ تعالٰی علیہ وسلم ہردوگانہ تصویرمے ساختند ہم بجسم وہم مسطح ودراحادیث ازمطلق صورت گری نہی اکیدوبرصنعت اووعیدشدید بے تخصیص وتقیید ورود یافت پس جمیع اقسام اوزیرمنع درآمد


Lehaza masjid, ya darul uloom me, ya uske baaher CCTV cameras lagane ki shar'an ijazat nahi.

Narmi ikhtiyaar karo, sakhti aur bad zabaani se apne aap ko bachaao.
(Bukhari : 6410)

(BAD ZABAANI SE APNE AAP KO BACHAAO)

Hazrat is ki kya hakikat hai, rehnumai farmaye

Jawab:

Maana bilkul waazeh hai ke Musalman Apas me Narm mizaaj hon, Ek dosre se sakhti ke sath pesh na aayein aur na hi badzubaani karein.

Title: 1) Rehmatullah Alaih aur Radi Allahu Anhu ka kya matlab hai?
Content:
2) Rehmatullah Alaih aur Radi Allahu Anhu kinhe kehna durust hai?

Hazrat Baraye Meherbani iss sawal ka jawab inayat farmakar rehnumai kare.

Jawab:

Rahmatullah Alaih ka Maana "Allah ki Rahmat un par ho" aur RaziAllahu Anhu ka Maana "Allah Un se Raazi ho"

Akaabir Auliya e Kiraam ke liye RaziAllahu Ta'ala anhu ka Istemal jaayez hai aur Aam Buzurgaan e deen ke liye Rahmatullah Alaih ka istemaal kiya jaaye.

Title: Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ne Mayyat Dafnane Ke Baad Itni Der Qabr Par Aulado Ko Tilawat Karne Ki Nasihat Kyu Ki
Content:
Jab Tak Ek Oont Zibah Kar Ke Taqseem Kar Diya Jaaye ❓

Hazrat Rahnumayi Farmaye.

Jawab:

Dafn Ke Baad Qabr Ke Paas Itni der Taherna Mustahab Hai, Jitni Der me Unt Zabah Kar Ke Gosht Taqseem Kar Diya Jaaye, Ke un Ke Rehne se Mayyat Ko Unsiyat Hogi, Aur Nakirain ka Jawab Dene Me Wahshat Na Hogi Aur Itni Der Tak Tilawat e Quran aur Mayyat Ke Liye Dua o Istegfar Karein Aur Dua Karein Ke Sawal e Nakiriain ke Jawab Me Sabit Qadam Rahe.

Title: Kya Kisi Ke Purane Kapde Pahenna Jaayez Hai ?
Content:
Purane Kapde, Shoes Waghaira?

Jawab:

Puraane Kisi Ke Istemal Shuda Kapde Joote Wagairah Pahenne Me Kuch Harj Nahi, Ke Wo Napaak hai Nahi.

Aur Kisi Cheez ki Hillat Ke Liye Daleel Ki Zarurat Nahi.

Ashya ki Asl Ibaahat Hai.

Lehaza us Ka Istemal Mubaah hai.

Jabtak us Ke Khilaaf Koi Daleel e Sharai na Qaayem Ho.

Title: Agar Kisi Sunni Muslim Ladke ki Shadi Kisi Wahabi Ya Aise Kisi Ladki Se Ho Jiske Khas Rishtedaar Me Wahabi ho
Content:
Aur Nikah Koi Sunni Mufti, Ya Qari Padhaye To Kya Nikah Durust Hoga ?

Jawab:

Agar Waaqai Ladki Wahabi Hai Ke Jiski Badmazhabi Hadd e Kufr ko Pahochi Hui Hai, To Ye Nikah Hi Na Hua.

Agarche Koi Parhaaye, Balke ye Jaante hue Parhaane Waale Par bhi Taubah Laazim Hai.

Haan! Agar Ladka Ladki Sunni Hain, To Nikah Durust Ho Gaya.

Magar usme wahabiyo ki shirkat jaayez nahi, jo unki shirkat se raazi raha us par taubah laazim.

Title: Kya kisi dargah pe chadhi huwi chadar ko khareed kar uske paiso ko dargah ke galle me daal kar
Content:
Hazrat kya us chaadar ko doosri kisi dargah me pesh kar sakte hai?

Rehnumayi farmayein.

Jawab:

Aksar dargaho pe urf o riwaaz se ye baat sabit hai ke wo chaadarein mujawaro ke le lene ke liye charhaai jaati hai.

To mujaawar maalik ho gaya aur ye khareed o farokht jaayez ho gayi.

Aur agar kahin chadar isliye charhaai ke wo mazar par rahe, to wo chaadar rakhne wale ki milkiyat me baaqi hai.

Jab tak wo ijazat na dega khareed o farokht sahih na hogi.

Lehaza agar wahan ka urf ye hai ke chadarein isi liye charhaai jaati hain ke ise bech kar uski qeemat dargah ke ikhrajat me sarf ki jaaye to khareed sakta hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Kya kisike sayyed hone par unko peer mana jaa raha hai
Content:
Naa hi wo shariat par paband hai aur Na hi unke ghar wale shariat par paband hai. Sirf Aale-Rasool hone ke wajah se unko peer mana ja raha hai. Kya iss haal me hum unke mureed ban sakte hai. Ek peer hone ke liye kya shartein hona zaroori hai? Jawab: Sirf siyaadat peer hone ke liye kaafi nahi. Peer ke liye 4 shartein hain.
  1. Sunni sahihul aqeedah.
  2. Itna ilm ho ke Masaail e Shariayyah Begair kisi ke madad se kitabo se nikal sake.
  3. Silsilah Huzoor ﷺ tak muttasil ho, Fasiq e Mo'lin na Ho.
-------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Ek Shakhs ki Walida Ka Inteqal Ho Gaya Subha aur Raat Main Uske Rishtedar Ke Yaha Nikha Se Ek Deen Phele ki Dawat Thi
Content:
Jo Ki Dhulhe Aur Gharwalon ne Aapne Doston aur Ahbab Ko Di Thi Jisme Sirf Gents Shameel The Aur DJ Party Jaisa Ek Chota Program Kiye.

Ab Jinki Walida Ke Inteqal Hua Tha Use un Logon se Ristedaari Khatam Kardi Hai aur Jo Dusre Log Hai Unse Kaha Hai ki Agar Humse Rishta Rakhna Hai Toh Maafi Nama Likh Kar Do aur Un Logo se Rishta Tod Do.

Dono khandan Ke Bich Sulah Ka koi Rasta Nahi Dikh Raha Hai.

Sawal Ye Hai Ki:

1) Jiski Walida Ka Inteqal Hua Usko Rishtedaron Ko aur Digar Mehmano ko Gum Main Rehne Ka Hukum Dena Kaisa ?

2) Jisne Yeah Party Ki Uska Yeah Khena ki 90 se Zyada Umar Ho Gayi thi. Aab kya Hamare Ghar Main Ussi ke Shok Main Dubbe Rahe Ge, Ya Hamare Bachho ki Shaadi ki Khushi Manaye?

3) Ab Jabki Kuch Log Usme DJ Party ke Khilaf The Aur Party Main Sirf Dawat ki Niyat se Gaye The, Na ki DJ Party Karne un par Shariyat ka kya Hukm Honga?

Rehnumaye Farmaye.

Jawab:

1) Gam o Sog ke Liye Apne Rishtedar Se Kehna jaayez hai.

2) Aisa Kehna Hargiz Jaayez o Durust Nahi Ke Jisse Ek Musalman Bhai ke Dil ko Thes Pohche, Kehne Wala Mayyat ke Ghar Walo se Muafi Maange.

3) Sawal se Zaahir Hai ke wo Mauj Masti ki Mehfil thi Aisi Mehfil hi Jaayez Nahi.

Lehaza us Naach Gaane ki Party me Koi Sirf khane Gaya to wo Bhi Makhooz Hoga.

Sab Par taubah Lazim hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi 
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Yaum e jumuah mein jo log masjid mein late aate hai.
Content:
Magar saffon mein baithe huwe logo ki gardanein ke upar se hote huwe aage ki saff mein jaa baithte hai.

Kya aisa karna jayez hai?

Aur woh log jo topi, ya rumal rakh ke jagah pehle se pakad lete hai aage ki saffon mein, fir apne kaam karke sidhe aage ki saffon mein jaa baithte hai.

Kya yeh amal jayez hai?

Hazrat rehnumayi farmaye.

Jawab:

Hadees e Paak me Hai Ke

"Jis Ne Jumuah ke Din Logo ki Gardane Phalaangi Us Ne Jahannam Tak Pahochne Ka Apne Liye Pul Bana Liya."

(Musnad Ahmad, Tirmizi, ibn e Majah)

Lehaza Agar Jumuah ke Liye Masjid Me Log Saff Me Baith Chuke Hon Aur Jagah Na Ho Phir Bhi Koi Logo ki Gardane Phalang Kar Agli Saff me Jaaye to Wo Gunahgar Hoga.

Isi Tarah Pehle se Apni Jagah Rumal, ya JaNamaz Bichha Kar Khaas kar Lena Nahi Chahiye, Agar us Jagah ke Ilawa Masjid me Jagah Nahi to us Jagah Par Dosra Shakhs Baith Sakta hai.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi 
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Agar Koi Insan Yeh Kehta Hai Ki Tumhara Rizq Bandh Diya Gaya Hai?
Content:
Yani Bandish Ki Gayi Hai. To Is Ki Kya Asliyat Maani Jaye ?

Maine Suna Tha Ke Bandish Ki Koi Sharai Haisiyat Nahi.

To Fir Kya Kiya Jaye.

Yeh Khud Mera Hi Mamla Hai ki Mene Nayi Dukan Chalu Ki Hai Par Customer Nahi Aate, To Hamari Behan Ne kisi se Puchha to Unho Ne Bataya ki Meri Rozi Bandh Di Gayi Hai.

Is Ko Main to Nahi Manta Lekin is Paresani Me Hamari Islaah Farma Kar Hamari Madad Farmayega.

Jawab:

Sehr, Jadu Wagaira Haq Hai, Mumkin Hai Aise Fasid Uloom Ke Zariye Kisi ki Bandish Kar Di Jaaye.

Magar Yaqeen Ke Sath Koi Nahi Keh Sakta Ke us Par Jadu Wagaira Kiya Gaya Hai.

Balke ye Ek Takhmeena o Hisab Hota Hai.

Namaz ki Pabandi Karein Aur Fajr Ki Sunnat aur Farz Ke Darmiyaan 100 Martaba Rozana

Sub'HanAllahi wa BiHamdih' Sub'HanAllahil Azeem Wa BiHamdihi Astaghfirullah Parhein.

Insha'Allah Zarur Rizq Ke Darwaze Khul Jayenge.

Title: Koi Shakhs kehta hai ki ALLAH Taala ne Hazrat E Adam Alaihi Salam ko Apni shakal mein banaya
Content:
Aur uske tehet Surah Hijr ki Ayat No. 29 aur yeh Ahadees pesh karta hai.

إِذَا قَاتَلَ أَحَدُكُمْ أَخَاهُ فَلْيَجْتَنِبْ الْوَجْهَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ خَلَقَ آدَمَ عَلَى صُورَتِهِ

“When any one of you fights with his brother, he should avoid his face for Allah created Adam in his [or His own] image.”

(Sahih Muslim, Hadith 4731) 

نْ النَّبِيِّ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ قَالَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ آدَمَ عَلَى صُورَتِهِ طُولُهُ سِتُّونَ ذِرَاعًا فَلَمَّا خَلَقَهُ قَالَ اذْهَبْ فَسَلِّمْ عَلَى أُولَئِكَ النَّفَرِ مِنْ الْمَلَائِكَةِ جُلُوسٌ فَاسْتَمِعْ مَا يُحَيُّونَكَ فَإِنَّهَا تَحِيَّتُكَ وَتَحِيَّةُ ذُرِّيَّتِكَ فَقَالَ السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ فَقَالُوا السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ فَزَادُوهُ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ فَكُلُّ مَنْ يَدْخُلُ الْجَنَّةَ عَلَى صُورَةِ آدَمَ فَلَمْ يَزَلْ الْخَلْقُ يَنْقُصُ بَعْدُ حَتَّى الْآنَ

The Prophet, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, said, "Allah created Adam on his form and his height was sixty cubits. When He created him, He said, 'Go and greet that group angels and listen to how they greet you. It will be your greeting and the greeting of your descendants.' He said, 'Peace be upon you,' and they said, 'Peace be upon you and the mercy of Allah,' and they added, 'and the mercy of Allah.' Everyone who enters the Garden will be in form of Adam. People have been getting shorter until now."

Sahih Bukhari, Hadith 5873.

Kya yeh sahi hai. Rehnumayi Farmaye.

Jawab:

Ye Hadees sahih hai aur yahan par izaafat sharf ke liye hai.

Jaise Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya "بيتي" mera ghar, "ناقة الله" Allah ki untni.

Yaha zameer Hazrat Adam ki taraf hai yaani Adam ko unki kaamil surat par banaya.

Unka qad 60 hath ka, Bar khilaaf Aulad e Adam ke bachcha chota hota hai.

Phir barh kar apne kaamil qad ko pahochta hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi 
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Nabi Mein Aur Rasool Mein Kya Farq Hai ?
Content:
Quran Aur Hadith Ki Roshni Mein Jawab Mile Toh Zyada Afzal Hoga Please.

Mufti Sahab Baraye Meherbani Jawab Inayat Farmaye.

Jawab:

Nabi Us Bashar (Insan) Ko Kehte Hain. Jise Allah Ta'ala Ne Logo Ki Hidayat Ke Liye Wahi Bheji Ho, Aur Rasool Bashar Hi Ke Sath Khas Nahi.

Balke Malaika (Farishto) Me Bhi Rasool Hain.

Almo'taqad Me Zikr Hai Ke Mash'hoor Ye Hai Ke Nabi Wo Hai Jis Par Wahi Bisshara Ho, Aur Agar Tableeg Ka Bhi Hukm Ho to Wo Rasool Hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Masjid Ke Imam Sahab ne Azaan di Aur Jamat ke waqt Baitul Qala mein The
Content:
Aur Logon ko Nahi Maloom Ke wo Masjid mein Maujood hain.

Kisi ne Imam sahab se Ijazat nahi li Aur waqt e Muqarrara se 5 minute zyada hojane par kisi aur ko Namaz Padhane ke liye Kaha gaya.

Aur Namaz Ba Jamaat Ada karli Gayi.

Namaz Ke Baad Muqarrara Imam Sahab Ne Kaha Ke Kisi ki Namaz Nahi hui.

Kyunki Imam Masjid mein the unki ijazat ke baghair Jamaat qayem ki gayi.

Lihaza dobara jamaat qayem karke Namaz Adaa ki gayi.

Kya Ye Durust Hai?

Kya waqai pehle qayem ki hui Jamaat Ghalat hai?

Kya doosri Namaz ka alag sawab milta hai?

Baraye Meherbani Jawab Inayat Farmayein.

Jawab:

Jo Muqtadi Har waqt rehte hain wo maujood the to Ye Jamaat e Ula ho gayi.

Imam ka ye kehna ke kisi ki Namaz na hui Jihaalat hai.

Haan! Imam ka Intezar karna zaruri tha, magar jab ke Ye Ma'loom tha ke Imam Maujood hi nahi aur kuch der Intezar bhi kiya gaya to is me koi gunah nahi.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Hazrat Harmain Shareefain Me jo Maujooda Imam Jamaat se Namaz Padhata Hai
Content: Agar Koi Sunni Haram Sharif Me us Waqt Maujood Ho. To Kya Aisi Soorat Me wo Namaziyon ke Aage se Guzar kar Baahar Ja Sakta hai? Kisi ne ek shakhs ko mana kiya, to woh kehne laga ke usne suna hai ke Huzur Mufti e Azam ne bhi unki safon ko cheer kar baahar chale gaye the. Kya ye baat sahi hai? Jawab: Is waqt wahan ke jitne Imam hain, sab najdi wahabi khabees hain, unke peeche Namaz durust nahi. Chahiye ke Baaher nikal jaaye ya agar fitne ka andesha ho, to wahin baith jaaye. Magar unki iqteda hargiz na kare. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Kya Murda Logo (Mayyat) ka 40wa ya 10wa pe Bhari Dawat Deni Chahiye
Content: Isliye Ke Murda Log Khush Hote Hai? Jawab: Aala Hazrat ne is Ta'lluq se Fatawa Razviya me Jawab Tahreer Farmaya jiska Khulaasa ye hai ke: 1)  Soyem, daswen aur Chaliswe wagaira ka khana Miskeeno ko diya jaaye. Biraadri ko Taqseem karna, ya Unko Jama kar ke Khilana be'ma'na hai. Maut me Daawat Najaayez hai. 3 din iska Mahmool hai. Lehaza iske baad bhi Maut ki niyat se agar daawat kare Mamnoo hai. 2) Mash'hur Maqoola hai ke Mayyat ka khana Dil ko murda kar deta hai. Ye tajrube ki baat hai aur iska ye matlab hai ke jo Mayyat ke khaane ke khwahish mand rehte hain unka dil mar jaata hai. Allah Ta'ala ke zikr aur itaa'at ke liye Hayat o Chusti usme nahi rehti ke wo apne pet ke luqme ke liye ek Muslim ki Maut ke Muntazir rehte hain aur khana Khaate waqt Maut se Gaafil Rehte hain. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Hinda ka inteqal ho gaya hai. Hinda ka Shauhar aur 3 ladkiyan hayat hain.
Content:
Hinda ke walidain bhi faut ho gaye hain. Hinda ke 3 bhai aur 2 behne hayaat hain.

Ab waarison me tarka kis tarah Taqseem hoga?

Hinda ne wasiyat ki thi ke uske maal se 25 fisad khairaat ki jaye.

Jawab:

Hinda ke zimme agar koi dain. Maslan qarz wagaira ho, to uske tarke se pehle wo ada kiya jaaye.

Phir agar unho ne koi wasiyyat e saheeha ki hai to tihaai 1/3 maal tak wo nafiz ki jaaye, huqooq e mutaqaddima ki adaayegi ke baad.

Agar waaqai hinda ke wariso me 1 shauhar, 3 betiyaan, 3 bhai aur 2 behne hain.

Inke ilawa hinda ka aur koi dosra waris nahi.

To hinda ka kul tarka 288 hisse ho kar 72 hisse uske shohar ko, 64 hisse teeno betiyo me se har ek ko, 6,6 hisse teeno bhaiho ko aur 3,3 hisse dono behno ko milenge.

Agar feesad dekha jaaye to taqreeban, 25% shauhar ko, har ek beti ko 22.22%, har ek bhai ko 2.083%, har ek bahen ko 1.0416%.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Samuhiq Shadi-Biyaah, Ya Hajj Mein Jane Se Pehle Jo Dawat Khilaye Jati Hai
Content:

Yaani Ki Bad-Mazhab, Bad-Aqida, Wahabi, Ahle Hadees Wagaira Jaise Gair-Muqallideen Aur Kuch Log Sunni Saheeh-ul-Aqidaa Ahle Sunnat Wal Jamat Ke Mannewale Bhi Shahmil Hote Hai.

Toh Kya Unke Sath Samuhiq Dawat Mein Sarik Ho Sakte Hai, Ya Nahi.

Aur Kya Jo Sunni Saheeh-ul-Aqidaa Hai Woh Kya Woh Dawat Mein Shirkat Karke Khana Khaa Sakte Hai?

Jawab:

Jis dawat me wahabi deobandi bhi shareek hon, us dawat mein kisi tarah ka hissa lena na jaayez hai.

Unse kisi tarah ka mel jol, dosti na jaayez o haraam hai.

Title: Zaid Ko Kisi Isaai Ne Donation Manga Church Ke Liye, Aur Zaid Ne De Diya.p
Content:
Baad Me Apni Galti Ka Ehsaas Huwa Zaid Ko.

Zaid Bohot Sharminda Hai Iss Fel Se.

Baraye Rehnumaai Farmaaiye Ke Zaid Ko Kya Karna Chaahiye Ab?

جزاک اللَّه خیر

✍ Jawaab (2) :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Eisaaio Ko Haq Jaante Hue Madad Ki To Tajdeed e Iman Zaruri, Aur Agar Yu Hi Diya To Istegfar Kare Sacche Dil Se Tauba Kare.

--------------------------------------------------

? Sawal (3) :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Hazrat Iss Jawab ke Muta'allik Ek Sawal Ye Hai Ke Zaid Ne Jab Galti Se Salam Fer Diya Imam Sahab Ke Sath Uss Waqt Wo Namaz Imam Sahab Qiyadat Mai Adaa Kar Raha Tha

Agar Zaid Imam Sahab ki Qiyadat Mai Namaz Adaa Kar Raha Ho Aur Aisi Koi Galti ho Jaaye Jisse Sajda e Sahw Karna Pade to Kya Zaid ko Sajda e Sahw Karna Hoga ?

✍ Jawaab (3) :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Umooman Imam Ke Salam Pherne Ke Baad hi Us ki Iqteda Karne Waale Salam Pherte Hain, Aur Salam Me Agar Kuch Bhi Takheer Hui to Ab Iqteda Baaqi Na Rahi Balke Masbooq Munfarid Ho Gaya, Lehaza is Bina Par Sajda Wajib Hoga, Haan Agar Bilkul Imam Ke Sath Hi Sath Masbooq Ne Salam Phera Aur Yaad Aate Hi Khada Ho Gaya to Sajda Wajib Na Hoga.

--------------------------------------------------

Title: Zaid Ne Jab Galti Se Salam Fer Diya Imam Sahab Ke Sath
Content: Uss Waqt Wo Namaz Imam Sahab Ke Qiyadat Mein Adaa Kar Raha Tha. Agar Zaid Imam Sahab ki Qiyadat Mai Namaz Adaa Kar Raha Ho Aur Aisi Koi Galti ho Jaaye Jisse Sajda e Sahw Karna Pade. To Kya Zaid ko Sajda e Sahw Karna Hoga ? Jawab: Umooman Imam Ke Salam Pherne Ke Baad hi Uski Iqteda Karne Waale Salam Pherte Hain, Aur Salam Me Agar Kuch Bhi Takheer Hui, To Ab Iqteda Baaqi Na Rahi. Balke Masbooq Munfarid Ho Gaya. Lehaza is Bina Par Sajda Wajib Hoga. Haan! Agar Bilkul Imam Ke Sath Hi Sath Masbooq Ne Salam Phera Aur Yaad Aate Hi Khada Ho Gaya to Sajda Wajib Na Hoga. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Hamare Yaha Ek Masjid Ka Moazzin Umrah Ki Safar Ke Liye Ja Raha Hai
Content: Wo Gareeb Hai Aur Unke Liye Hamari Masjid Me Maulana Sahab Ne Eylaan Kiye Ki Inko Kuch Imdad Ki Raqam De. To Kya Masjid Me Aise Eylaan Karwa Sakte Hai. Mujhe Confusion Ho Rahi Hai Maine Kahi Padha Hai Ki Masjid Me Sawal Nahi Kiya Jaata. Par Inke Kehne Se Maulana Sahab Ne Eylaan Karwaya Hai Ki Inko Kuch De. Kya Asa Karna Sahi Hai, Ya Galat? Jawab: Sayyedi Aala hazrat Irshad Farmate Hain. Dosre Mohtaj Ke Liye Imdad Ko Kehna, Ya Kisi Deeni Kaam Ke Liye Chanda Karna Jisme Na Gul Shor Ho Na Gardan Phalangna Na Kisiki Namaz Me Khalal Ye Bila Shubah Jayez. Balke Sunnat se Saabit Hai. Aur Be Sawal Kisi Mohtaaj Ko Dena Bahot Khoob Aur Maula Ali Karramallahu Ta'ala Waj'hahu Se Saabit Hai. (Fatawa Razavia) -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Huzur Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam Ne Gaaye Ya Bail ka Gosha Tanaawul Farmaaya Hai Ya Nahi ?
Content:
Jawab:

Muslim Shareef Kitaabuz zakat ki Hadees hai ke

"Barirah رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہا ke liye Gaaye ka gosht sadqe me aaya wo Huzoor ﷺ ke paas laaya gaya aur Huzoor ﷺ se Arz kiya gaya ke ye sadqah hai ke Barirah ko aaya,

Farmaya uske liye Sadqah hai aur Hamare liye Hadiyah"

Isse ba zaahir Tanawul farmana Ma'loom hota hai.

Huzoor e Aqdas ﷺ ne Gaaye ki Qurbani farmaayi aur uske khane khilane ka hukm farmaya, duniya ki hazaro Ne'matein hain ke Huzoor ﷺ ne Qasdan Tanawul na farmayi, Gaaye ke gosht ki Mazammat me jo Hadees zikr ki jaati hai Sahih Nahi.

(Mulakkhasan Fatawa Razavia Kitabuz zabaaih wa Hashiyah)

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Jo Admi Apni Taraf Se Qurbani Karta Hai Usme Unke Sath Unke Walid Sahab Ka Naam Lagate Hai
Content:
Per Ek Problem Hai. Zaid Sunni Hai Aur Pura Khandan Sunni Hai.

Per Zaid Ke Sasur Wahabi Ho Gaye Hai Kuch Waqt Phele.

Is Surat Me Zaid Ki Wife Ki Taraf Se Jo Qurbani Karni Hai.

To Usme Us Khatoon Ke Piche Ab Kya Likhe.

Kyun Ki us Khatoon Ke Walid Aur Zaid Ka Sasur Wahabi Ho Gaya Hai?

Jawab:

Agar Aurt Apne Walid Ke Naam Ke Sath Mash'hoor Hai To "Bint" Laga Kar Walid ka Naam Zikr Karein.

Ya Shauhar Ke Naam Ke Sath Mashhoor Hai To "Zauja" Laga Kar Shauhar ka Naam Zikr Karein.

Title: Main Malawi Me Rehta Hu Aur Mere Ghar Wale India Mein Hai.
Content:
Malawi Me 12th Ko Bakri Eid Hai Aur India Me 13th Ko Eid Hai.

Kya Main 12th Ko Mere Ghar Wale Jo India Mein Hai. Unki Qurbani Malawi Me Karta Hu, To Wo Qurbani Ho Jati Hai, Ya Nahi?

Jawab:

Fatwa is Par Hai Ke Qurbani Jis Jagah Ho Rahi Ho Us Jagah Ka Ehtebar Hai.

Magar Ehtiyaat is Mein Hai Ke Dosre Din Qurbani Karein Taake Jiski Janib Se Qurbani Ki Ja Rahi Hai, Us Par Qurbani Wajib Hone Ka Waqt Bhi Aa Jaayein.

Title: Mere Ek Aziz Dost Ke Sath Goverment Job Zaid Karte Hai
Content:
Unko India Goverment India Se Hajj Ke Time India Se Bejti Hai Aur Uski Tankha Indian Goverment Deti Hai.

Masla Ye Hai Ki Wo Masha'Allah Umrah To Kar Liya Madina Shareef Bi Duty Karke Wapis Makkah Shareef Poch Gaye.

Ab Unki Duty Mina Me Lagegi Aur Unko Ye Bataya Gaya Ki Aap Log Duty Me Ihram Nahi Badho Ge.

Kafi Log is Masle Me Fase Hai.

Ab iske Baad Wo Mina Wagaira Me Hajiyo Ki Khidmat Kar Sakte Hain.

Title: Nabaalig Bachcho Ko Jo Nazrana Ya Eidi Wagaira Milti Hai.
Content:
Kya Wo Use Apne Upar Kharch Kar Sakta Hai Aur Uske Paise Ki Laayi Huwi Ashya, Kya Ghar Ke Doosre Log Bhi Kha Sakte Hain?

Kisi Ne Bataya Ke Wo Raqam Amanat Ki Taur Par Uske Walidain Jama Rakhe Aur Jab Wo Balig Ho To Usey Dein.

Is Silsile Me Sharah Ka Mauqaf Kya Hai Hazrat Rehnumayi Farmaye

Jawab:

Nabaalig Bachche Ki Milkiyat Me Jo Bhi Maal Ho Us Ka Istemal Sirf Bachcha Hi Apne Liye Kar Sakta Hai.

Us ke Paiso Ki Khareedi Hui Cheez Dosre Na Khaayein.

Agar Khaayein To Utni Raqam Ada Kar Dein.

Waalidain Un Paiso Ko Ba'Taur e Amanat Rakh Sakte Hain Ke Samajhdar Hone Par Lauta Dein.

Magar Uska Istemal Nahi Kar Sakte.

Title: Apne Nabalig Bachche Ki Eidi Ya Digar Jama Rakam Ko Jaise Apne Aage Bataya

Ya Walidain Parwarish Main Apni Hi Kamai Lagaye?

Aur Agar Aisi Raqam Jo Nabalig Bachcho Ki Milqiyat Hain.

Jaise Apne Bataya To Uspar Aanewali Zakat Ke Bare Main Kaun Zimmedar Rahega?

Jawab:

Waalidain Na Baalig Bachcho ki Jama Raqam Unki parwarish Aur Zaruriyat Me Kharch Kar Sakte Hain Aur Na Baalig Par Zakat Farz Nahi.

Lehaza Jin Paiso Ka Wo Malik Hai Unki Zakat na Nikaali Jayegi.

Title: Hazrat kya ek hi janwar ki Qurbani se pure ghar ke afraad ki Qurbani hojayegi ?
Content:
Jawab:

Ghaur wa tadabbur aur gehraayi wa geerayi ke sath dekha jaye to,

Hazrat Abu Ayyub Ansari ﺭﺿﯽ ﺍﻟﻠّٰــﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﯽٰ ﻋﻨــــــــﮧ ki ye hadees. ﻣﺎﻧﻌﻴﻦ ﺗﻌﺪﺩ Ke khilaf nahi, balke unki taayid me hai.

Is liye ke ahnaaf ke yahan sahib e nisaab par sirf uski taraf se qurbani zaroori hai.

Uski aulaad aur uski biwi ki taraf se uspar qurbani wajib nahi.

Isi mafhoom ko batane ke liye Hazrat Abu Ayyub Ansari Radiallaho Anhu farmate hain ke
ﻳﺬﺑﺤﻬﺎﺍﻟﺮﺟﻞ ﻋﻨﻪ ﻭﻋﻦ ﺍﻫﻞ ﺑﻴﺘﻪ ﺍﻟﺦ .

Hadees e mazkoor ki tauzeeh is liye ki gayi hai ke agar isse ta'addud ka jawaaz saabit kar diya jaye.

To phir Hazrat Jaabir ﺭﺿﯽ ﺍﻟﻠّٰــﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﯽٰ ﻋﻨــــــــﮧ ki jis hadees me aaya hai ke

ﺿﺤﻲ ﺍﻟﻨﺒﻲ ﷺ ﻋﻤﻦ ﻟﻢ ﻳﻀﺢ ﻣﻦ ﺍﻣﺔ ''

Aur Hazrat Abu Raafe ﺭﺿﯽ ﺍﻟﻠّٰــﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﯽٰ ﻋﻨــــــــﮧ ki hadees.
ﺿﺢ ﺍﻟﻨﻲ ﷺ ﻋﻦ ﺟﻤﻴﻊ ﺍﻣﺘﻪ .

In dono hadeeso ka taqaazah to ba'zaahir ye hai ke ek bakri Tamaam musalmano ke liye kaafi hai.

Phir Hazrat Imam Maalik ﺭﺿﯽ ﺍﻟﻠّٰــﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﯽٰ ﻋﻨــــــــﮧ wa Imam Ahmad Radiallaho Anhu waghairah ka ghar ke afraad ke sath takhsees karne ke kya
ma'ne hain?

Neez agar ek bakre me masalan 7 afraad ki shirkat ko jaayiz maan liya jaye to qurbani ke jaanwar ki aqall miqdaar ek bakri rahi ya uska saatwan 7 hissa raha?

Jab ke aqall miqdaar ek mukammal bakri hone par saare fuqaha ka ijma hai.

To kya ye Hazrat hadees ka aisa mafhoom batane ki ijaazat denge jisse khirq e ijma ke ilawah khud unke musallamaat ki tardeed hoti ho?

Neez agar ek bakre me ghar ke senkro afraad ka shareek hona durust maan liya jaaye to phir hadees e paak
ﻣﻦ ﻭﺟﺪ ﺳﻌﺔ ﻭﻟﻢ ﻳﻀﺢ
ﻓﻼ ﻳﻘﺮﺑﻦ ﻣﺼﻼﻧﺎ
Ke kya ma'na honge?

Yaani qurbani ki istita'at ka phir Kya mafhoom hoga?

Kyun ke ye baat khilaaf e aql wa mushaahidah hai ke ghar ke senkro afraad mil kar bhi ek bakre ko khareed na sakein ?

Aisi soorat me to har bade kumba aur afraad waale musta'tee shumaar honge.

Aur ek bakra bhi adaa na kar sakne ki soorat me wa'eed e mazkoor ke mustahiq honge.

Al Gharz in ma'nwi kharaabiyon ke Pesh e nazar yahi ma'na Muraad lena sahi hai ke Abu Ayyub Ansari ﺭﺿﯽ ﺍﻟﻠّٰــﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﯽٰ ﻋﻨــــــــﮧ ke asar ka matlab ye hai ke,

Hazrat Sahaba ek bakre ki qurbani ke sawab me apne tamaam ghar waale ko shareek kar liya karte the.

Ye matlab hargiz nahi hai ke Adaayi e fareezah ke taur par ek bakri me ghar ke tamaam afraad shareekho jate the.

Isi mafhoom ki taayid Abu Raafe ﺭﺿﯽ ﺍﻟﻠّٰــﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﯽٰ ﻋﻨــــــــﮧ ki hadees se bhi hoti hai jis me ye mazkoor hai ke jab aap ﷺ ne apne liye bakri ki qurbani to ek Bachchi ne ye kaha: ﻭﻋﻨﻲ .

Phir aap ﷺ ne farmaya ﻭﻋﻨﻚ,Is se bhi yahi samajh me aata hai ke ek bakri me isqaat e fareezah ke liye nahi.

Balke hadiya e sawab ke liye ta'addud wa ishtiraak jaayiz hai Aur ahnaaf ka yahi mufta bih mazhab hai.

Ghair muqallideen Hazrat Abu Ayyubﺭﺿﯽ ﺍﻟﻠّٰــﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﯽٰ ﻋﻨــــــــﮧ ki riwayat
ke alfaaz" ﻛﻨﺎ ﻧﻔﻌﻞ " ko marfu bata kar isse ta'addud ke jawaaz saabit karne ki jo koshish ki hai wo qaabil e ta'ajjub hone ke ilawa bejaa janbedaari ka bayyin saboot hai.

Unke yahan jab fel e Sahaba mutlaqan hujjat nahi hai. To Abu Ayyub Ansari ﺭﺿﯽ ﺍﻟﻠّٰــﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﯽٰ ﻋﻨــــــــﮧ ka mazkoorah fel kaise aur kyun kar hujjat bana?

Iska munsifanah jawab bhi aana chahiye.

Ye tamaam taujeehat to us soorat me hai jab Hazrat Abu Ayyub Ansari ﺭﺿﯽ ﺍﻟﻠّٰــﻪ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﯽٰ ﻋﻨــــــــﮧ ki hadees ko ma'mool bhi maana jaye warna agar is hadees ko mansookh maan liya jaye jaisa ke khatam ul muhaddiseen Imam tahaawi ne Shariah ma'ni al aasar me muta'addid riwayaton se sabit kiya hai tab to ye
mas'alah bilkul be ghubar hi ho jaata hai ke "qurbani ke ek bakre me ek aadmi se ziyadah afraad ki shirkat ka naa jayiz hona hi aqrab ilas sunnah hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah

Title: Kisi Ko Peshab Ki Problem Hai Matlab Thodi Umerdaraz Hai
Content:

Jawab:

Peshab Karne Se Ghusl Wajib Nahi Hota.

Balke Sirf Wazu Laazim Hoga.

Lehaza Wo Kapre Badal Kar aur Jis Jagah Peshab Lag Gaya Ho Wahan Pani Baha Kar Wazu Kar Ke Namaz Parh Len.

Title: Ladke Ka Naam 'Rishan' Rakhna Ho To Kaisa Rahega?

Jawab:

Agar Waaqai ye Naam Hinduo ke Ma'bood e Baatil ka Hai. To Hargiz Aisa Naam Na Rakha Jaaye.

Title: Ak Shakhs Hai Jo Ahle Sunnat wal jamat Se Hai Deobandi Wahabi Ko Ahle khabees
Content:
Tamam Badmazhab Firko Ko Kafir Bhi Mante Hai Aur is Hadees Par Bhi amal Karta Hai Ki Unke Sath Uthna Bhaithna Khana Peena Sab Haraam Hai.

Lekin Woh Yaha Dubai Me Ahle khabees Imam Ke Piche Namaz Padhte Hai.

Unse Kuch Logo Ne Kaha Ke Inke Piche Namaz Nahi Hoti Hai.

To Wo Bolo Ki Hamare Aqeeda To durust Hai.

Allah Sab Janta Hai or Namaz Sabke Piche Ho Jati Hai.

To Unhe Ab Kis Tarah Samjaya Jaye

Jawab:

Wahabi, deobandi Apne Kufriya Aqaaid ki buniyad Par Kafir o Murtad Hain, Aur Kisi Kafir Ko Apna Imam Manna Bhi Kufr Hai.

Imam Usi Ko Banaya Jata Hai Jo Har Tareeqe Se Afzal o Aala Ho.

Jab Aqeeda hi Durust Nahi To Use Imam Banana Kaise Durust ho Sakta Hai.

Jab wo Shakhs Maante Hain Ke wahabi, deobandi, Badmazhab Hain. To Unhe Imam Bhi Na Banaya Jaaye.

Kya Koi Kisi Hindu Ko Apna Imam Bana Sakta Hai?

Jis Tarah wo Kafir Usi Tarah, Balke us Se Badtar Wahabi, Deobandi Hain.

Title: Hajj mein kitni sunnatein hai ?
Content:
Hajj ki 15 Sunnatein hai

(1) Tawaf-E-Qudum: Ya'ani Meekaat ke baahar Se Aane Wala Makka Muazzama mein Haajir Ho kar Sab Se Pahla Jo Tawaf kare Use Tawaf-E-Qudum (Pehla Tawaf) Kahte Hai.

Tawaaf-E-Qudum Mufreed Aur Kaarin ke Liye Sunnat Hai Mutmatte'a ke liye nahi

(2) Tawaf ka Hazre Aswad Se Shuru Karna.

(3) Tawaf-E-Qudum Ya Tawaf-E-Farz Mein Ramal Karna.

Yaani Akad kar Chalna

(4) Safa Wa Marwa ke Darmiyan jo do Sabz meel hai.

Ya'ani Hare Rang ke Nishaan Hai Unke Darmiyan Dood Na.

(5) Imam ka Makka Mein Saatvi ko.

(6) Aur Arfaat Mein 9 vi ko.

(7) Aur Meena Mein 11vi ko Khutba Padhna.

(8) 8vi ki Farz ke baad Makka Se Rawana hona ki meena mein 5 Namaze Padh lee jaye.

(9) 9vi Raat meena mein guzarna.

(10) Aftab Nikal ne ke baad Meena Se Arafat Ko Rawana Hona.

(11) Wookuf-E-Arfah ke liye Gusl Karna.

(12) Arafat Se Waapsi mein Muzdalifa me Raat Ko Rahna.

(13) Aftab Nikal Ne Se Pahle Yahaan Se Mina Ko Chala Jaana.

(14) 10vi Aur 11vi ke baad jo Dono Raate Hai Unko Meena Mein Guzarna Aur Agar 13vi ko bhi meena me Raha To 12vi ke baad ki Raat ko bhi meena me Rahe

(15) Abtah: Ya'ani Waadi-E-Muhssab me Utarna.

Agarche thodi der ke liye ho Aur Inke Alawa Aur Bhi Sunnate Hai.



Bahar-E-Sahari'At Hissa 06 Safa 18,19

Title: Kya Ala Hazrat Quds Sira Bedari Ki Halat Me Ziyarat E Aqdas ﷺ Se Mushraf Hue Hai ?
Content:
Ek Waiz Ne Ek Waqiah Bayan Kiya Ke Ala Hazrat Maulana Ahmad Raza Khan Rehamtullah Alaih Barelvi Madina Munawara Tashrif Le Gaye.

To Huzur E Akram ﷺ Ke Roza Aqdas Par Hazri Di.

Sarkar E Madina ﷺ Ne Mazar E Anwar Se Dast E Mubarak Nikal Kar Ala Hazrat Se Musafa Kiya, Kya Yeh Durust Hai ?

2) Wo Kaun Naujawaan The Jinke Dhadhi Me Sirf Ek Baal The Aur Wo Hazir E Darbar Hote Rahte The.

Ek Din Wo Baal Munda Kar Hazir E Darbar Hue, Sarkar E Madina ﷺ Ne Munh Pher Liya, Jab Unhone Israr Kiya To Sarkar Ne Farmaya: "Tumhari Dhadhi Ke Is Baal Par Farishtein Jhula Karte The, Aaj Na Paa Raha Hun ?"

Jawab:

1) Waiz Ne Jo Waqiah Bayan Kiya Wo Mukmal Nahi.

Waqiyah Yeh Hai Ke Mujjadeed E Azam Ala Hazrat Quds Sira Ne Bargah E Aqdas ﷺ Me Arz Kiya Ke Khawab Me Sarkar Ne Baarhaa Ziyarat Se Mushraf Farmaya Hai.

Bedari Me Ek Baar Mushraf Farmaye, Kai Baar Darkhawast Paish Ki, Yeh Sharf Hasil Na Huwa, Bil Aakhir Mashur Nazam Likhi.

Wo Sue Lalazaar Phirte Hai, Tere Din Aey Bahar Phirte Hai.

Puri Nazm Likh Kar Bargah Me Paish Ki To Sarkar E Madina ﷺ Ne Karam Farmaya, Bedari Ke Alam Me Sarkar E Madina ﷺ Ne Jalwa Dikhaya Aur Ala Hazrat Quds Sira Ne Dast Bhosi Farmayi.

Yeh Waqiah Arifbillah Hazrat Maulana Ziya Ul Din Sahab Muhajir Madni Rehamtullah Alaih Ne Saikdo Admiyon Se Bayan Farmaya, Jin Me Se Kam Az Kam 10 Admiyon Se Maine Suna, Sharan Is Me Koi Ist'abad Nahi.

Wallahu Ta'la Allam.

2) Yeh Riwayat Meri Nazar Se Nahi Guzri.

Wallahu Ta'la Allam.

Fatwa E Shareh Bukhari Jild 3 Safah 468

Title: Kya Aala Hazrat Ne Ansariyon Ke Piche Namaz Padne Se Manah Farmaya ?
Content:
Kya Farmate Hai Ulma E Deen Wa Muftiyan E Sharah Matin Madarja Zail Masla Me Ke Logo Se Suna Hai Ke Imam E Ahl E Sunnat Ahmad Raza Khan Sahab Barelvi Ne Farmaya Hai Ke Jola Hai (Ansari) Ki Imamat Durusat Nahi ?

Kya Yeh Sahi Bat Hai ?

Jawab:

Mujadeed E Azam Imam Ahmad Raza Quds Sira Par Yeh Bohtaan Hai Aur Iftara Hai Ke Unhone Farmaya Hai Ke Jula Hai Ki Imamat Durusat Nahi.

Iske Jawab Me Yahi Kahna Kafi Hai. "Jhootho Par ALLAH Ki Laanat".

Iske Bar Khilaaf Hazrat Quds Sira Apni Namaz E Janaza Ke Bare Me Yeh Wasiyat Farmai Ke Al Mant Ul Matar Me Ahadees Me Warid Namaz E Janaza Ki Tamaam Duyain Darj Hai.

Agar Hamid Raza Ko Wo Tamaam Duayein Yaad Ho To, Wo Meri Namaz E Janaza Padaye.

Warna Amjad Ali Sahab Padaye.

Yani Hafiz E Millat Quds Sira Ke Ustaz Hazrat Sadruh Shariah Maulana Amjad Ali Sahab Quds Sira Jo Zaat Ke Ansari The Aur Ala Hazrat Quds Sira Ko Yeh Malum Bhi Tha.

Khud Yeh Khadim 11 Saal Bareli Raha Aur Ala Hazrat Ki Masjid Me Imamat Karta Raha.

Hazrat Mufti E Azam E Hind Ne Mujhe Imamat Ka Mansab Ata Farmaya, Jumuah, 5 Waqta Khud Meri Iqtada Me Hazrat Mufti E Azam Quds Sira Padte Rahe.

Wallahu Ta'la Allam.

Fatwa E Shareh Bukhari Jild 3 Safah 367

Title: Aala Hazrat Ne Sarkar Gareeb Nawaz Ke Astane Par Hazri Kyu Nahi Di ?
Content:
Aala Hazrat Quds Sira Sarkar Gareeb Nawaz Radiallahu Ta'la Anho Se Taluq Khatir Tha, Ya Nahi.

Ba Surat E Awal Baragah Khwaja Me Mausuf Ki Kabhi Hazri Kyon Nahi Hui,

Niz Sarkar Khwaja Ki Madah Sarai Ki Kisi Tasnif Na Aai Jaisa Ke Sarkar Gausiyat, Apki Tarif Wa Tausif Se Unki Tasnifaat Gunj Rahi Hai Bar Surat Daum Kyon Kya Sabab Hai ?

Jawab:

Mujjadeed E Azam Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Quds Sira Ko Jis Tarah Tamaam Aauliyah E Kiram Se Aqeedat Wa Mohabbat Thi Isi Tarah Hazrat Khwaja Gareeb Nawaz Sultan Ul Hind Radiallahu Ta'la Anho Se Bhi Thi.

Aur Al Malfuz Me Gareeb Nawaz Quds Sira Ka Zikr Bhi Pure Aqeedat Ke Sath Hai.

Hisa Saum : Safah 47 Aur Amjer Sharif Darbar Khawaja Me Hazri Bhi Di Hai.

Janaab Syed Hasan Sahab Razwi Wakil Jaura Ne Khud Mujh Se Yeh Bayan Kiya Hai.

Ala Hazrat Unhi Ke Yaha Muqim The.

Rah Gaya Ke Hazrat Khwaja Gareeb Nawaz Ka Zikr Itni Kashrat Se Nahi Jitni Kasrat Se Hazrat Gaus E Azam Radiallahu Ta'la Anho Ka Hai.

Iska Jawab Yeh Hai Ke Yeh Nisbat Ke Galba Ka Asar Hai.


Chunke Aala Hazrat Par Nisbat E Qadriya Hawi Thi.

Isliye Uske Jalwe Jagah Jagah Nazar Ate Hai Aur Nisbat Ka Galba Humare Aur Apke Bas Ki Baat Nahi.

Batni Taur Par Jo Buzurg Jiska Mazhar Nazar Ho Jaye Bas Wo Uska Ho Gaya.

Qaida Yahi Hai Jisko Naimatein Jaha Se Milti Hai. Wo Ussi Ke Goon Gata Hai.

Khud Chishti Hazrat Ka Haal Yeh Hai Ke Wo Khud Sarkar Gaus E Azam Radiallahu Ta'ala Anho Ka Zikr Boht Halke Andaz Me Karte Hai.

Behar Haal Yeh Iftara Hai Ke Aala Hazrat Gareeb Nawaz Se Lagao Nahi Tha Aur Waha Hazri Nahi Di.

Haan, Yeh Baat Sahi Hai Ke Jo Walihana Aqeedat Sarkar Gaus E Azam Radiallahu Ta'ala Anho Se Thi Wo Kisi Wali Se Nahi Thi.

Iska Sabab Nisbat Qadriya Ka Galba Hai Aur Yeh Qabil E Aitraaz Baat Nahi.

Naqsbandi Hazrat Khwaja Khawzgaan Khwaja Bahdudeen Naqbandi Quds Sira Aur Soharwari Hazrat Shaikh Hazrat Shaikh Shabdudeen Sarwar Quds Sira Ka Zikr Digar Auliyah E Kiram Se Zayda Karte Hai.

Iska Yeh Matlab Hargiz Nahi Ke Unhe Dusre Aauliyah E Kiram Se Aqeedat Nahi.

Ya Unke Dil Me Dusre Aauliyah E Kiram Ki Taraf Se Sue Aqeedat Hai.

Balke Yeh Is Batni Silsila Ki Nisbat Ka Asar Hai.

Ab Agar Koi Chistiyon Se Yeh Kahe Ke Aap Logo Ko Khwaja Naqshband Se Ya Hazrat e Shahabudeen Sauharwardi Se Qalbi Lagao Nahi.

To Wo Kya Jawab Denge Jo Jawab Unka Hoga Wahi Jawab Humhara Hoga.

Is Qism Ki Mehmal Baatein Aajkal Ke Be Parde Likhe Ilm Zahir Wa Ilm Batini Se Kore Bataur Paisha Peeri Muridi Karne Wale Kiya Karte Hai.

Agar Ilm Batin Hota To Wo Is Qism Ki Baatein Zubaan Par Nahi Laate.

Fatwa E Sharah Bukhari Jild 3 Safah 462
