Title: Taboot E Sakina Kya Hai Aur Uski Haqeeqat Kya Hai
Content:
Yeh Shamshad (Ek Lamba Khubsurat Darkhat) Ki Lakdi Ka Sanduq Tha. Jo Hazrat Adam Allaihissallam Par Nazil Huwa Tha.

Yeh Apki Akhri Zindagi Tak Apke Pass Hi Raha.

Phir Bataur E Mairas Ke Yake Baad Digar E Apki Aaulad Ko Milta Raha. Yaha Tak Yeh Hazrat Yaqub Allaihissallam Ko Mila.

Aapke Baad Aapki Aaulad Bani Israel Ke Qabze Me Raha Aur Hazrat Musa Allaihissallam Ko Mil Gaya. To Aap Usme Taurait Sharif Aur Apna Khaas Khaas Samaan Rakhne Lage.

Yeh Bada Hi Muqdas Aur Ba Barkat Sanduq Tha. Bani Israel Jab Kuffar Se Jihaad Karte The Aur Bani Israel Jab Kuffar Ke Lashkaro Ki Kashrat Aur Unki Shaukat Dekh Kar Saham Jate Aur Unke Sino Me Dil Dhadkane Lagte.

To Wo Is Sanduq Ko Apne Aage Rakh Lete The. To Us Sanduq Se Aisi Rehmato Aur Barkato Ka Zahoor Hota Ke Mujahideen Ke Dilo Me Sukun Wa Itminaan Ka Samaan Paida Ho Jata Tha.

Aur Mujahideen Ke Sino Me Larzate Hue Dil Pathhar Ki Chatano Se Zyada Mazbut Ho Jate The.

Aur Jis Qadr Sanduq Aage Badta Tha Asmaan Se نَصْرٌ مِّنَ اللہِ وَفَتْحٌ قَرِیْبٌ Ki Basharat E Uzma Nazil Huwa Karti Aur Fatah Mubin Hasil Ho Jaya Karti Thi.

Aur Jab Bani Israel Me Koi Ikhtlaaf Paida Hota Tha.

To Log Usi Sanduq Se Faisala Karate The Aur Us Sanduq Se Faisla Ki Awaz Aur Fatah Ki Basharat Suni Jati Thi.

Bani Israel Us Sanduq Ko Apne Aage Rakh Kar Aur Usko Wasila Bana Kar Duayein Mangte The.

To Unki Dua E Maqbul Hoti Thi Aur Balao Musibatein Aur Aafatein Tal Jaya Karti Thi.

Al Garaz Yeh Sanduq Bani Israel Ke Liye Taboot E Sakina Aur Barkat Wa Rehmat Ka Khazana Tha Aur Nusrat Khudawandi Ke Nuzul Ka Nihayat Muqdas Aur Behtarin Zariyah Tha.

Magar Jab Bani Israel Tarah Tarah Ke Gunaho Me Malus Ho Gaye. Yeh Aur Logo Me Muaasi Wa Tagyaan Aur Sarkashi Wa Asiyaan Ka Daur Daura Ho Gaya.

To Unki Bad'Amaliyon Ki Nahusat Se Unpar Khuda Ka Yeh Gazab Nazil Ho Gaya Ke Qaum Amalqa Ke Kuffar Ne Ek Lashkar Jaraar Ke Saat Un Logo Par Hamla Kar Diya Aur Un Kafiro Ne Bani Israel Ka Qatal Kaam Kar Ke Unki Basiton Wa Taraaj Kar Dala.

Imarato Ko Tod Phord Kar Saare Shehar Ko Tahas Nahas Kar Dala.

Us Mubarak Sanduq Ko Bhi Uthha Kar Le Gaye Aur Muqdas Tabruk Ko Najasato Ke Kude Khana Me Phenk Diya.

Lekin Us Be Adabi Ka Qaum E Amalqa Par Yeh Wabaal Pada Ke Log Tarah Tarah Ki Bimariyon Aur Balao Ke Hujoom Me Jinjod Diye Gaye.

Chunache Qaum Amalqa Ke 5 Shehar Bilkul Barbad Aur Wiraan Ho Gaye.

Yaha Tak Ke Un Kafiro Ko Yaqin Ho Gaya Ke Yeh Sanduq Ki Beadbi Ka Ajaab Hum Par Pad Gaya Hai.

To Un Kafiro Ki Aankhein Khul Gayi.

Chunache Un Logo Ne Us Muqdas Sanduq Ko Ek Bailgadi Par Laad Kar Bailo Ko Bani Israel Ki Bastiyon Ki Taraf Haank Diya.

Phir Allah Ta'la Ne Char Farishto Ko Muqrar Farma Diya Jo Us Mubarak Sanduq Ko Bani Israel Ke Nabi Hazrat Shamul Allaihissallam Ki Khidmat Me Laaye.

Is Tarah Phir Bani Israel Ki Khoyi Hui Naimat Dubara Unko Mil Gayi Aur Yeh Sanduq Thik Us Waqt Hazrat Shamul Allaihissallam Ke Pass Pohucha.

Jab Ke Hazrat Shamul Allaihissallam Ne Taalut Ko Badhshah Bana Diya Tha Aur Bani Israel Taalut Ki Badhshahi Taslim Karne Par Tayaar Nahi Thi.

Aur Yahi Shart Thhehari Ke Muqdas Sanduq Aa Jaye, To Hum Taalut Ki Badhshahi Taslim Kar Lege.

Chunache Sanduq Aa Gaya Aur Bani Israel Taalut Ki Badhshahi Par Razamand Ho Gaye.

Ruh Ul Bayaan Jild 2 Safah 386 Wa Sawi Jild 1 Safah 201

Ajaib Ul Quraan Safah 38

Title: Taboot E Sakina Me Kya Tha ?
Content:
Is Muqdas Sanduq Me Hazrat Musa Allaihissallam Ka Asa Aur Unki Muqdas Jutiyah Aur Hazrat Harun Allaihissallam Ka Imama, Hazrat Sulemaan Allaihissallam Ki Anguthi, Taurait Ki Takhtiyon Ke Chand Tukde, Kuch Man Wa Salwa, Iske Ilawa Hazrat Ambiyah E Kiram Allaihissallam Ki Surato Ke Huliye Wagera Sab Samaan The.

Tafsir Ruh Ul Bayan

Quran Majeed Me Khuda Wand Qudus Ne Surah Baqra Me Is Muqdas Sanduq Ka Tazkira Farmate Hue Irshad Farmaya :

وَقَالَ لَہُمْ نَبِیُّہُمْ اِنَّ اٰیَۃَ مُلْکِہٖۤ اَنۡ یَّاۡتِیَکُمُ التَّابُوۡتُ فِیۡہِ سَکِیۡنَۃٌ مِّنۡ رَّبِّکُمْ وَبَقِیَّۃٌ مِّمَّا تَرَکَ اٰلُ مُوۡسٰی وَاٰلُ ہٰرُوۡنَ تَحْمِلُہُ الْمَلٰٓئِکَۃُ ؕ اِنَّ فِیۡ ذٰلِکَ لَاٰیَۃً لَّکُمْ اِنۡ کُنۡتُمۡ مُّؤْمِنِیۡنَ ﴿248﴾٪

Tarjumah E Kanzul Iman 

Aur Unse Ke Nabi Ne Farmaya Uski Badshahi Ki Nishani Yeh Hai Ke Aye Tumhare Pass Taboot Jisme Tumhare Rab Ki Taraf Se Dilo Ka Chain Hai Aur Kuch Bachi Hui Chizein Hai Muazaz Musa Aur Muazaz Haroon Ki Turka Ke, Uthhate Laye Gaye Use Farishtein Beshak Usme Badi Nishani Hai Tumhare Liye Agar Imaan Rakhte Hon.

(Parah 2 Surah Baqra Ayat 248)

Dars E Hidayat: Bani Israil Ke Sanduq Ke Is Waqiah Se Chand Masail Wa Fawaid Par Roshni Padti Hai Jo Yaad Rakhne Ke Qabil Hai:

1) Malum Huwa Ke Buzurago Ke Tabarrukaat Ki Khuda Wand Qudus Ke Darbaar Me Badi Izzat Wa Azmat Hai.

Aur Unke Zariya E Makhluq Khuda Ko Bade Bade Fayuz Wa Barkaat Hasil Hote Hai.

Dekh Lo ! Is Sanduq Me Hazrat Musa Allaihissallam Ki Jutiyah, Apka Asa Aur Hazrat Harun Allahissallam Ki Padgi Thi, To ALLAH Ta'la Ki Bargah Me Yeh Sanduq Is Qadr Maqbul Aur Mukram Wa Muazam Ho Gaya Ke Farishto Ne Usko Apne Noorani Kandho Par Uthha Kar Hazrat Shamul Allaihissallam Ke Darbar E Nabuwat Me Pohchaya Aur Khuda Wand Quds Ne Quran Majeed Me Is Baat Ki Shahadat Di Ke فِیْہِ سَکِّیْنَۃٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّکُمْ

Yani Is Sanduq Me Tumhare Rab Ki Taraf Se Sakina Yani Momino Ke Qulub Ka Itminaan Aur Unki Ruho Ki Taskin Ka Saman Tha.

Matlab Yeh Ke Is Par Rehmat E Ilahi Ke Anwar Wa Barkaat Ka Nuzul Aur Uspar Rehmato Ki Barish Huwa Karti Thi.

To Malum Huwa Ke Buzurgo Ke Tabarrukaat Jaha Aur Jis Jagah Bhi Hoge Zaroor Un Par Rehmat Khudawandi Ka Nuzul Hoga.

Aur Us Par Nazil Hone Wali Rehmato Aur Barkato Se Mominin Ko Sukun E Qalb Aur Itminaan E Ruh Ke Fayuz Wa Barkaat Milte Rahege.

2) Jis Sanduq Me ALLAH Walo Ke Libaas Wa Asa Aur Jutiya Ho Jab Us Sanduq Aur Itminaan Nahi Utarega ?

Har Aqil Insan Jisko Khuda Wand Alam Ne Basaarat Ke Sath Imaani Basirat Bhi Ata Farmai Hai.

Wo Zaroor Is Baat Par Imaan Layega Ke Jab Buzurago Ke Libaas Aur Unki Jutiyon Par Sakina Rehmat Ka Nuzul Hota Hai.

To Un Buzurago Ki Qabro Par Bhi Rehmat E Khudawandi Ka Khazina Zaroor Nazil Hoga.

Aur Jab Buzurago Ki Qabro Par Rehmato Ki Barish Hoti Hai.

To Jo Musalmaan Un Muqdas Qabro Ke Pass Hazir Hoga Zaroor Us Par Bhi Barish E Anwaar Rehmat Ke Chand Qatraat Baras Hi Jayenge.

Kyun Ke Jo Musladhar Barish Me Khada Hoga Zaror Uska Kapda Aur Badan Bhigega, Jo Dariya Me Gauta Lagayega Zaroor Uska Badan Paani Se Tar Hoga, Jo Atar Ki Dukaan Par Baithega Zaroor Us Ko Khushbuh Nasib Hogi.

To Sabit Ho Gaya Ke Jo Buzurago Ki Qabro Par Hazri Dege Zaroor Wo Fayuz Wa Barkaat Ki Daulat Se Malamaal Hoge.

Aur Zaroor Un Par Khuda Ki Rehmato Ka Nuzul Hoga. Jisse Un Ke Musaaib Wa Aalam Dur Hoge Aur Deen Wa Duniya Ke Fawaid Wa Munafah Hasil Hoge.

3) Yeh Bhi Malum Huwa Ke Jo Log Buzurago Ke Tabarrukaat Ya Unki Qabro Ki Ahanat Wa Beadabi Karege Zaroor Qahar Wa Qahaar Aur Gazab E Jabaar Me Girftaar Hoge.

Kyon Ke Qaum Amalaqa Jinhone Is Sanduq Ki Beadabi Ki Thi Un Par Aisa Qahar E Ilahi Ka Pahad Toota Ke Wo Balao Ke Hujum Se Bilbala Uthhe Aur Kafir Hote Hue Unhone Is Baat Ko Maan Liya Ke Hum Par Balao Aur Wabao Ka Hamla Isi Sanduq Ki Beadabi Ki Wajah Se Huwa Hai.

Chunache Isiliye Un Logo Ne Is Muqdas Sanduq Ko Bail Gardi Par Laad Kar Bani Israil Ki Basti Me Bhej Diya Take Wo Log Gazab E Ilahi Ki Balao Ke Panja Qahar Se Najaat Paale.

4) Jab Is Sanduq Ki Barkat Se Bani Israil Ko Jihaad Me Fatah Milti Thi To Zaroor Buzurago Ki Qabro Se Bhi Mominin Ki Mushkilaat Dafah Hogi Aur Muradein Puri Hogi Kyu Ke Zahir Hai Ke Buzurago Ke Libaas Se Kahi Zayda Asar Rehmat E Buzurago Ke Badan Me Hoga.

5) Is Waqiah Se Yeh Bhi Malum Huwa Ke Jo Qaum Sarkashi Aur Asaiyan Ke Tufaan Me Pad Kar ALLAH Wa Rasool (عزوجل و صلی اللہ تعالیٰ علیہ وسلم) Ki Nafarman Ho Jati Hai, Us Qaum Ki Naimatein Chhin Li Jati Hai.

Chunache Apne Padh Liya Ke Jab Bani Israil Sarkash Ho Kar Khuda Ke Nafarmaan Ho Gaye Aur Qism Qism Ki Badkariyon Me Padh Kar Gunaho Ka Bhoot Unke Saro Par Afriyat Ban Kar Sawaar Ho Gaya.

To Un Ke Jurmo Ki Nahusat Ne Unhe Yeh Bura Din Dikhaya Ke Sanduq Sakina Unke Pass Se Qaum Amalqa Ke Kuffar Uthha Le Gaye Aur Bani Israil Kai Barso Tak Is Naimat E Uzma Se Mehroom Ho Gaye.

Ajaibul Quraan Safah 40

Title: Qurbani Karne Ki Kya Fazilat Hai?
Content:
Huzur sallallahu Alahih waalihi wasallam farmate hai ke

Qurbani karnewale ko Qurbani ke Jaanwar ke har baal ke badle me ek neki milti hai.

Jisne khush dili se sawab paane ke liye Qurbani ki to wo jahannam ki aag se hijaab (parda/rukaawat ) ho jayegi.

Aey Fatema
Apni Qurbani ke paas Maujood Raho kyun ke uske khoon ka pehla Qatra girega to Tumhare sare gunah maaf kar diye jayenge.

Jisko bhi Qurbani karne ki wus-at (taaqat) ho or fir bhi wo Qurbani na kare to hamari Eidgaah ke Qarib na aaye.

QARZ LE KAR KARE-AGAR WAAJIB HAI TO

Agar kisi par Qurbani Wajib hai Aur us Waqt uske paas Rupaye nahi to udhaar lekar, ya koi chiz bech karke Qurbani kare.

(Fatawa-E-Amjadiya-Jild,3, Safa,315)

Hazrate Ahmed bin Ishaaq Rehmatullah alahi kehte hain ke, Mera ek gharib bhai tha, Gharib tha fir bhi Allah ki Raza ke liye Qurbani karta tha.

Uske marne ke baad maine khwaab dekha ke qayamat aa gayi or nafsa nafsi ka maahol hai.

Maine dekha ke Mera bhai Ek ghode par sawaar hai or dusre ghode bhi uske saath hai.

Maine poocha ke Allah ki baargah me tera kya maamla raha to wo bola ke

Ek budhiya ko ek dirham dene ki wajah bakhsh diya.

To maine poocha ke ye sab ghode ?

To kehne laga ke

Ye sab meri Qurbaniyan hai or jis par mein baitha hu ye meri pehli Qurbani hai.

To maine poocha ke ab kidhar jaa rahe ho.

To bola ke, JANNAT ki taraf.


Aur meri nazron se gayab ho gaya.

Ye to nafli Qurbani ka ajar o sawab hai Wajib ka aur zyada sawab hoga Aur Ek dusra pehlu ye bhi pata chala ki Jo log Waajib hone ke baad bhi Qurbani nahi karte unke liye bhi is mein ibrat O raghbat hai, Ke Wo kitni badi saadat se mehroom ho rahe hain or gunahgaar bhi ho rahe hain.

DURRATUN NAASIHIIN

THE AHLE BAYT (Part 1)

The Ahle Bayt (Noble Family) of the of the Beloved Nabi Sall Allahu alaihi wa Sallam are the leaders of the Ahle Sunnat. One who does not love them is a contemptible and cursed Khariji.

Ummul Momineen Khadijatul Kubra, Ummul Momineen A’isha Siddiqa Radi Allahu anha and Hazrat Sayyidatuna Faatima Radi Allahu anha are undoubtedly Jannatis and they have been blessed with superior excellence over all the other Beloved Daughters and Holy Wives Radi Allahu ta aala anhuna of the Nabi Kareem Sall Allahu alaihi wa sallam.

The Holy Qur’an bears testimony to their chastity and sacredness.

MASLAK E AALA HAZRAT
ZINDA BAAD!

THE AHLE BAYT (Part 2)

The Ahle Bayt (Noble Family) of Sayyiduna Rasoolullah Sall Allahu alaihi wa Sallam have indeed been blessed with the greatest excellence compared to any other family in this world.

They have been blessed with an honour that no other family can ever attain. Subhaan'Allah! They are the Noble Family of Sayyidul Ambia, Hazrat Muhammadur Rasoolullah Sall Allahu alaihi wa Sallam, The Greatest Nabi whose companions are the greatest of all Companions, whose Noble Family is the most honoured amongst all families and whose Ummah is the greatest Ummah!!!

In many of my past posts I have mentioned this one very important point and I will repeat it here as well, that 'No true claimant of Hubb e Ahle Bayt (love for Ahle Bayt) will ever slander any of the Sahaba of Sayyiduna Rasoolullah Sall Allahu alaihi wa Sallam'. Anyone or any group or any movement that shows the slightest disrespect to any Sahabi of Rasoolullah Sall Allahu alaihi wa Sallam is a 'False Claimant' in his love for the Ahle Bayt.

Also know that we accept that Hazrat Imam Hasan and Imam Husain Radi Allahu Ta'aala Anhuma are indeed from amongst the exalted martyrs of Islam. Anyone who denies their martyrdom is a misguided, irreligious and deprived individual. We should stay away from such deviants and from all other deviants if we wish to keep our Imaan safe.

Title: WHO IS AALA HAZRAT?
Content:
Allah's Name (we) begin with, The Compassionate Most Merciful

As Salaatu Was Salaamu Alaika Ya Rasool'Allah
صلٰى الله عليه و سلم

WHO IS AALA HAZRAT? (Part 1)

Today we commence a new series in Food For Thought, under the title, Who is Aala Hazrat?

This series will focus on the Blessed life and works of Imam Ahle Sunnat Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Qadiri Barkati radi Allahu, as we go towards the month of Safar which marks his blessed Urs.

I feel it is time to Re-Introduce Aala Hazrat to the people so that they may better understand the excellence of this Wali e Kaamil and Mujad'did, and the importance of following his way.

The personality of Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radi Allahu anhu shines on this earth just as the sun shines with all its splendour over the Horizon. When one closely examines the sun, it seems as if it only possesses a single colour, but if we examine it very closely, we realise that it gives out rays of light which show the colours of a rainbow or spectrum.

Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Khan can be understood in a very similar manner.

Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radi Allahu Anhu was in reality, very much like the sun.

He was a single person spreading his rays of knowledge and spiritualism throughout the earth, by the Grace of Allah and the Blessings of Nabi Kareem Sallallahu alaihi wasallam.

In this present time, Imam Ahmed Raza Khan is not only the name of one individual, but is the name which demonstrates.

‘The Movement of the Love of the Beloved Rasool Sallallahu alaihi wasallam'

In this present time, Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radi Allahu Anhu is regarded as one of the major ‘Academic and Spiritual Power Houses’ of the Muslim World.

His personality is one of the Central points of attaining spiritual and academic knowledge.

He is a personality who was proficient in more than fifty different branches of learning.

In his 65 years of physical life, he wrote approximately 1200 books and treatises.

Huzoor Muhadith e Azam Hind Alaihir Rahma once said,

“If all the past books of Fiqh had to be destroyed, then the books of Imam Ahmed Raza would be sufficient up to Qiyaamah.”

Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radi Allahu anhu was not just a Hafiz ul Qur’an, a Qaari, an Aalim, a Mufti, a Mufas'sir and a Shaykhul Hadith, but he was undoubtedly the 'Imam Abu Hanifa' of his Era.

Many years have passed since the departure of Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radi Allahu anhu from this physical world, but his blessed name and works still remain world renowned.

The works of Aala Hazrat Radi Allahu anhu serve as a source of inspiration to the true seekers of knowledge even today.

Many have gone to great lengths to try and degrade the rank of Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radi Allahu anhu but they could not achieve any success in this.

They have been destroyed and their false missions have been destroyed with them.

The mission of Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radi Allahu Anhu was to inculcate in the hearts of the Believers the True and Sincere Love for Allah and His Beloved Rasool Sallallahu alaihi wasallam and this mission is now becoming even brighter and more successful.

The reason for this success is that the blessed hands which are guiding the mission of Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radi Allahu anhu are none other than the Sacred Hands of the Beloved Rasool Sallallahu alaihi wasallam and the blessed hands of Sarkaar e Baghdad Ghauth e Azam Sayyiduna Shaykh Abdul Qaadir Jilani Baghdadi Radi Allahu Anhu.

The Mujad'did of the Century, The Imam of the Ahle Sunnah, The True Aashiq e Rasool Sallallahu alaihi wasallam, Our Imam and Our Saviour in this Era.

Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radi Allahu anhu was born on a Monday, the 10th of Shawaal 1272 A.H. (14th June 1856), at the time of Zuhr Salaah in a place called Jasoli, in the city of Bareilly Shareef, which is situated in the Northern Province (Uttar Pradesh) of India.

Just a few days before the birth of Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radi Allahu anhu, his father, Allama Maulana Naqi Ali Khan radi Allahu anhu who was also a Wali Allah and Blessed Personality of his time, had a wonderful dream.

He immediately disclosed this dream to his father, Allama Maulana Raza Ali Khan Radi Allahu anhu, who interpreted the dream in the following words:

“This is a sign that you are to be the father of a child, a boy, who will grow up to be pious and knowledgeable. His name will gain prominence from East to West."

This was the blessed news which was given to Allama Maulana Naqi Ali Khan Radi Allahu anhu, on the birth of none other than the 'Emerald from amongst the Treasures of Almighty Allah', the 'sweet-scented rose from the fragrant garden of the Beloved Rasool Sallallahu alaihi wasallam', Aala Hazrat Ash Shah Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Radi Allahu anhu.



From Post 5 it's missing

WHO IS AALA HAZRAT?
(Part 8)

Aala Hazrat's piety and spiritual excellence was already very noticeable even as a child. The following incident points to his deep pious nature and fear for Allah, during his childhood.

Fasting was not Fard (obligatory) upon him because he was still a child, but on one particular day in the Holy month of Ramadaan, he intended to keep fast. It should be known that it is very difficult for a little child to keep fast in India during the summer months.

On that day, the suns heat was intense. Hazrat Allama Naqi Ali Khan Radi Allahu anhu took his young son, Aala Hazrat Radi Allahu anhu into a room where some sweets were kept. He closed the door shut and said, “There, You may eat the sweets” Aala Hazrat Radi Allahu anhu replied that he was fasting.

His father then said, “The fasting of children is always like this. The door is closed and no one is looking. Now you may eat.” On hearing this, the young Aala Hazrat Radi Allahu anhu respectfully said,

“The One for Whom I am fasting, is Seeing me (i.e. Allah is All Seeing)”.

On hearing these words from a little child, tears began to flow from the eyes of Hazrat Allama Naqi Ali Khan Radi Allahu anhu. In a state of spiritual delight, he then left the room with Aala Hazrat radi Allahu anhu.

MASLAK E AALA HAZRAT
ZINDA BAAD!

Sag e Mufti e Azam
Muhammad Afthab Cassim Qaadiri Razvi Noori

Imam Mustafa Raza Research Centre, Durban, South Africa

Allah's Name (we) begin with, The Compassionate Most Merciful

As Salaatu Was Salaamu Alaika Ya Rasool'Allah
صلٰى الله عليه و سلم

WHO IS AALA HAZRAT?
(Part 18)

After a short break in posts, due to being occupied with Akaabireen, Ulama and guests for Urs Noori Amjadi in Durban, we will in'sha Allah continue with 'Food For Thought' from today.

Aala Hazrat radi Allahu anhu learnt Arithmetic, Algebra, the twelve branches of Mathematics, Modern Astronomy, Science of Inheritance, Science of Prosody, Astrology, Science of History, Prose in Hindi, Prose is Persian, in-depth study of Arabic and in-depth study of plain Persian writing by himself.

When Aala Hazrat was questioned about his amazing capabilities in solving intricate and confusing Mathematical theories, and as to whom his mentor was, he replied,

“I did not have a teacher in this field. Whatever you see, I achieved within the four walls of my room. This is indeed through the Blessing of Sayyiduna Rasoolulah Sall Allahu alaihi wa Sallam”

The above are merely a few branches of knowledge in which Aala Hazrat reached such great heights of proficiency.

MASLAK E AALA HAZRAT
ZINDA BAAD!

Sag e Mufti e Azam
Muhammad Afthab Cassim Qaadiri Razvi Noori

Imam Mustafa Raza Research Centre, Durban, South Africa

Title: Huzoor Nabi E Kareem Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ka Namaz e Janaza Kisne Padhaya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Janaza e Aqdas Par Namaz Ke Baab Me Ulama Mukhtalif Hain.

Kuch Logo Ke Nazdeek Ye Namaz Ma'roof Na Hui. Balke Log Giroh Dar Giroh Hazir Aate Aur Salaat O Salam Arz Karte.

Aur Bahot Ulama Yahi Namaz E Ma'roof Maante Hain Ke Sayyedna Siddiq e Akbar رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہ Taskeen E Fitan O Intezam E Ummat Me Mashgool, Jab Tak Unke Dast E Haq Parast Par Bai't Na Hui Thi, Log Fauj Dar Fauj Aate Aur Janaza E Anwar Par Namaz Parhte Jaate.

Jab Bai't Ho Chuki Aur Hazrat Abu Bakr E Siddiq Wali E Shara'i Hue, To Unho Ne Janaza e Muqaddas Par Namaz Parhi.

Phir Kisi Ne Na Parhi. Isliye Ke Wali Ke Namaz Parh Lene Ke Baad, Phir Namaz e Janaza Ke I'aada Ka Ikhtiyar Nahi.

Hazrat Abdullah Bin Mas'ood رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہ Se Riwaayat Hai Ke Rasoolullah ﷺ Ne Farmaya:

"Jab Mere Gusl O Kafan Se Faarig Ho Mujhe Na'sh E Mubarak Par Rakh Kar Baaher Chale Jaao. Sab Se Pehle Jibr'eel Mujh Par Salaat Karenge, Phir Mikail Phir Israafil, Phir Malak Ul Maut Apne Saare Lashkaro Ke Sath, Phir Giroh Giroh Mere Paas Haazir Ho Kar Mujh Par Durood O Salam Arz Karte Jaao".

Baihaqi, Tibraani Mo'jam e Ausat Ba Hawaala Fatawa Razavia Jild 4 Safah 54

✉POST : 01?

♡•♡??♡•♡??♡•♡??♡•♡

Pehly yeh jaan lain k Ahle-sunnat ke nazdeek Eid milaad un Nabi صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم manana koi farz ya wajib nahi, yeh ek MUSTAHAB amal hai,
jo kary usko sawab milega aur jo nahi kare us per koi gunaah nahi.

Ab baat yeh aati hai k kya ISLAM humain ijazat deita hai Eid milaad-un-nabi manany ki ya nahi ?
eska jawab yeh hai ke Quran-o-hadees ki roshni main Eid-Milaad Un nabi
صلی اللہ علیہ و سلَّم
manana bilkul jaiz hai.
koi bhi dosry maslak ka aalim aaj tak sharai daleel milaad k HARAM ya najaiz hony ki
معاذ الله
na aaj tak laa saka hai na la saky ga.
Aage aane wale posts me hum janenge ki kis tarha Eid-e-Milad manana jaiz hai Quran-o- Hadees ki Roshni me !

12vi Sharif ki Nisbat se ان شاءالله عزوجل ye 12 Topics jo neeche diye gaye hai aur mazeed kuch points bhi cover karne ki koshish ki jayengi.
1)Aaqa-e-Kareem
صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم
ki wiladat kab hui ?

2)Quran kya farmata hai ?

3)Aap صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم ne kya aapna Milaad manaya ?
Aur
Aapne صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم aapne milaad ke mutallik kya farmaya ?

4)Kya kissi Sahabi ne Eid-Milaad Manayi hai ?

5)Abu Lahab ne bhi Milaad manaya

6)Juloos Nikalna kiski Sunnat ?

7)Jhande Lehrana kiski Sunnat ?

8)Naat Sharif Padhna kiski Sunnat ?

9)Milaad par kharch karna Kaisa ?

10)Shaitan ki Ruswai

11)Shab-e-Qadr se bhi Afzal raat

12)- Kis-kis AIMAH WA MUHADISEEN "MEELAD-UN-NABI صلی اللہُ علیہِ و آلہِ وسلمِ " ko jaiz kaha hai ?

Aur kuch jahilana aitraaz Ke jawaabat etc bhi dene ki koshish ki jayegi...

Dua farmayein ki Jis kaam ki niyaat ki gayi hai woh mukammal ho sake !

Quran kya Farmata hai ?

?Apne Rab Ki Nemato Ka Khoob Khoob Charcha Karo”
(Surah Duha Ayat 11)

?Is Ayat Me Allah Ta'ala Ne Humein Apni Nemato Ka Charcha karne Ka Hukm Diya. Har Momin Ye Janta Hai Ki Allah Ki Sabse Badi Aur Azeem Nemat Hamare Liye Uske Rasool صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم Hai !

?Is Baat Ko Samjhane K Liye Quran Ki Ek Ayat Pesh e khidmat hai......

?Beshak Allah ka bada ehsan hua musalmano par ki unme unhi me se ek Rasool صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم bheja jo unpar uski aayatein padhta hai aur unhe paak karta hai.....”
(Sureh Al-Imran,Ayat 164)

?Mere Pyare Islami Bhaiyo Aap Sara Quran Pad Lijiye Kisi Bhi Jagah Allah Ne Ye Nahi Kaha K Humne Tumhe Ye Nemat Dekar Tumpar Ehsan Kiya hai Siwae Apne Mehboob Nabiصلی اللہ علیہ وسلم
ke.
Isse Malum Hua K Allah Ki
Sabse Badi Nemat Hamare Liye Uske Nabi صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم Hai…

?Toh kya pehli Ayat me Allah ne jo hukm diya us par amal karte hue hum hamare Pyaare Pyaare Aaqa صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم Ki wiladat na manayein ?

?Hadees no.1
Hazrat Abu Qatada رضی الله عنہ Se Riwayat Hai,
Rasool-E-Karim صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم
Se Peer Ka Roza Rakhne
Ke Bare Me Sawal Kiya Gaya To Aap صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم Ne Farmaya ki,
"Isi Din Meri Wiladat Hui Aur Isi Din Mujh par Quran Nazil Hua"

?(Sahih muslim Jild 2.hadith no 819 .page1162)

?(nasai al sunane kubra Jild 2 hadith 146,page 2777)

?Hadees no.2
"Huzoor صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم Ke Zamane Me Masjid-E-Nabwi
Me Milaad Huyi Isme Khud
Aaqa-e-Kareem صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم
ne Apni Wiladat Ke Fazail Bayan kiye."
?(Tirmizi Sharif, Jild 2 Safa 201)

?Hadees no.3
"Khud Nabi-e-Kareem صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم Ne Apne Milaad Par ALLAH عزوجل Ka Shukra Bajaa Lane Ki talkin Farmayi Aur Targib Di"

Hadees taweel (badi) hai
Poori Tafseel Neeche diye gayi hadeeson ki kitabon main check ki jaa sakti hai
?[ Muslim Sharif, Jild - 2, Safa - 819 ]

?[ Nisaai Sharif, Jild - 2, Safa - 147 ]

?Aap صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم ki wiladat ko Eid kehna kaisa ?

?Aaqa-e-Kareem صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم ne farmaya,

?"Juma’a ka din sab dino ka sardar hai,
ALLAH ke nazdik sabse bada hai aur wo ALLAH ke nazdik "Eid-ul Azha" aur "Eid-ul Fitr" se bada hai.

?ALLAH ne isme Hazrate
ADAM (عليه السلام) ko paida kiya, Isme Zameen par unhe utara Aur Isme Unhe wafat di."

?[Sunan Ibne Majah, Jild 2, Page No. 8,Hadith No. 1084]

?Is Hadees me Teen khaslate Hazrate Adam (عليه السلام) ke liye bayan ki gayi jisme aap ki wafat-e-Zahiri ka bhi zikr hai,

?to pata chala ki ek nabi ki paidaish unka zameen par utarna aur unki wafat ke din
ke bawajud bhi Mo’mino ke liye ALLAH ne use Eid bana diya....
Aur toh aur woh din Eid-ul-Azha aur Eid ul fitr se bhi afzal kar diya.

?Mairaj ki raat AAQA-e-kareem صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم
ne tamam Anbiya ki imamat ki thi"

?{sanan nisai, V:1, Page:221}

?Jaisa ki hadees se pata chalta hai ki hamare Sarkar
صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم
tamam ambiya ke sardar aur Imaam hain....

?unki tashrif aavari par hum us din ko kyun Eid na kahe,

?balke hum tou use Eidon ki Eid
kahenge ki unki tashrif aavri ki wajah se hi tou hume baki Eid mili aur har hafte me ek eid karke pure saal me 52 Eidon (juma) ka tohfa mila woh isi "Rehmatallil Aalamin" ki tashrif aavari se mila hai tou hum kyun us din khushi na kare ?

⏩ Juloos Nikalna kiski Sunnat ?

?Aaye Dekhte Hai Milad Un Nabi صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم Ke Mauke Par nikale Jane Wale Juloos ke Mustahab Amal Hadith Ki Roshni Me.

?Pehle hum kuch point note karlete hain ki juloos me hota kya hain.

1)-Naat padhi jaati hai jis me Aaqa-e-Karim صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم
ki Shaan aur Azmat ka bayan kiya jaata hai.

2)-Khushi mein Jhandey lehraye jaate hain.

3)-Log ikhate jama hote hain aur Naare lagaye jaate hain.

Yeh sab points ko ab hum Hadees ki Roshni me dekhte hai.

▶Point 1-
Iska jawab aapko Eid-e-Milad Post 14 me mil jayega "Naat Sharif Padhna kiski Sunnat ?"

?(Nahi hai toh maanglein mujhse)

▶Point- 2
Iska jawab aapko Eid-e-Milad Post 13 me miljayega
"Jhande Lehrana kiski Sunnat ?"
(Nahi hai toh maanglein mujhse)

▶Point 3-Juloos nikalna logon ka jama hona...

⏩Reference no.1-

"Hum (Sahaba Ikram) Sab Apne Bachcho Samet Huzoor Ke Istiqbal Ke Liye Wida Ki Ghatiyo Tak Gaye"

Khanon(Food) Ki Lazzaten (Taste), Aur In Ki khushbuwen Hamare Liye Ghaib Nahin, Kyun Ke Yeh Aankh Se Chupe Hone Ke Baawajood, Dusre Hawaas (Naak, Zabaan) Se Mehsoos Ki Ja Sakti Hain,

❂ Ab GHAIB Hote Hain, 2 Tarah Ke..

1⃣ Woh GHAIB, Jis Par Koi Daleel Qaim Hosake, Yaani Daleel Se Maaloom Hosake..

✍ For E.g:

Jaise Jannat, Dozakh aur ALLAH TA'ALA Ki Zaat o SIFFAAT... Ke In Baaton Ka Andaza, Is DUNIYA Ki Cheezen Dekh Ke Aur QURA'ANI AAYAAT Dekh Kar Pata Chalta Hai..

2⃣ Dusra GHAIB Woh Jis Ko Kisi DALEEL Se Bhi Maaloom Na Kiya Ja Sake,

✍ FOR E.g:

QAYAMAT Ka ILM, Ke Kab Hogi?

INSAAN Kab Marega?
Aur Aurat Ke Pait Main Ladka Hai Ya Ladki, Bad Bakht (Buri) Aulaad hai, Ya Naik Bakht (Naik) Aulaad, Yeh Woh Baatein Hain, Jin Ko Daleel Se Bhi Maaloom Nahin Kiya Ja Sakta...

Isi Dusrey GHAIB (TYPE) Ko Mafateh-AL-GHAIB, Kaha Jata Hai..
Aur is Ko Parwardigar E Aalam Ne Farmaya,
فلا یظھر علی غیبہ احدا الا من ارتضی من رسول۔

?(Parah#29, Surah#72, Aayat#26,27)

Iski Tafseer Bezaawi Main Isi Aayat Ke Tahet, Ghaib Ki Kuch Yun Taareef Ki Gayi Hai:

"GHAIB Se Muraad Woh Chupi Huwi CHEEZ Hai, Jis Ko Hawaas Na Pa Sake Aur Na Badahatan Usko Aqal Chahe"
?(Anwar ul Tanzeel, Jild#1, Page#28)

✯Tafseer Kabeer SURAH AL-BAQRAH Ke Shuru Main Isi Aayat Ke Ma Tehet hai:

" Aam Mufassareen Ka Qual Hai, Ke GHAIB Woh Hai, Jo Hawaas Se Chupa Ho, Phir GHAIB Ki 2⃣ Qismen Hoti Hai, Ek To Woh Jis Par Daleel Ho, Dusri Woh Jis Par Koi Daleel Nahin"
?(Tafseer-ul-Kabeer, Jild#1, Page#27, Matboo’a Dar ul Fikar, Beroot)

✍ TARJUMA: "Aur ALLAH TA'ALA Ne Aadam Ko Tamaam Ashiya (Cheezon) Ke Naam Sikhaye Phir Sab Ashya Malaika (Faishton) Par Pesh Ki"
? (PARAH#1, SURAH#2, Aayat#31)

❂ Tafseer E Madarik Main Isi Aayat Ke Ma Tehet hai.

" HAZRAT AADAM (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ko Tamaam Cheezon Ke Naam Batane Ke Maane (Meaning) Yeh Hai Ke ALLAH TA'ALA Ne Unko Woh Tamaam Jinse,n Dikha Dee,n Jis Ko Paida Kiya Hai, Aur Unko Bata Diya Ke Is Ka Naam GHODA (HORSE) Hai, Aur Iska Naam OUNT (CAMEL) Hai, Aur Is Ka Naam Falaan Hai (Waghaira waghaira),

? Ibn-E-ABBAS Se Marwi Hai Ke In Ko Har Cheez Ke Naam Sikha Diye Yahan Tak Ke Piyaali Wagera Ke Bhi"
?(Tafseer-e-Madarik, Jild#1, Page#45, Matboo’a Maktaba-tul-Quran Wal Sunnah, Peshawar)

?Tafseer E Khazin Main isi Aayat Main Yeh Hi Mazmoon (Topic) Bayaan Farmaya:

" Kaha Gaya Ke HAZRAT ADAM (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ko Tamaam Farishton Ke Naam Sikha Diye Aur Kaha Gaya Hai Ke In Ki Aulaad Ke Naam Aur Kaha Gaya Ke In Ko Tamaam Zaban'ne Sikha Di Gayi"
?(Al-Baab ut Taaweel Fi Ma’ani ut tanzeel Al Maroof, Tafseer-e-Khazin, Jild#1, Page#24, Matboo’a Dar-ul-Ma’arfah, Beroot)

?Tafseer E Kabeer Main Isi Aayat Ke Ma Tehet hai:

" HAZRAT AADAM (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ko Tamaam Cheezon Ke Ausaaf Aur Un Ke Haalaat Sikha Diye Aur Yeh Mashoor Hai Ke Murad E Makhlooq Main Se Har Hadees Ki Jins Ke Saare Naam Hain, Jo Mukhtalif Zaban'o Main Honge, Jin Ko Aulaad E Aadam Aaj Tak Bol Rahi Hai.

✍For E.g: Arbi, Farsi, Romi, Wagera (Tamam Ki Tamam Zabaane Jo Aaj Tak Is Dunya Main Istimaal Huwi Aur Hoti Rahengi)
?(Tafseer-e-Kabeer, Jild#1, Page#397, Matboo’a Dar ul Ehya, At Turas ul Arabi, Beroot)

"Kaha Gaya Ke HAZRAT AADAM (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ko Guzishta (Past) aur Aaenda (Future Ki) Tamaam Cheezon Ke Naam Bata Diye, Aur Kaha Gaya Hai Ke Apni Saari Makhlooq Ke Naam Bata Diye Aqli, Khayaali Aur Wehmi Cheezen Bhi Bata Di, Aur Un Cheezon Ki Zaat Ke Naam, Un Ke Khaasi, Unki Pehchaan, ILM Ke Qawaaid, Hunaron Ke Qaanoon, Un Ke Auzaaron (Instuments Aur Weapons) Ki Tafseel Aur Un Ke Istamaal Ke Tareeqe Ka ILM, HAZRAT AADAM (ALAYHIS SALAAM) ko ILHAAM Farmaya..

✍ Tarjuma:

?(Tafseer Mu’aalim ut Tanzeel, Jild#1, Page#61, Matbooa’ Dar ul Ma’arfah, Beroot)

✯ Ghair Muqallidon Ke Imam Muhammad Bin Ali Shokani 1250 Hijri Main likhte Hain:

✍ Tarjuma:
 “ ALLAH TA’ALA ka Farmaan "کلھا" Ki Taakeed Ka Fayda Yeh Hai Ke ALLAH TA’ALA Ne Hazrat Aadam (Alayhis Salam) Ko Tamaam Naam Sikha Diye Aur Is Se Jo Kuch Hone Waala Hai Aur Jo Kuch Ho Chuka Hai, koi Shaye Bhi Khaarij Nahin”..
?(Tafseer Fatah ul Qadeer, Jild#1, Page#24, Matboo’a Dar ul Fikar, Beroot)

?Tafseer E ROOH Ul BAYAAN Main Isi Aayat Ke Ma Tehet Hai:

" Aur HAZRAT AADAM (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ko Cheezon Ke Haalaat Sikhaye, Aur Jo Kuch In Main Deeni o Duniyavi NAFA'A Hain, Woh Bataye, Aur In Ko Farishton Ke Naam, Inki Aulaad Aur Hewaanaat aur Jamadaat Ke Naam Bataye, Aur Har Cheez Ka Banana Bataya, Tamaam Shehron (Cities), Aur Gaon (Villages) Ke Naam, Parindon (Birds) aur Daraakhton (Trees) Ke Naam, Jo Ho Chuka, Ya Jo Kuch Bhi Hoga, Un Ke Naam Aur ALLAH TA'ALA Jo Kuch QAYAAMAT Tak Paida Faramye Ga, Un Ke Naam Aur Khane Peene Ki Cheezon Ke Naam , Jannat Ki Har Ne'mat, Garz Yeh Ke Har Cheez Ke Naam Bata Diye, HADEES Main Hai Ke HAZRAT AADAM Ko 7 Lakh Zaban'ne Sikhayi Gayi..
?(Tafseer Rooh ul Bayaan, Jild#1, Page#136, Matboo’a Dar ul Ehya ut Turas al Arabi, Beroot)

?IN Tafaaseer Se Maaloom huwa Ke Maakaana Aur Maayakoon Ke Saare Uloom HAZRAT AADAM (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ko Diye Gaye, Zaban'ne (Languages), Cheezon Ke Nafa o Zarar (Profit And Loss) Banane Ke Tarike, Aalaat (Instruments) Ka Istamaal Sab Dikha Diye..

Lekin Ab Mere NABI (Sallalahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ke Uloom To Dekho, HAQ Yeh Hai Ke Yeh ILM E AADAM, Mere NABI (Sallalahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ke ILM Ke Darya Ka Ek Qatra Hai..

✍ SHEIKH IBN-E-ARBI, FATOOHAAT-E-Makiya Ke Baab Daham (10) Main farmate Hain:

✍ Tarjuma: 
“HUZOOR (Sallalahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ke Pehle KHALIFA Aur Naaib, AADAM (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Hain"

Maaloom Huwa Ke HAZRAT AADAM (ALAYHIS SALAAM) , HUZOOR (SALLALAHU ALAYHI WASALLAM) Ke Khalifa Hain.

KHALIFA Usko Kehte Hain Jo Asal Ki Gair Maujudgi Main Uski Jagah Kaam Kare,

HUZOOR (Sallalahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ki Paidaish Se Qabal Saare Ambiya HUZOOR (Sallalahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ke Naaib The..

Yeh Baat Molvi Qasim Sahab (Deoband Ke Baare Aalim) Ne Apni Kitaab Tehzeer Un Naas main Likhi Aur Maani Hai..

Jaisa Ke Hum Bayaan Kar Chuke Hain, Ke Khalifa Ke ILM Ka Yeh Haal Hai, To Aap Khud Soche ke NABI (Sallalahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ka ILM Kitna Hoga...

?Tafseer-E-Madarik
PARAH#2, Surah Al-BaQarah Mein Isi Aayat Ke Ma Tahet Hai.

" Phir HUZOOR (Sallalahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ko Bulaya Jayega, Aur Aap Ki UMMAT Ke Haalaat Puche Jaayenge, Pas Aap Unki Safai Bayaan Karenge, Aur Un Ke Aadil Hone Ki GAWAHI Denge, Lihaza HUZOOR (Sallallahu AlayhinWasallam) Tumhari Adaalat Ko Jaante Hain ".
?(Tafseer-e-Madarik, Jild#1, Page#88, Maktabah tul Quran wal sunnah, Peshawar)

❂ Is Aayat Aur In Tafaseer Mein Farmaya Gaya Ke  QAYAAMAT Ke Din Doosre AMBIYA Ki UMMATEN, BARGAH-E-ILAHI Main Arz Karengi, Ke Hamare Pass Tera Koi Peghambar Na Pahucha.

In UMMATON Ke NABI Arz Karenge Ke KHUDAYA Hum In Mein Gaye, Tere Ahkaam Pahuchchaye, Magar In Logon Ne Qabool Na Kiya. RAB TA'ALA Ka AMBIYA Ko Hukum Hoga, Ke Chuke Tum Muda'i Ho, Apna Koi GAWAH Lao, Woh Apni GAWAHI Ke Liye UMMAT-E-MUSTAFA (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ko Pesh Karenge, MUSALMAAN GAWAHI Denge, Ke KHUDAYA Tere Peghambar Sachche Hain, Inhone Tere Ikaam Pahuchaye The.

Ab Do 2⃣ Baatein Tehqeeq Ke Layak Hain,

1⃣• Yeh Ke Musalmaan Gawahi Ke Kaabil Hain Ya Nahin?

✍ Answer: 
Faasiq O Faajir Aur Kaafir Ki GAWAHI Qabool Nahin Hoti, Musalmaan Parhezgaar Ki Gawahi Qbool Hoti Hai..

2⃣• Dusri Yeh Ke Musalmaano (UMMAT-E-MOHAMMADI) Ne Apne Se Pehle Ka Zamaana Nahin Dekha Tha, Phir Gawahi Kis Tarah De Rahe Hain?

✍ Answer: 
Musalmaan Arz Karenge Ke KHUDAYA Hum Se Tere MEHBOOB MOHAMMAD (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ne Farmaya Tha, Ke Pehle Ke Peghambaron Ne TABLEEG Ki Thi, is Ko Sun Kar Hum GAWAHI De Rahe Hain, Tab HUZOOR (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ko Bulaya Jayega, Aur HUZOOR (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) 2⃣ Baaton Ki Gawahi Denge,

Ek Yeh Ke Yeh Log (MUSALMAAN), FAASIQ Ya FAAJIR Nahin, Taa Ke In Ki GAWAHI Kabool Ho, Balke MUSALMAAN Aur Parhezgaar Hain, Dusra Yeh Ke Haan Hum Ne In Se (MUSALMAAN Se) Kaha Tha Ke Pehle NABIYON Ne Apni QOUM Tak Ahkaam-E-ILAHI Puhcha Tab GAWAHI Qabool Hogi.

Is Waqiye Se Chand Baatein Saamne Aati Hain, Ek Yeh Ke HUZOOR (Sallalahu Alayhi Wasallam) QAYAAAMAT tak Ke Musalmaanon Ke Imaan, Aamaal, Roze, Namaz-o-Niyat, Se Bilkul KHABARDAAR Hain, Warna Pehli Yaani Safai Ki Gawahi Kaise Mumkin Hai, Agar Ek MUSALMAAN Ka Bhi Koi Bhi Haal Aap Se Chupa Rahe.(Yaani ILM-E-GHAIB)..

Jaise HAZRAT NOOH (Alayhis Salaam) Ne Apni Qaum Ke Aane Waali Nasal Ka Haal Maaloom Farma Liya Tha, Ke KHUDA In Ki Aulaad Bhi Agar Huwi To Woh Kaafir Hogi. Dekhiye
?(PARAH#29, SURAH#71, AAYAT#27)

Lihaaza Tu In Ko Gharq Kar De..

HAZRAT KHIZR (Alayhis Salaam) Ne Jis Bachche Ko QATAL Farmaya, Uska Aaenda Ka Haal Maaloom Kar Liya Ke Agar Zinda Raha To Sarkash Hoga...

Ab AMBIYA Ko Itna ILM Haasil Tha, To Aap Khud Sochen Ke IMMA UL AMBIYA Ke ILM Ka Kiya Maqaam Hoga, Aur Un Se Kisi Ka Haal Kaise Chhup Sakta Hai..

Ab Doosra Point Dekhe Ke Gawahi Ke Waqt, Guzishta Peghambar Aur Unki Ummat Ke Haalaat HUZOOR (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ne BA-NOOR-E-NABUWAT Dekhe The, Aur Aap Ki Gawahi Dekhi Huwi Thi, Kyun Ke Agar Sirf Suni Hoti, To Aisi Gawahi To MUSALMAAANO Ne Bhi Di Thi..

Teesra Point Yeh Ke ALLAH Jaanta Hai, Ke AMBIYA Sachche Hain, Phir Bhi Gawahiyaan De Kar Faisla Farmata Hai, Kiya ALLAH Ko Sachchai Maaloom Nahin?

BESHAK ALLAH Ko Maaloom Hai Ke AMBIYA Sachche Hai, Unhone Tableeg Ki..

Magar Phir Bhi ALLAH Ne Tehqeeq Ki Aur Gawahi li isi Tarah Agar HUZOOR (Sallallahu Layhi Wasallam) Ne Kuch Muqadmaat Main Tehqeeq Ki Ya GAWAHI li To is Se Yeh Laazim Nahin Ke NABI (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ko Maaloom Nahin, Balke Muqadmaat Ka Aqeeda Hi Yeh Hota Hai, Ke Tehqeeq Ki Jaye Aur GAWAHI Li Jaye..

3. Muhaddis Imam Ibne Jawzi (born in 510hijri) ne Jashne Milad un Nabi صلی اللہُ علیہِ و آلہِ وسلمِ manaane ko jaiz kaha - kitab - Ibne Jawzi, Al Milad un Nabi.

❂ Aayat#4:

من ذا الذی یشفع عندہ الا باذنہ یعلم ما بین ایدیھم وما خلفھم۔

✍ Tarjuma:
 “Woh Kaun Hai Jo Us Ke Yahaan Sha’fa’at Kare Baghair Us Ke Hukm Ke, Jaanta Hai Jo Kuch Un Ke Aagey Hai, Aur Jo Kuch Un Ke peechey Hai”
?(Surah Al-Baqarah, Parah#3, Aayat#255)

?Tafseer-e-Nishapuri Mein isi Aayat Ke Ma-Tehet hai..

✍ Tarjuma: 
“Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Makhlooq Ke Pehle Ke Awwal Maamlat Bhi Jaante Hain Aur Jo Makhlooq Ke Baad-e-Qayaamat Ke Ahwaal Hain Who Bhi Jaante Hain”..

?Rooh-ul-Bayaan Mein isi Aayat Ke Ma-Tehet hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
 “Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Makhlooq Ke Pehle Ke Halaat Jaante Hain, ALLAH TA’ALA Ke Makhlooq Ko Paida Karne Ke Pehle Ke Waqiyaat Aur Un Ke Peechey Ke Halaat Bhi Jaante Hain, Qayaamat k Ahwaal Makhlooq Ki Ghabrahat Aur RAB TA’ALA Ke Ghazab Waghairah”..
?(Tafseer-e-Rooh ul Bayaan, Jild#1, Page#43, Matboo’a Maktabah Islamiyah, Quetta)

Is Aayat Aur In Tafaseer Se Maloom Huwa Ke Ayat ul Kursi Mein من ذالزی  Se Le Kar الا بما شآء Tak 3 Sifaat Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Bayaan Huwi.

Baqi Awwal Wa Aakhir Main sifaat e Ilaahiya Hain.

❂ Aayat#14:

وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّمَا كُنَّا نَخُوضُ وَنَلۡعَبُۚ قُلۡ أَبِٱللَّهِ وَءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَرَسُولِهِۦ كُنتُمۡ تَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

" Aur Aey MEHBOOB Agar Tum In Se Puchoge, To Kahenge Ke Hum To Yu Hi Hansi Khel Mein The".
?(PARAH#10, SURAH#9, AAYAT#65)

?Tafseer Dar Mansoor O Tarbi Mein Isi Aayat Ke Ma Tehet:

✍ Tarjuma: 
" HAZRAT MUJAHID (Razi ALLAH Anhu) Se Riwayat Hai, Is Aayat Ke Nuzool Ke Baare Mein Hai Ke Ek Munaafiq Ne Kaha Ke Muhammad (Sallalahu Alayhi Wassallam) Khabar Dete Hain, Ke Falaa Ki Oontni (Camel) Falaa Jungle Mein HAI, In Ko GHAIB Ki Kiya KHABAR".
?( Al-Dur ul Mansoor Fi Tafseer, Al-Maasoor, SURAH TOBA, Aayat#65, Jild#3, PAGE#456, Matboo'a Darul Qutub Ul ILMIYA, Beroot)

??Bad Aqeedah Logon Se Darkhast Hai Ke Bar Bar Padhen, Ke Ek Munaafiq Ne Kaha Tha Ke HUZOOR (ALAYHIS SALAAM) ko GHAIB Ki Kya Khabar..

??GUSTAAKHO Tum Bhi Munaafiqon K Aqaid Pe Chalte Ho.. Hosh Karo.. ALLAH Ka Khauf Karo..

❂ Aayat#14:
Part ②_________Continued••••

?Imam Yousuf Bin Ismail Nibhaani (Rehmatullah Alayhi) Likhtey Hain:

✍ Tarjuma: 
“ Hazrat Moosa Bin Uqbah Aur Arwah Bayaan Karte Hain Ke Nabi Akram (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Gazwah e Bani Mustalaq Se Laute To Madinah Shareef Ke Qareeb Sakht Aandhi Aai, Qareeb Tha Ke Saara Lashkar Rait Mein Dab Kar Dafan Hojaata, Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ne Farmaya, Yeh Aandhi Ek Munaafiq Ki Maut Ke Liye Bheji Gayi Hai (Yeh Ilm-e-Ghaib Nahin To Kiya Hai ? )

Chunaanche Hum MADINA Munauwara Pahuche To Munaafiqeen Ka Sardar Mar Chuka Tha, Us Munaafiq Ka Naam Rafa’a Bin Zaid Bin Taaboot Tha, Shaam Ke Waqt Yeh Aandhi Thi, To Logon Ne Apni Sawariyon Ko ikattha Kiya un Mein Se Nabi (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ki Oontni Ghum Ho Chuki Thi, Jis Ki Wajah Se Logon Mein Us Ki Talash Ke Liye Bhaag Daud Pad Gayi, Ek Munaafiq Ne Ansaar Ki Majlis Mein Kaha Muhammad (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) To Hume Bade Bade Waqiyat Ki Khabaren Deta Hai, Ab ALLAH Inhi Ki Oontni Ke Baarey Mein Kyu Nahin Batata ?

Phir Woh Munaafiq Uth Khada Huwa, Aur Nabi e Kareem (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ke Pass Gaya Taa Ke AAP (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ki Guftugu Suney To Us Ne Dekha Ke ALLAH Ne Us Ki Yeh Baat Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ko Bata Di Hai, Us Waqt Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ne Farmaya, Jab Ke Woh Munaafiq Sunn Raha Tha Ke, “Ek Munaafiq Shakhs Ne Yeh Har’sah’zai Ki Hai Ke Muhammad Rasool'ALLAH (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ki Oontni Gum Hogayi Hai, ALLAH Ab AAP (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ko Kyu Nahin Bata Deta Ke Woh Oontni Is Waqt Kahaan Hai, Sunn Lo ALLAH Ne Mujhey Aagah Kar Diya Hai Ke Woh Oontni is Waqt Kahaan Hai? Aur is Mein Koi Shak Nahin Ke Koi Bizzat Ghaib Ki Baatein Nahin Jaan Sakta Siwaye ALLAH TA’ALA Ke (Yaani Aatayi Ilm-e-Ghaib Huzoor ko Hai)

Sunn Lo..! Woh Oontni Samne Ki Ghaati Mein hai, Aur Us ki Muhaar Ek Darakht (Tree) Mein Atki Huwi Hai, Yeh Sunn Kar Log Us Oontni Ke Paas Gaye Aur Usey Pakad Kar Le Aaye, Woh Munaafiq Bhaagta Huwa Un Logon Ke Pass Aaya, Jin Ki Maujudgi Mein us Ne Woh Baat Kahi Thi, Woh Sab Log Usi Jagah Baithe They, Un Mein Se Koi Bhi Abhi Tak Uth Ker Kahin Na Gaya Tha, Woh Munaafiq kehney Laga, “Main Tumhe Qasam De Ker Puchta Hoon, Ke Kiya Tum Mein Se Koi Abhi Tak Is Majlis Mein Se Utha Nahin, Aur Woh Baat ja Kar Kisi Ne Unhen Batayi Hai ? Sab Ne Kaha: “Nahin , Hum Se Koi Abhi Tak Is Majlis Mein Se Nahin Utha”, Woh Shakhs Phir Kehne Laga: “Meri Baat To Muhammad (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Bayaan Farmaa Rahey They, Ba-Khuda Main Ab Tak Muhammad (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ke Amar-e-Nabuwwat Mein Shak Karta Tha, Main Ab Gawahi Deta Hoon Ke Muhammad ALLAH Ke RASOOL Hain”..
?Hajjatullah  Ali ul Aalameen Fi Mujizaat Syed ul Mursaleen, Page#366, Matboo’a Dar ul Qutub ul Ilmiyah, Beroot)
?(Dalael un Nabuwwah, Imam Behki, Jild#4, Page#59-60, Matboo’a Dar ul Qutub ul Ilmiyah, Beroot)
?(Naeem ur Riyaz Fi Sharah Shifa ul Qazi Ayaz, Jild#4, Page#195, Matbooa’ Dar ul Qutub ul Ilmiyah, Beroot)
?(Sharah ul Allama ur Zarqani Ali ul Mawahib ul Ludniyah, Jild#7, Page#207, Matboo’a Dar ul Ma’arfah, Beroot)
?(Khasais ul Kubra, Jild#1, Page#391-392, Matboo’a Dar ul Qutub ul Ilmiyah, Beroot)

? Imam Abdul Malik Bin Hashshaam 213 Hijri Mein Likhtey Hain:

“Ek Kehne Waala Kehta Hai Ke Muhammad (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Yeh Gumaan Kartey Hain Ke Aasmaan Se in Ke Pass Wahi Ati Hai Magar Woh Yeh Nahin Jaante Hai Ke Un ki Oontni Kahaan Hai,
Qasam Ba-Khuda! Main Wahi Jaanta Hoon Jo ALLAH TA’ALA Mujhey Sikhaata Hai, Ab Us Ne Mujhey is Oontni Ke Mutalliq Bata Diya Hai, Woh is Ghaati Mein Hai, Is Ki Nakeel Ek Darakht Ke Saath Uljhi Huwi Hai..

Sahaba-e-Karam (Razi ALLAH Anhu) Us Ghaati Mein Gaye Unhonne Wahi Oontni Ko Paaya, Jahaan Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ne Farmaya, Aur Bilkul Usi Haalat Mein Paya, Jis Tarah Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ne Farmaya Tha”..
?(Al Seerat un Nabwiyyah Al Maroof Seerat Ibn-e-Hasshaam, Jild#3, Page#60, Matboo’a Dar ul Jeel, Beroot)

?Imam Nibhani (Rehmatullah Alayhis) likhte Hain:

✍ Tarjuma:
“Aehki aur Abu Naeem Aasim Bin Umer Qatadah (Razi ALLAH Anhu) Se Riwayat Karte Hain Ke Mujhey Ansaar Ke Kuch Logon Ne batata Ke Nabi e Kareem (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ki Oontni Tabook Ki Jang Mein Gum Hogai, To Ek Munafiq Jis Ka Nifaaq Mashhoor o Maroof Tha, Us Ne Kaha Kiya Muhammad (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Nabuwwat Ke Mud’ee Nahin ?? Woh Tumhein Aasmaan Ki Khabren Dete Hain, Halaanke Unhein Pata Nahin Ke Oontni Kahaan Hai?

Yeh Sun Ker Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ne Farmaya, (Ammarah Bin Hazan Bhi us Waqt Wahaan Mojood Tha) Ke Ek Shakhs Ne Kaha Ke Muhammad (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Tumhein Aasmaan Ki khabren Dete Hain, Halaanke Unhein Maloom Nahin Ke Khud in ki Apni Oontni Kahaan Hai, Ba-khuda! Main To Wahi Jaanta Hoon, Jo Mujhey Khuda Batata Hai, ALLAH TA’ALA Ne Mujhey Bata Diya Hai Ke Meri Oontni Falaan Ghaati Mein Hai, is ki Nakeel Ek Darakht Mein Phansi Huwi Hai, Yeh Sunn Ker Sahaba e Karam (Razi ALLAH Anhu) Gaye, Aur Usey Pakad Ker Le Aaye, Ammarah Laut Ker Ghar Aaye, Aur Ahl-e-Khana Ko Nabi (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ki Munaafiq Ke Mutalliq Guftugu Bayan Ki Toh Ek Shakhs Ne Jo Ke Ammarah Ke Ghar Mein Tha, Bataya Ke Waqai Ek Munaafiq Ne Aap Ke Aaney Se Pehley Yeh Baat Ki Thi”..
?(Hujjatullah Ali ul Aalameen Fi Mujizaat e Syedul Mursaleen, Page#366, Matboo’a Dar ul Qutub ul Ilmiyah, Beroot)

" Tu Apne GHAIB Par Kisi Ko Musallat Nahin Karta Siwaye Apne Pasandeedah Rasoolon Ke".
?(Parah#29, Surah#72, Aayat#26)

?Tafseer e Kabeer Mein isi Aayat Ke Tehet Hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
“ Yani Qayamat Ke Aaney Ka Waqt Un Ghaibon Mein Se Hai Jis Ko ALLAH TA’ALA Kisi Per Zaahir Nahin Farmata, Pas agar kaha jaawey k jab tum Ne is Ghaib Ko Qayamat Par Mehmool Kar Liya To Ab Rab Ta’ala Ne Kaise Farmaya, “Magar Pasandeedah Rasoolon Ko” Halaankey Yeh Ghaib To Kisi Per Bhi Zaahir Nahin Kiya Jaata, To Hum Kahenge Ke Rab Ta’ala Qayamat Ke Qareeb Zaahir Farmaye Ga”
?(Tafseer-e-Kabeer, Jild#10, Page#678, Matboo’a Dar ul Ehya ut Turas ul Arabi, Beroot)

?Tafseer Azeezi Mein Isi Aayat Ke Ma Tehet, Page 173 Pe Hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
" Jo Cheez Tamaam Makhlooqaat Se Ghayeb Ho, Woh Ghaib e Matlaq Hai, Jaise Qayaamat Ke Aane Ka Waqt, Aur Rozaana Aur Har Cheez Ki Pedaaishi Aur Shar'ai Ehkaam Aur Jaise Parwardigaar Ki Zaat-O-Siffaat Bar Tareeq Tafseel, Is Qism Ko RAB TA'ALA Ka Khaas GHAIB Kehte Hai. Pas Apne Khaas GHAIB Par Woh Kisi Ko Matlaa Nahin Karta, Is Ke Siwa Jis Ko Pasand farma De, Aur Woh RASOOL Hote Hai, Chahe Farishte Ki Jins Se Ho Ya Insaan Ki Jins Se, Jaise HAZRAT MUHAMMAD (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ko Apne Ba'az GHAIB Zaahir Farmata Hai".

فاوحی الی عبدہ ما اوحی۔

✍ Tarjuma:
“Ab Wahi Farmaye Apne Bande Ko Jo Wahi Farmayi”..
?(Parah#27, Surah#53, Aayat#10)

?Madarij un Nabuwwah Jild#1 Mein Hai:

✍Tarjuma:
“ Me’raj Mein RAB Ne Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Par Jo Saare Uloom Aur Ma’arfat Aur Basharate Aur Ishaare Aur Khabren Aur Karamate o Kamalaat Wahi Farmayeen Woh is Ibhaam Mein Daakhil Hai, Aur Sab Ko Shaamil Hai, In Ki Ziyaadati Aur Azmat Ki Wajah Se Hi In Cheezon Ko Bator-e-Ibhaam Zikr Kiya , Bayan Na Farmaya, Is Mein is Taraf Ishaarah Hai Ke In Uloom e Ghaibiyah Ko Siwaye Rab Ta’ala Aur Mehboob (Alayhis Salam) Ke Koi Nahin Ihaata Kar Sakta, Haan Jis Qadar Huzoor Ne Bayan Farma Diya Woh Maloom Hai”..
?(Madarij un Nabuwwah Farsi, Jild#1, Page#170, Matboo’a Nooriyah Rizawiyah, Publishing Bilal Ganj, Lahore)

Is Aayat Aur Ibaarat se Maloom Huwa Ke Me’raj Mein Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ko Woh Uloom Ata Huwe Jin Ko Na Koi Bayan Kar Sakta Hai, Aur Na Kisi Ke Khayal Mein Aa Sakte Hain, Maakaan o Maayakoon To Sirf Bayaan Karne Ke Liye Hai Warna is Se Bhi Kahin Ziyaadah Ki Ata Huwi..

وما ھو علی الغیب بضنین۔

✍ Tarjuma:
" Aur Aye NABI, GHAIB Batane Mein Bakheel Nahi".
?(Parah#30, Surah#81, Aayat#24)

Yeh Jab Hi Hosakta Hai, Jab HUZOOR (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ko ILM-E-GHAIB Ho, Aur HUZOOR (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Logon Ko is Se Matla Farma Dete Hon.

Muraad Yeh Hai Ke HUZOOR (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ke Pass GHAIB Aata Hai, Pas Woh is Mein Tum Par Bokhl Nahin Karte, Balkey Tumhen Sikhate Hain, Aur Tum Ko KHABAR Dete Hain, Jaise Ke Kaahin Chupaate Hain, Waise Nahin Chupaate".
?(Mu'aalim U Tanzeel, JILD#4, PAGE#422, Matboo'a Darul Kitaab Ul Ilmiya, Beroot)

?Tafseer-E-Khazan Mein Hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
"Muraad Yeh Hai Ke HUZOOR (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ke Paas ILM-E-GHAIB Aata Hai, To Tum Par is Mein Bokhl Nahin Farmate, Balke Tum Ko Sikhate Hai".
?( Lubaab U Taaweel , Al Tanzeel Ul Ma'aroof, Tafseer-E-Khazan, JILD#4, PAGE#357, Matboo'a Darul Ma'arfatah, Beroot)

Is Aayat o Ibaarat Se Maaloom Huwa Ke HUZOOR (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Logon Ko ILM-E-GHAIB Sikhate Hain. Aur Sikhayega Wohi, Jo Khud Jaanta Hoga..

❂Aayat#18:

وعلمنہ من لدنا علماً۔

✍ Tarjuma:
" Aur Inko Apna ILM-E-LADUNNI Ata Kiya, (Yaani HAZRAT KHIZR Ko)".
?(Parah#15, Surah#18, Aayat#65)

?Tafseer e Be-Zaawi Mein Hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
" HAZRAT KHIZR (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ko Woh ILM Sikhaye Jo, Hamare Saath Khaas Hain, Bager Hamare Bataye Koi Nahin Jaanta Aur Woh ILM-E-GHAIB Hai".
?(Tafseer-E-Be Zaawi, JILD#3, PAGE#510, Matboo'a Darul fikar, Beroot)

?Tafseer IBN-E-JAREER Mein ABDULLAH IBN-E-ABBAS Se Riwayat Hai:

✍Tarjuma:
"HAZRAT KHIZR (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ne Farmaya Tha, HAZRAT MOOSA (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Se Ke Tum Mere saath Sabr Na Kar Sakoge, Woh KHIZR, ILM-E-GHAIB Jaante The, Ke Unhon Ne Jaan Liya".
?(Jaame Ul Bayaan, Fi Tafseer Ul Qura'an, Al Ma'aroof, Tafseer Tibri, JILD#15, PAGE#323, Matboo'a Darul Haya, Beroot)

?ROOH UL BAYAAN Mein Hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
" HAZRAT KHIZR Ko Jo Ladunni ILM Sikhaya Gaya, Woh ILM-E-GHAIB Hai aur is GHAIB Ke Muta'alliq Khabar Dena Hai, KHUDA Ke Hukm Se, Jaise Us Taraf IBN-E-ABBAS (RAZI ALLAH ANHU) Gaye Hain".
?(Tafseer-e-ROOH Ul Bayaan, JILD#5, PAGE#321, Matboo'a Darul Haya, Beroot)

?Tafseer-E-Madarik Mein Hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
" Yaani HAZRAT KHIZR Ko GHAIB Ki khabren Di, Aur Kaha Gaya Hai, Ke ILM-E-LADUNNI Woh Hota Hai, Jo Bande Ko ILHAAM Ke Tarikhe Par Haasil Ho".
?(Tafseer-E-Madaarik, JILD#2, Page#22, Matboo'a Maktab Ul Qura'an, Peshaawar)

?Tafseer-E-KHAAZAN Mein isi Aayat Ke Tehet Hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
" Yaani HAZRAT KHIZR Ko ILM-E-BAATIN ILHAAM Ke Tarikhe Par Ata Farmaya".

Is Aayat O Tafseeri Ibaarton se Maaloom Huwa Ke RAB TA'ALA Ne HAZRAT KHIZR Ko Bhi ILM-E-GHAIB Ata Farmaya Tha, Jis Se Laazim Hai Ke HUZOOR (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Ko Bhi ILM-E-GHAIB Ata Huwa.

Kyu Ke Aap (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Tamaam Makhlooqaat-E-ILAHI Mein Sab Se Ziyada Afzal Aur AALIM (Yaani ILM Waale) Hain, Aur HAZRAT KHIZR (ALAYHIS SALAAM) Bhi Makhlooq Hain..

?Tafseer-e-Khazin Mein isi Aayat Ke Tehet Hai:

“ Hazrat Ibrahim (Alayhis Salam) Ko Sakhrah Par Khada Kiya Gaya Aur Un Ke Liye Aasmaan Khol Diye Gaye, Yahaan Tak Ke Unhone Arsh o Kursi Aur Jo Kuch Aasmaanon Mein Hai Dekh Liya, Aur Aap Ke Liye Zameen Khol Di Gayi, Yahaan Tak Ke Unhone Zameenon Ki Neechi Zameen Aur Un Ajaebaat Ko Dekh Liya Jo Zameenon Mein Hai..
?(Al-bab ul Taaweel Fi Ma’ani ul Tanzeel al Maroof tafseer-e-Khazin, Jild#2, Page#126, Matboo’a Dar ul Qutub ul Ilmiyah, Beroot)

?Tafseer-e-Madarik Mein isi Aayat Ke Tehet Hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
“Mujaahid Ne Farmaya Ke Ibrahim (Alayhis Salam) Ke Liye Saaton (7) Aasmaan Khol Diye Gaye, Pas Unhone Dekh Liya, Jo kuCh Aasmaanon Mein Hai, Yahaan Tak Ke Unki Nazar Arsh Tak Puhanch Gayi, Aur Un Ke Liye Saat (7) Zameene Kholi Gayi, Ke Unhone Woh Cheezen Dekh Li Jo Zameeno Mein Hai ”
?(Tafseer-e-Madarik, Jild#1, Page#373, Matboo’a Maktaba tul Quran wal Sunnah, Peshawar)

?Rooh ul Bayan Mein isi Aayat Ke Tehet Hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
“Ibrahim Ko Aasmaan o Zameen Ke Ajaebaat o Garaebaat Dikhaye, Aur Arsh Ki Bulandi Se Le Kar Teh-Tus-Sara Tak Khol Diya ”..
?(Tafseer-e-Rooh ul Bayan, Jild#3, Page#72, Matboo’a Dar ul Ehya ut Turas al Arabi, Beroot)

?Tafseer-e-Ibn-e-Jareer Ibn-e-Abi Hatim Mein isi Aayat Ke Ma-Tehet Hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
“Hazrat Ibrahim Par khuli o Posheedah Tamaam Cheezen khul Gayeen, Pas Un Par Makhlooq Ke Aamaal Mein Se Kuch Bhi Chupaa Na Raha”..
?(Jame’ul-Bayan Fi Tafseer ul Quran Al Maroof Tafseer e Tabri, Jild#247, Matboo’a Dar ul Ehy t Turas al Arabi, Beroot)

?Tafseer-e-Kabeer Mein Hai:

✍ Tarjuma:
“ ALLAH TA’ALA Ne Hazrat Ibrahim (Alayhis Salam) Ke Liye Aasmaanon Ko Cheer Diya, Yahaan Tak Ke Unhone Arsh o Kursi Aur Jahan Tak Jismaani Ilm Ki Foqiyat khatam Hoti Hai Dekh Liya, Aur Woh Ajeeb o Ghareeb Cheezen Bhi Dekh Leen Jo Aasmaanon Mein Hai, Aur Woh Ajeeb o Gareeb Cheezen Bhi Dekh Leen Jo Zameen Ke Pait Mein Hain”..
?(Tafseer e Kabeer, jild#5, Page#35, Matboo’a dar ul ehya ut turas ul arabi, beroot)

Is Aayat Aur in Tafseeri Ibaraat Se Maloom Huwa Ke Az Arsh ta Teh-tus-Sura Hazrat Ibrahim (Alayhis Salam) Ko Dikhaye Gaye Aur Makhlooq Ke Aamaal Ki Bhi In Ko Khabar Di Gayi, Aur Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ka Ilm in Se Kahin Ziyadah Hai, To Maanna Padega Ke Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ko Bhi Yeh Uloom Ata Huwe..

Khayal Rahe Yeh Ke Arsh Ke Ilm Mein Looh e Mehfooz Bhi Aagaya Aur Looh e Mehfooz Mein Kiya Likha Hai, is Ko Hum Pehley Hi Bayaan Kar Chuke Hain, Lihaaza Maakaana wa Mayakoon ka Ilm To Unhe Bhi Haasil Huwa Aur Ilm-e-Ibraahimi Aur Ilm e Hazrat Aadam (Alayhis Salam) Huzoor (Sallalahu Alaihi Wasallam) Ke Ilm Ke Dariya Ka Qatrah Hai..

“Aayat Se Murad Woh Mojizaat Hain, Jo Hazrat Easa (Alayhis Salam) Ke Dast-e-Aqdas Se Zahoor Pazeer Hote They, AAP (Alayhis Salam) Murdon Ko Zindah Kar Dete They, Woh Mitti Se Parindey Ki Shakal Banate Phir is Par Phoonk Maarte To Woh ALLAH Ke Hukm Se Parinda Ban Jaata, Mareez Ko Shifa’yab Farmaa Dete They, Woh Log Jo Kuch Apne Gharon Mein Zakheerah Karte They, AAP is Ke Mutalliq Inhe Bata Dete Bohat Se Uloom-e-Ghaibiyah Ka Izhaar Farmate”..

(Upper Di Gayi Ibaarat 213 Hijri Mein Likhi Gayi (Yaani Aaj 1200 Saal Pehley), Aur is Mein Saaf Hai Ke Hazrat Easa (Alayhis Salam) Uloom e Ghaibiyah Ki Khabar Dete They, Aur Zaahir Hai Insaan Ghaib Ki Khaber Tab Hi Dega Jab Us Ko Khud Ghaib Ka Ilm Hoga, (Yaani Ilm-e-Ghaib Hoga), Ab Jab Hazrat Easa (Alayhis Salam) Ko ALLAH Ki Ata Se Ilm-e-Ghaib Haasil Hai, To Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ke Paas Bhi Ataayi Ilm-e-Ghaib Manna Hoga, Kyu Ke Huzoor (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ko ALLAH Ki Ata Se Tamaam Makhlooqaat Se Ziyadah Ilm Hai)

?Imam Abdur Razzaak Bin Hamaam San’aani 211 Hijri Mein Riwaayat Karte Hain:

✍Tarjuma:
“Qatadah (Rehmatullah Alayhi) Is Aayat e Kareemah Ke Tehet Farmaya, Main Tumhen Khabar Deta Hoon Un Cheezon Ki Jo Tum Khaate Ho, Aur Jo Tum Dastarkhuwaan Mein Bachatey Ho”
?(Tafseer-e-Abdur Razzaak, Jild#1, Page#121-122, Matboo’a Maktaba-tur-Rushd-ul-Riyaz)

?Imam Fakher ud Deen Raazi 606 Hijri Mein Likhte hain:

✍ Tarjuma:
“Is Aayat Ki Tafseer Mein Do (2) Qual Hai,

Pehla Yeh Ke AAP Ne Pehli Martaba Ghuyoob (Ghaib Ki Jama) Ki Khabar Us Waqt Di (Sadi Ne Riwaayat Ki) Ke Jab AAP Bachon Ke Saath Khelte Phir Unhein Un Ke Waalden Ke Af’aal Ki Khabar Dete,

AAP Bachche Ko Khabar Dete Ke Us Ki Maa Ne Fulaan Shey (Cheez) Us Ke Liye Fulaan Jagah Chupa Kar Rakhi Hai, Bacha Ghar Aata Aur Ro Ro Kar Woh Shey Haasil Kar Leta,

Un Logon Ne (Yaani un Bachchon Ke Maa Baap Ne) Bachchon Se Kaha Ke Us Jaadugar Ke Saath Na Khela Karen, Unhone Tamaam Bachchon Ko Ek Makaan Mein Jama Kar Diya,

Hazrat Easa (Alayhis Salam) Ne In Se Bachchon Ke Baare Mein Dariyaaft Farmaaya To Unhone Kaha Ke Woh is Makaan Mein Nahin Hain,

AAP Ne (Yaani Hazrat Easa Ne) Ne Pucha Ke Acha Phir is Makaan Mein Kiya Hai, To Unhone (Yaani Maa Baap ne) Kaha Ke is Makaan Mein Khinzeer Hain

AAP (Hazrat Easa) Ne Farmaya, Ke Aisa Hi Hoga, Phir Jab Makaan Ko Dekha Gaya To Dekha Ke Woh Bachche Khinzeer Ban Chuke They…

Dusra Qual Yeh Hai Ke AAP (Hazrat Easa) Ka Mojizah e Akhbar-e-Ghaib Ba-Waqt-e-Nuzool e Maedah Zaahir Huwa

Woh Aise Ke AAP (Hazrat Easa) Ki Quam Ko (Maedah) Ke Jama Karney Aur Zakheerah Karne Se Mana Kiya Gaya Tha, is Ke Ba-Wajood Woh Log Jama Kar Liya Karte They, Hazrat Easa (Alayhis Salam) Unhein is Ki Khabar Diya Karte They”..
?(Al-Tafseer-e-Kabeer, Jild#8, Page#57, MAtboo’a Dar ul Fikar Beroot)

“Aur Main Tumhein Batata Hoon Jo Kuch Tum Kha Kar Aaye Yaani Us Shai (Cheez) Ke Baarey Mein Batata Hoon Jisey Meine Dekha Bhi Nahin Aur Jo Kuch Tum Apney Gharon Mein Jama Karte Ho, Yaani Jo Kuch Tum Aayenda Kal Ke Liye Jama Karte Ho, Kaha Gaya Ke Hazrat Easa (Alayhis Salam) Kisi Shakhs Ne Jo Guzishta Kal Khaya Tha Aur Jo Aaj Khaye ga, Aur Jo Raat Ke Khaney Ke Liye Jama Karey ga Sab Ki Khabar De Dete They”..
?(Al Baab ul Taweel fi Ma’ani ul tanzeel al maroof tafseer-e-Khazin, Jild#1, Page#237, Matboo’a Dar ul Ma’arfah, Beroot)

✍Tarjuma:
“ Main Tumhein Us Shai (Cheez) Ki Khabar Deta Hoon Jo Tum Mein Se Kisi Ne Abhi Abhi Khaai Hai, Aur Us Shai (Cheez) Ki Bhi Jo Aayendah Kal Ke Liye Zakheerah Ki Hai”..
?(Tafseer-e-Ibn-e-Kaseer, Jild#1, Page#365, Matboo’a Dar ul Fikar, Beroot)

“ Agar Kaha Jaye Ke Hazrat Easa (Alayhis Salam) Ghaib Ki Khabar Diya Karte They Aur Woh Sab Kuch Batla Dete Jo Log Gharon Mein Khaa Ker Aatey Aur Jo Kuch Ghar Mein Chhod Ker Aatey They To Nabi e Kareem (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ne is Se Bhi Kahin Ajeeb Tar Khabren Di Hain (Yani Ghaib Ki khabren Di Hain)

Kyu Ke Hazrat Easa (Alayhis Salam) To Yahi Batlaate They Ke Log Ghar Ki Deewari Ke Peechey Kiya Khatey Aur Kiya Chhod Kar Aate Hai, Magar Nabi e Kareem (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ek Maah (Month) Ya is Se Bhi Ziyadah Musaafat Per Waaqey Hone Waale Hawadis Se Aagahi De Dete They,
Jaise AAP Ne Nijaashi Ke Wisaal Aur Gazwa-e-Mo’ta Mein Zaid Jaafer Aur Abdullah Bin Rawaha (Razi ALLAH Anhum) Ki Shahadat Ki It’tala Di, Basa Auqaat AAP Ke Pass Koi Shakhs Kuch Puchne Aata To AAP Farmaate Agar Tum Chaho To Mein Tumhein Batla Du Ke Tum Kiya Sawal Karna Chahte Ho”..

﷽ (Bismillah) Ki Barkat Ki
Ajeeb o Ghareeb Hikayat
———————————————

Ek Buzurg ﷽ (Bismillah) Shareef Ke Fazail Bayaan Farma Rahe The! Ek Yahoodi Ladki Bhi Is Ijtima Mein Maujud Thi! Fazaile ﷽ (Bismillah) Sunn Kar Woh Yahoodi Mutas'sir Hui Aur Islam Qabool Kar Liyaa! Usi Waqt Se Uss Ladki Ki Zabaan Par ﷽ (Bismillah hir-Rahman nir-Rahim) Ka Wird Jari Ho Gaya! Har Waqt Uthte, Baithe, Sotey, Jagte, Chalte, Phirte ﷽ (Bismillah) Ka Zikr Jari Tha! Iss Wajah Se Ladki Ke Maa Baap Uss Se Bahut Naraz Rahne Lage Aur Usko Tarah Tarah Ki Takleefe Dene Lage! Neez Iss Khoshish Mein Lag Gaye Ki Ladki Par Koi Ilzaam Aayed Karke Usko Qatl Kara De! Chunache Uss Ladki Ke Baap Ne Jo Badshah Waqt Ka Wazir Tha! Ek Din Badshah Ki Mohar Ki Anguthi Jo Uske Paas Rehti Thi Apne Ladki Ke Supurd Kar Di! Usne ﷽ (Bismillah) Shareef Padhkar Anguthi Lekar Jeb Mein Dal Di! Raat Ko Jab Wo Ladki Soo Gayi Toh Uske Baap Ne Anguthi Uski Jeb Se Nikal Kar Dariya Mein Dal Di! Ek Machli Ne Wo Anguthi Nigal Li! Subah Ko Ek Mahigeer Ne Jaal Dala! Ittifak Se Wahi Machli Jaal Mein Phans Gayi! Shikari Ne Lakar Wazeer Sahib Ke Nazr Pesh Kar Di! Wazir Ne Machli Ladki Ko Pakane Ke Liye Di! Ladki Ne ﷽ (Bismillah) Keh Kar Machli Li! Aur ﷽ (Bismillah) Keh Kar Jab Uska Pait Chak Kiya To Wo Anguthi Machli Ke Pait Se Nikli! Usme ﷽ (Bismillah) Padkar Phir Jeb Mein Dal Li! Aur Machli Paka Kar Baap Ke Aagey Rakh Di! Khana Khane Ke Baad Jab Baap ke Darbar Ka Waqt Aaya! Baap Ne Ladki Se Anguthi Talab Ki! Usne ﷽ (Bismillah) Padh kar Anguthi Jeb Se Nikaal Kar De Di! Baap Yeh Wakiya Dekh Kar Hairaan Ho Gaya! Iss Tarah Ladki Ke Qatl Ka Mansooba Dhare Ka Dhara Reh Gaya Aur ALLAH ﷻ Ne ﷽ (Bismillah) Ki Barkat Se Ladki Ko Qatl Se Mahfooz Rakha!
?Lam'aane Sufiya

———————————

Hazrate Abu Huraira (Radi'Allahu Ta'ala Anhu) Farmate Hain Ki Ek Martaba Ek Musalman Aur Ek Kaafir Ke Shyateen mein Mulaqat Hui! Kaafir Ka Shaitan Khoob Mota Taza, Badan Par Kapde, Pahne Aur Sar Par Tel Lagaya Huwa Tha ! Jabki Momin Ka Shaitan Dubla Patla Paraganda Sar Aur Nanga Tha! Kaafir Ke Shaitan Ne Momin Ke Shaitan Se Pucha, Bhai! Tumhari Yeh Halat Kyun Hai? Usne Jawab Diya, Main Ek Aisey Marde Khuda Ke Sath Hoon Jo Khana Khate Huwe بسم الله Padh Leta Hai! Issi Wajah Se Muje Bhooka Rehna Padhta Hai Aur Jab Woh Paani Yaa Koi Aur Cheez Peeta Hai To Uska Aaghaaz Bhi بسم الله Se Karta Hai! Issi Wajah Se Muje Pyaasa Rehna Padhta Hai! Sar Par Tel Lagate Waqt Woh بسم الله Ka Wird Karta Hai Isiliye Main Paraganda Baal Reh Jaata Hoon. Libaas Zeb Tan Karte Waqt Bhi Woh بسم الله Shareef Padh Leta Hai! Iss Ki Badaulat Main Nanga Reh Jaata Hoon! Kaafir Ke Shaitan Ne Kaha, " Main Ek Aisey Shakhs Par Musallat Hoon! Jo Kisi Kaam Mein بسم الله Nahi Padhta Issi Liye Main Khane Peene Aur Deegar Umoor Mein Shareek Ho Jaata Hoon!"
?Mawahibul Ladunniya

Iss Hikayat Se Hame Yeh Dars Milta Hai Ki Agar Hum Khair o Barkat Chahte Hain Toh Har Nek Kaam Ke Aaghaaz Mein بسم الله Padha Karein! Basurte Deegar Hamare Har Fel Mein Shaitan La'ien Shareek Ho Jaaye ga!

Un'nis Huroof

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم, Mein Unnis Huroof Hain Aur Dozakh Par Aazaab Ke Farishte Bhi Unnees Hain! Pas Ummid Hai Ki Uske Ek Ek Harf Ki Barkat Se Ek Ek Farishte Ka Aazaab Dur Ho Jaye! Doosri Khubi Yeh Bhi Hai Ki Din Raat Mein Chobees Ghante Hai Jin Mein Se Panch Ghante Panch Namazo Ne Gher Liya Aur Unnis Ghanto Ke Liye بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم, Ke Unnis Huroof Ata Farmaye Gaye! Pas Jo بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم,
Ka Wird Karta Rahe, In Sha ALLAH (Azzawajal) Uska Har Ghanta Ibadat Mein Shumar Hoga Aur Har Gaye Ke Gunah Muaaf Honge!

Sharabi Wa'li Ban Gaya
—————————————

Hazrate Bishr Haafi (Rahmatullah Ta'ala Alai) Tauba Se Qabl Bahut Bade Sharabi They! Aap Ek Martaba Sharab Ke Nashe Aur Masti Ke Aalam Mein Kahi Jaa Rahe The Ki Raste Mein Aapne Ek Kaghaz Ka Tukda Dekha Jis Par بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم Likha Hua Tha! Aapne Tazeeman Usey Utha Liya! Aur Itr Kharid Kar Usey Mu'attar Kiya! Phir Usey Ek Buland Jagah Par Rakh Diya! Usii Raat Ek Buzurg Ne Khawab Mein Suna Ki Koi Keh Raha Hai, "Jaao! Bishr Se Keh Do Ki Tumne Mere Naam Ko Mu'attar Kiya, Uski Tazeem Ki Aur Usey Buland Jagah Rakha! Hum Bhi Tumko Pak Karenge Aur Duniya wa Akhirat Mein Tumhe Buzurgi Aata Farmayege!" Un Buzurg (Rahmatullah Ta'ala Alai) Ne Dil Mein Socha Ki Bishr To Ek Sharabi Aur Fasik Hai! Shayad Main Ne Yeh Khawab Galat Dekha Hai! Chunanche Unhone Wuzu Kiya, Nafl Padhe Aur Phir Soo Gaye! Doosri Bar Unhone Phir Wahi Khawab Dekha! Issi Tarah Teen Martaba Yehi Nazar Aaya Aur Yehi Awaaz Suni " Yeh Hamara Paigham Bishr Hi Ki Taraf Hai Jaao Unhein Hamara Paigham Paucha Do!"

Chunanche Subah Hote Hi Wo Buzurg (Rahmatullah Ta'ala Alai) Hazrate Bishr (Rahmatullah Ta'ala Alai) Ki Talash Mein Nikal Pade Unko Pata Chala ki Wo Sharab Ki Mehfil Mein Baithe Hai! Toh Wo Wahi Pauche Aur Bishr Ko Awaaz Di! Logon ne Bataya Ki
Wo Toh Saharab Ke Nashe Mein Behosh Pade Huwe Hai! Unhone Kaha, Tum Log Usey Jaakar Kisi Tarah Ye Baat Suna Do Ki Tumhare Naam Ek Zaroori Paigham Aaya Hai! Aur Paigham Laane Wala Bahar Khada Hai, Chunanche Wo Log Gaye Aur Hazrate Bishr (Rahmatullah Ta'ala Alai) Ko Keh Diya Ki Utho! Bahar Chalo, Tumhare Naam Koi Paigham Aaya Hai! Hazrate Bishr (Rahmatullah Ta'ala Alai) Ne Farmaya, Unse Pucho Ki Wo Kiska Paigham Laaye Hai? Chunanche Logon Ke Daryaaft Karne Par Woh Buzurg (Rahmatullah Ta'ala Alai) Farmane Lage, "ALLAH ﷻ Ka Paigham Laaya Hoon!" Jab Aap (Rahmatullah Ta'ala Alai) Ko Ye Baat Batayi Gayi Toh Jhoom Gaye Aur Fauran Bahar Aaye Aur Paigham e Haq Sunkar Sachche Dil Se Tauba Ki Aur Uss Buland Maqam Par Jaa Pauche Ki Mushahudae Haq Ke Galba Ki Shiddat Se Nange Paaun Rahne Lage! Aur Kabhi Joota(Shoes) Paaun Mein Nahi Pehna! Isiliye Aap "Haafi" Ke Naam Se Mashoor Ho Gaye ! "Haafi" Nange Paaun Rehne Waale Ko Kehte Hai!
?Tazkiratul Auliya

Ba-Adab Ba-Naseeb Be-Adab Be-Naseeb
————————————————

Ek Aisa Khagaz Ke Tukde Ki Tazeem Karne Se Jis Par ALLAHﷻ Ka Naam Likha Hua Tha, Ek Gunaahgaar Shakhs Ko Itna Buland Makaam Aata Ho Gaya Ki Woh ALLAH ﷻ Ke Bade Bade Maqboolo Aur Waliyo Ki Fherisht Mein Aa Gaya Toh Unn Nufoose Qudsiyaa (Rahimahu'mullah)
Ki Tazeemo Takreem Se Jinke Dilo Mein Khuda ﷻ Ka Naam Khunda Hai! Aur Jinke Sil Zikre Haq Se Mahmoor Hai Hum Gunaahgaar, ALLAH ﷻ Ke Fazlo Karaam Se Kyun Bahreh var Na Honge? Neez Unn Jumla ALLAH ﷻ Waalo (Rahimahu'mullah), Nabiyon (Alayhis Salam) Aur Rasoolon (Alaihimus Salam) Ke Bhi Jo Sardar Hai (Yaani Sayyedul Ambiya, Ahmade Mujtaba, Muhammad Mustafa (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Inki Tazeem Aur Takreem ALLAH ﷻ Ko Kis Qadr Mahboob wa Pasandida Hogi Yakeenan Kisi Shaan Wale Ke Naam Ko Tazeem Bhi Mujibe Ajr'o Sawaab Hai! Hazrate Bishr Haafi (Rahmatullah Ta'ala Alai) Ne ALLAH ﷻ Ke Naam Ki Tazeen Ki Toh Izzat Paayi! Toh Aaj Hum Agar Rasoolullah (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ke Naam Ki Tazeem Karein! Jaha Sune, Chum Kar Aankhon Se Lagaa Lein! Toh Kyun kar Izzat Na Paayenge? Hazrat Bishr Haafi (Rahmatullah Ta'ala Alai) Ne Jaha ALLAH Ka Naam Dekha! Wahi Itr Lagaaya Toh Pak Ho Gaye! Toh Hum Agar Jaha Zikre Rasoolullah (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam) Ho! Wahan Itro Gulab Chidh'ke Toh Kyun Pak Na Honge!

Ek Sharabi Sharab Ke Nashe Mein Mast Jaa Raha Tha! Raah Mein Kuwa Aaya, Thokar Lagi, Andar Gira Aur Halak Ho Gaya! Baad Mein Kisi Ne Usey Khawab Mein Dekh Kar Pucha, ALLAH ﷻ Ne Tere Sath Kya Sulook Kiya? Usney Jawab Diya, ALLAH ﷻ Ne Muje Bakhsh Diya! Saa-el Ko Badi Hairat Hui! Usney Sawal Kiya, Tu Sharabi Nahin Tha? Jawab Diya Waqai Main Sharabi Tha Aur Meri Maut Bhi Nashe Hi Ke Aalam Mein Hui Magar ALLAH ﷻ Ka Karaam Ho Gaya! Baat Ye Hai Ki Main Nashe Mein Jhoomta Hua Ja Raha Tha Ki Meri Nazar Ek Kaghaz Ke Purze Par Padi Jis Par بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم , Tehreer Tha! Maine Uss Kaghaz Ko Uthaya Aur Nigal Gaya! Phir Kuwe Mein Gir Pada Aur Mar Gaya! Jab Muje Qabr Mein Rakha Gaya! Munkar Nakeer Ki Ahmad Hui! Unhonne Mujh Se Sawalat Shuru Kar Diye! Maine Kaha, Mujh Se Sawalat Kar Rahe Ho? Mere Parwardigaar ﷻ Ka Pakeeza Naam To Mere Pet Mein Maujud Hai! Itne Mein Ghaib Se Awaaz Aayi, "Mera Banda Sach Kehta Hai, Isey Chodh Do, Maine Isey Bakhsh Diya!"

Title: Hazrat Zaid Ka 1 Bhai Aur 2 Bahan Hai Walid Ka Intaqal Hogaya Hai Aur Walida Zinda Hai
Content:
Aur Zaid Ki Walida Ke Paas 1 Ghar Hai Jiski Qimat 70 lakh Hai Aur Usi Ghar Me Walida Bhi Rehti Ha.

Lekin Walida ki Khushi Yeh Hai Ke Is Ghar Ko Bech Kar Bhai aur Bahano Ke Darmiyan Batwaara Hojaye.

To Hasil Kalam Ye Ke Is Ghar Ka Batawara Kaise Hoga? Kisko Kitna Hissa Milega Aur Walida ko Kitna Lena Chahiye ?

Jawab:

Agar Wo Ghar Zaid ki Walida Ka Hai Aur Wo Ba Hayaat Hain.

To Wo Apni Zindagi Me Jise Jitna Chahen Den, Magar Tamam Logo Me Adl Karein, Ke Sab Ko Barabar Den To Afzal Hai.

Title: Sunniyo par Aitrazat k Jawabaat
Content:
❗?BROADCAST MESSAGE?❗
*▬▬▬▬? ﷽ ?▬▬▬▬*
*الصــلوة والسلام‎ عليك‎ ‎يارسول‎ الله ﷺ*
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
*Sunniyo par Aitrazat k Jawabaat*
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
*•┉─○ PART [1] ○─┉•*

? Mojuda dor e Hazir me kuch Badmazhab sunni Awaam jo ilm se Nawaqif hai us ko pareshan karne k leye Tarha Tarha k Aitrazaat karte hai jese....

*Masla :* Ek shaqs jis ka naam Zaid hai wo kehta hai k Darood (shareef) padna jaiz hai aur salaam padna Bid'Aat hai...?

*? AL•JAWAAB :* Zaid ka salaam padne ko Bid'Aat Qaraar dena sakht gunah hai Qur'an e kareem me Jaha Allah Ta'ala ne musalmano ko darood Bhejne ka hukm deya hai wahi Salaam padne ka bhi Hukm deya hai chunan'che farmata Hai...

*(يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا صَلُّوا عَلَيْهِ وَسَلِّمُوا تَسْلِيمًا)*
? [ Qur'an e Majeed sureh Al-Ahzaab Ayat 56 ]
*Yani "A musalmano ! tum mere Nabi ﷺ par Darood Bhejo aur khoob salaam padho aur Jab khud Allah ta'ala ne Darood shareef k sath salaam padne ka Hukm deya hai to salaam padna Bid'Aat kiyu kar ho sakta Hai zaid par farz hai k wo apne is Behuda Batil Qoll se Ala Al'Aylaan tuba kare...*

➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖
☔ Hazraat e Rasool wa Anmbiya Alahyhim salato wa salaam par Darood Bhejna aur Salaam Bhejna sunnat e Ahlaiya Hai...

*chunan'che Farman e Rabbani aur irshad e Rabbani Hai ( وَسَلَامٌ عَلَى الْمُرْسَلِينَ ) Tamaam Rasool Pegambar'o par Salaam Ho.*

*Aur ( سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ) Yani Musa wa Haroon par Salaam ho.*

*Aur ( سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ , سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِلْ يَاسِينَ) Ibbrahim wa ilyas ko salaam ho.*
? [ Quran e Majeed sureh Al-Saffat para 23 ]
➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖

?Ala Nabiyana wa Alahyhim salaam aur sarkar e Aazam syed e Aalam ﷺ pe Darood wa salaam padne ko to khuso'siyat se Hukm deya gaya Hai Jesa k Hazrat Mujeeb ne Ayat e Karema pesh farmaye..

is leye zaid par Qbr ka hukm Qurani aur irshad e Rabbani k khilaf ek Ala'Darje key mustahab aur muqaddas Amal ko Bid'Aat kehna khuli jahalat aur Neri Bid'Aat hai jis key Binah par zaid BeQaid khud mubtida aur Gumrah ho gaya

Lehaza Al-Jaqeem Sharah Hazrat Mujeeb zaid Mujaida key fatwe k mutabiq Amal keya jaye ....!
? [ Fatawa faiz e Rasool jild 2 safa 602 & 603 ]

*▬▬▬▬? ﷽ ?▬▬▬▬*
*الصــلوة والسلام‎ عليك‎ ‎يارسول‎ الله ﷺ*

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
*•┉─○ PART [2] ○─┉•*

*? MASLA : Huzoor ﷺ key Tazeem karna jaiz hai ya Nahi ..?*
Zaid kehta hai k Huzoor ke Tazeem karna jaiz Nahi aur Baqr kehta Hai k Hame Huzoor ke Tazeem ka jaiz Hona Tasleem Hai Lekin *chunke wo Hamare nigaho k samne Nahi aur ham unhe dekhte Nahi is leye Ham un key Tazeem Nahi karte* to zaid wa Baqr ke Bato ka mudalal jawab tehreer farmaye karam hoga.....!

*AL•JAWAAB : Huzoor syed e Aalam ﷺ key Tazeem jaiz hi Nahi Bal'k wajib wa Lazim Hai khuda wand e Quddus irshad Farmata Hai (وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُ) Yani Huzoor ke Tazeem wa Tauqeer karo,*
? [ Qur'an e Majeed para 26 sureh Fateh Aayat 9 ]

➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖
?Hazrat Qazi Aayaz Alahy Al•Rehmat wa Al•Rizwan Tehreer farmate Hai (Tarjuma)
Yani khuda Azzwajal ne Huzoor ﷺ ke Hurmat wa Tauqeer ko wajib Qaraar deya aur in ke Tazeem wa Taqreem ko Lazim Qaraar deya....!
?[ Shifa shareef jild 2 safa 28 ]

*Lehaza zaid ka ye kehna galt hai k Huzoor ke Tazeem Jaiz Nahi.*

*Musalmano par wajib hai k wo Har tarha Huzoor ﷺ ka Adab Baja'laye Aur har jaiz tariqe se un ke Tazeem kare is leye k Qur'an e Majeed me hukm Mutlaq Hai..*

*Yani Huzoor ke Tazeem k leye koi khas tareqa Mut'main Nahi keya gaya Hai Lehaza Har tareqe se un ke Tazeem karna Lazim Hai, Albatta inhe khuda ya khuda ka Beta kehna ya khuda e Ta'ala ke Tarha in k leye kese sifat ka sabit karna shirq wa kurf Hai aur un ko Sajdah karna Haraam wa Najaiz Hai........!*
➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖

?Aur Baqr ka ye kehna k Huzoor ﷺ ko chun'k dekte Nahi is leye Ham un ke Tazeem Nahi karte is ka bhi ye Qul Galt hai is leye k Mazeem (jis ke Tazeem key jaye) us ka samne Hona zaroori Nahi ,

Bukhari aur muslim me Hazrat Abu Ayub Ansari رضي الله تعالي عنه se Riwayat Hai k Huzoor ﷺ ne irshad farmaya (Tarjuma). Yani Jab tum pakhana jao to Qibla ke Taraf Na Muh karo Na peth..!
? [Mishqat sharef safa 42 ]

Hazrat Mulla Ali Qari رحمةالله تعالي عليه is Hadees sharef ke sharah ne tehreer farmate Hai (Tarjuma) yani Kaba shareef ke Taraf muh aur peth na karne ka hukm is ke Tazeem k leye Hai..!
? [ Mirqat jild 1 safa 283 ]

Aur Bukhari wa muslim me Hazrat Abu HureRah رضي الله تعالي عنه Se Riwayat hai k Rasool e Akram ﷺ ne farmaya (Tarjuma) Yani jab tum me se koi Namaz padne k leye khada ho to Wo Apne samne Na thuke...!
?[ Mishqat sharef safa 69 ]

Hazrat Mulla Ali Qari رحمةالله عليه Huzoor ﷺ k is Hukm ke Aalat Bayan karte Huwe Tehreer Farmate Hai (Tarjuma) yani Qibla ke Taraf thukne se is ke Tazeem k leye mana keya gaya Hai...!
?[ Mirqat jild 1 safa 455 ]

*?Aur Abu Daud sharef me Hazrat Saib bin jallad رضي الله تعالي عنه se Riwayat Hai (Tarjuma) Yani ek shaqs apne Qom ko namaz pada Raha tha to is ne Qibla ke Taraf Thuk deya aur Rasool Allah ﷺ Dekh Rahe the jab wo Namaz se farig ho gaya to Huzoor ne is Qom se farmaya k Aaindah ye Shaqs Tum logo ko namaaz na padaye,*

*Huzoor ke Mumaniyat k Baad is ne Namaz padane chahi (To) logo ne (is ko) Rok deya aur Rasool Allah ﷺ k Hukm se is ko Aagah keya (to phir is) Shaqs Mazkoor ne ye baat Huzoor se Daryaaf ke to Aap ne farmaya k Ha me ney Mana keya Hai,*

*Rawi e Hadees Hazrat Saib رضي الله تعالي عنه kehte Hai mere khayal me Huzoor ne ye bhi farmaya k Tune Allah wa Rasool ko Ezyat de aur un ko sataya...!*
? [ Mishqat sharef safa 71 ]

?To jis tarha Kaba e Muazma Hamare nigaho k samne Nahi Hai magar us ke Tazeem karna Ham par zaroori Hai ishi Tarha Agar'che Ham Huzoor syed e Aalam ﷺ ko Nahi dekh pate Magar un ke Tazeem karna Ham par Wajib wa Lazim Hai.......!!!
? [ Fatawa e faiz Al•Rasool jild 2 safa 608 se 610 tak ]

*? MASLA :* Huzoor syed e Aalam ﷺ aur degar Anambiya e kiraam k naam k sath Bajaye pura Darood ya salaam lekhne k sirf (s.a.w) neyz sahaba e kiraam aur Awliya e Azam k Naam k sath (R.z) aur (R.h) lekhna kesa Hai....?

*? AL'JAWAAB :* Huzoor fakhre Aalam ﷺ aur dusre Anambiya e kiraam Alayhim Assalato wa Assalaam k mubarak Namo k sath Bajaye pura Darood ya salaam key sirf (Yani is tarha (s.a.w) ya (s.l.m) lekhna Agar shan e Anambiya key Taqfeef k leye Ho to kufr Hai

?Allama syed Tehtavi Hashiya durre mukhtaar me farmate Hai fatawa Tatar kha'niya se mankool Hai من كتب یلي اصلاة و اسلام بالهذة والميم يكفر لانه قخفيق وقخفيف الانبياكفر Yani jo Anambiya e kiraam Alahy salato wa salaam k naam me Alahy salaam key jagah (short darood sharef s.a.w) lekhe to kafir ho jayega Qki..

*Esa lekhna un ke shan ko Halka karna Hai aur ye Yaqeenan Kufr Hai aur Agar sirf kahile Nadani aur jahalat se Esa keya to kufr Nahi Magar Haram aur Najaiz Zaroor Hai..*

? ise Tarha sahaba e kiraam aur Awliya Aazem رضي الله تعالي عنہم k mubarak Namo k sath (R.z) aur (R.h) bhi lekhna Nahi chahiye k ullma e kiraam ne Makroh aur Bais Mehrumi Bataya Hai.

Chunan'che Allama syed Tehtavi farmate Hai يكره الامزباالترضّ بالكتابة yani Razi Allahu ta'ala Anhun key jagah (R.z) lekhna Makroh Hai aur Bahare shariyat safa 295 me Hai Aqsar log Darood sharef k Badle (s.a.w) lekh dete Hai ye Najaiz aur sakht Haraam Hai. Yu hi Razi Allahu Ta'ala Anhu ke jagah (R.z) aur Rehmatullah ta'ala Alahy ke jagah (R.h) lekhte Hai ye bhi Na chahiye......!!!
? [ Fatawa e Faiz Al'Rasool jild.1 safa 137 ]

✍MAIDANE MAHSHAR MULKE SHAAM KI ZAMEEN PAR QAAYAM HOGA
US DIN ZAMEEN ITNI HAMWAAR AUR SAAF SUTHRI HOGI KI
US MAIDAN KA 1 KINAARA DUSRE KINAARE SE SAAF DIKHAYI DEGA.

US DIN ZAMEEN TAAMBE KI HOGI
AUR SOORAZ ZAMEEN SE SIRF 1 MEEL KI DOORI PAR HOGA.

US DIN 50,000 BARAS KA 1 DIN HOGA
US DIN DHOOP AUR TAPISH SE KHUDA KI PANAAH.

SARO ME BHEJE KHOULTE HONGE
PYAAS KI SHIDDAT KA YEH AALAM HOGA KI ZUBAANE SOOKH KAR KAATA HO JAYEGI
AUR KISI KISI KI ZABAANE BAAHAR NIKAL PADI HOGI,

IS KASRAT SE PASEENA NIKLEGA KI
KISI KE TAKHNO TAK
KISI KE GHUTNO TAK
KISI KI KAMAR TAK
AUR KOI APNE PASEENO ME DUBKIYA LAGATA HOGA,

IN TAKLEEFO AUR MUSIBATO KE SAATH BE'KSI W BE'BASI KA YEH HAAL HOGA KI KOI KISI KA PURSAANE HAAL NAHI HOGA.

*Aur Mujahir wo kafir Hai k Aylaniya kalma e islaam ka inkaar karta Ho. Is key char (4) kisme Hai. Awwal (1) Deharya Doam (2) Mushriq Aur soam (3) Majusi. in sab ka zabiha murdaar Hai.*

*?Aur chaharm (4) kitabi Ye bhi Agar che kalma e islaam Ka Aylaniya inkaar karta Magar is ka Zabiha Halaal Hai, is wajah se K Allah Azzwajal Ne farmaya. وَطَعَامُالَّذِينَ اُوتُو الِكتَبَ حِلُّ لّكُم Aur Hazrat ibn Abbas رضي الله تعالي عنه ne is Aayat e Karema ke Tafseer me farmaya.طعامھم ذبيحتھم To Aayat e mubariqa ka khulasa ye Huwa k kitabiyo ka zabiha Tumhare leye Halaal Hai*

*(Q) k Zebah karne wale ka kese Aasmani kitaab par Imaan Rakhna shart Hai Lehaza kitabi ne Agar musalmaan k samne Zebah kiya Ho aur ye Maloom Ho k Allah ka Naam le Kar Zebah keya Hai to is ka Zabiha Halaal Hai..*

*❗Aur Agar zebah karte Watq Hazrat (Esa) Maseh ya Hazrat Uzair عليه السلام ka naam leya ho aur Musalmaan k ilm me ye baat Ho to zabiha murdaar Hai, Aur Agar Musalmaan tha phir kitabi Hua to is ka zabiha Bhi murdaar Hai (Q) k wo murtad Hai Aanya me Hai...*

*ومن شرط الذبح ان يكون الذابح صاحب ملة التوحيدامااعتقادًا كالمسلم اور عوى كا لكتابى فانه يدعى ملّة التوحيلد وانما تحل ذبيحته اذالم يذكر وقت الذبح اسم عُذير والمِسيح لقوله تعالى ومااهل به لغير الله*

*Aur Murtad wo kafir Hai k Kalma'go Ho kar kufr kare is key bhi 2 Qisme Hai, Mujahir wa Munafiq,*

*Murtad Mujahir wo Hai k pehle Musalmaan tha phir Aylaniya islaam se phir gaya Yani Dehriya, mushriq Majusi ya kitabi wagerah kuch bhi Ho gaya.,*

➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖

*?Jesa k Makka e MuAzma, Madina e Tayyaba, pakistan, Hindustaan, Bangaal aur Barma wagerah k Sekdo ullma e kiraam wa Muftiya e Aazaam k fatawae wahabiyo k Murtad Hone k Bare me Hisamul Harmeen aur Alsuwaram Al'Hindiya me Shaya Ho chuke Hai aur Murtad Ahkaam e Dunya me sab Kafiro se Badtareen k Mustahiq Qatal Hai is sey Jazya Nahi leya ja sakta aur is ka Niqah Muslim, kafir ya murtad kese se Nahi ho sakta jis se Hoga Mehaz Zina Hoga.صرح فى الكتب الفقهية...*
➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖

*?Aur Murtad ka zabiha is wajah se haram wa Murdaar Hai k wo Kalma'go ho kar kufr Karta Hai zaror'Yaat e Deen me sey kese ka inkaar Karta Hai phir Agarche wo kitabi Ho jaye k is ka zabiha Murdaar Hai, K Deen e islaam chod kar jis Deen ke Taraf wo chala Gaya us par bhi Ese sabit Na mana jayega Yani khuah kese millat ka Dawah kare Murtad ka Dawah bekar Hai...!*

*Hidaaya me Hai....*
*لاتوکل زبيحة المجوسى و المرتد لانه لاملّةله فانه لايُقر على ماانتقل اليه*

*TABRAANI KABEER ME BAZZAAR IBNE UMAR RADIYALLAHU TAALA ANHUMA SE RAAWI KAHTE HAI MAI MASJIDE MINAA ME NABI ﷺ KEE KHIDMAT ME HAAZIR THA*
*AEK (1) ANSAARI AUR AEK (1) SAQFEE NE HUZOOR ﷺ KEE KHIDMAT ME HAAZIR HO KAR SALAAM ARZ KIYA*
*FIR KAHA YAA RASOOLULLAH HAM KUCH POOCHNE KE LIYE HUZOOR KEE KHIDMAT ME HAAZIR HUE HAI*
*HUZOOR NE FARMAYA AGAR TUM CHAHO TO MAI BATAA DOO KI KYA POOCHNE AAYE HO*
*AUR AGAR TUM CHAHO TO MAI KUCH N KAHOO*
*TUMHI SAWAAL KARO*
*ARZ KEE YAA RASOOLULLAH HAME BATA DIJIYE*
*HUZOOR NE IRSHAD FARMAYA::--*
*TOO IS LIYE HAAZIR HUA HAI KI GHAR SE NIKAL KAR BAITUL HARAM (Qa'aba shareef) KE IRADE SE JAANE KO MUJHSE POOCHE AUR YAH KI USME TERE LIYE KYA SAWAAB HAI*
*AUR TAWAAF KE BAAD DO (2) RAK'ATE PADHNE KO AUR YAH KI USME TERE LIYE KYA SAWAAB HAI*
*AUR SAFA AUR MARWA KE DARMIYAAN SAI KO AUR YAH KI USME TERE LIE KYA SAWAAB HAI*
*AUR ARFA KEE SHAAM KE WUQOOF KO AUR TERE LIYE USME KYA SAWAAB HAI*
*AUR JAMAAR KEE RAMEE KO AUR USME TERE LIE KYA SAWAAB HAI*
*AUR QURBAANI KARNE KO AUR USME TERE LIE KYA SAWAAB HAI*
*AUR USKE SAATH TAWAAFE IFAAZA KO,,*
*US SHAKHS NE ARZ KEE QASAM HAI US ZAAT KEE JISNE HUZOOR KO HAQ KE SAATH BHEJA*
*ISILIYE HAAZIR HUA KI IN BAATO KO HUZOOR SE DARYAAFT KAROO*
*IRSHAD FARMAYA::--*
*JAB TOO BAITUL HARAM KE QASD SE GHAR SE NIKLEGA TO OONT KE HAR QADAM RAKHNE AUR HAR QADAM UTHANE PAR TERE LIYE NEKI LIKHI JAYEGI AUR TERI KHTAA MITA DEE JAYEGI*
*AUR TAWAAF KE BAAD KEE DO (2) RAK'ATE AESI HAI JAISE AULADE ISMAAIL ME KOI GULAM HO ISKE AAZAAD KARNE KA SAWAAB*
*AUR SAFAA AUR MARWA KE DARMIYAAN SAI SATTAR (70) GULAM AAZAAD KARNE KEE MISL HAI*
*AUR ARFA KE DIN WUQOOF KARNE KA HAAL YAH HAI KI ALLAH TAALA AASMAANE DUNIYA KEE TARAF KHAAS TAJALLI FARMATA HAI AUR TUMHARE SAATH MALAAIKA PAR MUBAAHAAT (Fakhr) FARMATA HAI*

*MERE BANDO WAAPAS JAAO TUMHARI MAGFIRAT HO GAI AUR USKI JISKI TUM SHAFA'AT KARO*
*AUR JAMRO PAR RMEE KARNE ME HAR KANKRI PAR AEK (1) AESA KABEERA GUNAAH MITA DIYA JAYEGA JO HALAAK KARNE WAALA HAI*
*AUR QURBAANI KARNA TERE RAB KE HUZOOR TERE LIYE ZAKHEERA HAI*
*AUR SAR MUNDANE ME HAR BAAL KE BADLE ME NEKI LIKHI JAYEGI AUR AEK (1) GUNAAH MITAYA JAYEGA*
*USKE BAAD KHAANAE QA'ABA KE TAWAAF KA YAH HAAL HAI KI TOO TAWAAF KAR RAHA HAI AUR TERE LIYE KUCH GUNAAH NAHI AEK (1) FARISHTA AAYEGA AUR TERE SHAANO KE DARMIYAAN HAATH RAKH KAR KAHEGA KI AANE WAALE ZAMAANA ME AMAL KAR AUR GUZRE HUE ZAMAANA ME JO KUCH KIYA THA MAAF KAR DIYA GAYA,,*
