*IMAM MUSLIM O BETE RAWANA*
*OR KOOFIYON KI BE-WAFAAI*

★ Hazrate Muslim apne 2 kam-umr bachchon k saath Imaame Husen k numaainde ban kar koofa rawaana ho gaye aur ye tay huwa k haalaat achche rahe to khat ( letter ) likenge..khat milne k baad hi Imaame Husen koofaa jayenge..
★ Jab Aap koofa pohnche to log chaaron taraf se bade josh aur aqidat se Aap k haath par bay-at karne lage..Yahan tak k aik week k andar 12000 koofiyon ne Aap k haath par Imaame Husen ki bay-at ki..
*Ye haalaat dekh kar Imam Muslim ne Imaam Husen ko khat likh diya k koofa k log apni baat mein sachche hai Aap jaldi tasriif le aaein..*
Hazrat Nomaan bin bashir sahaabi e Rasool us waqt koofa k governor the..Wo mimbar par chadhe aur kaha..Logo ye bay-at yaziid ki marzi k khilaaf hai aur is baat par wo bhadkega aur fitna aur fasaad bhadkaaega..
Banu umaiya k abdullah ne Aap ko kaha k ye maamla sakhti k baghair hal nahi hoga aap kamzor hai..Aap ne kaha k..
*Agar mein Allah ki farma-bardaari k saath kamzor hun to muje manzur hai..Aur izzat aur taaqat wala banne k liye Allah ki naa-farmani karun ye muje manzoor nahi..*
★ Banu umaiya k is fard ne yaziid ko khat likh diya..K agar koofa ko bachaana chaahta hai to kisi sakht aadmi ko haakim bana kar bhej..ye Nomaan to kamzor hai ya kamzori dikha rahe hai..
*Yaziid palid ko khabar hui to gazab-naak huwa aur ubaidullah ibne ziyaad ko koofa ka haakim bana kar bheja aur kaha k..Muslim bin Aqiil ko sheher se tadipaar kar do aur na maane to qatal kar do..Aur Husen bin Ali aaye to un se bhi bayat maango aur na maane to un ko bhi qatal kar do..*
★ Ubaidullah ibne ziyaad ayse raaste se koofa mein daakhil huwa jis raaste par koofa waale Imaame Husen k muntazir the..
Us ne chehra chhupa liya aur sheher mein daakhil huwa koofa waale Imaame Husen samaj kar naare pukaarne lage..kuch duur chal kar logon ko pata chala k ye to ibne ziyaad hai to log maayus huwe apne gharon mein waapas chale gaye..
★ Subha ibne ziyaad ne logon ko jama kiya or kaha k yaziid ne muje koofa ka governor bana kar bheja hai to tum yaziid ki hukumat k khilaaf na jao to amaan mein rahoge aur khilaaf jaoge to darwaaze par tumhari laashein latkegi aur tumhaare biwi bachchon par rahem nahi kiya jaayega..
Fir us ne sheher k sarkardah logon k sab khandanon k aik aik sardaar ko bula kar un se likhwaaya k ham kisi bhi hukumat k mukhaalif ko apne ghar mein panah nahi denge aur jo aysa karega to qatal kar diya jayega.
★ *Ibne ziyaad ki is harkat se pure sheher k logon par khauf aur dar chha gaya..aur logon k khayalaat badalne lage..*
Aur ye haalat dekh kar Hazrate Muslim raat k andhere mein Ahle bait k chahane waale k ghar sift ho gaye jin ka naam Haani bin Urwah tha.
*ALLAHUAKBAR*
Ridwaanullahi taala anhum ajmaiin

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr al-Shibli rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr al-Shibli rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Taaj-ul-Auliya, Qutb-ul-Aarifeen.

**************
Aap ki wilaadat 247 Hijri (861 A.D.) me Samarra (Iraq) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Younus hai.

Aap ke pariwaar ka watan Khorasan ka Shibla gaanv tha.

Aap ka bachpan Baghdad me guzra.

**********
Aap 30 saal tak Hadeeṡ aur Fiq'h ki ta’aleem haasil karte rahe.
Aap ne Hazrat Imaam Maalik ki ‘Muwatta’ ko hifz kiya.

************
Aap Nihawand ke governer the. Ek baar Khalifa ne apne tamaam governer ko apne mahel me ek mehfil me bulaaya jis me wo apne ek khaas aur qareebi shakhs ko ek ilaake ka governor ka ohada dene wala tha. Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr al-Shibli bhi is mehfil me saamil hue. Khalifa ne us shakhs ko governer ka qeemati kapda diya. Us naye governer ko jukhaam ho jaane ki wajah se jaldi me use apna naak saaf karne ke liye us qeemati kapda istemaal karna pada. Khalifa yeh dekhkar ghussa ho gaya. Use laga ke ye meri tauheen hai aur us ne foran use governer ke ohade se barkhaasht kar diya.
Aap ne yeh sab dekha to foran khayaal aaya ke “Ek chhoti si galti ki wajah se khalifa ne is shakhs ko governer ke ohade se mehroom kar diya. Aur hum to Maalik e Kaa'inaat Rabbul aalameen ki na-farmaani karte rehte hain aur gunaah karte rehte hain.”
Aap governer ka ohada chhodkar durwesho ki sohbat me rehne lage. Aap ne bahot saare Soofi mashaa'ikh ki sohbat me rehkar faiz haasil kiya.
Aakhir me aap Hazrat Khair-un-Nassaaj rahmatullāhi alaihi ke shaagird bane. Kuchh arse tak un ki sohbat me taaleem haasil karne ke baad un ke farmaan par aap Hazrat Junaid al-Baghdadi rahmatullāhi alaihi ki baargaah me gaye. Unho ne aap ko kai saal tak apni sohbat me rakhkar taaleem mukammal ki.

Hazrat Junaid al-Baghdadi Aap se bahot mohabbat karte the.

***********
Aap Waaqif-e-Rumooz-e-Khafi wa Jali the.

Aap hamesha saadgi pasand farmaate the aur akṡar waqt tanhai me guzaarte.
Aap puri raat jaagkar Ibaadat o Riyaazat karte.

************
Ek baar Aap ne wuzu ke waqt miswaak talaash kiya magar na mila. Aap ne 1 deenaar kharch karke dusra mishwaak khareeda. Logo ne kaha “Aap ne mishwaak itna mahenga kyun khareeda?” Aap ne farmaaya “Yeh dunya aur us ki har cheez ALLĀH ta’ala ke nazdeek machchhar ke baraabar bhi nahi hai. Agar qayaamat ke din ALLĀH mujh se sawaal kare ke Tum ne mere mehboob sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ki sunnat ko kyun chhoda, maine jo maal tumhe ata kiya tha us ki qeemat machchhar ke baraabar bhi nahi thi phir tum ne use sunnat ada karne ke liye kyun kharch nahi kiya to main kya jawaab dunga?”

*************
Hazrat Abu Bakr ibn Mujaahid apne zaamane ke bahot bade wali aur imaam hain. Aap ki taqreer sunne ke liye bahot badi ta’adaad me ulama jama hote the. Ek martaba Hazrat Abu Bakr Shibli un ki mehfil me pahunche to wo foran adab ke saath khade ho gaye. Aur phir aage aakar mohabbat ke saath aap se gale mile aur aap ki paishaani ko chuma. Yeh dekhkar mehfil me se ek shakhs ne khade hokar arz kiya “Huzoor! Aap ne is shakhs ki ta’azeem wa takreem kyum ki?” Hazrat Abu Bakr ibn Mujaahid ne farmaaya “Aye logo! Maine is ke saath wo hi kiya hai jo Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ko is ke saath karte dekha tha.” Phir aap ne aage farmaaya “Ek baar maine khwaab me dekha ki Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ki mubarak mehfil saji hui hai. Aur jab Hazrat Abu Bakr Shibli mehfil me tashreef laaye to Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam khade ho gaye aur aage aakar un ki peshaani ko chuma. Maine arz kiya : ‘Ya Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihu wa sallam, Aap in se itni zyada mohabbat ke saath sulook kyun kar rahe hain?’ Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ne farmaaya : ‘Yeh har namaaz baad "Laqad jaa’akum rasoolum" aur "Fa'in tawallaw fa hasbiyallāh" (Surah al-Taubah, Aayat 128-129) tilaawat karta hai aur phir 3 martaba ‘Sallallāhu alaika Ya Rasool-Allāh’ padhta hai.”

****************
Aqwaal :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap irshaad farmaate hain :
(1) Yeh dunya ek aisa bartan hai jis me paani ubal raha hai aur jo us ki khubsurti kharaab kar raha hai.

(2) Apne sha'oor par qaaboo rakhna aur apni saanso ki hifaazat karna Tasawwuf ki haqeeqat hai.

(3) Kisi ne Aap ko Tasawwuf ke baare me puchha to aap ne farmaaya ‘Apne dil ko makhlooq aur dunyaawi cheezo se door karke Khaaliq e kaa'inaat ki taraf pher dena ye 'Tasawwuf' hai.’

(4) Khuda shanaas kabhi Khuda ke siwa kisi se nahi milta aur jo aisa karte hain woh Khuda ko hargiz nahi paa sakte.
Aarif wo hi hai jo na to Khuda ke siwa kisi ka mushaahida kare, na kisi se mohabbat aur baat kare aur na kisi ko apne nafs ka muhaafiz tasawwur kare.

(5) ALLĀH ta’ala ki mohabbat aag jaisi hai. Jis tarah aag har cheez ko pighla deti hai usi tarah ALLĀH ki mohabbat ki aag dil ko jalaaye to us ki nishaani ke taur par aankho se aansoo aane chaahiye.

(6) Bure logo ki sohbat ki nahusat se nek bando ke baare me bad gumaani (galat khayaal) paida hoti hai.

*************
Aap Hazrat Shaikh Junaid al-Baghdadi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Shaikh Abul Fazl Abdul Azeez bin Haariṡ Yemeni al-Tameemi rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(2) Hazrat Shaikh Abul Hasan Neemalam al-Husri rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(3) Hazrat Shaikh Muhammad Zojjaaj rahmatullāhi alaihi.

************
Aap ka wisaal 27 Zil Hijjah 334 Hijri (946 A.D.) ko Shabe Jum’aa ke 87 saal ki umr me hua.

Aap ka mazaar Khayrazan, Baghdad (Iraq) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr al-Shibli rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Buzurgaan e Deen Ya Aqabir Aulema ka Inteqal Ho Jaaye
Content:
To Kya Unki Pakki Yaa Unchi Mazaar Bana Sakte Hai.

Aur Koi Naa Ahl Ya Bad'Mazhab iss Hawale Se Dalil Mange.

To Kya Dalil Pesh Ki Jaaye?

Jawab:

Qabrein Ek Hath Unchi Karne Ki Ijazat Hai, Ke Maloom Ho Ke Wo Qabr Hai.

Aur Be Adabi Ya Tauheen Na Ho.

Ma'zam e Deeni Ke Liye Kisi Buzurg Ki Qabr Ko Pukhta Karne Me Harj Nahi.

Title: Makka Muazzama Aur Madina Tayyaba Mein Nazil Hone wali sabse pehli aur aakhiri Suratein kaun kaun si hain?
Content:
Jawab:

Makka Mukarrama meiñ nazil hone wali sabse pehli surat "Iqra" aur Sabse Aakhiri surat "Mominon" hai. Baaz ne "Ankaboot" ko akhiri surat kaha hai. Aur madina Munawwara meiñ nazil hone wali sabse pehli surat "Wailul-lil-Mutaffifeen" aur akhiri sur: "Bara'at" hai.

Ibne Hajr ne apni Kitaab "Sharah Bukhari" meiñ likha hai ki sur: Baqarah pehli surat hai jo Madina meiñ nazil hui aur Tafseer nafsi meiñ Baqadi ki riwayat hai ki pehli surat jo Madina meiñ nazil hui woh sur: Qadr hai.

Title: Hazrat Imaam Sayyed Ja’afar al-Saadiq rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Imaam Sayyed Ja’afar al-Saadiq rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Saadiq (Truthful), Faazil (Virtuous), Taahir (Pure).

*************
Aap ki wilaadat 17 Rabi’ ul Awwal 83 Hijri (20 April 702 A.D.) ko Madeena me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Imaam Sayyed Muhammad al-Baaqir bin Imaam Zainul aabideen Sayyed Ali al-Aswat rahmatullāhi alaihi aur waalida ka naam Hazrat Umme Farwah, Faatima bint Hazrat Qaasim bin Muhammad bin Abu Bakr Siddeeq rahmatullāhi alaihi hai.

Aap Husaini saadaat hain.

**************
Aap ne apne daada Imaam Zainul aabideen aur waalid Imaam Muhammad al- Baaqir ke paas Qur’an aur Hadeeṡ aur Tafseer ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Aap Hadeeṡ, Tafseer Fiq'h (Islamic jurisprudence), Falsafa (Philosophy), Ilm e kalaam (Theology), Ilm e Riyaazi (Mathematics), Ilm e Hai'at wa falaq (Astronomy), Ilme Tashreeh (Anatomy), Ilm e Keemiya (Alchemy) aur dusre uloom me maahir hue.

**************
114 Hijri (733 A.D.) me Aap apne waalide mohtaram ke intiqaal ke baad 31 baras ki umr me Imaam bane.
Aap Aa'imma e Ahle bait ke chhathe (6th) Imaam hain.

**************
Aap Masjid e Nabawi me ta’aleem wa tadrees karte the.
Aap ne Tijaarat (commerce), Miraaṡ [Wiraṡat] (inheritance) aur Zakaat aur dusre bahot saare masaa'il ke hal bataaye.

**************
Aap ka ilm, husn e akhlaaq, sakhaawat, saadgi aur ibaadat mash'hoor hai.

**************
Ek din kisi shakhs ki deenaar ki thaili kho gai to us ne Hazrat Imaam Ja’afar Saadiq rahmatullāhi alaihi par shak karke iljaam lagaate hue kaha ‘Meri thaili aap hi ne churaai hai.’
Aap ne us se puchha ke ‘Us me kitni raqam thi?’
Us ne kaha ‘2000 deenaar.’
Aap ghar ke andar tashreef le gaye aur 2000 deenaar laakar use de diye.

Baad me jab us shakhs ko us ki khoi hui thaili kisi dusri jagah se mil gai. To us ne aakar pura qissa bayaan karke muafi maangi aur Aap se apni raqam waapas lene ki iltija ki. Magar aap ne farmaaya ke ‘Hum kisi ko dekar waapas nahi lete.’

Phir jab us ko logo se aap ka naam mubarak maaloom huwa to us ne behad nadaamat ka izhaar kiya.

**************
Ek baar Aap ne apne khaadim ko kisi kaam se bheja. Us ko waapas aane me bahot zyada der ho gai to aap us ko talaash karne ke liye nikle. Thodi door jaane par aap ne dekha ke wo khaadim ek maqaam par so raha hai aur use paseena ho raha hai. Aap use pankhe se hawa karne lage. Kuchh der baad jab wo jaaga aur Imaam ko pankha karte dekhkar sharminda hua. Aap ne us se kaha ‘Ghabhrao nahi. Magar ek baat yaad rakhna ki din ke waqt me kaam karna chaahiye aur raat ke waqt me sona chaahiye.’

**************
Ek baar Aap ne besh qeemati libaas pehna to ye dekhkar ek shakhs ne aap se kaha ‘Aye Aale Rasool, Itna qeemati libaas Ahle bait ko zeba nahi. Aap ne uska haath pakadkar aastin ke andar me rakha to us ne dekha ki aap ne niche taat jaisa khurdara libaas pehna tha.
Aap ne farmaaya ‘Ye khalq ke liye hai aur wo khaaliq ke liye hai.’

**************
Ek baar ek shakhs ne Aap se puchha ‘Kya aap mujhe Rabb ka deedaar kara sakte hain?’ Aap ne farmaaya ‘Tum sooraj ke saamne lagaatar dekhte raho.’
Wo kehne laga ‘Ye kaise mumkin hai?’ Aap ne farmaaya ‘Jab Rabb ta’ala ki makhlooq Sooraj ko dekh nahi sakte to phir sab ke khaaliq ka deedar kaise kar sakoge.’

**************
Ek martaba aap ne farmaaya “Ek Momin ke paas 4 cheeze honi chaahiye :
(1) Wasee (bada) ghar, (2) Achhi sawaari, (3) Achha libaas, (4) Aisa chiraagh jo us ke ghar ko roshan kar sake.”

Ek Shakhs ne arz kiya “Huzoor! Agar humare paas ye cheeze na ho to hum kya karen?”
Aap ne jawaab diya “Tum ne is ke zaahir ko dekha hai is ke baatin par gaur karo.
Wasee ghar se muraad Sabr hai, Behtareen sawaari insaan ki Aql hai, Sab se achha libaas Haya hai, Behtareen chiraag ilm hai jo Khuda ki bandagi wa ita'at sikhaata hai.”

**************
Aqwaal :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
(1) Agar namaaz padhne se hum gunaah aur bure kaamo se baaz aa jaayen to yeh samjho ki hamari namaaz qubool ho rahi hai.

(2) Agar tum izzat chaahte ho to Narmi ikhtiyaar karo aur agar zaleel hona chaahte ho Sakht bano.

(3) Ghussa har burai ki jad hai. Ghussa aqlmand insaan ko bhi barbaad kar deta hai.

(4) 3 nek amal Dunya me aur aakhirat me faa'ida dete hain :
Jis ne tumhare saath bura kiya ho use maaf kar do, Jo tumhe chhod gaya hai use milte raho aur jab tumhare saath jahaalat bhara bartav kiya jaaye to sabr karo.

(5) Jo chala gaya hai (ganwa diya hai) us ke baare me lagaataar socha mat karo kyun ki us ke baare me sochna tumhare dimaagh ko us (ke baare me sochne) se hata deta hai jo milne waala hai.

(6) Jo cheez ALLĀH ta’ala se hataakar dusri cheezon me mashgool kare un ko baghair kisi afsos ke tark karne ko Zohad kehte hain.

(7) Kisi neki ko maamooli na jaano, ke wo hi ALLĀH sub'hān wa ta’ala ki khushnudi ka baa'iṡ ho sakti ho.

(8) ALLĀH se agar kuchh maangna hai to Narm zubaan maango.

(9) Jab ALLĀH ta’ala tumhe koi ne'amat ata farmae aur tum use hamesha baaqi rakhna chaahte ho to us ka shukr ada karo kyun ki shukr ada karne waale ko ALLĀH ta’ala zyada ata farmaata hai.

(10) Tama (laalach) insaan ko zaleel karti hai aur us ke yaqeen ko kharaab karti hai.

(11) Ek bhuke mo’min aur us ke ghar waalo ko khaana khilaana, jis ke paas pehanne ke kapde na ho use kapde pehnaana aur us ek chehre ko bhik ki zillat se bachaana ye 70 ghulaamo ko aazaad karaana aur 70 Hajj karne se bhi zyada ALLĀH ko pasand hai.

(12) Jo shakhs kisi dusre ki parda-daari karta hai ALLĀH ta’ala us ke ghar ke posheeda haalaat ki parda-daari karta hai.

(13) Intiqaam lene ki salaahiyat hone ke bawajood bhi apne ghusse par qaabu rakhna ek azeem Jihaad hai.

(14) 4 qism ke insaan ki sohbat se bacho :
[1] Jaahil, kyun ki woh apni jahaalat se museebat me daal sakta hai.
[2] Jhut bolne waala, kyun ki woh kabhi bhi dhoka de sakta hai.
[3] Bakhil aur Laalachi, kyun ki woh apne matlab ke liye tumhe nuqsaan pahuncha sakta hai
[4] Bad-akhlaaq kyun ki woh museebat ke waqt tumhe madad nahi karega.

**************
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
(1) Ek martaba Aap Makkah mukarrama me ek gali se guzar rahe the. Aap ne dekha ki ek aurat aur us ke bache ro rahe the aur qareeb me ek gaaye murda padi thi. Aap ne us aurat se puchha ki ‘Tum aur tumhare bache kyun ro rahe hain?’ Us ne kaha ‘Huzoor! Mera aur mere bacho ka guzaara is gaaye ke doodh par tha. Yeh mar gai hai aur hum isi pareshaani aur gham ki wajah se ro rahe hain.’ Aap ne farmaaya ‘Kya tum chaahti ho ki ALLĀH ta’ala tumhari gaaye ko zinda kar de?’ Aurat ne kaha ‘Mujh par museebat padi hai aur aap aisi baat kar rahe hain.’ Imaam Ja’afar Saadiq ne Dua farmaai aur apne qadam se gaaye ko ek thokar maari aur woh zinda hokar khadi ho gai. Phir Aap tashreef le gaye.

(2) Abu Basheer bayaan karte hain ke ‘Main Madeena munawwara gaya hua tha. Ek din maine apni kaneez se sohbat ki aur ghusl ke liye jaa raha tha ki logo ka hujoom ek taraf jaate dekha to main bhi usi taraf chal diya, tamaam log Hazrate Imaam Ja’afar Saadiq ki baargaah me pahunchkar un ki ziyarat karne lage. Main bhi saamil ho gaya. Jab Hazrat ki nazar mujh par padi to farmaaya ‘Kya tumhe pata nahi ke Nabi aur nabi ki Aal ki baargaah me haalate janaabat me nahi aate?’ Ye sunkar mai hairaan reh gaya aur foran tauba ki aur aa'inda aisa na karne ka ahad kiya.

(3) Ek saahab ke dost ko Khalifa Mansoor ne qaid kar liya tha. Hajj ke mausam me maidaane Arafaat me us shakhs ki mulaaqaat Hazrat Imaam Ja’afar Saadiq se hui. Imaam ne us ke dost ke muta’alliq puchha. Us ne kaha ‘Huzoor! Wo abhi tak qaid me hai.’ Aap ne dua ki. Phir ek ghante ke baad farmaya ke ‘Khuda ki qasam. Tumhare dost lo aazaad kar diya gaya hai.’
Hajj se faarigh hokar jab wo shakhs waapas aaya to apne dost se puchha ke ‘Tumhari rihaai kis din hui?’ Us ne kaha ‘Arfaa ke din jab Haaji log maidaane Aarfaat me hote hain usi din mujhe chhod diya gaya.’

**************
Pariwaar :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki 2 biwiya aur 5 saahabzaade aur 3 saahabzaadiya hain.

(1) Bibi Faatima bint Husain Asram bin Hasan Muṡanna se
2 bete – Ismāeel al-Arij aur Abdullāh al-Aftaah.

(2) Hameeda Khaatoon se
3 bete – Moosā al-Kaazim, Muhammad al-Dibaaj aur Ali al-Uraizi.
3 betiya – Faatima, Umme Farwah, Asma.

**************
Aap ke shaagirdo me Imaam Abu Haneefa Nomaan ibn Ṡaabit, Imaam Maalik bin Anas, Hazrat Sufyaan Ṡauri, Hazrat Jaabir ibn Hayyaan, Qaazi Sukuni aur Qaazi Abul Bakhtari mash'hoor hain.

*************
Aap ko Hazrat Imaam Sayyed Mohammad al-Baaqir rahmatullāhi alaihi se ‘Alawi Husaini’ silsile ki aur Hazrat Qaasim bin Muhammad bin Abu Bakr Siddeeq rahmatullāhi alaihi se ‘Siddeeqi’ silsile ki Khilaafat mili hai.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Imaam Sayyed Moosā al-Kaazim rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(2) Hazrat Khwaja Baayazeed Bastami rahmatullāhi alaihi.

**************
Umayya khalifa Hishaam ibn Abdul Malik ki hukoomat ke dauraan zulm ke khilaaf jab logo ne baghaawat karne ka faisla kiya to Aap ne un ko samjhaaya ki jung ke ilaawa dusra raasta ho to pehle wo aajmana chahiye.
Logo ne khalifa banaane ke liye kaha to Aap ne farmaaya ‘Mujhe hukoomat ki zaroorat nahi. Ye tamaam mulk ALLĀH ta’ala ka hai aur mere liye ye kaafi hai ki ALLĀH ta'ala ne mujhe izzat aur logo ke dilo par hukoomat ata farmai.’

Umayya hukoomat ke khilaaf awaam ki jung me aap ke chacha Hazrate Zaid, Yahyā ibne Zaid aur dusre kai rishtedaar aur azeez shaheed hue aur ba’az ko giraftaar karke saza di gai.

Is ke baad Hishaam ne Imaam ko giraftaar karke Damishq me rakha.

132 Hijri (750 A.D.) me as-Saffah ne Marwaan ibn Muhammad ko haraakar Abbaasi hukoomat shuru ki.
as-Saffah ne Imaam ko giraftaar karke nazar qaid karke rakha.

136 Hijri (754 A.D.) me al-Mansoor baadshaah bana to us ne Saadaat se bughz ki wajah se Aap ki mehfil aur taqreer par nazar rakhna shuru kiya aur logo ko Aap se milne se rokne laga.
Phir Imaam ko giraftaar karke Samarra (Iraq) me nazar qaid karke rakha.
Phir kuchh arse baad Aap ko Madeena laaya gaya.
Aakhir me al-Mansoor ke hukm se Aap ko zeher diya gaya.

**************
Aap ka wisaal 15 Rajab 148 Hijri (14 December 765 A.D.) ko Jum’aa ke roz hua.

Aap ka mazaar Jannatul Baqi, Madeena munawwara me hai.

**************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Imaam Sayyed Ja’afar al-Saadiq rahmatullāhi alaihi aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Qur'an ka nuzool kitni bar hau aur kab-kab?
Content:
Qur'an ka nuzool kitni bar hau aur kab-kab?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Qur'an Majeed Furqan e Hameed Ka Nuzool Do(2) bar hua:

1 • Ek bar pura Qur'an Lauhe Mehfooz se Aasmane Duniya ke(Baitul Mamoor) meiñ nazil kar diya gaya. Yeh nuzool e jazeel Lailatul Wadr meiñ hua.

2 • Doosri bar Rasool e Kareem Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ par thodi-thodi hasbe Haal Ya Hasbe Zaroorat Nazil hota raha. Teis (23) saal meiñ yeh nuzool mukammal hua.

? *Al Atqan Fee Ulumul Qur'an Jild 1, Safa 35*

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Qur'an ka nuzool, Injeel ke kitne Saal Baad hua?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Qur'an Kareem Hidayat e Azeem Ka Nuzool Injeel ke Teen Sau Aath (308) Saal Ya Sath Sau (700) Ya Paanch Sau (500) Saal baad hua.

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Azeez urfe Urjun Shaah Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Azeez urfe Urjun Shaah Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Shehanshaah-e-Petlad, Suharwardi Dulha.

************
Aap ka watan Ferghana (Uzbekistan) hai.

Aap Wali e Ba-Safa the.

7wi sadi Hijri (13wi sadi Eiswi) me Aap tabligh e islaam ke liye Hindustan tashreef laaye. Aur Damoh (Madhya Pradesh) me qayaam kiya aur phir waha se Petlad (Gujarat) tashreef laaye aur sukoonat pazeer hue.
Aur logo ko ta’aleem wa faiz ata farmaate rahe.

Aap Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

************
Aap ka wisaal 17 Rajab 633 Hijri (March 1236 A.D.) ko Peer ke roz hua.

Aap ka mazaar Petlad (Gujarat) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Azeez urfe Urjun Shaah Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Ghaazi Saalaar Mas'ood rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Ghaazi Saalaar Mas'ood rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Sultaan-ush-Shohada fil Hind, Baala Peer.

*************
Aap ki wilaadat 21 Rajab 405 Hijri (15 January 1015 A.D.) ko Itwaar ko Subah saadiq ke waqt Ajmer me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Ghaazi Saalaar Saahoo Daawūd bin Ata-ullāh aur waalida ka naam Sitr-e-Mu'alla binte Sultaan Naasir-ud-deen Sabuktigin hai.

Aap Hazrat Muhammad ibn al-Hanafiyyah bin Ali al- Murtaza rahmatullāhi alaihi ki nasl se hain.

Aap Sultaan Mahmood Ghaznawi ke bhaanje hain.

Jab Raay Somkaran aur 40 Raajao ne ek bahot bade lashkar ke saath Ajmer ko gher liye to Sultaan Mahmood Ghaznawi ne Aap ke waalid Hazrat Ghaazi Saalaar Saahu ko Ajmer ke Governer Muzaffar Khan ki imdaad ke liye bheja.
Ajmer ki yeh muhim kaamyaab hone ke baad jab amn o sukoon ka maahol ho gaya to 8 Shawwaal 404 Hijri ko Aap ki waalida bhi Ghazni se Ajmer aa gai.

Aap ki wilaadat ke kuchh waqt baad mufsido aur shareero ne Kahilar ar hamla kya to Sultaan Mahmood Ghaznawi ke farmaan par Aap ke waalid lashkar ke saath Ajmer se Kahilar gaye. Kalihar me fateh ke baad Sultaan Mahmood Ghaznawi ne un ko Kalihar ki jaagir ata ki aur unho ne apni biwi aur saahabzaade ko bhi Kalihar bula liya aur waha sukoonat pazeer hue.

**********
Aap ne Hazrat Sayyed Ibrāheem Barah Hazari se ta’aleem haasil ki. 9 saal ki umr tak Hazrtat ne Aap ko zaahiri aur baatini uloom se muzayyan kar diya.

10 saal ki umr se Aap ne Qur’an majeed ki Tilaawat aur Namaaze Ishraaq w Chasht paabandi se ada karna shuru kar diya,
Aap hamesha Ba-wuzu rehte the.

**********
417 Hijri (1026 A.D.) Sultaan Mahmood Ghaznawi ne jab Somnath par hamla kiya tab Aap 11 saal ki umr me un ke saath saamil hue. Somnath fateh hone ke baad Sultaan Ghazni waapas laut gaye. Magar Aap barr-e sagheer me hi rook gaye.

Aur 422 Hijri (May 1031 A.D.) me Aap Meer Husain Arab aur Ameer Vazeed Ja’afar ke saath 1,00,000 sipaahiyo aur 50,000 ghode ka lashkar lekar jihaad ke liye Hindustan ki taraf rawaana hue. Yaha Saalaar Saif-ud-deen, Meer Bakhtiar, Sayyed Azeez-ud-deen and Malik Bahr-ud-deen ka lashkar bhi Aap ke lashkar ke saath saamil hua.

Miyan Rajab aur Saalaar Saif-ud-deen ne Brahmarchi (Bahraich) ki taraf aage badhe. Ameer Hasan Arab ne Mahona ko aur Malik Fazal ne Varanasi ko fateh kiya. Sultaan-us-Salaateen aur Meer Bakhatiar Kannor se aage gaye. Meer Bakhtiar kaafiro se jung karte hue shaheed ho gaye.
Saalaar Saahu ne Karra and Manikpur ko fateh kiya. Aur Karra me Malik Abdullāh ko naa'ib banaaya aur Manikpur me Qutub Haidar ko naa'ib banaaya. Sayyed Azeez-ud-deen ko Hardoi ki taraf bheja magar Gomti nadi ke kinaare Gopamau me jung me wo shaheed ho gaye.

Meerut, Kannauj aur Malihabad hote hue Aap Satrikh pahunche. Waha se Aap ne Meerut aur Ujjain par chadhaai ki. Magar waha ke raajao ne suleh kar li. Is ke baad Saket ko fateh kiya.

Phir Aap Ayodhya ki taraf rawaana hue. Zaidpur, Baba Bazar aur Rudauli hote aap Raunahi pahunche. Yaha se Aap ek gaanv me pahunche jo haal me Salarpur ke naam se mash'hoor hai.
Phir Aap ne Brahmarchi (Bahraich) ki taraf kooch karne ka iraada kiya. Brahmarchi Balark Mandir naam ka Surya Mandir tha. Jaha par bauli aur Surya Kund tha. Aur is mandir ko Hindu bahot maante the.

Hindu raajao ko jab is baat ka pata chala to Rai Raib, Rai Saib, Rai Arjun, Rai Bheekhan, Rai Kanak, Rai Kalyan, Rai Makaru, Rai Savaru, Rai Aran, Rai Birbal, Rai Jaypal, Rai Shreepal, Rai Harpal, Rai Hakru, Rai Prabhu, Rai Deo Narayan aur Rai Narsinha naami 17 raajao ne milkar muqaabala karne ke liye tayyaari ki. Bais Rajput, Arkawanshi kshatriya, Kalhans Rajput, Raikwars aur Bhar kabeele ne bhi saath diya. Baad me Rai Sahar Dev aur Rai Hardev bhi saamil hue. Sravasti ke Raja Suheldev ki sardaari me tamaam Kshatriya jama hue. Aur Ghaazi Sayyed Saalaar Mas'ood ko paighaam bheja gaya ke Ye ilaaqa Hinduo ka hai aur Aap yaha se waapas laut jaao. Magar Aap ne jawaab me farmaaya ke ‘Tamaam mulk ALLĀH hi ka hai aur is liye main kufr ko door karne ka kaam chhodkar yaha se jaa nahi sakta.’

13 Rajab 424 Hijri (13 June 1032 A.D.) ko Kshatriya lashkar ne hamla kiya aur Aap ke lashkar ko gher liya. 2 din ki Jung me Aap ke tamaam saathi shaheed ho gaye aur aakhir me dusre din shaam ko Aap bhi jung karte hue shaheed ho gaye.

***************
Aap Hazrat Shaikh Ala-ud-deen Husaini Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed hain.

***************
Aap ka wisaal 14 Rajab 424 Hijri (15 June 1033 A.D.) ko 18 saal ki umr me hua.

Aap ka mazaar Bahraich (Uttar Pradesh) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Ghaazi Saalaar Mas'ood rahmatullāhi alaihi aur Ahle bait aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur shohada ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Nasir-ud-deen Abu Yousuf Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Nasir-ud-deen Abu Yousuf Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap ki wilaadat 362 Hijri (972 A.D.) me Chisht me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Sayyed Shams-ud-deen Abu Nasr Muhammad Saamaan bin Sayyed Abu Jaa’far Ibrāheem aur waalida ka naam Bibi Khizmatullāh binte Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Abu Ahmad Abdaal Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi hai.

Aap Husaini saadaat hain.
Aur Hazrat Sayyed Abu Ibrāheem Abdullāh Ali Akbar bin Sayyed Imaam Hasan al-Askari rahmatullāhi alaihi ki nasl se hain.

Aap Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Abu Muhammad Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi ke bhaanje hain.

Aap ki waalida Waliya thi aur ibaadat me hi masroof rehti thi. Aur nikaah karna nahi chaahti thi magar jab hukm e ilāhi hua to unho ne nikaah kiya.

************
Aap Khwaja Sayyed Abu Muhammad Chishti ke mureed hue aur 40 saal tak Peer ki khidmat me rahe aur un se ta’aleem aur faiz haasil kiya.

************
Aap ki khwaahish thi ke Haafiz e Qur’an ho jaaun aur is ke liye koshish karte the.
Ek din Aap ke Peer o murshid Khwaja Sayyed Abu Muhammad Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi khwaab me tashreeef laaye aur farmaaya ‘100 martaba Surah al-Faatiha padho. Us ki barkat se Haafiz e Qur’an ho jaaoge.’
Chunanche bedaar hone ke baad aap ne wuzu kiya aur 100 martaba Surah al-Faatiha shareef padhi. Foran aap hafize Qur’an ho Gae aur ye shaan hui ke Rozaana 5 martaba Qur’an majeed mukammal farmaate the.

************
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
(1) Ek martaba sakht garmi ke mausam me aap apne hujra e mubarak se baahar tashreef laaye to Aap ke muta’alliqeen ne arz kiya ke ‘Huzoor! Aap ki dua ki barkat se agar is jagah thande paani ka chashma jaari ho jaaye to khalq e Khuda ko garmi se raahat mil jaaye.’
Aap ne foran apna Asaa mubarak ek patthar par maara to us se saaf shaffaaf thande paani ka chashma jaari ho Gaya. Tamaami logo ne paani piya, wuzu kiya aur ALLĀH ta’ala ka shukr ada kiya.

Wo Chashma abhi tak jaari hai. Garmi ke mausam me us ka paani khub Thanda ho jaata hai aur sardiyo ke mausam me Motadil (Na zyada thanda na zyaada garm) ho jaata hai. Niz us chashme par jaakar log aap ke waseele se Dua karte hain aur ALLĀH ta’ala apne karam se un ki haajaten puri farmaata hai.

(2) Aap ke makaan ke saamne patthar ki ek chattaan thi. Aap aksar us chattaan par baitha karte the aur ibaadat karte the.
Ek din jab Aap us chattaan se utarkar chalne lage to wo chattaan bhi Aap ke saath chalne lagi. Ye ajeeb baat dekhkar kaafi ta’adaad me log jama ho gaye aur pichhe chalne lage. Aap ne jab logo ki bhid dekhi to chattaan ko hukm diya ke ‘Usi jagah thaher jaa.’ Chattaan usi jagah thaher gai aur aaj tak wahi maujood hai.
Us ke baad aap aksar usi chattaan par Hazrta Khizr alaihis salaam ke saath baithe hue paaye gaye. Aur kai baar us chattaan se is qadar noor nikalta tha ke pura gaanv roshan ho jaata tha. Log aaj bhi us Nooraani chattaan ki ziyarat ke liye jaate hain.

(3) EK martaba kuchh log masjid bana rahe the. Kuchh galti ki wajah se masjid ki chhat tayyaar ki gai thi wo thodi chhoti ban gai. Aap masjid ki deewaar par chadhe aur Bismillāh shareef padhkar chhat ko apne sar par rakha to wo chhat badi hokar sahi naap ki ban gai.

************
Aap Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Naasih-ud-deen Abu Mohammad Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) (Aap ke saahabzaade) Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Qutub-ud-deen Maudood Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(2) Hazrat Khwaja Soofi Abdullāh Ansaari al-Haarwi rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(3) Hazrat Khwaja Sultaan Sayyed Haaji Hud rahmatullāhi alaihi.

************
Aap ka wisaal 13 Rajab 459 Hijri (May 1067 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Chisht (Afghanistan) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Nasir-ud-deen Abu Yousuf Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae

Title: ✳Sawal Jawab✳ Holi ✳
Content:
_*✳Sawal Jawab✳ Holi ✳*_

Sawal:- karobar ki wajahse hindo customer ko diwali ya holi ya shadi per mubark bad de sakte hai.? Wo to hamari shadi me sharik hote hai. Hame eid ke moke per khass milne bhi aate hai aur mubark bad bhi dete hai. Esa koi rasta hai ke duniya aur samaj aur karobar me koi dushwari nahi aye aur shariyat se jaez bhi ho. Bara e karam rehnumai kare.

Jawaab:
Is Tarah Ke Muaamlaat jis me Kaafiro ke tahwaar manana pade aur Mubarakbaad deni pade Jaayez hi nahi.. Balke Agar uski Tazeem karte hue Mubarakbaad di to Muaamla kufr tak pahoch sakta hai ..

Sawal- Assalamoalaikum hazrat holi diwali jaise inke festival mein labour jo market mein roz hamali ka kaam karte hai woh log musalmanon ki dukaanon par paise maangne nikalte hai inke saal bhar kaam karne ka bonus jaisa kehta hai toh unko paise dena kaisa??

Hazrat rehnumayi farmaye

Jawaab:
Khas holi ki Mubarakbaad me ya khushi me unhe paise dena har giz jaayez nahi .. Mahez chutkaare aur fatne ke khadshe ko khatam karne ki niyyat se de de to harj nahi magar khas holi ke din na de

Ek Bhai Ka Sawal Hai:
Sawal
Bahut se log kehte hai holi ke din Kasrat se khajoor khani chahiye. aisa kahi se sabit hai hazart rehnumai farmaye?

Jawaab:
Khajoor acchi giza hai Us k khane me harj nahi magar khas holi ke din kasrat se khana kahin mazkoor nahi,

Sawal- AssalamuAlaikum.
Hazrat kuchh musalmano ko dosti yaari me kafir log rang zabardasti laga dete hain to uska kya hukm hai...??
Hindu ilaqon me to jis tarah eid ki mubarak baad hoti hai usi ko coppy karte huye sab k gharon me jakar zabardasti color lag rehe hai
Bura na mano holi keh kr.
Ispar kya hukm hai ?
Rehnumayi farmayein

Jawaab:
Holi rusoom e kuffaar se hai, Musalmano ka is me shamil hona haraam aur pasand karen to sareeh kufr hai. Lehaza kisi ko yu rang lagaane ki ijazat na de aur agar kisi ne zabardasti bhi laga diya to Taubah o istegfaar kare.

Sawal:- karobar ki wajahse hindo customer ko diwali ya holi ya shadi per mubark bad de sakte hai.? Wo to hamari shadi me sharik hote hai. Hame eid ke moke per khass milne bhi aate hai aur mubark bad bhi dete hai. Esa koi rasta hai ke duniya aur samaj aur karobar me koi dushwari nahi aye aur shariyat se jaez bhi ho. Bara e karam rehnumai kare.

Jawaab:
Is Tarah Ke Muaamlaat jis me Kaafiro ke tahwaar manana pade aur Mubarakbaad deni pade Jaayez hi nahi.. Balke Agar uski Tazeem karte hue Mubarakbaad di to Muaamla kufr tak pahoch sakta hai ..

Sawal:- agar hindu custmer ke tehvar(festival) ki tajim bhi nahi karni padhe aur unke sath samil bhi nahi hona pade sirf wo dukan pe aye to "happy diwali" kehna padhe to kya ye keh sakte hai? Kya is tarah ka mobile sms kar sakte hai.? Bara e karam jawab inayat kare.

Jawaab:
kisi bhi surat me kafiro ko unke tehwaaro par Mubarakbaad dene ki ijaazat har giz nahi ..
???????????
? (Mufti) Maqsood Akhtar Qadri
Khadim Ridawi Amjadi Dar Al-Ifta
Barkati Islamic Centre Mumbai

Title: Hazrat Maulana Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ki wilaadat Rabi ul awwal 1325 Hijri (August 1907 A.D.) me Bareilly me hui. Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ke waalid ka naam Alhaaj Sardaar Wali Khan bin Maulana Haadi Ali Khan hai. Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi waalid Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan Bareilwi rahmatullahi alaihi ke chachazaad bhai the. Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ki naani Aala Hazrat ki zauja ki bahen thi. 5 saal ki umr me Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ne Quran majeed ki ta’aleem mukammal ki. 1332 Hijri (1914 A.D.) me Aap 7 saal ki umr me Aala Hazrat ke mureed hue. Aap ne ibtidaai ta’aleem Maulana Khaleel-ur-Rahman Bihari, Maulana Zaheer-ul-Hasan Mujaddidi Faarooqi aur unke saahabzaade Maulana Noor-ul-Hasan Rampuri se haasil ki. Aap ne Hazrat Maulana Hasanain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi se Dars-e-Nizami ki ta’aleem haasil ki. Hazrat Maulana Rahame Ilahi, Hazrat Maulana Abdul Mannaan, Hazrat Maulana Abdul Azeez Mohaddees Bareilwi, aur Hazrat Sadrush-Shariah Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi rahmatullahi alaihi se ta’aleem haasil ki. Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ne Hazrat Hujjat-ul-Islam Maulana Muhammad Hamid Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi se majeed ta’aleem haasil ki. 1345 Hijri (1926 A.D.) me Aap ne Daar-ul-Uloom Manzar-e-Islam se Sanad-e-Faraaghat haasil ki. Phir Aala Hazrat se ‘Sharh Jaami’ ka Khutba padha. Dauraane ta’aleem hi Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi Daar-ul-Uloom Manzar-e-Islam ke naa'ib Mohtamim muqarrar hue. Faraaghat ke baad Daar-ul-Uloom Manzar-e-Islam me dars wa tadrees shuru ki. Hazrat Hujjat-ul-Islam rahmatullahi alaihi ke baad Daar-ul-Uloom Manzar-e-Islam ke Mohtamim muqarrar hue. Taqseeme mulk ke baad 1951 A.D. me Aap Karachi tashreef laaye. 1371 Hijri (1952 A.D.) me Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi Peer jo goth tashreef laaye aur Daar-ul-Uloom Jamiah Rashidiyah me dars wa tadrees shuru ki. Tehreek-e-Khatm-e-Nabuwwat me bhi Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi shaamil hue. Muradabad Sunni Conference me bhi Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ne shirkat ki. Aap ne Hazrat Imam Muhammad al-Ghazaali rahmatullahi alaihi ki kitaab ‘Mukaashfatul Quloob’ ka Tarjuma kiya hai. Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mash'hoor shaagird:
  1. Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Khushtar Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi
  2. Mohaddees e azam e Pakistan Maulana Sardaar Ahmad rahmatullahi alaihi,
  3. Maulana Rajab Ali Razawi,
  4. Mufti Sayyed Muhammad Afzal Husain,
  5. Maulana Mufti Ashfaaq Husain Naeemi,
  6. Maulana Mufti E'ajaaz Wali Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi,
  7. Maulana Mufti Ghulaam Qaadir,
  8. Maulana Mufti Abdul Hameed,
  9. Maulana Mufti Abdul Raheem,
  10. Maulana Muhammad Saalih rahmatullahi alaihi,
  11. Maulana Dar Muhammad,
  12. Maulana Muhammad Haaroon,
  13. Peer Mardaan Shaah.
Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ne 1364 Hijri (November 1945 A.D.) me Hajje Baitullah ada kiya. Iske baad 1969 A.D. me dusri martaba aur 1392 Hijri (1972 A.D.) me teesri martaba Hajj ada kiya. Ramzan-ul-Mubarak 1395 Hijri (1975 A.D.) me Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ne Umrah wa Ziyarat ki sa’adat haasil ki. 1342 Hijri (1923 A.D.) me Aap ka nikah Hazrat Hujjat-ul-Islam Maulana Muhammad Hamid Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ki saahabzaadi se hua. Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan Bareilwi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed hain. Hazrat Hujjat-ul-Islam Maulana Muhammad Hamid Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi aur Hazrat Qutb-e-Madeena Maulana Zia-ud-deen Ahmad Madani Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ne Aap ko khilaafat ata farmai hai. Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ke khalifa Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Khushtar Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi Wisaal se pehle Aap ne Madina munawwara ki khajoor khaai aur Zam zam piya. Phir Durood shareef padhte hue inteqaal farmaya. Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 3 Rajab 1408 Hijri (22 February 1988 A.D.) ko Budh ke roz 12:10 ko hua. Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ki namaz e janaza Hazrat Allama Mufti Waqaar-ud-deen rahmatullahi alaihi ne padhai. Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Pir jo Goth, Khairpur, Sindh (Pakistan) me hai. ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Maulana Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke Imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye. Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye. Ameen.

Title: Hazrat Makhdoom Shaah Muhammad Munem Paak rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Makhdoom Shaah Muhammad Munem Paak rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Laqab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Sultaan-ul-Waasileen.

***************
Aap ki wilaadat 1082 Hijri (1671 A.D.) me Pachna (Shaikhpura, Bihar) me hui.

Aap Hazrat Sultaan Ibrāheem bin Ad'ham al-Balkhi rahmatullāhi alaihi ki nasl se hain.

Hazrat Makhdoom Shams-ud-deen Haqqaani Aap ke pardaada hain.

***************
Pachna me bunyaadi ta’aleem haasil karne ke baad Patna ke qareeb Barh jaakar Hazrat Deewaan Sayyed Abu Saeed Ja’afar Muhammad Qadrib se ta’aleem haasil ki aur un ke wisaal ke baad un ke saahabzaade Hazrat Deewaan Sayyed Khaleelullāh se ta’aleem haasil ki.

Phir Hazrat Deewaan Sayyed Khaleelullāh rahmatullāhi alaihi se bai'at ki aur baatini ta’aleem mukammal hone ke baad un se khilaafat haasil ki.

***************
Phir Peer ke farmaan par Delhi se Patna tashreef laaye aur shuru me Meetanghat par Meer Taqi masjid me qayaam kiya aur phir Jaame masjid (Hazrat Mulla Meetan masjid) ke pichhe Madrasa me tashreef laaye aur 40 saal tak talba ko ta’aleem dete rahe.

Patna me sukoonat ikhtiyaar karne ke baad Aap 3 mahine tak Bihar shareef me Hazrat Makhdoom-e-Jahaan Shaikh Sharf-ud-deen Ahmad Yahyā Maneri ke mazaar ke qareeb muraaqaba karte rahe aur Roohaani faiz haasil kiya.

Aap ne Hazrat Khwaja Shaah Muhammad Farhaad rahmatullāhi alaihi ki khidmat me 11 saal rahe aur faiz haasil kiya.

Aap ne Hazrat Ghauṡ e aazam Shaikh Sayyed Abdul Qaadir Jeelaani radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu se bhi Roohaani faiz haasil kiya.

1162 Hijri (1749 A.D.) me Aap ne Khaanqaahe Mumemia ki taamir ki.

***************
Aap aksar Roza rakhte the.

Aap zyada waqt ibaadat o riyaazat me guzaarte.

Apni khaanqaah me aane waale sab ko faiz ata farmaate.

***************
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Delhi me qayaam ke dauraan Aap ne 3 kitaaben likhi hain.

(1) Mukashifaat-e-Munemi (1119 Hijri)
(2) Ilhaamaat-e-Munemi (1120 Hijri)
(3) Mushaahidaat-e-Munemi (1123 Hijri).

***************
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Ek martaba Gurbakhsh naami Hindu Yogi aap ki baargaah me aaya. Us ne bataaya ke main Krishna ka bahot bada bhakt hu aur us ke deedaar (darshan) karna chaahta hu. Ek arse se deedaar ke liye pure Hind me safar kar raha hu. Is dauraan bahot saare Yogi se mulaaqaat hui magar koi mujhe Krishna ke deedaar nahi kara saka. Aap ke baare me sunkar badi ummeed lekar aap ke paas aaya hu.’ Aap ne use dhyaan (muraaqaba) karne ke liye farmaaya. Dhyaan ke dauraan wo khushi se jhumne laga aur jhumte jhumte be-hosh ho gaya. Jab use hosh aaya to us ne bataaya ke ‘Jab main dhyaan me tha tab maine mehsoos kiya ke main Vrindavan me pahunch gaya hu aur maine dekha ke Krishna baansuri baja raha hai jis me ye Laa Ilāha illallāh Muhammadur Rasoolullāh ki dhoon sunaai de rahi hai. Gopiya jhum rahi hain aur shokh maahol chhaaya hua hai. Ye sab dekhkar main masroor ho gaya aur jhumne laga.’
Is ke baad wo musalman ho gaya aur Hazrat ka mureed bankar Aap ki khidmat me hi rehne laga.

***************
Aap Hazrat Deewaan Sayyed Khaleel-ud-deen rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Hazrat ne Aap ko ‘Qaadri Qutubiya’, ‘Chishti Khizri’ aur ‘Suharwardi Firdausi’ silsile ki khilaafat ata farmai hai.

Aap ko Hazrat Meer Sayyed Asadullāh rahmatullāhi alaihi se ‘Naqshbandi Abul Ulai’ silsile ki khilaafat mili hai.

Aap se ‘Munemi’ silsila jaari hai.
Aap ke khulfa :
(1)Hazrat Maulana Sayyed Hasan Raza Raipuri (Raipur Fatuha)
(2) Hazrat Sayyed Shaah Ghulaam Husain Danapuri (Chakand, Gaya)
(3) Hazrat Khwaja Rukn-ud-deen Ishq Azeemabadi
(4) Hazrat Makhdoom Shaah Hasan Ali
(5) Hazrat Shaah Qutub-ud-deen urfe Shaah Basawan
(6) Hazrat Sufi Sayyed Muhammad Dayem
(7) Hazrat Shaah Ahlullāh Sani
(8) Hazrat Shaah Khuda Bakhsh (Rajauli, Nawadah)
(9) Hazrat Shaah Fazil (Rehi, Patna)
(10) Hazrat Shaah Maneri (Chishtipur, Bihar)
(11) Hazrat Shaah Wajhullāh Taalib
(12) Hazrat Shaah Muhammad Azeem (Delhi)
(13) Hazrat Shaah Raheem-ud-deen
(14) Hazrat Mulla Jamaal ul Haq
(15) Hazrat Mulla Kamaal ul Haq
(16) Hazrat Shaah Nawaazish Ali
(17) Hazrat Deewaan Sayyed Saahib-e-Aalam
(18) Hazrat Shaah Ghulaam Nabi Alwari.

***************
Aap ka wisaal 11 Rajab 1185 Hijri (October 1771 A.D.) ko 103 saal ki umr me hua.

Aap ka mazaar Patna (Bihar) me Jaama masjid ke bagal me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Makhdoom Shaah Muhammad Munem Paak rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Shams-ud-deen Mohammad Tabrizi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Shaikh Shams-ud-deen Mohammad Tabrizi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Laqab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Shams-e-Tabriz.

**********
Aap ki wilaadat 580 Hijri (1185 A.D.) me Tabriz (Iran) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Ali bin Malik-e-Daad hai.

***********
Aap ne bachpan me Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr Sallebaf rahmatullāhi alaihi se ta’aleem haasil ki.

Is ke baad Aap ne Shaafi mazhab ki Fiq'h ki Hazrat Abu Is'hāq al-Shirazi rahmatullāhi alaihi ki kitaab ‘al-Tanbih fil fiqh al-Shafi'i’ ki taaleem haasil ki.

Aap ne Fiq'h, Kalaam, Ilm e Istadalaal (Mantiq), Falsafa, aur Tasawwuf ki ta’aleem haasil ki.

***********
Aap Baghdad, Damishq (Damascus), Halab (Aleppo), Kayseri, Aksaray, Sivas, Erzurum aur Erzincan ka safar karte rahe.

Aap apne saath sirf ek chattai rakhte. Aap jab kisi jagah wuqoof karte to kisi khaanqaah me theharne ke bajay saraay me theharte aur khud ko ek musaafir batate. Aur tokriya banakar ya kamar-band banakar use bechkar apna guzraan kar lete.
Aur akṡar waqt sufiya e kiraam aur ulama ki mehfilo me guzaarte aur tanhai me ibaadat aur riyaazat me guzaarte.

***********
642 Hijri (November 1244 A.D.) me Aap Konya pahunche.
Ek baar Maulana Jalaal-ud-deen Rumi rahmatullāhi alaihi bahot saari kitaaben saath rakhkar padh rahe the. Itne me Hazrat Shams Tabrizi waha se guzre. Aap ne puchha ‘Kya kar rahe ho?’ Aap ka saada libaas dekhkar Maulana Rumi ne kaha ‘Aap nahi samajh sakenge.’ Aap ne un kitaabo ko lekar qareeb me ek jhil ke andar phenk diya. Maulana Rumi ne jab un kitaabo ko paani se baahar nikala to wo sab bilkul sookhi thi. Unho ne puchha ‘Hazrat, ye kaise hua?’ Aap ne farmaya ‘Ye tum nahi samajh sakoge.’

Ye dekhkar Maulana Rumi samajh gaye ke Hazrat Shams Tabrizi ek wali e kaamil hain. Unho ne din wa raat saara waqt un ki sohbat me guzaarna shuru kar diya. Aur apni Mudarris ki aur apne pariwar ki zimmedaari bhi bhul gaye. Jab aap ko pata chala ke Maulana Rumi ke shaagird is baat ki wajah se naraaz ho gaye hain tab Shawwaal 643 Hijri (March 1246 A.D.) me baghair kisi ko bataaye Konya se rawaana ho gaye.
Aap ke achaanak chale jaane se kuchh waqt tak Maulana Rumi ghamzada ho gaye.
Unho ne Hazrat Shams Tabrizi ko waapas aane ke liye bahot saare paighaam bheje. Aakhir me jab apne saahbzade Sultaan Walad ko bheja tab Aap Konya waapas aaye. Aap ke waapas aane se Maulana Rumi bahot khush hue aur un ki sohbat me rehkar faiz haasil karne lage.

Kuch arsa Maulana Rumi ke saath Konya me guzaarne ke baad Aap waha se Khoy aa gaye.

***********
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ne ‘Maqaalat’ (Discourses) naam ki ek kitaab likhi hai.

***********
Aqwaal :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap irshaad farmaate hain :
(1) Khush-mijaazi us saaf paani ki tarah hai jis se paid-paudhe khilte hai aur sabz wa taaza rehte hai aur Gham-geeni us kichad ki tarah hai jis se khile hue paid-paudhe murza jaate hain.
(2) Achha insaan fariyaad karne me aur dusro ke aib dekhne me waqt zaaya nahi karta.
(3) Jaisa tum kahoge achha ya bura, waisa hi tumhare saamne aayega. Is liye agar koi tumhare baare me bura sochta hai aur agar tum bhi us ke baare me bura kahoge to is se sirf baat bigdegi aur tum us daayre me phanse hue rahoge.

***********
Aap Hazrat Baaba Kamaal-ud-deen Jundi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed hain.
Aur ‘Suharwardi Kubrawiya’ silsila ke shaikh hain.

Aap ke Khalifa Hazrat Maulana Jalaal-ud-deen Rumi rahmatullāhi alaihi hain.

***********
Aap ka wisaal 8 Rajab 646 Hijri (1248 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Khoy (Iran) me hai.

***********
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Shams Tabrizi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Qutub-ud-deen Maudood Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Qutub-ud-deen Maudood Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Shams e Sufiyaan, Chiraagh e Chishtiyaan.

************
Aap ki wilaadat 430 Hijri (1038 A.D.) me Chisht me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Nasir-ud-deen Abu Yousuf bin Sayyed Shams-ud-deen Abu Nasr Muhammad Saamaan Chishti hai.

Aap Husaini saadaat hain.

************
Aap ne apne waalid se ibtidai ta’aleem haasil ki.
7 saal ki umr me Aap Haafiz e Qur’an hue.
Aap ne Shaikh Ahmad Jaami se bhi shariat aur tasawwuf ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
16 saal ki umr me Aap ne tamaam ta’aleem mukammal ki.

******************
Bai'at ke baad Hazrat Khwaja Abu Yousuf Chishti ne Aap se farmaaya ‘Qutb-ud-deen Maudood! Faqr ikhtiyaar karo.’
Peer ki naseehat aur farmaan par Aap tanhaai me mujaahida karne lage. Aap ne 20 saal ibaadat, riyaazat aur muraaqaba me guzaare.
Aap din me 2 martaba aur raat me 2 martaba pure Qur’an majeed ki tilaawat karte the.

29 saal ki umr me Aap ke waalid ka intiqaal hua.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala ne Aap ko ‘Tay-ul-Ard’ ki karaamat ata farmai thi. Aap jab bhi Ka’abatullāh ka tawaaf karne ka iraada karte the ALLĀH ke fazl se kuchh hi lamho me Makka mukarrama pahunch jaate.

ALLĀH ke fazl se Aap ko Kashf-e-Quloob (Revelation of the hearts) and Kashf-e-Quboor (Revelation of the graves) bhi haasil tha.

************
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :
(1) Minhaaj-ul-Aarifeen
(2) Khulaasat-ul-Shariah.

************
Qaul :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap irshaad famaate hain
‘Jo fuqara se mohabbat aur husn e sulook karta hai wo ALLĀH ta’ala aur us ke Rasool sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke qareeb hota hai aur jo un se nafrat karta hai wo Sunnat e rasool ki mukhaalifat karta hai.’

************
Aap (apne waalid) Hazrat Khwaja Nasir-ud-deen Abu Yousuf Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap se ‘Chishti Maudoodi’ silsila jaari hai.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Haaji Noor-ud-deen Shareef Zandani rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(2) (Aa ke saahabzaade) Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Najm-ud-deen Ahmad Mushtaaq rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(3) Hazrat Khwaja Abu Ahmad rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(4) Hazrat Khwaja Ahmad Zandani rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(5) Hazrat Shaah Sanjan rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(6) Hazrat Shaikh Abu Naseer Shakeeban rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(7) Hazrat Shaikh Hasan Tibti rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(8) Hazrat Shaikh Ahmad Baderoon rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(9) Hazrat Khwaja Sabz-Posh rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(10) Hazrat Shaikh Uṡmaan Awwal rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(11) Hazrat Khwaja Abul Hasan rahmatullāhi alaihi.

************
Aap ke wisaal se pehle ek mota shakhs ek khat lekar Aap ke paas aaya. Aap ne us khat ko padhne ke baad us khat ko chuma aur apni aankho se lagaaya. Aur foran Aap ka intiqaal ho gaya.

************
Aap ka wisaal 1 Rajab 533 Hijri (March 1139 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Chisht (Afghanistan) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Qutb-ud-deen Maudood Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Content:

Title: Mahe Rajab Mubarak
Content: Rajab ka maana hai Tazeem karna. Ahle Arab is mahine ki khaas tazeem kiya karte the. Isko Al-Asab bhi kehte hain yaani Tez bahaav. Is Mahe Rajab mubarak me Tauba karne walo par Rehmat ka bahaav tez ho jaata aur Ibadat karne walo par Qubooliyat ke anwaar ka Faizaan hota hai. Is barkat wa rahmat aur fazilat waale mahine me Shab e Meraj hai. 27wi Rajab ki mubarak raat me ALLAH ta’ala ne apne Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wassallam ko Meraj ata farmayi aur Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam ko La'makaan ki us bulandi par bulaya jiska koi tasawwur bhi nahi kar sakta aur Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam ko Rab ta’ala ne apna deedaar karaya aur Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam se kalaam kiya aur Momino ke liye Namaz ka tohfa ata farmaya. Mahe Rajab ka chand dekhkar Surah-al-Adiyaat padhein: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِي ۞ أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ إِنَّ رَبَّهُمْ بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَخَبِيرٌ Bismillah ir-Rahmaanir-Raheem. Wal-adiyati dab'ha. Fal-mooriyati qad'ha. Fal-mogheerati sub'ha. Fa-asrna bihi naq'a. Fa-wasatna bihi jam'a. Innal insaana lirabbihi lakanoodu. Wa innahu ala zalika lashaheedu. Wa innahu lihubbil khayri lashadeedu. Afalaa ya’alamu izaa bu'aṡiru maa feel quboor. Wa hussila maa fees sudoor. Inna rabbahum bihim yawma'izin lakhabeeru. Phir ye masnoon dua padhein : اللَّهُمَّ أَهِلَّهُ علَيْنَا بِالأَمْنِ والإِيمَانِ وَالسَّلامَةِ والإِسْلامِ ، رَبّي ورَبُّكَ اللَّه ، هلال رشد وخير Allahumma ahillahu alayna bil amni wal eimaani was salamati wal islami Rabbee wa Rabbuk-Allah hilaalu rushdin wa khayrin. अल्लाहुम्म अहिल्लहु अलयना बिल अम्नि वल ईमानि वस्सलामति वल इस्लामि रब्बी व रब्बुकल्लाह हिलालु रुश्दिन व ख़ैरिन। Tarjuma: Aye ALLAH is chand [mahine] ko hum par amn aur imaan aur salamati aur islam ke saath, Tera Rab aur mera Rab ALLAH hai, yeh chand hidayat aur khair wala ho. Translation: O Allah, let this moon appear on us with security and faith with safety and Islam. (O moon!) Your Rabb and mine is Allah. May this moon be bringing guidance and good. Jaami Tirmizi, Jild -2, Hadeeṡ -1376/Hasan, Tabarani, Al-Mujam-ul-Awsat, Hadeeṡ -6241 Phir Dua e Mahe Rajab-ul-Murajjab padhein: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا في رَجَبٍ وَ شَعْبَانَ وَ بَلِّغْنا رَمَضَان Tarjuma: Aye ALLAH, Hume Mahe Rajab aur Shabaan ki barkate ata farma aur Mah e Ramzan tak pahunchne me aasaani ata farma. Translation: O ALLAH, Grant us blessings in the month of Rajab & Shabaan & make us reach safely the month of Ramadan. Hadeese Nabawi: Hazrat Anas bin Maalik radiyAllahu ta’ala anhu se riwaayat hai ki: Huzoor RasoolAllah sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne irshad farmaya ‘Jannat me ek naher hai jise Rajab kehte hain jo doodh se zyada safed aur shahed se zyada meethi hai. Jo maahe Rajab ke Roze rakhega ALLAH ta’ala use is naher se shairaab karega.’ Shoab-ul-Eimaan, 3/367 Mahe Rajab ke khaas din: 1 Rajab – Yaum e Wisaal Hazrat Khwaja Qutub-ud-deen Maudood Chishti rahmatullahi alaihi (Chisht / Afghanistan). 1 Rajab – Yaum e Wisaal Hazrat Peer Sayyed Mahmood Shaah Mohaddees Hazarwi rahmatullahi alaihi (Havelian / Pakistan). 2 Rajab – Yaum e Wisaal Hazrat Khwaja Title: Rajab Ke Roze Ki Fazilat
Content:
Hazrat e Sayyiduna Allama Saffori alaih rehma Farmate Hai.

Rajab ul Murajjab Beech Boneka, Shabaan ul Muazzam Aabpashi Ka Aur Ramzan ul Mubarak Fasl Kaatne Ka Mahina Hai!

Lihaza Jo Rajab ul Murajjab Mein Ibadat Ka Beech Nahi Bota Aur Shaaban ul Muazzam Mein Aansuo Se Sairab Nahi Karta, Woh Ramzan ul Mubarak Mein Fasal e Rehmat Kyun Kar Kaat Sakega?

Mazeed Farmate Hai.

Rajab ul Murajjab Jism Ko,

Shabaan ul Muazzam Dil Ko Aur

Ramzan ul Mubarak Rooh Ko Paak Karta Hai.

Imam Abdul Rehman Bin Abdul Salaam [894 H] : Nuzhat ul Majalis: Jild 01, Pg. 155

Jisne Rajab Ka 1 Roza Rakha, Toh Woh 1 Saal Ke Rozo Ki Tarah Hoga.

Jisne 7 Roze Rakhe, Uspar Jahannam Ke 7 Darwaze Band Kar Diye Jayenge.

Jisne 8 Roze Rakhe, Uske Liye Jannat Ke 8 Darwaze Khol Diye Jayenge.

Jisne 10 Roze Rakhe, Woh Allah Azzawajal Se Jo Kuch Mangega Allah Azzawajal Usey Aata Farmayega.

Aur Jisne 15 Roze Rakhe, Toh Aasman Se 1 Munadi Nida Karta Hai Ki Tere Pichle Gunah Bhakhs Diye Gaye, Pas Tu Aaj Saare Nav Amal Shuru Kar Ki Teri Buraiyan Nekiyon Se Badal Di Gayi.

Aur Jo Zyada Kare, Toh Allah Azzawajal Usey Zyada De.

Imam Bayhaqi [ 384 - 458 H ] - Shoab ul Imaan: Jild 03, Pg. 368, Hadees no. 3801

Ek Shakhs baargaahe Risaalat mein haazir huwa aur arz kiya "Ya Rasoolallah (sallallaho alaihi wasallam), main kamzor hun aur Rajab ke poore mahine ke roze nahi rakh sakta hun. Main kya karun?

Sarkaar e kainaat Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ne irshad farmaya,

"Rajab ki pehli, pandharwin (15th) aur aakhri tarikh me roza rakh le poore mahine ke roze ka sawab milega".

Aur koi wo bhi na kar sake to?

Irshad huwa

"Rozana roti sadqa kare, sawaab paa lega"

SubhanAllah!!

(Nuzhatul Majaalis)

Title: Hazrat Maulana Fakhr-ud-deen Chishti Dehlawi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Maulana Fakhr-ud-deen Chishti Dehlawi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Muhibb-un-Nabi, Fakhr-e-Jahaan.

************
Aap ki wilaadat 1126 Hijri (1715 A.D.) me Aurangabad me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Khwaja Nizaam-ud-deen Aurangabadi rahmatullāhi alaihi hai.

Aap Hazrat Abu Bakr Siddeeq radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ki nasl se hain.

Aap ki waalida Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Muhammad Banda nawaaz Gaisu daraaz ki nasl se hain.

Hazrat Khwaja Nizaam-ud-deen Aurangabadi rahmatullāhi alaihi ne jab Aap ki wilaadat ki khabar Hazrat Khwaja Kaleemullāh Jahanabadi rahmatullāhi alaihi ko di to Hazrat ne Aap ke liye ek kapda bheja aur Aap ko ‘Fakhr-ud-deen’ naam ata farmaaya aur Aap ke liye dua ki aur bashaarat ata farmaai.

************
Aap ne apne waalid se aur dusre ulama se Qur’an, Hadeeṡ aur Fiq'h ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Is ke baad Khwaja Nizaam-ud-deen Aurangabadi rahmatullāhi alaihi ne Aap ko Tasawwuf aur Tareeqat ki ta’aleem ata farmaai.
Aur 1142 Hijri (1729 A.D.) me 16 saal ki umr me Khwaja Nizaam-ud-deen Aurangabadi rahmatullāhi alaihi ne apne wisaal se pehle Aap ko Khilaafat ata farmai.

Is ke baad Aurangabad me Aap 3 saal tak majeed ta’aleem haasil karte rahe aur phir 8 saal tak Mujaahida aur Muraaqaba karte rahe.
Aur kuchh saal tak logo ko ta’aleem aur faiz ata farmaate rahe.

Aap shohrat se door rehna chaahte the. Lekin jab khwaab me Aap ke waalid e mohtaram tashreef laaye to un ki farmaan par Delhi rawaana hue.

1165 Hijri (1752 A.D.) me Aap Delhi tashreef laaye aur Ajmeri darwaaze ke qareeb kiraaye par ek makaan lekar qayaam farmaaya. Aur us me Madrasa shuru kiya aur phir apni khaanqaah shuru karke logo ko ta’aleem aur faiz ata karte rahe.
Hindustan ke aur dusre mulko ke log Madrasa Ghaazi-ud-deen me ta’aleem haasil karne ke liye aate the.

Sultaan Ghazi-ud-deen Khan, us ka shehzaada aur Baadshaah Shaah Aalam Aap ke mureed the.

************
Aap hamesha ishq e Nabi ke saath Sunnato par amal karte the aur logo ko bhi Sunnato ko sikhkar amal karne ki ta’aleem dete the. Is liye Aap ‘Muhibb-un-Nabi’ ke laqab se mash'hoor hain.

************
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :

(1) Nizaam-ul-Aqaa'id
(2) Risaala Marziya
(3) Risaala Ain-ul-Yaqeen
(3) Fakhr-ul-Hasan.

************
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Delhi ki taraf safar ke dauraan raaste me Aap ke qaafile ne ek maqaam par wuqoof kiya tab ek na-bina hindu aurat se mulaaqat hui. Us aurat ne qaafile waalo se Hazrat ka huliya mubarak puchha aur phir Hazrat ke paas aakar us ki aankh ki roshni ke liye dua karne ke liye arz kiya. Aap ne farmaaya ‘Main to ek aam sipaahi hu aur koi karaamat nahi jaanta.’ Magar us aurat ne israar kiya. Aakhir-kaar qaafila jab waha se rawaana hone laga tab Aap ne us aurat ke liye dua farmaai aur ALLĀH ke fazl se us aurat ki aankh ki roshni use waapas mili.

************
Aap Hazrat Khwaja Nizaam-ud-deen Aurangabadi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap se ‘Chishtiya Fakhriya’ silsila jaari hai.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Shaah Niyaaz Ahmad Bareilwi
(2) Hazrat Khwaja Noor Muhammad Maharwi
(3) Hazrat Maulana Zia-ud-deen Jaipuri
(4) Hazrat Sayyed Badi-ud-deen
(5) Hazrat Maulwi Noorullāh
(6) Hazrat Maulwi Fareed-ud-deen
(7) Hazrat Muhammad Ghauṡ
(8) Hazrat Miyan Qutub-ud-deen Sharqi
(9) Hazrat Maulawi Abdul Wahaab Bikaneri
(10) Hazrat Haafiz Sa’adullāh
(11) Hazrat Haaji Muhammad Wasil
(12) Hazrat Sayyed Muhammad Meer
(13) Hazrat Maulwi Azmatullāh
(14) Hazrat Shaah Muhammad Aazam
(15) Hazrat Ghulaam Fareed Chishti
(16) Hazrat Miyan Asmatullāh
(17) Hazrat Haaji Ahmad Saahab
(18) Hazrat Shaikh Ala-ud-deen Mohammad Zama
(19) Hazrat Soofi Yaar Mohammad
(20) Hazrat Sub'hān Ali
(21) Hazrat Maulana Jamaal-ud-deen
(22) Hazrat Meer Shams-ud-deen
(23) Hazrat Maulwi Mukarram Shaah
(24) Hazrat La’al Muhammad.

************
Aap ka wisaal 27 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 1199 Hijri (May 1785 A.D.) ko 73 saal ki umr me hua.

Aap ka mazaar Mehrauli, Delhi me Hazrat Khwaja Qutb-ud-deen Bakhtiar Kaaki rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mazaar ke bagal me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Maulana Fakhr-ud-deen Chishti Dehlawi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Sayyed Shaah Aulaade Rasool Mohammad Miyan Barkaati Marehrawi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Sayyed Shaah Aulaade Rasool Mohammad Miyan Barkaati Marehrawi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Laqab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Taaj-ul-Ulama.

******************
Aap ki wilaadat 23 Ramazaan 1309 Hijri (April 1892 A.D.) ko Tams-ganj, Sitapur me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Maulana Sayyed Shaah Abul Qaasim Ismāeel Hasan urfe Shaah Ji Miyan bin Sayyed Shaah Mohammad Saadiq Marehrawi rahmatullāhi alaihi hai aur waalida Hazrat Sayyed Shaah Noor-ul-Mustafa bin Sayyed Shaah Ghulaam Mohiy-ud-deen Marehrawi ki saahbazaadi hain.

Aap Husaini saadaat hain.

******************
Aap ne Pali me Munshi Farzande Hasan Faarsi ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Phir Hazrat Maulana Sayyed Shaah Abul Qaasim Ismāeel Hasan urfe Shaah Ji Miyan Barkaati rahmatullāhi alaihi se ta’aleem haasil ki.
Phir Badaun me Madrasa Aalia Qaadria me ta’aleem haasil ki.
Phir Hazrat Maulana Shaah Mutee-ur-Rasool Muhammad Abdul Muqtadir Qaadri al-Matufi se Faatiha Faraagh padhkar sanad aur ijaazat haasil ki.
Phir Hazrat Maulana Shaah Ji Miyan Barkaati, Hazrat Sayyed Shaah Noor-ul-Mustafa aur Hazrat Sayyed Abul Husain Ahmad-e-Noori Miyan Barkaati se Hadeeṡ ki ijaazat haasil ki.

Aap saahibe zohad o taqwa aur inaabat the.
Puri zindagi khidmate deen me guzaari.
Aap ne ta’aleem aur tasannif ke zariye Ahle sunnat wal Jama’at ki azeem khidmat ki hai.

******************
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ne taqreeban 30 kitaaben likhi hain.
Jin me ‘Buzurgaane Marehra ke tafseeli Haalaat’ mash'hoor hai.

******************
Aap (apne waalid) Hazrat Maulana Sayyed Shaah Abul Qaasim Ismāeel Hasan urfe Shaah Ji Miyan Barkaati Marehrwrahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Hazrat Sayyed Abul Husain Ahmad-e-Noori Miyan Barkaati Marehrwrahmatullāhi alaihi ne bhi Aap ko khilaafat ata farmai hai.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Ahsan-ul-Ulama Sayyed Shaah Mustafa Haidar Hasan Marehrwrahmatullāhi alaihi,
(2) Hazrat Sayyed-ul-Ulama Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullāhi alaihi.

************
Aap ka wisaal 24 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 1375 Hijri (February 1956 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Marehra (Uttar Pradesh) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Taaj-ul-Ulama Sayyed Shaah Aulaade Rasool Mohammad Miyan Barkaati Marehrawi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Shaah Mohammad Farhaad Abul Ulaai rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Shaah Mohammad Farhaad Abul Ulaai rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Fard-ul-Afraad, Shaikh-ul- Jinn wa Ins.

************
Aap ki wilaadat Delhi me hui.

Aap ke waalid Burhanpur ke Subedaar muqarrar hue to Aap bhi un ke saath Burhanpur gaye. Aap ne taaleem wa tarbiyat Burhanpur me haasil ki.

************
Burhanpur me Hazrat Shaah Dost Mohammad Abul Ulai rahmatullāhi alaihi bahot mash'hoor the. Aap ke waalid bhi kabhi kabhi Hazrat ki Khaanqaah me jaate the. Aap bhi apne waalid ke saath Hazrat ki baargaah me jaate the. Us waqt Aap ki umr 12 ya 13 Saal ki thi. Kuchh waqt me hi Aap ko Hazrat se aqeedat wa mohabbat ho gai aur Aap akele hi Hazrat ki khidmat me haazir hone lage.
Jab Aap ke waalid ko pata chala to unho ne Aap ko waha jaane se roka. Aap phir jaane lage to Aap ke waalid Hazrat ki baargaah me haazir hue aur arz kiya ke ‘Mera sirf ek hi ladka hai. Agar wo Aap ke paas aata jaata raha to dunya se bekaar ho jaayega.’ Hazrat ne farmaaya ‘Tum chaahte ho ke wo baadshaah ke saamne haath bandh kar khada ho lekin ALLĀH ta’ala chaahta hai ke Baadshaah us ke saamne haath bandh kar khada ho.’ Is ke baad waalide maajid ne Aap ko Hazrat ke paas aane jaane se mana na kiya.
Kuchh dino ke baad Aap Hazrat ke Mureed hue, Hazrat se taaleem haasil ki aur Khirqa e Khilaafat haasil kiya.

************
Hazrat Shaah Dost Mohammad rahmatullāhi alaihi ne apne wisaal se pehle Aap ko wasiyat farmai ke ‘Burhanpur se Delhi jaao aur wahi reh kar Rushd o Hidaayat ka silsila jaari rakho.’
Hazrat ke wisaal ke baad Aap Delhi tashreef laaye aur sukoonat pazeer hue. Aur tamaam umr Delhi me reh kar Khidmate Islaam karte rahe aur logo ko ta’aleem wa faiz ata farmaate rahe.

************
Aap bade Aabid o Zaahid Buzurg the. Aap apne waqt ke Ahle Tareeqat ke Muqtada aur Peshwa the.
Aap ki tawajjoh ka aalam ye tha ke ek nigaahe khaas padte hi aadmi behosh ho jaata tha.

Aap ko ‘Shaikh-ul- Jinn wa Ins’ kaha jaata tha. Jinnaat Insaani surat me Aap ki majlis me shareek ho kar Faiz haasil karte the.

************
Aap Hazrat Shaah Dost Mohammad Abul Ulaai Burhanpuri rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aur ‘Naqshbandi Abul Ulaai’ silsila ke shaikh hain.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Burhaan-ud-deen rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(2) Hazrat Meer Sayyed Asadullāh rahmatullāhi alaihi.

************
Aap ka wisaal 25 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 1145 Hijri (13 December 1732 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Bagichi Peerji, Delhi me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Shaah Mohammad Farhaad Abul Ulaai rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Khwaja Razi-ud-deen Muhammad Baaqi Billāh rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Khwaja Razi-ud-deen Muhammad Baaqi Billāh rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap ki wilaadat 5 Zil Hijja 971 Hijri (1563 A.D.) me Kabul me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Qaazi Abdul Salaam Khilgi Samarqandi rahmatullāhi alaihi hai.
Aap ki waalida Hazrat Khwaja Ubaidullāh Ahraar rahmatullāhi alaihi ki nasl se hain.

***********
Bachpan se Aap saadgi aur tanhai pasand karte the.

5 saal ki umr me Khwaja Saad rahmatullāhi alaihi ke madrase me Aap ki ta’aleem shuru hui.
8 saal ki umr me Qur’an shareef mukammal kiya.
30 saal ki umr me Maulana Saadiq Hilvahi ke paas ta’aleem shuru ki.

Phir Aap Mawara-un-Nahr (Transoxiana) gaye. Jaha kai soofi Auliya se Aap ki mulaaqaat hui. Pehle Aap Khwaja Ubaid rahmatullāhi alaihi se mile. Phir Aap Hazrat Shaikh Samarqandi ki sohbat me rahe. Unho ne Aap ke liye dua ki. Phir Aap Hazrat Ameer Abdullāh Balkhi rahmatullāhi alaihi ki sohbat me rahe. Jis se Aap ko kuchh sukoon mehsoos hua.

Ek baar Aap tasawwuf ki kitaab padh rahe the tab Aap ne dekha ki us jagah ke ird-gird noor chha gaya aur Khwaja Baha-ud-deen Naqshband rahmatullāhi alaihi Aap ke saamne jalwa afroz hain aur apna roohaani faiz ata farma rahe hain.

Is ke baad Aap ke dil me sirf ALLĀH aur us ke Rasool ki muhabbat hi baaqi rahi aur zohad o taqwa se Aap wilaayat ke buland maqaam par pahunch gaye.

***********
Ek baar Aap Mawara-un-Nahr ki taraf safar kar rahe the ki raaste me Aap ne khwaab me dekha ke Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Amkanaki rahmatullāhi alaihi aap ka intazaar kar rahe hain aur aap ko bula rahe rahe hain. Aap un ke qayaam-gaah par gaye aur 3 din aap ke saath rahe. Khawaja Amkanaki ne aap ko khilafat ata farmai aur farmaaya ‘Hindustan jaakar Naqshbandi silsila qaa'im karo.’
Aap ne peer se farmaaya ‘Shaayad ye mushkil kaam main nahi kar sakunga.’
Khwaja Muhammad Amkanaki ne aap ko Istikharah karne ke liye kaha. Aap ne istikharah kiya to raat ko khwaab me dekha ke ek tota darakht ki shaakh par baitha hai. Aap ne socha ke agar ye mere haath par aakar baithe to safar khushnaseeb hoga. Foran wo tota udkar aaya aur aap ke haath par baith gaya. Aap ne us ke munh me apna la’aab e dahan (thunk) rakha aur us ne aap ke munh me shakkar rakhi.
Subah ko aap ne peer ko is khwaab ke baare me bataaya to unho ne farmaaya ‘Tumhe foran Hindustan ke liye rawaana hona chaahiye.’

Aap foran Hindustan ke liye rawaana hue. Aap Lahore aakar 1 saal rooke. Yaha bahot saare soofi aur ulama aur dusre logo ne Aap ka faiz haasil kiya.
Phir 1008 Hijri (1599 A.D.) me Aap Delhi aaye aur Jamuna ke kinaare Qila Ferozabad par ek masjid me qayaam kiya.

***********
988 Hijri (1581 A.D.) me Mughal baadshaah Akbar ne sab mazhab ko milaakar Deen-e-Ilāhi banaaya to aap ne use maanne se inkaar kiya aur farmaaya ke ‘Sirf deen e Islaam hi sahi hai.’

Aap hamesha logo ki islaah aur hidaayat ki koshish karte rahe aur Shariat aur Sunnat ki ta’aleem dete rahe.
Apni kitaabo me aur dars me Aap logo ko har buri bid'at se door rehne ke liye samjhaate the.

***********
Ek baar raat ko Aap tahajjud ki namaaz padhkar aaraam karne ke liye apne bistar ki taraf gaye to dekha ke ek billi aap ke bistar par so rahi hai. Aap ke dil me itna raham tha ki Aap ne us billi ko bistar par sone diya aur thandi ke mausam me khud zameen par baithkar raat ka baaqi hissa guzara.

***********
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
(1) Ek baar der raat ko Aap ke ghar kuchh mehmaan aaye. Aap ne apne baawarchi se un ke liye khaane ka intazaam karne ke liye kaha. Us waqt khaane ka saamaan ghar par maujood nahi tha. Is liye us ne baahar jaakar kisi tarah intazaam kiya aur khaana pakaakar mehmaano ko khilaaya.
Jab mehmaan chale gaye to us khaadim ne Hazrat ko ye baat batakar apni ujrat ke liye kaha. Aap ne puchha to us ne kaha ‘Mujhe dunya ke maal o daulat ya aur koi cheez nahi chaahiye. Main to ye chaahta hu ki aap mujhe bilkul apne jaisa bana den.’
Aap use apne saath apne hujre me le gaye aur use apne seene se lagaaya to Aap ki dua se wo hoo-ba-hoo aap ke jaisa ban gaya. Logo ke liye dono me farq karna mushkil ho gaya.
Sirf yeh farq tha ke Khwaja apna roz ka kaam ba-dastoor karte rahe aur wo khaadim wajd me pada rehta tha. 3 din baad wo is dunya se intiqaal kar gaya.

(2) Ek zaeefa aurat ka 3-4 saal ka ladka Firozabad me deewaar par se taqreeban 30 gaz ki unchaai se gir pada. Deewaar ke niche mazboot farsh tha. Kaano ke suraakho se khoon jaari ho kar us ladke ka dam toot gaya.
Us ki maan girya wa zaari karne lagi aur be-qaraar hokar apne bache ko lekr Hazrat ki baargaah me aai aur ke Qadmo me daal diya aur us ki zindagi ki fariyad karne lagi.
Aap ne apna tasarruf posheeda rakhne ke liye ek Tibb ki kitaab talab ki aur farmaaya ke ‘Maaloom hota hai ke ye ladka marega nahi.’
Thodi der Aap khaamosh rahe. Us ke baad dekha ladka zinda ho gaya. Ye dekhkar haazireen ko bahot hairat hui.

(3) Ek martaba ek Shakhs Aap ka imtihaan lene ki garz se hire jawaahiraat lekar Aap ki baargaah me aaya aur Aap ko pesh kiye. Aap ne lene se inkaar farma diya.
Jab us shakhs ne bahot israar kiya to Aap ne apne musalle ka kona utha kar us se farmaaya ke ‘Dekh.’ Jab us shakhs ne Aap ke musalle ke neeche nazar ki to dekha ke musalle ke neeche sone aur chaandi ke dariya jaari heain.
Aap ne naseehat karte hue us shakhs se farmaaya ‘Faqeero ka imtihaan na liya kar.’

***********
Aap aage (qibla ki taraf) bhi dekh sakte the aur pichhe muqtadiyo ko bhi dekh sakte the.

***********
Qual :
¯¯¯¯¯
Aap farmaate hain ke ‘Insaan dunya me rehkar apne sab tamaam kaam karte hue bhi parhezgaari ke saath taqwa aur ibaadat se ALLĀH ke qareeb ho sakta hai.’

***********
Aap ne ‘Berang’ takhllus ke saath bahot saari Nazamen likhi hai.

Maulana Rushdi ne ‘Malfuzaat’ me Aap ke dars wa ta’aleem ko jama kiya hai.

‘Ruq'aat’ me Aap ke 87 Maktubaat (letters) ko jama kiya gaya hai.

‘Kulliyaat e Baaqi Billāh’ me Aap ke likhe hue Mazmoonaat ko jama kiya gaya hai jin me Haqeeqat e Namaaz, Mukhtasar Bayaan e Tawhid, Ma’ana A’ooz (A’oozu Billāh), Tafseer Bismillāh aur Surah al-Faatiha, Tafseer Surah ash-Shams, Tafseer Surah al-Ikhlaas, Tafseer Surah al-Falaq, Tafseer Surah an-Naas Sharh e Rubaā'iyāt urfe Silsilatul Ahraar saamil hain.

***********
Pariwaar :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ke 2 biwiya aur 2 saahabzaade hain :

Saahabzaade :
(1) Khwaja Kalaan Ubaidullāh,
(2) Khwaja Khurd Abdullāh.

***********
Aap Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Amkanaki Naqshbandi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap se Hindustan me Naqshbandi silsila jaari hai.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Mujaddid e Alf e ṡaani Imaam Shaikh Ahmad Sirhindi rahmatullāhi alaihi (Sirhind)
(2) Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Haq Dehlawi rahmatullāhi alaihi
(3) Hazrat Khwaja Taaj-ud-deen Uṡmaani Sanbhali rahmatullāhi alaihi (Makka)
(4) Hazrat Khwaja Husaam-ud-deen Ahmad rahmatullāhi alaihi (Agra)
(5) Hazrat Shaikh Ilāh-daad Dehlawi rahmatullāhi alaihi
(6) Hazrat Shaikh Uṡmaan Jalandhari rahmatullāhi alaihi.

***********
Aap ka wisaal 25 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 1012 Hijri (1603 A.D.) ko Sanichar ko Ghuroob e aaftaab se pehle 40 saal ki umr me hua.

Aap ka mazaar Sadar Bazaar, Delhi me hai.

***********
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Baaqi Billāh rahmatullāhi alaihi aur Tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Mazhar-ud-deen Abdul Quddoos Chishti Gangohi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Shaikh Mazhar-ud-deen Abdul Quddoos Chishti Gangohi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Laqab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Qutb e aalam.

**************
Aap ki wilaadat 860 Hijri (1456 A.D.) me Rudauli (Uttar Pradesh) hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Shaikh Muhammad Ismā'eel bin Shaikh Safi-ud-deen hai.

Aap Hazrat Imaam e aazam Abu Haneefa Nomaan bin Saabit ki nasl se hain.

Turki hukoomat ke dauraan aap ke pardaada Shaikh Nizaam-ud-deen apne farzand Shaikh Naseer-ud-deen ke saath Ghazna se Delhi aaye. Phir Jaunpur aaye aur aakhir me Rudauli me sukoonat pazeer hue.

Hazrat Makhdoom Saayed Ashraf Jahaangeer Simnani rahmatullāhi alaihi ne Aap ke daada Shaikh Safi-ud-deen ko Bashaarat di thi ke ‘Aap ki nasl me ek qutbe Aalam paida hoga.’
Hazrat Makhdoom Shaikh Ahmad Abdul Haq Rudaulwi rahmatullāhi alaihi ne Aap ke waalid Shaikh Muhammad Ismā'eel ko Bashaarat di thi ke ‘Tumhare yaha ek farzand paida hoga jo Saeed e Azali hai aur humari ne'amat us ko milegi.’

Aap bachpan hi se kaafi zaheen the.

Aap saara din husoole Ilm memasroof rehte aur raat ko Ibaadat me mashgool rehte.

**************
Aap ne Rudauli me ibtidai ta’aleem haasil ki.

Aap Hazrat Shaikh Muhammad Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed hue.

Aap ne apne peer ke daada Hazrat Shaikh Ahmad Abdul Haq Rudaulwi ke mazaar par Jhaadu lagaane ki khidmat ikhtiyaar ki.
Hazrat Shaikh Ahmad Abdul Haq Rudaulwi (Wisaal 838 Hijri /1434 A.D.) ne bhi tashreef laakar Aap ko Roohaani faiz aur tarbiyat ata farmai.

Bai'at ke baad Aap Rudauli me 17 saal tak ibaadat wa riyaazat me masroof rahe. Aap ne Namaaz e makoos aur Sultaan e Zikr bhi kiya.
896 Hijri (1491 A.D.) me Sultaan Sikandar Lodi ke wazeer Umar Khan Kaahi ki daawat par Shahabaad (Haryana) tashreef laaye aur waha 30 saal tak rahe.
926 Hijri (1521 A.D.) me Gangoh (Zila Saharanpur) tashreef laaye.
931 Hijri (1525 A.D.) me ek martaba Gangoh me khatarnaak aag lagi jis me se Aap bahot mushkil se bach paaye. Usi raat Aap ko ghaib se aawaaz sunai di ke ‘Ummeed mat chhodo, Hum ne tumhe ‘Qutb-ul Aqtaab’ ka martaba ata farmaata hai.’
932 Hijri (1526 A.D.) me Jung e Panipat me aap ne Sultaan Ibrāheem Lodi ke saath rahe. Sultaan ki iltija par aap ne us ke lashkar ke liye dua farmai. Mughal baadshaah ne Aap ko giraftaar kiya aur phir haqeeqat jaanne ke baad riha kar diya.

Phir Aap ne Gangoh me taaleem e deen ka kaam jaari rakha.
Aap Lodi aur Mughal baadshaaho aur afsaro ko khato ke zariye hidaayat aur ta’aleem ata karte rahe.

**************
Aap hamesha Awraad o Azkaar me masroof rehte. Zikre Khafi wa Zikre Jahri ba kaṡrat kiya karte the.
400 Rak’at Nawaafil din me aur 400 Rak’at Nawaafil raat me ada farmaate.

Aam kunve ke paani se Wuzu ya Ghusl karne ke bajaay shaher se baahar jaakar bade hauz ke paani se Wuzu ya Ghusl karte.

**************
Aap Arabi, Faarsi, Urdu aur Hindi ke maahir the.

Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :

(1) Rushd-naama
(2) Anwaar ul Uyoon
(3) Ta’leeqaat ala Sharhis Sahaa'if
(4) Haashiyatut Ta’arruf (Tafseer e Awaarif ul Ma’aarif).

♦ ‘Maktubaat e Quddoosi’ me Aap ke likhe hue khato ko jama kiya gaya hai.

**************
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Ek martaba ek makkaar aurat ne Hazrat ke khalifa Hazrat Shaikh Bhooru rahmatullāhi alaihi par naahaq Amaanat me khayanat karne ka daawa daa'ir kar diya aur hukme Deewaani par un ko qaid khaane me dalva diya gaya.
Zaalim Haakim ne lohe ki salaakh ko aag par garm karna shuru kiya. Shaikh Bhooru ne apne Peer ko yaad kiya. Foran Hazrat Abdul Quddoos Ganngohi rahmatullāhi alaihi qaid khaane me in ke paas pahunch gaye aur tasalli dete hue farmaaya ke ‘Fikr na karo, sab theek ho jaayega.’
Jab wo zaalim ne lohe ko surkh aag banakar Shaikh Bhooru ko daagne ke liye us lohe ko aag se baahar nikaala to Qudrate Khuda se wo loha aisa sard ho gaya ke goya wo aag me rakha hi na gaya tha. Ye Haalat dekhkar wo zaalim haakim bahot sharminda aur naadim hua aur apne is fail ko tark kiya.

**********
Aap ka nikaah Shaikh Aarif bin Shaikh Ahmad Abdul Haq Rudaulwi rahmatullāhi alaihi ki saahabzaadi se hua.

Aap ke 2 saahabzaade hain.

(1) Shaikh Rukn-ud-deen,
(2) Shaikh Abdul Kabeer urfe Baala Peer.

**********
Aap Hazrat Shaikh Mohammad bin Shaikh Ahmad Aarif rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aap ‘Chishti Saabri’ silsila ke Shaikh hain.

Hazrat Shaikh Muhammad Durwesh bin Qaasim Awadhi rahmatullāhi alaihi ne Aap ko ‘Chishti Naasiri’, ‘Suharwardi Jalaali’ aur ‘Madaari’ silsila ki khilaafat ata farmai hai.
Hazrat Shaikh Bandagi Miyan bin Haakim Avadhi ne ‘Chishti Naasiri’ silsila ki khilaafat ata farmai hai.
Hazrat Shaikh Abdus Salaam urfe Shaah Ali Jaunpuri rahmatullāhi alaihi ne ‘Chishti Qalandari’ ata farmai hai.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Shaikh Jalaal-ud-deen Thanesri rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(2) Hazrat Shaikh Bhooru rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(3) Hazrat Shaikh Umar rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(4) Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Ghafoor Aazampuri rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(5) Hazrat Shaikh Maulana Rukn-ud-deen rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(6) Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Kabeer rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(7) Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Azeez rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(8) Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Ahad Sirhindi rahmatullāhi alaihi.

**********
Aap ka wisaal 23 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 944 Hijri (November 1537 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Gangoh (Uttar Pradesh) me hai.

**********
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Quddoos Chishti Gangohi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.
