Title: Hazrat Sayyed Muhammad Zafar-ud-deen Bihari rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Sayyed Muhammad Zafar-ud-deen Bihari rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Laqab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Malik-ul-Ulama (King of Scholars).

************
Aap ki wilaadat 10 Moharram 1303 Hijri (19 October 1885 A.D.) ko Subah saadiq ke waqt Moza Rasoolpur, Zila Naalanda (Bihar) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Sayyed Abdur Razzaaq Ashrafi hai.

Aap Hasani saadaat hain.

Aap Hazrat Ghauṡ ul aazam Sayyed Shaikh Mohiy-ud-deen Abdul Qaadir Jeelaani radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ki nasl se hain.

Aap ke pardaada Sayyed Ibrāheem bin Sayyed Abu Bakr Ghaznawi Sultaan Firoz Shaah Tughlaq ke zamaane me Hind me tashreef laaye the aur 13 Zil hijja 753 Hijri (1352 A.D.) me Junge Qila e Rohtas (Shahabad ) me shaheed hue the.

***************
4 saal 4 mahine 4 din ki umr me Aap ke waalid ne apne Murshide Giraami Hazrat Shaah Chaand Bithwi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke Daste mubarak se Aap ki Bismillāh khwaani karwai.

Aap ne apne waalid Sayyed Abdur Razzaaq Ashrafi se Arabi aur Faarsi ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Phir Shaikh Haafiz Makhdoom Ashraf, Shaikh Kabeer-ud-deen aur Shaikh Abdul Lateef se Qur’an ki aur Arabi aur Faarsi kitaabo ki ta’aleem haasil ki.

1316 Hijri (1898 A.D.) me Aap Madrasa Ghauṡiya Hanafiya, Patna me daakhil hue aur Tafseer ul Jalalain ki aur Meer Zaahid ki kitaabo ki taaleem haasil ki aur 8 ulama se dusre uloom ki ta’aleem haasil ki.

25 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 1320 Hijri (1902 A.D.) me Aap Madrasa Hanafiya, Patna me daakhil hue aur Shaikh Wasi Ahmad Muhaddeeṡ Surati se Musnad Imaam e Aazam, Mishkaat ul Masaabih aur Mulla Jalaal ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
2 saal baad Shaikh Wasi Ahmad Muhaddeeṡ Surati rahmatullāhi alaihi jaeefi ke sabab Patna se Pilibhit tashreef le gaye.
Is ke baad Aap ne Kanpur jaakar 3 madaaris me taaleem haasil ki. Daar-ul-Uloom me Shaikh Ahmad Hasan Kanpuri Mantiq ki aur Shaikh Ubaidullāh Punjabi se ‘Hidayah’ ki, Madrasa Imdaad-ul-Uloom me Shaikh Qaazi Abdur Razzaaq se aur Madrasa Ahsan-ul-Madaaris me ta’aleem haasil ki.

Phir Aap ne Pilibhit jaakr Hazrat Shaikh Wasi Ahmad Muhaddeeṡ Surati rahmatullāhi alaihi se uloom e baatini ki ta’aleem haasil ki.

1321 Hijri (1903 A.D.) me Aap Bareilly aaye to Aa’la Hazrat Imaam Ahmad Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed hue.

Aap ne Hazrat Maulana Hasan Raza Khan rahmatullāhi alaihi, Hujjat-ul-Islaam Maulana Haamid Raza Khan aur Sayyed Muhammad Ameerullāh Shaah ke saath koshish ki. Jis ke sabab 1322 Hijri (1904 A.D.) me Aa’la Hazrat ne Madrasa Manzar-ul-Islaam ki qaa'im farmaaya.
Sayyed Muhammad Zafar-ud-deen Bihari aur Sayyed Abdur Rasheed Azeemabadi Madrasa Manzar-ul-Islaam ke pehle talba the.

Aap ne Aa’la Hazrat ke paas Sahih Bukhari, Aqlidas ke 6 Maqaale, Tashrih-ul-Aflak, Sharh Chughmini, Risaalah Qushayriya aur Awaarif-ul-Ma’arif ki taaleem haasil ki.
Aap ne Aa’la Hazrat se Ilm e Hayaat, Ilm e Tauqeet, Ilm e Jafr, Ilm e Takseer aur Ilm al Riyaazi ki ta’aleem bhi haasil ki.

Madrasa Manzar-ul-Islaam me Aap ne Shaikh Sayyed Basheer Ahmad Aligarhi, Shaikh Sayyed Ameerullāh Shaah Bareilwi, Shaikh Hameed Hasan Rampuri aur Maulana Hasan Raza Khan Bareilwi se ta’aleem haasil ki.
1325 Hijri (1907 A.D.) me ulama ki bahot badi ta’adaad ki maujoodgi me Aap ko Shaikh Makhdoom Shaah Hayaat Ahmad Qaadri ke daste mubarak se Sanad aur Ijaazat ata ki gai.

***************
Aap ne Aa’la Hazrat se uloome baatini ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
1325 Hijri (1907 A.D.) me Aa’la Hazrat ne Aap ko Khilaafat aur Ijaazat ata farmai.

Aa’la Hazrat ne Aap ko 43 khat likhe the aur Shaikh Khalifa Taaj-ud-deen Lahori aur Shaikh Haaji Muhammad Layal Khan Qaadri Razwi ko likhe hue 2 khato me Malik-ul-Ulama ka zikr kiya tha.
Aa’la Hazrat ‘Habeebi wa Waladi wa Qurrat al Ayni (My Beloved Son and Coolness of my Eyes)’ aur kai baar ‘Waladi al A'az Haami us Sunan wa Maahi ul Fitan (My Son who Protects the Sunnah and Fights the Heresies)’ kehkar khitaab farmaate.

1337 Hijri (1919 A.D.) me Aa’la Hazrat ne Qasida ‘Zikr ul Ashaab wa Dua al Ahbaab’ Al ma’aroof ‘Qasidatul Istimdaad’ me Aap ka zikr is tarah kiya hai :
‘Mere Zafar ko apni Zafar de
Is se Shikasten Khaate ye hain!’

**************
1329 Hijri (1911 A.D.) tak Aap Madrasa Manzar-ul-Islaam, Bareily me Mudarris rahe. Phir 2 saal tak Madrasa Hanafiya, Arah, Allahabad me Mudarris rahe. Phir 1330 Hijri (1912 A.D.) se 1334 Hijri (1916 A.D.) tak Aap Madrasa Islaamiya Shams ul Huda, Patna me Shaikh al Fiq'h aur phir Shaikh-ul-Tafseer rahe.
Phir Shaikh Sayyed Shaah Malih-ud-deen ki guzaarish par Aap 1331 Hijri (1913 A.D.) se 1338 Hijri (1920 A.D.) tak Madrasa Khaanqaah al-Kabiriya, Sahsharam me Mudarris rahe.
Phir Madrasa Islaamiya Shams-ul-Huda, Patna me waapas aaye aur 1369 Hijri (1951 A.D.) se 1338 Hijri (1920 A.D.) tak Mudarris rahe.
1365 Hijri (1947 A.D.) me Aap Madrasa Islaamiya Shams-ul-Huda ke Shaikh-ul-Kulliya (Principal) bane.

Phir Shaikh Sayyed Shaah Shaahid Husain ki guzaarish par 21 Shawwaal 1371 Hijri (1953 A.D.) ko Aap ne Kathyar, Bihar me Jamiah Lateefiya Bahr-ul-Uloom ki shuruat ki aur 1378 Hijri (1960 A.D.) tak Sadr-ul-Mudarriseen (Chief patron) rahe.

**************
Aap ke mash'hoor shaagird :

Shaikh Khwaja Muzaffar Husain Razawi Purnawi , Shaikh Abdur Raoof Qaadri Balyawi, Shams-ul-Ulama Sayyed Shams-ud-deen Ja’afari Qaadri Razawi Jaunpuri, Shaikh Muhammad Zahoor Ahmad Naeemi Muradabadi, Shaikh Nizaam-ud-deen Balyawi Allahabadi, Shaikh Yahyā Balyawi aur Shaikh Dr. Sayyed Mukhtaar-ud-deen Ahmad Aarzu Qaadri.

***************
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Shahere Katihaar se zara Pachchhim me ek Basti me Aap ke Aqeedatmando ne Aap ko daawat ki.
Jab daawat ka waqt hua to Mezbaan lene aaye. Hazrat jab jaane lage to Ahbaab, Ulama aur Talba ki 40-50 aadmiyo ki ek Jama'at Aap ke saath ho gai. Itne saare logo ko dekhkar ghar waale kuchh pareshaan ho gaye.
Aap ne gharwalo ki is tashwish ko foran bhaanp liya aur farmaaya ‘Mujhe ma'aloom hai ke daawat 10 aadmiyo ki hai aur aane waale kai guna zyada hai. magar Aap log fikr na kare. Jo kuchh tayyaar hai haazir kiya jaaye, alag se kuchh karne ki katai zaroorat nahi. Dastarkhwaan bichha dijiye.’
Aap ke farmaan par dastarkhwan bichha diya gaya. Aap der tak zere lab kuchh padhte rahe aur phir dastarkhwaan par jo kuchh maujood tha us par dam kar diya. Phir farmaaya ‘Haan! Ab khaana khaaiye.’
Raawi farmaate hain ke Aap ki dua se Mehmaan aur Mezbaan, sab ke khaana khaa lene ke bawajood khaana bach gaya.

**************
Aap Aa’la Hazrat Imaam Ahmad Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Hazrat Mohaddeeṡ e Aazam e Hind Sayyed Shaah Muhammad Ashrafi rahmatullāhi alaihi ne Aap ko ‘Chishti Ashrafi’ silsila ki Khilaafat ata farmai hai.

Aap ke khalifa (aap ke saahbzaade) Hazrat Allama Dr. Sayyed Mukhtaar-ud-deen ‘Aarzu’ Qaadri rahmatullahi alaihi hain.

*********
Ek din ek shakhs Aap ke paas aaya. Aane waala un ka shanaasa tha. Us ne kaha ke “Maine Aap ke paas ek Istefa'a kiya tha lekin Aap ne us ka jo jawaab diya hai, Khaanqaahe Mujeebiya Phoolwari shareef ke Sajjaada nasheen ne us ke Bar aks Fatawa diya hai. Jab maine un se Aap ke Fatawe ka zikr kiya to unho ne farmaaya ke : Unhe yaha bula laao. Hum log aapas me Tabaadala e khayaal kar ke ya to hum hi apne faisle se ruju'a kar lenge ya phir unhi ko mashwara denge ke apne faisle par nazre ṡaani kare. Is liye Aap Phoolwari chaliye.”
Aap ne farmaaya “Jis ko zaroorat hogi wo khud mere paas aayega. Maine jo Fatawa diya he wo theek hi diya hai.” Is par wo saahab bole ke “Khaanqaah ke Sajjaada nasheen Aap ke paas is liye nahi aa sakte ke Sajjaada nasheen ke liye waha ye qaid hai ke wo apni Khaanqaah ke halke se baahar nahi jaa sakta aur Aap ke saath to aisi koi qaid nahi hai, Aap to aate jaate rehte hain. Is liye Aap ko hi chalna chaahiye.”
Aap ne barham ho kar farmaaya ke “Ek martaba keh diya nahi jaaunga phir baar baar israar kyun karte ho?” Us Shakhs ne kaha “Jaayenge kyun nahi? Aise nahi jaayenge to main kandhe par utha kar le jaaunga.” Aap ek minute khaamosh rahe, Phir farmaaya ke “Jab kandhe par hi le jaana hai to jaao parso aana.” Wo Shakhs mutmaeen ho kar chala gaya.
Teesre din jab wo Aap ko le jaane ke liye aaya to us ne bheed dekhi aur jaise hi wo darwaaze par pahuncha to us ko ma’aloom hua ke Hazrat ka wisaale paak ho chuka hai aur Aap ka Janaaza baahar laaya jaa raha hai.
Usne aage badh kar kandha diya aur Hazrat ki laash mubarak se mukhaatib ho kar kaha ke”Hazrat! Kandhe par le chalne ki baat maine is liye kahi thi ke main Aap ko Phoolwari Shareef le jaana chaahta tha. Aap kandhe par chal to rahe hain magar Aap ne raasta badal diya hai.”

*********
Aap ka wisaal 19 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 1382 Hijri (18 November 1962 A.D.) ko Aap ke makaan ‘Zafar Manzil’, Patna me hua.

Wisaal ke waqt Aap ‘Allāh-Allāh’ ka Zikr e Zaahiri kar rahe the.
Aap ki namaaze janaaza Hazrat Allama Shaah Ayyoob Abdaali Shaahidi Rashidi Islampuri ne padhai.

Aap ka mazaar Patna (Bihar) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Malik-ul-Ulama Sayyed Muhammad Zafar-ud-deen Bihari rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Maulana Shaah Muhammad Abdul Qaadir Badayuni rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Maulana Shaah Muhammad Abdul Qaadir Badayuni rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Taaj-ul-Fahool, Muhibb-ur-Rasool.

************
Aap ki wilaadat 17 Rajab 1253 Hijri (17 October 1837 A.D.) ko Badaun me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Maulana Shaah Fazale Rasool bin Ain-ul-Haq Shaah Abdul Majeed Badayuni rahmatullāhi alaihi hai.

Aap Hazrat Uṡmaan Ghani radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ki nasl se hain.

Aap ke pardaada Hazrat Daaniyal Qatari rahmatullāhi alaihi Sultaan Shams-ud-deen Altamash ki fauj ke saath Badaun tashreef laaye the.

************
Aap ne apne waalid Hazrat Maulana Shaah Fazale Rasool rahmatullāhi alaihi aur Hazrat Maulana Noor Ahmad Badayuni rahmatullāhi alaihi se ta’aleem haasil ki.

************
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :
(1) Ahsan-ul-Kalaam Fee Tahqeeq Aqaa'id-ul-Islaam
(2) Radd-e-Rawaafiz
(3) Ikhtilaaf-e-Hazrat Ali o Ameer Muawiya Radiy-Allāhu anhum.

************
Aap ne ta’aleem wa tadrees o taqreer aur tasannif ke zariye Ahle sunnat wal Jama’at ki azeem khidmat ki hai.

1288 Hijri (1871 A.D.) me Aap ne Muhammad Ahsan Nanotwi ke shaagird Ameer Ahmad bin Ameer Hasan Sahsawani ke saath Imkaan-e-Kizb aur Imkaan-e-Nazeer ke mauzu par Mubaahisa kiya.

************
Aap Hazrat Moeen-ul-Haq Maulana Shaah Fazale Rasool Badayuni rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap ke khalifa (aap ke saahabzaade) Hazrat Saahib-ul-Iqtidaar Maulana Shaah Abdul Muqtadir Qaadri Badayuni rahmatullāhi alaihi hain.

************
Aap ka wisaal 18 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 1319 Hijri (2 October 1901 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Khaanqaah-e-Aalia Qaadriya, Maulwi Mohalla, Badaun (Uttar Pradesh) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Maulana Shaah Abdul Qaadir Badayuni rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Sadr-ud-deen Mohammad Raajan Qattaal Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Sadr-ud-deen Mohammad Raajan Qattaal Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap I wilaadat 26 Sha’abaan 730 Hijri (14 June 1330 A.D.) ko Uch (Zila Bahawalpur) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Ahmad Kabeer bin Sayyed Jalaal-ud-deen Haidar Hasan Surkh-Posh Bukhari rahmatullāhi alaihi aur waalida ka naam Sayyeda Bibi Faatima hai.

Aap ke daada Sayyed Jalaal-ud-deen Haidar Hasan Surkh-Posh Bukhari rahmatullāhi alaihi 630 Hijri (1232 A.D.) me Sultaan Nasir-ud-deen Mahmood bin Shams-ud-deen Altamash ke zamaane me Bukhara se Hindustan tashreef laaye the.

*****************
Aap apni waalida ka doodh nahi pee rahe the. Jab Aap ke bade bhai Hazrat Makhdoom Jahaaniyan Jahaangasht ko khabar di gai to unho ne farmaaya ‘Ye Qutub hain. Akele doodh nahi piyenge. Koi dusra doodh peeta bacha laakar waalida ke dusri jaanib se doodh pilaao to hi wo doodh piyega.’

Jab Maahe Ramazaan aaya me Aap ne doodh pina band kiya to Hazrat Makhdoom Jahaaniyan Jahaangasht ne farmaaya ‘Ye Qutub hai aur Maahe Ramazaan ki ta’azeem karta hai. Din me doodh nahi piyega, sirf raat ko hi doodh piyega.’

*****************
Aap ne apne waalid Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Ahmad Kabeer rahmatullāhi alaihi se ta’aleem haasil ki.
Phir apne biraadar Hazrat Makhdoom Jahaaniyan Jahaangasht Saayed Jalaal-ud-deen Husain rahmatullāhi alaihi se baatin ta’aleem hail ki.

*****************
Aap bahot hi muttaqi wa parhezgaar aur paabande sharia he.

Aap puri zindagi isha’at e Islaam aur ta’aleem e deen karte rahe.
Aap ki ta’aleem wa faiz se beshumaar logo ko hidaayat mili.

ALLĀH ke fazl se log Aap ko dekhkar aur Aap se guftagu karke musalman ho jaate the.
Ek martaba ek mehfil me ek kaafir musalman hua aur us ke saath 300 dusre ghair-muslim ne Islaam apnaaya.

Kaha jaata hai ke taqreeban 3,40,300 logo ne Shaikh Sayyed Sadr-ud-deen Raajan Qattaal rahmatullāhi alaihi se Bai'at ki thi.

Uch aur aas paas ke ilaaqe ke logo ke dilo par Aap ki hukoomat thi. Is liye ‘Raajan’ ke laqab se mash'hoor hain.
Aur kaṡrate ibaadat o riyaazat aur mujaahida aur mukhaalifat e nafs aur dushmane deen par sakhti ki wajah se ‘Qattaal’ ke laqab se mash'hoor hain.

*****************
Ek martaba Shaikh Saarang ne Aap se arz kiya ‘Huzoor! Aap ke khaane me se bacha hua roti ka tukda mujhe inaayat farmaayen to main use batore tabarruk tanaawul karun.’ Aap ne irshaad farmaaya ‘Jab tum panj gaana namaaz paabandi aur ikhlaas ke saath ada karne lago tab mere aas aana.’ Shaikh Saarang ne Aap ke farmaan ki taamil ki. Jab wo dobaara Hazrat ki baargaah me haazir hue to Aap ne farmaaya ke ‘Aap namaaze Israaq wa Chaasht ka wa’ada karo hum tabarruk ka wa’ada karte hain. Hum saath me khaana khaayenge.’
Sub'hān Allāh, Aap ke tarbiyat ke is haseen tareeqe ne Shaikh Saarang ko ibaadat guzaar wali e kaamil bana diya.

*****************
Aap ka nikaah Hazrat Moeen-ud-deen bin Naeem-ud-deen ki saahabzaadi se hua.
Aap ke 6 saahabzaade aur 1 saahabzaadi hain.

*****************
Aap (apne bhai) Hazrat Makhdoom Jahaaniyan Jahaangasht Sayyed Jalaal-ud-deen Husain rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aur ‘Suharwardi Jalaali’ silsila ke shaikh hain.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) (Aap ke saahabzaade) Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Husaam-ud-deen Hasan rahmatullāhi alaihi (Jo Sultaan Firoz Shaah Tughlaq ke zamaane me isha’at e Islaam ke liye Kara-Manikpur tashreef le gaye the.) (Parsaki);
(2) Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Kabeer-ud-deen Ismāeel rahmatullāhi alaihi (Uch / Pakistan);
(3) Hazrat Makhdoom Shaikh Saarang Mohammad Khamis urfe Abdullāh Rumi rahmatullāhi alaihi (Majhgawa, Uttar Pradesh)

************
Aap ka wisaal 16 Jamaadi uṡ Ṡaani 827 Hijri (16 May 1424 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Uch (Pakistan) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Sadr-ud-deen Mohammad Raajan Qattaal Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Siraaj-ud-deen Muhammad rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Siraaj-ud-deen Muhammad rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Shaah e aalam, Mehboob e Baari, Shehanshaah e Gujarat.

Kunniyat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Abul Barkaat.

***********
Aap ki wilaadat 17 Zil Qa’ada 817 Hijri (1414 A.D.) ko Peer ke roz Patan, Gujarat me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Qut-e-aalam Sayyed Burhaan-ud-deen Abdullāh bin Sayyed Naseer-ud-deen rahmatullāhi alaihi aur waalida ka naam Bibi Aamina urfe Sultaana Khaatoon hai.

Aap apne waalidain ki 12 aulaad me se 11we hain.

Aap Husaini saadaat hain.

Aap ke waalid Sayyed Jalaal-ud-deen Husain Bukhari Makhdoom Jahaaniya Jahaan-Gasht ke pote hain aur Sultaan Muzaffar Shaah ke daur me Uch (Punjab) se Patan tashreef laaye. Aur jab un ke bete Sultaan Ahmad Shaah ne Ahmedabad aabaad kiya to un ki guzarish par Patan se Ahmedabad tashreef laaye aur Vatva ilaaqe me sukoonat ikhtiyaar ki.

***********
Aap ki waalida roz khaana khaane se pehle Dua e Shifa padha karti thi. Ek martaba padhna bhul gai to Hazrat Shaah e aalam ne apni waalida ke pait me se buland aawaaz se Dua e Shifa padhna yaad dilaaya. Aap ke yaad dilaane par aap ki waalida ne Dua e Shifa padh liya.

Jab aap Hazrat Shaah e aalam apni waalida ke shikam me the, 7wa mahina chal raha tha. Ek martaba Ramazaan ul Mubarak Aap ki waalida namaaz e Taraawih ada kar rahi thi. Ek rak’at me galti ho gai. Aap ne pait me se buland aawaaz se apni waalida ko toka aur sahi alfaaz padhne ki hidaayat farmai.

***********
Aap ki wilaadat ki shab aap ke waalid ko khwaab me Huzoor Sarwar e kaa'inat alaihi wa sallam ki ziyarat naseeb hui aur Sarkar ne bete ka naam ‘Muhammad’ rakhne ke liye farmaaya.

***********
Aap bachpan se Huzoor Nabi e kareem sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ki mutaabiat karte.
Aap ki daaya Bibi Haleema bayaan karti hain ke ‘Mera ek ladka Hazrat Shaah e aalam ka hum umr tha. Aap hamesha mere ek hi pistaan se doodh nosh farmaate the aur dusre pistaan ko chhute tak na the use apne doodh sharik bhai ke liye chhod dete the.
Ek martaba mere us pistaan ka doodh khushk ho gaya jis se mera apna bacha doodh pita tha. Us ke baad aap ne ye dastoor bana liya ke apne wale pistaan se aadha doodh nosh farmaate the aur aadha doodh apne doodh sharik bhai ke liye chhod dete the. Yaha tak ke ALLĀH ta’ala ki lutf o ataa se mere dusre pistaan me bhi doodh utar aaya.’

***********
Aap paida'ishi Haafiz e Qur’an the.

Aap ne Maulana Qaari Ali Jenki se ta’aleem haasil ki.

Aap bachpan hi se bahot hi zaheen the.
Aap ke haafza ka aalam ye tha ki aap ne apne ustaad se Fiqh e Hanafi ki mash'hoor kitaab ‘Hidaayah shareef’ ko sirf 4 din me yaad kar li. Is kitaab me 2000 safaat (pages) hain.

16 saal ki umr me aap ne tamaam uloom ki ta’aleem haasil kar li.

***********
Ek martaba Aap ke waalid e mohtaram Hazrat Qutb e aalam apne hujre me tashreef farma the. Hazrat Shaah e aalam waalid saahab ke hujre me gae to dekha ke waalid mohtaram par Wajd ki haalat taari hai.
Jab waalid saahab ne farmaaya ‘Kyun aaye ho? Kya talab karna chaahte ho?’
Aap nee arz kiya ke ‘Ye meri khush qismati hai ke aise mubarak waqt me main aap ke saamne haazir hu. Main ye chaahta hu ke Ishq e Ilāhi ke samandar ka ek qatra mujhe inaayat farmae aur mujhe sarfaraz farmaen.’
Aap ke waalid e mohtaram aap ke is jawaab se bahot khush hue aur apni aankho se behte hue aansoo ke chand qatre aap ke munh me daal diye. In chand qatro ke faiz se aap ka seena aur qalb munawwar ho gaya.

***********
Aap ki umr jab 11 saal ki thi tab aap ko khwaahish hui ki main apne jadd e amjad (pardaada) Makhdoom Jahaaniya Jahaan gasht ko aalam e waaqiya me deedaar karu aur wo mujhe ‘Ya waladi (Aye mere bete)’ kehkar pukaare.
Makhdoom Jahaaniya Jahaan-gasht ne aap ki is tamanna ko puri farmaaya aur ‘Aye putar’ kehkar aap se khitaab farmaaya.

***********
Aap ne Ahmedabad shaher se door Rasoolabaad me apni khaanqaah banaai. Ye ilaaqa ab ‘Shaah e aalam’ ke naam se mash'hoor hai.

***********
Aap ko ALLĀH ta’ala ne maqaam e Mehboobiyat ata farmaaya hai. Wilaayat ka ye aala darja bahot kam Auliya ko haasil hua hai.
Jin me Aap ke ilaawa Gauṡ e aazam Shaikh Sayyed Abdul Qaadir Jeelaani (Mehboob e Sub'hāni), Khwaja Ghareeb nawaaz Moeen-ud-deen Hasan Chishti, Khwaja Sayyed Nizaam-ud-deen Auliya (Mehboob e Ilāhi), Makhdoom Sayyed Ashraf Jahaangeer Simnani rahmatullahi alaihi (Mehboob e Yazdaani) aur Hazrat Soofi Akhlaaq Ahmad saahib Naqshbandi rahmatullahi alaihi (Mehboob e Samad) saamil hain.

***********
Aap ko ALLĀH ne ye in’aam ata kiya tha ki aap jab chaahte Huzoor sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ka deedaar jaagti aankho se kar lete.

***********
Aap hamesha Sunnat e Rasool par amal karte the aur Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ka ishq me aise doobe rehte the ki Sarkar sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ki shaan me adna si bhi be-adabi ya tauheen bardasht nahi karte the aur khilaafe shariat amal karne walo se sakht muakheza farmate.

Ek martaba kisi ne azaan me Huzoor Rasool-Allah sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ka naam mubarak sunkar angoothe chumne ka saboot e sharai daryaaft kiya to aap ne farmaya ‘Hairat hai logo ke haalata par ki kisi baadshah ka naam sunkar Khaladallahu mulkhu kehte hue seene par haath rakhkar sar kham karke apni mohabbat o aqeedat ka izhaar karte hain tab is fail ka saboot e sharai kyun nahi puchhte.’

Aap roz raat ko ibaadat aur riyaazat me masroof rehte.

***********
Aap farmaate hain ki
‘Dunya ko uqaba par 3 baato me fazeelat haasil hai aur ye 3 cheezen sirf dunya me hain, uqaba me nahi – (1) Raah e khuda me kharch karna, (2) Kuffar se Jihaad karna, aur (3) Namaaz ke liye takbeer e tehreema jo mo’min ki me'araaj hai aur Huzoor pyare Aaqa sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ki aankho ki thandak hai.
Uqaba Daar-ul-in’aam ya Daar-ul-jazaa’ hai.

***********
Aap ne tamaam zindagi logo ko taaleem e deen aur dars dene me guzaari.
Aap har Jum’aa ko apni mehfil me aane waalo ke sawaalo ke jawaab dete aur wa’az aur naseehat farmaate.

Aap logo ko fuzul kaamo aur fuzul baato me waqt zaaya karne se door rehne ke liye aur apne dilo me dusro ke liye bughz aur hasad door karne ke liye farmaate.
Aur logo ko ALLĀH ta’ala par bharosa (tawakkal) rakhne ki aur us ki ibaadat karne aur us ki Hamd o Sana karne ki naseehat dete.

***********
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki mash'hoor kitaaben :

(1) Lamia-at-Taariq-al- Burhaaniya
(2) Risaala-e-Saadiqiya
(3) Munaajaat-ul-Aashiqeen.

♦ Aap ke Jum’aa ki taqreer o wa’az ka majmua ‘Khutba-e-Shaahiya’ ke naam se mash'hoor hai.

*************
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
(1) Ek Martaba aap apne ustaad Maulana Qaari Ali Jenki rahmatullāhi alaihi se Milne gae. Wo Tilaawat e Qur’an me masroof the. Itne me Ustaad e mohtaram ne farmaaya ‘Dil chaahta hai ke is waqt garm roti aur halwa hota to khaata.’
Ye sunkar aap ne foran apni takhti ke neeche haath daal kar halwa aur roti Ustaad ki khidmat me pesh ki. Ustaad ko is par badi hairat hui.
Phir batore imtihaan Ustaad ne kaha ke ‘Aap ne nihaayat nafis wa sheerin garma garm halwa khilaaya lekin mere ghar waalo ke liye to kuchh tabarruk inaayat farmae.’ Aap ne dobaara apne haath ko takhti ke neeche daala to phir se haatho me garma garm roti aur halwa maujood tha. Aap ne Ustaad ki khidmat me pesh kar diya. Aap ke Ustaad e mohataram samajh gae ke ye halwa aur roti Aap ne apni karaamat se ghaib se ata farmaaya hai.

(2) Ek martaba Aap apne Ustaad Maulana Qaari Ali Jenki se 'Mizaan us sarf' ki taaleem haasil kar rahe the. Aap ke Ustaad ne farmaish ki ke ‘Mujhe chaandi ke sikke aur gaaye ka doodh inaayat farmaen.’
Aap ne foran apni aastine Ustaad ke aage badhaai. Ek aastin me se taaza doodh se gilaas bhar kar Ustaad ki khidmat me pesh kiya. Phir dusri aastin se khankhanate hue chaandi ke sikke Ustaad e mohtaram ke aage rakhe. Ustaad ko ye karamat badi hairat hui.

(3) Ek martaba aap ke waaild Hazrat Sayyed Qutb e aalam apne saahabzaado ko saath lekar Hazrat Maulana Ali Sher Patani ke madrase par jaane ki tayyaari kar rahe the.
Hazrat Shaah e aalam apne waalid ke saath un ke ghode par sawaar hona tha. Chhoti umr ki wajah se aap ke liye alag se ghod nahi tha. Dusre bhai apne ghode par sawaar the.
Kisi bhai ne aap ko chhedne ke liye ye keh diya ke ‘Tumhare liyes ghoda nahi hai. Tum to paidal hi waalid saahab ke ghode ke saath saath daudoge.’
Aap ne qareeb ki deewaar par sawaar hokar us ko ed di. Deewaar foran ghoda ban kar daudne lagi. Hazrat Qutb e aalam jab ye maajra dekha to foran aap ko neeche utaar liya aur deewaar se mukhaatib hokar farmaaya ‘Thaher jaa.’
Us ke baad Hazrat Sayyed Qutb e aalam ne farmaaya ‘Alhmadulillāh. Aaj is farzand ko mere waalid e girami Hazrat Sayyed Naasir-ud-deen Mahmood Nausha Bhukhari rahmatullāhi alaihi 'Maqaam e Mahmoodi' ata hua.’

(4) Ek martaba Sultaan Mahmood Begda Aap ki baargaah me haazir hue aur arz kiya ‘Aaj besh qimati jawaahiraat bataure tabarruk ata kijiye.’
Ye sunkar aap muskurae aur ek khaadim se farmaaya ‘Chand khwaan (thaal) me dariya e Saabarmati se ret bharkar le aa.’ Khaadim hukm ke mutaabiq khwaan me ret bharkar le aaya. Aap ne ret se bhare hue un khwaan par ek nazar daali. ALLĀH ke fazl se un tamaam khwaano ki ret besh qimati jawaahiraat t me tabdil ho gai.

Hazrat ki is azeem karaamat ko dekhkar be-saakhta Sultaan Mahmood Begda ki zabaan se ye Sher nikal gaya :
‘Shaahe ke khaak raaba e nazar kima kunad,
Aaya buwad ke gosha e chashm e bima kunad.’

Ye sunkar Hazrat Shaah e aalam muskurae aur jawaahiraat se bhare hue khwaan Sultaan Mahmood Begda ko inaayat farmakar rukhsat kiya.

(5) Ek martaba Qaazi Najm-ud-deen Hazrat Shaah e aalam ki khidmat me haazir hue. Us waqt makaan ke sehen me ek lakdi padi hui thi. Aap ne Qaazi Najm-ud-deen ko wo lakdi laane ke liye farmaaya aur apne daste mubarak me lekar us par kuchh dam kiya. Dekhte hi dekhte wo lakdi sone ki ho gai. Aap ne wo lakdi Qaazi Najm-ud-deen ko ata farmaakar irshaad farmaaya ‘Qaazi saahab! Ise apne ghar le jaaiye, ghar waalo ke kaam aaega.’
Qaazi Najm-ud-deen ne arz kiya ‘Huzoour! Aap ka ye tohfa dil o jaan se qubool hai. Lekin meri dili muraad kuchh aur hai. Maine Aap ki baargah me haazri kisi duniyawi nafe ki khaatir ikhtiyaar nahi ki hai. Mujhe to mera dili mudda'a ata karke surkh roo farma dijiye.’ Aap ne farmaaya ‘Ye bhi lo aur wo bhi lo.’
Phir aap ne Nigaah e wilaayat ki ek tavajjoh se unhe tamaam Maqaamaat e Sulook tay kara diye.

(6) Ek martaba chand taajiro ka jahaaz kisi bandargaah ke qareeb toofaan me phans gaya tha. Jahaaz me sawaar logo ne khaufzadaa hokar chillaana shuru kar diya.
Us jahaaz me chand faqeer bhi sawaar the. Un faqeero ne kaha ke ‘Ghabraao nahi, In sha Allāh Humara jahaaz doob nahi sakta, Is liye ke az raah e nawaazish humare yaad karne se Sarkar Shaah e aalam tashreef le aaye hain aur humare jahaaz ki hifaazat farma rahe hain.’
Jab logo ne dekha to waaqai ek nihaayat haseen o jameel nooraani surat waale buzurgh toofaan se jahaaz ko khinchkar nikaal rahe hain. Jahaaz ko toofaan se nikaalne ke baad wo buzurg ghaa'ib ho gae.
Wo taajir un faqeero se pata maaloom karke Hazrat Shaah e aalam ki baargaah me aaye. Hazrat ke nooraani chehre ke deedaar karke unhe pata chala ke ye wo hi buzurg hai jo toofaan me madad karne ke liye tashreef laaye the.

(7) Hazrat Ghaazi Mohammad rahmatullāhi alaihi ko koi aulaad nahi thi. Ek martaba wo apne Peer Harzat Qutb e aalam rahmatullāhi alaihi ki baargaah me haazir hokar dua kew liye iltija karne lage. Harzat Qutb e aalam ne unhe apne saahabzaade Shaah e aalam rahmatullāhi alaihi ke paas bheja. Aap ne farmaaya ‘Agle Jum’aa ko tumhe Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke deedaar ki sa’adat naseeb hogi. Unhi ki baargaah me fariyaad rakh dena.’ Ye sunkar Hazrat Ghaazi Mohammad be-qaraar hokar Jum’aa ka intazaar karne lage. Jum’aa ko ishq o adab ke saath Durood shareef padhte hue so gaye. Khwaab me Huzoor Sarware kaa'inat sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ki ziyarat musharraf hue aur unho ne Sarkar ko salaam pesh kiya ‘Assalaatu wa salaamu alaika Ya Rasool-Allāh’. Sarkar ne un ki hatheli par 3 martaba harfe ﺡ tehreer farma diya. Subah bedaar hokar Hazrat Ghaazi Mohammad khushi khushi Shaah e aalam ki baargaah me haazir hue. Hazrat ne sab se pehle to unhe seene se lagaaya aur phir un ki aankho ko bosa diya aur farmaaya ‘Mubarak ho, tumhe 3 farzand ata honge aur un ke naam Hameed, Haamid aur Hammaad honge aur teeno saahib e wilaayat honge.” ALLĀH ke fazl se Hazrat Ghaazi Mohammad ko 3 bete paida hue.

(8) Ek martaba Hazrat Meer Sadr-ud-deen Bhikhari Hazrat Shaah e aalam ke deedaar ke iraade se Aap ki khaanqaah me haazir hue lekin Hazrat ki mulaaqaat na ho saki. Un ke saathi waapas jaane lage lekin unho ne dil me iraada kiya ke jab tak meri aarzoo puri na hogi me waapas na jaaunga.
Abhi dil me ye socha hi tha ke foran Hazrat ne unhe talab farmaaya. Jab wo haazir hue to Aap ne farmaaya ‘Aao Sadr-ud-deen! Hum Hazrat Ādam alaihis salaam ke Naqsh e qadam ki ziyarat kar aayen.’ Unho ne dast basta arz kiya ‘Jaisa Irshaad e aali ho.’
Aap foran uthe aur Chandola taalaab ki taraf tezi se chale aur Hazrat Sadr-ud-deen bhi Aap ke pichhe pichhe gaye. Unho ne dekha ke Taalaab ke kinaare 2 ghode saaz o saamaan ke saath aarasta khade hain. Ek Ghode par Hazrat Shaah e aalam khud sawaar hue aur Hazrat Sadr-ud-deen dusre ghode par sawaar hone ka farmaaya.
Sawaar hote hi un ghodo ne par khole aur fizaa me udne lage aur palak jhapkne ki der me dono Sarandip pahunch gaye aur Naqsh e Paa e Hazrat Ādam alaihis salaam ki ziyarat se musharraf hue. Aur phir unhi ghodo par udkar waaapas Chandola Taalaab ke kinare aaye. Phir wo ghode gaa'ib ho gaye.

(9) Deccan ke raaja ke bete ko juzaam (leprosy) ki beemaari hui. Koi hakeem use theek nahi kar paaya. Aakhir me Hazrat Shaah e Aalam ki shohrat sunkar us ne apne bete ko khaadimo ke saath Ahmedabad bheja.
Jab wo log Hazrat ki baargaah me aaye to Hazrat Shaah Abdul Lateef Aap ko wuzu kara rahe the. Un logo ne saari baat batai aur dua karne ke liye arz ki. Aap ne Shaah Abdul Lateef ko us ladke ke zakhmo par aur us ke jism par wuzu ka bacha hua paani bahaane ke liye kaha. Phir us paani ke chand qatre use pilaaye. ALLĀH ke fazl se wo ladka foran tandurast ho gaya.

***********
Ek martaba Hazrat Shaah e aalam Huzoor Sarware kaa'inat sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ki ziyarat se musharraf hue to aap ne baargaah e Nabawi me iltija ki ‘Apne qadmo se meri khaanqaah ko zinnat bakhshen.’ Huzoor sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ne waada farmaaya.
Is ke chand din baad aap bahot beemaar hue aur 10 din tak masnad e irshaad par tashreef na la sake. 10 din baad jab sehatyaab hue aur khaanqaah tashreef le gaye aur apne takht par jalwa afroz hokar talba se farmaaya ke apne sabak nikaalo to wo Bukhari shareef kholkar sabak dikhaane lage to aap ne farmaaya ‘Tumhara sabak to kahi safaat pehle ka hai. Ye aage ka sabak kyun nikaal rahe ho?’ To sab ne kaha ‘Huzoor kal hi to aap ne hume pichhle baab ka daur karaaya hai aur hum ye hadees nahi samajh sake to aap ne is ka ye mafhoom bataaya tha aur yaha hume ye shak hua to aap ne ye baat kehkar humara shak door farmaaya tha.’ Aap ko hairat hui. Sabhi talba ke chehre par sadaaqat ko paaya. Aap foran gardan jhukakar muraaqaba me kho gaye. Talba ko aap ke chehre par paseene ke aasaar nazar aaye. Phir achaanak aap takht se neeche utre aur use bosa dene lage aur aap ki aankho se aansoo jaari ho gaye. Kuchh der tak adab se haath baandhkar khade rahe. Phir farmaaya ‘Ya Jadadi Ya Sayyedi aap ne waada wafa farmaaya.’
Phir aap ne ek ke baad ek tamaam talba ko seene se lagaaya aur farmaaya ‘Tum sab bahot hi khushqismat ho ke Huzoor Sarwar e kaa'inat Pyare Aaqa sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ne 10 din tak dars diya.’

Is ke baad aap ‘Hum Sabi e Mustufa (sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam)’ ke naam se mash'hoor ho gaye.

Is ke baad aap us takht par kabhi nahi baithe aur use ba-adab ek goshe me rakh diya aur apne liye ek naya takht banaaya.

Aap ke wisaal ke baad aashiqo ne dono mubarak takht ko Shaah e aalam ki masjid me laga diya.
Shaah e aalam baaba ki dua se in takhto ke neeche 2-2 rak’at nafl namaaz padhkar dua karne wale ko ALLĀH ta’ala dunya aur aakhirat me bhalai ata farmaata hai aur har jaa'iz dua qubool farmaata hai.

***********
Pariwaar :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki 3 biwiya, 5 bete aur 4 betiya hain.

3 Biwiya :
(1) Bibi Rabia
(2) Bibi Marqi
(3) Bibi Mulgi.

Saahabzaade :
(1) Sayyed Naasir-ud-deen Raaju Muhammad (Sattaar e aalam)
(2) Sayyed Naseer-ud-deen Muhammad (Shaikh Muhammad)
(3) Sayyed Burhaan-ud-deen Muhammad (Shaah Budhan)
(4) Sayyed Muhammad Beg (Shaah Bhikan)
(5) Sayyed Sultaan Misri.

Saahabzaadiya :
(1) Bibi Faatima
(2) Bibi Zainab
(3) Bibi Khadeeja
(4) Bibi Sughra.

***********
Aap Hazrat Qutb e aalam Sayyed Burhaan-ud-deen Abdullāh rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aap se Tareeqat ka ‘(Suharwardi Jalaali) Shaahiya’ silsila jaari hai.

Aap ko Hazrat Shaikh Baba Baarakullāh Chishti rahmatullāhi alaihi se ‘Chishti Nizaami’ silsile ki bhi khilaafat mili hai.
Unho ne hi aap ko ‘Shaah e aalam’ ka khitaab diya.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Maulana Shaikh Ahmad Miyan Makhdoom rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(2) Hazrat Qaazi Sayyed Kamaal-ud-deen Ismā'eel Isfahani rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(3) Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Shaah Mohammad Zaahid rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(4) Hazrat Malik Shaah Abdul Lateef Daawr-ul-mulk rahmatullāhi alaihi (Amaran, Jamnagar),
(5) Hazrat Khwaja Hameed-ud-deen Chaheldaah Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi (Birpur),
(6) Hazrat Malik Qutb-ud-deen, rahmatullāhi alaihi
(7) Hazrat Sultaan Shaah Ghajni rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(8) Hazrat Khwaja Ahmad bin Dosan rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(9) Hazrat Qaazi Shaah Hammaad rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(10) Hazrat Maulana Shaikh Muhammad Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi.

***********
Aap ka wisaal 16 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 880 Hijri (1475 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ki namaaz e janaaza Hazrat Qaazi Sayyed Ismā’eel Isfahani rahmatullāhi alaihi ne padhaai.

Aap ka mazaar Ahmedabad (Gujarat) me hai.

***********
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Shaah e aalam Sayyed Siraaj-ud-deen Muhammad rahmatullāhi alaihi ke aur Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Injeel ka nuzool kis tarikh ko hua?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Title: Hazrat Makhdoom Shaikh Ahmad Abdul Haq Rudaulwi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Makhdoom Shaikh Ahmad Abdul Haq Rudaulwi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Makhdoom e Rudauli, Shaikh ul Aalam, Saahib e Tosha, Dastageer e bekasaan.

************
Aap ki wilaadat 21 Zil Qa’ada 737 Hijri (June 1337 A.D.) ko Rudauli me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Shaikh Umar bin Shaikh Daawūd hai.

Aap Hazrat Umar Faarooq radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ki nasl se hain.

Aap ke daada Shaikh Daawūd Sultaan Ala-ud-deen Khilji ke zaamane me Balkh se Hindustan aaye.

***************
Aap ko bachpan se hi ibaadat wa riyaazat ka shauq tha.

7 saal ki umr me aap ne namaaz e Tahajjud padhna shuru kiya.

Aap ne Delhi me Uloom-e-Zaahiri ki taaleem haasil ki.

Ek baar jangal me ghumte ghumte aap Panipat pahunch gaye.
Hazrat Shaah Jalaal-ud-deen Mahmood Kabeer ul Auliya rahmatullāhi alaihi ne aap ke aane se pehle apne khuddaam ko lazeez khaane aur phalo ka intazaam karne ke liye farmaaya. Jab aap Hazrat ki baargaah me pahunche to Hazrat ne aap ka imtihaan ke liye dastarkhwaan par khaane ki cheezo ke saath chand haraam cheese bhi rakhwaai. Aap ne jab khaane ki cheezo ke saath un haraam cheezo ko dekha to aap foran waha se chale gaye. Pura din chalne ke baad sham ko aap ek shaher me pahunche. Jab aap shaher se baahar kisi ko puchhne par pata chala ke ye Panipat hai. Aap ko ta’ajjub hua aur aap ne socha ke shaayad main raasta bhul gaya is liye waapas Panipat pahunch gaya hu.
Aap phir se waha se door jaane ke liye nikle magar dusre din bhi shaam ko phir se Panipat pahunch gaye. Teesre din bhi yahi muamla hua.
Aap shaher ke baahar tashwish me khade the ke safed libaas me ek buzurg dikhaai diye. Aap ne un se raasta puchha to unho ne farmaaya ke ‘Tum Hazrat Shaah Jalaal-ud-deen Mahmood Kabeer ul Auliya ka raasta chhodkar aaye ho.’
Aap aage chalne lage aur raaste me alag alag 2 shakhso ko raasta puchha to unho ne bhi Hazrat Shaah Jalaal-ud-deen Mahmood Kabeer ul Auliya ki khaanqaah ka raasta bataaya.
Ab aap samajh gaye ke Hazrat ki khaanqaah me jo waaqya paish aaya tha wo ek imtihaan tha. Aap Hazrat ki khaanqaah me waapas aaye aur Hazrat ke mureed hue.

Hazrat Shaah Jalaal-ud-deen Mahmood Kabeer ul Auliya se aap ne Uloom-e-Baatini ki taalim haasil ki.

**************
Bai’at ke baad Aap ek qabr banaakar musalsal 6 mahine tak us ke andar mujaahida karte rahe. Is ke baad hukm e ilāhi se aap ke Peer ne aap ko ‘Abdul Haq’ naam diya aur khilaafat ata farmaai.

Is ke baad Ayodhya shaher ki Saryu nadi ke paani me khade khade musalsal 9 maah ki mujaahida karte rahe. Is ke ekhtetaam par baargah e Nabawi se bashaarat ata hui aur Hazrat Ali Murtaza radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ne tashreef laakar bataur e in’aam Dua e Haidari ki taalim ata farmaai.

**************
Phir Peer se ijaazat lekar Rudauli waapas aaye aur khaanqaah banaakar taaleem aur faiz ata karte rahe.

**************
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
(1) Ek martaba Aap ne farmaaya ‘Agar main ek deg khaana pakaau jis se khalq e Khuda ko faa'ida ho.’
Is ke baad ek deg khaana paka kar ek raaste par rakh diya. 3 din tak tamaam aane jaane waale log us deg se khaate rahe lekin us me kuchh kami na aai.
Phir Aap ko mehsoos hua ke is se meri shohrat hogi aur sufi ke liye shohrat achhi baat nahi. Ye sochkar Aap ne farmaaya ‘Ahmad! Bande sab khuda ke hain. Wo Razzaaq e mutlaq hai, Us ki shaan badi hai. Wo jaane aur us ke bande jaane, tum darmiyaan me na pado.’ Ye kehkar aap ne deg ko ulat diya.

(2) Ek martaba ek baaraat puri aaraaish ke saath aap ke saamne se guzri. Aap ne aalam e wajd me us baaraat par nazar daali to jalaal ke sabab tamaam aadmi aur ghode wahi par jalkar khaak ho gaye.
Thodi der ke baad jab kuchh ifaqa hua to logo ne aap se wo waaqia arz kiya. Aap ne dobaara us raakh par jamaal ki nazar daali to sab log uth khade hue aur ba-dastoor chalne lage.

Ek arse tak aap ne nikaah nahi kiya.
Jab aap ne nikaah kiya to aap ke yaha jo bacha paida hota wo paida hote hi ‘Haq haq haq’ kehta aur inteqaal farmaata. Har baar aisa hone ki wajah aap ki biwi rone lagi. Aap ne farmaaya ‘In sha Allāh is baar aisa nahi hoga.’ Is ke baad aap saahabzaada paida hua wo zinda raha jis ka naam Shaikh Muhammad Aarif hai.

**************
Aap Hazrat Shaah Jalaal-ud-deen Mahmood Kabeer ul Auliya rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aur ‘Chishti Saabri’ silsile ke shaikh hain.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Quddoos Gangohi,
(2) Hazrat Shaikh Muhammad Aarif,
(3) Hazrat Shaikh Fareed Bakthiyari.

************
Aap ka wisaal 15 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 837 Hijri (January 1434 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Rudauli (Uttar Pradesh) me hai.

************
Ek din majma e aam me aap ki turbat mubarak shaq hui (khul gai) aur Aap apne jism e zaahiri ke saath tashreef laaye aur Shaikh Abdul Quddoos Gangohi ka haath pakadkar farmayaa ‘Abdul Quddoos! Tumhe khuda tak pahuncha diya. Jaao Apne kaam par lag jaao.’

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Makhdoom Shaikh Ahmad Abdul Haq Rudaulwi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Imaam Abu Haamid Muhammad al-Ghazaali rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Imaam Abu Haamid Muhammad al-Ghazaali rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
¯¯¯¯¯¯
Hujjat-ul-Islaam, Zain-ud-deen, Sharaf-ul-Aa'imma.

*************
Aap ki wilaadat 450 Hijri (1058 A.D.) me Tabaran (Tus, Iran) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Muhammad ibn Muhammad hai.
Aap ke waalid oon kaatkar bechte the.

Bachpan me hi Aap ke waalid ka inteqaal ho gaya.

*************
Aap ne Tus me me ibtidaai taaleem haasil ki aur Hazrat Ahmad bin Muhammad al-Razakani rahmatullāhi alaihi se fiqh ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Phir 20 ssal ki umr me Jurjaan jaakar Imaam Abu Nasr Ismāeeli rahmatullāhi alaihi se ta’aleem hail ki. Phir Tus waapas aaye aur waha 3 saal rahe.
Phir Nishapur me Imaam al-Juwaini rahmatullāhi alaihi se ta’aleem haasil ki.
477 Hijri (1085 A.D.) me Imaam al-Juwaini ke inteqaal ke baad aap Nishapur chhodkar Khwaja Nizaam-ul-Mulk Abu Ali Hasan al-Tusi ki baargaah me gaye.
484 Hijri (1091 A.D.) me Khwaja Nizaam-ul-Mulk ne aap ko ‘Zain-ud-deen’ (Brilliance of the Religion) aur ‘Sharaf-ul-Aa'imma’ (Eminence among the Religious Leaders) ke alqaab ata farmaaye aur Aap ko Baghdad ke Madrasa Nizaamiya ki zimmedaari ata ki.
488 Hijri (1095 A.D.) me Aap apni tamaam milkiyat bechkar wo maal apne khaandan ko guzara karne ke liye de diya aur aap Hajj ke liye rawaana ho gaye.
Damishk aur Jerusalem me kuchh waqt guzaarne ke baad 489 Hijri (1096 A.D.) aap ne Madeena aur Makka jaakr hajj ada kiya.
Phir Tus waapas aakar aap ne kuchh saal uzla (tanhai) me guzaare.
Phir Aap ne zawiya (private madrasa) aur khaanqaah me logo ko taaleem dena shuru kiya.
499 Hijri (1106 A.D.) me Sultaan Ahmad Sanjar ke wazeer Fakhr-ul-Mulk ne kai baar Nishapur ke Madrasa Nizaamiyya me aane ke liye kaha. Magar Aap ne har baar inkaar kiya.
Is ke baad 503 Hijri (1110 A.D.) me Sultaan Muhammad ke wazeer ne Aap ko Baghdad waapas aane ke liye kaha. Aap ne us ko bhi mana kiya.

*************
Aap hamesha saadgi pasand karte the.

Ek martaba Makka mukarrama me qayaam ke dauraan Aap nihaayat saada aur maamooli libaas pehne hue the. Hazrat Abdur Rahmān Tusi ne arz kiya ‘Aap ke paas is ke ilaawa aur koi libaas nahi hai. Hazaaro log aap ke mureed hain aur aap ko Imaam e waqt aur Peshwa e qaum maante hai.’
Aap ne jawaab diya ‘Aise shakhs ka libaas kya dekhte ho jo is duniya me ek musaafir ki tarah muqeem hua aur jo is kaa'inaat ki ranginiyo ko faani aur waqti tasawwur karta ho. Jab Huzoor Sarwar e kaa'inaat sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam is Duniya me Musafir ki tarah rahe aur kuchh maal o zar jama na kiya to meri kya haisiyat ya haqeeqat hai.’

*************
Aap 5wi sadi ke Mujaddid e Islaam hain.

*************
Aqwaal :
¯¯¯¯¯¯
(1) Insaan jitna Tangdasti se darta hai agar utna Jahannam se darta to dono se najaat pa leta, Aur jitni use Daulat se mohabbat hai agar Jannat se utni mohabbat hoti to dono ko paa leta, Aur jitna Zaahir me Logon se darta hai agar utna Baatin me ALLĀH ta’ala se darta to dono jahaan ki Sa’aadat paa leta.

(2) Khwaahishaat baadshaah ko bhi ghulaam bana deti hai aur Sabr wa parhez ghulaam ko bhi baadshaah bana deti hai.

(3) Rizq ALLĀH ta’ala ka waada hai to kisi bande se is ki umeed mat rakho.

(4) Narm alfaaz (guftagu) sakht patthar jaise dil ko bhi narm bana sakte hain aur sakht alfaaz resham jaise narm dil ko bhi sakht bana sakte hai.

(5) Daawat qubool karne me Ameer o Ghareeb ka farq na karo aur Door hone ki wajah se daawat radd na karo.

(6) Duniya ke saare insaan murda hain, Zinda woh hai jo Ahle Ilm hai.
Saare Ahle Ilm So rahe hai, Jaag woh raha hai jo Amal kar raha hai.
Saare Ahle Amal khasaare me hai, Kaamyaab woh hai jis ne Khuloos ke saath amal kiya.

*************
Aap farmaate hain ki
‘Awaam ka Farz hai ki Eimaan aur islaam laakar Ibaadat aur apne rozgaar me mashgool rahe. Ilmi masa'il ko Ulma e deen ke hawaale kar de. Aam shakhs ka ilmi silsile me hujjat karna zina aur chori se bhi zyada nuqsaan-deh aur khatarnaak hai, Kyun ki jo shakhs deeni uloom ki baseerat aur pukhtagi nahi agar wo ALLĀH aur us ke deen ke masa'il me bahes karta hai to bahot mumkin hai ki wo aisi ray qaa'im kare jo Kufr ho aur us ko ehsaas bhi na ho ki wo jo us ne samjha hai wo kufr hai. Is ki misaal is tarah hai ke kisi ko tairna na aata ho aur samundar me kood pade.’

(Ihya’ ul uloom ul deen, Jild -3, Safa -36)

*************
Aap ne taqreeban 70 kitaaben likhi hain.

Aap ki mash'hoor kitaaben :

(1) Tasawwuf :
Ihya’ ul uloom ul deen
Kimiya-e-sa’ādat [Faarsi]
Mizaan-ul-amal
Bidaayat ul-hidaayah
Naseehat ul-muluk [Farsi]
Al-Munqidh min ul-dalaal
Minhaaj-ul-Aabideen

(2) Kalaam :
Hujjat-ul-Haq
Al-Iqtisad fil-itiqad
Al-maqsad al-asna fee sharah asma Allahu al-husna
Jawaahir al-Qur'an wa duraruh
Fayasl al-tafriqa bayn al-Islaam wal-zandaqa
Mishkaat al-Anwaar
Tafseer al-yaqut al-ta’wil

(3) Falsafa :
Maqaasid al-Falasifa
Tahafut al-Falasifa
Miyar al-Ilm fi fan al-Mantiq
Mihak al-Nazar fi al-mantiq
Al-Qistaas-ul-mustaqim

(4) Fiqh :
Fatawy al-Ghazaali
Al-wasit fi-ul-mazhab
Kitaab tahzeeb-ul-Isul
Al-Mustasfa fi ilm-ul-isul
Asas-ul-Qiyaas

♦ Aap ne Baadshaaho, Wazeero, Qaazi aur apne dosto ko jo khat likhe the us ka majmua ‘Faza'ilul al-anam min rasa'ili Hujjat al-Islaam’ naam se mash'hoor hai.

*************
Aap Hazrat Khwaja Shaikh Abu Ali Fazl ibn Muhammad al-Faarmadi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap ke khalifa Hazrat Abu Muhammad ibn Saalih ibn Harzihim rahmatullāhi alaihi hain.

*************
Apne wisaal ke din namaaz e fajr ada karne ke baad Aap ne apne bhai Hazrat Shaikh Ahmad al-Ghazaali ko safed kapda laane ke liye kaha aur jab wo lekar aaye to Aap ne apne kafan ko chuma aur phir use bichhakar us par lait gaye aur farmaaya ‘Aye mere Rab! Main khushi ke saath teri ita’at karta hu.’ Aur inteqaal farmaaya.

Aap ka wisaal 14 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 505 Hijri (19 December 1111 A.D.) ko Peer ke roz hua.

Aap ka mazaar Tus (Iran) me hai.

******
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Imaam Muhammad al-Ghazaali rahmatullāhi alaihi aur Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko sahi ilme deen haasil karne ki aur nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Alqaab: Sayyed-ul-Ulama, Imam-ul-Munaazireen. Hazrat Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullahi alaihi ki wiladat 25 Rajab 1333 Hijri (9 June 1915 A.D.) ko Budh ke roz Marehra Shareef me hui. Hazrat Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullahi alaihi ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Sayyed Shaah Aale Ibaa Basheer Haidar bin Sayyed Husain Haidar Barkaati rahmatullahi alaihi aur waalida ka naam Sayyeda Ikraam Faatima Shahar Banu binte Sayyed Shaah Abul Qaasim Ismaeel Hasan Barkaati hai. Hazrat Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullahi alaihi Husaini saadaat hain. 4 saal, 4 mahine aur 4 din ki umr me Aap Bismillah khwaani ki gayi. Huzoor Ghaus e azam Abdul Qadir Jilani ke daste mubarak se likhi hui ‘Bismillah’ se shuruat ki gayi. Aap ne apni waalida Sayyeda Ikraam Faatima Shahar Banu, Hafiz Aashiq Ali Barkaati aur Hafiz Saleem-ud-deen saahab se ta’aleem haasil ki aur 8 saal ki umr me Hafiz e Qur’an hue. Apni waalida se Faarsi ki ta’aleem haasil ki aur apne maamu Hazrat Tajul Ulama Mufti Sayyed Shah Aulaade Rasool Mohammad Miyan rahmatullahi alaihi se Faarsi ki kitaabo ki majeed ta’aleem haasil ki. Phir Aap ne Ajmer me Hazrat Sadrushshariah Mufti Amjad Ali Aazmi rahmatullahi alaihi se ta’aleem haasil ki. Hazrat Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullahi alaihi ne Bahra Tayyiba College Aligarh Muslim University se 1375 Hijri (1956 A.D.) me Diploma in Indian Medicine & Surgery (D.I.M.S.) ki degree bhi haasil ki. Hazrat Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullahi alaihi ek azeem Aalim, Mufti, Mufassir, Muhaddees, Mufakkir, Muhaqqiq, Khateeb, Munaazir, Shaayar, Tabeeb, Siyaasat-daan, Sufi aur Aarif the. Aap Mumbai Bakr Qassaab Jama’at ke Qazi aur Imam the. Aap Khaanqaah-e-Marehra ke Sajjaada nasheen aur Mutawalli bhi rahe. Aap ‘All India Sunni Jamiatul Ulama’ ke baani me se hain aur Aap uske Sadr bhi rahe. Tasannif: Hazrat Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullahi alaihi ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaabein:
  1. Khuba e Sadaarat
  2. Sirat e Khwaja Ghareeb nawaz
  3. Muqaddas Khaatoon
  4. Nayi Roshni
  5. Faiz e Tambeeh.
Aap ka nikah Qaisar Jahaan Begum binte Sayyed Aale Habeeb se hua. Aap (apne nana) Hazrat Sayyed Shah Ismaeel Hasan urfe Shaah Ji Miyan Barkaati rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain. (Aap ke maamu) Hazrat Tajul-Ulama Mufti Sayyed Shah Aulad e Rasool Mohammad Miyan rahmatullahi alaihi ne bhi (1362 Hijri me) Aap ko khilafat ata farmayi hai. Hazrat Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullahi alaihi ke khulfa:
  1. Sayyed Aale Rasool Hasnain miyan urfe Nazmi miyan Barkaati Marehrawi rahmatullahi alaihi (apke sahabzadein)
  2. Hazrat Sayyed Muhammad Ashraf Barkaati Marehrawi rahmatullahi alaihi
  3. Hazrat Maulana Sakhaawat Ali rahmatullahi alaihi (Maghar).
Hazrat Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullahi alaihi wisaal 11 Jamaadi us saani 1394 Hijri (1 July 1974 A.D.) ko Shabe Peer ko 60 saal ki umr me hua. Hazrat Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Marehra Shareef (Uttar Pradesh) me hai. ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Sayyed-ul-Ulama Sayyed Aale Mustafa Marehrwi rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah aur Ahle bait ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke Imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye. Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye. Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Baaba Samaasi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Baaba Samaasi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap ki wilaadat 25 Rajab 591 Hijri (5/6 July 1195 A.D.) ko Samaas, Ramitan (Uzbekistan) me hui.

****************
Aap ne Qur’an, Hadeeṡ, Fiq'h, Ilm e Istadalaal, Kalaam, Falsafa, aur Tawaarikh ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Aap Haafiz e Qur’an the.

****************
Is ke baad Aap ne Hazrat Khwaja Azeezan Ali Ramitani rahmatullāhi alaihi se Tasawwuf ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Khwaja Azeezan Ali Ramitani ke farmaan par Aap roz tanhai me Mujaahida karte rahe. Aakhirkaar aap Wilaayat ke aala maqaam par pahunch gaye.

Apne wisaal ke pehle Khwaja Azeezan Ali Ramitani ne Aap ko khilaafat ata farmaai.

Aap apne Taqwa wa Zohad aur karaamat ki wajah se mash'hoor the.

*****************
Aqwaal :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap farmaate hain ke
(1) Soofi ko hamesha paaband e Shariat hona chaahiye aur zaahiri aur baatini paakizgi ikhtiyaar karna chaahiye.
Us ka dil har cheez se paak hona chaahiye aur ALLĀH ta’ala ke siwa kisi ki taraf tawajjoh nahi karni chaahiye aur apne haalaat zaahir nahi karne chaahiye.
Ummeed aur Qana’at ke zariye Qalb ko paak rakhna chaahiye. Haya aur Adab ke zariye Nafs ko paak rakhna chaahiye. Tarq e Khwaahishaat ke zariye Jism ko paak rakhna chaahiye. Halaal khaana aur Parhez ke zariye Pait ko paak rakhna chaahiye. Neki aur mahenat ke zariye Haatho ko paak rakhna chaahiye. Zikr aur Istaghfaar ke zariye Zabaan ko paak rakhna chaahiye. Aakhirat ke khauf ke zariye khud ko Ghaflat aur susti se paak rakhna chaahiye.

(2) Hamesha Tauba wa istaghfaar karte raho, har muamle me ehtiyaat rakho, saaleheen ko itteba (pairwi) karo, un ke dars par amal karo aur apne dil ko har waswase se mehfooz rakho.

*****************
Aap Hazrat Khwaja Azeezan Ali Ramitani rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aur ‘Khwajagaaniya’ silsila ke shaikh hain.

Aap ke khalifa Hazrat Sayyed Shams-ud-deen Ameer Kulaal rahmatullāhi alaihi hain.

************
Aap ka wisaal 10 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 755 Hijri (2/3 July 1354 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Samaas, Bukhara (Uzbekistan) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Baaba Samaasi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Imaam Qaazi Ayaaz ibn Moosā al-Yahsubi al-Sabti rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Imaam Qaazi Ayaaz ibn Moosā al-Yahsubi al-Sabti rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap ki wilaadat 476 Hijri (1083 A.D.) me Sabta (Ceuta) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Moosā ibn Ayaaz al-Yahsubi hai.

Aap Yamen ke Yahsub qabeele se ta’alluq rakhte hain.
Aap ke pardaada Andalusia (Spain) se Shahere Faas muntaqil hue aur phir Sabta me mustaqil sukoonat pazeer hue.

************
Aap ne Sabta (Ceuta) me Hazrat Qaazi Abu Abdullāh Muhammad bin Isā se ta’aleem haasil ki.

506 Hijri se 507 Hijri (1114 A.D.) tak Aap ne Cordoba, Murcia, Almeria, aur Granada safar karke ta’aleem haasil ki.
Murcia me Hazrat Abu Ali al-Sadafi ne Aap ko ijaazat ata farmai.

Aap ne Abu Abdullāh ibn Hamdin aur Abul Hasan ibn Siraaj se bhi ta’aleem haasil ki.

Aap ke shaagrido me Mohammad ibn-ul-Hajj, Muhammad ibn Ahmad ibn Rushd, Ahmad bin Abdur Rahmān al-Qurtubi mash'hoor hain.

************
Aap Maaliki mazhab ke muqallid the.

515 Hijri (1121 A.D.) se 530 Hijri (1136 A.D.) tak Aap Sabta (Ceuta) ke Qaazi rahe.

531 Hijri me Aap Gharnaatah (Granada) tashreef laaye aur Qaazi bane.

************
Apni ta’aleemaat aur Tasannif ke zariye Aap ne azeem khidmate deen ki hai.

Aap ne Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke ikhtiyaar aur ilme ghaib par ṡaboot pesh kiye.

Muhammad ibn Tumart ne jab Mahdi hone ka daawa kiya to Aap ne daleel ke saath use radd kiya.
Hukoomat ne Aap ko jila watan kar diya. Aap pehle Tadla aur phir Marrakech me qayaam pazeer rahe.

************
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :

(1) Shifa Ba-Ta’arife Huqooq-ul-Mustafa sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam
(2) Tarteeb-ul-mardarik wa-Taqreeb-ul-masalik li ma’arifat alam mazhab Maalik (Maaliki Ulama ki sirat e mubarak)
(3) Al-Ilma ila Ma’arifa Usool al-Riwaaya wa Taqyid al-Sama
(4) Ikmal-ul-mualim bi fawaa'id Muslim (Tafseer e Saheeh Muslim)
(5) Bughya-ul-ra'i lima Tadmanahu Hadeeṡ Umm Zara min al-Fawaa'id,
(6) Al-Ilam bi Hudood Qawaa'id al-Islaam (Arkaan e Islaam)
(7) Mashaariq-ul-Anwaar ala Saheeh al-At'har (al-Muwatta Malik ibn Anas, Saheeh Al-Bukhari aur Saheeh Muslim)
(8) Al-Tanbihat al-Mustanbata ala al-kutoob al-Mudawwana wa al-Mukhtalata
(9) Daqaa'iq al-akhbar fee Zikr-ul-jannah wal-naar.

************
Al-Mohad ke saath aitraaz ki wajah se Aap ko neza maarkar shaheed kar diya gaya aur phir Aap ke jisme paak ke tukde kar diye gaye.

Aap ka wisaal 9 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 544 Hijri ko Jum’aa ke roz hua.

Aap ka mazaar Baab-ul-Ailen, Marrakesh (Morocco) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Imaam Qaazi Ayaaz ibn Moosā al-Yahsubi al-Sabti rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Shams-ud-deen Turk Panipati rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Shams-ud-deen Turk Panipati rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Shams-ul-Ard (The Sun of Earth), Shehanshaah e Panipat.

*********
Aap ki wilaadat Turkstan me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Sayyed Ahmad hai.

Aap Hasani saadaat hain.

***********
Aap ne Qir’at, Tafseer, Hadees aur Fiqh ki taaleem haasil ki. Aur Haafiz e Qur’an hue.

12 Zil Hijja 658 Hijri (November 1260 A.D.) ko Paak Patan pahunche aur Baaba Fareed-ud-deen Ganje Shakar se Bai'at ke liye guzarish ki. Magar Baaba Fareed ne unhe Kaliyar jaakar Khwaja Makhdoom Saabir Piya ka Mureed bankar Chishti silsile ka faiz haasil karne ke liye farmaaya.
Aap 21 durvesh ke giroh ke saath Kaliyar ke liye rawaana hue. Wo log Kaliyar se 24 mile ki doori par pahunche. Ye wo ilaaqa tha jaha se koi bhi aage nahi ja sakta tha. Phir Hazrat Aleemullāh Abdaal waha aaye aur sab ko apne saath aage le gaye.
Jab sab log Hazrat Saabir pya ki baargaah me pahunche to Harzat Istighraaq me the. 21 din tak intazaar karne ke baad baaqi sab log waha se chale gaye. Us ke baad 22we din aap akele the is liye aap ne Tilaawat e Qur’an shuru kiya. Kuchh waqt ke baad aap thodi der ke liye rooke. Kuchh der baad Tilaawat e Qur’an ki aawaaz phir se shuru na hui to Hazarate Saabir piya ne wajah jaanne ke liye apni aankhen kholi. Jab unho ne dekha ke Hazrate Shams-ud-deen thak gaye hain to un ko baithkar Tilaawat e Qur’an shuru karne ke liye farmaaya. Aap ne jawaab diya ‘Mere Aaqa khade ho aur main baith jaau ye khilaaf e adab hai.’ Ye sunkar Saabir piya khud baith gaye aur un se puchha ‘Kya tumhe Baaba Fareed ne yaha bheja hai?’ Aap ne kaha ‘Mere Aaqa behtar jaante hain.’ Ye sunkar Saabir piya ne farmaya ‘Jis tarah aasmaan me ek sooraj hai usi tarah zameen par is faqeer ke paas ek sooraj hai.’
Phir Saabir piya ne aap ko mureed banaaya aur aap ko Paak Patan waapas jaakar Baba Fareed ki khidmat karne ke liye farmaaya.

Aap waha gaye aur Baba Fareed ke farmaan par din ko jangal me lakdiya kaatkar jama karke bechte aur raat me ibaadat karte. Aap 4 saal ke tak Baba Fareed ki khidmat karte rahe.

Baba Fareed ke wisaal ke baad 12 Moharram 661 Hijri (November 1262 A.D.) ko jab aap waapas kaliyar aaye to aap ne dekha ke Saabir piya usi haal me gooler ke darakht ko pakadkar mujaahida me khade hain. Jab Saabir piya ko hosh aaya to aap ne un ko amaama shareef aur dusre tabarrukaat ata farmae aur Hazrat Khwaaja Nizaam-udd-een Auliya aur Hazrat Khwaaja Nasir-ud-din Chiraagh Dehlwi rahmatullāhi alaihi ki maujoodgi me aap ko khilaafat ata farmai. Aur farmaaya ‘Aye Shams-ud-deen, Main ALLĀH se dua karta hu ki Tum se mera silsila qayaamat tak jaari rahega.’

19 Moharram 684 Hijri (March 1285 A.D.) ko Saabir piya ne aap ko 6 saal tak zameen ke andar rehkar Habse kabeer ka Mujaahida karne ke liye farmaaya.
Saabir piya ne apni ungli ke ek harkat se zameen me ek qabr tayyar ki aur Alimullāh Abdaal ko us me Hazrate Shams-ud-deen ke liye paani ka ek gilaas aur kuchh rotiya rakhne ke liye kaha.
6 saal baad jab Aap ko baahar nikaala gaya to aadha gilaas paani aur aadhi rotiya bachi thi.

Us ke baad Saabir piya ne Aap ko Chittor jaakar Sultaan Ala-ud-deen Khilji ko Amber ka Qila fateh karne me madad karne ke liye farmaaya aur farmaaya ‘Jis din tum apni pehli karaamat zaahir karoge usi din tumhare peer ka wisaal hoga.’ Ye sunkar aap ki aankho me aansoo aa gaye. Aur Phir Saabir piya ne apne janaa'iz ke baare me tamaam jaankaari di.
Aur Aap ko Panipat ki Sardaari ata farmai.

Jab Amber ka Qila fateh nahi ho raha tha to Sultan Ala-ud-deen Khilji ne Aap ko dua karne ke liye arz ki. Aap ki dua se qila fateh hua.
Us ke baad aap Kaliyar waapas aaye. 13 Rabi ul awwal 690 Hijri ko Saabir piya ka wisaal ho chuka tha. Aap ne apne peer ki wasiyat ke mutaabiq janaaza ki tayyari ki. Jab janaaza tayyar karke rakh diya gaya to ek naqaab-posh ghood-sawaar shakhs ne aakar Saabir piya ki namaaz e janaaza padhai aur jab wo jaane lage to un se un ki pehchaan bataane ke liye kaha aur unho ne apna naqaab hataaya to pata chala ke wo khud Saabir piya hi the jo apne mureed ko Fana aur Baqa ka Matlab bataane ke aaye the.

Ye dekhkar Hazrate Shams-ud-deen be-hosh hokar gir gaye aur girne ke baad waha se gaa'ib ho gaye aur Turkistan ke Firkhaar shaher me pahunch gaye. Aap Firkhaar ke pahaad par ek saal tak mujaahida me mashgool rahe.

Is ke baad Kashan, Tehran, Badakshan, Qandhar, Kabul aur Lahore ka safar karte hue aap 4 Zil Qa’ada 693 Hijri ko Panipat waapas aaye.
Aap ne Hazrat Bu Ali Shaah Qalandar rahmatullāhi alaihi ko salaam aur doodh se bhara hua piyaala bheja. Bu Ali Shaah Qalandar ne muskurakar us piyaale me gulaab daalkar use waapas bheja.
Waha maujood logo ne is ke baare me puchha to aap ne bataya ‘Hazrat Bu Ali Shaah Qalandar ko doodh ka gilaas bhejkar maine ye paighaam diya ke Saabir piya ne Panipat ki sardaari mujhe ata farmai hai. Aur unho ne doodh me gulaab daalkar bheja aur ise tasleem kiya hai.’

Phir aap Panipat me taaleem e deen karte rahe.

***********
Jab aap ke khalifa Hazrat Shah Jalaal-ud-deen Mahmood Kabeer ul Auliya ne 6 mahine ka Habse kabeer ka Mujaahida mukammal kiya to 19 Sha’abaan 694 Hijri (July 1295 A.D.) ko aap ne mehfil-e-sama ka ehtamaam kiya. Aur mehfil me aap haalat e wajd me kho gaye.
Jab aap ko hosh aaya to logo ne aap ko bataaya ke ‘Ek naqaab-posh shakhs aaya tha aur aap ko salaam kaha hai aur kaha hai ke aap wajd me the is liye mulaaqaat nahi ho paai.’
Ye sunkar aap ghamzada ho gaye ke mere peer o murshid aaye the aur main is baat se bekhabar raha. Is ke baad aap ne mehfil-e-sama me jaana chhod diya. Aur logo se milna bhi band kar diya. Aap sirf Hazrat Shah Jalaal-ud-deen se milte the.

*********
Aap Hazrat Ala-ud-deen Saabir Paak rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap ke Khalifa Hazrat Shaah Jalaal-ud-deen Mahmood Kabeer ul Auliya rahmatullāhi alaihi hain.

*********
Aap ka wisaal 10 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 718 Hijri (August 1318 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Panipat (Haryana) me hai.

*********
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Shams-ud-deen Turk Panipati rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Hazrat Ibne Abbas Razi'allahu Anhuma farmate haiñ ki Taurat shareef ki takhtiyaañ zabarjad (ek kimti pathar) ki thi. Doosri riwayat ke mutabiq yeh takhtiyaañ jannat ke pedh sidra (Beri) ki thi.

? *Al Atqan Jild 01, safa 56,57*

Yeh bhi kaha gaya hai ki takhtiyaañ zamurood ki thi. Ek qaul yeh bhi hai ki lakdi ki thi.

? *Hashiya 2, 4 Jalalain Safa 141*

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Taurat ki takhtiyoñ ki Lambayi kitni thi?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Hazrat baghwi (Rehmatullah Alaihi) farmate hai ki alwahe Taurat meiñ se har kayi ki Lambayi barah (12) gaz thi aur Ba-qaul Hazrat hasan dus (10) Gaz thi.

? *Al Atqan Jild 01, safa 57*
? *Hashiya 04, Jalalain Safa 141*
