Title: Hazrat Sayyed Shaahul Hameed Abdul Qaadir Nagori rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Sayyed Shaahul Hameed Abdul Qaadir Nagori rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Qaadir Wali Shaah, Naagore Andavar (Shehanshaah-e-Nagore), Fard-ul-Ahbaab.

************
Aap ki wilaadat 10 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 910 Hijri (November 1504 A.D.) ko Jum’aa ke roz Ayodhya ke qareeb Manikapur (Uttar Pradesh) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Sayyed Hasan Quddoos bin Sayyed Hameed-ud-deen rahmatullāhi alaihi aur waalida ka naam Bibi Faatima hai.

Aap Hasani saadaat hain.
Aur Hazrat Ghauṡ e aazam Mohiy-ud-deen Abdul Qaadir Jeelaani radiy-Allāhu anhu ki 9wi pusht se hain.

Aap ke pardaada Hazrat Sayyed Hasan Qaadri Baghdadi Sultaan Firoz Shaah Tughlaq ke zamaane me Hind me tashreef laaye the.

*************
Aap ki wilaadat se pehle Aap ki waalida maajida ko khwaab me bashaarat hui ke ‘Tumhare yaha ALLĀH ke fazl se aisa beta aane waala hai jo logo ko najaat dilaane waala hoga aur puri zindagi Islaam ki khidmat karega.’

Aap ki waalida jab 7 maah haamila thi tab Manikapur aur aas paas ke ilaaqe me shadeed qehat pada aur log zinda rehne ke liye ghaas ghaas khaane lage. Ek martaba Bibi Faatima ne apne shikam se aawaaz suni ke ‘Aye mere waalidain! Fikr mat karo. Kuchh anaaj lekar use ek bade bartan me paka lo. In shaa Allāh is se aap ki bhuk bhi mit jaayegi aur dusro ko khaana khilaana.’ Jis se sab ko ek din ke liye raahat ho gai.

*************
Bachpan se hi Aap ilm o hikmat aur roohaniyat ki alaamat zaahir karne lage.

Aap ki wilaadat ke kuchh hi dino baad Indumati naami ek aurat aap ki waalida se milne aai. Us ko juzaam (leprosy) ki beemaari thi. Us ne aap ki waalida ki god me aap ko dekhkar dua ki ke ‘Mujhe is mubarak bache ke waseele se shifa ata farma. ‘ Aur ALLĀH ke fazl se us aurat ki puraani beemaari doodr ho gai aur bilkul tandurast ho gai.

Aap ki umr 2 mahine 19 din thi tab 29 taarikh ko baadal ki wajah se chaand nahi dikha aur logo ne tay kiya ke kal 30 sha’abaan hogi. Magar Aap ne subah saadiq se pehle hi doodh peena chhod diya. Aap ki waalida Bibi Faatima jaan gai ki aaj se Maahe Ramzaan shuru ho gaya hai.
Aap bachpan se hi panj waqta namaaz ada karte.

Jab Aap ki umr 4 saal ki thi tab Abdur Rahmān Tajjairi naami ek shakhs ne Aap ko dekhkar apni ghareebi door karne ke liye dua ki iltija ki. Aap ne us se farmaaya ‘In shaa Allāh tumhari ghareebi hamesha rehne waali nahi hai, bahot jald tumhare haalat badalne waale hain.’

***********
Aap ne apne daada Sayyed Hameed-ud-deen se taaleem haasil ki.
8 saal ki umr me Qur’an aur Ilme Nahaw ki ta’aleem mukammal ki.

Phir Aap ko uloome baatini ki ta’aleem haasil karne ki khwaahish hui. 18 saal ki umr me apne waalidain ke farmaan par Aap Hazrat Sayyed Shaah Muhammad Ghauṡ Gwaliori Shattari rahmatullāhi alaihi se taaleem haasil karne ke liye Gwalior ki jaanib rawaan hue.

Raaste me Moeen-ud-deen naami ek shakhs se Aap ki mulaaqaat hui. Jab dono safar karte hue ek jangal me pahunche to baagho ka ek jhund mila. Moeen-ud-deen ghabhara gaye. Magar Aap ne us jhund par ek nazar daali aura age chalne lage to us me se ek baagh (tiger) Aap ke pichhe pichhe chalne laga aur jangal khatm hote hi wo waapas laut gaya. Moeen-ud-deen ne puchha ‘Aap ko dar nahi laga?’ to Aap ne farmaaya ‘Agar hume ALLĀH par yaqeen ho aur us ki ita’at karte ho to har makhlooq hamari taabedaari karegi. Qur’an hume yehi sikhaata hai.’

Aage gaye to ek nadi aai magar koi kashti ka intazaam nahi tha. Is liye Aap paidal nadi paar karne lage. Ye dekhakar Najm-ud-deen naami ek shakhs ne Aap par jaadoo karne ki koshish ki. Magar wo na-kaam hua. Aur us ke sar par ek sing nikalne laga. Ye dekhkar us ne aap ki muafi maangi. Aap ko raham aaya aur us ka sing door kiya aur use naseehat farmakar aage badhe.

Gwalior pahunchkar Aap ne ek puraani masjid me namaaz ada karke ALLĀH ta’ala se dua ki.

Hazrat Sayyed Shaah Muhammad Ghauṡ Gwaliori rahmatullāhi alaihi apne shaagirdo ke saath aap ke istiqbaal ke liye aaye.
Aap ne 10 saal se zyada Hazrat ki khidmat me rehkar taaleem haasil ki.

*************
Phir ijaazat lekar 404 shaagirdo ke saath Gwalior se Manikapur tashreef laaye.
Phir 12 saal tak isha’ate islaam ke liye Hind, Afghanistan, Baluchistan, Sri Lanka, Burma aur dusre mulko me safar kiya.

Is dauraan Aap ne ALLĀH ke fazl se kai karaamat zaahir ki, jis me murde ko zinda karna, gunge ko aawaaz ata karna, apaahij ko chalta karna, beemaaro ko shifayaab karna aur samundar me jahaaz ko doobne se bachaana saamil hai.

*************
Ek martaba Aap Ajmer Khwaja Ghareeb nawaaz rahmatullāhi alaihi ke roze par ziyarat ke liye gaye to Roza mubarak ka darwaaza band tha. Aap ba-adab waha khade rahe. Kuchh der me roza mubarak ka darwaaza khul gaya. Aap andar tashreef le gaye aur darwaaza phir se band ho gaya. Aap ne 3 din tak andar rehkar faiz haasil kiya.

*************
Jab Aap Makka mukarrama ki taraf safar kar rahe the to raaste me Aap ne apne shaagirdo ke saath ek pahaad ke neeche thehre. Aap ke ek shaagird ka oont pahaadi logo ke giroh ne chura liya aur use khaa liya. Aap ka shaathi pareshaan ho gaya. Aap ne us oont ki haddiya aur bacha hua gosht jama kiya aur farmaaya ‘Kum bi iznillāh’ to ALLĀH ke fazl se wo oont zinda ho gaya. Jab un pahaadi choro ne ye dekha to un sab ne muafi maangi aur musalman ho gaye.

Phir jab Lahore pahunche to ek masjid me qayaam farmaaya. Yaha Qaazi Noor-ud-deen ne Aap ko aulaad ke liye dua ki iltija ki. Aap ne unhe apna chabaaya hua paan diya aur farmaaya ke ‘Ye paan apni biwi Zohara ko khila dena aur tum dono 40 din tak ek dusre door rehna. In sha Allāh tumhare yaha beta paida hoga jo tumhe mujhe de dena hoga.’
Aap ki dua se Qaazi Noor-ud-deen ke yaha 12 Rajab 959 Hijri (7 July 1552 A.D.) ko beta paida hua. Aap ke farmaan ke mutaabiq is ka naam ‘Mohammad Yousuf’ rakha gaya.

Jab Aap Khurasan pahunche to Aap ko ek na-bina shakhs mila. Aap ko us ki mohtaaji par raham aaya. Aap ne us ke liye dua farmai to ALLĀH ke fazl se use binai mil gai.

Khurasan me Sultaan Mahmood naami ek ameer taajir tha. Us ko aulaad nahi thi. Aap ki shohrat sunkar us taajir ki biwi ne Hazrat ki baargaah me dua ke liye jaane ke liye kaha. Us ne kaha ‘Agar wo waaqqi me Wali hin to mere sukhe baagh ko sabz bana den.’ Dusre din us shakhs ne dekha ke us ka baagh sabz ho gaya. Wo aap me baargaah me aaya aur muafi maangi aur dua ke liye iltija ki. Aap ki dua se us ke yaha 1 ladka aur 2 ladki paida hue.

Phir 949 Hijri me jab Aap Jable Azwiya par muqeem the tab ek raat namaaze isha ada karne ke baad Aap ne apne shaagirdo se farmaaya ‘Mujhe Aap sab ke saath Manikapur jaana hoga. Mere waalide mohtaram ke inteqaal ka waqt qareeb hai.’ Phir ek hi raat me Aap ne apne shaagirdo ke saath us jagah se Manikapur ka taweel safar tay kiya. Dusre din Aap ke waalid ka inteqaal hua. Phir 5 din ke baad Aap ki waalida ka bhi inteqaal hua.

Phir Aap waapas Makka mukarrama ki taraf rawaana hue. Raaste me Sindh me 2 Yogi mile jo hawa me udte the aur bahot maghroor the. Aap ne apni jootiyo ko hukm diya to wo hawa me udne lagi aur dono Yogi ke sar par maarne lagi. Dono ne Hazrat ke qadmo me aakar muafi maangi. Aap ne unhe Takabbur chhodne ki naseehat farmai.

Sindh ke Raaja ne Aap ko daawat ki aur zeher milaaya hua khaana Aap ko pesh kiya. Aap ne Bismillāh padhkar khaana khaaya. ALLĀH ke fazl se Aap ko aur aap ke saathiyo ko koi nuqsaan na hua magar wo Raaja mar gaya. Us ki Raani ne Aap ko iltija ki. Aap ne dua farmai to wo Raaja phir se zinda ho gaya.

Phir Aap Sindh se Gwalior tashreef le gaye aur Hazrat Muhammad Ghauṡ Gwaliori rahmatullāhi alaihi se faiz haasil kiya.

Phir Aap kashti me sawaar hokar Hajje Baitullāh ke liye rawaana hue. Jeddah pahunche to Hazrat Ādam aur Bibi Hawwa ki ziyarat haasil hui.
Phir waha se paidal Takbeer padhte hue 3 din me Makka pahunche aur Arkaane Hajj ada kiye.
Phir jab Aap Madeena munawwara pahunche aur Roza e Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam par haazir Salaam pesh kiya to Roz mubarak ke andar se jawaab mila ke ‘Wa alaikum assalaam yaa Waladi Khush aamadid’ Ye sunkar Aap ki aankho ke aansoo jaari ho gaye. Jab ijaazat ke liye Aap ne apne dono haath lambe kiye to Aap ke haatho me Huzoor sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke pasandeeda phalo ko maujood paaya.

Phir Aap Makka shareef waapas aaye aur taqreeban 6 saal tak muqeem rahe.
Makka me qayaam ke dauraan Abdullāh naami ek shakhs aap ki baargaah me aaya aur arz ki ‘Huzoor! Mera beta Abdul Azeez Scandinavia ki taraf safar par gaya hai. Magar ek arse se us ki ya us ke jahaaz ki koi khabar nahi hai. Wo mera eklauta beta hai.’ Aap ne dua farmai. 8 din ke baad Abdul Azeez apne jahaaz ke saath salaamat pahunch gaya. Abdullāh ne jahaaz aur us ka maal Hazrat ko batore hadiya pesh kar diya. Itne me ek aur shakhs waha aaya aur us ne apne gumshuda jahaaz ke liye dua ki iltija ki. Aap ne Abdullāh ka diya hua jahaaz aur tamaam maal us shakhs ko de diya.

Qaazi Noor-ud-deen ke farzanad Mohammad Yousuf 7 saal ki umr me taaleem haasil karne ke baad ek martaba namaaze asr ada karne ke baad ghar waapas aa rahe the tab ghaib se bashaarat hui ke ‘Aap ke waalide mohtaram Makka mukarrama me muqeem hain.’ Unho ne ghar aakar ye sab bataaya to waalidain un ko ek sandooq me se Hazrat ka Mishwaak nikaalkar diya. Wo apne waalidain ki ijaazat lekar Hazrat ki khidmat me jaane ke liye rawaana hua. Un ke waalid ne ashrafiyo aur 4 khaadimo bhi saath me diye. Thoda aage safar karne ke baad unho ne wo ashrafiya chaaro khaadimo me taqseem kar di aur ghode ke saath waapas jaane ke liye farmaaya. Is ke baad Makka mukarrama ki jaanib safar karte rahe. Jab wo Sana ke samundar ke kinaare par pahunche to Hazrat ne apne 2 shaagirdo ko Aap ko lene ke liye bheje. Un ke saath wo Hazrat ki khidmat me pahunche.
Hazrat ne Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf ko taaleem wa tarbiyat dena jaari rakha.
Ek baar Hazrat ne raat me pura Qur’n majeed likhkar diya aur Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf ne us ki tilaawat ki. Tilaawat sunkar Aap behad khush hue.

Is ke baad Aap ne kai mulko me safar karke Auliya Allāh aur buzurgaane deen ki baargaah me aur un ke mazaar par haazir hokar faiz haasil kiya.
Aap ne Baghdad me Hazrat Ghauṡ e aazam Abdul Qaadir Jeelaani radiy-Allāhu anhu ke mazaar par haazir hokar faiz haasil kiya.

Jab Aap Kuwait pahunche to Aap ne Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf ko ek maqaam par baithkar musassal zikr aur muraaqaba karne ke liye farmaaya. Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf ne Aap ke farmaan taamil ki. Kuchh waqt ke baad wo banjar ilaaqa sar o sabz ho gaya. Hazrat ne ek sukhi tehni zameen me daali to us me 2 patto se bhari hui shaakhen paida ho gai.
Aap ne khush hokar Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf ko Shattaari aur Qaadri silsila ki khilaafat ata farmai.

Phir Aap Jeddah aaye aur jahaaz me safar karke Kerala ke Ponnani tashreef laaye. Yaha Aap ne Zain-ud-deen Makhdoom naami taajir ke baagh me qayaam kiya. Jab Aap wuzu kar rahe the tab paani behkar jis simt gaya us taraf ka hissa sabz ho gaya.

Phir Aap Maldives tashreef le gaye. Yaha par ek riwaaj tha ke har saal log Jinn ko ek kunwaari ladki ki bali chadhaate the. Jab Aap waha pahunche to log is rasm ko ada karne ki tayyaari kar rahe the. Jab log us rasm ko ada karne ke liye gaye to Aap bhi gaye aur jab Jinn aaya to Aap ne use pakadkar ek botal me band kar diya. Us botal ko mazboot dhakkan lagakar bada patthar baandhkar samundar me phenk diya. Is tarah waha ke logo hamesha ke liye us jinn se najaat mil gai.

Phir Aap Kanyakumari gaye aur waha se Ceylon (Sri Lanka) gaye. Yaha Aap ne us pahaad ki ziyarat ki jaha par Hazrat Ādam alaihis salaam dunya me tashreef laaye the.

Phir Aap apne shaagirdo ke saath Kayalpattinam, Kilakarai, Pattaari aur dusre maqaam se hote hue Melappalayam pahunche. Yaha Aap ne Chilla kashi ki.

Phir Aap Tenkasi gaye. Yaha Aap ke kuchh saathiyo ne bhuk ki wajah se mandir ke bail ko zibah karke khaa liya. Hinduo ne Aap ko fariyaad ki. Aap ne muafi maangi aur apne shaagirdo se us bail ki haddiya jama karne ke liye farmaaya. Phir Aap ne apne asaa se use chhua to ALLĀH ta’ala ke fazl se wo bail zinda hokar khada ho gaya.

Phir Aap Pothigai pahaad par gaye. Jaha par kuchh Yogi rehte the. Aap ne Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf ko ek kaansa ata kiya tha. Jis me se khaana milta rehta tha. Do Yogiyo ne us kaanse ko churakar apne sardaar ko diya. Us ne ek gad'ha karke us kaanse ko andar rakh diya. Aap ke farmaan par Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf ne us jagah par gaye aur us sardaar ki maujoodagi me kaanse ko hukm diya to wo zameen chirkar baahar aa gaya aur Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf ke haath me aa gaya.

Phir Aap Tiruchirapalli gaye aur Hazrat Tabr-e-Aalam Nathar Wali rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mazaar par aaye aur Roza mubarak ke andar 3 din aur 3 raat rehkar faiz haasil kiya.
Phir waha Chilla kashi ki.

Phir 950 Hijri (1543 A.D.) Jab Aap Thanjavur pahunche to waha ke Raaj Achuthappa Naikan bahot arse se itna beemaar tha ke haath pair bhi hila nahi sakta tha. Us ne Hazrat ko mahel me aakar us ke liye dua ke liye iltija ki. Aap mahel me pahunche aur us ka haal dekhne ke baad Aap ne jaan liya ke Raaja ko jaadoo ke zariye beemaar kar diya gaya hai. Aap ne apne us farzand ko ek kabootar dhundhne ke liye farmaaya. Wo jab Hazrat ka bataaya hua kabootar lekar aaye to Aap ne us kabootar ke jism se ek ek karke sooiya nikaalna shuru kiya. Jaise hi sab sooi nikal gai Raaja bilkul tandurast ho gaya. Ye dekhkar us ki Raani ne Aap se aulaad ke liye iltija ki. Aap ne us ke liye saahibe aulaad aulaad ki dua farmaai. Aur ALLĀH ke fazl se Raaja ko aulaad hui. Us ne maal o daulat dena chaaha magar Aap ne use lene se inkaar kar diya. Aakhir me Raaja ne Aap ko Nagore me samundar ke kinaare 30 acre zameen batore hadiya pesh ki. Aur Aap waha sukoonat pazeer hue.

Aap Therampettai, Koothanallur, aur Thirukalachery hote hue Thiruvarur aaye. Thiruvarur me ek mandir me tehwaar ke liye ek Rath tha jo rook gaya tha aur aage nahi chal raha tha. Jab logo ne Aap ko dekha to Aap se iltija ki. Aap ne sab ko door hataaya aur us Rath par ek nazar daali to wo apne aap chalne laga.

Phir Aap apne saathiyo ke saath Mela-Nagore pahunche to logo ne Aap ko takleef dena shuru kiya. Aap waha se nikal gaye. Aap ke waha se nikalte hi waha zalzala aaya aur sab imaaraten gir gai. Phir sailaab aaya jis se sab behne laga. Log waha se jaan bachakar dusre gaanvo me bhaag gaye.

Phir Aap Nagore tashreef laaye aur yaha chila kashi ki. Ye jagah ‘Chilladi’ ke naam se mash'hoor hai.
Yaha Aap ko Hazrate Khizr alaihis salaam ne aakar bashaarat di ke ek maqaam par ret ke andar ek imaarat dabi hui hai. Aap ne apne shaagirdo ko us maqaam par jaakar khodne ke liye farmaaya. Aur waha par ret se us imaarat ko baahar nikaala gaya.

Raya Kunjali Maricar naami ek ameer shakhs Hazrat ki shohrat se na-raaz th aur hasad ki wajah se Aap ki burai karta tha. ALLĀH ke ghazab se use munh me Cancer hua. Dawa karaane par bhi wo theek nahi hua to Sayyed Makhdoom use doli me bithakar Hazrat ke paas lekar aaye. Raya Kunjali Maricar ne Aap se muafi maangi. Aap ne us ke munh me apna thoonk daal diya. ALLĀH ke fazl se wo bilkul tandurast ho gaya.

*************
Mela-Nagore me Khwaja Mahadoom al-Yamani ki badi saahabzaadi Bibi Zohara se Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf ka paighaam bheja. Khwaja Mahadoom-ul-Yamani ne apni ameeri ke ghroor me inkaar kar diya.
Is ke baad Khwaja Mahadoom ke maal se bhare hue 3 jahaaz samundar me doob gaye aur un ki badi saahabzaadi beemaar hui aur us ka inteqaal hua.
Khwaja Mahadoom ko apni galti ka ehsaas hua. Wo Hazrat ki baargaah me aaye aur apni dusri saahabzaadi Sultaana Bibi se Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf ka nikaah karaane ke liye raazi hue.
Aur un ke 6 saahabzaade aur 2 saahabzaadiya hue.

****************
Phir Aap jahaaz par sawaar hokar Darnacheri (Burma) bandar-gaah par gaye. Waha Budh mazhab ke logo ko islaam ki taaleem di to unho ne maanne se inkaar kiya. Is par Aap ne karaamat dikhaai ke un ke but bolne lage aur Islaam ki ta’areef bayaan karne lage. Ye dekhkar wo sab musalman ho gaye.

Kuchh arsa waha rehne ke baad Aap Nagore waapas aaye.

Ek martaba Aap Hajjaam ke paas khat banwa rahe the. Aap ne apne haath me ek aa'ina pakda hua tha. Achaanak Aap ne us aa'ine ko Bengaal ke samundar ki jaanib phenk diya.
Baad me pata chala ke ek Dutch jahaaz samundar me toofaan me phans gaya tha aur us ki teh me ek suraakh ho gaya tha jis se jahaaz me paani bharne laga tha. Ye andesha tha ke jahaaz doob jaayega. Sab ne ummeed chhod di thi. Itne me ek shakhs ne Hazrat ka naam bataaya aur Aap ko madad ke liye pukaara. Sab ne dekha ke aahista aahista jahaaz se paani kam hone laga aur jahaaza salaamat Nagapattinam ke kinaare par pahunch gaya. Hazrat ne Mohammad Yousuf aur dusre shaagirdo ko jahaaz par jaakar wo aa'ina waapas laane ke liye bheja. Phir sab ko pata chala ke Hazrat ne jo aa'ina samundar ki taraf phenka tha wo jahaaz ke suraakh par chipak gaya tha. Jis se jahaaz me paani aana band ho gaya tha.
Jahaaz ke Kaptaan ne aur dusre logo ne kuchh maal batore hadiya pesh kiya. Jo Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf Hazrat ke paas lekar aaye. Aap ne farmaaya ‘Aaj se jo kuchh hadiya milega us par Mohammad Yousuf ka haq hoga.’

Nagapattinam me Dutch afsaro ne Aap ko karaamat bataane ke liye kaha. Aur kaha ke ‘Aap East Indies ilaaqe se hari ilaaichi ka guchha laakar dikhaao.’ Kuchh hi lamho me hari ilaaichi ka guchha Aap ke haath me aa gaya. Jo Aap ne Dutch afsaro ko de diya.

Phir Aap ne Maahe Rajab me Nagore ke qareeb Vanjur tashreef le jaakar ek band khadde ke andar rehkar mujaahida karte hue 40 din tak roze rakhe. Isi tarah Silladi Pallivasal me bhi Aap ne 40 din tak roze rakhe.

************
Ek din Aap ne Mohammad Yousuf se farmaaya ‘Mere wisaal ka waqt qareeb hai. Har insaan ko dunya se rukhsat hona padta hai. Kuchh aisi ne'amate hain jo Jannat me hi milti hai. Main tum se door nahi hounga magar tumhare bahot qareeb rahunga.’
Phir Aap ne farmaaya ‘Jab mera inteqaal hoga us ke baad baadal jama honge aur baarish hogi. Us ke paani se mujhe ghusl dena. Aur Muthbaq me ek maqaam par jaana. Waha tumhe kapda milega. Jise mere kafan ke liye istemaal karna.’
Phir Aap ne farmaaya ‘Mere inteqaal ke 3 din baad namaaze fajr ke baad meri qabr par aakar mujhe salaam karna. In shaa Allāh tumhe salaam ka jawaab milega. Phir tum apne pariwaar ke saath Nagore me hi sukoonat pazeer rehna. Aur agar jawaab na mile to Nagore chhodkar dusri jagah par sukoonat ikhtiyaar karna.’

****************
Aap Hazrat Sayyed Shaah Muhammad Ghauṡ Gwaliori Shattari rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap ke khalifa Hazrat Sayyed Mohammad Yousuf rahmatullāhi alaihi hain.

************
Aap ka wisaal 10 Jamaadi uṡ Ṡaani 978 Hijri (November 1570 A.D.) ko Jum’aa ke roz subah ko 68 baras ki umr me hua.

Aap ka mazaar Nagore (Tamil Nadu) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Sayyed Abdul Qaadir Nagori urfe Qaadir Shaah Wali rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Makhdoom Zain-ud-deen Ali Mahimi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Makhdoom Zain-ud-deen Ali Mahimi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Laqab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Qutb-e-Kokan.

***************
Aap ki wilaadat 10 Moharram 776 Hijri (1372 A.D.) me Mahim, Mumbai hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Maulana Shaikh Ahmad bin Ibrāheem rahmatullāhi alaihi aur Faatima binte Nakhuda Husain Ankolia hai.

Aap Quraish ke Nawait qabeele se ta’alluq rakhte hain.

Aap ke waalid wali ALLĀH hain aur un ka mazaar Kalyan (Mumbai) me hai.

***************
Aap ne apne waalid se ta’aleem haasil ki aur Qur’an, Hadeeṡ, Tafseer, Fiq'h, Kalaam, Falsafa, Tasawwuf, Ilm e Istadalaal aur dusre uloom ke maahir hue.

Aap ki umr 9 saal ki hui tab 785 Hijri me aap ke waalid ka inteqaal hua.

Is ke kuchh arse baad Aap ilm e deen sikhne ke liye Hind ke baahar jaana chaahte the. Magar apni waalida ko chhodkar jaana nahi chaahte the. Aap ki waalida ko jab pata chala to unho ne aap ko khaas uloom ata karne ke liye ALLĀH ta’ala se dua ki.

Aap roz namaaz e fajr ke baad samundar ke kinaare jaate the. Ek din aap ne dekha ki ek buzurgh shakhs samundar ke kinaare baithe hain. Us ne use apne paas bulaaya aur farmaaya ‘Tumhari maa bahot nek hain aur ALLĀH ki wali hain. Us ki dua se ALLĀH ta’ala tumhe ilm ata farmaega. Tum roz namaaz e fajr ke baad mere paad ilme deen sikhne ke liye aa jaana. Magar ye baat kisi ko bataana nahi.’ Is tarah aap roz namaaze fajr ke baad samundar kinaare us buzurgh ke paas ilm e deen sikhne ke liye jaate. Wo buzurg Hazrate Khizr alaihis salaam the.
Ek din aap ki waalida ne aap se puchha ‘Bete! Roz subah tum kaha jaate ho?’ Aap tashweesh me pad gaye kyun ki aap ke ustaad ne aap ko ye raaz kisi ko bataane se mana kiya tha. Magar aap ne apni waalida ko sach baat bata di. Dusre din subah jab aap samundar ke kinaare gaye to Hazrate Khizr alaihis salaam waha nahi the. Aap ne waapas aakar apni waalida ko bataaya. Unho ne phir se ALLĀH se dua ki.
Dusre din jab Makhdoom saahib samundar ke kinaare gaye to Hazrate Khizr alaihis salaam tashreef laaye aur bataaya ki ‘ALLĀH ta’ala ne tumhari waalida ki dua qubool ki hai’ Aur phir unho ne aap ko koi cheez khaane ke liye di. Jaise hi aap ne use khaaya ALLĀH ta’ala ne aap ko zameen wa aasman ka tamaam ilm aap ko ata farma diya.

***************
Ek baar namaaz e isha ke baad aap ki waalida ne aap ko paani laane ke liye kaha. Aap paani lekar aaye to dekka ki aap ki waalida so gai thi. Aap paani ka gilaas lekar wahi khade rahe. Aap ne socha ki jab ammi jaan ki aankh khulegi aur wo paani maangegi to main foran unhe paani de dunga. Tahajjud ke waqt jab aap ki waalida ki aankh khuli to aap ne puchha ki ‘Tum ne mujhe jagaaya kyun nahi?’ To aap ne kaha ‘Main aap ki neend me khalel pahunchaana nahi chahta tha.’
Aap ki waalida ne aap ke liye dua ki ‘Tum meri itni khidmat karte ho ek din tum bhi Makhdoom aur Faqeeh ke naam se mash'hoor honge.’

***************
Aap apna zyada waqt Ibaadat, Riyaazat aur Muraaqaba me guzaarte.

Aap bahot ameer the. Magar aap apne maal ko ghareebo aur mohtaajo ki madad me aur mehmaano ki khidmat me kharch karte.

***************
Gujarat ke Sultaan Ahmad Shah ne aap ko Thane jila ke Qaazi banaaya tha.
Aur apni bahen se aap ka nikaah karaaya tha.

***************
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
(1) Makhdoom saahib ke ghar me ek bakari thi. Jo aap ko bahot pasand thi. Aik baar aap ghar par aaye to us bakari ko na dekha. Aap ne apni waalida ko us ke baare me puchha. Aap ki waalida ne bataya ke wo bakari mar gai hai aur hamari khaadima ne use samundar me phenk diya hai. Aap foran us khaadima ke saath samundar ke kinaare gaye aur jis gajah par bakari ko phenka thaw aha pahunchkar aap ne use ghar waapas jaane ke liye kaha. Wo khaadima waha se gai aur thoda door jaakar waapas aai. Jab wo waapas pahunchi to us ne dekha ki Makhdoom saahib us bakari se keh rahe the ‘Chalo utho. Hame ghar jaana hai. Waha ammi jaan intazaar kar rahi hain.’ Us ne dekha ki ye kehte hi ALLĀH ke hukm se wo bakari zinda ho gai aur aap ke saath chalne lagi. Us waqt aap ki umr 10 saal thi.

(2) Ek baar ek hindu vyapaari ka be-shumaar saamaan bhara hua jahaaz Mahim se rawaana hua. Magar 7 saal tak waapas na aaya. Us ne jyotishi se puchha to us ne bataaya ki jahaaz samundar me doob gaya hai.
Us ke ek muslim dost ko pata chala to wo use Makhdoom saahib ke paas lekar aaya. Aap ne use niche baithkar apni aankhen band karne ke liye kaha. Us ke baad aap ne farmaaya ‘Tumhara jahaaz aaj sham ko waapas aa jaayega.
Jab sham ko wo shakhs samundar ke kinaare gaya to us ne dekha ki us ka wo jahaaz jo 7 saal pehle paani me doob gaya tha wo sab saamaan ke saath kinaare par salaamat aa pahuncha hai.
Ye karaamat dekhkar us ka tamaam pariwar islaam me daakhil ho gaya.

(3) Ek baar ek shakhs ko kahi door safar par jaana tha. Us ke paas qeemati heere jawaahirat the. Us ne socha ki inhe apne saath le jaana theek nahi. Behtar hai ki kisi ke paas amaanat rakh du. Us ne Makhdoom saahib ke baare me suna tha. Is liye wo aap ke paas aaya aur apne heere jawaahirat unhe diye aur kaha ‘Jab main safar se waapas aaunga to le jaaunga.’ Aap ek kuen ke paas khade the. Aap ne unhe kuen me phenk diye. Wo kehne laga ‘Ab aap use waapas kaise laayenge?’ Aap ne farmaaya ‘Tum jab chaahoge main tumhe waapas de denga.’ Magar wo nahi maana.
Aap ne kuen me haath daala aur apni mutthi me jawaahirat lekar haath baahar nikala. Ye dekhkar wo sharminda hua aur maafi maangi. Aap ne un me se kuchh heere use waapas diye aur baaqi ko phir se kuen me phenk diye.

(4) Ek shakhs Makhdoom saahib ke ghar ke qareeb rehta tha. Us ki ek ladki ke saath mangni hui thi aur kuchh dino me un ki shaadi hone wali thi. Is dauran aik arab taajir ne us ladki ko dekha aur use wo pasand aa gai. Wo us ladki ke baap ke paas aaya aur us ladki ke saath shaadi karne ka iraada zaahir kiya. Us ladki ke baap ne saari baat batai to us arab ne kaha ki main mangni todne ke liye us ladke ko bahut saara maal dene ke liye tayyar hu. Ye sunkar us ka baap raazi ho gaya. Mohalle me ye baat fail gai.
Jab Makhdoom sahib us ladki ke baap ko samjhaane ke liye gaye to us ne kaha ‘Ye ladka aur Arab taajir dono hajj ke liye jaaye aur dono me se jo pehle Mahim waapas aaye us se main apni beti ka nikaah karunga.’ Is ke baad wo arab foran hajj ke liye nikal gaya. Magar wo ladka maayoos aur ghamgeen ho gaya.
Makhdoom sahib ne use masjid me dekha to 2 rak’at nafl namaaz padhne ke liye farmaaya. Jab wo ladka namaaz padhkar waapas aaya to aap ne farmaaya ‘Apni aankhen band kar lo aur jab tak main na kahu aankh kholna nahi.’ Us ne aisa hi kiya. Aap use lekar paani ke hauz ke andar daakhil ho gaye. Aur jab aap ne kaha to us ladke ne aankh kholi to us ne dekha ki wo Makka shareef me pahunch gaya hai.
Aap ne us se farmaaya ‘Jaakar us arab se mil lo magar use ye sab baaten na batana’ Us ne us arab se mulaqat ki. Aur Hajj ke tamaam arqan ada kiye. Phir wo Makhdoom saahib ke paas aaya. Aap ne use phir se Mahim pahuncha diya.
Dusre din jab wo arab waapas aaya to us ne kaha ki ‘Maine us ladke ko Makka me dekha tha.’ Phir use pata chala ki wo ladka to ek din pehle Mahim pahunch gaya hai. Aur shart ke mutaabiq us ladki ka nikaah us ladke ke saath hua.

(5) Ek baar ek majlis me kuchh nek logo ke darmiyaan baat hui ki Makhdoom saahib ke ghar me hamesha mehmaan hote hain aur wo un ki bahot khidmat karte hain aur bahot badhiya khaana khilaate hain. Ek shakhs kehne laga ‘Jo ALLĀH ke wali hote hain wo dunya ki cheezo se mohabbat nahi rakhte.’ Bahot samjhaane ke baad bhi wo nahi maana. Unho ne use Mahim jaakar khud dekhne ke liye kaha.
Wo Mahim aakar Hazrat ke ghar par aaya. Aap ne use rehne ke liye ek karma diya. Aur khaane ka waqt aap bhi us ke saath khaana khaane baithe aur use har cheez ko chakhne ke liye kaha. Aap thoda pehle khaana khaakar uth gaye aur aap ne waha se machhli ki chand haddiya utha li. Aur haath dhone ke baad aap ne use paani ke bartan me daal diya. Jab wo shakhs khaana khaane ke baad haath dhone ke liye gaya ato us ne dekha ki us bartan me haddiyo ke bajay zinda machhliya tair rahi hain. Ye dekhkar wo saari baat samajh gaya aur Hazrat ki maafi maangi.

***************
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :

(1) Tafseer -e-Rahmāni (Tafseer e Quran)
(2) Fataawa Makhdoomiya
(3) Fiqah Makhdoomi
(4) lna’am ul Malik-ul Ulam Jahkam Hukm-ul Ahkaam
(5) Awwalat-ut-Tawheed
(6) Ajallat-ut-Ta'id Fee Sharh-e-Adallatu-d-Tawheed
(7) An Noor-ul Athar Fee Kashf-e-Sirr-al Qaza wa Qadar
(8) Az Zawh-ul Azhar Fee Sharh al Noor-ul Azhar
(9) Khusus-un Na’am Fee Sharh-e-Fusus-ul-Hikam
(10) Mashra’al Khusus Fee Sharh-al Fusus-ul-Hikam
(11) Zawarif-ul lataif Fee Sharh-e-Awariful Ma’arif
(12) Azat-ud Daqaiq Sharh-e-Miraat-ul-Haqaa'iq
(13) Tarjuma wa Sharh-e-Lama’t –e-Iraqi
(14) Al Rutbat-ul Rafiatu Feel Jam’a wat Taufeeq bain al Asraar al Haqeeqat wa anwaar ush Shariah
(15) Imhaaz-ul Nashihaat
(16) lsjila’al basar fil radd ala istiqsa’an nazar
(17) Al wajud Fi Sharh-e-Isma’al Ma’bood
(18) Risaala-e-Ajeeba.

***************
Aap Hazrat Shaikh Mohiy-ud-deen Muhammad ibne Arabi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aur ‘Maghribi Akbari’ silsila ke shaikh hain.

Aap ke Khalifa Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Muhammad Kokani‎ rahmatullāhi alaihi hain.

***************
Aap ka wisaal 8 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 835 Hijri (February 1431 A.D.) ko Shab e Jum’aa ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Mahim (Mumbai, Maharashtra) me hai.

Aap ka Urs 13 Shawwaal ko manaaya jaata hai.

***************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Makhdoom Ali Mahimi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur Auliya Allah waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Taurat Shareef meiñ ek hazar (1000) surteiñ aur har surat meiñ ek hazrat (1000) aayat (is hisab se aayatoñ ki tadad dus lakh (10,00,000) hui.

Taurat kitni takhtiyoñ meiñ likhi hui nazil hui?

•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Tarjumanul Qur'an Hazrat Ibne Abbas Razi'allahu Anhuma farmate hai ki Hazrat Musa (عليه السلام) ko Taurat Shareef saat (7) takhtiyoñ meiñ ata hui.

? *Tafseer na'emi Jild 01, safa 430*
? *Al Atqan Jild 1, safa 56*

Hazrat ibne Abbas Razi'allahu Anhuma ki ek riwayat mein yeh bhi hai ki Taurat shareef ke kul saat (7) hisse the. Unko lekar jab Hazrat Musa (عليه السلام) apni qaum ki taraf Tashreef laye toh kuch thode se logoñ ke jo Hazrat Haroon (عليه السلام) ke sath markaz istiqamat par sabit wa Qayam the puri qaum bani israel ko shirk meiñ mubtala paya. Apni qaum ki yeh buri harkateiñ dekh kar aap bahut pareshan Huwe aur gusse ke aalam meiñ apne bhai Haroon (عليه السلام) ki taraf badhe. Is dauran Taurat shareef ki takhtiyaañ aapke hath se gir gayi ya gira di. Is gir jaane ki wajah se Allah Tabarak Ta'ala be Taurat Ke kuch hissoñ ko utha liya. Baki ek hissa jismeiñ zaroori masail the Bani Israel ko mila.

Title: Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
Aap ki wilaadat 11 Rabi ul awwal 1336 Hijri (27 December 1918 A.D.) ko Peer ke roz Nander, Hyderabad me hui.
Aap ke waalid ka naam Ghulaam Jeelaani bin Mohammad Noor-ud-deen hai.
************
Aap ne apne waalid se ibtidai ta’aleem haasil ki aur 14 saal ki umr me Haafiz e Qur’an hue. Aur Hazrat Haafiz e Millat Haafiz Abdul Azeez Mubarakpuri rahmatullāhi alaihi se sanad haasil ki.
Hazrat Haafiz e Millat ke mashware 1354 Hijri (1935 A.D.) me Aap Mubarakpur jaakar Madrasa Ashrafiya Misbaah-ul-Uloom me Haafiz e Millat Abdul Azeez Mubarakpuri, Sanaullāh Aazami aur Muhammad Sulaimān Bhagalpuri se Hadeeṡ, Fiq'h aur deegar uloom ki ta’aleem haasil ki. 1362 Hijri (1943 A.D.) me Aap Haafiz e Millat ke saath Jaamia Arabia, Nagpur gaye aur waha Aap ko Dastaar-e-Fazeelat ata ki gai.
***************
1358 Hijri (1939 A.D.) me Aap Haafiz e Millat ke saath Ghosi gaye aur us waqt Sadr-ush-Shariah Bareilly se Ghosi tashreef laaye the. Aap ne Sadr-ush-Shariah Maulana Amjad Ali Azami se Sahih Bukhari ta’aleem haasil ki aur phir naamaz e asr ke baad Aap Sadr-ush-Shariah ke mureed hue.
1365 Hijri (1946 A.D.) me Aap Sadr-ush-Shariah ke saath Nagpur mehfil e Na’at me gaye. Sadr-ush-Shariah ke farmaan par Aap ne Maulana Jaami ki naat padhi. Jise sunkar Sadr-ush-Shariah ki aankho me aansoo aa gaye aur usi jalse me unho ne Aap ko Khilaafat ata farmai.
************
Hindustan ki aazaadi aur taqseeme mulk ke kuchh arse baad Aap Pakistan chale gaye. Kharadar me Aap Akhund Masjid me Imaam (Khateeb) bane. Phir Jodia Bazaar ki Khori Garden Masjid me Imaam bane.
40 saal tak Aap ta’eleem wa tadrees karte rahe.
Aap hamesha ba-wuzu talba ko ta’aleem dete.
Aap puri zindagi Islaam aur Ahle Sunnat wal Jamaat ki khidmat karte rahe.
Aap ne bahot saare Pakistani talba ko majeed ta’aleem ke liye Madarsa Qaadriya me Baghdad bheja.
Aap ke shaagirdo me Allama Mufti Sayyed Shaah Turaab-ul-Haq Qaadri Razawi rahmatullāhi alaihi, Allama Abdul Azeem Qaadri aur Maulana Muhammad Qaasim Bareilwi mash'hoor hain.
************
Aap ke 3 saahabzaade hain :
(1) Muhammad Moeen-ud-deen
(2) Muhammad Misbaah-ud-deen
(3) Muhammad Salaah-ud-deen.
************
Aap Hazrat Sadr-ush-Shariah Allama Amjad Ali Aazami rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aap ko Huzoor Mufti-e-Aazam-e-Hind Muhammad Mustafa Raza Khan rahmatullāhi alaihi aur Hazrat Qutb-e-Madeena Allama Zia-ud-deen Ahmad Madani rahmatullāhi alaihi ne bhi khilaafat ata farmai hai.
Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Allama Mufti Sayyed Shaah Turaab-ul-Haq Qaadri Razawi rahmatullāhi alaihi (Karachi / Pakistan)
(2) Hazrat Allama Abdul Azeem Qaadri (Bangladesh).
************
7 Jamaadi ul ṡaani 1403 Hijri (23 March 23 1983 A.D.) ko dopahar ko Aap ki tabiyat na-saaz hui. Aap ne Kalma aur Durood shareef padhna shuru kar diya. Aap ko ambulance me haspataal le jaa rahe the tab dil ke daure ki wajah se Aap ka inteqaal hua.
Aap ka wisaal 7 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani 1403 Hijri (23 March 1983 A.D.) ko Budh ke roz hua.
Aap ki namaaz e janaaza Hazrat Taaj-ush-Shariah Akhtar Raza Khan rahmatullāhi alaihi ne padhai.
Aap ka mazaar Karachi (Pakistan) me hai.
************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Sayyed Ali akbar urfe Haaji Peer rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Sayyed Ali akbar urfe Haaji Peer rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Laqab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Shehanshaah e Kutch.

************
Aap ki wilaadat Multan me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Sayyed Mohsin Shaah hai.

*************
Aap ko bachpan se ibaadat ka bada shauq tha. Aur Namaaz aur Roza ke paaband the.

Aap bade zaheen the.
Aap ne Qur’an, Hadeeṡ aur Tasawwuf ki ta’aleem haasil ki.

*************
Kai saal tak Aap Sultaan Shahaab-ud-deen Ghori ki fauj me rehkar Jihaad me shaamil hote rahe.

Phir fauj ko chhodkar Faqr ikhtiyaar kiya aur apne bhai Sayyed Shahaab-ud-deen urfe Shaadi Shaah ke yaha hote hue Kutch ke Nara gaanv me tashreef laaye aur yahi sukoonat ikhtiyaar ki. Aur logo ko ta’aleem wa faiz ata farmaate rahe.

************
Bhuj ke Raaja ko koi aulaad nahi thi. Us ne Aap ki baargaah me aakar arz kiya. Aap ki dua se us ke yaha beta paida hua. Jab wo Aap ka shukr ada karne ke liye aaya tab Hazrat ki khwaahish par us ne zameen ka wo hissa Hazrat ko batore nazraana de diya.

************
Aap ka mazaar Kutch (Gujarat) me hai.

Aap ka urs 4 Jamaadi uṡ ṡaani ko manaaya jaata hai.

************
Aap ke aastaane par log Shareer jinn wa aaseb, jaadoo tona, junoon aur deemaaghi beemaariyo se najaat paane ke liye aate hain aur faiz haasil karte hain.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Sayyed Ali akbar urfe Haaji Peer rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Maulana Jalal ud din Muhammad Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Aap ki wilaadat 6 Rabi ul Awwal 604 Hijri (30 September 1207 A.D.) ko Vakhsh (maujooda Tajikistan) me hui.

Aapke waalid ka naam Hazrat Sultaan-ul-Ulama Baha-ud-deen Walad Muhammad bin Husain al-Balkhi rahmatullahi alaihi aur waalida ka naam Mo’mina Khaatoon hai.

Aapke waalid aalim aur sufi shaikh the.

612 Hijri (1216 A.D.) me aapke waalid apne pariwaar ke saath Khorasan se Baghdad aaye, phir ek saal baad Damishq (Damascus) aur Halab (Aleppo) aaye.

Phir Hajj ke liye Makka Sharif gaye.

Phir 613 Hijri (1218 A.D.) me Aqshahr (Anatolia) aaye aur 4 saal tak Madrasa me taalim dete rahe.

Phir 619 Hijri (1222 A.D.) me Laranda (Rum) aaye.

Laranda me aapki waalida ka inteqal hua.

621 Hijri (1224 A.D.) me aapka nikah Gauhar Khaatoon se hua.

Phir 626 Hijri (1229 A.D.) me aapke waalid Seljuq Sultaan Ala-ud-deen Kayqubad ki daawat par Konya tashreef laaye aur 2 saal tak Madrasa me taaleem dete rahe.

628 Hijri (1231 A.D.) me aapke waalid ka inteqal hua.

629 Hijri (1232 A.D.) me Hazrat Burhaan-ud-deen Muhaqqiq al-Tirmizi rahmatullahi alaihi Konya tashreef laaye. Aur Maulana Rumi ko ta’aleem dena shuru kiya.

Phir unho ne aapko majeed ta’aleem ke liye Shaam bheja.

Aap ne Halab (Aleppo) Madrassa Halawiyya me aur phir Damishq (Damascus) me ta’aleem haasil ki.

Aap Ilm e Nahaw, Hadees, Fiqh, Tafseer, Falsfa aur Kalaam ke maahir hue.

7 saal baad aap Shaam se Caesarea (Kayseri) aaye.

Yaha Hazrat Burhaan-ud-deen Muhaqqiq al-Tirmizi ne aapko tasawwuf ki taalim dena shuru kiya aur aapko mujahida karne ke liye farmaya.

Aapne 3 martaba lagaatar 40 din tak roze rakhe.

Aapne apne waalid Hazrat Baha-ud-deen Walad ki aur Hazrat Burhaan-ud-deen ki kitaabo ko padhkar bhi ilm haasil karna jaari rakha.

Jab aapki ta’aleem mukammal hui, to Hazrat Burhaan-ud-deen ne aapko Konya jaakar khidmat e deen karne ke liye farmaya.

Aap Konya me apne waalid ke madrasa me wapas aaye aur ta’aleem wa tadreees deen aur Isha’at e Islam karna shuru kiya.

34 saal ki umr tak Aap ek aala darje ke aalim ke taur par mash'hoor ho gaye. Aap ne Fatawa dena bhi shuru kar diya.

638 Hijri (1241 A.D.) me Caesarea (Kayseri) me Hazrat Burhaan-ud-deen Muhaqqiq ka wisaal hua.

<ins class="adsbygoogle" style="display: block;" data-ad-format="fluid" data-ad-layout-key="-gw-3+1f-3d+2z" data-ad-client="ca-pub-8429140506595796" data-ad-slot="8955849965"></ins>
<script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
</script>

Konya wapas aane ke kuch arse ke baad 640 Hijri (1242 A.D.) Aap ki biwi Gauhar Khaatoon ka inteqaal hua.

Iske baad aapne apne beto ko Sharf-ud-deen Samarqandi ki nigraani me ta’aleem ke liye Damishq bhej diya.

642 Hijri (November 1244 A.D.) me Shams Tabrizi rahmatullahi alaihi Konya tashreef laaye.

Ek baar Maulana Jalal ud din Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi bahot saari kitaabein saath rakhkar padh rahe the.

Itne me Hazrat Shams Tabrizi rahmatullahi alaihi waha se guzre.

Unho ne puchha ‘Kya kar rahe ho?’

Unka saada libaas dekhkar Aapne kaha ‘Aap nahi samajh sakenge.’

Unho ne un kitaabo ko lekar qareeb me ek jhil ke andar phenk diya.

Maulana Jalal ud din Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi jab un kitaabo ko paani se baahar nikale, to wo sab bilkul sookhi thi.

Maulana Jalal ud din Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi: ‘Hazrat, ye kaise hua?’

Hazrat Shams Tabrizi rahmatullahi alaihi ne farmaya ‘Ye tum nahi samajh sakoge.’

Ye dekhkar aap samajh gaye ke Hazrat Shams Tabrizi rahmatullahi alaihi ek wali e kaamil hain.

Aap ne din wa raat saara waqt unki sohbat me guzarna shuru kar diya.

Aap apni Mudarris ki aur apne pariwar ki zimmedari bhi bhul gaye.

Jab Hazrat Shams Tabrizi rahmatullahi alaihi ko pata chala ke Maulana Jalal ud din Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi ke shaagird is baat ki wajah se naraaz ho gaye hain, tab Shawwaal 643 Hijri (March 1246 A.D.) me bagair kisi ko bataaye Konya se rawaana ho gaye.

Unke achaanak chale jaane se kuchh waqt tak Maulana Jalal ud din Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi ghamzada ho gaye.

Unho ne Hazrat Shams Tabrizi rahmatullahi alaihi ko waapas aane ke liye bahot saare paighaam bheje.

Aakhir me jab aapke saahbzade Sultaan Walad ko bheje, tab wo Konya waapas aaye.

Unke wapas aane se Maulana Jalal ud din Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi bahot khush hue aur unki sohbat me rehkar faiz haasil karne lage.

Kuch arsa Maulana Jalal ud din Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi ke saath Konya me guzarne ke baad Shams Tabrizi rahmatullahi alaihi phir se Khoy chale gaye. Aap ne unhe bahot talaash kiya magar wo nahi mile.

<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script>
<ins class="adsbygoogle" style="display: block;" data-ad-format="fluid" data-ad-layout-key="-gw-3+1f-3d+2z" data-ad-client="ca-pub-8429140506595796" data-ad-slot="8955849965"></ins>
<script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
</script>

Phir aapki mulaaaqat Hazrat Salaah-ud-deen Zarkub se hui, jo Sunaar the aur Hazrat Burhaan-ud-deen Muhaqqiq al-Tirmizi ke mureed the.

Aap pehli baar jab unke kaarkhaane ke paas se guzre, to unke auzaar ki aawaaz sunkar aap wajd me kho gaye.

Phir aap unki sohbat me rehne lage Aur unke saath logo ko taalim wa dars karte rahe.

Kuchh waqt baad aap ne apne bete Sultaan Walad ka nikah Salaah-ud-deen Zarkub ki saahabzadi Faatima se karaya.

656 Hijri (December 1258 A.D.) me Salaah-ud-deen Zarkub ka wisaal hua tab aap phir se aalam e wajd me aa gaye.

660 Hijri (September 1262 A.D.) me Aapke saahabzaade Ala-ud-deen ka inteqal hua.

Aap ke mureed aur khalifa Husaam-ud-deen Chelebi ki guzarish par Aapne ek ghazal likhna shuru kiya.

18 asha’ar likhne ke baad aapne unse farmaya ‘Ab aage main bolta jaaunga aur tum use likhte jaana.’

Is tarah 660 Hijri (November 1262 A.D.) se 671 Hijri (1273 A.D.) tak, Husaam-ud-deen Chelebi likhte rahe.

Ye kitaab 'Maṡnawi-e-Ma’anawi' naam se mash'hoor hai.

Is dauran Aapne ta’aleem wa dars bhi jaari rakha.

Ek martaba Maulana Jalal ud din Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi ek dukaan par khade the. Ek aurat sauda lene aai. Dukandaar ne sauda dekar usse paise talab na kiye.

Jab wo aurat chali gayi, to Aapne wajah puchhi. Us shakhs ne jawaab diya ‘Mujhe usse mohabbat hai aur mohabbat me hisaab kitab kaisa.’

Yeh sunkar Aap behosh ho gaye. Jab hosh aaya to farmaya ‘Ek teri mohabbat hai jisme hisab kitab nahi aur ek main hu ke ALLAH ke ishq me uski tasbeeh bhi gin gin ke karta hu.’

Tasannif:
Hazrat Maulana Jalal ud din Muhammad Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi ki mash'hoor kitaabein:

(1) Maṡnawi-e-Ma’anawi

(2) Deewaan-e-Shams-e-Tabrizi

(3) Fihi Ma Fihi

(4) Makaatib

(5) Majaalis-e-Sab'ah.

Aqwaal:

Hazrat Maulana Jalal ud din Muhammad Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi farmate hain:

(1) Khwaahisho ke saanp ko shuruat se hi khatm kardo, warna baad me tum dekhoge ke wo bada azdaha ban gaya.

(2) Jab tum khud-garz matlabi nafs ko jeet loge, to tumhare tamaam andhere roshni me tabdeel ho jayenge.

(3) Jab dil ka aa'ina paak o saaf ho jaayega, tum is paani aur mitti ki dunya ke us paar ki taswirein dekh sakoge.

(4) Jab kisi se ikhtilaaf hota hai, ya koi tanqeed karta hai, to tumhare dil me nafrat aur adaavat ka ek chhota kida paida ho jaata hai. Agar tum usi waqt use kuchal nahi dete, to wo bada saanp, ya azdaha ban sakta hai.

(5) Insan ye talaash karta rehta hai ke dusre ke andar khazaana hai, ya kide aur saanp ka bil (burrow) hai. Phir pata chalta hai ke is talaash me usne apna waqt zaaya kar diya aur apni daanish-mandi kho di.

(6) Jo bhi milta hai uske shukr guzaar bano, kyun ki har koi tumhare liye raahnumaai ya hidaayat ke liye bheja jaata hai.

(7) Ye mat socho ke khitaab se hi hiqmat milti hai. Bolne se zyada sunna behtar hai.

(8) Agar tera ilm tujhe makhlooq se mohabbat karna nahi sikhaata to koi jaahil tujh se hazaar darja behtar hai.

<script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
</script>

Pariwaar:

Hazrat Maulana Jalal ud din Muhammad Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi ki 2 biwiya, 3 saahabzaade aur 1 saahabzaadi hain.

(1) Gauhar Khaatoon bint e Sharf-ud-deen Samarqandi (Nikah 621 Hijri [1224 A.D.]) se
2 saahabzaade : Ala-ud-deen aur Baha-ud-deen Muhammad Sultaan Walad [Wilaadat 623 Hijri (1226 A.D.)].

(2) Kerra Khaatoon se
1 saahabzaade : Muzaffar-ud-deen Ameer Alim Chelebi,
1 saahabzaadi : Malika Khaatoon.

Aap Hazrat Burhaan-ud-deen Muhaqqiq al-Tirmizi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aapse ‘Maulawi (Mevlevi)’ silsila jaari hai.

Aapke khalifa Hazrat Zia-ul-Haq Husaam-ud-deen Chelebi rahmatullahi alaihi hain.

672 Hijri (1273 A.D.) me aap beemaar hue. Sultaan apne wazeer aur afsaro ke saath aapki ayaadat ke liye aaya aur 2 tabeebo aapka ilaaj ke liye rakha gaya, magar aap theek na hue.

Aap ka wisaal 6 Jamaadi us Saani 672 Hijri (17 December 1273 A.D.) ko ghuroob e aftaab ke waqt hua 66 saal ki umr me hua.

Aap ka mazaar Konya (Turkey) me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke sadqe me aur Hazrat Maulana Jalal-ud-deen Muhammad Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se sabko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur sabke Imaan ki hifaazat farmaye aur sabko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sabki nek jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.
Ameen.

Kis nabi par kitne sahife nazil huwe unki Tafseel neeche likhi hai:

1 • Dus (10) safihe Hazrat Adam (عليه السلام),
2 • Pachas (50) sahife Hazrat Shees (عليه السلام),
3 • Tees (30) Hazrat Idress (عليه السلام),
4 • Aur Dus (10) Hazrat Ibrahim (عليه السلام) par nazil huwe.

? *Tafseer na'emi Jild 2, safa 170*
? *Hashiya Sharah Aqaid Kalañ safa 101*

Tafseer na'emi hi meiñ Tafseer roohul bayaan ke hawale se ek qaum yeh bhi hai ki sau (100) sahife meiñ se pachas (50) Hazrat Shees (عليه السلام) par, tees (30) Hazrat Idress (عليه السلام) aur bees (20) Hazrat Ibrahim (عليه السلام)par nazil huwe.

? *Tafseer na'emi Jild 01, safa 111*

Ek doosre qaul ke mutabiq Hazrat Ibrahim (عليه السلام) par tees (30), Hazrat Musa (عليه السلام) par Taurat se pehle dus (10) aur Hazrat Shees (عليه السلام) par aath (8) sahifoñ ka nuzool hua.

Title: Hazrat Mufti Jalaal-ud-deen Ahmad Amjadi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Mufti Jalaal-ud-deen Ahmad Amjadi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Laqab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Faqeeh-e-Millat.

************
Aap ki wilaadat 1352 Hijri (1933 A.D.) me Ojha-ganj (Basti) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Jaan Mohammad bin Abdur Raheem hai.

Aap ke pardaada Rajput the aur musalman hue the. Aur apna naam ‘Muraad Singh’ se ‘Muraad Ali’ rakha tha.

Aap ke waalid Masjid me Imaam the aur baghair kisi tankhwaah ke khidmat karte the.

***************
Aap ne 7 saal ki Maulana Haafiz Zakariya se Qur’an ki ta’aleem mukammal ki.
Aap 10 saal ki umr me Haafiz e Qur’an hue.
Phir Peerzaada Maulana Abdul Baari saahab aur Maulana Abdur Ra'oof saahab se Faarsi ki 12 kitaaben padhi aur Arabi ki ta’aleem bhi haasil ki.
1367 Hijri (1948 A.D.) me Majeed ta’aleem ke liye Aap Nagpur gaye aur Madrasa Islaamiya me Hazrat Allama Arshad-ul-Qaadri se Hadeeṡ aur Fiq'h ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Ilme deen sikhne ka itna shauq tha ke din ko kaam karte the taake apne waalid ko madad kar saken aur maghrib baad der raat tak ta’aleem haasil karte.
24 Sha’abaan 1371 Hijri (19 May 1952 A.D.) ko Aap ko Sanad e Faraaghat ata ki gai.

***************
Is ke baad Aap Basti aakar Madrasa Qaadria Razawia me Mudarris bane.
Phir Shoaib ul Auliya Hazrat Muhammad Yaar Ali ki daawat par 1 Zil Hijja 1375 Hijri (10 July 1956 A.D.) ko Baraoon me Daar-ul-Uloom Faiz-ur-Rasool me tashreef laaye.
24 saal ki umr me Aap ne apna pehla Fatawa diya.
Kuch arse me Aap ka ilm aur fataawa mash'hoor ho gaye.

Phir Aap ne Ojha-ganj me ‘Daar-ul-Uloom Amjadia Arshad-ul-Uloom’ ki shuruat ki.
In 2 idaaro me bahot saare talba ne Aap se ta’aleem haasil ki aur Aalim aur Mufti bankar khidmat e deen ka kaam karte rahe.

Aap ne ta’aleem e deen ke zariye islaam aur Ahle sunnat wal jama’at ki azeem khidmat ki.

*****************
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :

(1) Fataawa Faiz-ur-Rasool (2 Jild)
(2) Fataawa Faqeeh-e-Millat (2 Jild)
(3) Anwaar-ul-Hadeeṡ
(4) Anwaar-e-Shariat
(5) Aja'ib-ul-Fiq'h
(6) Fiq'hi pehilya
(7) Khutbaat-e-Muharram
(8) Khulfa e Raashideen
(9) Buzurgon ke Aqeede
(10) Nooraani ta’aleem
(11) Islaami ta’aleem
(12) Hajj wa Ziyarat.
(13) Guldasta e Maṡnawi.

************
Aap ke 3 saahabzaade hain :
(1) Maulana Anwaar Ahmad
(2) Maulana Abraar Ahmad
(3) Maulana Izhaar Ahmad.

************
29 Jamaadi ul awwal 1378 Hijri (December 1958 A.D.) ko Aap Hazrat Sadr-ush-Shariah Mufti Amjad Ali Aazmi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed hue.

Hazrat Ahsan-ul-Ulama Sayyed Shaah Mustafa Haidar Hasan Barkaati Marehrawi rahmatullāhi alaihi ne Aap ko khilaafat ata farmaai hai.

************
Aap ka wisaal 4 Jamaadi uṡ Ṡaani 1422 Hijri (23 August 2001 A.D.) ko Shab e Jum’aa 12 : 55 ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Ojha-ganj (Basti, Uttar Pradesh) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Faqeeh-e-Millat Mufti Jalaal-ud-deen Ahmad Amjadi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Woh Ambiya wa Mursaleen kitne aur kauñ kauñ se haiñ jin par aasmani kitabeiñ nazil hui?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Kitabe Ilahi ki azeem nemat aur badi daulat se sarfaraz hone wale ambiya wa Mursaleen aath (8) haiñ:
1 • Hazrat Adam (عليه السلام),
2 • Hazrat Shees (عليه السلام),
3 • Hazrat Idris (عليه السلام),
4 • Hazrat Ibrahim (عليه السلام),
5 • Hazrat dawood (عليه السلام),
6 • Hazrat Musa (عليه السلام),
7 • Hazrat Isa (عليه السلام),
8 • Hazrat Muhammad Salawatullahi Ta'ala wa Salamuhu Alaihi wa Alaihimus'salam Ajmaeen.

Title: Hazrat Haafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Haafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Haafiz-e-Millat, Ustaad-ul-Ulama, Jalaalatul-Ilm.

************
Aap ki wilaadat (1894 A.D.) me Peer ke roz Bhojpur (Muradabad, Uttar Pradesh) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Haafiz Ghulaam Noor hai.

************
Aap ne apne waalid se ta’aleem haasil ki aur Haafiz e Qur’an hue.
Bhojpur me Urdu aur Faarsi ki ta’aleem haasil karne ke baad Aap Muradabad Madrasa Naeemiya me gaye aur waha 3 saal ta’aleem haasil ki.
Is ke baad 1342 Hijri (1924 A.D.) me Aap Ajmer Madrasa Moeeniya me gaye aur Dars-e-Nizaami mukammal kiya.
Phir Aap ne Ajmer me Hazrat Sadr-ush-Shariah Maulana Amjad Ali Aazmi rahmatullāhi alaihi se Hadeeṡ ki ta’aleem haasil ki. Magar Aap ko 1351 Hijri (1932 A.D.) me Bareilly me sanad ata ki gai.

************
Sha’abaan 1352 Hijri (December 1933 A.D.) me Hazrat Sadr-ush-Shariah ki daawat par Aap Bareilly gaye aur Hazrat ke farmaan par Aap ne Madrasa Ashrafiya Misbaah-ul-Uloom, Mubarakpur me dars wa ta’aleem dena shuru kiya.
29 Shawwaal 1352 Hijri (14 February 1934 A.D.) me Aap ko Madrasa Ashrafiya Misbaah-ul-Uloom ka Sadr-ul-Mudarris banaaya gaya.
Aap ke mehnat se Madrasa ki shohrat badhne lagi aur talba ki ta’adaad badhne lagi. Phir 1353 Hijri (1935 A.D.) me Aap ne madrasa nayi imaarat me ‘Daar-ul-Uloom Ashrafiya Misbaah-ul-Uloom’ naam se shuru kiya jis ki bunyaad Aala Hazrat Maulana Sayyed Ali Husain Ashrafi Miyan aur Hazrat Sadr-ush-Shariah Maulana Amjad Ali Aazmi ke dast e mubarak se rakhi gai.
Jab talba ki ta’adaad aur badhne lagi aur Madrasa ko ek badi jagah me tabdeel karne ki zaroorat padi tab Rabi ul awwal 1392 Hijri (May 1972 A.D.) me Huzoor Mufti-e-aazam e Hind Mustafa Raza Khan aur Allama Arshad-ul-Qaadri ke dast e mubarak se ‘Al-Jaamiatul Ashrafiya’ ki bunyaad rakhi gai.

Aap ki khwaahish thi ke Madrasa me talba ko tamaam uloom ke saath Arabi aur Angrezi dono zabaan ki pukhta taaleem di jaaye taake faarigh hone ke baad dunya ke kisi bhi mulk me wo ta’aleem e deen ka kaam kar sake.

**************
Aap ke bahot saare shaagirdo ne khidmat e deen ka kaam jaari rakha hai.

Aap ke mash'hoor shaagird :

(1) Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi
(2) Faqeeh e aazam e Hind Mufti Shareef-ul-Haq Amjadi
(3) Raees-ul-Qalam Allama Arshad-ul-Qaadri (Baani e Jaamia Faiz-ul-Uloom, Jamshedpur, Daar-ul-Uloom Amjadia, Mau wa Jaamia Hazrat Nizaam-ud-deen Aulia, Delhi)
(4) Muhaddeeṡ-e-Kabeer Allama Mufti Zia-ul-Mustafa Aazami (Jaamia Amjadiya Razawiya, Ghosi)
(5) Allama Badr-ud-deen Ahmad Razawi
(6) Bahr-ul-Uloom Mufti Abdul Mannaan Aazami
(6) Imaam-ul-Ma’aqoolat Maulana Haafiz Abdul Ra'oof Balyawi
(8) Shaikh-ul-Islaam Allama Sayyed Muhammad Madani Ashrafi (Baani e Muhaddeeṡ-e-Aazam Mission)
(9) Mufakkir-e-Islaam Allama Qamar-uz-Zamaan Aazami (Baani e Jami’at-ul-Islaamiya, Ronahi)
(10) Allama Mohammad Ahmad Misbaahi (Sadr e Jami’at-ul-Ashrafia, Mubarakpur)
(11) Allama Yāsin Akhtar Misbaahi (Baani e Daar-ul-Qalam, Delhi)
(12) Allama Badr-ul-Qaadri (Islamic Academy, The Hague)
(13) Dr. Jalaal-ud-deen Ahmad Noori (Karachi University)

************
Aap har amal Sunnat e Rasool ke mutaabiq karte the.
Ek baar Aap ke daanye paanv me zakhm ho gaya. Ek saahab ne dawa laakar kaha ‘Hazrat! Dawa haazir hai.’ Sardi ka mausam tha, Hazrat moza pehne hue the.
Aap ne baaye (ulte) pair ka moza utaara to wo saahab bol pade ‘Hazrat! Zakhm to daahine paanv me hai.’ Aap ne farmaaya ‘Baaye paanv ka pehle utaarna Sunnat hai.’

************
1386 Hijri (1967 A.D.) me Aap ne Hajj ada kiya.
Aap ne photo na nikalwakar paaband e shariat hone ka ṡaboot diya.

************
Madeena munawwara me qayaam ke dauraan ek martaba Aap Roza e Rasool sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam par haath uthakar dua kar rahe the to ek Wahaabi Police Officer ne Aap ko roka aur kaha ke ‘Qibla ki jaanib haath uthakar dua karo.’ Aap ne Roza e Rasool ke adab ki wajah se koi jawaab na diya. Magar woh Aap ko pichhe khinchkar waha se door karne laga. Jab us ne kaha ke ‘Roza e Rasool ki jaanib rookh karke dua karna Shirk hai.’ tab Aap ne us se kaha ke ‘Quran majeed me ALLĀH ta’ala Waseela ke liye faramaata hai aur Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ALLĀH ta’ala ki baargaah me Waseela hain.’ Us ne kaha ‘Nek aamaal ko Waseela banaana chaahiye.’ Aap ne farmaaya ‘Kya musalman ke nek aamaal hamesha maqbool hote hain.’ Wo khaamosh raha. Aap ne farmaaya ‘Koi bhi shakhs ye nahi jaanta ke us ke nek aamaal qubool hote hain ya nahi. Har insaan qubool hone ki ummeed rakhte hue nek amal karta hai . Lekin Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ki zaat mubarak to ALLĀH ta’ala ki baargaah me Maqbool hi hai aur is me koi shak nah hai. Aur jo maqbool ho usi ko ALLĀH ta’ala ki baargaah me Waseela bana sakte hain. Chunaanche Huzoor Nabi e kareem sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam behtareen Waseela hain.’ Ye sunkar woh Police Officer baghair kuchh kahe waha se chala gaya.

************
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :
(1) Ma’arif-e-Hadeeṡ
(2) Fataawa Azeeziya
(3) Irshaad-ul-Qur’an
(4) Anba'-ul-Ghaib
(5) Al-Misbaah-ul-Jadeed
(6) Firqa-e-Na’ajiya
(7) Haashiya Sharh Mishkaat.

************
Aqwaal :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
(1) Dunya me amal karoge to qabr me raahat paaoge.
(2) Har aitraaz ka jawaab sahi amal se hi dena chaahiye.
(3) Amal karne waale bano kyun ki sahi amal se hi izzat badhti hai.
(4) Maal o daulat ALLĀH ta’ala ki ne'amat hai magar use nek kaam me kharch karne ki aadat bahot badi ne'amat hai.
(5) Woh shakhs Qaabile ehtaraam hai jis ke libaas me saadgi ho aur dil me sahi ilm ho.
(6) Hamesha dusro ki achhai dekho aur apne aib par nazar rakho.
(7) Apni izzat kuchh nahi, Asl izzat deen ki hai. Deen ki jalaalate shaan se hamari shaan hai.

************
Aap ko Hazrat Sadr-ush-Shariah Maulana Mufti Amjad Ali Aazami rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalia hain.
Hazrat Maulana Sayyed Ali Husain Ashrafi Miyan Kichhauchhawi rahmatullāhi alaihi ne bhi Aap ko khilaafat ata farmai hai.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Mumtaaz-ul-Fuqaha Muhaddeeṡ-e-Kabeer Allama Mufti Zia-ul-Mustafa Aazami rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(2) Hazrat Raahbare-Ahle-Sunnat Allama Mufti Mohammad Nasir-ud-deen Misbaahi,
(3) Hazrat Raees-ul-Qalam Allama Arshad-ul-Qaadri rahmatullāhi alaihi.

************
1 Jamaadi ul aakhir 1396 Hijri ko Aap ne Sahih al-Bukhari me se Kitaab-ul-Janaa'iz ka dars diya aur sabaq ke dauraan Aap ne farmaaya ‘Aaj Peer ka din hai aur aaj hi ke din Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ki be'asat hui thi aur aaj hi ke din aap ka wisaal hua tha.’
Aur usi raat 11: 55 p.m. baje Aap ka inteqaal hua.

************
Aap ka wisaal 1 Jamaadi uṡ Ṡaani 1396 Hijri (31 May 1976 A.D.) ko Peer ke roz hua.

Aap ka mazaar Mubarakpur (Uttar Pradesh) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Haafiz-e-Millat Haafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Abu Haamid Fareed-ud-deen Mohammad Attaar rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Abu Haamid Fareed-ud-deen Mohammad Attaar rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap ki wilaadat 539 Hijri (1145 A.D.) me Nishapur (Iran) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Sayyed Abu Bakr Ibrāheem bin Ahmad hai.

Aap Husaini saadaat hain.

**************
Aap ke waalid ki dawa (chemist) ki dukan thi. Aap ne bhi ye paisha ikhtiyaar kiya aur mareezo ki takleef sunkar un ko dawa dete dete aap ka nazariya badalne laga.

Ek baar aap ki dukaan par ek faqeer aaya aur ajeeb tarah se dekhne laga. Aap ne use waha se chale jaane ke liye kaha. Us ne apne puraane kapde batakar kaha ‘Main to yaha se jaane ke liye tayyaar hu. Lekin kya tum ne is ki tayyari kar li hai?’
Us ke jaane ke baad aap is baat par ghaur o fikr karte rahe.
Kuchh din baad aap ne apni dawa ki dukaan ko chhod diya aur Shaikh Rukn-ud-deen Akkaf Kubrawiya ke mureedo ke saath saamil ho gaye.

Aap ne Baghdad, Basra, Kufa, Makka, Madeena, Damishq, Khwarizm, Turkstan aur Hindustan me safar kiya aur safar ke dauraan Aap ne bahot saare Sufi Auliya se milkar faiz haasil kiya.

Aap ne Hazrat Majd-ud-deen Baghdadi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur Hazrat Qutb-ud-deen Haidar rahmatullāhi alaihi se Tasawwuf ki ta’aleem haasil ki.

*************
Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :

(1) Tazkiraatul Auliya
(2) Manteq aṭ-Tayr (Conference of the birds)
(3) Ilaāhi naama
(4) Asraar naama
(4) Mukhtaar naama (Rubaai ka Majmua)
(5) Diwaan (Ghazal ka Majmua)
(6) Museebat naama.

*************
Aap ke saahabzaade Sayyed Khatir-ud-deen Bayazeed hain.

*************
Aap ne Hazrat Majd-ud-deen Baghdadi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aur ‘Suharwardi Kubrawiya’ silsile ke Shaikh hain.

*************
618 Hijri (1221 A.D.) me Mongol lashkar ne Nishapur par hamla karke qatl e aam kiya. Aap us hamle me zakhmi hokar shaheed hue.

Aap ka wisaal 30 Jamaadi ul awwal 618 Hijri (July 1221 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Nishapur (Iran) me hai.

*******
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Fareed-ud-deen Attaar rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Aulia Allah ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Ghulaam Muhammad Miskeen Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Ghulaam Muhammad Miskeen Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap ka watan Kishtwa (Kashmir) hai.

1258 Hijri (1842 A.D.) me Aap apne Peer ke farmaan par Jaipur tashreef laaye aur apni Khaanqaah banaai aur ta’aleem wa tadrees shuru ki.

Aap aksar waqt Ibaadat wa riyaazat me guzaarte.

Jaipur ki hukoomat ne Aap ko 2 gaanv jaagir me diye the.

************
Aap ke wisaal baad aap ke saahabzaade Hazrat Zaheer-ud-deen Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi Sajaada nasheen bane.

************
Aap Hazrat Shaah Niyaaz Ahamd rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aap ‘Chishti Nizaami Niyaazi’ silsila ke shaikh hain.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Maulana Saadiq Shaah Jaipuri rahmatullāhi alaihi
(2) Hazrat Maulana Nijaabat Ali Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi
(3) Hazrat Maulana Sikandar Ali Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi

************
Aap ka wisaal 28 Jamaadi ul awwal 1275 Hijri (3 January 1859 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Ghat Gate, Jaipur (Rajasthan) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait aur Ashaaba ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Khwaja Sultan Abu Is'haq Ibraheem bin Ad'ham rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Aapki wiladat 100 Hijri (718 A.D) me Balkh (Afganistan) me hui.

Aapke waalid ka naam Ad'ham bin Mansoor al-Tameemi hai.

Aapke dada aur waalid Khurasan ke Sultaan the.

Hazrat Khwaja Sultan Abu Is'haq Ibraheem bin Ad'ham rahmatullahi alaihi bhi apne waalid ke baad Khurasan ke sultaan bane.

Ek raat ko Aap apne mahel me shaahi bistar par so rahe the.

Achanak chat par kisi ke chalne ki awaaz suni.

Hazrat Khwaja Sultan Abu Is'haq Ibraheem bin Ad'ham rahmatullahi alaihi ne puchha ‘Kaun hai?’

Us shakhs ne kaha ‘Ek dost.’

Hazrat Khwaja Sultan Abu Is'haq Ibraheem bin Ad'ham rahmatullahi alaihi ne puchha ‘Kya kar rahe ho?’

Usne kaha ‘Mera oont kho gaya hai. Use chat par talaash kar raha hu.’

Aapne kaha ‘Kaisi bewakoof jaisi baat kar rahe ho.’

Usne kaha ‘Tab tum kaise mulaayam kapde pehankar sone ke bistar par sokar ALLAH ko talaash kar rahe ho?’

Ye sunkar Hazrat Khwaja Sultan Abu Is'haq Ibraheem bin Ad'ham rahmatullahi alaihi be-chain ho gaye aur puri raat so na sake.

Subah ko aap apne darbaar me baithe the, tab ek shakhs maile (ghande) kapde pehne hue waha aaya aur aapke takht ke paas aaya.

Aapne usse puchha ‘Kya chaahte ho?’

Us shakhs ne kaha ‘Main is sarai ko dekhne ke liye aaya hu.’

Aapne kaha ‘Kaisi be-wakoofi ki baat kar rahe ho. Ye mera mahel hai koi sara nahi hai.’

Usne kaha ‘Aap se pehle is mahel ka maalik kaun tha?’

Aapne kaha ‘Mere waalid.’

Usne kaha ‘Unse pehle?’

Aapne kaha ‘Mere daada.’

Usne kaha ‘Un se pehle?’

Aapne kaha ‘Mere pardaada.’

Usne kaha ‘Wo sab kaha gaye?’

Aapne kaha ‘Wo sab is dunya se inteqal kar gaye hain.’

Usne kaha ‘Is tarah ye ek sara hua, jisme ek insaan aata hai aur dusra jaata hai.’

Ye sunkar aapke dil ka aalam badal gaya aur aapne fauran baargaah e Ilahi me tauba ki aur apni tamaam milkiyat aur saltanat ko chhodkar jangal me chale gaye aur Ibadat e Ilahi me lag gaye.

Aap ne Nishapur ke qareeb ek ghaar me 9 saal guzaare.

Aap sirf jumerat ko baahar aate aur lakdiya jama karte aur jumma ke din use bechkar usme se jo raqam milti usme se aadha faqeero ko de dete aur aadhe me se pure hafte tak guzaara karte.

Uske baad aap Makka Shareef tashreef le gaye aur kuchh arse tak waha qayaam kiya.

Yaha aapne Hazrat Sufyan al-Sauri aur Hazrat Fuzail bin Ayaaz rahmatullahi alaihi se mulaaqaat karke faiz haasil kiya.

Aur phir safar karte hue Shaam (Syria) aaye aur wahi par baaqi zindagi guzaari.

Aap tanhai me Ibadat karna zyada pasand farmaate the.

Ek baar Aap Imam E Azam Abu Hanifa rahmatullahi alaihi se mulaqaat ke liye gaye, to unho ne Aapka istaqbaal karte hue ‘Sayyedina Ibraheem’ kehkar bulaya.

Waha maujood kuchh logo ne aitraaz kiya to Imam E azam ne farmaya ‘Hazrat e Ibraheem hamesha yaad e Ilahi me mashgool rehte hain aur hum dunya ke khayalo me masroof rehte hain.’

Ek baar Aap naher ke kinare khaima ke baahar kapde see rahe the, tab kuchh log Aapki baargaah me aaye aur Aapse mulaaqat karne ke baad unho ne Hazrat ko chand sone ki ashrafiya batore hadiya paish ki.

Aapne unhe lene se inkaar kar diya aur faramaya ‘Mujhe iski zaroorat nahi padti.’

Ye sunkar unme se ek shakhs ne farmaya ‘Ye kaise ho sakta hai jab ke aap ne apni tamaam milkiyat ko chhod diya hai?’

Ye sunkar Aapne apni sooi ko naher me daal di.

Phir aapne naher ki taraf ishara kiya to ek machhli apne munh me sone ki sooi lekar baahar aai aur Hazrat ko de di.

Magar aapne faramaya ‘Mujhe meri sooi hi chaahiye.'

Phir ek chhoti machhli munh me aapki sooi lekar aai.

Phir Aapne faramaya ‘Jab main Sultaan tha tab sirf insaano par hukoomat karta tha. Magar ab ALLAH ne apne fazl se uski makhlooq par bhi hukoomat ata farma di hai.’

Ek baar ek shakhs ke paas se guzre wo bahot ghamgeen lag raha tha.

Aap ne usse kaha ‘Main tumhe 3 sawaal puchhta hu tum uske jawaab dena.’

Usne kaha ‘Theek hai.’

Aapne puchha ‘Kya kaainaat me koi baat ALLAH ki marzi ke khilaaf ho sakti hai?’

Us shakhs ne kaha ‘Nahi.’

Phir Aapne puchha ‘ALLAH ta’ala ne tumhara rizq muqarrar kiya hai wo koi kam kar sakta hai?’

Usne kaha ‘Nahi.’

Phir aapne puchha ‘ALLAH ta’ala ne tumhari zindagi muqarrar ki hai usse ek lamhe bhi kam ho sakti hai?’

Usne kaha ‘Nahi.’

Aapne faramaya ‘Tab tumhe is tarah ghamgeen kyun baithna chahiye?’

Ek baar logo ne puchha ‘Hamari duaein qubool kyun nahi hoti hai?’

Hazrat Khwaja Sultan Abu Is'haq Ibraheem bin Ad'ham rahmatullahi alaihi ne faramaya ‘Tumhare dil 10 cheezo ki wajah se murda ho gaye hain:

1) Tum ALLĀH ko jaante ho, magar uski sahi Ibadat ke zariye uske huqooq ada nahi karte.

2) Tum ALLAH ke Rasool Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke ummati hone ka aur unse mohabbat ka daawa karte ho, magar unki Sunnat par amal nahi karte.

3) Tum ALLAH ki kitaab (Qur’an majeed) ko maanne ka daawa karte ho, magar uske ahkaam par amal nahi karte.

4) Tum ALLAH ta’ala ki ata ki hui ne'amatein khaate ho, magar uska shukr ada nahi karte.

5) Tum jaante ho ke shaitaan hamara dushman hai, magar uske makr o fareb se bachne ki koshish nahi karte.

6) Tum jaante ho ke maut barhaq hain, magar marne ke baad qabr ke liye koi tayyaari nahi karte.

7) Tum Jannat ko paane ki khwaahish rakhte ho, magar uske liye nek amal karke nahi karte.

8) Tum Jahannam se darte ho, magar us se bachne ke liye koi tayyari nahi karte.

9) Tum apne rishtedaaro aur dosto ko marne ke baad qabr me dafn karte ho, magar isse koi naseehat nahi lete.

10) Tum jaante ho ke tum me bhi aib hai, magar hamesha dusro ke aib talaash karte ho.

Ab socho tumhari dua kaise qubool hogi.

Ek shakhs ne kuchh nasihat ke liye kaha to Aap ne faramaya

“Jab tum gunaah karne ka irada karo to 6 baatein yaad rakhna : ALLAH ta’ala ka ata kiya hua rizq khaana chhod dena, uske mulk se baahar nikal jaana, ya aisi jagah chale jaana jaha Rab ta’ala tumhe na dekh raha ho, maut ke waqt malik-ul-maut ko tauba ke liye kuch lamho ki mohlat dene ke liye kehna, munkar nakir ko apni qabr me aane se mana farma dena, jab jahannam me daale jaao to usme jaane se inkaar kar dena.”

Wo shakhs ta’ajjub ke saath bola “Aisa to koi bhi nahi kar sakta.”

Aapne farmaya “Agar ye sab tumhare liye mumkin nahi, to gunaah karna chhod dena hi behtar hai.”

Yeh sunkar us shakhs ne fauran tauba karli. Aur wahi par uska inteqal ho gaya.

Hazrat Khwaja Sultan Abu Is'haq Ibraheem bin Ad'ham rahmatullahi alaihi faramaya karte the ke: Mere paas 4 sawaariya hai. 

1) Jab koi Ne'amat milti hi to ‘Shukr’ ki sawaari par sawaar hokar khuda ke saamne jaata hu.

2) Jab Ibadat ka waqt aaye to ‘Khulus’ ki sawaari par sawaar ho jaata hu.

3) Jab koi Musibat ya Balaa aaye to ‘Sabr’ ki sawaari par sawaar ho jaata hu.

4) Jab koi Gunaah ho jaata hai to ‘Touba wa Istigfaar’ ki sawaari par sawaar hokar uske huzur pesh ho jaata hu.

Ek martaba Aap raaste se guzar rahe the.

Aapne ek sharaabi ko dekha jo sharaab ke nashe me raah me pada hua tha aur be-hoshi ke aalam me bahot bakwaas kar raha tha.

Aap uske paas thehar gaye aur farmaya ‘Yeh zabaan to zikr e haq ke liye thi. Ise kaun si aafat pahunchi ki yeh aise bakwaas kar raha hai?’

Phir Aapne paani mangwaaya aur uska munh aur zabaan dhone lage.

Aur phir aage tashreef le gaye.

Sharaabi hosh me aaya to logo ne use saara qissa sunaaya.

Sharaabi ko jab pata chala ke Hazrat Ibraheem bin Ad'ham mera munh aur zabaan dho gaye hain.

Wo rote hue kehne laga ‘Ilahi ! Tere maqbool bande ki sharm khaakar main sache dil se tauba karta hu. Tu apne maqbool bande ke tufail mujhe baksh de.’

Raat ko Hazrat Ibraheem bin Ad'ham ne khwaab me dekha ki koi kehne waala keh raha hai ‘Aye Ibraheem! Tune hamari khaatir us sharaabi ka munh dhoya. Hum ne tumhari khaatir uska dil dhoya.’

Aqwaal:

Hazrat Khwaja Sultan Abu Is'haq Ibraheem bin Ad'ham rahmatullahi alaihi farmate hai.

1) Agar koi ALLAH ke dost (wali) banna chaahta ho to use apne dil me se dunya aur aakhirat dono ki khwaahishaat nikal deni chaahiye aur sirf uski taraf tawajjoh rakhna chaahiye taake ALLAH uski taraf tawajjoh kare aur apne fazl se use wali bana de.

2) Apna batwah kholo (ya’ani apna maal nek kaam me kharch karo) aur apni zabaan band rakho (ya’ani fahash kalaami aur bad-zabaani se door raho).

Aap Hazrat Khwaja Fuzail bin Ayaaz rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Hazrat Imam Sayyed Mohammad al-Baaqir rahmatullahi alaihi ne bhi Aapko khilaafat ata farmai hai.

Aapka silsila ‘Ad'hamiya’ kehlaata hai.

Hazrat Khwaja Sultan Abu Is'haq Ibraheem bin Ad'ham rahmatullahi alaihi ke khulfa:

1) Hazrat Khwaja Sadeed-ud-deen Huzaifa Mir'ashi rahmatullahi alaihi.

2) Hazrat Khwaja Shafeeq al-Balkhi rahmatullahi alaihi.

Aapka wisaal 26 Jamaadi ul awwal 165 Hijri (782 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Jableh (Syria) me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Khwaja Sultaan Ibraheem bin Ad'ham rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sabke imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sabko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye.
Aur Sabko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sabki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.
Ameen.

Title: Hazrat Peer Sayyed Jahaangeer Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Peer Sayyed Jahaangeer Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap ke waalid ka naam Peer Sayyed Mahmood Shah Chishti bin Sayyed Imaam-ud-deen Chishti Ajmeri aur waalida ka naam Bibi Sayyeda Shaher Banu binte Baawan Mian hai.

************
Aap apne watan Kutch (Gujarat) se Mauritius tashreef laaye aur Torren Street Port Louis me qayaam pazeer hue.

************
Aap (apne chacha) Hazrat Peer Sayyed Jamaal Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi (Port Louis / Mauritius) ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

************
Aap ka wisaal 25 Jamaadi ul awwal 1307 Hijri (20 January 1890 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Bois Marchand Qabrastan, Terre Rouge, Mauritius me hai.

************
Aap ke wisaal baad Aap ke saahabzaade aur saahabzaadi Hindustan laut gaye. Kuchh waqt baad unhe khwaab me bashaarat farmai. 1315 Hijri (1898 A.D.) me wo dono waapas aaye aur dargaah banaane ke liye Aap ki qabr mubarak kholi gai to Aap ka jisme aqdas aur kafan mehfooz the.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Peer Sayyed Jahaangeer Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Peer Mohammad Ilm-ud-deen Qaadri rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Peer Mohammad Ilm-ud-deen Qaadri rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap ki wilaadat 1339 Hijri (1921 A.D.) ko Karachi me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Maulana Haafiz Ghulaam Rasool bin Maulana Haafiz Mohammad Ilm-ud-deen Qaadri rahmatullāhi alaihi hai aur aap ki waalida Hazrat Abdul Ghani rahmatullāhi alaihi ki saahabzaadi hain.

Aap ke waalid Karachi ke mumtaaz aalim wa soofi the.

************
Aap ki ta’aleem wa tarbiyat aap ke waalide mohtaram ki zere nigraani hui.

Aap apne waalid ki qaa'im karda ‘Qaadri Masjid’ me bataure naa'ibe imaam wa’az wa deegar muamalaat ko anjaam dete the aur 1383 Hijri (1964 A.D.) me aap ke waalide mohtaram ki jaeefi aur na-saazi ki wajah se ‘Qaadri Masjid’ ke e’azaazi Imaamat wa khitaabat ke aur roohaani salaasil ke muamalaat ko anjaam dena shuru kar diya.

Karachi me jab ‘All India Sunni Conference’ ki shaakh ‘Jamiate Aaliya Sunniya’ ke naam se qaa'im hui to us me Aap ke waalid Sadr aur Aap Naa'ib Naazim muqarrar hue.

************
1390 Hijri (1971 A.D.) me apne waalid ke wisaal ke baad Aap Khaanqaahe Qaadriya Ilmiya ke sajjaada nasheen bane.

Aap har Shab e Hafta, Shab e Jum’eraat aur har maah ki 11wi shab ko Mehfil e Zikr munaaqid karte.
Har 14wi shab ko Hazrat Maulana Jalaal-ud-deen Rumi rahmatullāhi alaihi ki ‘Maṡnawi Ma'anwi’ ka dars dete.
Har 17wi shab ko Hazrat Nizaam-ud-deen Auliya rahmatullāhi alaihi ki yaad me Majlis e Faatiha munaaqid karte.

Maahe Moharram me 10 din tak Aap Karachi me majaalis me Shahaadate Imaam Husain radiy-Allāhu anhu ka bayaan farmaate.

Aap hamesha logo ko Auliya wa Asfiya ke aqaa'd ke baare me taaleem dete.
Aap ne apni taqreero se Ahle Sunnat wal Jama’at ki azeem khidmat ki.

************
Aap ne bahot saari Hamd, Na’at shareef wa Manaqabat likhi hai.

************
Aap Hazrat Maulana Haafiz Ghulaam Rasool Qaadri rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aap ‘Qaadri Ilmi’ silsila ka Shaikh hain.

Aap ke khalifa Hazrat Soofi Abdul Ghani Qaadri rahmatullāhi alaihi hain.

************
Aap ka wisaal 25 Jamaadi ul Awwal 1406 Hijri (6 February 1986 A.D.) ko Jumeraat ke roz ba-waqt Zohar hua.

Aap ki namaaze janaaza baad namaaze Jum’aa (aap ke bahenoi) Hazrat Maulana Haafiz Abdul Hayy Haashami al-Qaadri ne padhaai jis me hazaaro ki ta’adaad me mureedeen wa mo’ataqideen saamil hue.

Aap ka mazaar Qaadri Masjid, Karachi (Pakistan) me Aap ke waalid ke mazaar ke qareeb ke hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Peer Mohammad Ilm-ud-deen Qaadri rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Taaj-ud-deen Hindi radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu
Content:
Hazrat Taaj-ud-deen Hindi radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap sab se pehle Hindustani muslim hain.

Aap ka asl naam Raaja Rama Varma Kulashekhara tha. Aap Malabar [Kerala] ke Raaja the aur ‘Cheraman Perumal’ naam se mash'hoor the.
Ek martaba Aap ne apne mahel ki chhat par chaand ke do tukde hote hue aur phir un dono tukdo ko judte hue dekha.

Jab 7 Hijri (629 A.D.) me Huzoor sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam farmaan par Hazrat Maalik bin Deenaar radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu apne saathiyo ke saath kashti me safar karte hue Taqipatanam (Madurakkara) aaye.

Jab Kodungallur (Kerala) me Aap ki mulaaqaat Hazrat Maalik bin Deenaar radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu se hui to aur un se us Moaziza e Rasool ki haqeeqat pata chali ke Hazrat Muhammad ibne Abdullāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ne elaan e nabuwwat kiya hai aur kaafiro ne aap se mo’azeeza talab kiya to Huzoor sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ne Jable Abu Qubais par khade hokar ungli ke ishaare se chand ke do tukde kiye aur phir un ko jod diya.
Hazrat Maalik bin Deenaar ki daawat par Aap musalman hue.

Aap ne Hindustan me sab se pehli masjid banai, jo ‘Cheraman Jumaa Masjid’ ke naam se mash'hoor hai.

************
Kuchh waqt baad Aap Madeena munawwara tashreef le gaye aur Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ki baargaah me haazir hue aur adrak ke Achaar ka hadiya pesh kiya. Huzoor sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ne sab ashaaba me us ka ek ek tukda taqseem kar diya.
Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ne Aap ko ‘Taaj-ud-deen Hindi’ naam ata farmaaya.
Madeena munawwara me kuchh roz qayaam ke baad Aap Shaher Muqalla pahunche. Waha se Hajj ke liye tashreef le gaye.

************
Waapas aate waqt Oman me maqaame Zafar par Aap beemaar hue aur Aap ka wisaal hua.

Aap ka mazaar Al-Baleed, Salalah (Oman) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Taaj-ud-deen Hindi radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ashaaba ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.
