Title: Kya tamaam kalma padhne waale musalman hai, chaahe kisi bhi Firqe se ho.
Content: Kya farmaate hain Ulama e Deen wa Muftiyaan e Sharah mateen is masle mein ke Zaid ka catering ka karobaar hai aur uska aqeedah ye hai ke tamaam kalma padhne waale musalmaan hain chaahe kisi bhi Firqe se hon. Uski aulaadein deobandi Wahabi ho chuki aur unki shaadiyaan bhi naamwar deobandi wahabi ke ghar karwaye. Ab inke haath ka Zabeeha ya inka pakaaya huwa khana. Agarche kisi Sunni ka Zabah karda ho khaana jaayez hai ya nahi. Kuch logon ka ye kehna hai ke iske yahan jo baawarchi hai wo behraich shareef ke Sunni hazraat hai. Lihaza kha sakte hai. Is zimn me kya hukm hai? Dusra ye ke aaj ke is pur-fitan daur mein jab ke halaal o haraam ki tameez uthti jaa rahi hai. Kya sirf Sunni ke bulane par bagair tehqeeq kahin bhi kisi ka bhi khana kha sakte hai. Jabke bade shehron mein khaas kar Mumbai mein kayi bade caterers ke Aqeede gumraahiyat par hai. Ya wo kaam lekar bohri murtad ko theka de dete hain aur unse thaal banwa kar apne label ke Saath pesh karte hain. Teesra ye ke koi caterer ye kahe ke main kahin bhi namaz padh leta hun mujhe is se matlab nahi ke wo kaunse Firqe hai namaz ka Waqt hota hai aur jahan bhi jamaat milti hai main padh leta hun. Aise shakhs ke zabihe ya aise shakhs ke laaye huwe gosht ka kya hukm hai? Ulama aur Mashaaikh ko unke mureedeen aur mutawassileen daawaton me bula Kar aise hi caterers ka khana pesh karte hain aur wo laa ilmi mein kha bhi lete hai. Jab koi Sunni nahi khata to wo mezbaan inhi ka hawala dete hain ke aap unse bade Aalim hai? Aisi soorat mein kya ye zaroori nahi ke jahan bhi daawat ho wahan tehqeeq karli jaaye ke kiska banaya huwa khana hai? Chautha ye ke kya ye mumkin nahi ke Muftiyaan e Kiraam kam se kam uroosul bilaad Mumbai mein aise caterers ki list shaaya farmayein jinka aqeedah mashkook hai aur awaam ko Hidayat dein ke inse bachein ? Jawab jald inayat farmakar ehsaan farmaye Aljawab bi’aunil Malikil Wahhab. (1) Wahabi, Deobandi, Rafzi, Bohri jinki Bad Aqeedgi hadde Kufr ko pahunch chuki hai unka zabiha murdaar hai aur unke wahan ka gosht bhi haraam hai. Aala Hazrat Faazil e Bareilvi Quddisa Sirruhul Azeez farmate hain. “Qadiyaani sareeh murtad hain unka zabiha qatai murdaar hai aur gair muqallideen wahabiya bawaj-he kaseer o ilzaam kufr hai un mein jo munkir e zarooriyat e deen hain wo to bil ijmaa kaafir hi hain, warna fuqaha e kiraam un par hukm e kufr farmaate hain aur zabiha ka halaal hona na hona hukm e fiqhi hai. Khususan wahi ehtiyaat ke mane’a takfeer ho yahan unke zabiha ke khane se mana karti hai, ke jamhoor fuqaha e kiraam ke taur par haraam wa murdaar ka khana hoga, Lihaza ehteraaz laazim hai”. Neez doosre fatwe mein irshad farmate hai. “Deobandi ka zabiha murdaar hai aur deobandi ka bheja huwa gosht agarche musalmaan ka laaya huwa ho murdaar hai”. Yunhi Aala Hazrat Faazil e Bareilvi Quddisa Sirruhul Azeez se sawaal huwa ke bohron ke yahan ka zabiha kiya huwa gosht unke yahan ka paka huwa khana Ahlesunnat wa jamaat kha sakte hain ya nahin? To aap ne jawaban irshad farmaya “Bohre ke Ismaili raafzi hain unke haath ka zabiha murdaar hai aur unke yahan ka gosht paka huwa bhi haraam hai. Magar ye ki Musalman ne zabah kiya aur us waqt se is waqt tak musalman ki nigah se gaib na huwa ho. Gosh ke ilaawa baaki khaanon par agarche qatai hurmat nahin magar behr haal ehteraaz hi munasib hai”. (Fatawa Razvia, Jild 8, Safha 332) Mazkoora baala ibaaraton se ye bilkul wazeh hai ki jin logon ki bad aqeedgi hadd e kufr ko pahunch gayi hai unka zabiha murdaar hai aur agar kisi Sunni Sahihul Aqeeda Musalman ne zabah kiya aur gosht kisi bad aqeeda ke qabza mein is tarah ho ki Sunni Musalmaan ki nazron se bilkul gayab ho jaaye to wo gosht bhi haraam ho jayega. Aala Hazrat Faazil e Bareilvi Quddisa Sirruhul Azeez se aise jaanwar ke baare mein sawal huwa jise musalman ne zabah kiya aur khaakrob (chamaar) ne chamda utaara gosht banaya to aap ne is ke jawaab mein farmaya. “ye sab is surat mein hai ki bakra waqt e zabah se musalmanon ke haath pahunchne tak musalman ke nigah se gaib na huwa. Aur agar zabah karke usey de diya aur koi musalman dekhta na raha usne gosht banaya aur musalmanon ko diya ab uska khana sire se halaal hi na raha, haan agar usko ajeer kiya ho to jawaaz rahega. (Fatawa Razvia Jild 8, Safha 364) Jinki bad aqeedgi hadde kufr ko pahunch gayi unhein apna imam banana haraam aur unki kufriyat par muttala ho kar unhein laaiq e imamat jaanna kufr hai. Aala Hazrat Faazil e Bareilvi Quddisa Sirruhul Azeez farmate hain. “Deobandi aqeede walon ke peechhe namaz baatil mahez hai hogi hi nahin, farz sar par rahega aur unke peechhe padhne ka shadeed azeem gunah alaawah. Imam Muhaqqiq e Alal Itlaaq Fat-hul Qadeer Sharhe Hidaaya mein hamare teeeno aimma e mazhab Imam e Azam, wa Imam Abu Yusuf, wa Imam Muhammad Radiyallahu Ta’ala Anhum se naql farmate hain is mein sab baraabar hain. Namaz e Panjgaana ho khwaah Juma, ya Eid, ya Janaza, ya Taraweeh koi Namaz unke peechhe ho sakti hi nahi. Balki agar (Unko Qaabil e Imamat ya Musalman jaanna bhi dar kinaar) unke kufr mein shak hi kare to khud kaafir hai jabki unke khabees aqwaal par muttala ho”. (Fatawa Razvia Jild 3, Safha 235) Surat e Mas’oola mein jab Zaid ka ye aqeeda hai ki tamaam kalma padhne wale musalman hain chaahe kisi bhi firqe se hon to us aqeeda ki wajah se khud us par hukm e kufr hai. Kyunki Qadiyani, Rafzi, Bohri aur kalimaat e kufr bakne wale ya unki kufriyaat par muttala ho kar unhein apna peshwa ya musalman jaanne wahabi, deobandi ko Ulama e Ahlesunnat ne kafir kaha aur yahan tak farmaya. Jo unke kafir hone aur unke azaab diye jaane mein shak kare wo bhi kaafir hai. Lihaza Jab zaid aisa aqeeda rakhta hai to uske haath ka zabiha murdaar aur uske wahaan ka paka huwa khana haraam ki agar kisi sunni hi ne zabah kiya ho. Lekin gosht kisi kafir wa murtad ke qabza mein ho aur sunni ki nazar se wo gayab ho jaye to aise gosht ka hukm murdaar ka hai. Haan agar waaqai uske wahan kaam karne wale yaani gosht lane wale aur usey pakane wale aur musalman tak us gosht ko pahunchane wale sab Sunni Sahihul Aqeeda musalmaan hain aur ek aan ke liye bhi gosht sunni musalman ki nazar se gayab na huwa ho aur kisi sunni sahihul aqeeda musalman ne zabah kiya ho to us gosht ka khana halaal hai. Sirf chand baawarchiyon ka sunni hona kaafi nahi. Wallahu Ta’ala Aa’lam. (2) Jin logon ke baare mein maloom ho ki ye bad aqeedon ke khane wagairah se bachte hain aur is muaamla mein ehtiyaat barat-ta hain unke wahan da’wat mein tehqeeq karne ki zaroorat nahin. Haan agar jin logon ke baare mein ishtibaah ho ki ye bad aqeedon se khana banwate hain, ya unke wahan se gosht laate hain. Unke yahan tehqeeq kar leni chahiye. Wallahu Ta’ala Aa’lam (3) Jo Caterer ye kehta ho ki main kahin bhi namaz padh leta hun mujhe isse matlab nahi ki wo kaun se firqe ka hai. Aise Shakhs ka hukm upar mazkoor huwa. Agar Waaqai bad aqeedon ki kufriyat par muttala ho kar unhein laiq e imamat jaanta hai. To wo bhi unhi ke jaisa hai, aise shakhs ka zabiha ya uska laaya huwa gosht haraam hai. Agar Ulama wa Mashaikh apne murideen wa mutawassileen par eitemaad karte huwe ki jab ye Sunni hain to Sunni hi se khana banwaya hoga, unke wahan ka khana kha liya to woh log maurid-e-ilzaam nahin. Aur agar kisi Sunni Sahihul Aqeeda Musalman ko ye ilm ho jaye ke is daawat ka khaana kisi bad aqeeda Suleh Kulli Caterers ke yahan ka bana huwa hai aur wo aise khane se bachche to woh laaiq e tehseen hai. Kisi Aalim ya Shaikh ke hawale se us par eiteraaz karna jaayez nahin. Haan agar kisi Aalim ya Shaikh ne ye jaante huwe ye khana bad aqeeda ke wahan ka hai aur khane mein gosht ke pakwaan bhi shaamil hain. Phir bhi usne khaaya to wo zaroor maurid e ilzaam hai aur iska ilm ke bawajood kha lena doosron ke liye hargiz jawaaz ki daleel nahin. Wallahu Ta’ala Aa’lam (4) Logon ko Hukm-e-Shar’a se aagaah kiya jaaye ki Bad Aqeeda bad mazhab Suleh Kulli Caterers ke wahan se hargiz khana na lein ki jin logon ki bad aqeedgi hadd e kufr tak pahunch gayi hai. Unka zabiha aur unke qabze ka gosht jab ki koi Sunni Musalman nigraan na ho Haraam o Murdaar hai. Poore Shaher ke Caterers ke aqeede ki chhaan been karna aur unke baare mein sahi faisla karna bahut dushwaar hai. Lihaza jo jisse muaamla kare uske baare mein khoob achchi tarah tehqeeq wa tafteesh karle. Wallahu Ta’ala Aa’lam. Nawasa E Sadrushshari'ah Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Mehmood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Qazi-E-Sheher Mumbai

Title: Hazrat Khwaja Kumail bin Ziyaad rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Khwaja Kumail bin Ziyaad rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap ki wilaadat 12 Hijri (633-4 A.D.) me Kufa me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Ziyaad bin Naheek hai.

Aap Banu Nakha qabeele se hain.

************
Aap Taabi'i hain.
Aap ne Hazrat Ali al-Murtaza radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ki khidmat me rehkar ta’aleem wa faiz haasil kiya aur un ki shahaadat ke baad Hazrat Imaam Hasan al-Mujaba radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ki khidmat me rahe.

************
Hazrat Ali al-Murtaza radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ne Aap ko Hit ka governor banaaya tha.

8 Safar 37 Hijri (26 July 657 A.D.) ko Aap ‘Jung e Siffin’ me aur dusri jung me bhi shaamil hue.

Phir Aap Kufa me sukoonat pazeer hokar ta’aleem aur faiz ata farmaate rahe.

************
Hajjaaj bin Yousuf al-Ṡaqafi ne Hazrat Abdur Rahmān bin al-Ash'aṡ ko lashkar ke saath Turkastan bheja. Islaami lashakr ne Ratbil ke lashkar ke saath kai jung me fatah haasil karke Turkey par islaami hukoomat haasil ki. Is ke baad Abdur Rahmān bin al-Ash'aṡ ne khat likhkar lashkar ko waapas aane ki ijaazat maangi. Lekin Hajjaaj ne unhe waapas aane se mana kar diya aur aage badhne ke liye kaha.
Islaami lashkar ko Hajjaaj ka iraada theek nahi laga aur wo waapas laut aaye aur Hajjaaj ke lashkar ke saath jung ki. Hazrat Kumail bin Ziyaad ko Qurra ke giroh ka sardaar banaaya gaya. Lashkar Sajistan aur Kirman (Iran) aur Basra aur Kufa ko aazaad karaaya.
Umayya Khalifa Abdul Malik ne suleh ke liye ek shakhs bheja. Woh Hajjaaj ko governor se maazool karne ke liye tayyaar hua. Magar Abdur Rahmān ke saathi Abdul Malik ko hi maazool karna chaahte the.
Abdul Malik ne bada lashkar bheja aur Deer-ul-Jamajum par jung hui. Jis me Hajjaaj ne Abdur Rahmān ki fauj ko haraaya. Hazrat Abdur Rahmān ne Turkey me panaah li. Hazrat Kumail bin Ziyaad aur Saeed bin Jubair chhup gaye.
Hajjaaj bin Yousuf ne Aap ke khaandaan waalo ko qaid kar liya. Jab Aap ko yeh khabar mili to Hajjaaj ke darbaar me haazir hue. Hajjaaj ne Aap ko Hazrat Ali radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ko mustarad karne ke liye kaha. Aap ne farmaaya “Ali ke tareeqe se behtar aur koi nahi hai.” Hajjaaj ne jallaad ko hukm dekar Aap ko qatl kar diya.

************
Aap Hazrat Ali al-Murtaza radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ke khalifa hain.

Aap ke khalifa Hazrat Shaikh Ya’aqoob as-Suhi rahmatullāhi alaihi hain.

************
Aap ka wisaal 82 Hijri (701 A.D.) me hua.

Aap ka mazaar Kufa (Iraq) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Khwaja Kumail bin Ziyaad rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Ahmad Kabeer Rifai rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Ahmad Kabeer Rifai rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Qutb-ul-aqtaab, Sultaan-ul-aarifeen, Sartaaj-e-Auliya, Shaikh-e-Kabeer, Abul Alamain (Father of Two Banners).

***********
Aap ki wilaadat 15 Rajab 512 Hijri (1119 A.D.) me Jum’eraat ko Umme Ubaida, Basra (Iraq) me hua.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Sayyed Ali bin Yahyā Nakib Bukhari aur waalida ka naam Faatima binte Yahyā al-Ansaari Nijjeri hai.
Aap Husaini saadaat hain.

Aap ki wilaadat se pehle Huzoor sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ne Shaikh Mansoor Rabbaani rahmatullāhi alaihi ko khwaab me aakar bashaarat di ke ‘Tumhari bahen ke yaha beta paida hone waala hai jo wali e kaamil hoga aur Rifai ke naam se mash'hoor hoga.’

***********
Aap ki umr 7 saal ki hui tab Baghdad me aap ke waalid ka inteqaal hua.
Is ke baad Aap ke maamu Shaikh Mansoor Rabbaani Aap ko Dikhla le gaye aur unho ne Aap ki parwarish ki.

Aap ne Abdus Sami al-Hurbuni se Qur’an ki ta’aleem haasil ki aur Haafiz e Qur’an hue.
Phir Shaikh Mansoor Rabbaanaai ne Aap ko Shaikh Ali al-Waasiti ke paas ta’aleem ke liye bheja.

Aap bahot zaheen the. Aur kam umr me sab ta’aleem haasil ki.

Aap ne Shaafi mazhab ki fiq'h ki kitaab ‘Tanbih’ ki tafseer likhi.

20 saal ki umr me Shaikh Abu Fazl Ali al-Waasiti ne Aap ko khilaafat ata farmai.

Kuchh waqt Nehre Dikhla (Tigris) par rahe aur phir Umme Ubaida (Hasen) aakar apne waalid ke musafir-khaane (sara) me qayaam kiya.

Hazrat Shaikh Mansoor Rabbaani rahmatullāhi alaihi ke wisaal ke kuchh waqt pehle un ki zauja mohtarma ne arz kiya ‘Khilaafat ke liye wasiyat farma den.’
Shaikh Mansoor Rabbaani ne apne bete aur bhaanje Ahmad Kabeer Rifai ko bulwaaya aur dono se farmaaya ‘Khajoor ke patte lekar aao.’
Beta bahot se patte kaat kar le aaya. Magar Hazrat Ahmad Kabeer Rifai koi patta na laaye. Wajah puchhi to arz kiya ke ‘Maine sab ko ALLĀH ki tasbeeh karte hue paaya, isi liye kisi patte ko nahi kaata.’
Hazrat Shaikh Mansoor Rabbaani rahmatullāhi alaihi muskuraye aur apni zauja ki taraf kar dekhkar farmaaya ‘Maine bhi kai martaba apne khalifa ke liye dua ki to har martaba yehi farmaaya gaya ke tumhara khalifa tumhara Bhaanja hai.’

28 saal ki umr me Aap ke maamu Shaikh Mansoor Rabbaani ne apne wisaal ke kuchh arse pehle Aap ko khilaafat ata farmaai aur un ke madrasa ki zimmedaari di.

***********
Aap ne tamaam zindagi logo ko Qur’an wa Shariat aur Hadeeṡ o Sunnat ki ta’aleem dena jaari rakha.

Kai baar aap ki masjlis me hazaaro ki ta’adaad me log jama hote the.
Log Aap se kitne bhi alag alag sawaal kare Aap baghair pareshaan hue un ko jawaab dete the.

***********
Aap Aqtaab e araba (4 Major Qutubs) me se hain.
Aap ko Qutub e waqt (Qutub of the time, not just of a local area) ka martaba mila hai. Ya’ni Aap sirf kisi ilaaqe ya mulk ke Qutub nahi the, apne daur me tamaam dunya ke Qutub the.

***********
555 Hijri me Hazrat Ahmad Kabeer Rifai rahmatullāhi alaihi Hajj ke liye gaye aur Makka me Hajj ke arkaan ada karne ke baad aap Madeena shareef pahunche.

Ek roz Asr ki namaaz ada karne ke baad aap Ghauṡe aazam Abdul Qaadir Jeelaani radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu aur deegar Auliya Allāh aur Ulama e kiraam ke saath Huzoor Sarkare Madeena sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke Roza e anwar par salaam pesh karne gaye.

Aap ne Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ko is tarah salaam kiya ‘Assalaamu alaikum wa rahmatullāhi Ya Jadadi’.
Roza Mubarak ke andar se jawab aaya ‘Wa alaikum assalaam wa rahmatullāhi Ya Waladi’ ya’ni ‘Aur tum par bhi salaam aur ALLĀH ki rahmat ho, Aye mere bete’.
Aur saath me sunaheri jaaliyo me se noorani haath bahar aaye aur Hazrat Ahmad Kabeer Rafai rahmatullāhi alaihi ne aap sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke daste mubarak ko chuma aur phir wo haath Roza mubarak ke andar chala gaya.

***********
Aap hamesha apna kaam khud karte the.

Aap hamesha mareezo, na-bina, ghareebo, mohtaajo, yateemo, jaeefo, buzurgo ki khidmat me lage rehte.

Aap farmaate the ki ‘Makhlooq par raham karna ye ek aisi sifat hai ki jo bande ko ALLĀH ta’ala ke qareeb karti hai’

Aap masjid me se baahar nikalte waqt andhe logo ko un ke joote talaash karke pehanne me madad karte aur un ko un ke ghar pahunchate ya un ko raasta batate.

Aap buzurgo ki izzat karte aur logo ko bhi kehte ke ‘Huzoor Rasool-Allāh sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ne farmaaya hai ki Jo buzurgo ki izzat karega ALLĀH ta’ala us ki zaroorat ke waqt aise log ata farmaega jo us ki izzat kare.’

Aap juzaam (leprosy) ki beemaari walo ki khidmat karte, un ke saath waqt guzaarte aur un ke liye dua karte, un ke kapde dhote, un ko saaf karte, un ke liye khaana laate.

Thandi ke mausam me aap yateemo, beemaaro, ghareebo aur mohtaajo ke ghar par jalaane ke liye lakdiya dene ke liye jaate.

Aap aalimo ki bahot ta’azeem karte the aur farmate ki ‘Aalim qaum ke raahnuma hote hai.’

Aap logo ko un logo ki sohbat se door rehne ke liye farmaate jo bad-tameez ho, takabbur wale ho aur jo logo se bin zaroori bahes karte ho.

Aap logo ko mubaah kaam me bhi zyadati karne se bachne ke liye farmaate jaise zyada khaana aur zyada sona.

Aap raat ka aksar waqt Ibaadat o riyaazata aur Tilaawate Qur’an aur Zikre ilāhi me guzaarte the.

***********
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
(1) Haddadiya me ek aurat ko mare hue bache paida hote the. Us ne dua ki ke ‘Agar mujhe aulaad hogi to main use Ahmad Kabeer Rifai ki khidmat me de dungi.’ Kuchh arse baad use ek ladki paida hui magar wo kubaani aur langdi thi. Is wajah se gaanv ke ladke us ka mazzaaq udate the.
Ek baar Hazrat Ahmad Kabeer Rifai us gaanv me aaye to sab log un ki ziyarat ke liye pahunche. Wo ladki Hazrat ke qadmo me gir gai aur rote hue kaha ‘Aap meri waalida ke peer hain. Mujhe is pareshaani se najaat dila dijiye.’ Aap ko raham aa gaya aur aap ne dua ki aur apna haath us ki pusht par aur sar par pher diya. Foran ALLĀH ke fazl se us ladki ki peeth aur pair durust ho gaye.

(2) Ek baar Hazrat Ahmad Kabeer Rifai ke bhaanje Hazrat Abul Farah bin Ali rahmatullāhi alaihi aap ke paas malfoozaat (naseehat) sunne ki niyyat se baithe the.
Itne me ek shakhs waha aaya. Hazrat ne use Marhaba kaha. Us ne kaha ‘Maine 20 roz se kuchh khaya peeya nahi hai. Main chahta hu ke mujhe khaane peene ke liye kuchh mil jaaye.’
Aap ne farmaya ‘Tumhari khwahish kya hai?’ Us ne aasman ki taraf nigaah uthai to dekha ke 5 Murgaabiya (ek parinda) udti hui ja rahi hain. Us ne Kaha ‘Kaash un me se ek mujhe bhuni hui mil jaaye, jis ke saath gehu ki rotiya aur thande paani ka maskija bhi ho.’
Ye sunkar aap ne farmaaya ‘Ye murgaabiya tere liye hi hain.’ Phir aap ne udti hui murgaabiyo ki taraf dekhkar farmaaya ‘Is shakhs ki khwaahish jaldi puri kar do.’ Jaise hi aap ne ye kaha ke foran un murgaabiyo me se ek bhuni hui aap ke paas aakar giri. Phir aap ne apne pehlu me pade hue 2 pattharo ko haath me liye to wo behtareen qism ki gehu ki rotiya ban gaye. Phir aap ne apna haath fiza me buland kiya to surkh rang ka thande paani se bhara hua ek maskija aap ke haath me aaya.
Jab wo shakhs kha pee kar chala gaya to Hazrat ne Murgaabi ki haddiyo ko baayen haath me lekarus par apna daahina haath phera aur farmaya ‘Aye haddiyo aur paththo khuda ke kukm se aapas me jud jaao.’ Phir aap ne ‘Bismillāhir rahmānir raheem’ padhi to wo murgaabi zinda ho gai aur hawa me udti hui chali gai.

***********
Ek baar Jum’aa ko Aap sokar uthe to dekha ki Aap ke kurte par billi so rahi hai. Aap ne apni biwi ko qainchi dene ke liye kaha aur kurte ka utna hissa kaat daala aur namaaz ke liye chale gaye. Aap jab waapas aaye to wo billi waha se chali gai thi. Aap ne wo kurte ka tukda uthaya aur apni biwi ko use silkar kurte me lagane ke liye kaha. Jab aap ne apni biwi ki naraazgi dekhi to aap ne farmaya ‘Fikr mat karo. Jo hua hai achha hi hua hai aur mujhe is ki wajah se koi pareshaani nahi hui hai. Ye achha kaam tha.’

Ek martaba Aap jaa rahe the aur ek tiddi Aap ke kapdo par baith gai to jab tak tiddi ud na gai Aap usi jagah dhup me thehre rahe aur phir farmaaya ‘Is ne hum se saaya haasil kiya.’

Ek baar Aap ne khaarish zada (khujli wale) ek kutte ke ilaaj me 40 din guzaare. Logo ne jab puchha ki ‘Aap ne aik wehshi jaanwar ke liye itna waqt kyun guzaara?’ To aap ne farmaaya ‘Agar ye mar jaata to jab main apne khaaliq se milta aur wo puchhta ki tum ne meri makhlooq ki madad kyun nahi ki to main kya jawaab deta.’

***********
Aqwaal :
¯¯¯¯¯¯
(1) Tareeqat aur Shariat alag alag nahi ho sakte magar saath saath hote hai. Agar Shariat sahi nahi to Tareeqat bhi sahi nahi hogi.

(2) Adab ALLĀH ta’ala ka ata kiya hua noorani taaj hai. Jo ise pehan leta hai wo buraai se mehfooz ho jaata hai. Taqwa jis darwaaze se aata hai wo Adab kehlaata hai.

***********
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :
(1) Al-Burhaan-ul-Moeed
(2) Al-Nzaam ul Khaas li Ahlil Ikhtisaas
(3) Al-Ahzaab ul Rafia
(4) Al-Hakam ul Rafia.

***********
Aap ki nasl Sayyed Zia-ud-deen Mohammad Madyan se jaari hai.
(Aap ke dusre beto ka bachpan me hi inteqaal ho gaya.)

Aap ki 2 betiya hain :
Sayyeda Faatima aur Sayyeda Zainab.

***********
Aap Hazrat Shaikh Abul Fazl, Ali al-Waasiti rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Hazrat Shaikh Mansoor Rabbaani rahmatullāhi alaihi ne bhi Aap k khilaafat ata farmai hai.

Aap se Tareeqat ka ‘Rifaeeya’ silsila jaari hai.

Aap ke Khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Sayyed Zia-ud-deen Mohammad Madyan rahmatullāhi alaihi
(2) Hazrat Sayyed Izz-ud-deen Ahmad rahmatullāhi alaihi
(3) Hazrat Sayyed Ali Mirbaaz rahmatullāhi alaihi.

***********
Aap ka wisaal 22 Jamaadi ul awwal 578 Hijri (1183 A.D.) ko Jum’eraat ke din hua.

Aap ka mazaar Wasit, Basra (Iraq) me hai.

********
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Sayyed Ahmad Kabeer Rifai rahmatullāhi alaihi aur Ahle bait ke aur Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Aakhiri "Wahi" Nabi Kareem Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ ke wisaal haq se kitne arse pehle nazil huwi?

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

Aakhiri "Wahi" Nabi Kareem Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ ke wisaal haq se kitne arse pehle nazil huwi?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Is Silsile meiñ aimma Tafseer ke beech ikhtilaf hai ki nuzoole Wahi aakhir kab hua:
1 • Aakhiri "Wahi" Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ ke Aalame wisaal ki taraf Tashreef le Jaane se teen(3) sa'at pehle nazil hui.

? *Hashiya Jalalain safa. 44*

2 • Nuzool Wahi aakhir ke teen(3) din baad Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ ne Aalame faani se kooch farmakar jaware rehmat meiñ nuzool kiya.

? *Tafseer e Na'emi Jild 3, safa.199*

3 • Aap Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ ke apni jaan afreen ke supurd karne se saat(7) din pehle aakhiri "Wahi" ka nuzool hua.

? *Hashiya Jalalain safa.44*

4 • Hazrat Ibne Hatim Rehmatullah Alaihi ke mutabiq "Wahi" aakhiri ka nuzool aapke Wisaal e Rafiqe aala se nau(9) din pehle hua.

5 • Aap Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ ke wisaal e daim aur qurbe atam se Masroor wa musharraf roz pehle aakhiri "Wahi" nazil hui.

? *Tafseer na'emi Jild 3, safa 199*

6 • Hazrat Ibne Abbas razi'allahu anhuma se marwi hai ki nuzool aakhiri "Wahi" ka aap ke apne matloobe Haqeeqi ke jaware rehmat meiñ jaane se ikkasi(81) roz pehle hua.

? *Al atqan jild 1, safa 36*

7 • Aakhiri "Wahi" dus zilhijja ko mina meiñ nazil hui jab ki aap hajjatul wida ke faraiz anjam dene meiñ mashroof the.

? *Tafseer qartabi*

Title: Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Siraaj-ud-deen Chishti rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Alqaab: Siraaj-ul-Auliya, Makhdoom-ul-Millat.

Aapki wiladat Dehli me hui.

Aapke waalid ka naam Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Kamaal-ud-deen Allama Chishti rahmatullahi alaihi hai.

Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Siraaj-ud-deen Chishti rahmatullahi alaihi Hussaini saadaat hain.

Aapne apne waalid se Quran majeed ki aur dusre uloom ki taaleem haasil ki.

Aapne Hazrat Allama Ahmad Thanesari aur Maulana Aalam Panipati rahmatullahi alaihi se bhi taaleem haasil ki.

Aap bachpan se hi Ibadat o Riyaazat aur Muraqaba wa Mujahida me waqt guzarna pasanad farmate.

Aap ‘Aalim al Dahr (Scholar of the continent)’ ke naam se mash'hoor hain.

Hazrat Khwaja Naasir-ud-deen Chiraag e Delhi rahmatullahi alaihi ke wisaal ke baad ek martaba Delhi me ulama ki mehfil Hazrat Makhdoom Jahaaniyan Jahaangasht rahmatullahi alaihi se Aap ki mulaaqaat hui.

Hazrat ne aapko bahot mushkil sawalat kiye.

Aapne har sawal ka bakhubi jawab diya, jisse Hazrat Makhdoom Jahaaniyan Jahaangasht rahmatullahi alaihi mutmaeen ho gaye.

Mehfil khatm hone ke baad Hazrat Makhdoom Jahaaniyan Jahaangasht ko pata chala ke Aap Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Kamaal-ud-deen Allaama rahmatullahi alaihi ke farzand hain.

Uske baad Hazrat Makhdoom Jahaaniyan Jahaangasht Aap se mile aur kaha ke ‘Hum aap ke waalide buzurghwaar ke shaagird hain aur Hazrat Khwaja Naasir-ud-deen Chiraag e Delhi rahmatullahi alaihi ne jo Khilafat naama mujh ko ata farmaya hai wo bhi aapke waalid saahab hi ke qalam se likha hua hai.’

Ek martaba Delhi ke sultaan Firoz Shaah ne 7000 Rupaye bataure nazrana zaade raah ke liye bheje aur aapko Deccan tashreef le jaakar waha taaleem wa isha’at e deen karne ke liye guzarish ki.

Aapne nazrana lene se inkaar kar diya aur raqam waapas bhej di.

Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Siraaj-ud-deen Chishti ne Patan (Gujarat) me taaleem e deen aur khidmat e khalq me zindagi guzaari.

Aap Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Kamaal-ud-deen Allama Chishti rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Hazrat Khwaja Naasir-ud-deen Chiraag e Delhi rahmatullahi alaihi ne bhi Aapko 4 saal ki umr me khilafat ata farmayi hai.

Aap ‘Chishti Naasiri’ silsila ke shaikh hain.

Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Siraaj-ud-deen Chishti ke khalifa (Aap ke saahbazaade) Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Mohammad Ilm-ud-deen Chishti rahmatullahi alaihi hain.

Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Siraaj-ud-deen Chishti ka wisaal 21 Jamaadi ul awwal 817 Hijri (August 1414 A.D.) ko hua.

Aapka mazaar Patan (Gujarat) me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wasallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Siraaj-ud-deen Chishti rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah aur Ahle bait ke waseele se Sabko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sabke imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sabko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye.

Aur Sabko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sabki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.
Ameen.

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Umar bin Abdur Rahmān al-Attaas rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Umar bin Abdur Rahmān al-Attaas rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Laqab :
Qutb-ul-Anfaas.

*********
Aap ki wilaadat 929 Hijri (1523 A.D.) me Tarim ke qareeb Lisik, Hadramaut (Yemen) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Sayyed Abdur Rahmān bin Aqeel rahmatullāhi alaihi aur waalida ka naam Shareefa Muznah binte Mohammad bin Ahmad al-Jufri hai.

Aap Husaini saadaat hain.

Aap jab apni waalida ke pait me hi tab aap ki chhink ki aawaaz aati thi. Is liye Aap ‘Attaas’ laqab se mash'hoor hain.

*********
Bachpan se hi Aap ko ibaadat wa riyaazat ka shauq tha. Aap Tarim ki har masjid me 2 rak'at namaaz padhte. Kunve me se paani nikaalkar masjid ke hauz me daalte.

*********
Aap ne Shaikh Abu Bakr bin Saleem, Shaikh Husain bin Abu Bakr bin Saleem, Shaikh Haamid bin Abu Bakr bin Saleem, Muhammad bin Abdur Rahmān al-Haadi, Sayyed Umar bin Isā al-Samarqandi, Barakwah al-Maghribi, Shaikh-ul-Kabeer Ahmad ibn Is'hāq al-Shahal bin Hainani, Abu Bakr bin Abdur Rahmān bin Shihaab, Shaikh Abdullāh bin Ahmad al-Afeef , Shaikh Ahmad bin Abdul Qaadir Ba'syin, aur Abu Bakr bin Muhammad al-Faqeeh se ta’aleem haasil ki.

*********
Aap ne Ainat, Tarim, Waadi al-Amed, Waadi al-Qasar aur Waadi al-Do'an ka safar kiya.

Phir Shaikh Husain bin Abu Bakr bin Saleem aur Shaikh Haamid bin Abu Bakr bin Saleem ke mashware par Aap ne Huraydah me tashreef laaye aur Shaikh Najjaad al-Zibyani ke yaha muqeem hue.
Aap ne Huraydah me sukoonat pazeer hokar ta’aleeme deen shuru ki.

Kuchh waqt baad Aap ke waalid aur pariwaar ko bhi Huraydah bula liya.
Huraydah aane ke 8 din baad Aap ke waalid ka intiqaal hua.

*********
Aap khilaafe shariat koi bhi baat pasand nahi farmaate aur sab ko shariat par amal karne ki ta’aleem farmaate.

Ek martaba Aap Banu Suwaid Anaq ke ek shakhs ke ghar par tashreef le gaye. Unho ne Aap ka istaqbaal kiya aur Aap ko ek kaddu batore hadiya diya. Aap ne puchha “Tum ye kaddu kaha se laaye ho?” Us ne kaha “Waqaf ke baagh se.” Aap ne farmaaya “Humare liye yeh kaddu khaana jaa'iz nahi kyun ki waqaf ki zameen musalmano ki milkiyat hai.” Us shakhs ne kaha “Aaj ke baad main waqaf ke baagh se koi cheez nahi khaaunga. Lekin is se pehle maine us me se jo khaaya hai us ka kya?” Aap ne farmaaya “Tum us baagh ki dekh bhaal karo aur jo bhi uge use musalmano ko de dena.”

Ek martaba Aap Wadi al-Amed me Banu Sulaib ke ek shakhs ke ghar ke paas se guzre us ne ba-adab Aap ko tashreef laane ke liye arz ki. Aap ne farmaaya “Main us ghar me kaise jaa sakta hu jis me betiyo ko miraaṡ me se hissa nahi diya jaata hai. Kyun ki Qur’an majeed me beto ko do hisse aur betiyo ko ek hissa dene ke liye irshaad farmaaya gaya hai.” Us shakhs ne kaha “Main aaj se hi betiyo ko miraaṡ me se hissa dena shuru kar dunga.”

*********
Aap apne shaagirdo se farmaate ke “Kaṡrat se Astaghfaar aur Durood shareef padhte raho ke yeh har pareshaani se najaat ka zariya hai.”

*********
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
(1) Ek shakhs ka intiqaal ho gaya. Us ki biwi haamila thi. Jab pariwaar waale us shakhs ki miraaṡ ko baant rahe the to Aap ne farmaaya ke “Is aurat ke pet me jo bachcha hai woh ladka hai. Us ke liye bhi is me se hissa rakhna.” Kuchh waqt baad jab bachcha paida hua to waaqai ladka tha. Wo ladka bada hua to Aap ne us se farmaaya “Beta! Ilme deen haasil karo taake deen ki hifaazat kar sako.” Aap ke farmaan par us ne ilme deen haasil karna shuru kiya aur bada hokar faqeeh bana aur Shaikh Abdul Kabeer ke naam se mash'hoor hua.

(2) Ek martaba Qahet ki wajah se Aap ke gaanv waale gaanv chhodkar jaaane ki tayyaari karne lage. Aap ne unhe farmaaya ki “Sabr rakho, In shaa Allāh baarish hogi.” Gaanv waale Aap ki baat maankar rook gaye. Aur jaldi hi baarish hui aur khajoor ke darakht hare ho gaye.

(3) Ek martaba Aap ne Shaikh Umar bin Ahmad al-Juaydi Hilabi se farmaaya “Gaanv me jaao to khajooro ko utaar lena.” Unho ne Aap ke farmaan par amal kiya. Is se Gaanv waale ko ta’ajjub hua. Lekin kuchh hi waqt me tiddi ke lashkar ne hamla kiya aur saara paak barbaad kar diya.

*********
Aap ne ‘Ratib-ul-Attaas’ naami kitaab likhi hai.

*********
Aap ke Shaagird :
(Aap ke saahabzaade) Husain, Saleem, Abdur Rahmān, Aap ke bhai Aqeel, Abdullāh bin Alawi al-Haddad, Isā bin Muhammad al-Ethiopia, Ahmad bin Hashim al-Ethiopia, Abdullāh bin Ahmad Balfaqih, Muhammad bin Abdur Rahmān Madihij, Sayis Ali bin Umar bin Husain Shaikh Ali Baras, Shaikh Muhammad Bamasymus, Shaikh Muhammad bin Umar al-Amudi, Shaikh Abdullāh bin Uṡmaan al-Amudi, Shaikh Abdullāh bin Ahmad Ba'Afeef al-Amudi, Shaikh Aqeel bin Ameer bin Daghmusy, Shaikh Sahal bin Shaikh Ahmad bin Is'hāq, Shaikh Abdur Rahmān bin Abdul Kabeer Baqis, Shaikh Muhammad bin Abdul Kabeer Baqis, Faqeeh Shaikh Ahmad bin Abdullāh bin Umar, Shaikh Saleem bin Umar, Shaikh Syarahil Badzib, Salim bin Ba'Ubad, Husain bin Shaikh Ali bin Muhammad al-Aidrus, Ahmad ibn Umar al-Hinduan, Zain bin Imraan Ba'Alawi, Shaikh Abbaas bin Abdullāh Bahafash, Shaikh Umar bin Ahmad al-Hilabi, Shaikh Abu Saeed Abdullāh bin Muhammad bin Basurah, Shaikh Muzahim bin Ali Bajabir, Shaikh Ali bin Saaleh, Qouzan Zahir, Faqeeh Abdur Raheem Bakatir, Shaikh Saleem bin Abdur Rahmān, Junaid Bawazir, Shaikh Abu Bakr bin Abdur Rahmān bin Abdul Ma’abood Wazeer, Muhammad bin Umar Bawazir, Shaikh Abdullāh bin Sad Bamika Syibami, Shaikh Ahmad bin Muhammad Bajamal, Shaikh Ali bin Toha as-Saqqaf, , Aqeel bin Shaikh as-Saqqaf Shaikh Umar bin Ali az-Zubaidi, Faqeeh Abdullāh bin Umar Ba'Ubad, Shaikh Ali bin Ahmad bin Wurud Bawazir, Shaikh bin Abdur Rahman al-Ethiopia, Shaikh Ali bin Haulan, Shaikh Ali bin Kosin al-Udzri, Shaikh Mahmood Jummal an-Najar.

*********
Aap Hazrat Shaikh Husain bin Abu Bakr rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap se ‘(Shaazili) Attaasia’ silsila jaari hai.
Aap ke khalifa Hazrat Imaam Sayyed Abdullāh bin Alawi al-Haddaad rahmatullāhi alaihi hain.

*********
Aap ka wisaal 20 Jamaadi ul awwal 1072 Hijri ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Huraydah (Yemen) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Umar bin Abdur Rahmān al-Attaas rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Allama Umar bin Abdullāh al-Khateeb rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Shaikh Allama Umar bin Abdullāh al-Khateeb rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap ki wilaadat 8 Zil Hijjah 1326 Hijri (31 December 1908 A.D.) ko Jumeraat ke roz Tarim, Hadramaut (Yemen) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Abdullāh bin Ahmad aur waalida ka naam Faatima binte Hasan hai.

Aap Hazrat Abbaad bin Bishr al-Awsi al-Ansaari radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ki nasl se hain.

************
9 saal ki umr me Aap sirf 97 din Haafize Qur’an hue.

Aap ne Hazrat Habeeb Abdullāh ibn Aydarus ibn Alwi al-Aydarus, Shaikh Abu Bakr ibn Abdullāh al-Khateeb, Shaikh Abdur Raheem ibn Abdullāh ibn Saleem al-Khateeb, Habeeb Abdur Rahmān ibn Ubaidullāh as-Saqqaf, aur Habeeb Alwi ibn Abdur Rahmān as-Seri se taaleem haasil ki.

Aap Qir’at, Tafseer, Tawaarikh, Ilme Nahaw, Adab aur Fiq'h ke maahir the.

Aap ne ‘Al-Mutanabbi’ ki 3 jild 3 din me hifz kar li.

Aap baghair kaagaz o qalam ya calculator ke koi bhi ginti kar dete the.

************
1353 Hijri (1935 A.D.) me jab aap ki umr 27 saal ki thi tab Ulama ne Aap ko Tarim ke Qaazi ka ohada dene ka mashwara kiya. Magar Aap ne ye sochkar inkaar kiya ke mujh se behtar aur bujurgh ulama maujood hain.

Is ke baad 1358 Hijri (1940 A.D.) me Aap Singapore aa gaye aur Al-Haddad pariwar ki Property company me Clerk bane. Jab Aap ke paas kuchh raqam jama hui to Aap ne Kandahar Street me khud ki Company shuru ki.
Is dauraan Aap madrasa me ta’aleemi class me saamil hote rahe magar khud ta’aleeme deen ka kaam nahi karte the.
Hazrat Sayyed Muhammad bin Saleem al-Attaas Aap ke khaas dost the.

1367 Hijri (1948 A.D.) me Aap ka nikaah Al-Khateeb pariwaar me hua.
Aap ke 3 saahabzaade aur 5 saahabzaadiya hain.

************
1386 Hijri (1967 A.D.) me Aap Haram shareef ke liye rawaana hue.
Aap ne Madeena munawwara me 5 saal qayaam kiya. Pehle Aap ek Ribat me thehre. Phir Aap ek makaan me rahe jo Shaikh Abdullāh ibn Muhammad Basader ne Aap ke liye tayyaar kiya.
Yaha Aap ne ‘Maqaamat-ul-Hariri’ hifz ki.
Is ke baad Makka mukarrama tashreef le gaye aur waha 5 saal sukoonat pazeer rahe.
Haramain shareefain me Aap ka bahot ehtaraam kiya jaata tha aur Aap ke liye ek khaas kursi rakhi jaati thi.

************
1396 Hijri (1977 A.D.) me Ulama e Sigapore ke israar par Aap Singapore waapas aaye aur ta’aleem wa tadrees ka kaam karte rahe.
Aap din aur raat talba ko ta’aleem wa tadrees karte the.
Sanichar ko shaam ko Aap Fiqh ki taaleem dete. Itwaar ko subah ko Halaqah ke zariye Sahih Bukhari wa Sahih Muslim ki aur Imaam Muhammad al-Ghazaali rahmatullāhi alaihi ki kitaab ‘Ihya ul uloom ul deen’ ki ta’aleem dete. Itwaar aur Peer ki raat ko Ilme Nahaw ki taaleem dete. Shab e Jum’aa ko Aap ke Hillside Drive, Serangoon me makaan par Ulama e Singapore ki Mehfil e Roha (discussions of classical Islami books) hoti.

Aap apne shaagirdo ka khaas khayaal rakhte. Shaagirdo ka chehra dekhkar us ki haal jaan lete the.
Ek martaba ek shaagird class me daakhil hua to Aap ne us se puchha “Bila mahu kahwin? (Tum shaadi kab kar rahe ho?)”. Sab is sawaal se ta’ajjub hua. Magar Aap ne us shaagird ko ye sawaal is liye puchha tha ke us ne do billiyo ko dekhne ke liye apni motorcycle roki thi.

Aap puraane talba ki galtiyo par ghussa bhi hote the magar kuchh der baad aap ki naraazgi door ho jaati.

Aap ke paas jo khairaat aati thi us se Aap apne watan Tarim (Yemen) ke ghareebo ko madad karte the.

Aap khaane me aur libaas me hamesha saadgi apnaate the.

************
1412 Hijri (1992 A.D.) me jab Aap Hasptal me the tab Aap ne tadrees mauqoof karke ‘I'raab-ul-Qur’an (Understanding Al-Quran through Arabic grammar and literature) shuru kiya. 5 saal ki mahenat me Aap 29we pare tak pahunch gaye.

************
Aap ‘Shaazili Ba-Alawiya’ silsila ke Shaikh hain.

************
Aap ka wisaal 20 Jamaadi ul Awwal 1418 Hijri (22 September 1997 A.D.) ko Peer ke roz Subah ko 90 baras ki umr me hua.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Shaikh Allama Umar bin Abdullāh al-Khateeb rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.
