Title: Hazrat Sayyed Faiz-ul-Hasan Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Sayyed Faiz-ul-Hasan Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Laqab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Khateeb ul Islaam.

************
Aap ki wilaadat 1329 Hijri (1911 A.D.) me Allo Mahar (Sialkot) hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Peer Sayyed Muhammad Husain Shaah bin Peer Sayyed Ameen Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi hai.

Aap Husaini saadaat hain.

Aap ke pardaada Hazrat Peer Sayyed Muhammad Jewan Shaah Naqawi urfe Sher Sawaar Sarkaar rahmatullāhi alaihi isha’ate Islaam ke liye Hind me tashreef laaye the aur Allo Mahar me sukoonat pazeer hue.

Aap ke pardaada Hazrat Peer Sayyed Ameer Shaah, Peer Sayyed Muhammad Channan Shaah Noori aur Peer Sayyed Ameen Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi Allo Mahar ke ‘Naqshbandi Mujadadi’ silsila ke mash'hoor buzurg aur masha'ikh hain.

Aap ke waalid Angrezi hukoomat ke dauraan Sialkot ke Magistrate the.

************
Aap Hadeeṡ, Falsafa, Khitaabat, aur Tasawwuf ke maahir the.

1348 Hijri (1930 A.D.) me Aap Majlis-e-Ahraar-ul-Islaam me saamil hue.

Aap Qaadiyani ke khilaaf Tehreeq-e-Khatm-e-Nabuwwat me saamil hue.

1351 Hijri (1933 A.D.) me Aap ke waalid ke wisaal ke baad Aap Sajjaada nasheen bane.

************
Aap ke 5 saahabzaade aur 3 saahabzaadiya hain.

Saahabzaade :
(1) Peer Sayyed Khaalid Hasan Shaah
(2) Sayyed Iftikhaar-ul-Hasan Shaah urfe Zahre Shaah
(3) Sayyed Barkat-ul-Hasan Shaah
(4) Sayyed Sajjaad-ul-Hasan Shaah
(5) Sayyed Zahid Ali Shaah.

************
Aap Hazrat Peer Sayyed Muhammad Husain Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap ‘Naqshbandi Mujadadi Ameeni’ silsila ke shaikh hain.

Aap ke khalifa Hazrat Peer Sayyed Khaalid Hasan Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi hain.

************
Aap ka wisaal 20 Jamaadi ul awwal 1404 Hijri (22 February 1984 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Allo Mahar (Pakistan) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Sayyed Faiz-ul-Hasan Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Farishte ko Wahi kis tarah milti thi?
Content:
Jawab:

ALLAH Tabarak wa Ta'ala ko jab kisi Nabi ke paas "Wahi" bhejna Manzoor wa Maqsood hota tha.

Toh farishte ko Roohani taur par us "Wahi" ka ilqa farmata tha.

Ya woh farishta us "Wahi" ko lauhe mehfooz se yaad karke laata aur Nabi ko suna deta tha.

Al Itqan fee ulumul Qur'an Jild 1, Safa 58

Title: Hazrat Imaam Jalaal-ud-deen Abul Fazl Abdur Rahmān as-Suyuti rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Imaam Jalaal-ud-deen Abul Fazl Abdur Rahmān as-Suyuti rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Ibn-ul-Kutoob (Son of books), Shaikh-ul-Islaam, Fakhr-ul-Mohaddeeṡeen.

**************
Aap ki wilaadat 1 Rajab 849 Hijri (3 October 1445 A.D.) ko Sanichar ki shab ko Asyut (Misr) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr ibn Muhammad hai.

Aap ke waalid Cairo me Masjide Shaikhu me Shafi'i mazhab ke mudarris the.

Aap ki umr 5 saal thi tab Aap ke waalid ka inteqaal hua.
Is ke baad Hazrat Kamaal-ud-deen ibn Hamaam Hanafi ne Aap ki parwarish aur tarbiyat ki.

**************
8 saal ki umr me Aap Haafize Qur’an hue.
Phir Aap ne Al-Umdatul Ahkaam, Minhaaj-ul-Fiqh wal-Usool, aur (Ibn Maalik Andaulisi ki) Alfiyyah fil Nahaw wa Sarf ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
864 Hijri me 15 saal ki umr me Aap ne majeed ta’aleem haasil karna shuru kiya.
866 Hijri (1461 A.D.) me 17 saal ki umr me Aap ne apni pehli kitaab ‘Sharh al-Isti'aazah wal-Bismillāh’ likhi.

Aap ne Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Ash'shaar Masahi Shafi'i se ‘Al-Majmoo’ aur Ilmul-Faraa'iz ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Hazrat Shaikh Siraaj-ud-deen al-Balqini se Fiq'h ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Unho ne 876 Hijri me Sanad aur Ijaazat ata farmai.
878 Hijri me Shaikh Siraaj-ud-deen al-Balqini ke inteqaal ke baad Shaikh Sharf-ud-deen al-Munaawi se Fiq'h aur Tafseer ki ta’aleem haaisl ki.
Hazrat Jalaal-ud-deen al-Mahalli se Tafseer ki ta’alem haasil ki.
Hazrat Imaam Taqi-ud-deen al-Shamani Hanafi se 4 saal tak Ilme Nahaw aur Hadeeṡ ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Aap ne 14 saal tak Hazrat Shaikh Mohiy-ud-deen al-Kaafiyaji se Tafseer, Usool-e-Tafseer, aur Ma’aani ki ta’aleem haasil ki aur Ijaazat haasil ki.
Hazrat Abdul Qaadir Ansaari se Usool-ul-Hadeeṡ ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Hazrat Saif-ud-deen al-Hanafi se Tafseer aur Balaaghah (eloquence) ki ta’aleem haasil ki.
Hazrat Shams-ud-deen Mouhammad se Tasawwuf ki ta’aleem haasil ki.

Aap ke ustaado ki ta’adaad taqreeban 150 hai.
Aap Ilme Nahaw, Hadeeṡ, Fiq'h, Tafseer, Tawaarikh, Falasfa, Kalaam, Ilme Lisaani (Philology), Khitaabat (Rhetoric), Miqaat (Timekeeping), Ilme Hisaab (Arithmetic), Miraaṡ, aur Ilme Tibb ke maahir the.

**************
866 Hijri me Aap Arabi ke mudarris bane.
867 Hijri me Masjide Shaikhu me Shafi'i mazhab ke mudarris bane.

Phir Aap Hajje Baitullāh ada kiya.
876 Hijri me Aap Mufti bane.
Phir Aap ne Madarsa Ibn Tuloon me Hadeeṡ ki tadrees shuru ki.
891 Hijri (1486 A.D.) me Sultaan Qaitbay ne Aap ko Khaanqaah-e-Baybar ke Shaikh aur Imaam muqarrar kiya tha.

Aap ko Shafi'i mazhab ke As'haab-un-Nazzar (Assessors) me se maana jaata hai.

**************
Aap ke shaagirdo me Al-Daawūdi, Ibn Ilyaas aur Haafiz Ibn Tuloon al-Hanafi mash'hoor hain.

**************
Aap ne Shaam, Hijaaz, Yemen, Hind aur Morocco aur Misr ke dusre shahero ka safar kiya.
Aur aakhir me Cairo (Misr) me sukoonat ikhtiyaar ki.

**************
Aap 9wi sadi ke Mujaddid e Islaam hain.
Aap ne apni kitaabo aur ta’aleemaat ke zariye khidmate deen ka azeem kaam anjaam diya.

Aap Mujtahid the aur apne Fatawo ke zariye logo ko sahi ta’aleem dete the.

**************
Aap ne taqreeban 283 kitaaben likhi hain.

Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :
(1) Tafseer-ul-Jalalain (Commentary of the Two Jalaals)‎, (Aap ke ustaad Hazrat Jalaal-ud-deen al-Mahalli ka Tafseer-e-Qur’an ka adhura kaam Aap ne mukammal kiya).
(2) Dur-ul-Manṡoor (Tafseer)
(3) Al-Itqaan fee Uloom ul Qur’an
(4) Al-Tibb-ul-Nabawi (Prophetic medicine‎)
(5) Al-Jaami' ul-Kabeer
(6) Al-Jaami' ul-Sagheer
(7) Alfiyyah-ul-Hadeeṡ
(8) Tadreeb-ul-Raawi
(9) Taarikh-ul-Khulafa‎
(10) Tabaqaat-ul-Huffaaz
(11) Nuzhat-ul-Julasaa fee ash'aar ul-Nisaa
(12) Al-Khasa'is-ul-Kubra (Miracles of Prophet Muhammad sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam)
(13) Al-Muzhir (Linguistics)
(14) Sharh al-Isti'aazah wal-Bismillāh
(15) Bushral-Kaeeb
(16) Arful Wardi fee Akhbar Mahdi

**************
Aap nek, parhezgaar, muttaqi aur tawakkal wa Qana’at waale the.
Agar koi ameer Aap ko koi tohfa deta to Aap use waapas de dete.

Afsaro ke saath ikhtelaaf aur takraav ki wajah se 907 Hijri (1501 A.D.) me Aap Jazeeratul Rawdah me chale gaye.

Aap aakhri umr tak kitaaben likhne ka aur ta’aleem wa tadrees ka kaam karte rahe.
Aakhir me 7 din tak beemaar rahe.

**************
Aap Hazrat Imaam Kamaal-ud-deen rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain,
Aur Shaazili silsile ke Shaikh hain.

**************
Aap ka wisaal 18 Jamaadi ul awwal 911 Hijri (17 October 1505 A.D.) ko Jumeraat ke roz hua.

Aap ka mazaar Cairo (Egypt) me hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Imaam Jalaal-ud-deen Abdur Rahmān Suyuti rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Makhdoom Sayyed Sama-ud-deen Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Makhdoom Sayyed Sama-ud-deen Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Aap ke waalid ka naam Sayyed Fareed-ud-deen hai.

Aap Hazrat Makhdoom Jahaaniyan Jahaangasht Sayyed Jalaal-ud-deen Husain rahmatullāhi alaihi ke khaandaan se hain.

************
Aap ne Hazrat Meer Sayyed Shareef Jirjani se ta’aleem haasil ki.

Aap Uch se safar karte hue Gujarat aur Nagaur (Rajasthan) hote hue Sultaan Bahlul Lodi ke zamaane me Bayana tashreef laaye. Sultaan Sikandar Lodi ke zamaane me Aap Delhi tashreef laaye.
Sultaan Aap ki bahot ta’azeem karta tha aur Aap se mashwara leta tha.

Aap ne ek Madrasa ta’ameer kiya aur ta’aleem wa faiz ata farmaate rahe.

Aap bade muttaqi aur zaahid the. Aap ki nazare tawajjoh se beshumaar logo ke dil gunaah aur nafsaani khwaahishaat se paak ho gaye.

************
Tasannif :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Aap ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaaben :
(1) Mifatah-ul-Asraar
(2) Sharh ‘Lama’at’

************
Aap ke 2 saahabzaade hain :
(1) Abdullāh Biyabaani
(2) Nasir-ud-deen.

************
Aap Hazrat Kabeer-ud-deen Ismāeel Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Shaikh Jamaal-ud-deen Haamid bin Fazlullāh urfe Shaikh Jamaali rahmatullāhi alaihi,
(2) (Aap ke saahabzaade) Hazrat Shaikh Nasir-ud-deen rahmatullāhi alaihi.

************
Aap ka wisaal 17 Jamaadi ul awwal 901 Hijri (2 February 1496 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Mehrauli, Delhi me Aulia masjid ke qareeb hai.

************
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Makhdoom Sayyed Sama-ud-deen Suharwardi rahmatullāhi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allāh aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Sayyed Badi-ud-deen Ahmad Madaar Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi
Content:
Hazrat Sayyed Badi-ud-deen Ahmad Madaar Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi :
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦

Alqaab :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Qutb-ul-Madaar, Zinda Shaah.

*******
Aap ki wilaadat 1 Shawwaal 242 Hijri (August 839 A.D.) me Halab (Shaam /Syria) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Sayyed Qidwat-ud-deen Mehzar Ali Halbi ibn Sayyed Baha-ud-deen Manaazar Ali rahmatullāhi alaihi aur waalida ka naam Bibi Haajra binte Sayyed Abdullāh Aazami rahmatullāhi alaihi hai.

Aap ke waalid Husaini saadaat hai aur waalida Hasani saadaat hain.

*******
Aap ki waalida agar be-wuzu hoti to aap doodh nahi pite the.

Agar aap kisi wajah se ro rahe hote aur Azaan ki aawaz sunte to foran khaamosh ho jaate aur puri Azaan sunte.
Isi tarah agar koi Tilaawat e Qur’an kar raha ho to aap khaamoshi ke saath sunte.

*******
4 saal 4 maah aur 4 din ki umr me Bismillāh khwaani ke baad Aap ke waalid ne Hazrat Khwaja Sadeed-ud-deen Huzaifa al-Mar'ashi ke paas ta’aleem ke liye rakha.
Aap Arabi ke har harf ke baare me gehra mutaalah karke sikhne lage.

Ek baar Hazrat Khwaja Huzaifa al-Mar'ashi ko Huzoor sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ne khwaab me farmaaya ke ‘Ye ladka ALLĀH ta’ala ka wali hai aur meri aal me se hai. Tum is ka khas khayaal rakhna.’

14 saal ki umr me aap Haafiz e Qur’an hue.
Aap Hadeeṡ, Tafseer, Fiq'h aur dusre uloom ke bhi maahir hue.

*********
Is ke baad Aap apne waalidain se ijaazat lekar Hajj ke liye rawaana hue. Aap ne apne saath kuchh bhi saamaan nahi liya.
Raaste me jab aap Baitul Muqaddas par pahunche to Hazrat Baayazeed Bustami rahmatullāhi alaihi apne mureedo ke saath waha tashreef farma the.
Hazrat ne aap ki peshani chumkar farmaaya ‘Huzoor sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ne mujhe khwaab me bashaarat di hai ke bahot jald tumhari mulaaqaat Badi-ud-deen Ahmad naam ke ek shakhs se hogi. Jab tum use milo to tum ne jo ilm haasil kiya hai wo use ata kar dena ke ye us ka haq hai. Is liye main is ke liye tayyaar hu.’

Is tarah Aap Hazrat Baayazeed Bastami ke mureed hue aur Tayfuria silsila me daakhil hue.
Phir peer ki ijaazat lekar Hajj ke liye rawaana hue.
Ek baar Aap Baitullāh ka tawaaf kar rahe the ke ghaib se aawaaz sunai di ke ‘Aye Badi-ud-deen! Ab tumhe Madeena ke liye nikalna chaahiye.’ Ye sunkar Aap foran Madeena ke liye rawaana ho gaye.

Jab aap Roza mubarak par pahunche aur Huzoor sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ko salaam pesh kiya to Roza mubarak ke andar se Aap ko jawaab mila.
Kuchh din Madeena me guzarne ke baad aap waapis aaye aur Hazrat Ali Halbi ke paas charo aasmaani kitaabo ka ilm haasil kiya aur ilaawa in ke dusri kitaabo ka ilm bhi haasil kiya.

*******
Phir Aap Huzoor sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke hukm se Hindustan ke liye rawaana hue.
Safar me Aap roz Roza rakhte the. ALLĀH ta’ala ki taraf se roz aap ko 2 roti ata ki jaati, jis me se ek aap khairaat me de dete.
Is tarah Aap jahaaz se Yemen hote hue Hindustan tashreef laaye.
Aap Surat (Gujarat) shaher me pahunche. Yaha Aap ne Muslim aur Ghair-muslim sab ko Islaam ki sahi ta’aleem dena shuru kiya.
Phir kuchh arse baad Aap Khambhat tashreef le gaye. Yaha Aap ki ta’aleem se Raja Jaswant Singh ne Islaam apnaaya, Aap ne us ka naam Jaffar Khan rakha. Us ne kai Masjiden banai.
Phir Aap ne Bhedoch jaakar qayaam farmaaya.
Phir Khambhat se jahaaz me Hajj ke liye tashreef le gaye. Waha se Iraq aur Bukhara hokar Shaam gaye.
Phir Hindustan aakar Ahmedabad gaye. Yaha Raja Balwaan Singh ne Islaam apnaaya aur Aap ne us ka naam Zoraawar Khan rakha.

Phir Khambhat aakar jahaaz me Hajj ke liye gaye. Waha se Iraq gaye aur Hazrate Ghauṡ e aazam radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu se mile. Us waqt Ghauṡe aazam ke jalaal ka ye aalam tha ke koi insaan Aap ke saamne nahi thehar sakta tha aur koi parinda Aap ke upar se guzar nahi sakta tha. Agar koi parinda aasmaan me Aap ke upar se guzarta to jalkar mar jaata. Aap ne Ghauṡe aazam se farmaaya ‘Humare naana jaan to rahmatallil aalameen kehlaate hain.’ Yeh sunkar Ghauṡe paak ne khud ko badal diya aur sukoon waale ban gaye.

Phir aap Badkhashan hokar Misr pahunche.
Yaha pure ilaaqe me koi beemaari phail gai thi aur Hakeem Ahmad Misri ke ilaaj se bhi logo ko shifa nahi mil rahi thi. Aap ne Hakeem Ahmad Misri se farmaaya ‘Ye beemaari ALLĀH ki na-farmaani aur gunahao ki wajah se hai. Yaha ke log yateem bacho ka maal chhin lete hain.’ Ye sunkar us ne foran tauba kar li aur Aap ka mureed ban gaya. Aap ki naseehat se dusre ilaaqe ke logo ne bhi yateemo ka maal lautana shuru kar diya. Phir Aap ki dua se ALLĀH ta’ala un ko is beemaari se najaat ata farmai.

Phir aap Neem Roz gaye aur Yaha Hazrat Shaah Lutfullāh Aap ke mureed hue. Aap ne unhe ta’aleem e deen ke liye Najaf bheja.

Phir aap Hindustan aakar pure ilaaqe ka aur Sri Lanka me bhi gasht karte rahe.

Aap jab Ajmer pahunche to logo ne aap ko waha se chale jaane ke liye kaha aur kaha ke ‘Yaha jang me bahut saare musalman mar gaye hain aur Taraghadh par un ki laashen padi hai aur raat ko waha se Allāhu akbar (takbeer) ki aawaaz aati hai.’
Aap ne logo se farmaaya ‘Agar main is pareshani ko door kar du to tum meri baat maanoge?’ Logo ne kaha ‘Zaroor.’
Aap ne apne shaagirdo ko bhejkar un shohada ko janaaza padhakar dafn karne ke liye kaha. Is ke baad wo aawaaze aana band ho gaya. Logo ka khauf door hua aur un ko itminan hua aur sab ne musalman hokar Hazrat se bai'at ki.

Jab Aap Lucknow pahunche to ek shakhs ne aakar arz kiya ke ‘Meri biwi 4 mahine se beemaar hai aur aap us ki sehat ke liye dua karen.’ Aap ne use Makhdoom Shaah Meena ke se milne ke liye kaha aur saath me apne shaagird Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen ko jaa-namaaz aur ek thaili di aur farmaaya ‘Hazrat Qawaam-ud-deen ki dargaah par jaakar Shaah Meena ko ye do cheezen dena aur un ko dua karne ke liye kehna.’
Jab wo log us aurat ko lekar waha pahunche to dekha ke Shaah Meena abhi bache hain. Unho ne dono cheeze un ko dekar saari baat bataai. Shaah Meena wuzu karke jaanamaz par khade hue to aap ke pair kaampne lage. Unho ne Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen ko dua karne ke liye kaha. Unho inkaar kiya magar israar aap karne par Shaah Meena ne Dua ki aur Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen ne ‘Aameen’ kaha.
Un ki dua se foran us aurat ki beemaari door hui aue wo hosh me aakar khaana maangne lagi. Unho ne us thaili me se chaawal aur sirka nikaalkar use khilaaya. Use khaane ke baad use zyada achha mehsoos hone laga.

Is ke baad Makhdoom Shaah Meena mash'hoor ho gaye aur log un ke paas apni takleefo aur beemaariyo ke liye dua karaane ke liye aane lage.
Is tarah Hazrat Badi-ud-deen Madaar Shaah ne Shaah Meena ko Qutub ka darja ata farmaaya.

Ek baar ek budhi aurat Aap ke paas aakar kehne lagi ‘Aaj ek ladka paida hua hai, Magar wo doodh nahi pee raha hai.’
Aap ne farmaaya ‘Ye bacha ALLĀH ka wali hai aur Maah e Ramazaan shuru ho gaya hai. Is liye wo din ke waqt me doodh nahi pee raha hai.’

Aap jab Kannauj pahunche to waha qareeb me sukhe taalaab me rehne lage. Ek baar kuchh logo ne aakar kaha ‘Kannauj me Cholera ki beemaari paaili hai aur zyada ta’adaad me log mar rahe hain. Aap hamare liye dua karen.’
Aap ne farmaya ke ‘Main ALLĀH se dua karunga. Magar yaha ke logo ko Islaam apnaana hoga.’
Logo ne kaha ‘Agar 40 din tak kisi ki maut nahi hoti hai to hum Islaam apnayenge.’

Aap ne Qaazi Shahaab-ud-deen Kidwai ko bhejkar dua karne ke liye kaha. Unho ne jaise hi Kannauj ki had par khade hokar dua ki, shaher me se aik aag ka gola nikalkar upar uthne laga. Qaazi Shahaab-ud-deen Kidwai apni roohaani taaqat se us aag ko nigal gaye aur Makanpur waapas aaye.
Is ke baad 39 din guzar gaye aur Kannauj me kisi ki maut nahi hui. Logo ne jama hokar mashwara kiya ke agar kal 40we din bhi agar koi nahi marega to sab ko Islaam apnana hoga. Aisa karte hain ki kisi budhe shakhs ko maar daalte hain.
Jab logo ne Bhikha aur Gopal naam ke do daane shakhs ko saari baaten batai to unho ne logo se kaha ‘Jo us aag ko nigal sakta ho wo waapas baahar bhi nikal sakta hai.’
Aur dono ne tay kiya ke hume Islaam apnaana hai. Un ki baat sunkar sab logo ne bhi Islaam apnaaya.

*********
Aap ke chehre par ALLĀH ta’ala ne aisa noor ata farmaaya tha ke agar koi Aap ko baghair hijaab ke dekh leta to be-ikhtiyaar aap ke qadmo me gir padta aur kalma e shahaadat padh leta.

Aap paani par is tarah chal sakte the jis tarah zameen par ya ret par chalte ho.

Aap ALLĀH ke fazl se apne takht par baithkar jaha jaana chahte waha pahunch jaate the.

*********
Karaamat :
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
(1) Hazrat Ghauṡe aazam Abdul Qaadir Jeelaani radiy-Allāhu ta’ala anhu ki bahen Sayyeda Bibi Naseeba ko koi aulaad nahi thi. Unho ne apne bhai se kaha ‘Kaa'inat ki har cheez aap ka faiz o barkat haasil karti hai. Magar main aulaad se mehroom hu. Aap mere liye dua kijiye ke ALLĀH ta’ala mujhe aulaad ata farmae.’ Ghauṡe aazam ne farmaaya ‘Tumhare naseeb me aulaad hai, magar wo Hazrat Madaar shah ki dua se hai. Wo bahot jald Baghdad tashreef laayenge. Jab wo aaye to tum un se ilteja karna. Agar wo tumhare liye dua karen to in sha Allāh ALLĀH tumhe ata farmaega.’
Kuchh dino ke baad Hazrat Madaar Shaah Baghdad tashreef laaye. Sayyeda Naseeba ne jab ye khabar suni to foran aap ki baargah me haazir hui aur dua ke liye kaha. Aap ne farmaya ‘ALLĀH ta’ala tumhe 2 bete ata farmaega agar tum un me se ek ko Islaam ki isha’at ke liye dene ke liye raazi ho to.’ Sayyeda Naseeba is ke liye raazi ho gai.
Is ke baad Aap ki dua se Sayyeda ko 2 bete hue. Jin ke naam Sayyed Muhammad aur Sayyed Ahmad rakhe gaye.
Kuchh arse baad jab Madaar shah teesri baar Baghdad tashreef laaye aur kuchh din ke liye waha qayaam kiya.
Ek din Sayyed Muhammad ghar ki chhat par khel rahe the ki achanak waha se niche gire aur foran un ka inteqaal ho gaya. Ye dekhkar Sayyeda ki aankho me aansoo aa gaye. Itne me unhe yaad aaya ki maine apne wade ke mutabik is bete ko Madaar shah ko dene ka tay kiya tha.
Chunaanche wo Madaar Shaah ki baargah me apne bete ki laash ko lekar pahunchi aur kaha ‘Aap ki dua se ALLĀH ta’ala ne mujhe 2 bete ata farmae the. Jin me se aik mujhe rakhna hai aur dusra jise aap ko dena tha us ka inteqaal ho gaya hai.’ Aap ne farmaaya ‘Theek hai, wo beta mujhe de do.’ Sayyeda ne kaha ‘Magar jo mar chuka hai use kisi ko nahi de sakti.’
Ye sunkar Aap ne laash ke qareeb khade hokar farmaaya ‘Aye Jamaal-ud-deen Jaameman Jannati! ALLĀH ta’ala ke hukm se khade ho jaao.’ Ye kehte hi wo ladka zinda hokar khada ho gaya.
Baad me woh isi naam se mash'hoor hua. Aur us ka laqab ‘Jameel Shaah Daatar’ bhi hai. Aur us ka mazaar Helsa Jatinagar (Bihar) me hai.

(2) Kannauj me rehne wale ek shakhs ko aulaad nahi thi. Ek martaba wo apni biwi ke saath Madaar Shaah ke paas aaya. Aap ne us ke liye dua ki. Us ke baad us ki biwi ko hamal raha magar us ko jo bacha paida hua wo sirf gosht ke tukde jaisa tha us ka sar, haath ya pair nahi the. Wo shakhs use lekar Madaar Shaah ke paas aaya. Aap use dekhne lage aur phir Aap ne kuchh gungunana shuru kiya. Us ke saath hi us bache ne shuru kiya aur phir ALLĀH ta’ala ne use zindagi ata farmai aur insaani shakl o soorat ata farmai. Aur us ka naam ‘Alrai’ rakha gaya.

(3) Ek baar Aap apne mureed Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Abu Turaab Fansoor ke saath ek baagh me sair kar rahe the. Aap ne ek insaan ki khopdi dekhi. Aap ne us se puchha ‘Tum kaun ho aur kya ho?’ ALLĀH ke hukm se wo khopdi bolne lagi aur us ne kaha ‘Main is baagh ki nigraani ka kaam karta tha aur apne bacho ki parwarish karta tha. Magar ek din achaanak mujhe maut aa gai. Aur 12 saal se main yahi par dafn tha. Aur mere gunaaho ki wajah se mujh par azaab ho raha tha. Kisi ko meri koi parwah nahi hai. Aur main kahi ka nahi raha.’
Ye sunkar Aap ne ALLĀH se dua ki. Aap ki dua se ALLĀH ne apni rahmat se use zinda kiya aur jism ata farmaaya. Aap ne use ‘Zamzama’ naam diya aur us ke baad wo 12 saal tak dunya me raha.

(4) Ek baar ek aurat Madaar Shaah ki baargaah me aai aur kaha ‘Mujhe bahot duao ke baad ALLĀH ne ek beta diya tha. Magar bad-naseebi se bachpan me hi us ka inteqaal ho gaya. Ab main tanha aur be-sahara hu. Aap ki dua se bahot se logo ne faiz paaya hai to main kyun mehroom rahu?’
Aap ko raham aa gaya aur Aap us bache ki qabr par gaye aur farmaaya ‘Kum bi iznillāh.’ Aur foran wo bacha zinda hokar kalma padhne laga.
Magar us bache ne Hazrat se iltija ki ke ye dunya gunaho aur khwahishaat se bhari hai aur us me koi sukoon nahi. Haqeeqi sukoon to Jannat me hai. Is liye main is dunya me waapas aana nahi chaahta.’

(5) Ek baar Madaar Shaah ek nadi ke kinaare baithe the. Itne me ek machhyaare (maahigeer) bhaagkar aaya aur bataaya ke ‘Ek saudagar kashti me apna maal lekar safar par nikla tha. Kuchh der baad wo kashti dariya me doob gai.’ Aap ne waha se geeli mitti li aur use dekar farmaaya ‘ Jis jagah par wo kashti doob gai hai waha jaakar is mitti ko daal do.’ Us ne waha jaakar jab wo mitti dariya me daali to use ye dekhkar ta’ajjub hua ke wo kashti paani ke upar salaamat laut aai aur tairne lagi. Ye dekhkar wo apne saathiyo ke saath Hazrat ke paas aaya aur Aap ki daawat par wo sab musalman ho gaye.

(6) Ek martaba Aap Surat pahunche to Aap ne ek maqaam par logo ki bheed dekhi. Aap waha pahunche to dekha ke ek na-bina shakhs raaste me baitha tha. Jab us shakhs ko Hazrat ki haazri ka pata chala to us ne aap se fariyaad ki. Aap ne foran wuzu kiya aur phir usi paani ko us shakhs ki aankho par lagaya. Foran us shakhs aankho ki roshni durust ho gai. Yeh karaamat dekhkar aas-paas se ilaaqe ke log Aap ki bahut izzat karne lage aur apne naam ke sath Shaah lagaane lage.

(7) Hazrat Ahmad ghud-sawaari me bahot maahir the. Ek baar wo apne ghode par sawari karte hue soch rahe the ki main dunya me sab se zyada khush aadami hu aur mujhe kisi tarah ki koi pareshaani nahi hai. Bad-qismati se un ka ghoda gir gaya aur un ko bhi neeche girne ki wajah se gehri chot aai aur dard aur khoon nikal jaane ki wajah se be-hosh ho gaye. Jab Madaar shah aap ke paas aaye to aap ne farmaaya ‘Kab tak tum yun be-hosh pade rahoge. Utho aur ALLĀH ta’ala se tauba karo.’ Ye sunkar Hazrat Ahmad jaage aur tauba ki. Unho ne Hazrat ke qadmo ko chhune ke koshish ki. Magar dard ki wajah se na kar paaye. Madaar shah ke pukarne par unka ghoda waha aa gaya aur aap Hazrat Ahmad ko qareeb ke gaanv me ek jarrah (doctor) ke paas le gaye aur ilaaj ke liye kaha. Us ne jaanch karke kaha ‘Is shakhs ka ilaaj karna mere bas ki baat nahi. Shaayad gehre jakhm ki wajah se yeh mar bhi sakta hai.’
Ye sunkar Aap ne waha zameen par padi anaar ki chhal ko uthaaya aur use piskar un ke jakhmo par lagaaya to khoon nikalna band ho gaya. Chand dino baad Hazrat Ahmad bilkul tandurast ho gaye. Aur Aap ke mureed hue aur Madaar Shaah ke Makka ke safar me aap ke saath rahe.

(8) Ek martaba Madaar Shaah Bengal ke ilaaqe me the. Waha qahet pada tha. Logo ne Aap ki baargaah me haazir hokar arz ki ‘Kitne mahine se baarish nahi ho rahi hai aur is wajah se sab bahot pareshaan hain. Paani ki pareshaani hai aur hamari kheti bhi sukh kar barbaad ho rahi hai.’ Aap ne baargaah e ilāhi me dua ke liye apne haath uthaaye aur farmaaya ‘Aye ALLĀH! Tu Qaadir e mutlaq hai. Main ek insaan hu aur aasi hu. Teri baargaah me dua karta hu ki teri makhlooq par raham farma de aur tere Habeeb Muhammad Mustafa sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me in par rahmat naazil farma.’
Is ke saath hi tez baarish shuru ho gai aur charo taraf paani paani ho gaya. Yaha tak ke jo log Madaar Shaah ki baargaah me aaye the un ko bhi paani ki wajah se apne gharo tak waapas jaana mushkil ho gaya.

(9) Ek baar Madaar Shaah naher ke kinaare baithe the. Itne me ek Jogi ek botal lekar aaya aur kaha ‘Ye Aksir hai’ Aap ne is ke baare me puchha to us ne kaha ‘Ise taambe ki cheez par lagao to use sona bana deta hai.’ Aap ne us botal ko naher me phenk diya. Ye dekhkar wo Jogi gusse me aa gaya aur aap se kehne laga ‘Tum ne meri zindagi bhar ki mehnat barbaad kar di.’ Aap ne farmaaya ‘Insaan khud aksir hai. Lihaaza kisi aur cheez ko taanbe me se sona banaane ke liye istemaal kyun karna chaahiye?’
Phir aap ne kaha ‘Ye aksir dikhta kaisa hai?’ Us ne kaha ‘Mitti jaisa.’ Aap ne waha se mitti uthaakar farmaaya ‘Ye mitti bhi aksir jaisa kaam kar sakti hai. Ise le jaao aur jitna chaho sona bana lo.’ Use yaqeen na hua aur us ne jaanch karne ke liye taanbe ke bartan par lagaaya to wo sone ka ho gaya.
Ye dekhkar wo Aap ke qadmo me gir gaya aur Islaam me daakhil ho gaya. Aur kuchh dino ke liye aap ki khidmat me bhi raha.

(10) Kabul me qayaam ke dauraan ek martaba Hazrat Shaah e Madaar ne apne khaadimo ko paani laane ke liye bheja. Wo log qareeb me ek kuen par gaye aur jab wo us me se paani nikal rahe the to waha rehne wale kuchh logo ne unhe roka. Khaadimo ne aakar Hazrat ko ye baat bataai. Aap ne unhe farmaaya ‘Kuen par waapas jaao aur us se kaho ke Shaheed e Karbala ke pote ne tumhe bulaya hai.’ Khaadimo ne waisa hi kiya. Aap ka farmaan sunkar kuen ka paani tez raftar se upar aane laga. Aur jab khaadim ne bartan me paani bhar liya to paani waapas apni jagah par chala gaya. Ye sab dekhakar wo sab log sharminda ho gaye aur Hazrat ki baargah me aakar qadmo me gir gaye aur muafi maangi.

(11) Ek baar Madaar Shaah Mevat ke pahaadi ilaaqe se guzar rahe the. 52 Dakaito ke ek giroh ne Aap ko ameer suadagar samajhkar aap ko lootne ke liye hamla kiya. Aap ne apne chehre par se naqaab hata diya. Aur us noor ki wajah se wo sab log andhe ho gaye aur chillaane lage. Aur Hazrat ke qadmo me girkar muafi maangne lage. Aap ne farmaaya ‘Main tumhe ek hi shart par muaf kar sakta hu ke tumhe ye loot karna aur raahgiro ko pareshan karna chhodna hoga.’ Un logo ne kaha ‘Hum waada karte hain ki abhi se ye burai ka kaam chhod denge aur mehnat karke rozi kamaenge.’ Is ke saath hi sab ko aaankho ki roshni phir se mil gai.
Wo sab log musalman ho gaye aur aap ke mureed hue.

(12) Ek baar aap wa’az farma rahe the. Ek shakhs waha se guzra to logo ki bheed dekhkar us ne Shaikh Mohammad Baqaullāh se is ki wajah puchhi. Unho ne bataaya ‘Hamare Peer Qutb-ul-Madaar Shaah wa’az farma rahe hain.’ Magar wo shakhs aap ke martabe ko maanne se aitraaz karne laga.
Madaar Shaah us ke dil ki baat jaankar use qareeb bulaya aur farmaaya ‘Tumhare ghar ke saamne jo paid hai wo kis ka hai?’ Us ne kaha ‘Wo bahot puraana darakht hai aur bijli girne ki wajah se sukh gaya hai aur us par koi patte ya phal na hone ki wajah se ye bataana mushkil hai ki wo kis cheez ka paid hai. Aap ne use us paid ke saamne dekhne ke liye kaha aur farmaaya ‘Ab batao ye kaun sa paid hai?’ Jab us ne paid ko dekha to wo hairat me ye dekhkar pad gaya ke wo paid patto aur naariyal se bhara hua hai.
Wo Hazrat ke qadmo me gir gaya aur muafi maangi. Aap ne use us paid ka khayaal rakhne ke liye kaha aur farmaaya ‘Jo is paid ke naariyal ka paani piyega use aankho ki beemaari nahi hogi.’

(13) Qaazi Maulana Shahaab-ud-deen Malik-ul-Ulama Madaar Shaah ki izzat nahi karte the. Ek baar unho ne Aap se kai sawaal kiye aur Aap ne har sawaal ka jawaab diya. Phir bhi wo nahi maane.
Ek baar unho ne ek zinda shakhs ko kafan pehnakar janaaze me rakhkar Hazrat ki baargaah me bheja aur Madaar shah se namaaz e janaaza padhaane ke liye kaha. Aap ne namaaz e janaaza padhai aur apne khaime me chale gaye.
Madaar shaah ko koi ilm nahi hai ye sochkar wo log janaaza kholkar kafan ko hataane lage. Jaise hi kafan khola un logo ne dekha ki wo shakhs mar chuka hai.
Qaazi Maulana Shahaab-ud-deen ko jab ye pata chala to Madaar shah ki baargaah me aaye to apni gustaakhi ke liye muafi maangi.

*********
Aap Hazrat Khwaja Baayazeed Bastami rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.
Aap se tareeqat ka ‘Madaariya’ silsila jaari hai.

Aap ke khulfa :
(1) Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Abu Muhammad Arghoon rahmatullāhi alaihi
(2) Hazrat Sayyed Maulana Hisaam-ud-deen Salaamati Jaunpuri rahmatullāhi alaihi
(3) Hazrat Sayyed Muhammad Jamaal-ud-deen Jaaneman Jannati Bukhari rahmatullāhi alaihi
(4) Hazrat Sayyed Ajmal Shaah Bahraichi rahmatullāhi alaihi
(5) Hazrat Khwaja Sayyed Abul Hasan Tayfoor rahmatullāhi alaihi
(6) Khwaja Sayyed Abu Turaab Fansoor rahmatullāhi alaihi
(7) Hazrat Qaazi Shahaab-ud-deen Kidwai Daulatabadi rahmatullāhi alaihi
(8) Hazrat Qaazi Mahmood Kintoori rahmatullāhi alaihi
(9) Hazrat Qaazi Mazhar Kallesar rahmatullāhi alaihi
(10) Hazrat Qaazi Mutesher Kaliyari rahmatullāhi alaihi
(11) Hazrat Sadan Shaah Sarmast rahmatullāhi alaihi.

*******
Aap ke wisaal se pehle Aap ne mureedo se farmaaya ke ‘Mere wisaal ka waqt qareeb hai. Is liye paani ka intazaam karke rakhna. Mujhe farishten ghusl denge.’
Ye sunkar mureedo ne Aap ko unhe chhodkar na jaane ke liye kaha. Aap ne farmaaya ‘Har jaandar ko maut ka maza chakhna hai. Aur main tumhe chhodkar nahi jaa raha hu. Jab bhi tum mujhe yaad karke dua karoge ALLĀH ta’ala tumhari muraad puri farmaega.’

Is ke baad Aap puri raat apne kamre me tilaawat e Qur’an karte rahe.

*******
Aap ka wisaal 17 Jamaadi ul awwal 838 Hijri (1434 A.D.) me 596 baras ki umr me hua.
Aap ki namaaz e janaaza Hazrat Sayyed Maulana Hisaam-ud-deen Salaamati rahmatullāhi alaihi ne padhaai.

Aap ka mazaar Makanpur (Uttar Pradesh) hai.

*****
ALLĀH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Sayyed Badi-ud-deen Ahmad Madaar Shaah rahmatullāhi alaihi ke aur Ahle bait Aur Auliya Allāh ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Eimaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmae.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaa'iz muraado ko puri farmae.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Allama Maulana Muhammad Noor-bakhsh Tawakkali rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Laqab: Fakhr-e-Ahle Sunnat.

Hazrat Allama Maulana Muhammad Noor-bakhsh Tawakkali rahmatullahi alaihi ki wiladat 12 Rabi ul Awwal 1305 Hijri (1888 A.D.) me Chak Qadyan, Zila Ludhiana me hui.

Hazrat Allama Maulana Muhammad Noor-bakhsh Tawakkali rahmatullahi alaihi ne ibtidaai ta’aleem apne ilaaqe ke ulama se haasil ki.

Phir Aligarh University se M.A Arabi ki degree haasil ki.

Phir Municipal Board College me Professor bane aur saath me Maulana Ghulaam Rasool Qasimi Amritsari ki khidmat me haazir hokar Hadees, Tafseer aur Fiqh ki ta’aleem haasil karte rahe.

Jab Hazrat Allama Maulana Muhammad Noor-bakhsh Tawakkali rahmatullahi alaihi Mohammadian School, Ambala me Head Master the.

Un dino me Hazrat Khwaja Tawakkal Shaah Ambalawi rahmatullahi alaihi [Wisaal 1315 Hijri (1897 A.D.)] se bai'at ki aur phir khilafat aur ijazat se sarfaraaz hue.

Ek arse tak Aap Jaamia Naeemia, Lahore ke Naazime ta’aleemaat rahe aur saath saath Government College me Shoaba e Arabi ke Professor bhi rahe.

Kuchh muddat ke baad College se musta’af ho gaye.

Apni ta’aleemaat ke zariye Aap ne Ahle Sunnat wal Jama’at ki azeem khidmat ki hai.

Tasannif:

Hazrat Allama Maulana Muhammad Noor-bakhsh Tawakkali rahmatullahi alaihi ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaabein:

(1) Seerat e Rasool e Arabi
(2) Moazizaat-un-Nabi
(3) Meelad-un-Nabi
(4) Ghazwat-un-Nabi
(5) Qaseeda-ul-Burda Sharh-ul-Umda
(6) Sirat e Ghaus ul aazam
(7) Tazkira Masha'ikh-e-Naqshbandia
(8) Imam Bukhari Shaafa'i
(9) Kitaab-ul-Barzakh
(10) E'ajaz-ul-Qur’an
(11) Tafseer Surah al-Fatiha wa Baqarah
(12) Aqaa'id e Ahle Sunnat
(13) Al-Afwaah-ul-Saheeh fee Jawaab-ul-Jarh alaa Abi Haneefa (Imam e aazam Abu Haneefa rahmatullahi alaihi par Raafzi aur Ghair Muqallideen ke aitaraazaat ka jawaab)

(14) Tahfah e Shia (2 Jild)
(15) Sar Gazasht Ibn-e-Tamaima.

Aap Hazrat Khwaja Tawakkal Shaah Ambalawi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Sid'hi se girne ki wajah se Aap kuchh arsa beemaar rahe.

Hazrat Allama Maulana Muhammad Noor-bakhsh Tawakkali rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 13 Jamaadi ul awwal 1368 Hijri (24 March 1948 A.D.) ko hua.

Hazrat Allama Maulana Muhammad Noor-bakhsh Tawakkali rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Lalpur, Faisalabad (Pakistan) me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Allama Maulana Muhammad Noor-bakhsh Tawakkali rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke Imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.

Ameen

Title: Hazrat Sayyed Meeran Husaini Qadri Hamawi Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Laqab: Shaah Abdaal.

Hazrat Sayyed Meeran Husaini Qadri Hamawi Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi ki wiladat 960 Hijri (1553 A.D.) me Hama me hui.

Hazrat Sayyed Meeran Husaini Qadri Hamawi Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Sayyed Shaah Mas'ood Hasan Qadri al-Hamawi bin Sayyed Jalaal-ud-deen rahmatullahi alaihi hai.

Hazrat Sayyed Meeran Husaini Qadri Hamawi Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi Hasani Saadaat hain.

Aur Hazrat Ghaus e azaam Shaikh Sayyed Abdul Qaadir Jilani radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ki nasl se hain.

Hazrat Sayyed Meeran Husaini Qadri Hamawi Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi ne apne apne waalid se ta’aleem haasil ki.

Aap bachpan se hi Mujaahida karte rehte the.

Khirqa e Khilafat haasil karne ke baad Hazrat Sayyed Meeran Husaini Qadri Hamawi Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi ne ta’aleem e deen karna shuru kiya.

Aap apne saathiyo ke saath isha’at e Islam ke liye safar karke Golkonda tashreef laaye aur Malkapur ke qareeb ek masjid me qayaam pazeer hue aur ta’aleem wa faiz ata farmaate rahe.

Aap aksar waqt ibaadat o riyaazat aur zikr o shagal me guzaarte aur namaz e tahajjud paabandi se ada karte.
Kisi se kuchh lete nahi.
Haajatmando ko madad farmaate.

Karaamat:

Ek martaba Aapko aur aapke 100 saathiyo ko 3 din tak kuchh khaane ke liye na mila. Chauthe din Sultaan Mohammad Quli Qutub Shaah ne Istaqlaal Khan ke saath khaane ki alag alag cheezo ke 50 tabaaq bheje.

Sab ne pait bharkar khaana khaaya.

Phir Aapne un tabaaq ko dhank kar waapas bheja.

Shaahi baawarchi khaane me jab Sultaan ke khaadimo ne un tabaaq ko khola to dekha ke saare tabaaq waise hi bhare hue hain aur kuchh bhi kam nahi hua hai.

Yeh dekhkar Istaqlaal Khan fauran Hazrat ki khidmat me haazir hua aur Aapka mureed bankar aapki khidmat me hi rehne laga.

Aap (apne waalid) Hazrat Sayyed Shaah Mas'ood Hasan Qadri al-Hamwi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Hazrat Sayyed Meeran Husaini Qadri Hamawi Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 13 Jamaadi ul awwal 1049 Hijri (September 1639 A.D.) ko hua.

Hazrat Sayyed Meeran Husaini Qadri Hamawi Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Langar Hauz, Rahmatabad, Hyderabad (Telangana) me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Sayyed Meeran Husaini Qaadri Hamawi Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah aur Ahle bait ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Aap ki wilaadat 1160 Hijri (1747 A.D.) me Multan me hui.

Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Mohammad Yousuf bin Hafiz Abdur Rasheed hai.

Aap Awaan qabeele se hain.

Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi ke daada Aawaankaari ke ilaaqe se Multan tashreef laaye the aur Multan ke Sharq me sukoonat ikhtiyaar ki thi.

Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi ke waalid Multan ke haakim Abul Qaasim aur Abul Haashim ke Wazeer the.

Aap bachpan me hi Hafiz e Qur’an hue aur bahot saare uloom ki ta’aleem haasil ki. Ta’aleem ke daur me bhi Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi mubaahisa me hamesha kaamyaab hote the.

Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi aksar raat ko Hazrat Rukn-e-aalam Shaikh Rukn-ud-deen Abul Fat'h Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mazaar shareef par haazir hokar Ibadat o Riyazat me masroof rehte.

Roz raat ko ek Kalaame paak khatm farmate aur Peer e kaamil ke liye dua maang kar so jaate.

Ek raat Aap ne khwaab me dekha ke Hazrat Rukn-e-aalam aur Hazrat Khwaja Noor Muhammad Maharwi rahmatullahi alaihi ek sath baithe hue hain.

Hazrat Rukn-e-aalam ne Aap ka haath pakad kar Hazrat Khwaja Noor Muhammad Maharwi ke haath par rakh diya aur farmaya ke “Jamaal! Yeh Tumhare Peer hain. Inka naam Noor Muhammad Maharwi hai aur watan Multan ka ek qasba hai. Tum inki khidmat me haazir ho jaao.”

Subah ko Aap Mahar shareef ke liye rawaana hue aur Hazrat Khwaja Noor Muhammad Maharwi rahmatullahi alaihi ki khidmat me haazir ho kar Silsila e Chishtiya Nizaamiya me Bai'at se musharraf hue.

Peer ke farmaan par Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi ne Multan me ‘Chishti’ Khaanqaah taamir ki aur ta’aleem wa faiz ata farmate rahe.

Aap bahot narm dil the. Agar koi ghareeb, ya museebat zada Aap ke paas aata to aap use tasalli dete.

Aap ke paas ek angoothi thi jis me ‘Allahu jameelun wa yuhibbul jamaal’

[ALLAH jameel hai aur Jamaal ko pasand karta hai.] naqsh kiya hua tha.

Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi ne Siraiki me ‘Seeharfi’ naam se nazam likhi hai jis me 29 ash'aar hain.

Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi Tirandaaji me maahir the aur Ranjeet Singh ne jab hamla kiya to Nawab Muzaffar Khan ke lashkar ke saath jung me bhi shaamil hue.

Karamat:

(1) Mohammad Husain naami Aap ka mureed jawaani me gunaaho ke kaam me mashgool ho gaya. Aap ke ek Khaadim ne Aap ki baargaah me haazir ho kar arz ki “Huzoor! Yeh Nau-jawaan Aap ka mureed hai lekin bure kaamo me mubtila ho gaya hai. uski aaqibat ka kya hoga?”

Aap ne farmaya ke “Uski aaqibat ba-khair hogi. Use bukhaar aayega aur is beemaari me woh 3 saal tak takleef uthaaega, Apne bure kaamo se tauba karega aur in shaa Allah main uska janaza padhunga.”

Chand saalo ke baad use bukhaar ho gaya jo 3 saal tak raha, aakhir ek din faut ho gaya. Jab uska janaza qabrastan le gaye to Khaadim ne socha ke Hazrat to Mahar shareef tashrif le gaye hain, ab janaza kaise padhayenge?

Abhi yeh soch hi raha tha ke chand sawaariyo aur paidal aane waalo ki gard udi. Dekha to Hazrat tashreef le aaye hain.

Aap ne namaz e janaza padhaayi aur farmaya “Aye Mohammad Husain! Tumhe Khuda ke supurd kiya.”

(2) Ek martaba Aap apne qaafle ke saath Singhad se aa rahe the. Jab Dariya e Sindh par pahunche to dekha ke dariya tugyaani par hai. Kashti bhi maujood na thi.

Aap ne Ghaazi Baloch naami ek mureed ko dariya me daakhil hokar paani ka andaza lagaane ke liye kaha.

Woh paani me utre aur ek kianaare se dusre kinaare gaye to dekha ke paani sirf ghutno tak tha.

Aap ne farmaya ke “Bismillah padh kar daakhil ho jaao.”

Durvesho ki jamaa'at, oont, ghode aur gadho ke saath Dariya me daakhil ho gaye.

Har aadami aur jaanwar ke ghutne tak paani tha. Is tarah sab us ghehre toofaani dariya se kashti ke baghair guzar gaye.

Aap Hazrat Khwaja Noor Muhammad Maharwi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi ke khulfa:

(1) Hazrat Khwaja Khuda bakhsh Multani Khairpuri rahmatullahi alaihi
(2) Hazrat Maulana Abdul Azeez Parharwi rahmatullahi alaihi
(3) Hazrat Maulana Zaahid Shaah Bukhari rahmatullahi alaihi
(4) Hazrat Qaazi Maulana Isa Khanpuri rahmatullahi alaihi
(5) Hazrat Maulana Haamid rahmatullahi alaihi.

Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 5 Jamaadi ul Awwal 1226 Hijri (29 May 1811 A.D.) ko 66 saal ki umr me hua.

Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Multan (Pakistan) me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Maulana Hafiz Jamalullah Chishti Multani rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.
Aameen.

Title: JazakAllahu Khairan Ka Matlab Aur Iska Jawab Kya hai
Content:
Jawab:

Usamah bin Zaid Radiallhu Tala Anhu se riwayat hai ki, RasoolAllah ﷺ ne farmaya:

“Agar kisi ke saath koi neki ka suluq kiya gaya aur usne neki karne wale se kaha Jazak Allahu khairan (Allah aapko achcha sila ata farmaye), toh usne uski puri tarif kar di”

(Jamia tirimizi, Jild 1, 2101-Hasan)

Umar ibn Khattab RaziAllahu anhu ne farmaya: “Agar logo ko jazak Allahu Khairan kahne ka sawab malum ho jaye tou wo ek dusre ko ye bahut zyada kahne lag jaye”

(Musannaf Ibn Abi Shaybah, 26519)

JazakAllahu Khairan Ka Jawab:

Mafhoom-e-Hadees: Ek baar Usaid bin Haider RaziAllahu anhu ne RasoolAllah ﷺ se farmaya,

Ya RasoolAllah ﷺ ! JazakAllahu Khairan (Allah aapko achcha sila ata farmaye)

Toh unke jawab me RasoolAllah ﷺ ne farmaya: “Wa antum fa Jazakum Allahu Khairan (Aur aapko bhi, Allah aapko bhi achcha sila ata farmaye”.

(Sahih Ibn Hibban, 7436 -Hasan)

Mafhoom-e-Hadees: Abu Hurairah RaziAllahu anhu se rivayat hai ki

RasoolAllah ﷺ ne farmaya: “Wo Allah ka ShukrGhuzar nahi ho sakta jo bando ka Shukrguzar na ho”.

(Sunan Abu Dwud, Vol 3,1383-Sahih)

Title: Hazrat Abdullah ibn Rawahah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu
Content: Aapke waalid ka naam Rawahah bin Salaba aur waalida ka naam Kabsha bint e Waqeed hai. Aap Khazraaj qabeele ke Banu Haaris khaandaan se hain. Aap Yasrab (Madina Sharif) ke 12 aadamiyo ke us giroh me shaamil the jisne 11 Nabawi (621 A.D.) me maqaam e Aqaba par Huzoor Rasool-Allah sallallahu alaihi wassallam se Bai'at e Ula ki. Iske baad Zil Hijja 12 Nabawi (622 A.D.) me Aap Yasrab (Madina Sharif) ke 73 mard aur 2 aurto ke giroh me bhi shaamil the jisne maqaam e Aqaba par Huzoor Rasool-Allah sallallahu alaihi wassallam se phir se bai'at ki. Aur har haal me unki ita’at karne ka aur unko madad karne ka waada kiya. Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam Hazrat Miqdaad ibn Amr Muhaajir radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko Aapka bhaai banaaya. Aap ne Ita’at e Rasool se mukammal ishq e Rasool ka ṡaboot diya. Ek martaba Aap masjid e Nabawi me daakhil ho rahe the ke Aap ne Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam ko farmate hue suna ke: “Jo shakhs jaha hai wahi par baith jaaye.” Aap fauran darwaze ke qareeb hi baith gaye. Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam ne jab dekha to irshad farmaya “ALLAH ta’ala tumhe ita’at me barkat ata farmaye.” Hazrat Abu Darda radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu Aapke khaas dost the. Jab woh musalman nahi hue the, tab ek bhoot ko apne ghar me rakhe the. Aap ne unke ghar me jaakar us bhoot ko tod diya. Jab Hazrat Abu Darda radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ghar par aaye to unki biwi khauf ki wajah se ro rahi thi ke “Shaayad koi aafat aa jaayegi.” Lekin Hazrat Abu Darda radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne socha ke “Jis bhoot ko hum khuda maan rahe the woh apni hifazat nahi kar saka to munaasib hai ke hum ALLAH ko apna ma’abood maane jo har cheez par qaadir hai.” Hazrat Abdullah ibn Rawahah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu Hadees e Nabawi ko yaad rakhte aur dusre ashaaba ko bataate the. Aap Shaayaraan e Islam me shaamil hain. Hazrat Abdullah ibn Rawahah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne kai mauqe par Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam ki shaan me Qaseeda padhe hain. Aapne Jung e Badr, Jung e Uhud, Jung e Khandaq aur Jung e Khaybar shaamil hokar apni shuja’at dikhaai. Jung e Badr me fatah ke baad Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam Aapko Hazrat Zaid ibn Haariṡah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ke saath fatah ki khush-khabari dene ke liye Madina Sharif bheje. Zil Qaadah 4 Hijri (April 626 A.D.) me Jung e Badr al-Maw'id ke mauqe par Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam Hazrat Abdullah ibn Rawahah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko Madina Sharif me apna naa'ib banaya tha. (Quraish ka qafla darkar bhaag jaane ki wajah se jung nahi hui.) Abu Raafi Sallam ibn Abul Huqaiq ke qatl ke baad 6 Hijri (628 A.D.) me Yusayr ibn Rizaam Khaibar ka naya sardaar bana. Huzoor RasoolAllah sallallahu alaihi wassallam ko jab pata chala ke woh lashkar ke saath musalmano se saath jung karne ki saazish kar raha hai. To Hazrat Abdullah ibn Rawaha radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko 3 sahaba ke saath Khaibar ke halaat jaanlene ke liye bheja. Aapne wapas aakar waha ke halaat bataye to Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam ne Aapko 30 ashaaba ke saath Khaibar bheje. Yusayr ibn Rizaam apne saathiyo ke saath Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke paas aane ke liye tayyaar hua aur Hazrat Abdullah ibn Unais radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ke saath oont par sawaar hokar Madina Sharif ki jaanib rawaana hue. Lekin Khaibar se 6 mile door Maqaam e Qarqarat par usne apna iraada badal diya aur oont par se neeche kood gaya. Hazrat Abdullah ibn Unais radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne us par hamla kiya aur woh maara gaya. Isi tarah dusre sahaaba ne bhi oont par sawaar kaafir ko qatl kar diya. 29 yahudi maare gaye aur ek bachkar bhaag gaya. Aap 6 Hijri me Sulaih Hudaibiyah ke mauqe par bhi haazir the. Aap Zil-Qa’ada 7 Hijri (628 A.D.) me Umrah al-Qa’ada me bhi shareek hue. Aap Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke oont ki lagaam pakadkar chal rahe the aur musalmano ke waqaar aur shuja’at ke ash'aar padh rahe the. Hazrat e Umar Farooq radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne Aapko roka aur kaha ke “Baitullah ke qareeb sher padhte ho?” Yeh sunkar Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam ne farmaya: “Ise padhne do. Iske alfaaz teer se bhi zyada taaqatwar aur aṡardaar hai.” Phir Hazrat Abdullah ibn Rawahah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu se yeh padhne ke liye farmaya “Laa ilaha illallah wahdahu laa shareek lahu sadaqa wa’adahu wa nasar abdahu wa hazam al-ahzaab wahdahu.” Aapne yeh padhna shuru kiya aur musalman Aapke saath dohraane lage. 7 Hijri (629 A.D.) me Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam ne apne sahaba ko khato ke saath Islam ki daawat ke liye alag alag mulko ke baadshaah ke paas bheje. Hazrat Haaris bin Umair Azdi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko safeer banakar Bosra ke baadshaah ki jaanib bheja. Hazrat Haaris bin Umair Azdi jab maqaame Mu’tah par pahunche, to waha ke governor Sharjeel Ghassani ne unhe rokkar shaheed kar diya. Jab Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wassallam ko pata chala to Aapne Jamaadi ul awwal 8 Hijri (September 629 A.D.) ko Hazrat e Zaid bin Haarisa radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko saalaar banakar 3000 musalmano ka lashkar bheja. Jab musalman Musharif pahunche to pata chala ke Byzantine aur unke saathiyo ka lashkar taqreeban 200000 ka hai. Musalmano ne intezar karne ka aur Madina Sharif se madad mangwaane ka mashwara kiya. Magar Hazrat e Abdullah ibn Rawahah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne irshad farmaaya ke ‘Musalman baatil se jung karne se ya shaheed hone se darta nahi hai.’ Hazrat Zaid ibn Haarisa radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne pehle kaafiro ko islam ki daawat di magar wo na maane. Aakhirkaar maqaam e Mu’tah par muslim lashkar ne kaafiro ke saath jung ki. Jung me Hazrat e Zaid bin Haarisa radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu shaheed hue, to Hazrat Ja’afar bin Abu Talib radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu islami lashkar ke saalaar bane. Unki shahadat ke baad Aap radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu saalaar e lashkar bane. Ek kaafir ne khanjar se Aapke chehre par waar kiya. Aap shadeed jakhmi hone ke ba-wajood bahaaduri se jung karte hue shaheed ho gaye. Aapke baad Hazrat Khalid bin Walid radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne halaat ko dekhkar tarkeeb se muslim lashkar ki hifazat ki. Aap ka wisaal 5 Jamaadi ul awwal 8 Hijri (September 629 A.D.) ko Jung e Mu’tah ke dauraan hua. Aapka mazaar Mu’tah (Jordan) me hai. ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Abdullah ibn Rawaha radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu aur tamaam Auliya Allah aur Ahle bait aur Ashaaba ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke imaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye. Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye. Ameen.

Sawaal

1⃣Ali Alaihisalam

2⃣Bhai panjetan e paak faristo se kaam hai kya

3⃣Hazrat hussain na hote toh islam bhi nahi hota aaj

4⃣Mere liye panjetan e paak farishtey hi hai

5⃣Shia shamjna hai samjho but panjetan e paak sir akho par

6⃣Mere liye sahi hai mujhe kisi se puchne ki zarurat nahi

7⃣Panjetan e paak Alaihisalam

??????????????

➡Hazrat aise alfaaz kehne wale par kya Hukm hai jabki zaid ko kafi samjhaya gaya aur zaid huzoor tajushariya sarkar ka mureed hai aur zaid ko huzoor tajushariya k jawab bhi sunaye gaye hai..

✳Fir bhi zaid ne aise alfaaz kahe hai toh ispar kya Hukm hoga..

Hazrat jawab de kar rehnumaiye farmaye..

☪Jawaab

1⃣Gair E Ambiya o Malaaika ke Naam ke Sath Alaihissalam ka istemaal Mamnoo hai, ke ye Ma'soomeen ke liye khas aur Alamat hai.

2⃣Panjatan e paak me Huzoor e Aqdas ﷺ Tamam Makhlooq me sab se Afzal aur Baqiya Sahaba e Kiraam Rusulaan e Malaaika Ke Siwa Tamam Farishto se Afzal hain.

✳Lehaza is jumle me harj nahi ke wo Farishto se kam nahi.

3⃣Islam ki Hifazat Allah Ta'ala ne Apne Zimma e karam par liya hai Aur Har zamane me kisi na kisi Apne Mahboob bande ke zariye se Allah ne Deen ki Hifazat farmaayi,

✳Lehaza ye jumla kehna k Husain na hote islam na hota Yaani Khatam ho jaata, Mubaalga hai aisa jumla na kaha jaaye.

4⃣Ye Rawaafiz ka Aqeeda hai k wo Hazrat Ali , Hazrat Fatima o Hasnain e Kareemain رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہم ko Ma'soom Maante hain,

✳Jab ke Ahl e Sunnat o Jamaat ka aqeeda ye hai k wo Ma'soom nahi balke gunaaho se mahfooz hain.

✴Lehaza Unhe Is Ma'na me Farishta kehna k wo Ma'soom hain Ma'mool e Ahl e Sunnat ke khilaaf hai.

5⃣Panjatan se Haqeeqi Muhabbat Sunni sahih ul Aqeeda rakhte hain na k shia o rawafiz,

6⃣In me se tamam bato ka jawab ijmalan zikr kar diya gaya, ab agar koi aisa jumla kahe k mujhe kisi se poochne ki zarurat nahi yaani agar che mai galat hu to galat hi karunga Magar Ulama e kiram se daryaft na karunga to Aisa jumla Istemaal karna sakht gunah O Najaayez hai.

7⃣Jawaab upar zikr hua.

☪Sawaal

➡Ek Bahen ne sawal bheja hy aap Baraye karam Rahnumai kare

✳Us Bahen Ke shohar 10 saal pahle ghar se nikal gaye aur nikalte wqt Quran Sharif Par haat rakh kar Tallaq diya

✴Us Bahen Ke Bacche bi hy abtq Guzar Basar Bahen Ke rishtedaro ne ki

✳Tallaq diya uske kagzi saboot nhi hy Kya WO Bahen Dusra nikah kar sakti hy

Hazrat Rahnumai kare

☪Jawaab

➡Agar waaqai us islami bahen ke shauhar ne Use Talaq de diya tha aur Iddat ke Andar Ruju bhi na kiya tha to Talaq waaqe ho gayi Talaq waaqe hone k liye Tahreeran Talaq dena zaruri nahi,

✳Wo Aurat ab jab ke is baat ko hue 10 saal guzar gaye kisi dosre sunni sahih ul aqeeda se nikah kar sakti hai

‎?ANSWER BY

?Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri

50/ New Qazi Street Mumbai 400003.

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Abul Jannaab Najmuddin Ahmad al-Kubra rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Alqaab: Shaikh e Wali taraash (Sculptor of Saints), Taamatul kubra.

Aap ki wilaadat 540 Hijri (1145 A.D.) me Khwarazm (Turkmenistan) me hui.

Hazrat Shaikh Abul Jannaab Najmuddin Ahmad al-Kubra rahmatullahi alaihi  ke waalid ka naam Umar bin Muhammad hai.

Aap ne Quran aur Kalaam ki ta’aleem haasil ki.

Hazrat Shaikh Abul Jannaab Najmuddin Ahmad al-Kubra rahmatullahi alaihi ne Iran aur phir Misr jaakar Hadeeṡ ki ta’aleem haasil ki.

Aap ne Hazrat Allama Abul Ma’ali Faraadi Nishapuri, Haafiz Abul Ula aur Imaam Abu Taahir Salfi Misri se ta’aleem haasil ki.

Ek arsa tak Aap ki dilchaspi Uloom e zahiri aur Dars o tadrees tak mahdood thi.

Ek martaba Hazrat Shaikh Abul Jannaab Najmuddin Ahmad al-Kubra rahmatullahi alaihi Tabriz me muqeem the, tab Hazrat Muhiy-us-Sunnah Imam Baghawi rahmatullahi alaihi ke ek shaagird se Imam Mausuf ki kitaab 'Sharhus Sunnah' padh rahe the, ke ittefaaq se Hazrat Baaba Farj Tabrizi rahmatullahi alaihi darsgaah ki taraf se nikle aur ek bharpur nigaah Aap par daali.

Us nigahe faiz ne Aapke dil ka aalam badal diya.

Aap Hazrat Baaba Farj Tabrizi ki khaanqaah shareef me haazir hue aur Hazrat ki khidmat me Uloom e baatini ki ta’aleem haasil ki.

Harzat ne apna Khirqa mubarak pehnaaya. Phir Aap raahe Sulook par aage badhte rahe.

Misr (Egypt) me Aapne Hazrat Baaba Farj Tabrizi rahmatullahi alaihi, Hazrat Moeen-us-Sunnah Shaikh Ruzbihan Yamaan Kabeer al-Wazzan Suharwardi Misri rahmatullahi alaihi, Hazrat Ismaeel al-Qasri rahmatullahi alaihi aur Hazrat Ibraheem Kurdi rahmatullahi alaihi se Tasawwuf ki ta’aleem haasil ki.

Phir Hazart Ismaeel al-Qasri rahmatullahi alaihi ke mashware par Hazrat Shaikh Zia-ud-deen Ammaar bin Yaasir al-Bitlisi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed hue aur apne peer ke wisaal ke baad Aap Misr waapas aaye.

Hazrat Shaikh Abul Jannaab Najmuddin Ahmad al-Kubra rahmatullahi alaihi ne Hazrat Gaus e aazam Shaikh Sayyed Abdul Qadir Jilani radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu aur Hazrat Shaikh Zia-ud-deen Abul Najeeb Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi se bhi faiz haasil kiya.

Shaikh Ruzbihan al-Misri ke mashware par Aap ne nikah kiya.

Aapke saahabzaade Hazrat Baaba Mufrah rahmatullahi alaihi hain.

Phir 582 Hijri (1185 A.D.) me Khwarazm waapas aaye aur ta’aleem e deen karte rahe.

Tasannif:
Hazrat Shaikh Abul Jannaab Najmuddin Ahmad al-Kubra rahmatullahi alaihi ki mash'hoor kitaabein:

(1) Fawaatih-ul-Jamaal wa fawaatih-ul-Jalaal

(2) Usool-ul-Ashrah

(3) Risaalat al-kha'if al-ha'im min lawmaat al-la'im.

(4) Fi Adab al-saalikeen

(5) Taweelaat-ul-Najmiyah

(6) Adab al-suluk ila Hazrat Malik-ul-Mulook.

Aap ne apne shaagirdo ko bhi apni ta’aleem aur faiz se aala darje ke Wali e kaamil banaye. Isliye Aap ka laqab ‘Shaikh e Wali taraash (Sculptor of Saints)’ hai.

Ek martaba ek Saudagar Aapki khaanqaah shareef me haazir hua. Aap par us waqt khushi kaifiyat taari thi. Aapne us Saudagar par ek nigaahe kimiya asar daali aur martaba e Wilayat ataa farma kar puchha ke ‘Kis mulk se aaye ho?’

Usne mulk ka naam bataya. Aapne use Ijazat naama likh kar diya aur farmaya ke "Jaao! tumhe us mulk ka Qutbul irshad muqarrar kiya."

Karaamat:

(1) Ek din Aap apne saathiyo ke saath baithe hue the. Ek baaz hawa me ek faakhta ka pichha kar raha tha. Achaanak Hazrat ki nazar us faakhta par padi. Fauran faakhta pichhe palti aur baaz ko pakad kar Aapke qadmo me la phenka.

(2) Ek din Aapki majlis me Ashaabe Kahaf ke baare me guftagu ho rahi thi. Aap ke ek mureed ke dil me khayaal paida hua ke Ummat e Muhamamdi me bhi koi aisa shakhs hai jis ki sohbat se Kutta faizyaab ho jaaye?

Aapne us mureed ke dil ki baat ma’aloom karli aur Khaanqaah ke darwaze par jaa kar khade ho gaye. Waha se ek Kutta guzra. Aapne us Kutte par nazar daali to wo usi waqt mutahayyar wa bekhud ho gaya aur Shaher se baahar qabrastan me jaa kar muqeem ho gaya aur wo apna sar hamesha zameen par ragadta rehta tha.

Wo Kutta jaha jaata 50-60 kutte uske aas paas jama hokar halqa bana lete aur Adab o ehtaraam ke saath uske saamne khade rehte.
Kuchh arse baad us kutte ka inteqaal hua to Hazrat ne farmaaya ke ‘Is ko dafn kardo.’

Aap Hazrat Shaikh Zia-ud-deen Ammaar bin Yaasir al-Bitlisi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur Khalifa hain.
Aap ko Hazrat Ismaeel al-Qasri rahmatullahi alaihi se bhi (Kumailiya silsila) ki khilafat mili hai.

Aap se ‘Suharwardi Kubrawiya’ silsila jaari hai.

Hazrat Shaikh Abul Jannaab Najmuddin Ahmad al-Kubra rahmatullahi alaihi ke khulfa:

(1) Shaikh Sa’ad-ud-deen Mohammad Hamuwayi rahmatullahi alaihi,

(2) Shaikh Razi-ud-deen Ali ibn Laala Ghaznawi rahmatullahi alaihi,

(3) Shaikh Majd-ud-deen Ahmad Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi,

(4) Shaikh Najm-ud-deen Abdullah Razi rahmatullahi alaihi,

(5) Shaikh Saif-ud-deen Abul Ma’ali Sa’ad Bakharzi rahmatullahi alaihi,

(6) Shaikh Baha-ud-deen Walad ibn Husain rahmatullahi alaihi,

(7) Shaikh Baaba Kamaal Khanjari Jundi rahmatullahi alaihi,

(8) Shaikh Ain-ul-zamaan Jamaal-ud-deen Gili rahmatullahi alaihi,

(9) Shaikh Mas'ood-ud-deen Hamawi rahmatullahi alaihi.

618 Hirji (1221 A.D.) me Mongol (Taataari) lashkar ne Khwarazm par hamla kiya, tab Aap Islam aur watan ki hifazat ke liye jung ke liye tayyaar hue.

Mongol lashkar ne Aapse kaha ke agar aap jung karne ke liye na aaye, to wo aap ko chhod denge. Magar Aap naa maane aur bahaaduri se jung karte hue shaheed ho gaye.

Aap ka wisaal 10 Jamaadi ul awwal 618 Hirji (1221 A.D.) ko hua.

Aap ka mazaar Urgench, Khwarazm (Turkmenistan) me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me aur Hazrat Shaikh Najmuddin Ahmad al-Kubra rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah aur ke waseele se sabko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sabke imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sabko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.
Ameen.

Title: Hazrat Zaid ibn Haarisah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu
Content: Aapki wiladat 581 A.D. me Najd me hui. Aapke waalid ka naam Haarisah ibn Sharahil aur waalida ka naam Sauda bint Saalaba hai. Aap Banu Kalb qabeele ke Uzra khandaan se ta’alluq rakhte hain. Aapki waalida Tayy qabeele ke Maan khaandaan se hain. Ek martaba 8 saal ki umr me Aap apni waalida aur qabeele walo ke saath safar kar rahe the, tab Qayn qabeele walo ne aapke khaimo par hamla karke Aapko qaid kar liya aur gulaam banakar Ukkaz ke bazaar me 400 dinaar me bech diya. Makka Sharif ke Hakeem bin Hijjaam ne Aapko kharida aur apni fhufhi Hazrat E Khadeeja bint Khuwailid radiy-Allahu ta’ala anha ko diya. Jab Hazrat e Khadeeja bint Khuwailid radiy-Allahu ta’ala anha ka nikah Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam se hua to wo Hazrat e Zaid ko apne saath le gayi. Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam Aap se bahot mohabbat karte the aur ‘Habeeb’ kehkar bulaate the. Jab Aapke waalid Haarisah aur chacha Kaab Makka aaye, to Ka’abatullah par Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam se mulaqaat hui, to Zaid ko wapas dene ke badle jitni chaahe utni raqam dene ke liye baat ki. Magar Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ne farmaya: ‘Zaid ko hi faisla karne do. Agar wo apne pariwaar ke saath jaana chaahta hai to main use bagair koi muawaze ke aazaad kar dunga.’ Zaid ko bulaaye gaye to unho ne apne waalid aur chacha se kaha ke ‘Main Mohammad (Sallallahu alaihi wassallam) ko chhodkar waapas nahi aana chaahta. Kyun ki inme maine kuchh khaas baat dekhi hai.’ Phir Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam Zaid ko lekar Ka’aba ki sid'hi par gaye aur ek iqraar-naama tayyar karke shahido ki maujudgi me baahum dastkhat kiye. Phir logo se mukhatib hokar farmaya ‘Aaj se Zaid mera beta hai.’ Aapke waalid aur chacha khush hokar wapas laut gaye. Iske baad Makka ke log Aapko Zaid ibn Muhammad kehne lage. Jab 609 A.D. me Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ne Islam ki daawat di to Aap fauran Islam me dakhil ho gaye. Aap Islam apnane wale sab se pehle teen (3) Sahabi e Rasool me saamil hain. 13 Nabawi (622 A.D.) me jab Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam Hazrat Abu Bakr Siddiq radiy-Allahu anhu ke saath Makka se hijrat karke Yasreeb (Madina Sharif) aa gaye. Iske baad Aap bhi Hijrat karke Madina Sharif aa gaye. Kuchh mahine baad Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke farmaan par Aap Makka Sharif aaye aur Ummul mo’mineen Sawda bint e Jama’a radiy-Allahu anha, Shehzaadi e Rasool-Allah Umme Kulsum aur Fatimah Zahara radiy-Allahu anha, Khaadim Abu Raafi, Hazrat e Abu Bakr Siddiq radiy-Allahu anhu ki zuaja Umme Rummaan, aur unke bachche Asma, Abdullah aur Aa'isha. Aapki zauja Baraaka aur beta Usaama, Talhah ibn Ubaydullah, Abdullah ibn Urayqit radiy-Allahu anhu ko apne saath Makka se Madina Sharif lekar aaye. Jab Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ne Sahaba me aapas me Mawaakhaat qaa'im ki, to Aapko apne chacha Hazrat e Hamza bin Abdul Muttalib radiy-Allahu anhu ka bhai banaya. Aapki 6 biwiya, 2 sahabzaade aur 1 sahabzaadi hai. (1) Durrah (Fakhita) bint Abi Lahab bin Abdul Muttalib (2) Umme Ayman, Barakah bint Sa’alaba bin Amr (Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ki Baandi) se Ek Sahabzaade : Usama [Wiladat 3 Nabawi (612 A.D.)] (3) Hind bint Awwaam (4) Umme Mubashshir, Humayma bint Sayfi [Nikah 2 Hijri (623 A.D.)] (5) Zaynab bint Jahsh bin Riyab [Nikah 3 Hijri (625 A.D.) Talak 4 Hijri (626 A.D.)] (6) Umme Kulṡum bint Uqba [Nikah 628 A.D.) Talak] se Ek Sahabzaade : Zaid (Bachpan me hi inteqaal hua) Ek Sahabzaadi : Ruqayya. Jab Aapne Hazrat e Zaynab bint Jahsh ko talak de diya aur uske baad Hazrat e Zaynab bint Jahsh radiy-Allahu anha ka nikah Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke saath hua to ALLAH ta’ala ne Aayat naazil farmayi: ‘Phir jab Zaid ne use [Zainab ko] talak dene ki garz puri karli, to hum ne usse Aapka nikah kar diya taake mo’mino par unke munh bole beto ki biwiyo (ke saath nikah) ke baare me koi harj na rahe jab ke wo (talak dekar) unse alag ho gaye ho, Aur Allah ka hukm to pura kiya jaane waala hi tha.’ (Quran: Surah al-Ahzaab, Aayat 37) Chunaanche Aap ek aise Sahabi e Rasool hain jinka naam Quran majeed me aaya hai. Isi tarah jab ALLAH ki taraf se Aayaatein naazil hui : (1) ‘Tum unko unke baap (hi ke naam) se pukara karo, Yehi ALLAH ke nazdeek zyada adl hai, Phir agar tume unke baap ma’aloom na ho to wo deen me tumhare bhaai aur tumhare dost hain.’ (Quran: 33 Surah al-Ahzaab, Aayat 5) (2) ‘Aur Mohammad (Sallallahu alaihi wassallam) tumhare mardo me se kisi ke baap nahi, lekin wo ALLAH ke Rasool hain aur tamaam nabiyo ke baad (tashreef laakar) silsila e nabuwwat ko khatm karne waale aakhari nabi hain, Aur Allah har cheez ka khoob ilm rakhne wala hai.’ (Quran: 33 Surah al-Ahzaab, Aayat 40) Iske baad logo ne Aapko Zaid ibn Muhammad ke badle Aapke asli naam Zaid ibn Haarisah kehkar pukaarna shuru kar diya. Aap Tirandaaji ke maahir the. Aapne Jung e Badr, Jung e Uhud, Jung e Khandaq aur Jung e Khaibar shaamil hokar apni shuja’at dikhayi. Jung e Badr me fatah ke baad Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam Aapko Hazrat Abdullah ibn Rawaahah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ke saath fatah ki khush-khabari dene ke liye Madina Sharif bheje. Aap Sulaih Hudaibiyah ke mauqe par bhi haazir the. Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam Islami fauj ke saath Banu Mustaliq se jung ke liye gaye, to Aapko Madina Sharif me apna Naa'ib banakar gaye the. Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ne Aapko sath (7) jung me Islami fauj ka Saalaar banakar bheja tha. (1) Jung e Qaraada– Najd ke qareeb Makka ke qaafile ke saath [Jamadi us saani 3 Hijri (November 624 A.D.)] (2) Jung e Jumum– Banu Saalim ke saath [Rabi us saani 6 Hijri (September 627 A.D.)] (3) Jung e Is– Makka ke qaafile ke saath [Jamaadi ul awwal 6 Hijri (September 627 A.D.)] (4) Jung e Taraf– Nakhl ilaaqe me. (5) Jung e Waadi al-Qura– Banu Faraza qabeele ke saath, Jisme aap shadeed jakhmi hue. [Jamaadi us saani 6 Hijri (November 627 A.D.)] Phir Aap Sha’aban 6 Hijri (January 628 A.D.) me Islami fauj ke saath dobara Waadi al-Qura gaye aur Banu Faraza ko haraaya. (6) Jung e Hisma– Juzam qabeele ke saath [Jamaadi us saani 6 Hijri (October 628 A.D.)] (7) Jung e Mu’tah – Byzantine lashkar ke saath [Jamaadi us saani 8 Hijri (October 629 A.D.)] 7 Hijri (629 A.D.) me Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ne apne Sahaba ko khato (letter) ke saath Islam ki daawat ke liye alag alag mulko ke baadshaah ke paas bheje. Hazrat Haaris bin Umair al-Azdi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko safeer banakar Bosra ke baadshaah ki jaanib bheja. Hazrat Haaris bin Umair Azdi jab maqaame Mu’tah par pahunche to waha ke governor Sharjeel Ghassani ne aapko rokkar shaheed kar diya. Jab Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ko pata chala to Aapne Jamaadi ul awwal 8 Hijri (September 629 A.D.) ko Hazrat e Zaid bin Haarisah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko saalaar banakar 3000 musalmano ka lashkar bheja. Jab musalman Musharif pahunche to pata chala ke Byzantine aur unke saathiyo ka lashkar taqreeban 200000 ka hai. Musalmano ne intezar karne ka aur Madina Sharif se madad mangwane ka mashwara kiya. Magar Hazrate Abdullah ibn Rawahah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne irshad farmaya ke ‘Musalman baatil se jung karne se ya shaheed hone se darta nahi hai.’ Hazrat Zaid ibn Haarisah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne pehle kaafiro ko Islam ki daawat di, magar wo na maane. Aakhirkaar maqaame Mu’tah par muslim lashkar ne kaafiro ke saath jung ki. Aapne bahot bahaaduri ke saath jung ki. Magar shadeed jakhmi hokar aakhirkaar shaheed ho gaye. Aapki shahaadat ke baad Hazrat Ja’afar bin Abu Taalib radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu Islami lashkar ke saalaar bane. Unki shahadat ke baad Hazrat e Abdullah ibn Rawahah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu saalaar e lashkar bane aur woh bhi shaheed ho gaye. Aap ka wisaal 5 Jamaadi ul awwal 8 Hijri (September 629 A.D.) ko Junge Mu’tah ke dauraan hua. Aapka mazaar Mu’tah (Jordan) me hai. ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Zaid ibn Haarisah radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu aur tamaam is aur shaaba ke Waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sabke imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sabko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye. Aur Sabko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sabki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye. Aameen

Title: Woh kaun si suratein hain ki Jinko Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Jummah ki fajr aur Namaz E Jummah mein padha karte the?
Content:
Jawab:

Muslim shareef mein hai ki Rasool e Pak Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Jummah mein Surah Jummah aur Surah Munafiqoon padha karte the.

Al Atqan Jild 1, Safa 81

Bukhari wa Muslim shareef ki Hadees mein hai ki roze Jummah namaz Fajr mein Nabi E Kareem Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Surah Sajda aur Surah Dahr Padhte the.

Khazainul irfan Page 21, Ruku 16
Al Atqan Jild 1, Safa 81

Title: Woh kaunsi aayatein hai ki jinko Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ namaze Eidein mein padha karte the?
Content:
Jawab:

Muslim shareef mein hai ki Hazrat Umar Bin Khattab (Radi'Allahu Anhu) ne Hazrat Abu Waqdi Laisi (Radi'Allahu Anhu) se pucha ki Eidein ki Namazo mein Rasool'Allah Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam kya padha karte the toh aapne farmaya, "Surah Qaaf Aur Surah Qamar."

Ibne Kaseer Page 27, Ruku 15
Al Atqan 1/80

Muslim shareef mein hi ek Doosri Hadees ke mutabiq Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ eidein ki namaz mein Surah Aala aur Surah Ghashiyah ki Tilawat farmaya karte the.

Ibne Kaseer Page 30, Ruku 12

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

اللھم افتح علینا حکمتک وانشر علینا رحمتک یاذالجلال والاکرام

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Shab meiñ nazil hone Wali surteiñ kauñ kauñ si hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

1 • Surah : Anaam
Tibrani meiñ hai ki Hazrat Ibne Abbas Razi'allahu Anhuma ne Farmaya yeh puri surat ekbarghi shaba meiñ ba-muqam Makka Mukarrama is tarah nazil hui ki sattar hazar (70,000) farishte iske ir-girdh Ba-awaz Buland tasbeeh wa taqdees Bayaan kar rahe the.

2 • Surah : Maryam
Tibrani hi meiñ Hazrat Abu Mariyam Gussani Razi'allahu Anhu ki riwayat hai farmate hai, Maiñe ek Subah Khwaja Kainat Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ ki khidmat aqdas meiñ hazir hokar arz kiya, "Aaj Raat mere yahañ ek ladki paida hui hai." Sarkar abd Qarar Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ ne farmaya, Aaj Raat Mujh par Surah : Maryam nazil hui hai lihaza Tum apni ladki ka naam Maryam rakho.

3 • Surah : Munafiqoon
Is Surat se Mutallik Tirmizi meiñ Hazrat Zaid bin Akram Razi'allahu Anhu ki Riwayat hai ki yeh surat raat ko nazil hui hai.

4 • Surah : Mursalat
Hazrat Ibne Masood Razi'allahu Anhu ne farmaya ki Walmursalat shab e jinn ko hira meiñ nazil hui. Ek Doosri riwayat ke mutabiq yeh surah shab e Arfa meiñ ba-muqam gaare mina nazil hui.

5 • Surah : Falaq

6 • Suarh : Naas
Hazrat Uqba bin Ameer Jehni Razi'allahu Anhu ki Riwayat hai Rasool e Khuda Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ ne farmaya Mujh par Aaj Raat Azeem aayatoñ ka Nuzool Ka hua Hai Jinki Misaaleiñ nahiñ. Phir in do mazkura surtoñ ko Tilawat Farmayi.

? *Al Atqan Juz Awwal Safa 28*

Part No : 11
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

اللھم افتح علینا حکمتک وانشر علینا رحمتک یاذالجلال والاکرام

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

*Meelad un Nabi ﷺ Par Kiye Gaye Sawalat Aur Unke Jawabat*

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Meelad un Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Itni Hi Ahem Hai toh Sirf Hindustan Aur Pakistan Meiñ Hi Kyuñ Manayi Jaati Hai? Doosre Muslim Mulkoñ Meiñ Kyuñ Nahiñ Manayi Jaati?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

*Alhumdulillah الحمدللہ*
Duniya Ke Saiñtalees (47) Mulk Eid Meelad un Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Ko Qaumi Ta'teel (National Holiday) Ke Taur Par Manate Hai Jismeiñ Se Kuch Mulk Toh Gair Muslim (Secular) Hai Jaise Hindustan, Sri Lanka, Ghana, Tanzania, Maali Wagairah.

47 Mulko Ki Tafseel Neeche Darj Hai:

Africi Mulkoñ Meiñ Aljiria, Benan, Cameroon, Nigeria Wagairah Kul 54 Mulkoñ Meiñ Se 25 Mulkoñ Meiñ 12 Rabi-ul-awwal Ko Qaumi Ta'teel Ke Taur Par Jashn Eid Meelad un Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Manaya Jaata Hai.

Mashriqe Wusta (Central Asia) Meiñ Bahrain, Iran, Iraq, Kuwait, Labnan, Shaam, Palestine Wagairah Kul 14 Mulkoñ Meiñ Se 11 Mulkoñ Meiñ Jashn Eid Meelad un Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Ko Qaumi Ta'teel Ke Taur Par Manaya Jaata Hai. Israel, Saudi Arabia Aur Qatar Hi 3 Aise Mulk Hai Jo Eid Meelad un Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Nahiñ Manate. Iran Ko Chhodh Baki Sabhi Mulkoñ Meiñ 12 Rabi-ul-awwal Hi Ko Jashn Eid Meelad un Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Manaya Jaata Hai.

Asia Mulkoñ Meiñ Afganistan, Bangladesh, Bhutan, Hindustan, Indonesia, Pakistan, Malaysia, Sri Lanka Wagairah 12 Rabi-ul-awwal Ko Qaumi Ta'teel Ke Taur Par Eid Meelad un Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Manate Hai.

Iske Alawa Canada, America, Bartaniya, Rus Aur Doosre European Mulkoñ Meiñ Musalman Badi Shaan Ke Sath Jashn Eid Meelad un Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Manate Hai.

*_Note : Department Of United Arab Emirates Se Yeh Jankari Li Gayi Hai_*

Title: Agar Wiladat 12 Rabi-ul-awwal Ko Hui Toh Wafat Bhi Usi Tarikh
Content:
Yaani 12 Rabi-ul-awwal Ko Hui. Phir Is Din Khushi Kaise Mana Sakte Hai ?

Yeh Toh Gam Manane Ka Din Hua ?

Jawab:

Yaad Rakhe Ki Sog (Gam Manana) Sirf Teen (3) Din Hai Siwaye Bewa Ke: "Kisi Aurat Ke Liye Jo ALLAH ﷻ Aur Akhirat Par Imaan Rakhti Hai, Halal Nahi Ki Zyada Shauhar Ke Siwa Kisi Mayyat Par Teen (3) Din Se Zyada Sog Manaye".

Sahih Bukhari, Hadees: 1280, Sahih Muslim, Hadees: 3814

Aur Yeh Bhi Yaad Rakhein Ki ek Lamha Ke Liye Apni Shaan Ke Mutabiq Maut Ka Maza Chakhne Ke Baad Aaqa Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Zinda Hai.

12 Rabi-ul-awwal Ko Hi Wiladat Aur Wafat Dono Hone Ke Bawajood Bhi Is Din Gam Nahi Manaya Ja Sakta.

Kyunki Jummah Ke Din Adam Alaihis Salam Banaye Gaye Aur Usi Din Wisaal Bhi Hua.

Phir Bhi ALLAH ﷻ Ne Jummah Ko Musalmano Ke Liye Eid Ka Din Banaya Hai.

Jaisa Ki Pehli Hadees Aur Tafseel Guzar Chuki.

Isiliye 12 Rabi-ul-awwal Ko Khushi Manayi Jaayegi.

Gam Nahi Manaya Jaayega.

Aur Haan ! Mukhalifeen Ko Qayamat Ke Din ALLAH ﷻ Se Yeh Sawal Zaroori Karna Chahiye Ki Jummah Ko Hi Adam Ki Takhleeq Aur Wisaal Ke Bawajood Usey Eid Kyu Karar Diya?

Gam Aur Khushi Ka Din Bana Kar Gam wa Afsos Zaahir Karne Se Kyu Mana Kar Diya ?

Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Ki Paidaish Ki Tarikh Ke Mutalliq Muharrikheen (Historians) Ki Rai Mukhtalif Hai, Magar Jis Tarikh Par Hadees Ke Bahut Se Imamo Aur Aulma-e-Kiraam Ne Ittifaq Kiya, Woh 12 (Barah) Rabi-ul-awwal Hai. Hawala Peshe Khidmat Hai.

3 - Seerat un Nabi : Ibne Hasham, Hissa : 1, Page : 182, Matbua Aetiqad Publication House (New Delhi)

4 - Madarijun Nabuwa, Hissa : 2, Page : 23, Matbua : Abdi Duniya (New Delhi)

6 - Shabul Iman, Hissa : 2, Page : 148, Matbua : Irada Isha'ate Islam, Deoband.

7 - Dalaillun Nubuwa, Hissa : 1, Page : 95 Wagairah Wagairah.

Zikr Ki Gayi Kitaabon Meiñ Aur Doosri Kahi Kitaabon Meiñ Yehi Likha Hai Ki Aaqa Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Ki Wiladat Pir (Monday) Ke Din 12 (Barah) Rabi-ul-awwal Ko Hui.

Title: Islam Mein Sirf Do Hi Eid Hai, To Yeh Teesri Eid Kaha Se Aayi?
Content:
Jawab:

Yeh Kehna Ki Islam Mein Sirf Do Hi Eid Hai Sarasar Jahalat Hai.

Hadees e Kareema Se Sabit Hai Ki Jummah Bhi Eid Hai.

Ab Jummah Eid Kyu Hai?

Woh Bhi Jaan Lijiye.

Hazrat Abdullah ibn Abbas Radi'Allahu Anhu Riwayat Karte Hai Ki Rasoolallah Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Ne Irshad Farmaya:

"Beshak Yeh Eid Ka Din Hai Jise ALLAH ﷻ Ne Musalmano Ke Liye (Barkat Wala) Banaya Hai, Pass Jo Koi Jummah Ki Namaz Ke Liye Aaye, Toh Ghusl Karke Aaye Aur Agar Ho Sake Toh Khushbu Laga Kar Aaye Aur Tum Par Miswak Karna Zaroori Hai."

Ibne Majha, Hissa: 1, Hadees: 1908, Tibrani, Hissa: 7, Hadees: 7355

Hazrat Abu Huraira Radi'Allahu Anhu Riwayat Karte Hai Ki Rasoolallah Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Ne Irshad Farmaya:

"Beshak Jummah Ka Din Eid Ka Din Hai, Pass Tum Apne Eid Ke Din Yaum e Siyaam (Roza Ka Din) Mat Banao, Magar Yeh Ki Tum Uske Pehle Ya Uske Baad Ke Din Ka Roza Rakhe." 

Sahih Ibn e Khuzaima, Hadees: 1980, Sahih Ibn e Hibban, Hadees: 3680

Hadees Mein Hai: "Jummah Ka Din Tamam Dino Ka Sardar Hai aur ALLAH ﷻ Ke Yaha Tamam Dino Se Azeem Hai Aur Yeh ALLAH ﷻ Ke Yaha Eid ul Azha Aur Eid ul Fitr Dono Se Afzal Hai."

Al-Maujamul Kabeer, Tibrani, Hadees: 4387

Hazrat Aus Bin Aus Radi'Allahu Anhu Se Riwayat Hai Ki Rasoolallah Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Ne Irshad Farmaya:

"Tumhare Dino Mein Sabse Afzal Din Jummah Ka Din Hai. Is Din Hazrat Aadam Ki Wiladat Hui, Isi Roz Unki Rooh Qabz Ki Gayi Aur Isi Roz Soor Phunka Jayega. Pass Is Roz Kasrat Se Mujh Par Durood Bheja Karo, Beshak Tumhara Durood Mujh Par Pesh Kiya Jaata Hai." 

Sunan Ibn e Majha, Hadees: 1138, Sunan Abu Dawood, Hadees: 1049, Sunan Nisai, Hadees: 1385

Zikr Ki Gayi Hadees Se Maloom Hua Ki Jummah Ka Din Aadam Alaihis Salam Ki Paidaish Ka Din Hai, Isiliye Yeh Eid Ka Din Hai.

Toh Bhala Jis Din Dono Jahan Ke Sarkar, Dono Jahan Ki Rehmat Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam (ﷺ) Ki Meelad (Paidaish) Ho, Woh Eid Ka Din Kyuñ Na Ho?

Balki Yeh Toh Eido Ki Eid Hai Ki Hamein Saari Eid Isi Eid Ki Wajah Se Mili Hai.

In Hadeeso Se Maloom Hua Ki Musalman Saal Mein Do Eid Nahin Balki Pachhas Se Zyada Eid Manata Hai.

Alhumdulillah الحمدللہ

Iske Alawa Quran Pak Mein Hazrat Isa Alaihis Salam Ki Dua Naql Hai Ki :

 اللّٰہُمَّ رَبَّنَاۤ اَنۡزِلۡ عَلَیۡنَا مَآئِدَۃً مِّنَ السَّمَآءِ تَکُوۡنُ لَنَا عِیۡدًا لِّاَوَّلِنَا وَ اٰخِرِنَا ﴿۱۱۴﴾

Kanzul Iman Tarjuma:

Aey Hamare Rab Hum Par Aasaman Se Nehmaton Ka Dastarkhwan Nazil Farma Ki Woh Hamare Liye Eid Karar Paaye Aur Woh Teri Taraf Se Nishaani Bane Aur Tu Behtar Rizk Ata Farmane Wala Hai.

Surah Al-maida, Aayat - 114

Gaur Farmaye! Ki Hazrat Isa Alaihis Salam Dastarkhwan Nazil Hone Ke Din Ko Eid Karar De Rahe Hai.

Ab Aap Khud Faisla Karein Ki Jis Din Fakhre Maujoodat, Duniya Ki Paidaish Ki Paidaish Ka Sabab Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam ﷺ Jalwagar Ho.

Toh Woh Din Kyu Na Eid Qarar Paaye?

Jin Surtoñ Meiñ Roza Na Rakhne Ki Ijazat Haiñ Unmeiñ Se Baaz Yeh Haiñ.

1 • Safar Yaani 3 Din Ki Raah Ke Irada Se Bahar Nikalna Lekin Agar Safar Meiñ Mashaqqat Na Ho Toh Roza Rakhna Afzal Hai.

2-3 • Hamila aur Dhoodh Pilane Wali Aurat Ko Apni Jaañ Ya Bachcha Ka Sahi Andesha Ho Toh Is Halat Meiñ Roza Na Rakhne Ki Ijazat Hai

4 • Marz Yaani Mariz Ko Marz Badh Jaane Ya Der Se Achcha Hone Ya Dandurusht Ko Beemar Ho Jaane Ka Galib Guman Ho Toh Us din Roza Na Rakhna Jaiz Hai.

5 • Shaikhe Faani Yaani Woh Budha Ki Na Ab Roza Rakh Sakta Hai aur Na Aainda Usmeiñ Itni Taqat Aane Ki Ummeed Hai Ki Rakh Sakega Toh Use Roza Na Rakhne Ki Ijazat Hai. Aur Haiz wa Nifas Ki Halatoñ Meiñ Roza Rakhna Jaiz Nahiñ.

Content:

Bahar e Shari'at

Title: Kin Logo Ko Zakat Dena Jaayez Nahi?
Content: Jawab: Jin Logo Ko Zakat Dena Jaayez Nahi Unmein Se Kuch Yeh Hai. 1) Maaldar: Yaani Woh Shakhs Jo Malik e Nisab Ho. 2) Bani Hashim: Yaani Hazrat e Ali, Hazrat e Jafar, Hazrat e Aqeel Aur Hazrat e Abbas wa Haris Bin Abdul Muttalib Ki Aulad Ko Dena Jaayez Nahi. 3) Apni Nasl Aur Fara: Yaani Maa, Baap, Dada, Dadi, Nana, Nani Wagairah Aur Beta, Beti, Pota, Poti, Nawasa, Nawasi Ko Zakat Dena Jaayez Nahi. 4) Aurat Apne Shohar Ko Aur Shohar Apni Aurat Ko Agarche Talaq De Di Ho Jab Tak Ki Iddat Mein Ho Zakat Nahi De Sakta. 5) Maaldar Mard Ke Na-Baligh Bachche Ko Zakat Nahi De Sakta Aur Maaldar Ki Baligh Aulad Ko Jabki Malik e Nisab Na Ho De Sakta Hai. 6) Wahabi Ya Kisi Doosre Murtad Bad-Mazhab Aur Kafir Ko Zakat Dena Jaayez Nahi.

Title: Zakat Aur Ushr Ka Maal Kin Logo Ko Diya Jata Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Jin Logo Ko Diya Jaata Hai Unmein Se Kuch Yeh Hai.

1) Fakeer: Yaani Woh Shakhs Jiske Paas Kuch Maal Hai. Lekin Nisab Bhar Nahi.

2) Miskeen: Yaani Woh Shakhs Ki Jiske Paas Khane Ke Liye Galla Aur Badan Chhupani Ke Liye Kapda Bhi Na Ho.

3) Qarzdaar: Yaani Woh Shakhs Ki Jiske Zimma Qarz Ho Aur Uske Paas Qarz Se Fazil Koi Maal Ba-Qadre Nisab Na Ho.

4) Musafir: Jiske Paas Safar Ki Halat Mein Maal Na Raha, Usey Zaroorat Bhar Ki Zakat Dena Jaayez Hai.
