Title: Maal Par Pura Saal Guzar Jaane Ka Kya Matlab Hai?
Content: Jawab: Iska Matlab Yeh Hai Ki Hajate Asliya Se Jis Tarikh Ko Pura Nisab Bach Gaya. Is Tarikh Se Nisab Ka Saal Shuru Ho Gaya. Phir Saale Aainda Agar Usi Tarikh Ko Pura Nisab Paya Gaya. Toh Zakat Dena Wajib Hai. Agar Darmiyan e Saal Mein Nisab Ki Kami Ho Gayi, Toh Yeh Kami Kuch Asar Na Karegi.

Title: Kam Se Kam Kitne Rupaye Ho Ki Jin Par Zakat Wajib Hoti Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Agar Sona Chandi Na Ho Aur Na Maal e Tijarat Ho.

Toh Kam Se Kam Itne Rupaye Ho Ki Bazaar Mein Saadhe Bawan (52 1/2) Tola Chandi, Ya Saade Saat (7 1/2)Tola Sona Khareeda Ja Sake.

Toh Un Rupayo Ki Zakat Wajib Hoti Hai.

Title: Zakat Farz Hai Ya Wajib?
Content: Jawab: Zakat Farz Hai. Uski Farziyat Ka Inkar Karne Wala Kafir Aur Na Ada Karne Wala Fasiq Aur Adayegi Mein Dair Karne Wala Gunahgar Mardudush'Shahadat Hai. (Gawahi Na Dene Ke Layak). Bahar e Shariat Zakat Farz Hone Ki Sharth Kya Hai ? Jawab: Chand Shartein Hai. Musalman Aaqil Baligh Hona. Maal Baqadre Nisab Ka Pure Taur Par Milkiyat Mein Hona, Nisab Ka Hajat-E-Asliya Aur Kisi Ke Baqaya Se Farigh Hona, Maal e Tijarat, Ya Sona Chandi Aur Maal Par Pura Saal Guzar Jaana. Sone Chandi Ka Nisab Kya Hai Aur Unmein Kitni Zakat Farz Hai? Jawab: Sone Ka Nisab Saadhe Saat (7 1/2) Tola Hai. Jismein Chaliswa Hissa. Yaani Sawa Do Masha Zakat Farz Hai. Aur Chandi Ka Nisab Saadhe Bawan (52 1/2) Tola Hai. Jismein Ek Tola Teen Masha Che Ratti Zakat Farz Hai. Sona Chandi Ke Bajaye Bazaar Bhav Se Unki Qeemat Laga Kar Rupaya Wagairah Dena Bhi Jaayez Hai.

Title: Kya Suraj Nikalne, Doobne Aur Zawal Ke Waqt Namaz e Janaza Padhna Makrooh Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Janaza Agar Unhi Waqto Mein Laya Gaya.

Toh Namaz Unhi Waqto Mein Padhe Koi Karahat Nahi.

Karahat Us Surat Mein Hai Ki Pehle Se Janaza Tayyar Maujood Hai Aur Der Ki Yaha Tak Ki Waqt e Karahat Aa Gaya.

Bahare Sharia'at, Aalamgiri

Title: Namaz e Janaza Farz Hai Ya Wajib?
Content:
Jawab:

Namaz e Janaza Farz e Kifaya Hai.

Yaani Agar Ek Shakhs Ne Padhli, Toh Sab Chhuthkara Pa Gaye Aur Agar Khabar Ho Jaane Ke Baad Kisi Ne Padhi, Toh Sab Gunahgar Huwe.

Namaz E Janaza Mein Kitni Cheezein Farz Hai?

Jawab:

Namaz E Janaza Me Do (2) Cheezein Farz Hai.

Chaar (4) Baar "ALLAHU AKBAR" Kehna, Qiyaam Yaani Khada Hona.

Namaz e Janaza Mein Kitni Cheezein Sunnat Hai?

Jawab:

Namaz e Janaza Mein Teen (3) Cheezein Sunnat e Mu'akkada Hai.

ALLAH Ta'ala Ki Sana,

Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Par Durood Aur Mayyat Ke Liye Dua.

Namaz e Janaza Padhne Ka Tariqa Kya Hai?

Jawab:

Pehle Niyat Kare.

Niyat Ki Maine Namaz e Janaza Ki Chaar Takbeero Ke Saath ALLAH Ta'ala Ke Liye Dua Is Mayyat Ke Liye (Muqtadi Itna Aur Kahe, Peeche Is Imam Ke) Muh Mera Taraf Kaaba Shareef Ke.

Phir Kaano Tak Dono Hath Uthakar ALLAHU AKBAR Kehta Hua Hath Wapas Laaye Aur Naaf Ke Neeche Bandh Le.

Phir Yeh Sana Padhe

" سُبْحَانَكَ اَّللُهَّم َوِبحَمْدِكَ وَ تَبَاْرَكَ اسْمُكَ َوتَعَالَئ جَدُّكَ وَجَلَّ َثَناءٌكَ وَلَااِلَه غَيْرُكَ "

Phir Bagair Hath Uthaye ALLAHU AKBAR Kahe Aur Durood e Ibrahimi Padhe.

Jo Paanch Waqt Ki Namaz Mein Padhe Karte Hai.

Phir Bagair Hath Uthaye ALLAHU AKBAR Kahe Aur Baligh Ka Janaza Ho Toh Yeh Dua Padhe

"Allah hummag fir le hayyena, wa mayyetena, wa shaaedena, wa gaaebena, wa sagheerena, wa kabirena ,wa zakarena ,wa unsana , Allah humma man aah yaiytahu , minna fa aah yehi alal Islam .Waman tawaf faiytahu minna fata waffahu alal Iman."

Iske Baad Chauthi Takbeer Kahe.

Phir Bagair Koi Dua Padhe Hath Kholkar Salam Pher De aur Na-Balig Bachche Ka Janaza Ho Toh Yeh Dua Padhi Jaaye.

"Allahummaj alho lana faratau waj alho lana ajrau wa zukhrau waj alho lana shafe au wa Mushaffa an."

Aur Agar Na-Balig Ladki Ka Janaza Ho Toh Yeh Dua Padhe.

"Allahummaj alha lana faratau waj alha lana ajrau wa zukhrau waj alha lana shafiatoñ wa Mushaffa at."

Title: Ladki Ke Aqeeqa Ki Kya Dua Hai?
Content:
Ladki Ke Aqeeqa Ki Dua Yeh Hai

اَللّٰھُمَّ ھٰذِہُُِ عَقِیْقَةُ بِنْتِی


(Yahan par ladki ka naam liya jaaye)


….. دَمُھَا بِدَمِھَا وَ لَحْمُھَا بِلَحْمِھَا وَ عَظْمُھَا بِعَظْمِھَا وَجِلْدُھَا بِجِلْدِھَا وَشَعْرُھَا بِشَعْرِھَا اَللّٰھُمَّ اجْعَلْھَا فِدَآءً لِّبِنْتِیْ مِنَ النَّار بِسْمِ اَللّٰهِ اَللّٰهُ اَکْبَرْ



Allahuma haa zihi aqeeqa’tu binti (yahan ladki ka naam liya jaaye) damuha bi damihaa wa lahmuhaa bi lahmihaa wa azmuhaa bi azmihaa wa jilduhaa wa jildihaa wa sha’aruhaa wa sha’arihaa Allahumaj al haa fi daa ‘a li binti minan naar.

Bismillah hi Allah hu Akbar

Title: Awaam Mein Mashoor Hai Ki Bachcha Ke Maa Baap, Dada Dadi Aur Nana Nani Aqeeqa ka Ghosht Na Khaye.
Content:
Kya Yeh Sahi Hai?

Jawab:

Galat Hai.

Maa Baap, Dada Dadi Aur Nana Nani Wagairah Sab Kha Sakte Hai.

Unhi Janwaron Ko Aqeeqah Mein Bhi Zabah Kiya Jaata Hain.

Qurbani Ka Malike Nisaab Kauñ Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Qurbani Ka Malike Nisaab Woh Shakhs Hai Jo Saade Bawan (52 1/2)` Tola Chandi Ya Saade Saat (7 1/2) Tola Sona Ya Unmeiñ Se Kisi Ek Ki Qeemat Ka Samane Tijarat Ya Samane Gaire Tijarat Ka Malik Ho Ya Unmeiñ Se Kisi Ek Ki Qeemat Bhar Ke Rupaya Ka Malik Ho Aur Mamluka (Jo Uski Milkiyat Ho) Cheezeiñ Hajate Asliya Se Jaiz Ho.

•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Har Saal Malike Nisab Hai Toh Har Saal Apne Naam Se Qurbani Karna Wajid Hai Aur Doosre Ki Taraf Se Bhi Karna Chahta Ho Toh Uske Liye Doosri Qurbani Ka Intizam Kare.

Title: Eid ul Adha (Azha) Ke Tamam Ahkaam Eid ul Fitr Ki Tarah Hain Ya Kuch Farq Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Eid ul Fitr Ki Tarah Hai.

Sirf Baaz Baaton Mein Farq Hai Aur Woh Yeh Hai.

1) Eid ul Adha (Azha) Mein Mustahab Yeh Hai Namaz Ada Karne Se Pehle Kuch Na Khaye.

Agarche Qurbani Na Karni Ho Aur Agar Khaliya Toh Karahat Nahi.

2) Eid ul Adha (Azha) Ke Din Eidgaah Ke Raste Mein Buland Aawaz Se Takbeer Kehte Huwe Jaaye.

3) Qurbani Karni Ho, Toh Mustahab Yeh Hai Ki Pehli Se Duswi (10wi) Zilhijja Tak Na Hajamat Banwaye Aur Na Nakhun Tarshwaye.

4) Nawwi (9wi) Zilhijja Ki Fazar Se Terawi (13wi) Ki Asar Tak Har Namaz e Farz Panjgana Ke Baad Jo Jama'at Mustahabba Ke Sath Ada Ki Gayi Ho Ek Bar Buland Aawaz Se Takbeer Kehna Wajib Hai Aur Teen Bar Afzal.

Isey Takbeer e Tashreeq Kehte Hai Woh Yeh Hai.

"ALLAHU AKBAR ALLHU AKBAR LAA'ILAH ILALLAHU WALLAHU AKBAR ALLAHU AKBAR WA LILLAHULHAMDU"

Title: Eid ul Fitr Ki Namaz Padhne Ka Tariqa Aur Niyat Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Pehle Is Tarah Niyat Kare.

Niyat Ki Maine Do Rakat Namaz Wajib Eid ul Fitr Ya Eid ul Azha (Adha) Ki Che (6) Takbeeron Ke Saath ALLAH TA'AALA Ke Liye (Muqtadi Itna Aur Kahe Peeche Is Imam Ke) Munh Mera Taraf Kaaba Shareef Ke.

Phir Kaano Tak Hath Uthaye Aur ALLAHU AKBAR Keh Kar Hath Bandh Le.

Phir Sana Padhe.

Phir Kaano Tak Hath Le Jaaye Aur ALLAHU AKBAR Kehte Huwe Hath Chhodh De.

Phir Hath Uthaye Aur ALLAHU AKBAR Kehte Huwe Hath Chhodh De.

Phir Teesri Bar Hath Uthaye Aur ALLAHU AKBAR Keh Kar Hath Bandh Le.

Iske Baad Imam Aahista Aauzu Billah wa Bismillah Padhkar Buland Aawaz Se Alhumdu Ke Saath Koi Surat Padhe.

Phir Ruku Aur Sajde Se Farigh Hokar Doosri Rakat Mein Pehle Alhumdu Ke Saath Koi Surat Padhe.

Phir Teen Bar Kaano Tak Hath Le Jaaye Aur Har Bar ALLAHU AKBAR Kahe Aur Teesri Martaba Hath Na Bandhe Aur Chawthi Bar Bagair Hath Uthaye ALLAHU AKBAR Kehte Huwe Ruku Mein Jaaye Aur Baqi Namaz Doosri Namazo Ki Tarah Puri Kare.

Salam Pherne Ke Baad Do Khutba Imam Padhe.

Phir Dua Mange Khutba e Ula (Pehla Khutba) Shuru Karne Se Pehle Imam Mimbar Par Khade Hokar 5 Bar Aahista ALLAHU AKBAR Kahe Ki Yehi Sunnat Hai.

Title: Eid ul fitr wa Eid ul adha Ki Namaz Wajib Hai Ya Sunnat?
Content:
Jawab:

Eid ul fitr wa Eid ul Adha Ki Namaz Wajib Hai.

Magar Inke Wajib Aur Jayez Hone Ki Shart Hai.

Jo Jumma Ke Liye Hai, Sirf Farq Itna Hai Ki Jumma Mein Khutba Shart Hai Aur Eidein Mein Sunnat. 

Doosra Farq Yeh Hai Ki Jumma Ka Khutba Namaz Se Pehle Hai Aur Eidein Ka Khutba Namaz Ke Baad.

Aur Teesra Farq Yeh Hai Ki Eidein Mein Azaan wa Iqamat Nahi Hai.

Sirf Do Baar "Assalatu Jami'ah" Kehne Ki Ijazat Hai.

Eid ul fitr wa Eid ul adha Ki Namaz Ka Waqt Kab Se Kab Tak Hai?

Jawab:

Eid ul fitr wa Eid ul adha Ki Namaz Ka Waqt Ek Neza Aftab (Suraj) Buland Hone Ke Baad Se Zawal Ke Pehle Tak Hai.

Title: Urdu Mein Juma Ka Khutba Padhna Kaisa Hai?

Arbi Ke Alawa Kisi Doosri Zaban Mein Pura Juma Ka Khutba Padhna Ya Arbi Ke Sath Kisi Doosri Zaban Ko Milana Dono Baatein Sunnatein Mutawarisa Ke Khilaf Aur Mukrooh Hain.

Agar Do Dai Din Ki Raah Ke Irada Se Nikla Wahañ Pahuñch Kar Phir Doosri Jagah Ka Irada Hua Woh Bhi Teen (3) Se Kam Ka Rasta Hai Toh Woh Sharan Musafir Hoga Ya Nahiñ
?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Woh Shakhs Sharan Musafir Na Hoga Us Waqt Tak Ki Jahañ Se Chale Wahañ Se Teen (3) Din Ki Raah Ka Ikatthe Irada Na Kare Yaani Agar Do Do Dai Dai Din Ki Raah Ke Irada Se Chalta Raha Toh Isi Tarah Agar Saari Duniya Ghum Aaye Musafir Na Hoga.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Musafir Kab Tak Qasr Karta Rahe?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Musafir Jab Tak Kisi Jagah Pandra (15) Din Ya Issey Zyada Theherne Ki Niyat Na Kare Ya Apni Basti Meiñ Na Pahuñch Jaaye Qasr Karta Rahe.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Musafir Agar Muqim Ke Peeche Namaz Padhe Toh Kya Kare?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Musafir Agar Muqim Ke Peeche Namaz Padhe Toh Puri Padhe Qasr Na Kare.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Muqim Agar Musafir Ke Peeche Namaz Padhe Toh Kya Kare?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Muqim Agar Musafir Ke Peeche Padhe Toh Imam Ke Salam Pher Dene Ke Baad Apni Baqi Do (2) Rakateiñ Padhe Aur Un Rakatoñ Meiñ Qirat Bilkul Na Kare Balki Surah Fatiha Padhne Ki Miqdar Chup Chup Khada Rahe.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

Title: Agar Kisi Ne Qasdan (Janboojh Kar) Char (4) Hi Padhi Toh Kya Hukm Hai?
Content:
???????? ?
? *ILM E DEEN* ?
? *ISLAMIC KNOWLEDGE* ?
???????? ?

Part No : 94
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

اللھم افتح علینا حکمتک وانشر علینا رحمتک یاذالجلال والاکرام

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•
Musafir Ki Namaz Ka Bayaan
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Kisi Ne Qasdan (Janboojh Kar) Char (4) Hi Padhi Toh Kya Hukm Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Janboojh Kar Char (4) Padhi Aur Donoñ Qada (Baithak) Kiya Toh Farz Ada Ho Gaya Aur Aakhri Do (2) Rakateiñ Nafl Ho Gayi Magar Gunaahgar wa Mustqikenar Hua Tauba Kare Aur Do (2) Rakat Par Qada Na Kiya Toh Farz Ada Na Hua.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Farz, Magrib Aur Witr Meiñ Qasr Hai Ki Nahiñ Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Nahiñ Farz, Magrib Aur Witr Meiñ Qasr Nahiñ Hai.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Sunnatoñ Meiñ Qasr Hai Ya Nahiñ ?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Sunnatoñ Meiñ Qasr Nahiñ. Agar Mauqa Ho Toh Puri Padhe Warna Mu'af Haiñ.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Musafir Kis Waqt Se Namaz Meiñ Qasr Shuru Kare?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Musafir Jab Basti Ki Aabadi Se Bahar Ho Jaaye Toh Us Waqt Se Namaz Meiñ Qasr Shuru Kare.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Bus Stand Aur Railway Station Par Qasr Karega Ya Nahiñ?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Aabadi Se Bahar Ho Aur Teen (3) Din Ki Raah Tak Safar Ka Irada Bhi Ho Toh Bus Stand Aur Railway Station Par Qasr Karega Warna Nahiñ.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

اللھم افتح علینا حکمتک وانشر علینا رحمتک یاذالجلال والاکرام

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•
Beemar Ki Namaz Ka Bayaan
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Beemari Ke Sabab Khade Hokar Namaz Nahiñ Padh Sakta Hai Toh Kya Kare?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Khade Hokar Namaz Nahiñ Padh Sakta Ki Marz Badh Jaayega Yaa Der Meiñ Achcha Hoga Ya Chakkar Aata Hai Ya Khade Hokar Padhne Se Peshaab Ka Qatra Aayega Ya Bahut Shadeed Dard Na Qabile Bardasht Ho Jaayega Toh In Sab Surtoñ Meiñ Baith Kar Namaz Padhe.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Kisi Cheez Ki Thek Lagakar Khada Ho Sakta Hai Toh Is Surat Meiñ Kya Hukm Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Khadim (Naukar) Ya Lathi Ya Deewar Wagairah Par Thek Lagakar Khada Ho Sakta Hai Toh Farz Hai Ki Khada Hokar Padhe. Is Surat Meiñ Agar Baith Kar Namaz Padhega Toh Nahiñ Hogi.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Kuch Der Khada Ho Sakta Hai Toh Uske Liye Kya Hukm Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Kuch Der Bhi Khada Ho Sakta Hai Agarche Itna Hi Ki Khada Hokar ALLAHU AKBAR Kehle Toh Farz Hai Ki Khada Hokar Uthna Kahe Phir Baithe Warna Namaz Na Hogi.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

Title: Zehri Namaz Meiñ Bhoolkar Aahista Padh Diya Ya Sirri Namaz Mein Zehr Se Padh Diya Toh Kya Hukm Hai?
Content:
???????? ?
? *ILM E DEEN* ?
? *ISLAMIC KNOWLEDGE* ?
???????? ?

Part No : 86
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

اللھم افتح علینا حکمتک وانشر علینا رحمتک یاذالجلال والاکرام

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•
Sajda e Sahw Ka Bayaan
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Zehri Namaz Meiñ Bhoolkar Aahista Padh Diya Ya Sirri Namaz Mein Zehr Se Padh Diya Toh Kya Hukm Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Zehri (Aawaz Se Padhne Wali) Namaz Mein Imam Ne Bhool Kar Kam Se Kam Aayat Aahista Padh Di Ya Sirri Yaani Jismeiñ Qirat Aahista Padhi Jaati Hai Aisi Namaz Meiñ Zehr se Padh Diya Toh Sajda e Sahw Wajib Hai Aur Agar Ek Kalima Padha Toh Mu'aaf Hai Aur Munfarid (Akele Namaz Padhne Wala) Ne Sirri Namaz Meiñ Aayat Zehr Se Padhi Toh Sajda e Sahw Wajib Hai Aur Zehr Mein Aahista Padhi Toh Nahiñ.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Qirat Wagairah Kisi Mauqa Par Theher Kar Sochne Laga Toh Kya Hukm Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Ek Rukan Yaani Teen Bar SubhanallahKehne Ki Miqdar Waqfa (Theherna) Hua Toh Sajda e Sahw Wajib Hai.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Jis Par Sajda e Sahw Hona Wajib Tha Agar Sahw Hona Yaad Na Tha Aur Namaz Khatm Karne Ki Niyat Se Salam Pher Diya Toh Kya Kare?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Sahw Na Hona Yaad Na Tha Aur Salam Pher Diya Toh Abhi Namaz Se Bahar Nahiñ Hua Isiliye Jab Tak Kalam Wagairah Koi Phel Manafi e Namaz (Jo Namaz Ko Fasid Kare) Na Kiya Ho Sajda Kare Aur Phir Tashahud Wagairah Padh Kar Salam Pher De.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

Title: Agar Sunnat Aur Nafl Ka Qada (Baithak) Na Kiya Aur Bhool Kar Khada Ho Gaya Toh Kya Kare?
Content:
???????? ?
? *ILM E DEEN* ?
? *ISLAMIC KNOWLEDGE* ?

Part No : 85
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

اللھم افتح علینا حکمتک وانشر علینا رحمتک یاذالجلال والاکرام

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•
Sajda e Sahw Ka Bayaan
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Sunnat Aur Nafl Ka Qada (Baithak) Na Kiya Aur Bhool Kar Khada Ho Gaya Toh Kya Kare?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Sunnat aur Nafl Ka Har Qada (Baithak) Qada e Akheera Hai Yaani Farz Hai. Agar Qada Na Kiya Aur Bhool Kar Khada Ho Gaya Toh Jab Tak Us Rakat Ka Sajda Na Kare Laut Aaye Aur Sajda e Sahw Kare.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Qada e Akheera (Peechli Baithak) Mein Attahiyaatu wa Rasooluhu Tak Padhne Ke Baad Bhool Kar Khada Ho Gaya Toh Kya Kare?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Ba Qadre Tashahud Qada e Akheera Karne Ke Baad Bhool Kar Khada Ho Gaya Toh Jab Tak Us Rakat Ka Sajda Na Kiya Ho Laut Aaye Aur Dobara Attahiyaat Padhe Bagair Sajda e Sahw Kare. Phir Tashahud Bagair Padh Kar Salam Pher De.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Qada e Ula (Pehli Baithak) Mein Bhool Kar Durood Shareef Bhi Padh Liya Toh Kya Hukm Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar "Allahum'ma Salli Ala'Muhammadin" Ya "Allahum'ma Salli Ala Sayyedena" tak Padha Ya Is Se Zyada Padha Toh Sajda e Sahw Wajib Hai Aur Agar Issey Kam Padha Toh Nahi. Magar Yeh Hukm Sirf Farz, Witr Aur Zohar wa Juma Ki Pehli Char Rakat Wali Sunnatoñ Ke Liye Hai Rahe Deegar Sunan wa Nawafil Toh Unke Qada e Ula Mein Bhi Durood Shareef Padhne Ka Hukm Hai.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

Title: Farz Ya Witr Mein Qada e Ula (Pehli Baithak) Bhool Kar Teesri Rakat Ke Liye Khada Ho Raha Tha Ki Yaad Aa Gaya Toh Is Surat Mein Kya Kare?
Content:
???????? ?
? *ILM E DEEN* ?
? *ISLAMIC KNOWLEDGE* ?
???????? ?

Part No : 84
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

اللھم افتح علینا حکمتک وانشر علینا رحمتک یاذالجلال والاکرام

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•
Sajda e Sahw Ka Bayaan
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Farz Ya Witr Mein Qada e Ula (Pehli Baithak) Bhool Kar Teesri Rakat Ke Liye Khada Ho Raha Tha Ki Yaad Aa Gaya Toh Is Surat Mein Kya Kare?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Abhi Seedha Nahi Khada Hua Hai Toh Baith Jaaye Aur Sajda e Shaw Na Kare. Aur Agar Seedha Khada Ho Gaya Toh Na Laute Aur Aakhir Meiñ Sajda e Sahw Kare Aur Agar Lauta Toh Is Surat Meiñ Bhi Sajda e Sahw Wajib Hota Hai.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Ruku, Sajda Ya Qada Mein Bhool Kar Qur'an Padh Diya Toh Kya Hukm Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Is Surat Meiñ Bhi Sajda e Sahw Wajib Hai.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Farz Ka Qada e Akheera (Pichli Baithak) Nahiñ Kiya Aur Bhool Kar Khada Ho Gaya Toh Kya Kare?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Jab Tak Us Rakat Ka Sajda Na Kiya Ho Laut Aaye Aur Attahiyaat Padh Kar Dahini Taraf Salam Phere Aur Sajda e Sahw Kare. Aur Agar Us Rakat Ka Sajda Kar Liya Toh Sajda Se Sar Uthate Hi Woh Farz Nafl Ho Gaya Isiliye Agar Chahe To'alawa Maghrib Ke Doosri Namazoñ Meiñ Ek Rakat Aur Milaye Taaki Rakat Taq Na Rahe.

Title: Agar Mahina Do (2) Mahina Yaa Saal Do (2) Saal Ki Namazein Qaza Ho Jaye
Content:
Toh Niyat Kis Tarah Karni Chahiye?

Jawab:

Aisi Surat Mein Jo Namaz Jaise Zohar Ki Qaza Padhni Hai.

Toh Is Tarah Niyat Kare.

Niyat Ki Maine Char (4) Rakat Namaz Qaza Jo Mere Zimme Baqi Hai Unmein Se Pehle Zohar Farz Ki ALLAH Ta'ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Taraf Kaaba Shareef Ke ALLAHU AKBAR.

Aur Maghrib Ki Padhni Ho, Toh Yoon Niyat Kare.

Niyat Ki Maine Teen (3) Rakat Namaz Qaza Jo Mere Zimme Baqi Hai Unmein Se Pehle Maghrib Farz Ki ALLAH Ta'ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Taraf Kaaba Shareef Ke ALLAHU AKBAR.

Isi Tariqe Par Doosri Namazo Ki Niyato Ko Samajhna Chahiye

Title: Agar Paanch (5) Ya Isse Kam Namazein Qaza Ho
Content:
Toh Unhein Kab Padhna Chahiye?

Jawab:

Jis Shakhs Ki Paanch (5) Ya Usse Kam Namazein Qaza Ho Woh Sahbe Tarteeb Hai.

Us Par Lazim Hai Ki Waqti Namaz Se Pehle Qaza Namazein Bittarteeb Padhe.

Agar Waqt Mein Gunjaish Hote Huwe Waqti Namaz Pehle Padhli, Toh Na Hui.

Is Masla Ki Mazeed Tafseel Bahare Shari'at Mein Dekhni Chahiye!

Title: Taraweeh Namaz Ki Bees (20) Rakatein Kis Tarah Padhi Jayein?
Content:
Jawab:

Taraweeh Namaz Ki Bees (20) Rakatein Dus (10) Salam Se Padhi Jaayein.

Yaani Har Do (2) Rakat Par Salam Phere Aur Har Taraweeh Namaz, Yaani Char (4) Rakat Par Itni Der Baithna Mustahab Hai Ki Jitni Der Mein Char (4) Rakatein Padhi Hai!

Doo(2) Rakaat Fajr Ke Farz Se Pehle, Chaar(4) Rakaat Zohar Ke Farz Se Pehle Aur Doo(2) Rakaat Farz Ke Baad, Doo(2) Rakaat Magrib Farz Ke Baad, Doo(2) Rakaat Isha Farz Ke Baad, Chaar(4) Rakaat Juma Ke Farz Se Pehle Aur Chaar(4) Rakaat Juma Farz Ke Baad. Content:

? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ?

Part No : 69
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

اللھم افتح علینا حکمتک وانشر علینا رحمتک یاذالجلال والاکرام

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Namaaz Ke Andar Jo Baate Makruh Hai Unhe Bataye?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Kapde, Badan Ya Daadhi Ke Saat Khelna Kapda Sametna, Jaise Sajde Me Jaate Waqt Aage Ya Peeche Se Uthana Kapda Latkaana Yani Sar Ya Mundhe Par Iss Tarah Daalna Ki Doono Kanare Latakte Ho, Kis Aasteen Ka Aadhi Kalaayi Se Ziyaada Chadhaana, Daaman Samet Kar Namaaz Padhna, Shiddat(Zordaar) Ka Paakhana, Peshab Maloom Hote Waqt Ya Galbaye Riyaah Ke Waqt Namaaz Padhna Mard Ka Judha Baandhe Huwe Namaaz Padhna Ungliya Chatkaana, Ungliyo Ki Kainchi Baandhna Kamar Par Haath Rakhna, Idhar Udhar Muh Pheir Kar Dekhna, Aasman
Ki Taraf Nigah Uthaana. Tashahud Ya Sajdon Ke Darmiyan Kutte Ki Tarah Baithna, Mard Ka Sajde Me Kalaayiyo Ka Bichaana, Kisi Shaks Ke Muh Ke Samne Namaaz Padhna, Kapde Me Iss Tarah Lipat Jaana Ki Haat Bhi Baahar Na Ho. Pagdi Iss Tarah Baandhna Ki Beech Sar Par Na Ho Naak Aur Muh Ko Chipaana Bezarurath Khankaar Nikaalna, Bilkasd Jamaahi Lena Aur Khud Aaye Toh Harz Nahi, Jis Kapde Par Jaandaar Ki Tasweer(Photo) Ho Usko Pehen Kar Namaaz Padhna, Tasweer Ka Namaazi Ke Sar Par Yaani Chath Me Hona Ya Latka Hona Ya Sajda Karne Ki Jagah Me Hona Ki Uss Par Sajde Waaki Ho, Namaazi Ke Aage Ya Dahine Ya Baaye Ya Peeche Tasweer Ka Hona Jab Ki Latki Ho Ya Nasab Ho Ya Diwaar Wagairah Mankoosh Ho(Dewaar Par Khood Kar Ya Waise Hi Kisi Jaandaar Ki Tasweer Bani Hona) Ulta Qur’aan Majeed Padhna, Kisi Waajib Ko Tark Karna(Choodhna)Qiyaam Ke Alaawa Kisi Aur Mauqe Par Qur’aan Padhna Ruku Me Qirat Ko Khatm Karna, Imaam Se Pehle Muqtadi Ka Ruku Wa Sujood Wagairah Me Jaana Ya Usse Pehle Sar Uthaana Yeh Tamaam Baate Makruh Tehreemi Hai!

Title: Kin Cheezo Se Namaaz Faasid Ho Jaati Hai?
Content:
? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ?
? ILM E DEEN ?
? ISLAMIC KNOWLEDGE ?
? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ?

Part No : 68
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

اللھم افتح علینا حکمتک وانشر علینا رحمتک یاذالجلال والاکرام

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•
Namaaz Faasid Karne Waali Cheeze
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Kin Cheezo Se Namaaz Faasid Ho Jaati Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Kalaam Karne Se Khwaah Amdan(Jaanboojkar) Ho Ya Galti Ya Bhool Kar Apni Khushi Se Baat Kare Ya Kisi Ke Majboor Karne Par Behtar Surat Namaaz Jaati Rahegi. Zuban Se Kisi Ko Salaam Kare Jaan Kar Ya Bhool Kar Namaaz Faasid Ho Jaayegi Isi Tarah Zubaan Se Salaam Ka Jawaab Dena Bhi Naam Ko Fasid Kar Deta Hai, Kisi Ki Cheenk Ke Jawaab Me “Yarhamukallah” Kaha Ya Khushi Ki Khabar Sun Kar Jawaab Me “Alhamdulillah” Kaha Ya Tajub Me Daalne Waali Khabar Sun Kar Jawaab Me “Subhaanallah” Kaha Ya Buri Khabar Sun Kar Jawwab Me “Inna Lillahi Wa Inna Ilaihi Raajioon” Kaha Toh Inn Tamaam Mashkalo Me Namaaz Jaati Rahegi. Lekin Agar Khud Usi Ko Cheek Aayi Toh Hukm Hai Ki Chup Rahe Aur Agar “Alhamdulillah” Kahliya Toh Bhi Namaaz Me Haraj Nahi. Namaaz Padhne Waale Ne Apne Imaam Ke Alaawa Dusre Ko Luqma Diya(Yaad Dilaya) Toh Namaaz Faasid Ho Gayi. Isi Tarah Apne Muqtadi Ke Alaawa Dusre Ka Luqma Lena Bhi Namaaz Ko Faasid Kar Deta Hai, Aur Galat Luqma Dene Se Luqma Dene Waale Ki Namaaz Jaati Rehti Hai. “Allahu Akbar” Ki Alif Ko Kheench Kar “Aallahu Akbar” Ya Aakbar Ya Akbaar Kehna Namaaz Ko Faasid Kar Deta Hai. Isi Tarah “Allahu Akbar” Ki ‘Ra’ Ko ‘Da’ Padhne Se Namaaz Faasid Ho Jaati Hai. Aur “Nastaeen” Ko “Nastaaeen” Padhne Se Namaaz Jaati Rehti Hai, Aur Anamath Ki Ta Ko Zabar Ke Bajaay Zeir Ya Peish Padhne Se Namaaz Faasid Ho Jaati Hai. Aaah, Oh, Uf Tuf Dard Ya Musibath Ki Wajah Se Kaho Ya Aawaaz Ke Saath Roye Aur Huruf(Akshar) Paida Huwe Toh Inn Sab Surato Me Namaaz Jaati Rahegi Lekin Agar Mareez Ki Zubaan Se Beiqtiyaar ‘Aah Ya Oh’ Nikle Toh Namaaz Faasid Na Huwi Isi Tarah Cheenk, Khaansi, Jamaahi Aur Dakaar Me Jitne Huruf Majbooran Nikalte Hai Muaaf Hai. Daaton Ke Andar Khaane Ki Koyi Cheez Reh Gayi Thi Usko Nigal Gaya Agar Chane Se Kam Hai Toh Namaaz Makruh Huwi Aur Chane Ke Barabar Hai Toh Faasid Ho Gayi. Aurat Namaaz Padh Rahi Thi Bacche Ne Uski Chaathi Choosi Agar Doodh Nikal Aaya Toh Namaaz Jaati Rahi. Namaaz Ke Aage Se Guzarna Namaaz Ko Faasid Nahi Karta Khwah Guzarne Waala Mard Ho Ya Aurat Magar Guzarne Waala Saqt Gunahgaar Hota Hai. Hadees Shareef Me Hai Ki Namaazi Ke Aage Se Guzarne Waala Agar Janta Ki Iss Par Kya Gunah Hai Toh Zameen Me Dhans Jaane Ko Guzarne Se Accha Jaanta!

Title: Namaz Ki Sunnatein Kya Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Namaz Ki Sunnatein Ye Hai.

1) Tehreema Ke Liye Haath Uthaana Aur Haatho Ki Ungliyan Apne Haal Par Choodna.

2) Takbeer Ke Waqt Sar Na Jhukaana Aur Hatheliyo Aur Ungliyo Ke Peit Ka Qibla Rukh Hona.

3) Takbeer Se Pehle Haath Uthaana Isi Tarah Takbeer e Qunoot, Wa Takbeerat e Eidein Me Kaano Tak Haath Le Jaane Ke Baad Takbeer Kehna.

4) Aurato Ko Sirf Kandho (Mundho) Tak Haath Uthana.

5) Imam Ka Allahu Akbar, SamiAllahu liman Hamidah Aur Salaam Buland Awaaz Se Kehna.

6) Takbeer Ke Baad Haath Latkaaye Bagair Fauran Baandh Lena, Sana, Taouz, Tasmiya Padhna Aur Aameen Kehna Aur Inn Sab Ka Hona.

7) Pehle Sana Padhna, Fir Taouz Fir Tasmiya Aur Har Ek Ke Baad Dusre Ko Fauran Padhna.

8) Ruku Me Teen Baar Subhana Rabbial Azeem Kehna Aur Ghutno Ko Haatho Se Pakadna Aur Ungliyan Khoob Khuli Rakhna.

9) Aurato Ko Ghutno Par Haath Rakhna Aur Ungliya Kushaada (Khuli) Na Rakhna.

10) Haalate Ruku Me Taange Seedhi Hona.

11) Ruku Ke Liye Allahu Akbar Kehna.

12) Ruku Me Peet Khoob Bichi Rakhna.

13) Ruku Se Uthne Par Haath Latka Huwa Choodh Dena.

14) Ruku Se Uthne Me Imam SamiAllahu liman Hamidah Kehna.

15) Muqtadi Ko Rabbana Lakalhamd Kehna Aur Akele Ko Doono Kehna.

16) Sajde Ke Liye Aur Sajde Se Uthne Ke Liye Allahu Akbar Kehna.

17) Sajde Me Kam Se Kam Teen Baar Subhana Rabbial Aala Kehna.

18) Sajda Karne Ke Liye Ghutna, Phir Haath, Phir Naak, Phir Peshani (Matha) Zameen Par Rakhna.

19) Aur Sajde Se Uthne Ke Liye Pehle Peshani (Matha), Phir Naak, Phir Haath, Phir Ghutna Zameen Se Uth aana.

20) Sajde Me Baazu Karwato Se Aur Peit Raano Se Alag Hona Aur Kutte Ki Tarah Zameen Par Kalayiya Na Bichaana.

21) Aurato Ka Baazu Karwato Se Peit Raano Se Raan Pindaliyo Se Aur Pindaliya Zameen Se Mila Dena.

22) Doono Sajdo Ke Darmiyan (Beech) Tashahhud Ki Tarah Baithna Aur Haatho Ko Raano Par Rakhna.

23) Sajdo Me Haatho Ki Ungliyo Ka Qibla Rukh Hona Aur Mili Huwi Na Hona Aur Paawo Ki Dus Ungliyo Ke Peit Zameen Par Lagana.

24) Dusri Rakaat Ke Liye Panjo Ke Bal Ghutno Par Haath Rakh Kar Uthna,

25) Qaida Me Baaya Paaw Bichaakar Doono Sureen (Khula) Uspar Rakh Kar Baithna.

26) Dahina (right) Pair Khada Rakhna Aur Dahine (right) Pair Ki Ungliyan Qibla Rukh (Qible Ki Taraf) Karna.

27) Aurat Ko Doono Paaw Dahini (right) Taraf Nikaal Kar Baaye Sureen (Khula) Par Baithna.

28) Dahina (right) Haath Dahini (right) Raan Par Aur Baaya (left) Haath Baayi (left) Raan Par Rakhna Aur Ungliyo Ko Apni Halath Par Choodhna.

29) Shahaadath Par Ishara Karna.

30) Qaida-E-Aakhira Me Tashahhud Ke Baad Darood Shareef Aur Dua-E-Masoora Padhna.

Title: Namaz Ke Wajibat Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Namaz Ke Wajibat Yeh Cheezein Hai.

Takbeer-E-Tehreema Mein Lafz e Allahu Akbar Hona.

Alhamdu Padhna,

Farz Ki Doo Pehli Rakato Mein Sunnat, Nafl Aur Witr Ki Har Rakaat Me Alhamdu Ke Saat Surat, Ya Teen Chooti Aayat Milaana,

Farz Namaz Mein Doo Pehli Rakato Me Qirat Karna,

Alhamdu Ki Surat Se Pehle Hona Har Rakaat Mein Surat Se Pehle Ek Hi Baar Alhamdu Padhna,

Alhamdu Wa Surat Ke Darmiyan Kisi Ajnabi Ka Fasil Na Hona.

Qirat Ke Baad Fauran Ruku Karna,

Sajde Mein Doono Paawo Ke Teen Teen Ungliyo Ka Peit Zameen Par Lagana.

Doono Sajde Ke Darmiyan Koi Rukn Fasil Na Hona,

Taadil Arkaan,

Qauma, Yaani Ruku Se Seedha Khada Hona,

Jalsa, Yaani Doono Sajdon Ke Darmiyan Seedha Baithna.

Qaida-E-Oola Mein Tashahhud Ke Baad Kuch Na Padhna,

Har Qaida Mein Poora Tashahhud Padhna,

Lafz e Assalaam Doo Baar Kehna,

Witr Mein Dua-E-Qunoot Padhna,

Takbeer e Qunoot,

Eidein Ki Chaaron Takbeere,

Eidein Mein Dusri Rakaat Ki Takbeer-E-Ruku Aur Uss Takbeer Ke Liye Lafze Allahu Akbar Hona,

Har Zaahiri Namaz Mein Imam Ko Zaahir Se Qirat Karna Aur Gair Zaahiri Me Aahista,

Har Wajib Aur Farz Ka Uski Jagah Par Hona,

Ruku Ka Har Rakaat Mein Ek Hi Baar Hona Aur Sujood Ka Doo Hi Baar Hona,

Dusre Se Pehle Qaida Na Karna Aur Chaar Rakaat Waali Mein Teesri Par Qaida Na Hona,

Aayat e Sajda Padhi, Toh Sajda-E-Tilawat Karna Aur Sajda E Sahu Ho.

Toh Sajda-E-Sahu Karna.

Doo Farz, Ya Doo Wajib, Ya Wajib Farz Ke Darmiyan Teen Tasbeeh Ki Miqdaar Wakfa Na Hona,

Imam Jab Qirat Kare Buland Aawaz Se Khwaah Aahista Uss Waqt Muqtadi Ka Chup Rehna Aur Siwaaye Qirat Ke Tamaam Wajibat Mein Imam Ki Pairwi Karna!

Title: Namaz Ka Tarika Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Namaz ka tarika / Namaz Padhne Ka Tarika Ye Hai Ki Bawuzu Qiblaruk Doono Paawon Ke Panjo Me Chaar Ungliyo Ka Faasla Karke Khada Ho.

Aur Doono Haath Kaan Tak Le Jaaye Ki Angoothe Kaan Ki Lou Se Chu Jaaye.

Iss Haal Me Ki Hatheliyan Qibla Rukh Ho.

Phir Niyat Kare.

Allahu Akbar Kehte Huwe Haath Neeche Laakar Naaf Ke Neeche Baandhle Aur Sana Padhe.

“SUBHANAKALLAAHUMMA WA BIHAMDIKA WA TABAARA KASMUKA WA TA AALA JADDUKA WALA ILAAHA GAIRUKA”. 

Phir Taouz padhe.

Yaani ‘AWUZU BILLAHI MINASH SHAITAAN NIRRAJEEM’

Phir Tasmiyah padhe.

Yaani ‘BISMILLAH HIRRAHMAAN NIRRAHEEM’ Padh Kar ALHAMDU Padhe Aur Aameen Aahista Kahe.

Uske Baad Koyi Surat Ya Teen Aayate Padhe, Ya Ek Aayat Jo Ki Chooti Teen Aayaton Ke Barabar Ho.

Ab Allahu Akbar Kehta Huwa Ruku Me Jaaye Aur Ghutno Ko Haath Se Pakad Le.

Iss Tarah Ki Hatheliya Ghutno Par Ho, Ungliya Khoob Pheli Ho, Peeth Bichi Ho Aur Sar Peeth Ke Baraabar Ho Ooncha Neecha Na Ho.

Aur Kam Se Kam Teen Baar “SUBHANA RABBIAL AZEEM” Kahe.

Phir “SAMIALLAAHU LIMAN HAMIDAH” Kehte Huwe Seedha Khada Ho Jaaye.

Aur Akele Namaz Padhta Ho Toh Uske Baad “RABBANA LAKAL HAMD” Kahe.

Phir Allahu Akbar Kehta Huwa Sajde Me Jaaye.

Iss Tarah Ki Pehle Ghutne Zameen Par Rakhe.

Phir Haath, Phir Doono Haatho Ke Beech Me Naak, Phir Peshaani Rakhe.

Iss Tarah Ki Peshaani Aur Naak Ki Haddi Zameen Par Jamaaye Aur Baazoun Ko Karwato Aur Peit Ko Raano Aur Raano Ko Pindhliyo Se Juda Rakhe.

Aur Doono Paawon Ki Sab Ungliya Qiblaru Ho Aur Kam Se Kam Teen Baar “SUBHANA RABBIAL AALA” Kahe.

Phir Sar Uthaye, Phir Haath Aur Dahina Qadam Khada Karke Uski Ungliya Qiblarukh Kare Aur Baaya Qadam Bicha Kar Uss Par Khoob Seedha Bait Jaaye.

Aur Hatheliya Bichakar Raano Par Ghutno Ke Paas Rakhe.

Phir Allahu Akbar Kehta Huwa Sajde Me Jaaye Aur Pehle Ki Tarah Sajda Karke Phir Sar Uthaye, Phir Haatho Ko Ghutno Par Rakh Kar Panjo Ke Bal Khada Ho Jaaye.

Ab Sirf ‘BISMILLAH HIRRAHMAAN NIRRAHEEM’ Padh Kar Qirat Shuru Kare.

Phir Pehle Ki Tarah Ruku Sajda Karke Baaya Qadam Bicha Kar Bait Jaaye Aur Attahiyat Padhe.

“ATTAHI YATULILLAHI WASSALAWATU WATTAIBAATU ASSALAAMU ALAIKA AYYUHANNABIYYU WA RAHMATULLAHI WA BARKA TAHU ASSALAAMU ALAINA WA AALA IBAADILLAHISSALIHEEN ASHHADU ALLAAILAAHA ILLALAAHU WA ASHHADU ANNA MUHAMMADAN ABDUHU WA RASSOLUHU”

Attahiyat Padhte Huwe Jab Kalimaye “LAA” Ke Qareeb Pahunche.

Toh Dahine Haath Ke Beech Ungli Aur Angoothe Ka Halka Banaye Aur Changuliya Aur Uske Paas Waali Ko Hatheli Se Milaade.

Lafze “LAA” Par Kalima Ki Ungli Uthaye.

Magar Usko Hilaaye Nahi Aur Kalimaye “ILLA” Par Gira De Aur Sab Ungliya Fauran Seedhi Karle.

Ab Agar Doo Se Ziyada Rakat Padhni Hai.

Toh Uth Khada Ho Aur Iss Tarah Padhe.

Magar Farzo Ki Unn Rakato Me ALHAMDU Ke Saat Surat Milana Zaruri Nahi.

Ab Pichla Qaida (Baithak) Jiske Baad Namaz Qatam Karega, Uss Me Attahiyat Ke Baad Darood Shareef Padhe.

“ALLAHUMMA SALLE ALA SAYYADINA MUHAMMADIN WA AALA AALI SAYYADINA IBRAHEEMA WALAA ALI SAYYADINA IBRAHEEMA INNAKA HAMEEDUMMAJEED, ALLAAHUMMA BAARIK ALA SAYYADINA MUHAMMADIN KAMA BAARAKTA ALAA IBRAHEEMA WA AALA IBRAHEEMA INNAKA HAMEEDUMMAJEED”!

Title: Maghrib Namaz Ke Waqt Kul Kitni Rakat Namaz Padhi Jaati Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Maghrib Namaz Ke Waqt Kul Saath (7) Rakat.

Pehle Teen (3) Rakat Farz. 

Phir Doo (2) Rakat Sunnat. 

Phir Doo (2) Rakat Nafl!

Maghrib Namaz Ke Waqt Teen (3) Rakat Farz Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jayegi ?

Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Teen (3) Rakat Namaz Farz Maghrib Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye (Muqtadi Itna Aur Kahe Peeche Iss Imam Ke) Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Maghrib Namaz Ke Waqt Doo (2) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat Kaise Kare ?

Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Sunnat Maghrib Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Sunnat Rasoolullah Ki Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Maghrib Namaz Ke Waqt Doo (2) Rakat Nafl Ki Niyat Kaise Kare ?

Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Nafl Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Asr Namaz Ke Waqt Kul Kitni Rakat Namaz Padhi Jaati Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Asr Namaz Ke Waqt Kut Aath (8) Rakat Namaz Padhi Jati Hai.

Pehle Chaar (4) Rakat Sunnat. 

Phir Chaar (4) Rakat Farz!

Asr Namaz Ki Chaar (4) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jayegi ?

Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Sunnat Asr Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Sunnat Rasoolullah Ki Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Asr Namaz Ki Chaar (4) Rakat Farz Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jayegi ?

Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Farz Asr Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye (Muqtadi Itna Aur Kahe Peeche Iss Imam Ke) Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Baliga Aurat Ke Aage Ke Maqam Se Jo Khoon Aadi Taur Par Nikalta Hai Aur Bimari Ya Bachcha Paida Hone Ke Sabab Se Na Ho Toh Usey Haiz Kehte Hai, Uski Muddat Kam Se Kam Teen Din Aur Zyada Se Zyada Dus Din Hai, Issey Kam Ya Zyada Ho To Bimari Yaani Istihaza Hai, Aur Bachcha Paida Hone Ke Baad Jo Khoon Aata Hai Usey Nifas Kehte Hai, Nifas Mein Kami Ki Janib Koi Muddat Nahi Aur Zyada Se Zyada Uska Zamana Chalees Din Hai Chalees Din Ke Baad Jo Khoon Aaye Woh Istihaza Hai!

Haan Juzdan Mein Qur'an Majeed Ho Toh Us Juzdan Ke Chhune Mein Harj Nahi!

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•
Najasat Ka Bayaan
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Najasate Galeeza Badan Ya Kapde Par Lag Jaye Toh Kya Hukm Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Najasate Galeeza Ek Dirham Se Zyaada Lag Jaye Toh Uska Pak Karna Farz Hai Ki Bagair Pak Kiye Namaz Padh Li Toh Namaz Hogi Hi Nahi, Aur Agar Najasate Galeeza Ek Dirham Ke Barabar Lag Gaye Toh Uska Pak Karna Wajib Hai Ki Bagair Pak Kiye Padh Li Toh Namaz Makrooh Tehreemi Hui Yaani Aisi Namaz Ko Dobara Padhna Wajib Hai Aur Agar Najasate Galeeza Ek Dirham Se Kam Lagi Hai Toh Uska Pak Karna Sunnat Hai! Ki Bagair Pak Kiye Namaz Padh Li Toh Ho Gayi Magar Khilafe Sunnat Hui Aisi Namaz Ka Dobara Padhna Behtar Hai!
? Bahare Shari'at

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Najasate Kh'fifa Lag Jaye Toh Uska Kya Hukm Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Najasate Kh'fifa Kapde Ya Badan Ke Jis Hisse Mein Lagi Hai Agar Uski Chawthai Se Kam Hai! Maslan Daman Mein Lagi Hai Toh Daman Ki Chawthai Se Kam Hai Ya Aasteen Mein Lagi Hai Toh Uski Chawthai Se Kam Mein Lagi Hai Toh Mua'af Hai Aur Agar Puri Chawthai Mein Lagi Ho Toh Bagair Dhoye Namaz Na Hogi!

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Kapde Mein Najasat Lag Jaye Toh Kitni Bar Dhone Se Pak Hoga?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Agar Najasat Daldar Hai Jaise Pakhana Aur Gobar Wagairah Toh Uske Dhone Mein Koi Ginti Muqarrar Nahi Balki Usko Door Karna Zaroori Hai Agar Ek Bar Dhone Se Door Ho Jaye Toh Ek Hi Martaba Dhone Se Pak Ho Jayega Aur Agar Char Paanch Martaba Dhone Se Door Ho Toh Char Paanch Martaba Dhona Padhega! Haan Agar Teen Martaba Se Kam Mein Najasat Door Ho Jaye Toh Teen Bar Pura Kar Lena Behtar Hai, Aur Agar Najasat Patli Ho Jaise Pehsaab Wagairah Toh Teen Martaba Dhona Aur Teen Martaba Quwat Ke Saath Nichawdhne Se Kapda Pak Ho Jayega!

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Najasate Galeeza Kya Cheezein Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Insaan Ke Badan Se Aisi Cheez Nikle Ki Ussey Wazu, Ya Gusl Wajib Ho Jata Ho Toh Woh Najasate Galeeza Hai Jaise Pakhana, Peshaab, Behta Khoon, Peep, Munh Bar Qai Aur Dukhti Aankh Ka Paani Wagairah, Aur Haraam Chaupaye Jaise Kutta, Sher, Lomdhi, Billi, Chuha, Gadha, Kachchar, Hathi Aur Suwar Wagairah Ka Pakhana Peshaab Aur Ghode Ki Leed Aur Har Halal Chaupaye ka Pakhana Jaise Gaay, Bhains Ka Gobar Bakri Aur Ounth Ki Mengni, Murgi Ya Batakh Ki Beeth, Hathi Ke Sundh Ki Ratubat Aur Sher Kutta Wagairah Darinde Chaupayo Ka Lu'aab Yeh Sab Najasate Galeeza Hai! Aur Doodh Peeta Ladka Ho Ya Ladki Unka Peshaab Bhi Najasate Galeeza Hai!

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Najasate Kh'fifa Kya Cheezein Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Jin Janwaron Ka Gosht Halal Hai Jaise Gaay, Bail, Bhains, Bakri Aur Bhed Wagairah Inka Peshaab Neez Ghode Ka Peshaab Aur Jis Parind Ka Gosht Haraam Ho Jaise Kawwa, Cheel, Shikra, Baaz Aur Behri Wagairah Ki Beeth Yeh Sab Najasate Kh'fifa Hai!

Nahi, Jin Paaniyon Se Wazu Jaiz Hai Unse Gusl Bhi Jaiz Hai Aur Jin Paaniyon Se Wazu Na-Jaiz Hai Gusl Bhi Na-Jaiz Hai!

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Gusl Karne Ka Tariqa Kya Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Gusl Karne Ka Tariqa Yeh Hai Ki Pehle Gusl Ki Niyat Karke Dono Hath Gatto Tak Teen Bar Dhoye Fir Istinja Ki Jagah Dhoye Uske Baad Badan Par Agar Kahi Najasat Haqeeqeeya (हक़ीक़ीया) Yaani Peshaab Ya Pakhana Wagairah Ho Toh Usey Door Kare Fir Namaz Jaise Wazu Kare Magar Paau Na Dhoye Haan Agar Chawki Ya Patthar Wagairah Unchi Cheez Par Nahaye Toh Paau Bhi Dhole! Iske Baad Badan Par Tel Ki Tarah Paani Chipde Fir Teen Bar Dahine Kandhe Par Paani Bahaye Aur Fir Teen Bar Baaye Kandhe Par Fir Sar Par Aur Tamam Badan Par Teen Bar Paani Bahaye Tamam Badan Par Hath Fere Aur Male Fir Nahane Ke Baad Fauran Kapde Pehen Le!

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Gusl Mein Farz KyaHai?

Gusl Mein Teen Baatein Farz Hai Kulli Karna, Naak Mein Sakht Haddi Tak Paani Chadana, Tamam Zaahir Badan Par Sar Se Paau Tak Paani Bahana!

Ghusl Mein Sunnat Kya Hai?

Ghusl Mein Yeh Baatein Sunnat Hai!

Ghusl Ki Niyat Karna,

Dono Hath Gatton Tak Teen Bar Dhona!

Intinja Ki Jagah Dhona!

Badan Par Jaha Kahi Najasat Ho Usey Door Karna!

Namaz Jaisa Wazu Karna!

Badan Par Tel Ki Tarah Paani Chupadna!

Dahine Modhe (मोढे) Fir Baaye Modhe (मोढे) Fir Sar Par Aur Tamam Badan Par Teen Bar Paani Bahana.

Tamam Badan Par Hath Ferna Aur Malna!

Nahana Mein Qibla Rukh Na Hona Aur Kadpe Pehen Kar Nahana Ho Toh Koi Harj Nahi!

Aisi Jagah Nahana Ki Koi Na Dekhe!

Nahate Waqt Kisi Qism Ka Kalam Na Karna!

Koi Duaa Na Padhna!

Auraton Ko Baithkar Nahana!

Nahane Ke Baad Fauran Kapde Pehen Lena!

Content:

Part No : 27
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

الصــلوة والسلام عليك يارسول الله ﷺ ‌‎

اللھم افتح علینا حکمتک وانشر علینا رحمتک یاذالجلال والاکرام

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•
WAZU KA BAYAAN
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Wazu Mein Kitni Baatein Makrooh Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Wazu Mein Ikkees (21) Baatein Makrooh Hai.
Aurat Ke Gusl Yaa Wazu Ke Bache Huwe Paani Se Wazu Karna.
Wazu Ke Liye Najis Jagah Baithna, Najis Jagah Wazu Ka Paani Girana, Masjid Ke Andar Wazu Karna, Wazu Ke Aaza Se Bartan Mein Qatre Tapakna, Paani Mein Reenth (रींठ) या Khnkar (खंकार) Dalna, Qibla Ki Taraf Thook Ya Khnkar (खंकार) Yaa Kulli Karna. Be-Zaroorat Duniya Ki Baatein Karna, Zaroorat Se Zyaada Paani Kharch Karna, Paani Is Qadr Kam Kharch Karna Ki Sunnat Ada Na Ho, Munh Par Paani Maarna, Munh Par Paani Dalte Waqt Funkna, Sirf Ek Hath Se Munh Dhona, Gale Ka Masah Karna, Baayein Hath Se Kulli Karna Yaa Nak Mein Paani Dalna, Dahine Hath Se Naak Saaf Karna, Apne Liye Koi Lota Wagairah Khas Kar Lena, Teen Naaye Paaniyon Se Teen Bar Sar Ka Masah Karna Jis Kadpe Se Istinja Kaa Paani Khushk (खुश्क) Kiya Ho Usse Aazaey (आज़ाए) Wuzu Pochhna, Dhoop Ke Garm Paani Se Wazu Karna, Kisi Sunnat Ko Chhod Dena.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Kitne Cheezon Se Wazu Tooth Jaata Hai?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Pakhana Yaa Peshaab Karna, Pakhana Peshaab Ke Raste Se Kisi Aur Cheez Ka Nikalna, Pakhana Ke Raste Se Hawa Ka Nikal Jaana, Badan Ke Kisi Muqam Se Khoon Yaa Peep Nikalkar Aisi Jagah Bahna Ki Jiska Wazu Ya Gusl Mein Dhona Farz Hau, Khana Paani Yaa Safra Ki Mumh Bhar Qai (क़ै) Aana, Is Tarah Soo Jaana Ki Jism Ke Joodh Dheele Pad Jaaye, Behosh Hona Zunoon Hona, Gashi Hona, Kisi Cheez Ka Itna Nasha Hona Ki Chalne Mein Pau Ladh'khadaye, Ruku Aur Sajda Wali Namaz Mein Itni Zaur Se Hasna Ki Aas Paas Wale Sunein, Dikhti Aankh Se Aansu Bahna, In Tamam Baaton Se Wazu Tooth Jaata Hai.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Wazu Mein Teen Cheez Farz Hai. Awwal Munh Dhona Yaani Baal Nikalne Ki Jagah Se Dhadhi Ke Neeche Tak Aur Ek Kaan Ki Lau Se Doosre Kaan Ki Lau Tak Doosre Kuhniyon Samet Dono Hath Dhona Teesre Chawthai Sar Ka Masah Karna Yaani Bheega Hua Hath Ferna Chawthe Dono Pau Takhno Samet Dhona

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Haa Bid'at Ka Hasna Aur Sayyeaa Hona Hadees Se Bhi Saabit Hai Tirmizi Shareef Mein Hai Ki Hazrate Umar Farooqe Aazam Razi'Allahu Ta'aala Anhu Ne Taraweeh Ki Baqaida Jama'at Kaim (काइम) Karne Ke Baad Farmaya Ki Yeh Bahut Achchi Bid'at Hai
? *Mishqat Safa 115*

Aur Muslim Shareef Mein Hazrate Jareer Razi'Allahu Ta'aala Anhu Se Riwayat Hai Ki Rasool e Kareem Alaihis'salatu Was'salam Ne Farmaya Ki Jo Islam Mein Kisi Achche Tareeqa Ko Raij Karega Toh Usko Apne Raij Karne Ka Bhi Sawaab Milega Aur Un Logon Ke Amal Karne Ka Bhi Sawaab Milega Jo Uske Baad Is Tareeqa Par Amal Karte Rahege Aur Amal Karne Walon Ke Sawab Mein Koi Kami Bhi Na Hogi Aur Jo Shakhs Mazhab e Islam Mein Kisi Bure Tareeqa Ko Raij Karega Toh Us Shakhs Par Uske Raij Karne Ka Bhi Gunaah Hoga Aur Un Logon Ke Amal Karne Ka Bhi Gunaah Hoga Jo Uske Baad Us Tareeqa Par Amal Karte Rahege Aur Amal Karne Walon Ke Gunaah Mein Koi Kami Bhi Na Hogi
? *Mishqat Safa 33*

Khuda e Ta'aala Ke Zaat wa Sifat Mein Kisi Ko Shareek Therana Shirk Hai. Zaat Mein Shareek Therane Ka Matlab Yeh Hai Ki Do Yaa Do Se Zyaada Khuda Mane Jaise Isaai Ki Teen Khuda Maan Kar Mushrik Huwe Aur Jaise Hindu Ki Kai Khuda Manne Ke Sabab Mushrik Hai. Aur Sifat Mein Shareek Therane Ka Matlab Yeh Hai Ki Khuda e Ta'aala Ki Sifat Ki Tarah Kisi Doosre Ke Liye Koi Sifat Saabit Kare Maslan Sunna Aur Dekhna Wagairah Jaisa Ki Khuda e Ta'aala Ke Liye Bagair Kisi Ke Diye Zaati Taur Par Saabit Hai Usi Tarah Kisi Doosre Ke Liye Sunna Aur Dekhna Wagairah Zaati Taur Par Mane Ki Bagair Khuda Ke Diye Use Yeh Siftein Khud Hasil Hai Toh Shirk Hai Aur Agar Doosre Ke Liye Atai Taur Par Mane Ki Khuda e Ta'aala Ne Use Yeh Siftein Ata Ki Hai Toh Shirk Nahi Jaisa Ki ALLAH TA'AALA Ne Khud Insaaf Ke Baare Mein Para 29 Ruku 19 Mein Farmaya Jiska Tarjuma Yeh Hai Ki "Hamne Insaan Ko Sunne Wala, Dekhne Wala Banaya"

Title: Marne Ke Baad Zinda Hone Ka Matlab Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Marne Ke Baad Zinda Hone Ka Matlab Yeh Hai Ki Qiyamat Ke Din Jab Zameen, Aasmaan, Insaan Aur Farishte Wagairah Sab Fana Ho Jayenge.

Toh Fir Khuda e Ta'ala Jab Chahega Hazrat Israfeel Alaihissalam Ko Zinda Farmayega Woh Dobara Soor Fokenge Toh Sab Cheeze Maujood Ho Jaayegi.

Farishte Aur Aadmi Wagairah Sab Zinda Ho Jayenge.

Murde Apni Apni Qabron Se Uthenge.

Hashr Ke Maidan Mein Khuda e Ta'ala Ke Samne Peshi Hogi.

Hisaab Liya Jayega Aur Har Shakhs Ko Achche Bure Kaamo Ka Badla Diya Jayega.

Yaani Achcho Ko Jannat Milegi Aur Buron Ko Jahannam Mein Bhej Diya Jayega.

Hisaab Aur Jannat wa Dozakh Haq Hai.

Unka Inkaar Karne Wala Kafir Hai.

Title: Taqdeer Kise Kehte Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Duniya Mein Jo Kuch Hota Hai Aur Bande Jo Kuch Bhalai (भलाई) Burai (बुराई) Karte Hai.

Khuda e Ta'aala Ne Usey Apne Ilm Ke Mu'aafiq Pehle Se Likh Liya Hai.

Usey Taqdeer Kehte Hai.

•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Hamare Nabi Kaun Hai? Unka Kuch Haal Bayaan Kijiye?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Hamare Nabi Hazrat Muhammad Mustafa Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Hai, Jo 12 Rabi'ul Awwal Mutabiq 20 April San 571 E. Mein Makka Shareef Mein Paida Huwe Unke Walid Ka Naam Hazrate Abdullah Aur Walida Ka Naam Hazrate Aamina (Razi'Allahu Ta'aala Anhuma) Aap Ki Zahiri Zindagi Tirsat (63) Baras Ki Hui Tirpan (53) Baras Ki Umr Mein Makka Shareef Mein Rahe Fir Dus (10) Saal Madeena Taiyiba (तैयिबा) Mein Rahe 12 Rabi'ul Awwal San 11 Hijri Mutabiq 12 June San 632 E. Mein Wafat Payi, Aapka Mazare Mubarak Madeena Shareef Mein Hai Jo Makka Shareef Se Taqreeban 320 Kilometer Uttar Hai.

•┈┈┈┈••✦✿✦••┈┈┈┈•

•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Kya Hamare Nabi (Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam) Zinda Hai?

•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Hadees Shareef Mein Hai Ki Sarkare Aqdas (Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam) Ne Farmaya Ki Khudaye Ta'aala Ne Zameen Par Ambiya e Kiraam Alaihimus'Salam Ke Jismo Ko Khana Haram Farma Diya Hai. Toh ALLAH Ke Nabi Zinda Hai Rozi (रोज़ी) Diye Jaate Hai.

Title: Zarooriyat e Deen Kya Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Zarooriyat e Deen Bahut Hai.

Unmein Se Kuch Yeh Hai Ki Khuda e Ta’aala Ko Ek Aur Wajibul Wujood Manna,

Uski Zaat wa Sifat Mein Kisi Ko Shareek Na Samajhna,

Zulm Aur Jhooth Wagairah Tamam Aibon Se Usko Paak Manna,

Uske Malaika Aur Uski Tamam Kitabon Ko Manna,

Quran Majeed Ki Har Aayat Ko Haq Samajhna,

Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Aur Tamam Ambiya e Kiraam Ki Nabuwwat Tasleem Karna,

In Sabko Azmat Wala Janna,

Unhein Zaleel Aur Chota Na Samajhna,

Uski Har Baat Jo Qatai Aur Yaqeeni Taur Par Saabit Ho Usey Haq Manna.

Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ko Khatmun Nabiyyeen Manna,

Unke Baad Kisi Nabi Ke Paida Hone Ko Jayiz na Samajhna.

Qiyamat, Hisaab wa Kitab, Jannat wa Dozakh Ko Haq Manna.

Namaz, Roza, Zakat Aur Hajj Ki Farziyat Ko Tasleem Karna.

Zina, Choori Aur Sharab Naushi Wagairah Haram e Qatai Ki Hurmat Ka Aeteqad Karna Aur Kafir Ko Kafir Janna Wagairah.

Shirk Kise Kehte Hai?

Jawab:

Shirk Usey Kehte Hai Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Alawa Kisi Doosre Ko Wajibul Wuzood Yaa Ibadat Ke Layaq Mana Jaaye.

Yaani Khuda e Ta’aala Ke ALLAH Aur Mabood Hone Mein Kisi Doosre Ko Shareek Kiya Jaaye Aur Yeh Kufr Ki Sabse Buri Qism Hai.

Title: Imaan Kise Kehte Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Imaan Use Kehte Hai Ki Sachche Dil Se Un Tamaam Baaton Ki Tasdeeq Kare, Jo Deen Ki Zarooriyat Mein Se Hai.

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

? Sawal :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Hamare Nabi Ki Kuch Khoobiya Bayaan Kijiye?

✍ Jawab :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Hamare Nabi Hazrat Muhammad Mustafa Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ke Alawa Doosre Nabiyon Ko Ek Khaas Qaum Ke Liye Bheja Gaya Aur Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Tamam Makhlooq, Insaano, Jino, Farishton, Haiwanat, Jamadaat Sab Ke Liye Bheje Gaye. Jis Tarah Insaan Ke Zimme Huzoor Ki Ita’at Farz Aur Zaroori Hai Usi Tarah Har Makhlooq Par Huzoor Ki Farmabardaari Farz Aur Zaroori Hai. Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Khatimun Nabiyeen Hai, ALLAH TA’AALA Ne Nabuwwat Ka Silsila Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Par Khatm Kar Diya, Huzoor Ke Zamane Mein Yaa Un Ke Baad Koi Nabi Nahi Ho Sakta. ALLAH TA’AALA Ki Tamam Makhlooqat Se Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Afzal Hai, Ki Aauron Ko Jo Kamalaat Diye Gaye Huzoor Mein Woh Sab Ikaththa Kar Diye Gaye Aur Unke Alawa Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ko Woh Kamalaat Mile Jin Mein Kisi Ka Hissa Nahi Balki Aauron Ko Jo Kuch Mila Huzoor Ke Tufail Mein Balki Huzoor Ke Mubarak Haathon Se Mila. Huzoor Jaisaa Kisi Ka Hona Muhaal Hai. Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ko ALLAH TA’AALA Ne “MEHBOOBIYATE KUBRA” Ka Martaba Diya Hai Yaha Tak Ki Tamam Makhlooq ALLAH TA’AALA Ki Raza Chahti Hai Aur ALLAH TA’AALA Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ki Raza Chahta Hai. Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ne ALLAH Ka Jamaal Apne Sar Ki Aankhon Se Dekha Aur ALLAH Ka Kamaal Bina Kisi Zariye Ke Suna Aur Zameen wa Aasmaan Ke Har Zarre Ko Tafseel Se Dekha. Qiyamat Ke Din Shafa’ate Kubra Ka Martaba Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ke Saath Khaas Hai. Huzoor Ki Farmabardari ALLAH TA’AALA Ki Farmabardari Hai. Huzoor Sayyedul Ambiya Hai Yaani Ambiya e Kiraam Ke Sardar Hai Aur Tamaam Ambiya Huzoor Ke Ummati Hai.

بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

ALLAH TA'AALA Ke Baare Mein Kaisa Aqeeda Rakhna Chahiye?

✍ Jawab (1) :
•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

ALLAH TA'AALA Ek Hai Koi Uska Shareek Nahi. Aasmaan, Zameen Aur Saari Makhlooqat Ka Paida Karne Wala Wahi Hai. Wahi Ibadat Ke Layeq Hai Doosra Koi Ibadat Ke Layeq Nahi. Woh Hamesha Se Hai Aur Hamesha Rahega, Usey Kabhi Maut Nahi Aayegi. Sabki Zindagi Usi Ke Dast-e-Qudrat Mein Hai Woh Jisey Jab Chahe Zindagi De Aur Jab Chahe Maut De. Ameeri Garibi Aur Izzat wa Zillat Sab Usi Ke Ikhtiyaar Mein Hai, Jisey Chahta Izzat Deta Aur Jisey Chahta Zillat Deta Hai. Uska Har Kaam Hikmat Hai Bandon Ki Samajh Mein Aaye Yaa Naa Aaye. Woh Har Kamaal Wa Khoobi Waala Hai. Jhooth, Dagaa, Khyaanat, Zulm Aur Jahal Wagairah Se Paak Hai. Uske Ke Liye Kisi Aib (ऐब) Ka Manna Kufr Hai. Woh Naa Kisi Ka Baap Hai Aur Naa Kisi Ka Beta Aur Naa Hi Uske Liye Koi Biwi Hai.

Title: Muharram Me Islami Naye Saal Ki Mubarakbad Dena Kaisa Hai?
Content:
Kuch log kehte he ki isme Imam e Hussain radiallahu anhu ki shahadat hai to gam manana chahiye mubarak baad nahi deni chahiye.

Iski kya asl hai ?

Jawab:

Islamic naya saal Muharram ul Haram se shuru'a hota hai, or ye mahina sog wa gam manane ka nahi hai.

Balki barkato or rahemato ka mahina hai Or islami naye saal ki mubarak baad dene me koi harj nahi.

Agar koi sunni dusre sunni ko mubarak baad deta hai to ma'azAllah Imam E Hussain ki shahdat par nahi.

Balki naye mahine ke aamad ki khushi me deta hai.

<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script>
<ins class="adsbygoogle"
     style="display:block"
     data-ad-format="fluid"
     data-ad-layout-key="-gw-3+1f-3d+2z"
     data-ad-client="ca-pub-8429140506595796"
     data-ad-slot="8955849965"></ins>
<script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
</script>

Naye saal ki mubarak baad dene wala is baat par khush hota hai ki Allah ne hame zindagi ka ek or saal bhi dikha diya hai.

Jisme hame tauba or nek amal kamane ki mazeed mauqa mayassar aa sakta hai.

Is liye naye saal ki mubarak baad dene me koi harj nahi.

Ek musalman par dusre musalman ke jo 6 huquq hai, unme se ek ye hai ki jab use khushi pahunche to use mubarak baad de.

Hazrat abdullah bin hussham radiallahu allahu anhu ki riwayat jise imam tabrani ne al-awsat me darj kiya usme vo farmate hai.

Naye saal ya mahine ki aamad pe sahaba e kiram radiallahu Allahu anhum ek dusre ko ye dua sikhate the.

Aye Allah hame is mahine me aman, iman salamati, or islam ke sath dakhil farma. Shaytan ke hamlo se bacha or rahman ki raza mandi ata farma.

(Al-Tibrani, Al-Awsat : 6241)

Or jo Log Kahte he ki is mahine me imam e Hussain Radiallahu anhu ko yazeed paleed ne zulmo sitam kiye or shaheed kiya is liye mubarak baad nahi dena chahiye. Wo log zara ise bhi padhe.

Allah Rabbul Izzat Quran majeed me irshad farmata hai ki,

Jo khuda ki Raah me Maare jaye unhe murda na kaho balki wo zinda hai, Haan Tumhe khabar nahi.

(SURA E BAQAR, AAYAT-154)

Or jo Allah ki Raah me Maare gaye Hargiz unhe murda na khayal karna.

Balki wo apne rab ke paas zinda hai rozi pate hai.

(SURA E AALE IMRAN, AAYAT-169)

Is aayat se awwal to ye hi sabit ho gaya ki jo shaheed huwe woh isi tarah ALLAH ke yaha zinda hai, bas is duniya wale ko iska sha'ur nahi.

Aur hadees me to hai ki kisi ki maut par 3 din se zyada gham na kare.

Agar shaheedo ki maut ko maut samajh kar gham bhi kiya jaye, to woh bhi is duar me mumkin nahi.

Kyunki hadees me gham ke din sirf 3 bataye gaye hai, jab shohda e karbala ko aaj 1300 se zyada ho gaye.

Fakhr is baat par karna chahiye ki jin yazeediyo ne us daur me islam ki roshni ko bujana chaha use us jannat ke nau-jawano ke sardar Hazrat Imam Hussain Radiyallahu anhu ne apne khoon se us chirag ko jalaya aur islam ki roshni bakshi.

Jinki badolat aaj hum tak aasani se islam pahucha hai.

Huzur Sallallahu Alaihi wasallam irshad farmate hai ki

Shaheed ko qatl ki bas itni hi taklif hoti hai jitni chinti ke katne se hoti hai. 

Warna maut ki taklif ke bare me riwayat hai ki kisi ko agar 1000 talwar ke zakhm diye jaaye to uski taklif maut ki taklif se kahi zyada halki hogi or Allah ke yaha use 6 inamat diye jate hai.

(SHARAHUSSUDOOR, SAFA-31)

Huzur Sallallahu Alaihi wasallam ne 3 din se zyada shog manane se mana farmaya hai.

(BUKHARI SHAREEF, J-2, S-804)

(MISHKAT SHAREEF, J-1, S-486)

Title: Rafzi firqa Maa Ayesha Siddiqua رضي الله تعالي عنها Ki Shaan me Gustakhi karte Hai.
Content:
Maa Ayesha Siddiqua رضي الله تعالي عنها Ki Shaan E Aqdas Pe Roshani Daale Aur Hame Bhi Apne Ilm se Nawaze.

Jawab:

Ummahaat ul Mo'mineen Me Hazrat Aaisha Siddeeqa رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــها hi aisi khatoon hain jinki wilaadat Islami Maahaul me hui aur Islami Sheer se apki parwarish hui.

Aur aphi wo Tayyiba o Taahira hain ke jo Huzoor ﷺ ke ilawa kisi aur ke Nikah me na raheen.

Aur Huzoor ﷺ ne is Nikah ko Min Jaanibillah qarar diya tha.

Bukhari Sharif me hai Huzoor ﷺ ne irshad farmaya.

"Mardo me bahot se log Takmeel ke darje ko pohche, magar Aurato ke Andar sirf Maryam bint Imran Aur Aasiya Zawja e Far'aun hi takmeel ko pohchi, aur Aaisha ko to sab aurato par aisi fazeelat hai jaise Sareed ko sab khaano par hai". 

Bukhari Sharif hi me hai ke Huzoor ﷺ ne irshad farmaya ke.

"Ek Aaisha hi hai ke mai uske bistar pe hota hu to us waqt bhi wahi ka nuzool hota hai. Magar dosri Azwaaj ke bistaro par kabhi aisa na hua".

Isi liye Huzoor e Aqdas ﷺ ne Saiyyeda Fatimatuzzahra رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــها se farmaya.

"Pyari beti! Jisse Mai Muhabbat rakhta hu, kya tum usse muhabbat nahi rakhti ?

Arz kiya zarur karti hu.

Irshad farmaya ke tu bhi Aaisha se Muhabbat rakha kar".

Hazrat e Aaisha siddeeqa رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــها ke Kamalaat e Aaliya par ye Hadees bhi dalalat karti hai ke Nabi ﷺ ne Hazrat Aaisha se Farmaya.

"Ye jibr'eel hain aur tum ko salam kehte hain, Hazrat Aaisha ne salam ke jawab me Farmaya un par bhi Allah ki salamati o Rahmat ho".

Gazwa e Badr me jis nishan ke Neeche Malaaika ne khidmat e islam ada ki aur jis nishan par Allah ki Awwaleen Nusrat o Fatah Nazil hui.

Wo Nishan Hazrat e Aaisha ki Orhni ka banaya gaya tha.

Ye baat bhi Apki Badi Fazeelat ko zahir karti hai.

Ek Gazwa me apki sawari kuch der se camp me pohchi to us par Munafiqeen ne unki shan e paak me gustakhaana kalimaat kahe, jinse lateef o sinf e nazuk ke liye aisa mauqa sakht pareshan kun hota hai.

Lekin us waqt bhi unki quwwat e imaniyah aur paaki e fitrat ki ajeeb shan nazar aayi.

Khud farmati hain ke mujhe apni paak daamani ki waja se yaqeen e kamil tha ke meri taharat o pakeezgi ke baare me Huzoor ﷺ ko khwab me bata diya jayega.

Magar iska mujhe gumaan bhi na tha ke mere haq me wahi e Ilaahi ka nuzool hoga.

Ulama e kiram farmaate hain ke Hazrat Yusuf Alaihissalam ko doodh peete bachche aur Hazrat Maryam ko Hazrat Isa Alaihissalam ki gawahi se logo ki badgumani se nijaat bakhshi aur jab Hazrat e Siddeeqa Aaisha رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــها par bohtaan utha to khud unki paak daamani ki Shahadat Allah ﷻ ne di aur 17 aayatein naazil Farmayi.

Agar wo chahta to ek ek darakht aur patthar se gawahi dilwata.

Magar manzoor ye hua ke Mahboba e Mahboob ki Tahaarat o paak daamani par khud Allah ﷻ shahadat de aur unki izzat o imtiyaz padhaaye.

Quran e paak utra Maula e kareem ﷻ ne Siddeeqa ki nusrat farmaayi, be qusoori zahir farmaayi, unko Taiyyeba Thehraya aur khabar di ke Magfirat aur Rizq e kareem unhi ke liye hai.

Garz ye wo zaat hai ke jinki pakeezgi aur pak daamani ki awaz se zameen o Asman goonj uthe aur wahi utri jiski qiyamat tak Namazo me aur Mehraabo me tilawat ki jayegi.

Phir jo Tafaqqoh unho ne deen me paya aur jo tableeg unho ne ummat ko farmayi aur Ilm e Nubuwwat ki isha'at me jo koshishein unho ne farmaayi aur jo ilmi khazane aur ganjeene unho ne farzandaan e ummat e marhooma ko pohchaaye.

Wo aisi fazeelat hai, jo azwaaj e mutahharat me se kisi dosri ummul momineen ko naseeb nahi.

Kutub e ahadees me apki riwayat ki Ta'dad 2210 hai, fatawa e sharaiyyah aur ilmi daqaaiq ka hal aur dosri ilmi khidmaat ka shumar inke ilawa hai.

Jo Hazrat e Aaisha Siddeeqa Taiyyeba Taahira رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــها ki shan me gustakhiyaan karte hain wo bil waasta Huzoor e Aqdas ﷺ ke Gustah hain Aur apki paaki Ka to Rab e kareem ﷻ ne eylaan farmaya.

Phir unpar keechad uchaalna Aayaat e kareema ko jhutlana hua, jo ke sakht hukm rakhta hai.

Allah ﷻ Hame Aise Shareero ke shar se bachaaye Aur Ahl e Bait e At'haar o jumla sahaba e kiraam رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــهم اجمعین ka adab o Ta'zeem hamare dilo me Jaaguzeen farmaaye.

Title: Mufti Akhtar Raza Khan Sahab Ka Maqam o Martaba Kiya Hai
Content:
Is Par Roshni Daal De Aur Zaid Ye Kehta Hai Ke Aaj Kal Ke Jadeed Masail Par Un Ki Nazar Nahi Aur Woh Juziat se Waqif Nahi.

Toh Aaj Kal Ke Masail Ke Liye Jadeed Jawan Mufti Se Rehnumai Leni Chahiye.

Kiya Zaid Ka Aisa Kehna Durust Hai ?

Jawab:

Huzoor Tajushshariah Hadrat Allama Mufti Akhtar Raza Khan Saheb Daamat Fuyoozuhum wo Abqari Shakhsiyat Hain Ke Jinhe Tareekh Dhoondti Hai Ke In Jaisa Dosra Koi Ek Hi Use Apne Daaman Me Mil Jaaye.

Yaad Rakhiye Ke Koi Kisi Fann Ka Imam Hota Hai.

To Koi kisi Ilm Ka Maahir.

Lekin Tajushshariah Har Ilm, Har Fann Ke Aftab o Mahtab Hain.

Bila Shubah Alahazrat Ka Faizaan e Ilmi Aap Ki Shakhsiyat Me Anwaar o Tajalliyat ki Surat me Chhalak Raha Hai.

Aap Sirf Barakaat o Fuyoozat Ke Hi Nahi.

Balke Uloom e Raza Ke Bhi Waaris o Ameen Hain.

Bahot Hi Ta'jjub Ka Maqam Hai Ke Kuch Na Aqibat Andesh Ilmi Baisaakhiyo Par Chal Kar Apne Langde Loole Toote Phoote Naaqis Ilm Se Mahez Apni Zaati Anaaniyat Ki Taskeen Aur Bugz o Inaad o Hasad o Fasad Ki Aag Ke Sho'lo Ka Luqma Bante Hue.

Is Zaat e Giraami Ko Taulne ki Koshish Karte Aur Apni Raaye Ka Bebaakana Izhaar Karte Hue Jis Ki Fahem o Zakawat, Maharat e Taamma, Fiqh me Tabahhur o Isaabat o Quwwat Ka Loha Duniya Ne Maana Aur Unki Ilmiyat Ka Sikka o Haibat Duniya e Arab o Ajam ke Ulama Par Musallam Hai.

Aur Rahi Ye Ilzam Tarashi Ke Aap Ko Masail e Jadeeda Par Uboor Nahi.

To Ise Mahez Deewane Ki Barr Ke Siwa Kuch Nahi kaha Jaa Sakta.

Jis Ka Ilm Qur'an o Sunnat Se Mustafaad o Maakhuz Ho Wo Har Fann Ka Imam Hota Hai.

Kyu Ke Qur'an Tamam Uloom Ka Sar Chashma Hai.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr Shibli rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Alqaab: Taaj-ul-Auliya, Qutb-ul-Aarifeen.

Aapki wiladat 247 Hijri (861 A.D.) me Samarra (Iraq) me hui.

Aapke waalid ka naam Yunus hai.

Aapke pariwaar ka watan Khorasan ka Shibla gaanv tha.

Aapka bachpan Baghdad me guzra.

Aap 30 saal tak Hadees aur Fiqh ki ta’aleem haasil karte rahe.

Aapne Hazrat Imam Maalik ki ‘Muwatta’ ko hifz kiya.

Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr Shibli rahmatullahi alaihi Nihawand ke governer the.

Ek baar Khalifa ne apne tamaam governer ko apne mahel me ek mehfil me bulaya, jisme wo apne ek khaas aur qareebi shakhs ko ek ilaake ka governor ka ohada dene wale the.

Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr Shibli bhi is mehfil me saamil hue.

Khalifa ne us shakhs ko governer ka qeemati kapda diya.

Us naye governer ko jukhaam ho jaane ki wajah se jaldi me use apna naak saaf karne ke liye us qeemati kapda Istemal karna pada.

Khalifa yeh dekhkar ghussa ho gaya.

Use laga ke ye meri tauheen hai aur us ne fauran use governer ke ohade se barkhaasht kar diya.

<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script>



<!-- Display ad -->




<ins class="adsbygoogle" style="display: block;" data-ad-client="ca-pub-8429140506595796" data-ad-slot="1692437615" data-ad-format="auto" data-full-width-responsive="true"></ins>
<script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
</script>

Aapne yeh sab dekha to fauran khayal aaya ke “Ek chhoti si galti ki wajah se khalifa ne is shakhs ko governer ke ohade se mehroom kar diya. Aur hum to Maalik e Kaa'inaat Rabbul aalameen ki na-farmaani karte rehte hain aur gunaah karte rehte hain.”

Aap governer ka ohada chhodkar durwesho ki sohbat me rehne lage.

Aapne bahot saare Sufi mashaa'ikh ki sohbat me rehkar faiz hasil kiya.

Aakhir me aap Hazrat Khair-un-Nassaaj rahmatullahi alaihi ke shaagird bane.

Kuchh arse tak unki sohbat me taaleem hasil karne ke baad unke farmaan par aap Hazrat Junaid al-Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi ki baargaah me gaye.

Unho ne aapko kai saal tak apni sohbat me rakhkar taaleem mukammal ki.

Hazrat Junaid al-Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi Aap se bahot mohabbat karte the.

Aap Waaqif-e-Rumooz-e-Khafi wa Jali the.

Aap hamesha saadgi pasand farmaate the aur akṡar waqt tanhai me guzaarte.

Aap puri raat jaagkar Ibadat o Riyazat karte.

Ek baar Aap ne wuzu ke waqt miswak talaash kiya magar na mila.

Aap ne ek deenaar kharch karke dusra mishwak khareeda.

Logo ne kaha “Aap ne mishwak itna mahenga kyun khareeda?”

Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr Shibli rahmatullahi alaihi ne farmaya “Yeh dunya aur uski har cheez ALLAH ta’ala ke nazdeek machchhar ke baraabar bhi nahi hai. Agar Qayamat ke din ALLAH mujhse sawaal kare ke Tum ne mere mehboob Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ki sunnat ko kyun chhoda, maine jo maal tumhe ata kiya tha uski qeemat machchhar ke barabar bhi nahi thi. Phir tum ne use sunnat ada karne ke liye kyun kharch nahi kiya to main kya jawab dunga?”

Hazrat Abu Bakr ibn Mujahid apne zaamane ke bahot bade wali aur Imam hain.

Aapki taqreer sunne ke liye bahot badi taadad me ulama jama hote the.

Ek martaba Hazrat Abu Bakr Shibli unki mehfil me pahunche to wo fauran adab ke saath khade ho gaye Aur phir aage aakar mohabbat ke saath aapse gale mile aur aapki peshaani ko chuma.

Yeh dekhkar mehfil me se ek shakhs ne khade hokar arz kiya “Huzoor! Aapne is shakhs ki ta’azeem wa takreem kyun ki?”

<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script>



<!-- Display ad -->




<ins class="adsbygoogle" style="display: block;" data-ad-client="ca-pub-8429140506595796" data-ad-slot="1692437615" data-ad-format="auto" data-full-width-responsive="true"></ins>
<script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
</script>

Hazrat Abu Bakr ibn Mujahid ne farmaya “Aye logo! Maine iske saath wo hi kiya hai, jo Huzoor Rasool-Allah Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ko iske saath karte dekha tha.”

Phir aapne aage farmaya “Ek baar maine khwab me dekha ki Huzoor Rasool-Allah Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ki mubarak mehfil saji hui hai. Aur jab Hazrat Abu Bakr Shibli mehfil me tashreef laaye to Huzoor Rasool-Allah Sallallahu alaihi wassallam khade ho gaye aur aage aakar unki peshaani ko chuma.

Maine arz kiya: ‘Ya Rasool-Allah Sallallahu alaihu wassallam, Aap inse itni zyada mohabbat ke saath sulook kyun kar rahe hain?’

Huzoor Rasool-Allah Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ne faramaya: ‘Yeh har namaz baad "Laqad jaa’akum rasoolum" aur "Fa'in tawallaw fa hasbiyallāh". (Surah al-Taubah, Aayat 128-129) tilawat karta hai aur phir 3 martaba ‘Sallallahu alaika Ya Rasool-Allah’ padhta hai.”

Aqwaal:
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr Shibli rahmatullahi alaihi irshad farmate hain:

(1) Yeh dunya ek aisa bartan hai jisme paani ubal raha hai aur jo uski khubsurti kharab kar raha hai.

(2) Apne sha'oor par qaaboo rakhna aur apni saanso ki hifazat karna Tasawwuf ki haqeeqat hai.

(3) Kisi ne Aapko Tasawwuf ke baare me puchha to aap ne farmaaya ‘Apne dil ko makhlooq aur duniyawi cheezo se door karke Khaaliq e kaa'inaat ki taraf pher dena ye 'Tasawwuf' hai.’

(4) Khuda shanaas kabhi Khuda ke siwa kisi se nahi milta aur jo aisa karte hain woh Khuda ko hargiz nahi paa sakte.

Aarif wo hi hai jo na to Khuda ke siwa kisi ka mushaahida kare, na kisi se mohabbat aur baat kare aur na kisi ko apne nafs ka muhaafiz tasawwur kare.

(5) ALLAH ta’ala ki mohabbat aag jaisi hai. Jis tarah aag har cheez ko pighla deti hai, usi tarah ALLAH ki mohabbat ki aag dil ko jalaaye to uski nishani ke taur par aankho se aansoo aane chahiye.

(6) Bure logo ki sohbat ki nahusat se nek bando ke baare me bad gumaani (galat khayaal) paida hoti hai.

Aap Hazrat Shaikh Junaid al-Baghdadi rahmatullāhi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr Shibli rahmatullahi alaihi ke khulfa:

(1) Hazrat Shaikh Abul Fazl Abdul Azeez bin Haaris Yemeni al-Tameemi rahmatullahi alaihi,
(2) Hazrat Shaikh Abul Hasan Neemalam al-Husri rahmatullahi alaihi,
(3) Hazrat Shaikh Muhammad Zojjaaj rahmatullahi alaihi.

Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr Shibli rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 27 Zil Hijjah 334 Hijri (946 A.D.) ko Shabe Juma ke 87 saal ki umr me hua.

Aap ka mazaar Khayrazan, Baghdad (Iraq) me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Shaikh Abu Bakr Shibli rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se sabko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sabke imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sabko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye.

Aur Sabko dunya wa akhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sabki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Alqaab: Shaikh-ul-Islaam, Shaikh-ul-Shuyukh.

Aapki wilaadat Shabaan 539 Hijri (1145 A.D.) me Suharward (Iran) me hui.

Aapke waalid ka naam Mohammad bin Abdullah al-Bakari hai.

Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi Hazrat Abu Bakr Siddiq radiy-Allahu ta’ala nahu ki nasl se hain.

Aap Hazrat Shaikh Abul Najib Abdul Qaahir Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi ke bhatije hain.

Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi ke waalidain ko koi aulaad nahi thi. Ek baar Aapki waalida Hazrat Ghaus e azam Abdul Qadir Jilani radiallahu anhu ki baargaah me hazir hui, To unko aulaad ke liye dua karne ke liye arz kiya.

Hazrat Ghaus e azam radiallahu anhu ne dua ki aur farmaaya “Tumhare yaha ALLAH ta’ala ka khaas aur muqarrab banda aane waala hai.”

Aapne Suharward me bunyaadi ta’aleem haasil ki. Phir majeed ta’aleem ke liye Baghdad gaye.

Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi ne Hazrat Ghaus e azam Shaikh Sayyed Abdul Qadir Jilani radiallahu anhu se ta’aleem haasil ki.

560 Hijri (1162 A.D.) me Hazrat Ghaus e azam radiallahu anhu ne Aapko khilafat ata farmayi.

Inke ilaawa aapne Hazrat Shaikh Abul Najib Abdul Qaahir Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi, Hazrat Shaikh Najm-ud-deen Ahmad al-Kubra rahmatullahi alaihi aur deegar mashaa'ikh se bhi ta’aleem aur faiz haasil kiya.

Kuch waqt Abbadan jazeere me Abdaalo ki sohbat me rehkar aapne faiz haasil kiya.

Aap Qur’an, Hadeeṡ, Fiq'h, Ilm e Istdalaal, Kalaam ke maahir the.

Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi Shafi'i aur Hanbali mazhab ke maahir the.

Aapne kai martaba Hajj e Baitullah ada kiye.

628 Hijri (1231 A.D.) me aapne apne sahabzaade Shaikh Imaad-ud-deen Mohammad ke saath aakhri Hajj ada kiya.

563 Hijri (1165 A.D.) me Hazrat Abul Najib Abdul Qaahir Suharwardi ke wisaal ke baad aapne Khaanqaah ki zimmedaari samhali.

Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi talba ke liye 3 naye Ribat (Hostel) banaaye:

(1) Ribat-e-Nasri,
(2) Ribat-e-Bistami,
(3) Ribat-e-Mamoonia.

Khalifa al-Nasir ne Aapko ‘Shaikh-ul-Shuyukh’ ka khitaab ata kiya.

Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi ki shohrat dunya ke tamaam ilaaqe me phaili hui thi.

Alag alag ilaaqo me se bahot badi ta’adaad me log aapse mulaaqat ke liye aate the aur utni hi ta’adaad me log aapko khat likhte the.

Aap hamesha saadgi ke saath zindagi guzaarte the.

Roz hazaaro log aapko nazraana ata farmaate the, magar aap wo tamaam maal ghareebo aur mohtaajo me taqsim kar dete.

Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi ki likhi hui kitaabo me ‘Awaarif-ul-Ma’arif’ mash'hoor hai.

<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script>

<script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
</script>

Aqwaal:
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi irshad farmaate hai:

(1) Ilm ki 3 qismen hain :

a) Ilm-e-Tauhid - ALLAH subhan wa ta’ala ki wahaadaniyat ka ilm,
b) Ilm-e-Ma’arifat - ALLAH subhan wa ta’ala ki sifaat wa qudrat ka ilm,
c) Ilm-e-Shariat  - ALLAH subhan wa ta’ala ke akhaam wa arkaan ka ilm.
Aur in teeno raaste par safar karne waale aur un ke maqaam alag alag hote hain.

(2) Dunya me 2 cheezen hi amal ke liye behtar hain :

a) Faqeero ki sohbat rehna aur
b) Auliya Allah ki ta’azeem karna.

Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi ke 3 saahbzaade hain :

(1) Shaikh Zain-ud-deen.
(2) Shaikh Imaad-ud-deen Mohammad [Wisaal 655 Hijri (1257 A.D.)].
(3) Shaikh Jamaal-ud-deen.

Aap Hazrat Shaikh Zia-ud-deen Abul Najeeb Abdul Qaahir Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain.

Hazrat Gaus e azam Shaikh Sayyed Mohiy-ud-deen Abdul Qadir Jilani radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu se bhi Aapko khilafat ata farmai hai.

Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi ke khulfa:

(1) Hazrat Shaikh Imaad-ud-deen Mohammad rahmatullahi alaihi
(2) Hazrat Khwaja Baha-ud-deen Zakariya Multani rahmatullahi alaihi
(3) Hazrat Khwaja Qaazi Hameed-ud-deen Muhammad Farooqi Nagori rahmatullahi alaihi
(4) Hazrat Meer Sayyed Noor-ud-deen Mubarak Ghaznawi rahmatullahi alaihi
(5) Hazrat Shaikh Jalaal-ud-deen Muhammad Tabrizi rahmatullahi alaihi
(6) Hazrat Sayyed Meer Nizaam-ud-deen rahmatullahi alaihi (Baghdad)
(7) Hazrat Shaikh Nooh Bhakari Sindhi rahmatullahi alaihi
(8) Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Ahmad urfe Sultaan Sakhi Sarwar rahmatullahi alaihi
(9) Hazrat Shaikh Zia-ud-deen Rumi rahmatullahi alaihi (Delhi)
(10) Hazrat Shaikh Majd-ud-deen Muhammad Haaji Jajermi rahmatullahi alaihi
(11) Hazrat Shams-ul-Aarifeen Shaah Turkaman Biyabaani Dehlawi rahmatullahi alaihi
(12) Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Qaazi Shahaab-ud-deen bin Muhammad al-Husaini rahmatullahi alaihi
(13) Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Moiz-ud-deen Abdaal Sandailwi rahmatullahi alaihi
(14) Hazrat Shaikh Meer Sayyed Ala-ud-deen Jawarri rahmatullahi alaihi
(15) Hazrat Shaikh Sharf-ud-deen Iraqi rahmatullahi alaihi
(16) Hazrat Shaikh Muhammad Ibraheem Ansaari rahmatullahi alaihi
(17) Hazrat Shaikh Ahmad bin Zain Multani rahmatullahi alaihi
(18) Hazrat Shaikh Sulaiman bin Abdullāh al-Abbaasi al-Hashmi rahmatullahi alaihi
(19) Hazrat Shaikh Muslih-ud-deen Sa’adi Shirazi rahmatullahi alaihi
(20) Hazrat Shaikh Najeeb-ud-deen Ali bin Buzghash Shirazi rahmatullahi alaihi
(21) Hazrat Shaikh Shams-ud-deen Safi Shirazi rahmatullahi alaihi
(22) Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Muhammad Shujah Mash'hadi rahmatullahi alaihi
(23) Hazrat Shaikh Shaah Sharf-ud-deen Mahmood bin Husain Tastari rahmatullāhi alaihi (Shoukara / Iran)
(24) Hazrat Shaikh Muhammad Yemeni rahmatullahi alaihi
(25) Hazrat Shaikh Ahmad rahmatullahi alaihi (Damascus / Syria)
(26) Hazrat Shaikh Najm-ud-deen al-Taflisi rahmatullahi alaihi (Baghdad / Iraq)
(27) Hazrat Shaikh Sayyed Muhammad Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi
(28) Hazrat Shaikh Rasheed-ud-deen Muhammad bin Abul Qaasim al-Maqri al-Baghdadi rahmatullahi alaihi
(29) Hazrat Shaikh Ahmad al-Faarooqi al-Kabuli rahmatullahi alaihi
(30) Hazrat Shaikh Izz-ud-deen Abul Abbaas Ahmad al-Faarooqi rahmatullahi alaihi
(31) Hazrat Shaikh Auhad-ud-deen Haamid bin Abul Fakhr Kirmani rahmatullahi alaihi
(33) Hazrat Shaikh Abdul Azeez urfe Urjun Shaah Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi
(34) Hazrat Makhdoom Kamaal-ud-deen Yahyā Maneri rahmatullahi alaihi
(35) Hazrat Shaikh Shaah Ni'amatullāh Wali Faarsi rahmatullahi alaihi.

Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 1 Moharram 632 Hijri (1234 A.D.) me hua.

Aapki namaz e janaza Hazrat Auhd-ud-deen Haamid Kirmani rahmatullahi alaihi ne padhai.

Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Baghdad (Iraq) me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Shaikh Shahaab-ud-deen Umar Suharwardi rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se Sabko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sabke imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sabko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye Aur Sabko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyabi ata farmaye aur Sabki nek jaayez murado ko puri farmaye.
Aameen.

Title: Agar Koi Shakhs 40 Days Dhadi Ko Nahi Kaate Phir Baad Me Usko Tarashwale
Content:
Matlab Saaf Karle To Uspar Kya Gunah Hoga?

Wo Shakhs Ki Niyat Nahi Thi Dhadi Rakhne Ki.

Jawab Inayat Farmaye Jazakllah Khaira

Jawab:

Aisa Shakhs Faasiq E Molin Hai.

Title: Ek Saksh Dhadi Mundwata Hai Aur Photo Graphy se Parhez Karta Hai
Content:
To Sharai Dhadi Rakhna Photo Graphy se Zyada Zaruri Hai.

Ya photo Graphy se Bachna Zyada Zaruri hai ?

Dono Me Se Konse Amal per Pehle Dhayan Aur Gour o Fikr Ki Jayegi ?

Rehnumai Farmaye....

Jawab:

Kisi Gunah Ko Kamtar Samajhna Bahot Bada Gunah Hai.

Balke Kufr Bhi Ho Sakta Hai.

Har Gunah Ke Kaam Se Bachna Laazim Hai.

Is Tarah Ki Baatein Na Ki Jaayein Ke Mai To Usse Kam Wala Gunah Karta Hu

معاذ اللّٰہ

Baher Haal! Tasweer Banana Banwana Haraam Sakht Haraam.

Jab Ke Daarhi Baar Baar Katwana Yaani Is Ki Aadat Banana Bhi Haraam Hai.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Iddat poori hone ke baad nikah mein lautana chaahe to kya halala bhi karna hoga?
Content:
Jawab:

Iddat puri hone ke baad agar biwi banana chahe to Nikah karna hoga halala ki zarurat nahi.

Title: Kya hum kisike kale jadu ka shikar ho sakte hai ?
Content:
Yaani puchhne ka maqsad ye tha ki kya hamko, yaa hamare ghar, yaa karobar kisi bhi chiz ko, koi jadu ki wajah se nuksan pohcha sakta hai ?

Agar aisa hai to hame ise kaise chhutkara mil sakta hai ?

Aur agar nahi hota to fir hame kai ilm ke jaankar aisa kyu batate hai ?

Jawab:

Jadu haq hai aur jadu ka shikar koi shakhs ho sakta hai.

Usse bachne ke liye Surah Falaq Aur Surah Naas ki Tilawat karein Aur Damm karein.

Khususan Raat ko sote waqt.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Khwab me billi aur billi ke bahut sare bachche dekhe.
Content:

To wo 3-4 bachche legaya aur baki bachcho ko maar dalne Bola.

Is khwab ki tabir achchi hai ya buri.

Jawab:

Maal par Alamat hai.

Aur Maal me khiyanat hone ki bhi dalalat hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Humne Ek Bani Hui Ghar Kharida Hain. Takriban 3 Saal Ho Gaye.
Content:
Jisme Takriban 2 Saal Koi Problem Nahi Tha.

Lekin Ab Ek Saal Se Koi Na Koi Bimar Rehta Hai.

Chhat Pe Awaaz Aati Hain. Darwaza Pitne Ki Awaaz do Teen Baar Aayi Hain.

Aur Kabhi Kabhi Meri Ammi Ko Ghar Ke Kisi Afrad Ke Awaaz Me Awaaz Se Bulata Hain.

Ammi Ko 4 Mahine Se Bukhar Nahi Ja Raha Hain Aur Bhi Bahot Kuchh Ghar Me Kisi Na Kisi Ke Sath Hota Rahta Hai.

Hazrat Aisa Kiya Hai Aur Hame Kya Karna Chahiye.

Jisme 41 Deen Surah BaQarah Shareef Ki Tilawat Bhi Karwaya.

Ghar Ki Bandis Bhi Karwai Aur Khatme Qadriya Bhi Karwaya?

Huzoor Koi Aisa Tarika Baatye Jis Me Kamyabi Mile.

Please Bahot Bahot Pareshan Hu.

Aap Ki Bari Mehrbani Hogi.

Jawab:

Namaz o Roze Ki Pabandi Karein Aur Har Namaz Ke Baad Hisaar E Qadri Parh Kar Hisaar Kar Liya Karein.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Jo Nabiyo Ko Murda Kahe Wo khud Murda Hain
Content:
Shafa e Mehshar (Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam) Wisaal e Zahiri Ke Baad Rouza e Athar Main Zinda Hain.

Hazrat Umar (RadiAllahu Anhu) Ne Farmaya- "Ke Khuda Ki Qasam! Jisne Bhi Ye Baat Kahi Aur Maine Suni Ke "Huzoor-E-Akdas (Sallallahu Alahi Wassallam)" Ka Wisaal Hua Hai, Uski Gardan Apni Talwar Se Uda Dunga.
(Tirmizi: 378 Sahih)

Hazrat Kya Ye Hadis Mukammal Nahi Hai.

Is Ke Baad Hazrath Siddique Akbar Ne Kya Kaha? Ye Janna Tha.

Jazak'Allahu Khaira

Jawab:

Hazrat e Siddiq e Akbar رضی اللّٰــه تعالیٰ عنــــــــہ Ne Farmaya Ke Waaqai Huzoor ﷺ Wisaal Farma Gaye Aur Aap Ne Ye Ayat e Kareema Tilawat Farmaayi
وما محمدالا رسول .... الخ

--------------------------------------------------

Title: Nabi Aur Rasool Kise Kehte Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Nabi Us Aadmi Ko Kehte Hai Jiske Paas ALLAH TA’ALA Ne Makhlook Ki Hidayat Ke Liye Wahi Bheji Ho.

Aur Rasool Us Insaan Ko Kehte Hai, Jo Khuda Ke Yaha Se Bandon Ki Hidayat Ke Liye Un Ke Paas Khuda Ka Paigaam Laaye.

Aur Apne Saath Koi Aasmani Kitaab Bhi Lekar Aaye.

Fir Hazrat Musaa Alaihissalam Ka, Fir Hazrat Isaa Alaihissalam Aur Hazrat Nooh Alaihissalam Ka Martaba Hai.
