Title: Muharram Shareef Me Kiye Jane Wale Khilaf-E-Shar'a Kamo'n Ki Nishan Dahi Farmaye?
Content:
Jawab: Shaikhul Hadees Hazrat Allama Abdul Mustafa Irshad Farmate Hai:

Dhol Tasha Bajana, Taziyo'n Ko Matam Karte Huwe Gali Gali Phirana, Sino Ko Hatho'n, Ya Zanjiron, Ya Chhuriyo (Knifes) Se Pit Pit Kar Aur Mar Mar Kar Uchhalte Kudte Huwe Matam Karna.

Taziyo'n Ki Tazim Ke Liye Taziyo'n Ke Samne Sajdah Karna.

Taziyo'n Ke Niche Ki Dhool Utha Utha Kar Bataur E Tabarruk Chehron, Saro'n Aur Sino Par Malna.

Apne Bachcho (Childs) Ko Muharram Ka Faqeer Bana Kar Muharram Ki Niyaz Ke Liye Bheek Mangwana.

Sog/Gham Manane Ke Liye Khas Qism Ke Kale Kapde Pehen Kar Nange Sar Nange Paunw (Legs) Girebaan Khule Huwe, Ya Girebaan Phaad Kar Gali Gali Bhage Phirna Waghaira Waghaira Qism Ke Lughwiyat Aur Khurafat Ki Rasme Jo Musalmano Me Pheli Huwi Hai.

Ye Sab Mamnu O Najaiz Hai Aur Ye Sab Zamana-E-Jahiliyat Aur Rafziyo'n (Shiyao'n) Ki Nikali Huwi Rasme Hai.

Jin Se Tauba Karke Khud Bhi In Haraam Rasmo'n Se Bachna Aur Dusro Ko Bachana Har Musalmaan Par Lazim Hai.

Usi Tarah Taziyo'n Ka Jhuloos Dekhne Ke Liye Aurato Ka Be Parda Gharo'n Se Nikalna Aur Mardo Ke Majmo'n Me Jana Aur Taziyo'n Me Jhuk Jhuk Kar Salaam Karna.

Ye Sab Kaam Bhi Shariyat Me Mana Aur Gunah Hai.

(جنتی زیور تخریج شدہ, ص 156/157)

Title: Muharram Shareef Me Dus (10) Roz Tak Karbala Walo Ki Yaad Me Sogawar/Ghamgeen Rehna, Sog Manana Shar'an Kaisa Hai?
Content:
Jawab: A'ala Hazrat رضی الله عنہ Farmate Hai, Muharram Shareef Me Dus Roz Tak Sogawar/Ghamgeen Rehna Mamnu o Najayez Hai.


(فتاوی رضویہ شریف جدید, ج24 ص508)

Mazeed A'ala Hazrat Farmate Hai.

Shariyat Ne Aurat Ko Shauhar Ki Maut Par 4 Mahine Aur 10 Din Sog/Gham Ka Hukm Diya Hai.

Auro'n Ki Maut Ke Teesre Din Tak Ijazat Di Hai.

Baqai Haraam Hai Aur Har Saal Sog/Gham Ki Tajdeed To Kisi Ke Liye Aslan Halaal Nahi.


(فتاوی رضویہ جدید, ج24 ص595)

Title: Suna Hai 10 Muharram Ko Ghar Me Chulha Jalana, Roti Pakana, Jhadu Lagana Nahi Chahiye
Content: Kya Ye Baat Durust Hai? Jawab: A'ala Hazrat Farmate Hai: Ye Baat Sog/Gham Hai Aur Sog Haraam Hai. (فتاوی رضویہ شریف جدید، ج24 ص488) To Maloom Hua 10 Muharram Ashura Ke Roz Ghar Me Chulha Jala Kar Roti Saalan Waghaira Paka Bhi Sakte Hai, Kha Bhi Sakte Hai Aur Dusro Ko Khila Bhi Sakte Hai. Neez Ghar Ki Safai Bhi Kar Sakte Hai. Jhadu Pochha Waghaira Bhi Laga Sakte Hai. Hamara Islam 10 Muharram Ko In Kaamo Se Mana Nahi Karta. ALLAH Ta'ala Ghalat Fehmiyo Se Tamaam Musalmasno Ko Bachaye (Aameen)

Title: Muharram Shareef Ke Mahine Me Shaadi Biyaah Kar Sakte Hai Ya Nahi?
Content:
Jawab:- A'ala Hazrat Farmate Hai:

Maah-E-Muharram (Muharram Ke Mahine) Me Nikah Karna Jaayez Hai. Nikah Kisi Mahine Me Mana Nahi.


(فتاوی رضویہ شریف جدید، ج11 ص265، ج23

 ص193)

Title: Suna Hai Muharram Me Sirf Hazrat E Sayyiduna Imam e Hussain Aur Digar Shohda-E-Karbala Radi Allaho Anhum Ajmaeen Ko Hi Isaale Sawab Kar Sakte Hai
Content:
Aur Kisi Ko Nahi Kiya.

Ye Baat Durust Hai?

Jawab:

Ji Nahi.! A'ala Hazrat Farmate Hai:

Muharram Waghaira Har Waqt Zamana Me Tamaam Ambiya AlaiyhimusSalaato Wassalaam Aur Auliya-E-Ikraam Ki Niyaz Aur Har Musalmaan Ki Fatiha Jayez Hai. Agarche Khas Ashura Ke Din Ho.


( فتاوی رضویہ شریف جدید، ج24 ص499)

Mazeed Irshad Farmate Hai: In Ayyam/Dino Me Siwaye Imam e Hassan O Imam E Hussain Radi Allaho Ta'ala Anhuma Ke Kisi Ki Niyaz Fatiha Na Dilana Jihalat Hai.

Har Mahina Har Tarikh Me Har Wali Ki Niyaz Aur Har Musalman Ki Fatiha Ho Sakti Hai.


(فتاوی رضویہ جدید, ج24 ص488)

Title: Maidan E Karbala Me Hazrat E Sayyiduna Imam E Hussain رضی الله عنه
Content: Aur Unke Rufqa/Sathi Par Jo Zulm o Sitam Kiye Gaye Unhe Padhkar Ya Sunkar Dil Ghamgheen Ho Jaye. Aankho'n Se Aansu Chhalak Pade, To Kiya Ye Bhi Mana Hai? Jawab: A'ala Hazrat Farmate Hai: Ji Nahi! Jaisa Ke Sarkar E Do Aalamصلی الله علیه وسلم Irshad Farmate Hai: Arre Sunte Nahi Ho Beshak ALLAH Ta'ala Na Aansu Se Rone Par Azaab Kare, Na Dil Ke Gham Par, Aur Zuban Ki Taraf Ishara Karke Farmaya: Haa Ispar Azaab Hai, Ya Reham Farmaye. Isko Imam Bukhari Wa Muslim Ne Hazrat Abdullah Ibne Umar رضی الله عنہما Se Riwayat Kiya Hai: صحیح بخاری کتاب الجنائز باب البکاء عندالمریض، ج1 ص174 Isi Tarah Fatawa Aalamgiri Me Bhi Hai Jameulmuzmirat Se (Buland Aawaz Se Rona) Aur Bin Karna (Islam Me) Jayez Nahi. Leqin Baghair Aawaz Ke Rona Aur Aansu Bahana Mamnu/Mana Nahi. فتاوی ہندیہ کتاب الصلاۃالفصل السادس، ج1 ص167 A'ala Hazrat Irshad Farmate Hai: Kaun Sa Sunni Hoga Jise Waqia-E-Karbala Ka Gham Nahi, Ya Uski Yaad Se Dil Mahzun Aur Aankh Purnam Nahi. Haan, Musaaib Me Hum Ko Sabr Ka Hukm Farmaya Hai. Jaza Faza Ko Shariyat Mana Karti Hai Aur Jise Waqai Dil Me Gham Na Ho Usey Jhuta Izhar-E-Gham (Gham Ka Izhaar) Karna Riya/Dikhawa Hai Aur Qasdan (Yani Jaan Bujhkar) Gham Aawari Aur Gham Parwari Khilaaf-E-Raza Hai. Jise Iska Gham Na Ho Usey Be Gham Na Rehna Chahiye. Balke Uss Gham Na Hone Ka Gham Hona Chahiye, Ke Uski Mohabbat Naqis/Kam Uska Imaan Naqis Hai. و الله تعالی اعلم فتاوی رضویہ شریف جدید، ج24 صفحہ 487/488

Title: Shuhada E Karbala Ki Yaad Me Matam Karna Aur Noha Karna Kaisa Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

A'ala Hazrat Farmate Hai:

Matam Karna Chhati/Sina Pitna Haraam Hai.

Neez Matam O Noha Muharram Ho, Ya Ghair Moharram Mutlaqan Haraam Hai.


فتاوی رضویہ جدید، ج23 ص407، ج24 ص496

Rasool ALLAH صلی الله عليه وسلم Irshad Farmate Hai:

Mai Bezaar Hun Usse Jo Bhadra Kare Aur Chillakar Roye Aur Gireban Chak Kare.

Imam Bukhari Wa Muslim Ne Hazrat E Abu Musa Ash'ari رضی الله عنه Ke Hawale Se Ise Riwayat Kiya.

Bhadra Kisi Ke Marne Par Hinduo'n Ki Tarah Bataur-E-Sog Sar Mundana Rasool ALLAH صلی الله عليه وسلم Ne Irshad Farmaya:

ALLAH Az'zawajal Jahannam Me Noha Karne Waalo Ki Do Safe'n Banayega Ek Saff Jahannam Ke Dahini (Right) Janib (Side) Aur Dusri Saff Jahannamiyo Ke Baee (Left) Janib. 

Wo Jahannamiyo Par is Tarah Bhonkte Honge, Jaise Kutte Bhonkte Hai.


سرور خاطر ترجمہ قرۃالعیون ص 30

Title: Tajiya Banane Walo'n Ko Tajiya Banane Ke Liye Chanda Dena
Content:
Ya Tajiya Banane Me Madad Karna Kaisa Hai?

Jawab:

A'ala Hazrat Alaiyhi Rehma Farmate Hai.

Tajiya Me Kisi Qism Ki Imdad Jayez Nahi.

ALLAH Ta'ala Ne Farmaya:

ولا تعاونو علی الاثم والعدوان
پ: 6، سورۃ المائدہ: 2

Tarjuma-E-Kanzul Imaan:

Gunah Aur Ziyadati Ke Muamlaat Me Ek Dusre Ki Madad Na Kiya Karo.

A'ala Hazrat Alaiyhi Rehma Mazeed Farmate:

Alam, Tajiye Me Jo Kuch Sarf Hota Hai.

Sab Israaf/Fizul Kharch O Haraam Hai.


فتاوی رضویہ شریف جدید ج24 ص505

Title: Tajiye Par Jo Mithhai Chadhai Jati Hai, Kya Usko Kha Sakte Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

A'ala Hazrat Alaiyhi Rehma Farmate Hai:

Tajiya Par Jo Mithhai Chadhai Jati Hai, Agarche Haraam Nahi Ho Jati.

Magar Uske Khane Me Jahilo'n Ki Nazar Me Ek Amr/Kam E Najayez Sharai Ki Wuqat Badhane Aur Uske Tark (Chhod) Me Usse Nafrat Dilayi Hai.

Lehaza Woh Mithhai Na Khayi Jaye.


فتاوی رضویہ صفحہ 49

Title: Alam Tajiya Dekhne Ke Liye Nikalna Kaisa Hai?
Content:
Jawab: A'ala Hazrat Alaiyhi Rehma Farmate Hai:

Jo Kaam Na Jaayez Hai Usey Tamashe Ke Taur Par Dekhne Jana Bhi Gunah Hai.


فتاوى رضويه ج24 صفحہ499

Mazeed Ek Maqam Par Irshad Farmate Hai:

Alam Tajiye Mehandi Unki Mannat, Gasht Chadhawa, Dhol Tashe, Marsiye Matam Masnui Karbala Ko Jana Aurato'n Ka Tajiye Dekhne Ko Nikalna.

Ye Sab Baatein Haraam O Gunah O Najayez O Mana Hai.


فتاوی رضویہ شریف جدید ج24 ص498

Title: Shuhada-E-Karbala Ke Rauzo'n Ki Tasveere Aur Naqshe Gharo'n Aur Dukano Me Awizan (Latka) Kar Rakh Sakte Hai Ya Nahi?
Content:
Jawab:

A'ala Hazrat رضی الله عنہ Farmate Hai:

Shaikh Abdul Mustafa Azmi رحمة الله علىه Farmate Hai.

Hazrat E Imam E Hussain رضى الله عنه Aur Shuhada-E-Karbala رضى الله عنهم Ke Muqaddas Rauzo'n Ki Tasveer, Naqsha Bana Kar Rakhna Aur Unko Dekhna Ye To Jaayez Hai.

Kyunki Ye Ek Gair Jaandaar Chiz Ki Tasveer, Ya Naqsha Hai.

Lehaza Jis Tarah Ka'aba, Baitul Muqaddas, Nalain Sharifain Waghaira Ki Tasveere Aur Unke Naqshe Bana Kar Rakhne Ko Shariyat Ne Jayez Thahraya Hai.

Usi Tarah Shuhada-E-Karbala Ke Rauzo'n Ki Tasveere Aur Naqshe Bhi Yaqinan Jayez Hi Rahenge.

Leqin Har Saal Sekdo'n, Hazaro Rupey Ke Kharch Se Rauza, Karbala Ka Naqsha Bana Kar Usko Pani Me Dubo Dena.

Ya Zameen Me Dafan Kar Dena, Ya Jangalo'n Me Phenk Dena.

Ye Yaqinan Haram o Najayez Hai.

Kyunki Ye Apne Maal Ko Barbaad Karna Hai Aur Musalman Janta Hai Ke Maal Ko Zaaya Aur Barbaad Karna Haraam o Na Jaayez Hai.


جنتی زیور تخریج شدہ، ص155,156

Hakimmul Ummat Taajdaare Gujarat Hazrat Mufti Ahmad Yaar khan Naimi Irshad Farmate Hai:

Agar Imam E Husain رضى الله عنه Ke Mazaar Shareef Ka Saheeh Naqsha Tayyar Kiya Jaye Jis Ki Ziyarat Ki Jaye Usey Dafan Na Kiya Jaye.

Balke Mahfooz Rakha Jaye Bila Shubah Jayez Hai.
فتاوی نعیمیہ، ص192

Title: Tajiya Banana Aur Dekhna Kaisa Hai?
Content:
Jawab: Sayyidi Sarkaar A'ala Hazrat Alaiyhi Rehma Irshad Farmate Hai:

Taziya Ma'asiyat Hai.

Taziya Banana Dekhna Jaayez Nahi.


فتاوی رضویہ جدید ، ج16ص155،ج24ص489

Title: Shariyat Me Tajiye Ki Asal Kiya Hai?
Content: Jawab: Faramane Aala Hazrat RadiAllahu anhu: Tajiya Mamnu Hai. Shariat Me Kuch Asal Nahi Aur Jo Kuch Biddat Unke Sath Ki Jati Hai. Sakht Na Jayez Hai. فتاوی رضویہ شریف جدید ، ج24ص490

Title: Kya Tajiya Banana Kufr o Shirk Hai?
Content: Jawab: Aala Hazrat رضى الله عنه Farmate Hai: Takiya Zaroor Na Jaayez o Biddat Hai Magar Kufr Nahi. Mazeed Ek Maqam Par Farmaya: Tajiya Banana Shirk Nahi. Ye Wahabiya Ka Khayal Hai. Haan Biddat Gunah Hai. واللہ تعالی اعلم فتاوی رضویہ شریف جدید ،ج21ص221،ج24ص503

Title: Tajiye Ki Tazim Karna Shar'an Kaisa Hai?
Content: Jawab: Aala Hazrat رضى الله عنه Farmate Hai: Taziya Banana, Dekhna Jaayez Nahi Aur Ta'zimo Aqidat Sakht Haraam Wa Ashad Biddat Hai. Allah Ta'ala Musalman Bhaiyo'n Aur Behno Ko Raah-E-Haq Ki Hidayat Farmaye. Aameen فتاوی رضویہ شریف جدید ج24ص489

Title: Kya Tajiya Ke Zariye Haajatein Puri Hoti Hai?
Content:
Jawab: A'ala Hazrat Farmate Hai:

Tajiya Ko Haajat Rawa (Yani Zariya-E-Haajat Rawa Samajhna) Jihaalat Par Jihaalat Hai.
فتاوی رضویہ صفحہ 499

Title: Suna Hai Agar Kisi Ne Tajiya Banana Ki Mannat Mani To Zaroor Banana Chahiye
Content: Warna Nuqsan Hoga. Kiya Ye Baat Durust Hai? Jawab: Aala Hazrat Farmate Hai: Tajiya Banana Biddat O Gunah Hai. (Lihaza) Na Karne Ko Bais-E-Nuqsan Khayal Karna, Zanana-E-Waham Hai. Musalmano Ko Aisi Harkaat Se Baaz Aana Chahiye. فتاوی رضویہ شریف ج 24.ص499اور503

Title: Agar Koi Musalman Tajiya Banaye To Kitna Gunah Hai?
Content: Jawab: Aala Hazrat Farmate Hai: Biddat Ka Jo Gunah Hai Woh Hai, Gunah Ki Naap Tol Duniya Me Nahi. فتاوی رضویہ 501،510

Title: Salaam aur chhink ka jawab naa dena kaisa?
Content:
Khali ishaare se jawab dena kaafi hoga kya ?

Jawab:

Salam aur chheenk dono ka jawab dena WAJIB hai aur dono ka jawab inti awaz se diya jayega ki samne wala sun le.

Warna gunahgar hoga aur jawab dene me bhi der ki to bhi gunahgar aur ishare se jawab kaafi nahi, awaz ke sath hi dena wajib hai.

Bahar e Shariat Jild: 3 Safa: 460

Salam ka jawab foran dena wajib hai.

Bila wajah takheer ki to gunahgar hoga or ye gunah jawab dene se dafa naa hoga, balki tauba karni hogi.

Bahar e Shariat Jild: 3 Safa: 464

Salam itni awaz se kahe ki jisko salam kiya gaya hai wo sun le, aur agar itni awaz naa ho to jawab dena wajib nahi.

Ungali ya hatheli se salam karna mana hai.

Hadis me farmaya: “ungali se salam karna yahoodiyo ka tariqa hai aur hatheli se salam karna nasara ka”.

Baaz log salam ke jawab me hath, ya sar se ishara kar dete hai.

Yun jawab nahi hua, unko munh se
jawab dena wajib hai.

Kisi ne hath ke ishare se salam kiya to ye salam nahi, naa iska jawab dena wajib.

Magar jab ishare ke sath munh se bhi salam kaha to jawab diya jayega.

Bahar e Shariat Jild: 3 Safa: 476

Chheenk ka jawab dena wajib hai.

Jabki chhenkne wala Ϳ الحمد َ ْ (Alhumdullillah) kahe, aur iska jawab bhi foran dena aur is tarah dena ki wo sun le wajib hai.

Jis tarah salam ke jawab me hai yaha bhi hai.

Masail-e-Shariyat, Jild:1, Page:147

Title: Wahabiyon Ka Aqeedah Kafir Ko Kafir Na Kaho Ye Kahena Kaisa?
Content:
Jawab:

Ye To Quran E Karim Ki Taalim Ke Khilaaf Hai.

Quran To Kaheta Hai ''قُلْ يٰٓاَيُّهَاالْكٰفِرُوْنْ'' Sarkar ﷺ Ko Hukm Hua Aur Ye Hukm Janasaheen E Mufti E Azam E Hind\nHuzoor Tajushshariah Alaihir rahmah war Rizwan Sarkar ﷺ Hi Ko Nahi Hai.

Balke Sarkar ﷺ Ki Ummat Ko Bhi Hai. "قُلْ يٰٓاَيُّهَاالْكٰفِرُوْنْ" To Quran Ne Jo Hai Kafir Ko Kafir Kahene Ka Hukm Diya Aur Uske Liye Ye Bahana Ke Ho Sakta Hai Ki Musalmaan Ho Jaaye.

To Lazim Ye Aata Hai Ke Musalman Ko Musalman Na Kaho Ke Ye Ho Sakta Hai Kafir Ho Jaaye.

Jo Jaisa Hai Usko Waisa Kaha Jaayega.

Janasaheen E Mufti E Azam E Hind

Huzoor Tajushshariah Alaihir rahmah war Rizwan

Title: Ghar Ke Aalmari Me Kitabein Padi Ho Aur Ham Bed (Chaarpai) Par Baithe Ho
Content:
Kya Ye Sahi Hai?

Jawab:

Is Soorat Mein Harj Nahin Hona Chahiye

والله تعالٰی اعلم

Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Dilshad Ahmad Qadri Razvi Amjadi 
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi

Title: Jiski Dhadi (Beard) Nahi Hai, Uski Apni Namaz Ke Baare Me Kya Hukm Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Faasiq Ki Apni Namaz Bhi Jo Hai Makrooh-e-Taherimi Wajib-Ul-Iyaada Hoti Hai.

Jab Tak Ke Wo Us Fisq Se Tauba Na Kare Us Fisq Ko Chhode Na.

Janasaheen E Mufti E Azam E Hind

Huzoor Tajushshariah Alaihir rahmah war Rizwan

Title: Fasiq Ke Pichhe Namaz Ho Sakhti Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Faasiq Ko Imam Banana Gunaah Hai.

Namaz Uske Pichhe Padhenge Namaz Ho Jayegi.

Magar Wo Sahi Ul Kha(n) Hai, Sahi Ul Qira'at Hai, Sahi Ul Tahaarat Hai, To Namaz To Ho Jayegi.

Lekin Usku Imam Banana Gunaah Hai.

Namaz Uske Pichhe Makrooh E Taherimi Hai, Wajib ul Iyada Hogi.

Janasaheen E Mufti E Azam E Hind

Huzoor Tajushshariah Alaihir rahmah war Rizwan

Title: Jiske Ghar Waale Sab Deobandi Ho Aur Beta Sunni Ho
Content:
To Beta Kis Tarah Apni Zindagi Guzaare Ki Uspar Kya Hukm Hoga?

Jawab:

Uske Liye Hukm Wohi Hai Jo Aam Sunniyon Ke Liye Hai, Ke Apni Sunniyat Par Wo Saqti Se Qaayam Rahe Aur Apne MurtadDeen Jo Uske Rishtedaar Hai.

Deobandion, Wahabion Ya Unke Andar Jo Hai, Koi Bhi Aisi Qabaat Ho Jis Se Wo Aadmi Murtad Ho Jaata Hai.

Unse Wo Door Rahe Mahefooz Rahe Aur Unse Apne Ta'alluqaat Na Rakhe, Har Mumkin Taur Par Unse Door Rahe.

Janasaheen E Mufti E Azam E Hind

Title: Chand grahan kya hota hai? aur hamal (bachcha) jiske paith me ho, Kya wo aurat kaam nahi kar sakti?
Content:
Kya ye baat sahi hai

Jawab:

Ye Allah ki Qudrat ki Nishani hai ke Allah Ta'ala agar chahe to roshan suraj chand ko bhi Tareek farma de.

Najoomiyo ka kehna hai ke Jab Suraj aur chaand ke beech me Zameen Haayel ho jati hai.

To Chand grahan aur Jab Zameen o Suraj ke darmiyan Chaand haayel ho to suraj grahan hota hai.

Rahi baat Hamila Aurato ki to Un par kisi tarah ki koi shar'an pabandi nahi.

Bade burhe kehte hain is tarah ki baatein ke unhe kaam na karne diya jaaye ya baaher na niklein wagaira.

Title: Tayammum Ka Tarika Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Tayammum Ka Tarika Yeh Hai Ki Awwal Dil Mein Niyat Kare.

Fir Dono Hath Ki Ungliyan Kushada Karke Zameen Par Maare Aur Zyada Gard Lag Jaye Toh Jhadh Le.

Fir Usse Saare Munh Ka Masah Kare.

Fir Dobara Dono Hath Zameen Par Maarkar Dahine (Right) Hath Ko Baayein (Left) Hath Se Aur Baayein (Left) Hath Ko Dahine (Right) Hath Se Kuhniyon Samet Maley.

Tayammum Kin Cheezo Se Karna Jaayez Hai?

Jawab:

Paak Mitthi, Patthar, Reth, Multani Mitthi, Geru, Kachchi, Ya Pakki Int (ईंट), Mutthi Aur Int Patthar, Yaa Chuna Ki Deewaron Se Tayammum Karna Jaayez Hai!

Tayammum Kin Cheezo Se Karna Naajaayez Hai?

Jawab:

Sona, Chandi, Tamba, Peetal, Loha, Lakdi, Aluminium, Kapda, Raak Aur Har Qism Ke Galla Se Tayammum Karna NaaJaayez Hai!

Yaani Jo Cheezien Aag Mein Pigal Jaati Hai, Yaa Jalkar Raak Ho Jaati Hai Un Cheezon Se Tayammum Karna Naajaayez hai!

Title: Zuban Se Tayammum Ki Niyat Ada Karte Waqt Kya Kahe?
Content:
Jawab:

Yeh Kahe Niyat Ki Maine Tayammum Ki ALLAH TA'ALA Ka Taqarrub Hasil Karne Ke Liye!

Title: Tayammun Ka Tarika Wazu Ke Liye Hai, Yaa Ghusl Ke Liye?

Jawab:

Tayammum Ka Tarika Yeh Hai Ki Awwal Dil Mein Niyat Kare.

Fir Dono Hath Ki Ungliyan Kushada Karke Zameen Par Maare Aur Zyada Gard Lag Jaye Toh Jhadh Le.

Fir Usse Saare Munh Ka Masah Kare.

Fir Dobara Dono Hath Zameen Par Maarkar Dahine (Right) Hath Ko Baayein (Left) Hath Se Aur Baayein (Left) Hath Ko Dahine (Right) Hath Se Kuhniyon Samet Maley.

Tayammum Kin Cheezo Se Karna Jaayez Hai?

Jawab:

Paak Mitthi, Patthar, Reth, Multani Mitthi, Geru, Kachchi, Ya Pakki Int (ईंट), Mutthi Aur Int Patthar, Yaa Chuna Ki Deewaron Se Tayammum Karna Jaayez Hai!

Tayammum Kin Cheezo Se Karna Naajaayez Hai?

Jawab:

Sona, Chandi, Tamba, Peetal, Loha, Lakdi, Aluminium, Kapda, Raak Aur Har Qism Ke Galla Se Tayammum Karna NaaJaayez Hai!

Yaani Jo Cheezien Aag Mein Pigal Jaati Hai, Yaa Jalkar Raak Ho Jaati Hai Un Cheezon Se Tayammum Karna Naajaayez hai!

Title: Kya Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ke Zamane Mein Mayyat Ka Teeja Hota Tha ?
Content: Jawab: Mayyat Ka Teeja Aur Isi Tarah Daswa, Beeswa Aur Chaleeswa Wagairah Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ke Zahiri Zamana Mein Nahi Hota Tha. Balki Yeh Sab Baad Ki Ijaad Hai Aur Biddat e Hasna Hai. Isiliye Ki Inmein Mayyat Ke Isal e Sawab Ke Liye Quran Khwani Hoti Hai. Sadqa, Khairat Kiya Jaata Hai Aur Gurba wa Masaakeen Ko Khana Khilaya Jaata Hai Aur Yeh Sab Sawab Ke Kaam Hai. Haan, Is Mauqe Par Dost wa Ahbaab Aur Azeez wa Aqareeb Ki Dawat Karna Zaroor Biddat e Sayyeaa Hai. Shaami Jild Awwal Safa 629, Fathul Qadeer Jild Duam Safa 102

Title: Farishte Kya Hote Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Farishte Noori Jism Waale Hai.

ALLAH TA’ALA Ne UnKo Yeh Taqat Di Hai Ki Jo Shakl Chahe Bann Jayein, Farishte Kabhi Insan Ki Shakl Bana Lete Hai Kabhi Koi Doosri Shakl.

Farishte Wahi Karte Hai, Jo ALLAH TA’ALA Ka Hukm Hota Hai.

Farishte ALLAH TA’ALA Ke Hukm Ke Khilaaf Kuch Nahi Karte, Na Jaan Bujh Kar, Na Bhoole Se Aur Naa Galti Se.

Kyunki Woh ALLAH Ke Masoom Bande Hai Aur Har Tarah Ke Sageera (Chote) Aur Kabeera (Bade) Gunaaho Se Paak Hai.

Farishton Ke Zimme Alag Alag Kaam Hai, Kuch Farishte Bando Ka Achcha Bura Amal Likhne Par Muqarrar Hai.

Jinko Kiraman Katibeen Kaha Jaata Hai, Kuch Farishte Qabr Mein Murdon Se Sawal Karne Par Maqarrar Hai.

Jinko Munkar Nakeer Kaha Jaata Hai Aur Kuch Farishte Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi Wassallam Ke Darbar Mein Musalmano Ke Duroodo Salam Pahuchane Par Muqarrar Hain.

Title: Farishte Kitne Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Farishte Beshumar (Anginat) Hai.

Unki Ginti ALLAH TA’ALA Hi Jaanta Hai Aur ALLAH TA’ALA Ke Bataye Se Uske Pyare Mehboob Huzoor Sallallahu Alahi Wassallam Jaante Hai.

Waise Chaar Farishte Bahut Mashoor Hai.

1) Jibreel Alaihissalaam: Ye allah ka paigaam or aayatein nabiyo tak pahunchate hai.

2) Mikaeel Alaihissalaam: Jo saari makhlook cheezon ko rozi dete hai. Makhlook matlab duniya me jitni bhi chizo me jaan hai.

3) Israfeel Alaihissalaam: Ye Qayaamat ke din Allah ke hukum se sur fukenge. Jisme se ek aawaz aayegi us awaz se qayamat ayegi.

4) Izraeel Alaihissalaam: Jo rooh kabz karte hai.

Yeh farishte Neki aur Burayi likhte hain.

1) Kiraman
2) Katibin

Yeh farishte Qabar mein sawal karte hain.

1) Munkar
2) Nakir

5) Riyafeel Alaihissalaam: Jo Qayamat Ke Din Tamam Zameen Ko Lapetenge.

6) Rizwan Alaihissalaam: Ye Jannat Ke Khazin Farishte Hai.

7) Malik Alaihissalaam: Ye Dozakh Ke Khazin Farishte Hai.

Title: Jannat Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Jannat Ek Makaan Hai.

Jise ALLAH TA'ALA Ne Imaan Walon Ke Liye Banaya Hai.

Usmein Aisi Aisi Nematein Rakhi Gayi Hai.

JinKo Na Aankhon Ne Dekha, Na Kaano Ne Suna Aur Na Koi Un Nematon Ka Guman Kar Sakta Hai.

Jannat Mein Sau (100) Darje Hai.

Ek Darje Se Doosre Darje Mein Itni Doori Hai Ki Jaise Zameen Se Aasmaan Tak.

Title: Dozakh Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Dozakh Ek Aisa Makan Hai.

Jo ALLAH TA'ALA Ki Shaan e Jabbari Aur Jalal Ki Mazhar (Zaahir Hone Ki Jagah) Hai.

Kis Tarah ALLAH TA'ALA Ki Rehmat Aur Nemat Ki Koi Hadd Nahi Ki Insaan Shumar Nahi Kar Sakta Aur Jo Kuch Insaan Sochta Hai Woh Zarra Barabar Bhi Nahi.

Usi Tarah Uske Gazab Aur Jalal Ki Koi Hadd Nahi, Insaan Jis Qadr Bhi Dozakh Ki Aafaton, Musibato Aur Takleefo Ko Soch Sakta Hai.

Woh ALLAH Ke Azaab Ka Ek Bahut Chota Sa Hissa Hoga.

Dozakh Ki Aag Hazar (1000) Baras Tak Jhonkai (धोंकाई) Gayi, Yahan Tak Ki Bilkul Lal Ho Gayi.

Fir Hazar (1000) Baras Aur Jalayi Gayi, Yaha Tak Ki Safed Ho Gayi.

UsKe Baad Fir Hazar (1000) Baras Aur Jalayi Gayi, Yaha Tak Ki Bilkul Kaali Ho Gayi Aur Ab Woh Kaali Hai Aur Us Mein Roshni Ka Naamo Nishaan Nahi.

Title: Kya Meelad Shareef Ki Mehfil Munaqid Karna Biddat E Sayyeaa Hai?
Content: Jawab: Meelad Shareef Ki Mehfil Munaqid Karna Usme Huzoor E Akram Sallallahu Alahi Wassallam Ki Paidaish Ke Halaat Aur Deegar Fazail wa Munaqib Bayaan Karna Barkat Ka Bais Hai. Use Biddat E Sayyeaa Kehna Gumrahi wa Bad'mazhabi Hai.

Title: Hadees Shareef Mein Hai Ki Har Biddat Gumraahi Hai, Toh Isse Kaunsi Biddat Muraad Hai?
Content: Jawab: Is Hadees Shareef Se Sirf Biddat e Sayyeaa Muraad Hai. (Dekhiye Mirkat Sharah Mishqaat Jild Awwal Safa 179 Aur Ashi'atul Lamaat Jild Awwal Safa 125) Isiliye Ki Agar Biddat Ki Tamaam Qisme Muraad Li Jaaye. Jaise Ki Jahire Hadees Se Mafhoom Hota Hai. Toh Fiqah, Ilm e Kalam Aur Sarf wa Nahu (नहू) Wagairah Ki Tadween Aur Unka Padhna Sab Zalalat wa Gumrahi Ho Jaayega.

Title: Dua E Qunoot
Content:
Dua Qunoot In Roman English Transliteration “Allahumma Inna Nastayeenuka Wa Nastagfiruka Wa Numinu Bika Wa Natawakkalu Alaika Wa Nusni Alaikal Khair Wa Nashkuruka Walaa Nakfuruka Wa Nakhlav Wa Natruku Maiyyafzuruka Allaahumma Iyyakanabudu Wa La Ka Nusalli Wa Nasjudu Wa Ilaya Nasaa Wa Nah Fidu Wa Narju Rehmataka Wa Naqshaa Azaabaka Inna Azaabaka Bil Kuffari Mulhiq”

دُعَاءُ القنوت اَللَّهُمَّ إنا نَسْتَعِينُكَ وَنَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَنُؤْمِنُ بِكَ وَنَتَوَكَّلُ عَلَيْكَ وَنُثْنِئْ عَلَيْكَ الخَيْرَ وَنَشْكُرُكَ وَلَا نَكْفُرُكَ وَنَخْلَعُ وَنَتْرُكُ مَنْ ئَّفْجُرُكَ

اَللَّهُمَّ إِيَّاكَ نَعْبُدُ وَلَكَ نُصَلِّئ وَنَسْجُدُ وَإِلَيْكَ نَسْعأئ وَنَحْفِدُ وَنَرْجُو رَحْمَتَكَ وَنَخْشآئ عَذَابَكَ إِنَّ عَذَابَكَ بِالكُفَّارِ مُلْحَقٌ

Dua E Qunoot In English Meaning

O' Allah! We implore You for help and beg forgiveness of You and believe in You and rely on You and extol You and we are thankful to You and are not ungrateful to You and we alienate and forsake those who disobey You. O' Allah! You alone do we worship and for You do we pray and prostrate and we betake to please You and present ourselves for the service in Your cause and we hope for Your mercy and fear Your chastisement. Undoubtedly, Your torment is going to overtake infidels O' Allah!  

دعاےَ قنوت کے معنی

الہی ! ہم تجھ سے مدد چاہتے ہیں اور تجھ سے معافی مانگتے ہیں اور تجھ پر ایمان رکھتے ہیں اور تجھ پر بھروسہ کرتے ہیں اور تیری بہت اچھی تعریف کرتے ہیں اور تیرا شکر کرتے ہیں اور تیری نا شکری نہیں کرتےاور الگ کرتے ہیں اور چھوڑتے ہیں اس سخص کو جو تیری نافرمانی کرے۔ الہی! ہم تیری ہی عبادت کرتے ہیں اور تیرے ہی لئے نماز پڑھتے ہیں اور سجدہ کرتے ہیں اور تیری ہی طرف دوڑتے اور جھپٹتےہیں اور تیری رحمت کے امید وارہیں اور تیرے عذاب سے ڈرتے ہیں، بیشک تیرا عذاب کافروں کو پہنچنے والا ہے۔

Title: Jis Shakhs Ko Dua E Qunoot Yaad Na Ho Woh Kya Padhe?
Content: Jawab: Jis Shakhs Ko Dua E Qunoot Yaad Na Ho Woh Ye Dua Padhe, “Allahumma Rabbana Aatina Fiddunya Hasanaton Wa Fil Aaqirati Hasanaton Waqina Azaabannar!

Title: Agar Dua E Qunoot Na Padhe Toh Kya Hukm Hai?
Content: Jawab: Agar Dua E Qunoot Kasdan (Jaan Boojh) Kar Na Padhe. Toh Namaz e Witr Phir Se Padhe Aur Agar Bhool Kar Na Padhe Toh Aakhir Me Sajda E Sahu Kare!

Title: Agar Dua E Qunoot Padhna Bhool Jaaye Aur Ruku Me Yaad Aaye Toh Kya Kare?
Content: Jawab: Agar Dua E Qunoot Padhna Bhool Jaaye Aur Ruku Me Yaad Aaye. Toh Na Qiyam Ki Taraf Laute Aur Na Ruku Me Padhe, Balki Aakhir Me Sajda E Sahu Kare.

Title: Salatul Tasbeeh
Content:
Salatul Tasbeeh Me Beinteha Sawaab Hai, Baaz Muhaqqiqeen Farmate Hai Ki Uski Buzurgi Sunkar Tark Na Karega, Magar Deen Me Susti Karne Waala.

Hadees Shareef Me Hai Ki Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ne Hazrate Abbas Radi’Allahu Anhu Se Farmaya Ki

“Aye Chacha Agar Tum Se Ho Sake Toh Salatul Tasbeeh Roz Ek Baar Padho, Agar Roz Na Ho Sake Toh Har Jumma Ko Ek Baar Padho Aur Yeh Bhi Na Ho Sake, Toh Har Mahine Me Ek Baar Padho Aur Yeh Bhi Na Ho Sake Toh Har Saal Me Ek Baar Padho Aur Yeh Bhi Na Ho Sake Toh Umr Me Ek Baar Padho”.

Salatul Tasbeeh Ka Tarika

Tirmizi Me Hazrate Abdullah Ibne Mubaarak Se Iss Tarah Mazkoor Hai Ki:

Takbeer Tehrima Ke Baad Sana Padhe Phir Pandrah (15) Baar Yeh Tasbeeh Padhe – “SUBHANALLAHI WALHAMDU LILLAHI WALA ILAHA ILLALAAHU WALLAAHU AKBAR”

Phir Taouz, Tasmiya, Surah e Fatiha Aur Surat Padh Kar Dus (10) Baar Upar Waali Tasbeeh Padhe.

Phir Ruku Kare Aur Ruku Me Dus (10) Baar Padhe.

Phir Ruku Se Sar Uthaaye Tasmia-Wa-Tehmeed Ke Baad Dus (10) Baar Wahi Tasbeeh Padhe.

Phir Sajde Ko Jaaye Aur Usme Dus (10) Martaba Padhe.

Phir Sajda Se Sar Uthaaye Toh Dus (10) Baar Padhe.

Phir Dusre Sajde Me Jaaye Toh Dus (10) Baar Padhe.

Iss Tarah Chaar Rakat Padhe Aur Ruku Wa Sujood Me “SUBHANA RABBIAL AZEEM” aur “SUBHANA RABBIAL AALA” Kehne Ke Baad Tasbeeh Padhe

Title: Namaz e Hajat
Content:
Abu Daawood Me Hai Hazrat e Huzaifa Radi’Allahu Ta’ala Anhu Farmate Hai Ki:

Jab Huzur Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ko Koi Aham Muamila Peish Aata, Toh Aap Uske Liye Do (2) Ya Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Padhte.

Namaz e hajat parhne ka tarika Hadees Shareef Me Hai:

Pehli Rakat Me Surah e Fatiha Aur Teen (3) Baar Ayatal Kursi Padhe Aur Baaki Teen (3) Rakato Me Surah e Fatiha, Qulhuwallahu, Qulauzubi Rabbil Falaq Aur Qul Aauzubi Rabbinnaas Ek Ek Baar Padhe.

Toh Yeh Aisi Hai Jaise Shabe Qadr Me Chaar (4) Rakaate Padhi.

Mashaayiq Farmate Hai Ki Hamne Yeh Namaz Padhi Aur Hamari Hajate (Zarurate) Poori Huwi.

Title: Dua E Masura
Content:
Dua e Masura in Roman English Transliteration:

1) “ALLAHUMAG FIRLI WALI WAALIDAYYA WALIMAN TAWAALDA WALIJAMIEL MOMINEENA WAL MOMINATI WAL MUSLIMEEN WAL MUSLIMAATIL AHYAYI MINHUM WAL AMWATI INNAKA MUJEEBUDDAWATI BIRAHMATIKA YAA ARHAMARRAHAMEEN”

2) Allahumma Inni Zalamtu Nafsi Zulman Kaseeraan, Wala Yaghfiruz-Zunooba Illa Anta, Faghfirlee Maghfiratan-mMin ‘Indika
War Hamnee Innakaa Antal Ghafoorur Ra’heemu

3) Alhamdu lillahi rabbis samawati walardhi wahuwal aziz-ul hakeem. Allahul hamdulillahi rabbis samawati walardhi rabil alaameen. Walahul kibriyaau fi-samawati walardhi wahuwal aziz-ul hakeem. Walah-ul azmahu fi-samawati walardhi wahuwal aziz-ul hakeem.

4) Allahum-aansurna alla quli udoowin sagheeran wakabeeran qaana zakaran awounsa hurran wa-abadan wa-shahidan wa-gaaibun wa-ziefun wa-sharifun muslimun wa-kafirun wala tusallit aalyina mun-la yarhamna wala yakahfu minka yaa Allahu ya samadu ya rabbu ya gahfooru ya shakooru birehmatika aagisni yamun howa laa illaha illa howa, Bismillahi mujriha wa-mursaha inna rabi laghfoorun raheemun. Wa sallahu ta'ala ala Rasuli khairi khalqihi muhammadin waa a'ala aalihi wa ashabihi ajma'ena bi rehmatiqa yaa Arhamar raheemeen.

5) Allahuma yaa-illal bashari waya azeemal kahtri waya wasial maghfirati waya azizalmaani waya maliki yumiddinn behakki iyyaka nabudu waiyaka nasateenu birehmatika yaa-arhamur-raheemen. Bismi Allahi arrahmani arraheem. Yaa-illahul alameena waya kahirun-nasireena waya giyasul mustagiseena birehmatika yaa-arhamur rahemeen.

6) Alhumdu lillahi qublaa quli ahadin walhumdullilahi bada quli ahadin walhumdulillilahi aala nayimmaaihi walhamdulillahi aala quli halin wasallallahu taalah aala rasooli kahyri khalqihi Muhammadin waalihi wa-ashabi ajmaeena birehmatika yaa-arahamur rahemeen.

7) Alhamdu lillahilladhi fissamaayi arshi alhamdu lilladhi fil-janaati rowaituhu walhamdu lillahi fil quboori qadaawohu walhamdu lillahi fil barri walbuhri hukmuhu walhamdu lillahi lataqrahu wala maljan minallahi illaa illayhi birehmatika yaa-arhamar-rahemeen.

8) Subahan alqadiril-qahirul-qawaiul-muaani laa illaha illahu ya haiu ya qyuoomu ya zaljalali walikram lahuwla wala quwata illa billahil-aaliul-azeem.

9) Allahuma ya-rajaayi ya-manaayi ya-giyaasi ya-muraadi ya-shifaayi ya-kammaayi kafiun yahya ya-gafhooru ya-gafhooru ya-gafhooru ighfirli khatiyyaati yumuddini yaa-Allahu yaa-Allahu yaa-Allahu ya-gafhooru ya-gafhooru ya-gafhooru ya-rehmanu ya-rehmanu ya-rehmanu ya-raheemu ya-raheemu ya-raheemu ya-kareemu ya-kareemu ya-kareemu Wa sallahu ta'ala ala Rasuli khairi khalqihi noore arshi nabiyna washafiyna wasanadina wamoulana Muhammadin waa a'ala aalihi wa ashabihi ajma'ena bi rehmatiqa yaa Arhamar raheemeen. Subhana rabika rabbil izzati aama yasifuna wasalamun allal mursaleena walhamdulillahi rabbil allameena fallahu kahirun hafiza wahua arhamur-raheemen.

11) Illahi laa-qadira illaa anta walakal hamdu, Illahi laa-baseera illaa anta walakal hamdu, Illahi laa-samiha illaa anta walakal hamdu, Illahi laa-illaha illaa anta hakimus-samawati walakal hamdu, Illahi anta kashiful mushkilati walakal hamdu, Illahi anta rehmanur-raheemu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal kahyirul-fatihena walakal hamdu, Illahi anta arhamur-rahemena walakal hamdu, Illahi antal muqalibu-quloobi walakal hamdu, Illahi antal qafil-haadi walakal hamdu, Illahi antal munshiul-mubdiu walakal hamdu, Illahi anta tuwalijul-laiyla finnihari fillaiyli walakal hamdu, Illahi antal qareebul-mujeebu walakal hamd, Illahi antal-tawabul-raheemu walakal hamdu

12) Illahi anta rabul-arbabi walakal hamdu, Illahi anta sayyedul-sadaati walakal hamdu, Illahi anta munimul-darajati walakal hamdu, Illahi anta naaziri-samawati walakal hamdu, Illahi antal fatahul-miftahu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal kahaliqul-jabari walakal hamdu, Illahi antal ahadu-samadu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal wajibul-majibu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal rasheedul-murshidu walakal hamdu, Illahi anta sayyedul-muminena walakal hamdu, Illahi antal zahirul-batinu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal baiesul-warisu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal-giyasul-mustagesu walakal hamdu

13) Illahi antal aleemul-hakeemu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal gahfoorul-shukooru walakal hamdu, Illahi antal musawirul-qudoosu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal noorul-munawiru walakal hamdu, Illahi antal gahfoorul-hamdu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal shukoorul-majeedul-mujeebu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal barul-raheemu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal qadeemul-bakki walakal hamdu, Illahi antal azizul-muashiri walakal hamdu, Illahi antal khalisul-ikhlasi walakal hamdu, Illahi antal qaziul-hajaati walakal hamdu, Illahi antal hananul-mananu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal rafiul-munafiu walakal hamdu

14) Illahi antal rafiul-budihu walakal hamdu, Illahi antal malikul-mulki walakal hamdu, Illahi antal alamul-gaiubi walakal hamdu, Illahi antallahulladhi laaillaha illahu alimul-gaybi washahdati howal-rehmanur-raheemu Huwa Allahu allathee la ilaha illa huwa AAalimu alghaybi waalshshahadati huwa alrrahmanu alrraheemu uwa Allahu allathee la ilaha illa huwa almaliku alquddoosu alssalamu almu/minu almuhayminu alAAazeezu aljabbaru almutakabbiru subhana Allahi AAamma yushrikoona Huwa Allahu alkhaliqu albari-o almusawwiru lahu al-asmao alhusna yusabbihu lahu ma fee alssamawati waal-ardi wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu.

Title: Namaz Ke Baad Ki Dua?
Content:
Jawab:


ALLAHUMMA ANTASSALAAM WAMIN KASSALAAM WA ILAIKA YARAJIUSSALAAM FAHAIYYANA RABBANA BISSALAAM WADQILNA DAARASSALAM WA TABAARAKTA RABBANA WATA ALAITA YA ZALJALAALI WAL IKRAAM

Title: Aurat Ki Namaz Ka Tarika?
Content: Aurat Ki Namaz Ka Tarika Ye Hai Ki Auratein Takbeer e Tehrima Ke Waqt Kaano Tak Haath Na Uthaye. Balki Kandho Tak Uthaye, Haath Naaf Ke Neeche Na Bandhe. Balki Baaye (Left) Hatheli Seene Par Chaathi Ke Neeche Rakh Kar Uski Peeth Par Dahini (Right) Hatheli Rakhe. Ruku Me Ziyada Na Jhuke. Balki Thoda Jhuke, Yani Sirf Iss Qadar Ki Haath Ghutno Tak Pahunch Jaaye, Peeth Seedhi Na Kare Aur Ghutno Par Joor Na De. Balki Mahaz Haath Rakh De Aur Haatho Ki Ungliya Mili Huwi Rakhe Aur Paaw Kuch Jhuka Rakhe Mardo Ki Tarah Khoob Seedha Na Karde. Auratein Simat Kar Sajda Kare, Yani Baazoun Ko Karwato Se Milade Aur Pait Raano Se Aur Raano Ko Pindhliyo Se Pindhliya Zameen Se Juda Na Rakhe, Aur Qaida (Baithak) Me Baaye Qadam Par Na Baithe. Balki Doono Paaw Dahine (Right) Janib Nikaal De Aur Baaye (Left) Sureen (Puttha) Par Baithe, Aurate Bhi Khadi Hokar Namaz Padhe. Farz Aur Wajib Jitni Namazein, Bagair Ujr Baithkar Padh Chuki Hai. Unki Qaza Karein Aur Tauba Karein. Aurat Mard Ki Imamat Hargiz Nahi Kar Sakti Aur Sirf Auratein Jamat Kare, Ye Makrooh E Teheemi Aur Najaayez Hai. Aurato Par Juma Aur Eidein Ki Namaz Wajib Nahi!

Title: Hazrat Allama Mufti Sayyed Shah Turab ul Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi
Content: Alqaab: Mujahid e Ahle Sunnat, Shehanshaah-e-Khitabat. Aapki wilaadat 27 Ramzan 1363 Hijri (15 September 1944 A.D.) ke roz Hyderabad me hui. Aapke waalid ka naam Sayyed Hasanain Qadri Jilani aur waalida ka naam Akbar-un-Nisaa Begum hai. Sayyed Shah Turab ul Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi Hasani Saadaat hai Aur Hazrat Ghaus e azam Shaikh Sayyed Abdul Qadir Jilani radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ki nasl se hain. Aapne ibtidaai ta’aleem Madrasa Tahtaaniyah, Hyderabad me haasil ki. Taqseem-e-Mulk ke baad 1370 Hijri (1951 A.D.) me Aapka pariwaar Pakistan aa gaya. P.I.B. Colony, Karachi me qayaam ke dauraan Faize Aam High School me ta’aleem haasil ki. Phir Hazrat Allama Qari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi se ta’aleem haasil ki. Iske baad Aapne Daar-ul-Uloom Amjadia, Karachi me ta’aleem haasil ki. Ta’aleem mukammal hone ke baad Aap Daar-ul-Uloom Amjadia, Karachi ke Mudaaris aur baad me Sadr bane. Daar-ul-Uloom Amjadia, Karachi ke har jalse me Aap Khitaab farmate. Sayyed Shah Turab ul Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi Jamat e Ahle Sunnat, Karachi ke Ameer aur Jamat e Ahle Sunnat World ke Naazim the. Aap Jamiat Ulama-e-Pakistan me shaamil hue. Aap Tehreek-e-Khatme Nabuwwat aur Tehreek-e-Nizaam-e-Mustafa me bhi shareek hokar pur zor kirdaar ada kiya. Aap Markazi Ruyat-e-Hilaal committee ke Chairman bhi rahe. Sayyed Shah Turab ul Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi Madrasa Anwaar-ul-Qur’an Qadriya Razawiya, Jaamia Anwaar-ul-Qur’an Qadriya Razawiya, Gulshane Iqbaal, Muslih-ud-deen Welfare Society, Al-Musallam Welfare Society ke Chairman the aur Daar-ul-Uloom Amjadia ke Naazim-e-Ta’aleemaat (Trustee) the aur Sunni Tehreek Ulama Board, Sunni Raahbar Council, Sunni Ittehaad Council ke Rukn the. Aur Daar-ul-Uloom Musli-ud-deen, Tehreek-e-Awaam e Ahle Sunnat, Tehreek-e-Ittehaad-e-Ahle Sunnat, Jamiat-e-Isha’at-e-Ahle Sunnat, Bazme Raza, Anjuman-e Isha’at-e-Islaam ke Sar-parast the. Sayyed Shah Turab ul Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi chunaav jitkar 1405 se 1408 Hijri (1985 to 1988 A.D.) tak Qaumi Assembly, Pakistan ke member rahe. Aapne isha’at wa tabligh e deen ke liye Asia, Arab, Europe, America, aur Africa ke kai mulko ka safar kiya. Aapne apni Taqreer, tasannif aur Fatawe ke zariye Ahle Sunnat wal Jama’at ki azeem khidmat ki hai. 1388 Hijri (1968 A.D.) me Sayyed Shah Turab ul Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi Bareilly tashreef laaye, to Huzoor Mufti e azam e Hind Mustafa Raza Khan Bareilwi rahmatullahi alaihi ne Aapko Masjid-e-Raza me imamat ka sharf ata faramaya. Tasannif: Sayyed Shah Turab ul Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitabein: (1) Tafseer-e-Surah-al-Faatiha (2) Tafseer Surah Wa-Duha taa Surah an-Naas (3) Anwaar-ul-Quran (4) Zia-ul-Hadees (5) Jamaal-e-Mustafa (Sallallahu alaihi wassallam) (6) Fazaa'il-e-Sahaba wa Ahle Bait (7) Shahadat-E-Imam Hussain (radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu) (8) Imam e Azam Abu Hanifa (9) Kitaab-us-Salaat (10) Masnoon Duaein (11) Tasawwuf aur Tareeqat (12) Islaami Aqaa'id (13) Jannati log kaun? (14) Mazaraat-e-Auliya aur Tawassul (15) Falaah-e-Daarain (16) Rasool e Khuda (Sallallahu alaihi wassallam) ki Namaz (17) Muballigh banaane waali Kitaab (18) Deeni Ta’aleem (19) Khawaatin aur Deeni masail (20) Mubaarat Raatein (21) Fazaa'il-e-Sha’abaan-ul-moazzam. 1386 Hijri (1966 A.D.) me Aapka nikah Akhtar bint e Hazrat Allama Qari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi ke saath hua. Sayyed Shah Turab ul Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ke 3 saahabzaade aur 6 saahabzaadiya hain. Saahabzaade: (1) Siraaj-ul-Haq (2) Abdul Haq (3) Fareed-ul-Haq Aap Hazrat Mufti e azam e Hind Mustafa Raza Khan Bareilwi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain. Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi aur Hazrat Maulana Faazil-ur-Rahman bin Zia-ud-deen Madani ne bhi Aapko khilaafat ata farmai hai. Aapke khalifa: Hazrat Allama Sayyed Shah Abdul Haq Qadri. Sayyed Shah Turab ul Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal beemaari ke sabab 4 Moharram 1438 Hijri (6 October 2016 A.D.) ko Jumerat ke roz hua. Aapki namaz e janaza Memon Masjid me namaz e Juma ke baad padhayi gayi. Aap ki namaz e janaza aapke saahabzaade Hazrat Allama Sayyed Shah Abdul Haq Qadri ne padhayi. Sayyed Shah Turab ul Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Jodia Bazar Kharadar, Karachi (Pakistan) me hai. ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Allama Mufti Sayyed Shah Turab ul Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah aur Ahle bait ke waseele se Sabko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sabke imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sabko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye. Aur Sabko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sabki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye. Ameen.

Title: Milad un Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ke Mauqe Par Jhande Lagana Kaha Se Sabit Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Imam Suyuti Rahmatullahi Alaih Bayan Karte Hai Ki:

"Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam ke Tashreef Lane Ke Waqt Hazrat Jibrail Amee(n) Sattar Hazar (70,000) Farishton Ke Jhurmuth Mein, Huzoor e Aqdas Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ke Aastana Mubarak Par Tashreef Laaye Aur Jannat Se Teen (3) Jhande Bhi Lekar Aaye.

Usmein Se Ek Jhanda Magrib Mein Gaadhe, Ek Mashrik Mein Aur Ek Kaaba Muazaama Par.
  
Dalailun Nubuwa Hissa: 1, Page: 82

Ruhul Amee(n) Ne Gaada Kaabe Ki Chat Pe Jhanda
Ta-Arsh Uda Pharera Sub-he Shab e Wiladat

Title: Eid Milad un Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ke Mauqe Par Juloos Kyu Nikalte Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Aaqa Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ke Liye Juloos Nikalna Koi Nayi Baat Nahi Hai. Balki Sahaba E Kiraam Radi'Allahu Anhum Ne Bhi Juloos Nikala Hai.

Sahih Muslim Ki Hadees Mein Hai Ki Jab Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Hijrat Karke Madina Sharif Tashreef Le Gaye Toh Logo Ne Khoob Jashn Manaya.

Toh Mard wa Aurat Apne Gharo Par Chadh Gaye Aur Naara-e-Risalat Lagate Aur Kehte Yaa Muhammad Yaa Rasoolallah! Yaa Muhammad Yaa Rasoolallah!.

Sahih Muslim, Hadees: 7707

Ek Riwayat Mein Aata Hai Ki Hijrat e Madina Sharif Ke Mauqe Par Jab Huzoor E Aqdas Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Madina Sharif Ke Kareeb Pahunche.

Toh Buraida Aslami Apne Sattar Sathiyon Ke Sath Damane Islam Se Wabasta Hue Aur Arz Kiya Ki Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Madina Sharif Mein Aapka Dakhila Jhanda Ke Sath Hona Chahiye, Phir Unhone Apne Amame Ko Neza Par Daal Kar Jhanda Banaya Aur Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ke Aage Aage Rawana Huwe.

Wafaul Wafa, Hissa: 1, Page: 243

Title: Kya Huzoor E Akram Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ki Wiladat (Milad un Nabi) Ki Khushi Manane Par Faida Pahunchata Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Ji Haan! Abu Lahab Jo Kufr Ki Halat Mein Mara, Uska Mamla Yeh Tha Ki Usne Rasoolallah Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ki Bi'asat Ke Baad Apni Baqi Bachi Zindagi Islam Aur Paigamber e Islam Ki Mukhalifat Mein Guzari.

Lekin Uske Marne Ke Baad Rasoolallah Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ke Chacha Hazrat Abbas Radi'Allahu Anhu Ne Usko Khwab Mein Dekha, Hazrat Abbas Radi'Allahu Anhu Ne Ussey Pucha Ki Marne Ke Baad Tujh Par Kya Guzri?

Usne Jawab Diya Ki Main Din Raat Sakht Azaab Mein Mubtala Hoon.

Lekin Jab Pir (Monday) Ka Din Aata Hai, Toh Mere Azaab Mein Kami Kardi Jaati Hai Aur Meri Ungaliyon Se Paani Jaari Ho Jata Hai.

Jise Peekar Mujhe Sukoon Milta Hai.

Azaab Mein Kami Ki Wajah Yeh Hai Ki Maine Pir (Monday) Ke Din Apne Bhatije (Muhammad Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam) Ki Wiladat Ki Khushkhabri Sunn Kar Apni Khadima Suwaiba Ko In Ungaliyon Ka Ishaara Karte Huwe Azad Kar Diya Tha.

Sahih Bukhari, Hadees: 5101

Yeh Waqia Hazrat Zainab Bint e Abi Salma Se Marwai Hai.

Jise Muhaddiseen Ki Badi Tadad Ne Milad un nabi Ke Waqiya Ke Bayan Mein Naql Kiya Hai.

Sahih Bukhari Ki Riwayat Hai, Urwa Ne Bayan Kiya Hai Ki Suwaiba Abu Lahab Ki Azad Ki Hui Bandi Hai. Abu Lahab Ne Usey Azad Kiya Toh Usne Nabi-e-Kareem Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Dhudh Pilaya.

Paas Jab Abu Lahab Mar Gaya, Toh Uske Baaz Ghar Walon Ko Woh Bure Haal Mein Dikhaya Gaya. Usne Ussey (Yaani Abu Lahab Se) Pucha : "Tuney Kya Paya?"

Abu Lahab Bola : Maine Tumhare Baad Koi Rahat Nahin Payi, Siwaye Ke Suwaiba Ko Aazad Karne Ki Wajah Se Jo Is (Ungali) Se Pilaya Jaata Hai.

Sahih Bukhari, Hadees : 5101

Shaikh Abdul Haq Muhaddis e Dehelwi (958-1052 Hijri) Is Riwayat Ko Bayaan Karne Ke Baad Likhte Hai Ki

"Yeh Riwayat Milad un nabi Ke Mauqe Par Khushi Manane Aur Sadqa wa Khairat Karne Walon Ke Liye Daleel Aur Sanad Hai. Abu Lahab Jiska Mazammat (Burai) Mein Quran E Pak Mein Puri Surah Nazil Huwi. Jab Woh Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ki Wiladat Ki Khushi Mein Laundi Azad Karke Azaab Mein Kami Hasil Kar Leta Hai. Toh Us Musalman Ki Khush-Naseebi Ka Kya Aalam Hoga, Jo Apne Dil Mein RasoolAllah Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam kKi Muhabbat Aur Aqeedat Ka Izhar Kare."

Madarijun Nabuwa, Hissa: 2, Page: 19

Dosto Zara Gaur Karo! Abu Lahab Jaisa Kaafir Ko Jab Milad un Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Par Khushi Manane Par Faida Mila, Toh Hum Mustafa Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ke Aashiq Kyun Kar Mehroom Reh Sakte Hai?

Title: Kya Sahaba e Karam Radiallahu Anhu Ne Bhi Kabhi Milad Un Nabi Ki Mehfil Munaqqid Ki Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Ji Haan! Imam Bukhari Ke Ustad Imam Ahmad Bin Hambal Likhte Hai:

Sayyiduna Ameer Muawiya Radiallahu Anhu Farmate Hai:

Ek Roz RasoolAllah Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ka Apne Ashab Ke Halqe Se Guzar Hua, Aap Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ne Farmaya: Kyu Baithe Ho?

Unhone Kaha : Hum ALLAH ﷻ Ka Zikr Karne Aur Usne Humein Jo Islam Ki Hidayat Ata Farmai Us Par Hamd wa Sana (Tareef) Bayaan Karne Aur Usne Aap Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ko Bhej Kar Hum Par Jo Ehsaan Kiya Hai. Uska Shukr Ada Karne Ke Liye Baithe The.

Aapne Farmaya: ALLAH ﷻ Ki Kasam! Kya Tum Isi Ke Liye Bethe The?

Sahaba Ne Arz Kiya: ALLAH ﷻ Ki Kasam! Hum Sab Isi Ke Liye Baithe The.

Is Par Aap Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ne Farmaya : Abhi Mere Paas Jibrail Alaihissalam Aaye The, Unhone Kaha Ki ALLAH ﷻ Tumhare Wajah Se Farishton Par Fakhr Kar Raha Hai.

Sunan Basai, Hadees: 5443, Al-Mozmul Kabeer: Tibrani, Hadees: 16057

Is Hadees Se Sabit Hua Ki Sahaba Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ki Milad (Paidaish) Par Sukhr Ada Karte The.

Yaha Yeh Baat Bhi Qaabil e Zikr Hai Ki Jo Log Huzoor e Aqdas Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ki Meelad Sajate Hai Aur Usmein Sharik Hote Hai.

ALLAH ﷻ Aise Bando Par Farishton Ki Jamat Mein Fakhr Farmata Hai Aur Haan! Huzoor e Aqdas Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ka Zikr ALLAH ﷻ Hi Ka Zikr Hai Is Par Qur'an Aur Huzoor Ki Hadeese Gawaah Hai.

Title: Kya Aap Sabit Kar Sakte Hai Ki Rasoolallah Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ne Apni Milad Manai?
Content:
Jawab:

Ji Haan! Hadees Mulahiza Farmayein : Hazrat Qatada Radi'Allahu Anhu Se Riwayat Hai Ki Rasool e Akram Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Se Pir (Somwar / Monday) Ke Din Roza Rakhne Ke Baare Mein Pucha Gaya.

Toh Aap Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ne Irshad Farmaya : "Isi Roz Meri Wiladat Huwi, Isi Roz Meri Bi'asat Huwi Aur Isi Roz Mere Upar Qur'an Nazil Kiya Gaya."

Sahih Muslim, Hadees: 2807, Sunan Abu Dawood, Hadees: 2428, Musnad Imam Ahmad Bin Jamval, Hadees 23215

Is Hadees Se Sabit Hua Ki Rasoolallah Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ne Har Pir Ke Din Roza Rakh Kar Apni Milad Ka Khud Ehtemam Kiya Hai.

Lihaza Sabit Hua Ki Din Mukarrar Karke Yaadgar Manana Sunnat Hai.
Alhumdulillah

Title: Kya Aap Quran Majeed Se Rasoolallah Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ki Aamad Par Khushi Manane Ki Daleel De Sakte Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Ji Haan! ALLAH Ta'ala Quran Majeed Mein Irshad Farmata Hai:

قُلۡ بِفَضۡلِ اللّٰہِ وَ بِرَحۡمَتِہٖ فَبِذٰلِکَ فَلۡیَفۡرَحُوۡا ﴿۵۸

Tarjuma:
Aey Habeeb Aap Farma Dijiye Ki ALLAH Ke Fazl Aur Uski Rehmat Milne Par Musalmanon Ko Chahiye Ki Khushiyan Manaye.
Surah Yunus: Aayat: 58

Is Aayat Mein Yeh Hukm Diya Gaya Ki Jab ALLAH Ka Fazl Aur Uski Rehmat Naazil Ho Toh Momino Ko Is Par Khushiyan Manani Chahiye.

Ab Kisi Zahen Mein Yeh Sawal Aa Sakta Hai Ki Kya Rasoolallah Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam Ki Rehmat Ka?

Jo Hum Unki Aamad Par Khushiyan Manaye. Iska Jawab Bhi Khud Quran Majeed De Raha Hai.

وَ مَاۤ اَرۡسَلۡنٰکَ اِلَّا رَحۡمَۃً لِّلۡعٰلَمِیۡنَ ﴿۱۰۷

Tarjuma:
Humne Tumhein Nahin Bheja Magar Rehmat Saare Jahan Ke Liye.
Surah Ambia: Aayat : 107

Alhumdulillah Rasool e Arbi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ka Is Duniya Mein Tashreef Lana Rehmat Hai Aur Pehli Aayat Mein ALLAH Ta'ala Humein Rehmat Milne Ki Khushiyan Manane Ka Hukm De Raha Hai.

Ab Batao Musalmanon! Rasoolallah Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ki Zaat Mubarak Se Badh Ke Rehmat Kaun Ho Sakta Hai.

Milad un Nabi (ﷺ) Par Khushiyan Kyun Na Manaya Jaaye.

Alhamdulillah Quran Majeed Ki In Aayaton Se Aamad e Rasoolallah Salallahu Alaihi Wasallam Par Khushiyan Manana Sabit Hua.

Title: Majlis Mein Aayat Padhi, Ya Suni Aur Sajda Kar Liya.
Content:
Phir Usi Majlis Mein wahi Aayat Padhi, Ya Suni Toh Doosra Sajda Wajib Hoga Ya Nahi?

Jawab:

Doosra Sajda Nahi Wajib Hoga, Wahi Pehla Sajda Kaafi Hai.

Title: Majlis Badalne Aur Na Badalne Ki Surtein Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Do Ek Luqma Khana, Do Ek Ghooñth Peena, Khada Ho Jaana, Do Qadam Chalna, Salam Ka Jawab Dena, Do Ek Baat Karna, Aur Masjid Ya Makan Ke Ek Ghosha Se Doosre Ghosha Ki Taraf Chalna.

In Tamam Surton Mein Majlis Na Badlegi.

Haan agar Makan Bada Hai, Jaise Shahi Mahal.

Toh Aisa Makan Mein Ek Ghosha Se Doosre Mein Jaane Se Badal Jaayegi, Aur Teen Luqma Khana, Teen Ghooñth Peena, Teen Kalime Bolna, Teen Qadam Maidan Mein Chalna Aur Nikah Ya Kahrido Farokht Karna.

In Tamam Surton Mein Majlis Badal Jaayegi.

Title: Nabiyon Ke Baare Mein Kaisa Aqeeda Rakhna Chahiye?
Content:
Jawab:

Ambiya Sab Mard The Na Koi Aurat Nabi Hui Aur Na Koi Jinn.

Nabiyon Ka Bhejna ALLAH Ta’ala Par Wajib Nahi, Usne Apne Karam Se Logon Ki Hidayat Ke Liye Nabi Bheje.

Nabi Hone Ke Liye Us Par Wahi Hona Zaroori Hai, Yeh Wahi Chahe Farishte Ke Zariye Ho, Ya Bagair Kisi Waste Aur Zariye Ke Ho.

Nabuwwat Aisi Cheez Nahi Ki Aadmi Ibadat, Yaa Mehnat Ke Zariye Hasil Kar Sake.

Balki Yeh Mehaz ALLAH Ta'ala Ki Dein Hai, Jise Chahta Hai Apne Karam Se Deta Hai.

Nabi Ka Masoom Hona Zaroori Hai, Isi Tarah Masoom Hone Ki Khusoosiyat Farishton Ke Liye Bhi Hai.

Nabiyon Aur Farishton Ke Siwa Koi Masoom Nahi, Kuch Log Imam’o Ko Nabiyon Ki Tarah Masoom Samajhte Hai, Yeh Gumrahi Aur Bad-Deen Hai.

Nabiyon Ke Masoom Hone Ka Matlab Yeh Hai Ki Unki Hifazat Ke Liye ALLAH Ta’ala Ka Wada Hai.

Isiliye Shari’at Ka Faisala Hai Ki Un Se Gunaah Ka Hona Muhaal Aur Namumkin Hai.

ALLAH Ta’ala Imam’o Aur Badi Waliyon Ko Bhi Gunaaho Se Bachata Hai, Magar Shari’at Ki Roshni Mein Un Se Gunaah Ka Ho Jaana Muhaal Nahi.

Koi Ummati Ilm, Ibadat Aur Nekiyon Mein Nabi Se Nahi Badh Sakta, Balki Barabar Bhi Nahi Ho Sakta.

ALLAH Ta’ala Ne Nabiyon Par Bandon Ke Liye Jitne Ahkaam Naazil Kiye Woh Sab Unhone Pahucha Diye.

Nabi Apni Qabron Mein Usi Tarah Zinda Hai Jaise Duniya Mein The, ALLAH Ta’ala Ka Wada Pura Hone Ke Liye Ek Aan Ko Unhein Maut Aai Aur Fir Zinda Ho Gaye.

ALLAH Ta’ala Ne Apne Nabiyon Ko Gaib Ki Baatein Batayi Hai, Zameen Aur Aasmaan Ka Har Har Zarra, Har Nabi Ki Nazar Ke Saamne Hai.

Yeh Gaib Ka Ilm ALLAH Ta'ala Ke Ata Farmane Se Hai.

Ambiya Alaihimussalam Shirk, Kufr Aur Har Aisi Cheez Se Paak Aur Masoom Hai.

Jis Makhlook Ko Nafrat Ho Jaise Jhooth, Khyaanat Aur Jahalat Wagairah Buri Siftein.

Title: Shirk Aur Kufr Ke Alawa Koi Doosre Gunaah Ho Jaaye Toh Maafi Ki Kya Soorat Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Tauba Kare Khuda e Ta'ala Ki Bargaah Mein, Roye Gidgidaye, Apni Galti Par Nadim wa Pasheema Ho Aur Dil Mein Pakka Ahad Kare Ki Ab Kabhi Aisi Galti Na Karunga.

Sirf Zuban Se Tauba Keh Lena Tauba Nahi Hai.

Title: Kya Har Qism Ka Gunaah Tauba Se Maaf Ho Sakta Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Jo Gunaah Kisi Bande Ki Haqtalfi Se Ho. 

Maslan Kisi Ka Maal Gasab Kar Liya, Kisi Par Tuhmat Lagayi, Yaa Zulm Kiya, Toh In Gunaho Ki Maafi Ke Liye Zaroori Hai Ki Pehle Us Bande Ka Haq Wapas Kiya Jaye, Yaa Usse Maafi Mangi Jaaye.

Fir Khuda e Ta'ala Se Tauba Kare, Toh Maaf Ho Sakta Hai.

Aur Jis Gunaah Ka Talluq Kisi Bande Ki Haqtalfi Se Nahi Hai, Balki Sirf Khuda e Ta'ala Se Hai.

Uski Do Qism Hai, Ek Woh Jo Sirf Tauba Se Maaf Ho Sakta Hai.

Jaisa Sharab Naushi Ka Gunaah Aur Doosre Woh Jo Sirf Tauba Se Maaf Nahi Ho Sakta Hai.

Jaise Namazon Ke Na Padhne Ka Gunaah, Iske Liye Zaroori Hai Ki Waqt Par Namazon Ke Ada Na Karne Ka Jo Gunaah Huaa Usse Tauba Kare Aur Namazon Ki Qaza Padhe.

Agar Aakhiri Umr Mein Kuch Qaza Reh Jaaye, Toh Unke Fidyah Ki Wasiyat Kar Jaye.

Title: Hazrat Allama Mufti Muhammad Mustafa Raza Khan (Mufti E Azam Hind) rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Alqaab: Mufti e azam e Hind, Taajdaar e Ahle Sunnat, Shams-ul-Aarifeen, Maahtaab e Rushd o Hidaayat. ‾‾‾‾‾‾‾ Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ki wiladat 22 Zil Hijjah 1310 Hijri (18 July 1892 A.D) ko Bareilly me hui. Aap ke waalid ka naam Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan bin Maulana Naqi Ali Khan rahmatullahi alaihi aur waalida ka naam Sayyeda Irshad Beghum bint Shaikh Fazl Husain hai. 26 Rabi’ ul aakhir 1314 Hijri ko Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza rahmatullahi alaihi Ne Aap ki Bismillah khwaani ki. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ne apne bade bhai Hujjat-ul-Islam Maulana Haamid Raza Khan ke paas Quran Majeed ki ta’aleem haasil ki. Iske baad Maulana Shah Raham Ilahi Manglori, Maulana Sayyed Basheer Ahmad Aligadhi aur Maulana Zahur ul Husain Faarooqi Rampuri ke paas ta’aleem haasil ki Aur apne waalid Imam Ahmad Raza Khan ke paas bhi fiqh aur dusre uloom ki ta’aleem haasil ki. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi Quran, hadees, tafseer, fiqh, sarf, nahaw, tajweed, balaaghat, kalaam, falsafa, tasawwuf, mantiq, seerah, taareekh, aqaa'id, riyaazi, tauqeet, jaafar aur haayat jaise bahot saare uloom ke maahir the. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ne 13 saal ki umr me Fatawa dena shuru kiya. Ek baar Aap Daar ul Ifta gaye to dekha ki Hazrat Maulana Zafar-ud-deen Bihari koi fatawa likh rahe the aur hawale ke liye almari me se Fatawa Razawiya nikal rahe the. Ye dekhkar Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ne farmaya ‘Kya aap jawab ke liye Fatawa Razawiya par munhasar hain?’ Unho ne kaha ‘Theek hai, Tum bagair kitab dekhe is ka jawab do.’ Wo ‘Raza'at’ ke baare me mas'ala tha aur aap ne uska sahi jawab likhkar diya. Wo fatawa Aala Hazrat ke paas tehqiqat ke liye bheja gaya. Aala Hazrat use padhkar khush hue aur us par apne dastkhat kiye. Phir Aala Hazrat ne aap ke liye ‘Abul Barkaat Muhiy-ud-deen Jeelaani Aale Rahman urf Mustafa Raza’ ki mohar banakar di. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ne 50,000 se zyada fatawa jaari kiye. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi 1328 Hijri (1910 A.D) me Daar-ul-uloom Jaamia Manzare Islam, Bareilly me Mudarris bane aur is idaare me 27 saal tak rahe. Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan ne Bareilly me Daar-ul-Qaza (Muslim Law Court) shuru kiya aur Hazrat Sadrush Shariah Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi ko usme Qazi banaya aur Huzoor Mufti e Azam e Hind aur Hazrat Burhaan e Millat Maulana Mufti Burhaan-ul-Haq Jabalpuri ko unki madad ke liye rakha. Pariwaar: 1329 Hijri me Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ka Nikah Bibi Faatima Jaan begum bint e Mufti Muhammad Raza Khan se hua. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ke ek saahabzaade Anwar Raza (jinka inteqal 18 mahine ki umr me hua) aur 6 saahabzaadiya hain. Sab se badi saahabzaadi Sarkaar beghum ka nikah Hazrat Mufassir e azam Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke saath hua. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi har kaam shariat ke mutaabiq karte the aur har sunnat e Rasool ko apnate the aur logo ko bhi iske liye taaleem dete the. Ilm e deen sikhne wale aur masaa'il janne ke liye aane walo ko hamesha sahi jawab dete the, chahe bada ho ya chhota. Aap haq baat kehne me kisi se darte nahi the Aur har buri bidat ko radd karke logo ko usse door rehne ke liye kehte the. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi kabhi Qibla ki taraf pair nahi karte the aur us jaanib thunkte bhi nahi. Aap hamesha ba-jamat namaz padhte the, Bareilly me ho ya safar me. Qabrastan me jaate to fauran Dua e maghfirat karte. Kisiki mayyat me jaate to kabhi bhi waha khaana nahi khaate. Logo ko achhe islami naam rakhne ke liye kehte jaise Abdullah, Abdur Rahman, Muhammad aur Ahmad. Kisi ko koi gham ho to use sabr ki talkeen karte aur ALLAH ko yaad karne ke liye kehte. Logo ko mustaqbil janne, ya batane se mana farmate the. Tamaam zindagi Mehfil e Milad wa Mehfil e Zikr me ishq aur adab ke saath saamil hote rahe. Aap hamesha ek ghulaam ki tarah Aale Rasool ki har khidmat karte rehte Aur ulama ki ta’azeem aur khidmat karte. 1399 Hijri (1979 A.D) me ek martaba ek Sayyeda khatoon apne bete ke saath ilaaj ke liye aai. Garmi ka mausam tha aur aap aaram farma rahe the. Us khatoon ne aap ke khaadimo se kaha ‘Agar Huzoor mufti e azam jaag rahe ho to main unse milna chaahti hu.’ Magar kisi ne Aap ko khalel pahunchaane ki himmat nahi ki. Wo aurat apne bete ko lekar wapas jaane lagi aur kehne lagi ‘Kya main ye samjhu ki yaha Saadaat ki baat bhi nahi suni jaati.’ Jab Aap ne ye suna to fauran apne khaadim ko us sayyeda ko bulaane ke liye kaha. Us aurat ne apne bete ko aap ke paas bheja. Aap ne bahut mohabbat aur ta’azeem ke saath us ladke se uska naam puchha aur apna haath uske sar par rakha. Aur apne khaadim se uske liye saib lane ke liye kaha. Aur phir us Sayyeda khaatoon ko parde me hi apni baat bataane ke liye kaha. Phir unko taweez banakar diya. Ek baar Hazrat Peer Ala-ud-deen Taahir Qadri rahmatullahi alaihi Bareilly shareef aaye to Aap ta’azeem aur adab ke saath unke peechhe nange paanv chalte the. Hazrat Sadrush-Shariah Maulana Amjad Ali Aazmi al-Qadri Aala Hazrat ke urs ke mauqe par Bareilly Shareef aate, tab aap unke istaqbaal aur ta’azeem ke liye Railway station tak jaate. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ne 3 martaba Hajj ada kiye: (1) 1323 Hijri (1905 A.D), (2) 1364 Hijri (1945 A.D), (3) 1391 Hijri (1971 A.D). Karamat: (1) Ek baar aap Faizabaad gaye tab Hazrat Maulana Abdul Qayyoom Muzaffarpuri apne saath Aashiq Ali naami ek shakhs ko lekar Aap ke paas Bait ke liye aaye. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ne usse farmaya “Kaho ki maine apna haath Gaus e azam ke haath me diya.” Woh bola “Maine apna haath Mufti e azam ke haath me diya.” Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ne phir se farmaya “Kaho ki maine apna haath Gaus e azam ke haath me diya. Woh bola “Maine apna haath Mufti e azam ke haath me diya hai. Abhi thodi der pehle aap ne mujhe gunaaho se tauba karwai hai. Ab main jhoot kaise bol sakta hu.” Aap ne use samjhaya “Bait ka yehi tareeqa hota hai. Tum mujh se bait kar rahe ho to silsile se hokar ye Gaus e azam tak pahunchta hai.” Magar woh nahi maana. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi jalaal me aa gaye aur uske sar par apna amama shareef daalkar usse farmaya “Tum yeh kyun nahi keh rahe ho? Kaho ki maine apna haath Gaus e azam ke haath me diya.” Usne foran kaha “Maine apna haath Ghaus e azam ke haath me diya.” Woh ye alfaaz lagataar kehta raha yaha tak ki wo be-hosh ho gaya. Jab use hosh aaya to Maulana Abdul Qayyoom ne use kone me le jaakar puchha ‘Kya hua tha?’ Us shakhs ne kaha ‘Jaise hi Hazrat ne apna amaama mere sar par rakha to maine dekha ki Huzoor Ghaus e azam mere saamne hain aur keh rahe hain ki Aashiq Ali, Mufti e azam ke haath mere haath hain. Wo mere khalifa hain. Kaho ki maine apna haath Ghaus e azam ke haath me diya. Jab maine ye suna to main kehne laga ki maine apna haath Ghaus e azam ke haath me diya aur jab Ghaus e azam rukhsat hue to main behosh ho gaya.’ (2) Maghribi Dinajpur Islampur ilaaqe me ek shakhs ne Huzoor Mufti e azam rahmatullahi alaihi ko mad'oo kiya aur bahot ehtemam kiya. Jab Hazrat aaram ke liye lete to wo shaks raat bhar jaagta raha. Hazrat ne us raat Tahajjud Ki Namaz na padhi. Azaan e Fajr ke baad Mufti Mohammad Shareef sahab Amjadi ne hasbe dastoor Hazrat Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ko jagaya to Hazrat uthe aur phir ba-jama’at namaz e Fajr padhi. Nashte ke baad Hazrat Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi waha se rukhsat ho gaye. Iske baad us shakhs ne ye kehna shuru kar diya ke ‘Bahot mash'hoor Tha Ke bahot bade Buzurg hain. Maine to unme buzurgi ki koi baat na dekhi. Unho ne Tahajjud Ki Namaz tak nahi padhi.’ Wo Ataab ka Shikaar Hua. Uske ghar me aag lag gayi. Saara ghar aur maal o saamaan jal gaya. Ghar me 1000-1000 ke note the jalkar raakh ho gaye. Sirf badan ke kapde bache. Is tabahi se wo pagal jaisa ho gaya, Aitraaf ke ulma ne use tambeeh ki ke ‘Tune ek aarife kaamil ki shaan me gustakhi ki hai. Ye usi ki saza hai.' Ab use hosh aaya magar kya karta. Dil hi dil me tauba ki. Ittefaaq se saal bhar ke baad Huzoor Mufti e azam rahmatullahi alaihi us atraaf me tashreef le gaye, to usne haazir hokar maafi muangi Aur phir Hazrat Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ko apne ghar le gaya aur mureed hua. Us ke baad uski saari pareshaniya aur tang-dasti door ho gayi aur wo khush-haal ho gaya. (3) General Ayyoob Khan ki hukumat ke dauran Pakistan me har mahine aur khaas kar Shawwaal (Eid-ul-Fitr) aur Zil Hijja (Eid-ul-Adha) ke chand ka elaan karne ke liye Rooyat Hilal Committee banai gayi thi. Ek baar 29 Ramazan ko ek hawaai jahaaz aasman me ud raha tha aur usme se chand dekhkar Hilal Committee ne chand ho jaane ka elaan kar diya. Magar Pakistan ke Sunni ulama ne ise sahi maanne se inkar kiya. Unho ne har mulk ke ulema ke paas iske liye sawal naama bheja. Huzoor Mufti e azam ke paas jab ye aaya to Aap ne foran likhkar diya ‘Shariat me chaand dekhkar Roza rakhne ka ya Eid manaane ka hukm hai. Jaha chaand na dikhe waha ke Qaazi ko tehqiqaat karke iske baare me faisla dena chaahiye. Chand zameen par se ya zameen se judi hui jagah se dikhna chahiye. Aur hawaai jahaaz se chand dekhna galat hai. Kyun ki chand ghuroob hota hai, fana nahi hota. Isi liye kabhi 29wi ko dikhta hai, kabhi 30wi ko. Aur chand dekhne ke liye hawaai jahaaz lekar jaana ho to itni bulandi par se 27wi aur 28wi ko bhi chaand dikh sakta hai. To is soorat me kya ye maan len ke 27wi ya 28wi ko chand dikh gaya. Koi bhi aaqil is baat ko qubool nahi kar sakta. Lihaza is soorat e haal me, kya ye munaasib nahi hoga ki 29wi ko chaand dekha jaaye?’ Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ka ye fatawa Pakistan ke akhbaaro me bataya gaya. Iske baad Hilaal Committee ko barkhaast kar diya gaya. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ke bahot saare shaagirdo ne Hindustan aur dusre mulko me Islam ki isha’at ka kaam jaari rakha. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ke mash'hoor shaagird: (1) Muhaddees e azam e Pakistan Maulana Muhammad Sardaar Ahmad (2) Faqeeh e Asr Maulana E'ajaaz Wali Khan (3) Raees-ul-Atqiya Maulana Mubeen-ud-deen Amrawi (4) Faqeeh e aazam e Hind Maulana Mufti Shareef-ul-Haq Amjadi (5) Maulana Muhammad Rehaan Raza Khan Bareilwi (6) TajushShariah Faqeeh e Islam Mufti Muhammad Akhtar Raza Khan Azhari Bareilwi (7) Mufti Sayyed Muhammad Afzal Husain (8) Maulana Qaazi Abdul Raheem Bastawi (9) Maulana Mufti Burhaan-ul-Haq Jabalpuri. Aap ne bahot saari Hamd-e-baari ta’ala, Naat shareef aur Manqabat likhi hain. Aapki likhi hui kitaab ‘Saamaan e Bakhshish’ (Majmua e Naat shareef) mash'hoor hai. Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ne taqreeban 40 kitaaben likhi hain. Jin me se ye mash'hoor hain : (1) Fataawa Mustafawiya (2 Jild) (2) Tanweer ul Hujjat bi Tawaaril Hajjah (3) Tard-ush-Shaitaan (4) Hujjatul Da’ira bi Jawaabil Hujjatul Hazira (5) Al-qaul ul Ajeeb fi Ajoobatit Tasweeb (6) Masaa'il e Sima (7) Adkhal-ul-Insaan (8) Almaut-ul-Ahmaar (9) Noor-ul-Irfaan (10) Saif-ul-Jabbaar (11) Malfoozaat e Aa’la Hazrat. Aap Hazrat Allama Shaah Sayyed Abul Husain Ahmad Noori Barkaati Qadri rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain. Jab aap ki umr 6 mahine thi tab aap ke Peer Hazrat Allama Shaah Sayyed Abul Husain Ahmad Noori Barkaati Qadri rahmatullahi alaihi ne aap ko dekhkar farmaya tha ‘Yeh bachcha ALLAH ka wali ma’aloom hota hai aur ALLAH ke fazl se ye deen e islam ki khub khidmat karega. Ye faiz o barkat ka samundar hai aur log is se faizyaab hote rahenge.’ Phir unho ne apni ungli aap ke munh me rakhi.
Mufti E Azam Hind rahmatullahi alaihi ke Khulfa:
Asia me: (1) Hazrat Mufassir-e-aazam Maulana Ibrāheem Raza urfe Jeelaani Miyan Bareilwi rahmatullahi alaihi (2) Hazrat Maulana Rehaan Raza Khan Bareilwi rahmatullahi alaihi (3) Hazrat TajushShariah Title: Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Naqshband Sirhindi rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Laqab: Hujjatullah (Proof of Allah).
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Naqshband Sirhindi rahmatullahi alaihi ki wilaadat 1034 Hijri (1624 A.D.) me hui.

Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Ma’asoom bin Hazrat Mujaddid e alfe saani Imam Shaikh Ahmad Sirhindi al-Faarooqi rahmatullahi alaihi hai.

Aap ne apne waaild Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Ma’asoom, apne chacha Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Saeed Sirhindi aur deegar ulama se ta’aleem haasil ki.

Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Naqshband Sirhindi rahmatullahi alaihi ko 2 martaba Hajj e Baitullh ki sa’adat haasil hui.

Aap akṡar mughal lashkar me rehkar sipahiyo aur salaaro ko taaleem wa nasihat farmate. Bahot saare sipahi Aapke mureed the.

Aap ne Mughal baadshaah Hazrat Aurangzeb rahmatullahi alaihi ko kai khat likhe the.

Maulana Imaad-ud-deen Muhammad ne ‘Manktubaat’ me Aapke 128 khato ko jama kiya hain.

Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Naqshband Sirhindi rahmatullahi alaihi ke pote aur khalifa Khwaja Muhammad Zubair bayaan karte hain ke
‘Ek martaba Aap shadeed beemaar the aur apne ghar me baithe the. Itne me ek imama pehna hua shakhs aaya (jo ek farishta tha) aur aap se kaha ke ‘ALLAH ta’ala ne Aap ko Salaam bheja hai.’ Aap ne sar uthaaya aur usse farmaya ‘Allahumma antas salaam wa minkas salaam tabaarak ya zul-jalaali wal ikaraam.’

Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Naqshband Sirhindi rahmatullahi alaihi ke saahabzaade:

(1) Shaikh Abul A’ala (Wisaal 1107 Hijri)
(2) Shaikh Muhammad Umar
(3) Shaikh Muhammad Kaazim.

Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Naqshband Sirhindi rahmatullahi alaihi Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Ma’asoom Naqshbandi Sirhindi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed hain Aur ‘Naqshbandi Mujaddidi’ silsile ke Shaikh hain.

Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Naqshband Sirhindi rahmatullahi alaihi ke khulfa:

(1) Shaikh Muhammad Zubair bin Shaikh Abul A’ala Sirhindi rahmatullahi alaihi
(2) Shaikh Abul Khair Burhanpuri rahmatullahi alaihi
(3) Shaikh Ziya-ud-deen Yousuf Mujaddidi Sirhindi bin Khwaja Yahya rahmatullahi alaihi
(4) Shaikh Abdul Kareem rahmatullahi alaihi
(5) Shaikh Haji Abdullāh rahmatullahi alaihi.

Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Naqshband Sirhindi rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 9 Moharram 1115 Hijri (14 May 1703 A.D) ko 80 saal ki umr me hua.

Aap ka mazaar Sirhind (Punjab) me hai.

Azaadi aur taqseem e mulk ke waqt fasaad ke dauraan kuch muslim, Aap ke mazaar me panaah li thi.

Kuchh sikh ne unko maarne ke liye hamla kiya. Magar jaise hi wo sikh dargaah ke qareeb aaye dargaah ke minaar tootkar un par gire. Jisse darkar wo sab waha se bhaag gaye.

ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Khwaja Muhammad Naqshband Sirhindi rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke Imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.
Aameen.

Title: Yani Aye Imaan Walo'n Jab tum Namaz Padhne Ka Irada Karo
Content:
To Apne Muh Aur Kohniyo'n Tak Dono Haatho'n Ko Dho Aur Saro'n Ka Masah Karo Aur Tukhno Tak Pao'n Dho.

اللّٰه تعالىٰ ارشاد فرماتا ہے

يَااَيُّهَا الَّذينَ آمَنُو اِذَا قُمتُم اِلى الصّلٰوةِ فاغسِلُوا وُجُوهكُم واَيدِيَكُم اِلىَ المَرَافِق *واَمسَحُو بِرُؤُسِكُم* وَاَرجُلَكُم اِلىَ الكَعبَينِ.

Ye Quran shareef ki ayat hai.

Isme sar ka masah nahi, balki saro ka masah likha hai.

Yani tamam saro ka, yani pure sar ka masah karna hai.

Aur Quran shareef me jo hukm hota hai, wo farz hota hai.

Yani pure sar ka masah karna farz hai na?

To phir masail me aisa kyu likha hai ke chothai sar ka masah farz hai.

Jawab:

Jisne bhi ye eteraz kiya wo ya to jaahil hai, ya pareshan karna chahta hai.

Yahan par khitaab tamam iman walo se hai aur jab jama (plural) Istemal kiya gaya.

To sar ki bhi jama Istemal ki gayi, yaani aye iman waalo apne saro ka masah karo.

Ab reh gayi baat chauthaai sar ki, to iske dalaail kutub e fiqh me mufassal mazkoor hain.

To jo chahe us janib ruju kare Aur Acche ustaz ke paas Taleem hasil kare.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Hazrat Abu Hafz Rabee bin Sabeeh rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Laqab: Sawaai Peer.

Aap ki wilaadat Basra (Iraq) me hui.

Aap ke waalid Banu Sa’ad bin Banaat bin Tazeem qabeele ke aazaad karda ghulaam the.

Hazrat Abu Hafz Rabee bin Sabeeh rahmatullahi alaihi Tabe taabi'een hain.

Hazrat Abu Hafz Rabee bin Sabeeh rahmatullahi alaihi ne Hazrat Khwaja Hasan Basri, Imaam Ata’a bin Abi Rabaah Makki, Imaam Yazeed Rakkashi, aur Imam Abu Zuberi rahmatullahi alaihi se ta’aleem haasil ki.

Hazrat Abu Hafz Rabee bin Sabeeh rahmatullahi alaihi Hadees aur fiqh ke maahir the.

Hazrat Abu Hafz Rabee bin Sabeeh rahmatullahi alaihi un Mohaddeeseen me se hain jinho ne dusri sadi hijri me Ahaadees ko jama karke logo tak pahunchaana shuru kiya.

Hazrat Imam Ahmad bin Hanbal ki kitaab me Hazrat Abu Hafz Rabee bin Sabeeh rahmatullahi alaihi se kai Hadees marwi hain.

Aap 159 Hijri (775 A.D.) me al-Mahdi Billah Abbaasi ke zamaane me Hazrat Abdul Malik bin Shihaab al-Masmai ke saath isha’ate Islam ke liye Hindustan tashreef laaye Aur Bhadbhoot (Gujarat) me sukoonat pazeer hokar ta’aleeme deen aur khidmate khalq karte rahe.

Ek martaba Hazrat Abu Hafz Rabee bin Sabeeh rahmatullahi alaihi ke ek saathi ne Aap se kaha ke “Kuchh log aap ko ruswa karne ke liye aapki buraai talaash karte rehte hain.”

Hazrat Abu Hafz Rabee bin Sabeeh rahmatullahi alaihi ne farmaya ke “Isse pareshaan hone ki zaroorat nahi. Maine aakhirat ki taraf rooju kiya use dunya se behtar paaya, Maine Rahman [ALLAH ta’ala] se raghbat ki, to woh mujhse raazi hua. Agar main logo ko raazi karne ki koshish karta. To nakaam hota kyun ki insaan apne khaaliq se bhi khush nahi hai, to dusre insaan se kaise khush ho sakta hai.”

160 Hijri (776 A.D.) me jab Bhadbhoot me Taaoon (plague) ki beemaari phaili.

Hazrat Abu Hafz Rabee bin Sabeeh rahmatullahi alaihi mareezo ka ilaaj karne lage Aur isi beemari ke sabab Aapka aur aapke kai shaagirdo ka inteqal hua.

Hazrat Abu Hafz Rabee bin Sabeeh rahmatullahi alaihi ka 16 Moharram 160 Hijri (November 776 A.D.) ko hua.

Hazrat Abu Hafz Rabee bin Sabeeh rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Savai bet, Pipavav (Gujarat) me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Rabee bin Sabeeh urfe Sawaai Peer rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke Imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.
Aameen.

Title: I am lecturer in a college and I have some doubts but I want to correctly about one doubt.
Content:
It will be good if you increase my knowledge.

It's forbidden to wear ladies/Girls dresses to gents and Boys / Gents dress to ladies but in the colleges.

We see lots of girls Wearing t-shirt & shirt as uniform.

But when we ask them it's forbidden, that Time they say It is ladies tshirt And shirt.

Now my question is whether ladies T-Shirt and shirt if it's meant For them.

Jawab:

All type of clothing is allowed for women if the following conditions are met:

1) The whole body of the woman must be concealed. Only the hands and feet (and according to some scholars, the face, (when there is no fear of Fitna) can be exposed.

2) The garment of the female must not be so thin that her body can be visible.

3) Her clothes must not be close-fitting and tight; rather they must be loose, as to avoid the figure and shape of the body being exposed and visible.

4) Imitation of the opposite sex is also impermissible.

Sayyiduna Abd Allah ibn Abbas Radi Allahu Anhuma relates, that the Messenger of Allah SallAllahu Alaihi wasallam said

“Cursed are those men who imitate women and those women who imitate men.”

Bukhari

If the clothes are made for women and fulfill the above conditions then they are permissible, if not they would be impermissible.

Allah Almighty knows best.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Zaid ne ek business shuru kiya. Jisme uske rishtedaron ne paisa invest kiye.

Ab zaid ke paise apne lendaro ke pass fas gaye. Usse apna business band karna pada.

Karobar me Profit ke jitne percent par partner ke sath raza mandi ho jaaye, utna percent dena lazim hai aur Nuqsan hone par jiska jitna percent paisa laga hai, uska utna nuqsan mana jayega.

Title: Aasmani Kitabein Kitni Hai ?
Content:
