Aasmani Kitabein Chote Badi Bahut Si Nazil Hui.

Badi Kitab Ko Kitab Aur Choti Kitab Ko Sahifa Kehtein Hai.

Inmein Char Kitabein Bahut Mash’hoor Hai Aur Woh In Nabiyon Par Nazil Hui?

1) Taurat - Hazrat Musa Alaihissalam Par Nazil Hui.

2) Zaboor - Hazrat Dawood Alaihissalam Par Nazil Hui.

3) Injeel - Hazrat Isaa Alaihissalam Par Nazil Hui.

4) Quran Majeed Yeh Sabse Afzal Kitab Hai Aur Yeh Kitab Sabse Afzal Rasool Hazrat Muhammad Mustafa Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Par Nazil Hui.

Title: Kya Pura Quran Majeed Ek Bar Mein Nazil Hua, Yaa Thoda Thoda?
Content:
Jawab:

Pura Quran Majeed Ek Bar Mein Nazil Nahi Hua.

Balki Zaroorat Ke Mutabiq Tewis (23) Saal Tak, Thoda Thoda Nazil Hota Raha.

Title: Wazu ka tarika
Content:
Wazu Karne Ka Tarika Yeh Ki Pehle Tasmiya (Bismillah) Padhe.

Fir Miswak Kare, Agar Miswak Na Ho Toh Ungli Se Daant Masle.

Fir Dono Hathon Ko Gatton (गट्टों) Tak Teen Bar Dhoye.

Pehle Dahine (Right) Hath Par Paani Daale.

Fir Baaye (Left) Hath.

Par Dono Hathon Ko Ek Saath Dhoye.

Fir Dahine (Right) Hath Se Teen Bar Kulli Kare.

Fir Baaye (Left) Hath Ki Choti Ungli Se Naak Saaf Kare Aur Dahine (Right) Hath Se Teen Bar Naak Mein Paani Chadaye.

Fir Pura Chehra Dhoye.

Yaani Peshaani Par Baal Ugne Ki Jagah Se Dhadhi (Beard) Ke Neeche Tak Aur Ek Kaan Ki Lau Se Doosre Kaan Ki Lau Tak.

Har Hisse Par Teen Bar Paani Bahaye.

Iske Baad Dono Haath Kuhniyon (Elbow) Samet Teen Bar Dhoye.

Ungliyon Ki Taraf Se Kuhniyon (Elbow) Ke Upar Tak Paani Daale.

Kuhniyon (Elbow) Ki Taraf Se Na Daale.

Fir Ek Bar Dono Hath Se Pura Sar Ka Masah Kare.

Fir Kaano Ka Aur Gardan Ka Ek Ek Bar Masah Kare.

Fir Dono Paau Takhno (Ankle) Samet Teen Bar Dhoye.

Note: Dhone Ka Matlab Yeh Hai Ki Jis Cheez Ko Dhoye Uske Har Hisse Par Paani Bah Jaaye.

Title: Agar Wazu Me Kuch Hissa Bheeg Gaya
Content:
Magar Us Par Paani Naahi Baha.

Toh Wazu Hoga, Yaa Nahi?

Jawab:

Is Tarah Wazu Hargiz Na Hoga.

Bheegne Ke Saath Har Hisse Par Paani Bah Jaana Zaroori Hai

Title: Azaan Dena Farz Hai, Ya Sunnat?
Content:
Jawab:

Farz Namazo Ko Jamat Ke Saat Masjid Me Adaa Karne Ke Liye Azaan Dena Sunnat E Muakkadah Hai.

Magar UsKa Hukm Misl Wajib Ke Hai.

Yaani Agar Azaan Na Di Gayi, Toh Waha Ke Sab Loog Gunehgaar Honge!

Title: Azaan Kis Waqt Deni Chahiye ?
Content:
Jawab:

Jab Namaz Ka Waqt Ho Jaaye, Toh Azaan Deni Chahiye.

Waqt Se Pehle Jaayiz Nahi.

Agar Waqt Se Pehle Di Gayi, Toh Waqt Hone Par Lautayi Jaaye!

Title: Farz Namaz Ke Alawa Aur Kis Waqt Me Azaan Di Jaati Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Haan, Farz Namaz Ke Alawa Aur Is Waqto Me Azaan Di Jaati Hai

1) Bachche Aur Magmoom (Fikrmand) Ke Kaan Me.

2) Mirgi Waale Gazabnaak Aur Badmijaaz Aadmi, Ya Jaanwar Ke Kaan Me.

3) Saqt Ladayi Aur Aag Lagne Ke Waqt,

4) Mayyat Ko Dafan Karne Ke Baad,

5) Jin Ki Sarkashi Ke Waqt Aur

6) Jungle Me Jab Raasta Bhool Jaaye Aur Koyi Bataane Wala Na Ho,

Inn Surathon Me Azaan Kehna Mustahab Hai!

Bahare Shariyat, Shaami Jild Awwal Safa 258

Title: Fajr Namaz Ke Waqt Kitni Rakat Namaz Padhi Jaati Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Kul Chaar (4) Rakat.

Pehle Doo (2) Rakat Sunnat. 

Phir Doo (2) Rakat Farz.

Fajr Namaz Ki Doo (2) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jayegi ?

Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Sunnat Fajr Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Sunnat Rasoolullah Ki Muh Mera Taraf Kaaba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Fajr Namaz Ki Doo (2) Rakat Farz Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jayegi ?

Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Farz Fajr Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye (Muqtadi Itna Aur Kahe Peeche Iss Imam Ke) Muh Mera Taraf Kaaba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Hazrat Bilal al Habashi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu
Content:
Alqaab: Sayyed-ul-Muazzeen, Muazzin-e-Awwal.

Hazrat Bilal al Habashi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ki wilaadat 580 A.D. me Makka me hui.

Hazrat Bilal al Habashi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ke waalid ka naam Rabah aur waalida ka naam Hamamah hai.

Aap ke waalidain Habasha (Abyssinia, Ethiopia / Africa) ke the.

Ek baar Huzoor Rasool-Allah Sallallahu alaihi wassallam Makka ki ek gali se guzar rahe the.

Unho ne ek ghar me se kisi ke rone ki aawaaz suni.

Is dard bhari rone ki aawaaz sunkar be-ikhtiyaar us ghar me daakhil ho gaye.

Dekha ke ek Habashi naujawaan chakki pees raha hai aur zaar o qataar ro raha hai.

Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne us se rone ki wajah puchhi to us ne bataaya ke

‘Main ek ghulaam hu. Saara din apne maalik ki bakariya charaata hu. Shaam ko thak kar jab ghar aata hu to mera maalik mujhe gamdum ki ek bori peesne ke de deta hai. Jisko peesne me puri raat lag jaati hai. Main bhi ek insaan hu. Mera jism bhi aaraam maangta hai.

Lekin mere maalik ko mujh par zara bhi taras nahi aata hai. Main apni buri qismat par ro raha hu. Kya meri taqdeer me saari zindagi isi tarah ro rokar guzaarna hi likha hai?’

Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne farmaya ke

“Main tumhare maalik se kehkar tumhari mashaqqat to kam nahi karwa sakta kyun ki wo meri baat maanega nahi. Haan, Main tumhari thodi madad kar sakta hu.

Tumhari jagah par main chakki peesta hu aur tum so jaao.”

Wo Habashi ghulaam bahot khush hua aur shukriya ada karke so gaya.

Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam uski jagah par chakki peeste rahe.

Jab gandum khatm ho gaye to aap use baghair jagaye waapas tashreef le aaye.

Dusre din phir aap waha tashreef le gaye aur us ghulaam ko sulaakar uski jagah chakki peeste rahe.

Teesre deen bhi yahi maajra hua aur subah ko aap khaamoshi se apne ghar tashreef le aaye.

Chothe din jab aap waha gaye to us ghulaam ne kaha

‘Aye Allah ke bande!, Aap kaun hain aur mera itna khayaal kyun kar rahe hain?

Hum ghulaamo se na kisi ko koi dar hota hai aur na koi faa'ida.

To phir aap ye sab kuchh kis liye kar rahe ho?’

Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne farmaya

‘Main to ye sab insaani humdardi ke tahet kar raha hu. Iske ilaawa mujhe tum se koi garz nahi.’

Us ghulaam ne kaha ‘Aap kaun ho?’

Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne farmaya ke ‘Kya tum jaante ho ke Makka ke ek shakhs ne nabuwwat ka daawa kiya hai?'

Us ghulaam ne kaha ‘Haan, Maine suna hai ke Mohammad naami ek shakhs khud ko ALLAH ka nabi kehta hai.’

Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne farmaya ‘Main wo hi Mohammad hu.’

Ye sunkar us ghulaam ne kaha

‘Agar aap hi wo nabi hain to mujhe kalma padhaa'iye kyun ki itna shafeeq aur meharbaan koi nabi hi ho sakta hai jo ghulaamo ka bhi is qadar khayaal rakhe.’

Phir Hazrat e Bilal kalma padhkar Islam me daakhil hue.

Hazrat E Bilal as-Saabiqoon al-Awwaloon me shaamil hain.

Hazrat e Bilal ne 30 saal ki umr me jab Islam apnaaya to shuru me makhafi rakha.

Jab Hazrat e Bilal ke Maalik Umayyah ibn Khalaf ko pata chala, to usne aap ko tarah tarah ki takleef dena shuru kiya.

Wo Hazrat e Bilal ko garm ret par letakar aap ke upar bade bhari patthar rakta tha.

Hazrat e Bilal ne har takleef bardaasht ki, magar Islam aur daaman e Mustafa ko na chhoda aur apne ishq e Mustafa ka saboot diya.

Phir Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke hukm par Hazrat e Abu Bakr Siddeeq radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne Umayyah ibn Khalaf ko dusra gulaam aur kuchh raqam dekar Hazrat E Bilal ko aazad karaya.

Jab Hazrat e Abu Bakr aap ko lekar jaa rahe the tab Umayyah ibn Khalaf ne kaha.

‘Aye Abu Bakr! Tum ne bahot mahenga sauda kiya.’

To Hazrat e Abu Bakr Siddeeq ne usse kaha.

‘Tum ne sirf Bilal ko dekha hai aur maine us ke dil me ishq e Rasool ko dekha hai.’

622 A.D. me Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke Madeena Shareef aane ke baad Hazrat Bilal bhi Makka Shareef se Hijrat karke Madeena Shareef aa gaye.

Hazrat Bilal ne Jung e Badr aur dusri tamaam jang me shirkat ki.

Jung e Badr me Hazrat Bilal ne Umayyah bin Khalaf ko qatl kar diya.

Hazrat Bilal Islam ke sab se pehle Muazzin hain.

2 Hijri me jab Hazrat e Umar radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne Namaz ke liye musalmano ko jama karne ke liye Azaan pukaarne ka mashwara diya.

To Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne Hazrat e Bilal ko Muazzin muqarrar kiya.

Hazrat Bilal hamesha Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke saath rehte the, Masjid e Nabawi me ya Masjid e Quba me, ya Safar me aur Hazrat Bilal ki Azaan ki aawaaz se ashaaba ko pata chal jaata tha ke Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam kis maqaam par hain.

Jab Makka Shareef fatah hua to Hazrat Bilal ne Ka’abatullah par Azaan pukaari.

Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne Hazrat Bilal ko apna khajaanchi muqarrar kiya tha aur jab koi shakhs apni haajat lekar darbaar e nabi me aata tha to aap Hazrat e Bilal ko uske liye hukm dete the aur wo use uski haajat ki cheez dete the.

Ek martaba Huzoor E Akram Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne Fajr ke waqt Hazrat e Bilal se farmaya ke

‘Aye Bilal! Yeh bataao ke imaan laane ke baad tum ne wo kaun sa aisa amal kiya hai jo fazilat me dusre amal se badhkar hai. Kyun ki maine jannat me tumhare qadmo ki aawaaz aage aage suni.’

Hazrat Bilal ne kaha ‘Ya Rasool-Allah sallallahu alaihi wa sallam! Mujhe aisa koi amal yaad nahi aata,’

Phir kuchh der baad aap ne kaha.

‘Aye mere Aaqa! Main jab bhi wazu karta hu, chaahe din me ya raat me, to foran main 2 rak'at nafl Tahyatul Wazu padhta hu aur jab bhi mera wazu toot jaata hai to main foran wazu kar liya karta hu.’

Huzoor E Akram Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne farmaya ke ‘Aye Bilal! Ye hi wo amal ho sakta hai, jis ki wajah se ye khushkhabari mili hai.’

Sahih Bukhari, Jild -2, Hadees-1149

Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke parda farmaane ke baad Hazrat e Abu Bakr radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ke ilteja karne par Hazrat e Bilal Madeena munawwara me ruke.

Lekin unke wisaal ke baad Hazrat e Umar Farooq radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ke zamaaane me Hazrat e Bilal ne unse Jihaad ke jaane ki ijazat chaahi.

Hazrate Umar Farooq ne Madeena Shareef me rukne ki guzaarish ki, magar Hazrat Bilal na maane aur Shaam (Syria) ki taraf rawaana ho gaye aur Halab me muqeem hue.

Ek saal baad khwaab me Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ki ziyarta hui aur Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne farmaya ‘Aye Bilal! Kya hum se milna nahi chaahte?’

Hazrat Bilal foran oontni par sawaar hokar Madeena munawwara tashreef laaye.

Roza e Rasool par haazir hue aur be-inteha rote hue gir pade.

Jab Hazrat Bilal ko hosh aaya to logo ne Aap ko fajr ki azaan ke liye guzaarish ki.

Shuru me mana karne ke baad Hazrat e Hasan aur Hazrat E Hussain ko bulaaya gaya aur jab unho ne guzarish ki to Hazrat Bilal ne azaan pukaari aur sab ko Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke zamaana e zaahiri ki yaad aa gayi.

Magar ‘Ashhadu anna Mohammadur Rasool-Allah’ par pahunchkar Hazrat E Bilal ki aankho se aansoo jaari ho gaye aur aawaaz halaq me rukh gayi.

Jab Hazrat E Bilal ko hosh aaya to bataaya ke ‘Jab main ‘Ashhadu anna Mohammadur Rasool-Allah’ kehta tha to Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ko dekh leta tha.

Aaj Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ko aankho ke saamne na paaya to Aaqa ke hijr me khud ko sambhal nahi saka.’

Phir usi roz Hazrat E Bilal Mulke Shaam waapas chale gaye.

Ameer ul mo’mineen Hazrat e Umar Farooq radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu jab Jerusalem gaye to waha Hazrat e Bilal maujood the aur ashaaba ke arz karne par Hazrat e Umar Farooq Radiallaho Anhu ne unko azaan ke liye guzaarish ki.

Shuru me mana karne ke baad jab Hasnain kareemain ka waasta dekar israar kiya to Hazrat e Bilal ne azaan pukaari aur sab ko Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke zamaana e zaahiri ki yaad aa gayi.

Qaul:

Deen e Islam me kisi tarah ka jabr nahi. Hidayat paane me kisi ko barso lag jaate hain to kisi ko ek pal. Waqt ka tayyun sirf ALLAH ta’ala hi karta hai.

Hazrat Bilal ka wisaal 20 Moharram 18 Hijri (2 March 640 A.D.) ko 60 saal ki umr me hua.

Hazrat Bilal al-Habashi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ka mazaar Damascus (Syria) me ‘Baab-us-sagheer’ me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Bilal al Habashi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu aur Ashaaba ke waseele se
Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke Imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye.
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.
Aameen.

Title: Namaz me Farz Aur Sunnat Ke Chooth Jaane Se Sajda e Sahu Wajib Hota Hai Ya Nahi ?
Content: Jawab: Namaz me Farz Chooth Jaane Se Namaz Fasid Ho Jaati Hai. Sajda e Sahu Se Uski Talafi Nahi Ho Sakti. Isiliye Phir Se Padhna Padhega Aur Sunnat wa Mustahab, Jaise Ta'aouz Tasmiya, Sana, Aameen Aur Takbeerat Inteqal Ke Chooth Jaane Se Sajda e Sahu Wajib Nahi Hota. Balki Namaz Ho Jaati Hai. Magar Dobara Padhna Mustahab Hai.

Title: Namaz Me Kisi Wajib Ko Qasdan (Jan Bujhkar) Chhodh Diya
Content:
Toh Kya Sajda e Sahu Se Talafi Hogi, Ya Nahi ?

Jawab:

Namaz Me Kisi Wajib Ko Qasdan (Jan Bujhkar) Chhodh Diya Toh Sajda e Sahu Se Us Nuqsaan Ki Talafi Nahi Hogi.

Balki Namaz Ko Dobara Padhna Wajib Hoga.

Isi Tarah Agar Bhoolkar Kisi Wajib Ko Chhodh Diya Aur Sajda e Sahu Na Kiya.

Jab Bhi Namaz Ka Dobara Padhna Wajib Hai.

Title: Agar Namaz Mein Koi Ek Wajib Chhoot Gaye, Toh Kya Hukm Hai?
Content: Jawab: Is Surat Mein Bhi Sajda E Sahw Ke Wahi Do (2) Sajde Kaafi Hai.

Title: Ada Aur Qaza Kise Kehte Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Kisi Ibadat Ko Unke Waqt E Muqarrar Par Karne Ko Ada Kehte Hai Aur Waqt Guzar Jaane Ke Baad Amal Karne Ko Qaza Kehte Hai.

Title: Kaunse Namazo Ki Qaza Zaroori Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Farz Namazo Ki Qaza Farz Hai.

Witr Ki Qaza Wajib Hai Aur Fajr Ki Sunnat Agar Farz Ke Sath Qaza Ho Aur Zawal Se Pehle Padhe.

Toh Farz Ke Sath Sunnat Bhi Padhe Aur Zawal Ke Baad Padhe.

Toh Sunnat Ki Qaza Nahi Aur Zohar Yaa Juma Ke Pehle Ki Sunnatein Qaza Ho Gayi Aur Farz Padh Li.

Agar Waqt Baqi Hai, Toh Padhe Aur Afzal Yeh Hai Ki Pichle Sunnatein Padhne Ke Baad Unko Padhein.

Title: Qaza Namaz Kaunse Waqt Par Padhni Chahiye ?
Content:
Jawab:

Che (6) Ya Ussey Zyaada Qaza Namazein Padhne Ke Liye Koi Waqt Maqarrar Nahi Hai.

Haan, Jald Padhna Chahiye Takheer (Deri) Nahi Karna Chahiye Aur Umr Mein Jab Bhi Padega Choothkara Pa Jayega.

Lekin Suraj Nikalne, Suraj Doobne Aur Zawal Ke Waqt Qaza Namaz Padhna Jaayiz Nahi.

Title: Namaz me imam ke piche ruku aur sajde me jaate waqt Allahu Akhbar kehna Kaisa hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Imam ke piche Namaz Parhte waqt muqtadi ko bhi takbirat e inteqal (ruku sujood wagaira ke liye jaate waqt jo takbeer kahi jaati hai) kehna sunnat hai.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Tayammum Kab Karna Chahiye ?
Content:
Jawab: Jab Paani Par Qudrat na Ho Toh Tayammum Karna Jayez Hai.

Paani Par Qudrat Na Honi Ki Kya Surat Hai?

Jawab:

Paani Par Qudrat Na Hone Ki Yeh Surat Hai Ki Aisi Beemari Ho Ki Jo Wazu, Ya Ghusl Se Uske Zyaada Ho Jaane Ka Saheeh Andesha Ho.

Ya Aise Muqam Par Maujood Ho Ki Wahan Charon Taraf Ek Ek Meel Tak Paani Ka Kahi Pata Na Ho.

Yaa Itni Sardi Ho Ki Paani Ke Istemal Se Mar Jaane, Yaa Beemar Ho Jaane Ka Qawi Andesha Ho.

Yaa Kuwa Maujood Hai, Magar Dol wa Rassi Nahi Pata Hai! 

Inke Alawa Paani Par Qudrat Na Hone Ki Aur Bhi Surtein Hai Jo Bahare Shari'at Wagairah Badi Kitabon Se Maloom Ki Jaa Sakti Hai!

Title: Tayammum Kin Cheezon Se Toot Jata Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Jin Cheezon Se Wazu Toot Jaata Hai, Yaa Ghusl Wajib Hota Hai.

Unse Tayammum Bhi Toot Jaata Hai! Alawa Inke Paani Par Qudrat Ho Jaane Se Bhi Tayammum Toot Jata Hai!

Tayammum Ka Tarika Yeh Hai Ki Awwal Dil Mein Niyat Kare.

Fir Dono Hath Ki Ungliyan Kushada Karke Zameen Par Maare Aur Zyada Gard Lag Jaye Toh Jhadh Le.

Fir Usse Saare Munh Ka Masah Kare.

Fir Dobara Dono Hath Zameen Par Maarkar Dahine (Right) Hath Ko Baayein (Left) Hath Se Aur Baayein (Left) Hath Ko Dahine (Right) Hath Se Kuhniyon Samet Maley.

Tayammum Kin Cheezo Se Karna Jaayez Hai?

Jawab:

Paak Mitthi, Patthar, Reth, Multani Mitthi, Geru, Kachchi, Ya Pakki Int (ईंट), Mutthi Aur Int Patthar, Yaa Chuna Ki Deewaron Se Tayammum Karna Jaayez Hai!

Tayammum Kin Cheezo Se Karna Naajaayez Hai?

Jawab:

Sona, Chandi, Tamba, Peetal, Loha, Lakdi, Aluminium, Kapda, Raak Aur Har Qism Ke Galla Se Tayammum Karna NaaJaayez Hai!

Yaani Jo Cheezien Aag Mein Pigal Jaati Hai, Yaa Jalkar Raak Ho Jaati Hai Un Cheezon Se Tayammum Karna Naajaayez hai!

Title: Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Alqaab: Qamar-e-Millat Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ki wiladat 14 Sha’abaan 1365 Hijri (14 July 1946 A.D.) ko Mohalla Khwaja Qutub, Bareilly Shareef me hui. Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan urfe Jeelaani Miyan bin Hujjat-ul-Islam Hamid Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi aur waalida ka naam Sarkaar begum binte Hazrat Mufti e azam e Hind Muhammad Mustafa Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi hai. 4 saal 4 maah 4 din ki umr me Aap ki Bismillah khwaani hui. Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne ibtidaai ta’aleem apne waalide mohtaram Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan Bareilwi se haasil ki. Phir Jaamia Razawiya Manzar e Islam me Arabi, Faarsi aur Deeniyaat ki ta’aleem haasil ki. 1379 Hijri (1960 A.D.) me Hazrat Mufti e azam e Hind Muhammad Mustafa Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed hue. 1385 Hijri (1966 A.D.) me Aligardh Muslim University tashrif le gaye aur Asri ta’aleem haasil ki. Aap Arabi, Faarsi, Urdu, Hindi aur Angrezi zabaano ke maahir the. Aur Science, Ilm e Riyazi, Ilm-ul-Aa’daad aur Taarikh goi wagairah uloom ke bhi maahir the. Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi Shamsi taarikh se Qamari taarikh bila taraddud nikaal diya karte the. 1984 A.D. me Ahle Silsila Hazrat ke pur-zor israar par Aap Bai'at wa irshad ki taraf maa'il hue. Aap Ahle Sunnat wal Jamat ki isha’at ke liye Hindustan ke kai ilaaqe aur Iraq, Iran, Pakistan, aur Sri Lanka ka safar karte rehte the. Aakhri arse me Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ko kaafi waqt se sugar aur dil ke marz tha. Uske ba-wajood Aap tableeghi safar farmaate rahe. Aap apne kharche se ek Daar-ul-Uloom bhi chalaate the, jiski khabar kisi ko nahi thi. Karamat: (1) Ek martaba Aap ek Gaanv se guzar rahe the. Achaanak Aap ne farmaya ke “Yaha koi takleef zada hai.” Aur gaadi rukwaai aur utar kar baghair kisi ki raahnumaai ke chalte chalte ek ghar par pahunche. Us ghar ke rehne waale Bad mazhab the. Unka ek louta bachcha shadeed beemaar tha. Aap ne us par dam farmaya, ALLAH ke fazl se woh foran theek ho gaya. Yeh karamat dekh kar sab usi waqt Sunni Saheeh-ul-Aqeeda ho gaye aur Hazrat se bai'at kar li. (2) Aap ke saahabzaade Maulana Umar Raza Khan bayaan karte hain ki: Ek martaba Aap ‘Baliya’ gaanv (Zila Muzaffarpur, Bihar) se guzar rahe the. Yaha nadi ka bahaaw musalmano ke ilaaqe ki taraf tha. Aap ne Chhadi Mubarak se us nadi ki taraf ishaara kiya aur zere lab kuchh padha, jis par nadi ka rukh tabdeel ho kar dusri taraf ho gaya. Jo ab tak isi tarah maujood hai. Hazrat ki is karaamat ko dekh kar be-shumaar Ghair Muslim Islam me daakhil ho gaye. Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ka Nikah 23 Zil Hijja 1394 Hijri (12 January 1975 A.D.) ko me Hazrat Mufti e azam e Hind Mustafa Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ki Nawaasi se hua. Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke 3 saahabzaade aur 1 saahabzaadi hain. Saahabzaade:
  1. Maulana Umar Raza Khan.
  2. Maulana Aamir Raza Khan.
  3. Maulana Aasim Raza Khan.
Aap Hazrat Mufti e azam e Hind Muhammad Mustafa Raza Khan Bareilwi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed hain. Hazrat Sadr-ul-Ulama Allama Mufti Tehseen Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne Aap ko khilaafat ata farmayi hai. 24 June 2012 A.D. ko raat me Aap ki tabiyat kuchh naasaaz thi aur sugar badhi hui thi. Lihaaza Doctor ne dawa dekar aaraam karne ke liye kaha. Dusre din mutabiq ko maamool ke mutaabiq sugar badh gayi. Ek baje raat ka khaana khaaya aur phir dedh baje Aap ke saahabzaade Maulana Umar Raza Khan ne dawa khila kar Aap ko kamre me leta diya. Raat ko hi Aap ka intiqaal hua. Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 5 Sha’abaan 1433 Hijri (25 June 2012 A.D.) ko hua. 27 June budh ke roz baad namaz e Asr Islamiya Inter College maidaan me namaz e janaza padhayi gayi. Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ki namaz e janaza (Aap ke biraadar) Hazrat Tajushshariah Maulana Muhammad Akhtar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne padhayi. Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Bareilly Shareef (Uttar Pradesh) me hai. ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb sallallāhu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Allama Qamar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke Imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye. Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye. Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan urfe Jilani Miyan rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Alqaab: Mufassir e azam, Qamr-ul-Aarifeen. Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ki wiladat 10 Rabi’ ul aakhir 1325 Hijri (May 1907 A.D.) ko Bareilly Sharif (Uttar Pradesh) me hui. Hazrat Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Hujjat ul Islam Hamid Raza Khan bin Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi hai. Hazrat Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke daada jaan Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne aap ke kaan me Azaan aur Iqaamat padhi aur khajoor chabaakar aap ke munh me rakhi. Hazrat Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke aqeeqah me Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne madrasa ke tamaam talba ko khaas daawat ki aur ye ehtamaam kiya ke sab khush ho. 14 Sha’abaan 1329 Hijri (July 1911 A.D.) ko aap ki Bismillah khwaani ki gayi. Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne apni waalida se Quran majeed ki aur Urdu ki taaleem haasil ki. 7 saal ki umr me aap ko Daar-ul-Uloom Manzar e Islam me daakhil kiya gaya. Hazrat Hujjat ul Islam Maulana Haamid Raza Khan, Hazrat Maulana Ahsaan Ali Saahib Muhaddees Faizpuri, aur Hazrat Muhaddees e azam Pakistan Maulana Sardaar Ahmad se taaleem haasil ki. 1344 Hijri (1926 A.D.) me 19 saal ki umr me aap Aalim aur Faazil hue. Hazrat Hujjat ul Islam ne aap ki dastaarbandi ki aur aap ko khilaafat ata farmayi. Hazrat Hujjat ul Islam ke wisaal ke baad Huzoor Mufti e azam e Hind ne aap ko khilaafat aur Madrasa ki zimmedaari ata farmayi. Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne puri zindagi saadgi ke saath guzzari. Aap hamesha Sunnat e Rasool par amal karte aur sab ko iske liye taaleem dete. Aap namaz e Fajr ke baad kuchh waqt wazife me guzaarte. Phir Madrasa me taaleem ke liye jaate. Aap Muslim Shareef, Tirmizi Shareef aur Mishkaat Shareef ka dars dete. Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi apne shaagirdo ki Wahabi ko bad-aqeeda ke baare me bataakar unko radh karne ke liye saboot paish karke taaleem dete. Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi bahot achhe muqarrir the. Ek baar ek 2 roza jalse me pehle din aap ne ek shaandaar taqreer farmayi. Dusre din Hazrat Muhaddees e azam Kichhauchhwi rahmatullahi alaihi ne taqreer farmayi tab 20 wahabi unke paas aaye aur kaha ke ‘Hazrat ki kal raat ki taqreer se muta’asir hokar hume hamare galat aqeedo ka pata chala hai.’ Aur un logo ne tauba ki. Aap ne ‘Aala Hazrat’ naam se maahaana risaala jaari kiya aur logo ko Ahle Sunnat wal Jamat ki taaleem dena shuru kiya. Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ki likhi hui kitaabein:
  1. Zikrullah
  2. Ne'amatullah
  3. Hujjatullah
  4. Fazaa'il e Durood Shareef
  5. Tafseer Surah Balad
  6. Tashreeh Qasida Nu’maania
1372 Hijri (1953 A.D.) me aap Haramain shareefain tashreef le gaye tab Makkah mukarrama aur Madeena munawwara ke ulama ne aap ki bahot ta’azeem ki. Karamat: (1) Ek baar ek paidaishi gunge shakhs ko aap ki baargaah me laaya gaya. Aap ne us ke liye dua farmai to ALLAH ta’ala ke fazl se wo shakhs bolne laga. Hazrat ki ye karaamat dekhkar tablighi jama’at ke bahot saare logo ne apni bad-aqeeda se tauba karli. (2) Ek baar ek shakhs apni biwi ke saath aap ki baargaah me aaya aur arz kiya ke ‘Mera saale ko qatl ke galat ilzaam me giraftaar kar liya gaya hai. Uske pariwaar ki zimmedaari uske upar thi. Aap uski rihaai ke liye dua farma dijiye.’ Aap ne jab jaan liya ke us shakhs ka saala Sunni hai to aap ne ek kagaaz liya aur us par ‘Allahu Rabbu Muhammadin Salla alaihi wa sallama Nahnu Ibaadu Muhammadin Salla alaihi wa sallama’ likhkar diya. Aur us qaidi shakhs ko yaad karne ke liye aur kasrat se padhne ke liye farmaya. Aur farmaya ‘Ise taaweez banaakar us shakhs ke baazu par baandhne ke liye kehna. Agar ALLAH ne chaaha to wo riha ho jaayega.’ 10 din baad wo dono us shakhs ke saath lekar niyaz (meethaai) lekar aaye aur kaha ‘Aap ki dua se mera saala be-gunaah saabit hua aur dusre do shakhs jinho ne qatl kiya tha unhe umr qaid ki saza hui hai.’ Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne unko Silsila me daakhil kiya aur unhe namaz ki pabaandi karne ka aur kasrat se durood shareef ka wird karne ke liye naseehat ki. Aqwaal:
  1. Mere apne aib mujhe dusro ke aib dhundhne se rokte hain.
  2. ALLAH ta’ala ne hume 2 haath aur 1 zabaan di hai taake hum sune zyada aur bole kam.
  3. Amal ke bagair ilm rooh ke liye bojh hai.
  4. Sabr Zeher se zyada kadwa lagta hai magar uska phal shahed se zyada meetha hota hai.
  5. ALLAH ta’ala use dunya me bhi raahat deta hai jo aakhirat ke liye nek amal karta hai.
  6. Mulk ki shaan uske ulma se hoti hai.
Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ka nikah Sarkaar begum binte Hazrat Mufti e azam e Hind Muhammad Mustafa Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi se hua. Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke 5 bete aur 3 betiya hain. Saahabzaade:
  1. Hazrat Allama Rehaan Raza Khan
  2. Hazrat Tajushshariah Allama Mufti Mohammad Akhtar Raza Khan
  3. Hazrat Dr. Qamar Raza Khan
  4. Hazrat Manaan Raza Khan Manaani Miya
  5. Hazrat Tanweer Raza Khan.
Saahabzaadiya:
  1. Sarfraaz Begum (Jinka nikah Hazrat Maulana Shaukat Hasan Khan se hua hai)
  2. Sartaaj Begum (Jinka nikah Hazrat Abdul Haseeb se hua hai)
  3. Dilshaad Begum (Jinka nikah Younus Raza Khan se hau hai)
Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi Hazrat Hujjat ul Islaam Maulana Hamid Raza Khan ke mureed aur khalifa hain. Huzoor Mufti e azam e Hind Muhammad Mustafa Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne bhi aap ko khilaafat ata farmayi hai. Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 11 Safar 1385 Hijri (12 June 1965 A.D.) ko Peer ke roz hua. Aap ki namaz e janaza Mufti Sayyed Muhammad Afzal Husain ne padhaai. Mufti Muhammad Afzal Husain, Maulana Muhammad Ahsaan Ali, Maulana Sayyed Aarif Ali, Sayyed Ijaaz Husain aur Muhammad Ghaus Khan ne aap ko qabr me utaara. Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Bareilly Shareef (Uttar Pradesh) me Aala Hazrat ke bagal me hai. ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Maulana Muhammad Ibraheem Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke Imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye. Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye. Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu
Content:
Laqab: Waaris-ul-Islam.

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ki wiladat 568 A.D. me Hayy, Isfahan (Iran) me hui.

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ka paida'ishi naam ‘Roazbeh’ tha.

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ke waalid ka naam Hushiel hai.

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ke waalid bahot ameer the aur ilaaqe ke sardaar (Dihqan) the.

Aap aatish-parast (Magian) khaandaan me paida hue the Aur jawaan hone par aap ko zimmedaari di gayi ke us aatish ki nigraani rakhe ke wo hamesha jalta rahe.

Aap ke waalid ki bahot saari milkat aur zimmedariya thi.

Ek baar unho ne Hazrat Salman Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko unke badle kuchh zimmedaari ada karne ke liye bheja.

Raste me wo ek church ke paas se guzre aur waha unki prayer ki awaaz sunkar andar daakhil hue aur unki ibadat ka tareeqa dekhkar unhe laga ke ye mazhab hamare mazhab se behtar hai.

Waha der tak rookne ke baad jab raat ko apne ghar gaye to apne waalid ke puchhne par saari baat batayi.

Unko ye dar laga ke kahi Hazrat Salman Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu apna mazhab chhod na de.

Isliye unho ne use pair me zanjeer baandhkar qaid karke rakha.

<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script>
<!-- Display ad -->
<ins class="adsbygoogle" style="display: block;" data-ad-client="ca-pub-8429140506595796" data-ad-slot="1692437615" data-ad-format="auto" data-full-width-responsive="true"></ins>
<script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
</script>

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne kisi tarah isaiyo (Christian) ko paighaam pahunchaya aur phir ek din waha se bhaagkar Shaam ki taraf ja rahe kaafile ke saath wo Shaam ke ek church me pahunche aur waha ke Paadri ke saath rehkar church ki khidmat karne lage.

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne dekha ke wo paadri mazhab ke naam par apne maanne walo ke paas se maal leta hai aur ghareebo ko dene ke badle khud jama karta hai.

Jab wo paadri mar gaya aur sab log use dafn karne ke liye aaye to Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne saari baat unhe batayi.

To unho ne use dafn karna mauqoof rakha aur use patthar maarne lage.

Iske baad jo naya paadri aaya wo bahot achha aur ibadat karne waala tha.

Uski maut ke baad Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu Mosul, Nisibis aur dusri maqaam par Eisaaiyo ke saath rahe.

Aakhir me unho ne suna ke Arab me ek nek shakhs ne ALLAH ke Nabi hone ka elaan kiya hai.

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne Ammuriyah se guzar rahe Banu Kalb qabeele ke Arab sardaaro ke giroh ko unke saath arab me le jaane ke liye kaha aur us ke liye apne paas jo bhi maal tha wo sab unhe de diya.

Wo unko apne saath le gaye.

Magar Madeena Shareef ke qareeb Waadi al-Qura me pahunchkar unho ne apna waada tod diya aur Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko Banu Qurayzah ke Usman bin Ash'hal naami ek yahudi ko bech diya.

Usne Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko apne bhateeje ko bech diya, Woh Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko apne saath Yasrib le gaya.

Ek baar Aap ek darakht ke upar the, tab Aap ne apne Maalik ko kisi se baat karte suna ke Yasrib ke Aws aur Khazraaj khaandan ke log Quba ilaaqe me ek shakhs se milne gaye hain.

Jo Makka Shareef se hijrat karke aaya hai aur wo keh raha hai ke wo ALLAH ka Nabi hai.

<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script>
<!-- Display ad -->
<ins class="adsbygoogle" style="display: block;" data-ad-client="ca-pub-8429140506595796" data-ad-slot="1692437615" data-ad-format="auto" data-full-width-responsive="true"></ins>
<script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
</script>

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne use us nabi ke baare me kuchh aur bataane ke liye kaha to Maalik ne ghusse me aap ko buri tarah pita aur apne kaam par lag jaane ke liye kaha.

Shaam ke waqt Aap baargaah e Mustafa me pahunche aur kaha ke ‘Maine suna hai aap ne nabi hone ka elan kiya hai aur hijrat karke yaha aaye hain aur pareshaan hain. Main aap ke liye kuchh khajoor laaya hu jo Sadqa hai.’

Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne use lekar apne ashaaba ko khaane ke liye de diya, Lekin khud nahi khaya.

Phir Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wa sallam jab Quba se Madeena Sharif pahunche to Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu waha gaye aur kaha ‘Main phir se aap ke liye khajoor laaya hu, jo mere taraf se aap ke liye hadiya (tohfa) hai.’

Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne use lekar khud bhi khaaya aur apne ashaaba ko bhi khaane ke liye kaha.

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne eisaayio ki kitaab Injeel me padha tha ke Nabi sadqa nahi khaate.

Isliye Aap ne Islam apna liya.

Baad me Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne unke maalik ko Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko aazaad karne ke liye kaha to us ne badle me 40 awakiyah (taqreeban sawa sher) sona aur 300 khajoor ke darakht maange.

Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne apne haatho se khajoor ke bij boye aur usme se ek raat me 300 khajoor ke darakht tayyar hue aur usi saal khajoor dene lage (jo Ajwa ke naam se mash'hoor hai). Aur Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne ek ande ke barabar sona diya jo maale ghanimat me aaya tha.

Hazrat e Salman ne arz kiya ‘Ya Rasool-Allah sallallahu alaihi wa sallam! 40 awakiyah sona chaahiye, Kya itna kaafi hoga?’

Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne us sone par apni zabaan mubarak pher di.

Phir jab us sone ka wazan kiya gaya to wo barabar 40 awakiyah hua, na zyada na kam. Aur is tarah Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ko aazad karaya.

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu hamesha kehte the ‘Main Salman hu, Hazrat e Adam ki aulaad me se Islam ka beta.’

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu Ashaab e Suffa me saamil hain.

Hazrat e Salman al-Farsi, Abu Zar Jundub ibn Junaada al-Ghaffaari, Miqdaad bin Aswad aur Ammaar ibn Yaasir radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhuma ko Mo’mino ke 4 sutoon kaha gaya hai.

Roze mehshar jab ALLAH ta’ala Hazrat e Eisa alaihis salaam ki qaum me se aur Huzoor Rasool-Allah Muhammad Mustafa sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ki ummat me se un logo ko bulaayega jo apne nabi ke bataye hue deen par saabit qadam rahe tab Hazrat e Eisa alaihis salaam ke hawaariyo ko aur Ummat e Muhammadi me se in 4 ashaaba ko aage kiya jayega.

Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne Hazrat e Salman Farsi aur Hazrat e Abu Darda radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhuma ko aapaas me bhai banaaya tha.

Hazrat Abu Darda Aap ki har baat maante the.

Ek baar Hazrat Salman Farsi Hazrat Abu Darda ke ghar gaye to pata chala ke unki biwi puraane kapde pehenti hain.

<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script>
<!-- Display ad -->
<ins class="adsbygoogle" style="display: block;" data-ad-client="ca-pub-8429140506595796" data-ad-slot="1692437615" data-ad-format="auto" data-full-width-responsive="true"></ins>
<script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
</script>

Aap ne puchha to bataaya ke ‘Aap ke bhai Abu Darda dunya ki khwaahishat se hamesha door rehna chaahte hain.’

Itne me Hazrat Abu Darda aaye aur Hazrat e Salman Farsi ke liye khaana lagaaya.

Hazrat e Salman Farsi ne unko bhi saath khaana khane ke liye kaha to unho ne kaha ke ‘Maine roza rakha hai.’

Hazrat e Salman Farsi kaha ke ‘Jab tak tum mere saath khana nahi khaaoge, main bhi nahi khaaunga.’

Ye sunkar Hazrat e Abu Darda aap ke saath khaana khaane ke liye baithe.

Phir raat ko dono saath me so gaye.

Kuchh waqt sone ke baad Hazrat Abu Darda Tahajjud ke liye khade hue.

Hazrat e Salman Farsi ne unko kuchh der wapas sone ke liye kaha.

Hazrat Abu Darda so gaye.

Phir kuchh waqt baad Hazrat Abu Darda phir se khade hue.

Hazrat e Salman Farsi ne phir se sone ke liye kaha.

Jab raat ka aakhri waqt baaqi raha to Hazrat e Salman Farsi ne uthaaye aur dono ne saath me namaz padhi.

Phir Hazrat e Salman Farsi ne unse kaha ke ‘Hamare Rab ke hamare upar haqooq hain, Hamari khud ke bhi hamare upar huqooq hain, Hamare mehmaan ke bhi hum par huquooq hain, Hamare ghar waalo aur rishtedaaro ke bhi ham par huqooq hain. Is liye hame sab ke huqooq ada karne chahiye.’

Hazrat e Abu Darda ne Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ki baargaah me ye sab baatein bayaan ki.

To aap ne fauran farmaya ke ‘Salman ne sach hi kaha hai.’

Aap Jung e badr ke ilaawa dusri bahot saari jungo me saamil hue.

Jung e Badr ke mauqe par aap Ghulaam hone ki wajah se jung me saamil nahi ho sake.

Ghazwa e khandaq ke mauqe par jab ashaaba alag alag mashwara de rahe the, tab Hazrat e Salman Farsi ke mashware par Madeena ki hifazat ke liye Madeena ke ird-gird khandaq khodi gayi aur Jab kaafiro ka lashkar aaya aur jung hui to musalmano ko fateh haasil hui.

Is mauqe par Muhajireen aur Ansaar ashaaba ke giroh ek dusre se ye kehne lage ke ‘Salman Farsi ham se hain.’

Jab Huzoor sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne ye baat suni to aap ne farmaya ke ‘Salman na Muhajireen me se hai aur na Ansaar me se, Balke wo hum me se hai aur ahle bait ki tarah hai.’

Hazrat e Ali radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu Aap ko ‘Luqmaan al-Hakeem’ kehkar bulaate the.

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ne Quran majeed ka Farsi me tarjuma kiya.

Is tarah Aap Quran majeed ka ghaire arabi me tarjuma karne waale sab se pehle shakhs hain.

16 Hijri me muslim lashkar ne Faars (Iran) ko gher liya aur Hazrat e Salman ne Faarsiyo se kaha ke ‘Main tum logo me se hi hu. Tum par koi zyadati nahi ki jayegi. Tumhare paas 3 raaste hain; Tum log Islam apna lo aur isse tum hamare bhai ban jaaoge, Ya tum musalmano ko hukoomat de do aur Jizyah ada karte raho aur ham tumhari zimmedari uthaayenge, Ya hamare saath jang karo.’

Faarsiyo ne dusra raasta qubool kiya.

<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script>
<!-- Display ad -->
<ins class="adsbygoogle" style="display: block;" data-ad-client="ca-pub-8429140506595796" data-ad-slot="1692437615" data-ad-format="auto" data-full-width-responsive="true"></ins>
<script>
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
</script>

Hazrat e Salman Farsi ko 30000 musalman ki fauj ke saath waha ka subedaar (governor) muqarrar kiya gaya.

Aap hamesha saadgi se rehte the aur khud mehnat karke kamate the. Aap ne rehne ke liye apna ghar bhi nahi banaaya tha aur ek kambal ke saath paid ke neeche soya karte the.

Aap Huzoor Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke khalifa Hazrat e Abu Bakr Siddeeq radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ke khalifa hain aur Siddiqeeya silsila e tareeqat me teesre Shaikh hain. (Jo Hazrat Shaikh Baha-ud-deen Naqshband rahmatullahi alaihi se ‘Naqshbandi’ silsila kehlaata hai.)

Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu ke khalifa Hazrat Imam Qasim ibn Muhammad ibn Abu Bakr Siddeeq rahmatullahi alaihi hain.

Aap ka wisaal 10 Safar 33 Hijri (654 A.D.) me hua.

Aap ka mazaar Madain (Iraq) me hai.

ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me
Aur Hazrat Salman Al Farsi radiy-Allahu ta’ala anhu aur Ashaaba ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke Imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye
Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye.
Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Laqab: Hakeem-ul-Islaam. Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ki wiladat 1310 Hijri (1893 A.D.) me Bareilly Shareef (Uttar Pradesh) me hui. Aap ke waalid ka naam Hazrat Hasan Raza Khan bin Hazrat Naqi Ali Khan rahmatullahi alaihi hai. Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke bhatije hain. Bunyaadi ta’aleem ke baad Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke waalid ne aap ko Daar ul uloom Manzar e Islam me daakhil kiya. Aap ne Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan, Maulana Raham Ilahi Mangloori, Maulana Mufti Irshaad Husain Mujadidi Faarooqi, Maulana Zahoor ul Hasan Faarooqui Rampuri, Maulana Noor ul Husain Mujadidi Farooqui, Maulana Abdul Azeez aur Maulana Hidayatullah Khan Joenpuri se taalim haasil ki. 1328 Hijri (1910 A.D.) me Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi Daar-ul-uloom Manzar-e-Islam me Mudarris bane. Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke mash'hoor shaagird:
  1. Hazrat Sher Besha e Ahle Sunnat Maulana Mufti Hashmat Ali Khan Pilibhiti
  2. Hazrat Maulana Mufti Aijaaz Wali Khan Razawi (Lahore)
  3. Hazrat Maulana Mufti Taqaddus Ali Khan Bareilwi
  4. Hazrat Maulana Ghulaam Jeelaani Aazmi
  5. Hazrat Mohsin e Millat Maulana Haamid Ali Faarooqi Raipuri
  6. Hazrat Maulana Mufti Abraar Hasan Haamidi
  7. Hazrat Maulana Idrees Raza Khan.
Aap Hazrat Allama Shah Sayyed Abul Husain Ahmad Noori Barkati Qadri rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain. Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne bhi Aap ko khilaafat ata farmayi hai. Pariwaar: Aap ka nikah Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ki saahabzaadi ke saath hua. Unse Aap ki 1 saahabzaadi hain. Unke inteqal ke baad Aap ka dusra nikah Aala Hazrat ki dusri saahabzaadi ke saath hua. Unse Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ke 3 saahabzaade aur 1 saahabzaadi hain.
  1. Hazrat Ameen-e-Shariat Shabi e Mufti e azam Allama Sibtain Raza Khan.
  2. Hazrat Sadr-ul-Ulama Mazhar e Mufti e azam Maulana Mufti Tahseen Raza Khan.
  3. Hazrat Yaadgaar-e-Salf Alamma Maulana Habeeb Raza Khan.
Aap ki saahabzaadi ka nikah Huzoor Tajushshariah Akhtar Raza Khan Azhari Miyan ke saath hua hai. Aqwaal:
  1. Har museebat Dars e Ibrat hai. Museebat par rona dohari museebat hai. Sabr aur Chaarakaar ki talaash behtar hai.
  2. Khuda ka dost sab ka Dost hai aur us ka nafarmaan kisi ka dost nahi.
  3. Haraam ka maal rehta nahi behta hai.
Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne bahot saari Na’at e Mustafa aur Manqabat likhi hai. Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ki likhi hui Naat shareef me ye mash'hor hai: Teri naal-e-muqaddas jiske sar par saaya gustar hai, Wohi farma rawa-e-haft kishwar hai sikandar hai. Aap ne Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi kim shaan me ek mash'hoor Manqabat likhi hai: ‘Madad ka waqt hai aye Hazrate Ahmad Raza utho, Ghareebo ko sahaara do mareezo ki dawa utho.’ Aala Hazrat aap se bahot mohabbat karte the aur unho ne apni wasiyat likhne ke liye Aap ko pasand kiya tha. Aap ne Bareilly Shareef me Hasani Press ke naam se ek chhaapkhaana shuru kiya aur Aala Hazrat kitaabein shaaye karna shuru kiya. Aur dusre kitaabein aur risaale bhi shaaye karna shuru kiya. Aap ye sab kitaabein muft me taqsim bhi karte the. Iske liye waqt kam padne laga tab Aap ne Daar ul uloom me mudarris ka kaam chhod diya. Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 5 Safar 1401 Hijri (14 December 1980 A.D.) ko hua. Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Bareilly Shareef (Uttar Pradesh) me hai. ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Allama Mufti Hasnain Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye. Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye. Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Hafiz E Millat Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Alqaab: Hafiz-e-Millat, Ustad-ul-Ulama, Jalaalatul-Ilm. Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ki wiladat (1894 A.D.) me Peer ke roz Bhojpur (Muradabad, Uttar Pradesh) me hui. Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ke waalid ka naam Hafiz Ghulaam Noor hai. Hafiz-e-Millat ne apne waalid se ta’aleem haasil ki aur Hafiz e Quran hue. Bhojpur me Urdu aur Faarsi ki ta’aleem haasil karne ke baad Aap Muradabad Madrasa Naeemiya me gaye aur waha 3 saal ta’aleem haasil ki. Iske baad 1342 Hijri (1924 A.D.) me Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi Ajmer Madrasa Moeeniya me gaye aur Dars-e-Nizaami mukammal kiya. Phir Huzoor Hafiz e Millat ne Ajmer me Hazrat Sadrush-Shariah Maulana Amjad Ali Azmi rahmatullahi alaihi se Hadees ki ta’aleem haasil ki. Magar Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ko 1351 Hijri (1932 A.D.) me Bareilly Shareef me sanad ata ki gai. Sha’abaan 1352 Hijri (December 1933 A.D.) me Hazrat Sadrush-Shariah ki daawat par Aap Bareilly Shareef gaye aur Hazrat ke farmaan par Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ne Madrasa Ashrafiya Misbaah-ul-Uloom, Mubarakpur me dars wa ta’aleem dena shuru kiya. 29 Shawwaal 1352 Hijri (14 February 1934 A.D.) me Aap ko Madrasa Ashrafiya Misbaah-ul-Uloom ka Sadr-ul-Mudarris banaaya gaya. Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mehnat se Madrasa ki shohrat badhne lagi aur talba ki ta’adaad badhne lagi. Phir 1353 Hijri (1935 A.D.) me Aap ne madrasa nayi imaarat me ‘Daar-ul-Uloom Ashrafiya Misbaah-ul-Uloom’ naam se shuru kiya jiski bunyaad Aala Hazrat, Maulana Sayyed Ali Husain Ashrafi Miyan aur Hazrat Sadrush-Shariah Maulana Amjad Ali Azmi ke dast e mubarak se rakhi gayi. Jab talba ki ta’adaad aur badhne lagi aur Madrasa ko ek badi jagah me tabdeel karne ki zaroorat padi tab Rabi ul awwal 1392 Hijri (May 1972 A.D.) me Huzoor Mufti-e-azam e Hind Mustafa Raza Khan aur Allama Arshad-ul-Qaadri ke dast e mubarak se ‘Al-Jaamiatul Ashrafiya’ ki bunyaad rakhi gayi. Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ki khwaahish thi ke Madrasa me talba ko tamaam uloom ke saath Arabi aur Angrezi dono zabaan ki pukhta taaleem di jaaye. Taake faarigh hone ke baad duniya ke kisi bhi mulk me wo ta’aleem e deen ka kaam kar sake. Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ke bahot saare shaagirdo ne khidmat e deen ka kaam jaari rakha hai. Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mash'hoor shaagird:
  1. Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi
  2. Faqeeh e azam e Hind Mufti Shareef-ul-Haq Amjadi
  3. Raees-ul-Qalam Allama Arshad-ul-Qaadri (Baani e Jaamia Faiz-ul-Uloom, Jamshedpur, Daar-ul-Uloom Amjadia, Mau wa Jaamia Hazrat Nizaam-ud-deen Aulia, Delhi)
  4. Muhaddees-e-Kabeer Allama Mufti Zia-ul-Mustafa Aazami (Jaamia Amjadiya Razawiya, Ghosi)
  5. Allama Badr-ud-deen Ahmad Razawi
  6. Bahr-ul-Uloom Mufti Abdul Mannaan Aazami
  7. Imam-ul-Ma’aqoolat Maulana Hafiz Abdul Ra'oof Balyawi
  8. Shaikh-ul-Islam Allama Sayyed Muhammad Madani Ashrafi (Baani e Muhaddees-e-Aazam Mission)
  9. Mufakkir-e-Islam Allama Qamar-uz-Zamaan Aazami (Baani e Jami’at-ul-Islaamiya, Ronahi)
  10. Allama Mohammad Ahmad Misbaahi (Sadr e Jami’at-ul-Ashrafia, Mubarakpur)
  11. Allama Yasin Akhtar Misbaahi (Baani e Daar-ul-Qalam, Delhi)
  12. Allama Badr-ul-Qaadri (Islamic Academy, The Hague)
  13. Dr. Jalaal-ud-deen Ahmad Noori (Karachi University)
Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi har amal Sunnat e Rasool ke mutaabiq karte the. Ek baar Hafiz e Millat ke daanye paanv me zakhm ho gaya. Ek saahab ne dawa laakar kaha ‘Hazrat! Dawa haazir hai.’ Sardi ka mausam tha, Hazrat moza pehne hue the. Huzoor Hafiz e Millat ne baaye (ulte) pair ka moza utaara to wo saahab bol pade ‘Hazrat! Zakhm to daahine paanv me hai.’ Huzoor Hafiz e Millat ne farmaya ‘Baaye paanv ka pehle utaarna Sunnat hai.’ 1386 Hijri (1967 A.D.) me Huzoor Hafiz e Millat ne Hajj ada kiya. Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ne photo na nikalwakar paaband e shariat hone ka saboot diya. Madeena munawwara me qayaam ke dauraan ek martaba Aap Roza e Rasool Sallallahu alaihi wassallam par haath uthakar dua kar rahe the to ek Wahabi Police Officer ne Huzoor Hafiz e Millat ko roka aur kaha ke ‘Qibla ki jaanib haath uthakar dua karo.’ Huzoor Hafiz e Millat ne Roza e Rasool ke adab ki wajah se koi jawab na diya. Magar woh Huzoor Hafiz e Millat ko pichhe khinchkar waha se door karne laga. Jab usne kaha ke ‘Roza e Rasool ki jaanib rookh karke dua karna Shirk hai.’ Tab Hafiz-e-Millat ne usse kaha ke ‘Quran majeed me ALLAH ta’ala Waseela ke liye farmata hai aur Huzoor Rasool-Allah Sallallahu alaihi wassallam ALLAH ta’ala ki baargaah me Waseela hain.’ Usne kaha ‘Nek aamaal ko Waseela banaana chaahiye.’ Huzoor Hafiz e Millat ne farmaya ‘Kya musalman ke nek aamaal hamesha maqbool hote hain.’ Wo khaamosh raha. Huzoor Hafiz-e-Millat ne farmaya ‘Koi bhi shakhs ye nahi jaanta ke uske nek aamaal qubool hote hain ya nahi. Har insaan qubool hone ki ummeed rakhte hue nek amal karta hai. Lekin Huzoor Rasool-Allah Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ki zaat mubarak to ALLAH ta’ala ki baargaah me Maqbool hi hai aur isme koi shak nah hai. Aur jo maqbool ho usi ko ALLAH ta’ala ki baargaah me Waseela bana sakte hain. Chunaanche Huzoor Nabi e kareem Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam behtareen Waseela hain.’ Ye sunkar woh Police Officer baghair kuchh kahe waha se chala gaya. Tasannif: Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ki likhi hui mash'hoor kitaabein:
  1. Ma’arif-e-Hadees
  2. Fatawa Azeeziya
  3. Irshaad-ul-Qur’an
  4. Anba'-ul-Ghaib
  5. Al-Misbaah-ul-Jadeed
  6. Firqa-e-Na’ajiya
  7. Haashiya Sharh Mishkaat.
Aqwaal:
  1. Dunya me amal karoge to qabr me raahat paaoge.
  2. Har aitraaz ka jawab sahi amal se hi dena chahiye.
  3. Amal karne waale bano kyun ki sahi amal se hi izzat badhti hai.
  4. Maal o daulat ALLAH ta’ala ki ne'amat hai, magar use nek kaam me kharch karne ki aadat bahot badi ne'amat hai.
  5. Woh shakhs Qaabile ehtaraam hai jis ke libaas me saadgi ho aur dil me sahi ilm ho.
  6. Hamesha dusro ki achhai dekho aur apne aib par nazar rakho.
  7. Apni izzat kuchh nahi, Asl izzat deen ki hai. Deen ki jalaalate shaan se hamari shaan hai.
Huzoor Hafiz-e-Millat ko Hazrat Sadrush-Shariah Maulana Mufti Amjad Ali Azami rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur Khalifa hain. Hazrat Maulana Sayyed Ali Husain Ashrafi Miyan Kichhauchhawi rahmatullāhi alaihi ne bhi Aap ko khilaafat ata farmayi hai. Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ke khulfa:
  1. Hazrat Mumtaaz-ul-Fuqaha Muhaddees-e-Kabeer Allama Mufti Zia-ul-Mustafa Azami
  2. Hazrat Raahbare-Ahle-Sunnat Allama Mufti Mohammad Nasir-ud-deen Misbaahi,
  3. Hazrat Raees-ul-Qalam Allama Arshad-ul-Qaadri rahmatullahi alaihi.
1 Jamaadi ul aakhir 1396 Hijri ko Aap ne Sahih-al-Bukhari me se Kitaab-ul-Janaa'iz ka dars diya aur sabaq ke dauraan Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ne farmaya ‘Aaj Peer ka din hai aur aaj hi ke din Huzoor Rasool-Allah Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ki be'asat hui thi aur aaj hi ke din aap ka wisaal hua tha.’ Aur usi raat 11:55 p.m. Ko Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ka inteqaal hua. Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 1 Jamaadi us saani 1396 Hijri (31 May 1976 A.D.) ko Peer ke roz hua. Hazrat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Mubarakpur (Uttar Pradesh) me hai. ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb Sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Hafiz e Millat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Muradabadi rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmae aur Sab ke imaan ki hifaazat farmae aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye. Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmae aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye. Ameen.

Title: Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Aap ki wilaadat 11 Rabi ul awwal 1336 Hijri (27 December 1918 A.D.) ko Peer ke roz Nander, Hyderabad me hui. Aap ke waalid ka naam Ghulam Jeelaani bin Mohammad Noor-ud-deen hai. Aap ne apne waalid se ibtidai ta’aleem haasil ki aur 14 saal ki umr me Hafiz e Quran hue. Aur Hazrat Hafiz e Millat Hafiz Abdul Azeez Mubarakpuri rahmatullahi alaihi se sanad haasil ki. Hazrat Hafiz e Millat ke mashware 1354 Hijri (1935 A.D.) me Aap Mubarakpur jaakar Madrasa Ashrafiya Misbaah-ul-Uloom me Hafiz e Millat Abdul Azeez Mubarakpuri, Sanaullah Aazami aur Muhammad Sulaiman Bhagalpuri se Hadees, Fiq'h aur deegar uloom ki ta’aleem haasil ki. 1362 Hijri (1943 A.D.) me Aap Hafiz e Millat ke saath Jaamia Arabia, Nagpur gaye aur waha Aap ko Dastaar-e-Fazeelat ata ki gayi. 1358 Hijri (1939 A.D.) me Aap Hafiz e Millat ke saath Ghosi gaye aur us waqt Huzoor Sadrush-Shariah Bareilly Shareef se Ghosi tashreef laaye the. Aap ne Huzoor Sadrush-Shariah Maulana Amjad Ali Azami se Sahih Bukhari ta’aleem haasil ki aur phir namaz e asr ke baad Aap Huzoor Sadrush-Shariah ke mureed hue. 1365 Hijri (1946 A.D.) me Aap Huzoor Sadrush-Shariah ke saath Nagpur mehfil e Naat me gaye. Huzoor Sadrush-Shariah ke farmaan par Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi ne Maulana Jaami ki naat padhi. Jise sunkar Huzoor Sadrush-Shariah ki aankho me aansoo aa gaye aur usi jalse me unho ne Aap ko Khilaafat ata farmai. Hindustan ki aazaadi aur Taqseem e mulk ke kuch arse baad Aap Pakistan chale gaye. Kharadar me Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi Akhund Masjid me Imaam (Khateeb) bane. Phir Jodia Bazaar ki Khori Garden Masjid me Imaam bane. 40 saal tak Aap ta’eleem wa tadrees karte rahe. Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi hamesha ba-wuzu talba ko ta’aleem dete. Aap puri zindagi Islam aur Ahle Sunnat wal Jamaat ki khidmat karte rahe. Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi ne bahot saare Pakistani talba ko majeed ta’aleem ke liye Madarsa Qadriya me Baghdad bheja. Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi ke shaagirdo me Allama Mufti Sayyed Shah Turab-ul-Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi, Allama Abdul Azeem Qaadri aur Maulana Muhammad Qasim Bareilwi mash'hoor hain. Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi ke 3 saahabzaade hai:
  1. Muhammad Moeen-ud-deen
  2. Muhammad Misbaah-ud-deen
  3. Muhammad Salaah-ud-deen
Aap Hazrat Sadrush-Shariah Allama Amjad Ali Azami rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur khalifa hain. Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi ko Huzoor Mufti-e-Azam-e-Hind Muhammad Mustafa Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi aur Hazrat Qutb-e-Madeena Allama Zia-ud-deen Ahmad Madani rahmatullahi alaihi ne bhi khilaafat ata farmayi hai. Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi ke khulfa:
  1. Hazrat Allama Mufti Sayyed Shah Turab-ul-Haq Qadri Razawi rahmatullahi alaihi (Karachi / Pakistan)
  2. Hazrat Allama Abdul Azeem Qaadri (Bangladesh)
7 Jamaadi ul saani 1403 Hijri (23 March 23 1983 A.D.) ko dopahar ko Aap ki tabiyat na-saaz hui. Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi ne Kalma aur Durood shareef padhna shuru kar diya. Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi ko ambulance me hospital le jaa rahe the, tab dil ke daure ki wajah se Aap ka inteqal hua. Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 7 Jamaadi us saani 1403 Hijri (23 March 1983 A.D.) ko Budh ke roz hua. Aap ki namaz e janaza Hazrat Tajushshariah Akhtar Raza Khan rahmatullahi alaihi ne padhai. Hazrat Allama Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Karachi (Pakistan) me hai. ALLAH ta’ala uske Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Qaari Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi rahmatullahi alaihi aur tamaam Auliya Allah ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye. Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek Jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye. Aameen.

Title: Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi
Content:
Alqaab: Sadrush Shariah (Chief of the Islamic Law), Badr e Tareeqat (Shining Moon of Tareeqah), Faqeeh e azam. Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ki wilaadat 1296 Hijri (1879 A.D) me Ghausi, Aazamgardh (Uttar Pradesh) me hui. Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ke waalid ka naam Allama Hakeem Jamaal-ud-deen bin Maulana Khuda-Bakhsh hai. Aap ne apne daada ke paas bunyaadi ta’aleem haasil ki. Iske baad apne bade bhai Maulana Muhammad Siddeeq se majeed ta’aleem haasil ki. Phir aap ke bhai ke mashware par Aap ko Madrasa-e-Hanafiya (Jaunpur) me bheja gaya. Waha Hazrat Allama Maulana Hidayatullah Khan Rampuri se Dars-e-Nizami ki ta’aleem haasil ki. Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi roz Ghausi se Aazamgadh tak aur phir waha se Jaunpur tak ka safar karte the. Iske baad Madrasatul-Hadees (Pilibhit) me Shaikh-ul-Mohaddeeseen Allama Maulana Wasi Ahmad Surati se Hadees ki ta’aleem haasil ki aur 1320 Hijri (1902 A.D) me Aapko Sanad ata ki gayi. Aap ne Hakeem Abdul Wali se Ilm e Tibb (Medicine) sikha. Iske baad Aap 4 saal tak (1323 – 1327 Hijri) Madrasa e Mohaddees e Surati me Mudarris rahe. Phir Aap Azeemabad (Patna) jaakar 1 saal tak mareezo ka ilaaj karte rahe. Iske baad Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan ne Aap ko Bareilly Shareef bulakar Daar-ul-Uloom Manzar-e-Islam me Mudarris ki zimmedaari di aur saath me ‘Maktbah-e-Ahle-Sunnah’ (Printing Press) ki nigraani ki zimmdedaari di aur ‘Jamat-Raza-e-Mustafa’ ke Sadr (president) bhi banaya. Iske ilaawa Aap Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan ko ‘Kanzul-Imaan fi Tarjamah al-Qur’an’ tayyaar karne me bhi madad karte rahe. Jo 1330 Hijri (1911 A.D) me mukammal hua. 1343 Hijri (1924 A.D) me aap Ajmer gaye aur for Daar-ul-Uloom Moeeniyah Usmaaniyah me Sadr-ul-Mudarriseen (Head teacher) rahe. 1351 Hijri (1933 A.D) me Aap Bareilly Shareef wapas aaye aur waha 3 saal tak rahe. Phir Dadoon (Aligardh) ke Nawab Haji Ghulaam Muhammad Khan Shervan ki daawat par Daar-ul-Uloom Hafiziah Shervani me 7 saal tak Sadr-ul-Mudarriseen rahe. Phir 1 saal tak Banaras me thehre. Iske baad 1364 Hijri (1945 A.D) me Daar-ul-Uloom Manzar-e-Islam, Bareilly Shareef me wapas aaye. Tasannif : Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azami (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ki likhi hui kitabo me se ye mash'hoor hain: (1) Bahar-e-Shariat (2) Fataawa Amjadia (3) Sharh Ma’an al-at'har. Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ke mash'hoor Shagird: (1) Sher Besha e Ahle Sunnat Allama Hashmat Ali Khan, (2) Mohaddis e azam e Pakistan Maulana Sardaar Ahmad Khan, (3) Hafiz e Millat Hazrat Allama Abdul Azeez Mohaddees Muradabadi, (4) Imam-ul-Nahw Sadr-ul-Ulama Allama Ghulaam Jeelaani Aazmi, (5) Ameen-e-Shariat Mufti Rafaaqat Husain Kanpuri, (6) Allama Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi, (7) Mujaahid e Millat Shaikh Allama Maulana Habeeb-ur-Rahmān, (8) Shams-ul-Ulama Qaazi Shams-ud-deen Jaunpuri, (9) Faqeeh e aazam Shaikh Mufti Shareef-ul-Haq Amjadi, (10) Khair-ul-Azkiya Allama Ghulaam Yazdani Ghausawi, (11) Ra’is-ul-Mohaddeeseen Allama Mubeen-ud-deen Amrohawi, (12) Khaleel-ul-Ulama Maulana Mufti Khaleel Khan Barkaati, (13) Fakhr-ul-Amathi Allama Muhammad Sulaiman Bhagalpuri, (14) Maulana Abdul Haq Mubarakpuri, (15) Maulana Mohammad Ilyaas Siyalkoti, (16) Maulana Mufti Mohammad E’ajaaz Razawi. Pariwaar: Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ki 4 biwiya aur 11 saahabzaade aur 4 saahabzaadiya hain. (1) Kareema Khaatoon se 4 bete:
  1. Hakeem Shams-ul-Huda,
  2. Maulana Mohammad Yahya,
  3. Shaikh-ul-Hadees Allama Abdul Mustafa Azhari,
  4. Allama Ata-ul-Mustafa.
1 beti : Zubaida Khaatoon. (2) Safiy-un-nisaa se 1 beti:
  1. Ra'isa Khaatoon.
(3) Raabia Khaatoon se 2 bete:
  1. Muhammad Ahmad,
  2. Qaari Raza-ul-Mustafa.
(4) Hajra Bibi se 5 bete:
  1. Muhaddis-e-Kabeer Allama Maulana Zia-ul-Mustafa,
  2. Muhammad,
  3. Maulana Ṡana-ul-Mustafa,
  4. Maulana Baha-ul-Mustafa,
  5. Maulana Fida-ul-Mustafa.
2 betiya:
  1. Sa'eeda Khatoon,
  2. Aa'isha Khaatoon.
Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza Khan Bareilwi rahmatullahi alaihi ke mureed aur Khalifa hain. Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ke Khulfa : (1) Hazrat Sher Besha e Ahle Sunnat Mazhar e Aala Hazrat Allama Hashmat Ali Khan, (2) Hazrat Mohaddees-e-azam-e-Pakistan Maulana Sardaar Ahmad Khan, (3) Hazrat Haafiz-e-Millat Allama Abdul Azeez Mohaddees Muradabadi, (4) Hazrat Faqeeh-e-azam Sharah-e-Bukhari Shaikh Mufti Shareef-ul-Haq Amjadi, (5) Hazrat Imam-ul-Nahw Sadr-ul-Ulama Allama Ghulaam Jeelaani Aazmi, (6) Hazrat Ameen-e-Shariat Maulana Mufti Sayyed Shaah Rafaaqat Husain Kanpuri, (7) Hazrat Allama Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi, (8) Hazrat Khair-ul-Azkiya Allama Ghulaam Yazdani Ghausawi, (9) Hazrat Maulana Abdul Haq Mubarakpuri. Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ko 1337 Hijri (1922 A.D) me Hajj ki sa’adat naseeb hui. 1367 Hijri me ek martaba Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi Hazrat Allama Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi ke saath Ahmedabad (Gujarat, India) me Hazrat Shaah e aalam rahmatullahi alaihi ke mazaar par haazir hue. Shaah e aalam rahmatullahi alaihi ki masjid me 2 mubarak takht lagaye hue hain. Jisme se ek takht par Huzoor RasoolAllah sallallahu alaihi wassallam jalwa afroz hue the aur dusre par Hazrat Shaah e aalam baba tashreef rakhte the aur madrasa me taaleem diya karte the Aur Shaah e aalam baba ki dua se in takhto ke neeche 2-2 rakat nafl namaz padhkar dua karne wale ko ALLAH ta’ala dunya aur aakhirat me bhalai ata farmata hai aur har jaayiz dua qubool farmata hai. Dono hazrat in takhto ke niche namaz padhkar dua karke faarigh hue to Hazrat Allama Muhammad Muslih-ud-deen Siddeeqi ne apne peer se puchha ‘Huzoor, aap ne kya dua maangi.’ Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azami (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ne farmaya: ‘ALLAH ta’ala har saal Hajj e baitullah ki sa’adat naseeb farmaye.’ Yeh dua is tarah qubool hui ki usi saal safar e Hajj ke dauran Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisal ho gaya. Ek Hadees shareef me Huzoor RasoolAllah sallallahu alaihi wassallam ne farmaya hai: ‘Jo Hajj ke liye nikla aur faut ho gaya to Qayamat tak uske liye Hajj ka sawab likha jayega aur Jo Umrah ke liye nikla aur faut ho gaya uske liye Qayamat tak Umrah ka sawab likha jayega.’ 26 Shawwal 1367 Hijri ko Aap apni biwi ke saath Hajj e baitullah ke safar par rawana hue. Rawana hone se pehle Aap ne railway station par majme ke saamne shaandar taqreer farmayi. Phir car me safar ke dauran baarish ki wajah se Aap ki tabiyat kharaab hui Aur Mumbai pahunchne tak aap ko Pneumonia ho gaya. Mumbai station par Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ka ilaaj shuru kiya gaya. Magar Aap be-hosh ho gaye. Huzoor Mufti e azam e Hind bhi Hajj ke liye jaa rahe the. Aap lagaatar Hazrat Sadrush Shariyah ki iyadat ke liye aate the Aur saath me bahot saare chahne waale bhi aate. Ek baar ek shakhs ne Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmad Raza ki likhi hui Naat shareef padhna shuru kiya. Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azami (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ne foran aankhen kholi aur takiye ke sahare baithkar adab ke sath naat e pak suni. Huzoor Mufti e azam e Hind aur Hazrat Sadrush Shariah ek saath ek hi hawaai jahaaz me Hajj ke liye rawaana hone wale the. Magar Aap ki bemaari ki wajah se Huzoor Mufti e azam e Hind rawaana ho gaye. Uske baad Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ki sehat aur zyada kharaab ho gayi aur Aap ka intiqal ho gaya. Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ka wisaal 2 Zil Qadah 1367 Hijri (6 September 1948 A.D, 12:26 p.m) ko Peer ke roz hua. Hazrat Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi (Sadrush shariah) rahmatullahi alaihi ka mazaar Ghausi, Aazamgardh (Uttar Pradesh) hai. ALLAH ta’ala us ke Habeeb sallallahu alaihi wassallam ke sadqe me Aur Hazrat Sadrush Shariah Mufti Amjad Ali Azmi rahmatullahi alaihi aur Auliya Allah ke waseele se Sab ko mukammal ishq e Rasool ata farmaye aur Sab ke Imaan ki hifazat farmaye aur Sab ko nek amal karne ki taufiq ata farmaye. Aur Sab ko dunya wa aakhirat me kaamyaabi ata farmaye aur Sab ki nek jaayiz muraado ko puri farmaye. Aameen.

Title: Azaan Dene Ka Tarika Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Masjid Ke Sahan Se Baahar Kisi Buland Jagah Par Qible Ki Taraf Muh Kar Ke Khade Ho Aur Doono Haatho Ke Kalimah Ki Ungliyo Ko Kaano Me Daalkar Buland Awaaz Se Azaan Ke Kalimaat Ko Tehar Tehar Kar Kahe Jaldi Na Kare Aur Hayya Alassalaat Kehte Waqt Dahine (right) Jaanib Aur Hayya Alalfalaah Kehte Waqt Baaye (left) Jaanib Muh Phere!

Title: Agar Namaz Ki Niyat Ke Alfaaz Bhool Kar Kuch Ke Kuch Zuban Se Nikal Jaaye Toh Namaz Hogi Ya Nahi ?
Content:
Jawab:

Niyat Dil Ke Pakke Iraade Ko Kehte Hai.

Yaani Niyat Me Zuban Ka Ayetbaar Nahi.

Toh Agar Dil Me Maslan, Zohar Ka Irada Kiya Aur Zubaan Se Lafz e Asr Nikal Gaya.

Toh Zohar Ki Namaz Ho Jaayegi!

Title: Taraweeh ki namaz Sunnat Hai Ya Nafl?
Content:
Jawab:

Taraweeh ki namaz Mard wa Aurat Sab Ke Liye Sunnat e Muakkada Hai.

Uska Chhodhna Jayez Nahi!

Title: Wahabi Devbandi Ke Peeche Namaz Padhna Kaisa Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Wahabi Devbandi Ke Aqeede Kufri Hai.

Maslan Unn Logo Ka Aqeeda Ye Hai Ki Jaisa Ilm Huzur Sallallahu Alaihi Wa Sallam Ko Haasil Hai.

Aisa Ilm Toh Baccho, Paagalo Aur Jaanwaro Ko Bhi Haasil Hai.

Jaise Ki Unka Peshwa Molvi Ashraf Ali Thanwi Ne Apni Kitaab Hifzul Imaan Me Safa No:8 Par Huzur Sallallahu Alaihi Wa Sallam Ke Liye Kul Ilm e Gaib Ka Inkaar Karte Huwe Sirf Baaz Ilm e Gaib Ke Bare Me Yun Likha Hai Ki “Isme Huzur Ki Kya Takhsee Hai Aisa Ilm Toh Zaid Wa Umar Balki Har Sab (Baccho) Maznoon Balki Jameea Haiwanaat Wa Bahayam Key Liye Bhi Haasil Hai”

Ma’azAllah Rabbil Aalameen.

Iss Tarah Unke Peshwaon Ki Kitaabon Me Bahuth Se Kufri Aqeede Hai.

Jinhe Woh Haq Maante Hai.

Isliye Unke Peeche Namaz Padhna Najaayez Wa Gunah Hai.

Agar Kisi Ne Galti Se Padhli Ho, Toh Phir Se Padhe.

Agar Dubaara Nahi Padhega Toh Gunahgaar Hoga.

Bahar e Shariat

Title: Kya Qaza Namazo Ki Rakatein Bhi Khali Aur Bari, Yaani Bagair Surah Aur Surah Ke Sath Padhi Jaati Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Haan, Jo Rakatein Ada Mein Surah Ke Sath Padhi Jaati Hai.

Woh Qaza Mein Bhi Surat Ke Sath Padhi Jaati Hai Aur Jo Rakatein Ada Mein Bagair Surah Ke Padhi Jaati Hai.

Woh Qaza Mein Bhi Bagair Surah Ke Padhi Jaati Hai.

Title: Jamat Se Namaz Padhna Farz Hai Ya Wajib ?
Content:
Jawab:

Jamat Se Namaz Padhna Wajib Hai.

Jamat Ke Saat Ek Namaz Padhne Se Sattayis (27) Namazo Ka Sawaab Milta Hai.

Bagair Uzr Ek Baar Bhi Choodne Wala Gunahagaar Aur Choodhne Ki Aadath Kar Lene Wala Faasiq Hai.

Title: Asar Ki Namaz Ka Waqt Kab Se Kab Tak Rehta Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Zohar Ki Namaz Ka Waqt Khatm Ho Jane Se Asar Waqt Shuru Ho Jata Hai Aur Suraj Doobne Se Pehle Tak Rehta Hai.

Magar Asar Ki Namaz Mein Takheer Hamesha Mustahab Hai.

Lekin Na Itni Takheer Ki Suraj Ki Tikiya Mein Zardi Aa Jaye !

Title: Maghrib Ki Namaz Ka Waqt Kab Se Kab Tak Rehta Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Maghrib Ki Namaz Ka Waqt Suraj Doobne Ke Baad Shuru Ho Jata Hai Aur Uttar (north) Dakhshin (South) Faili Hui Safedi Ke Gayab Hone Se Pehle Tak Rehta Hai.

Magar Awwal Waqt Padhna Mustahab Aur Takheer Makrooh.

Title: Isha Ki Namaz Ka Waqt Kab Se Kab Tak Rehta Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Isha ki Namaz Ka Waqt Uttar (north) Dakhshin (South) Faili Hui Safedi Ke Gayab Hone Se Shuru Hota Hai Aur Subah Ujala Hone Se Pehle Tak Rehta Hai.

Lekin Tihayi Raat Tak Takheer Mustahab Aur Aadhi Raat Tak Mubah Aur Aadhi Raat Ke Baad Makrooh Hai.

Title: Sajda e Tilawat Kise Kehte Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Quran Mein Chawdha (14) Muqamat (Jagah) Aise Hain Ki Jin Ke Padhne, Yaa Sunne Se Sajda Karna Wajib Hota Hai.

Usey Sajda e Tilawat Kehte Hain.

Title: Sajda e Tilawat Ka Tarika Kya Hain ?
Content:
Jawab:

Sajda e Tilawat Ka Masnoon Tarika Yeh Hai Ki Khada Hokar ALLAHU AKBAR Kehte Huwe Sajda Mein Jaaye Aur Kam Se Kam Teen (3) Bar SUBHANA RABBIYAL A'ALA Kahe.

Phir ALLAHU AKBAR Kehta Huwe Khada Ho Jaaye Bas.

Na Ismein ALLAHU AKBAR Kehte Huwe Hath Uthana Hai Aur Naa Ismein Tashahhud Hai Aur Na Salam.

Title: Agar Baithkar Sajda Kiya, Toh Sajda E Tilawat Ada Hoga Ya Nahi ?
Content:
Jawab:

Ada Ho Jaayega.

Magar Masnoon Yehi Hai Ki Khada Ho Kar Sajda Mein Jaaye Aur Sajda Ke Baad Phir Khada Ho.

Title: Kya Ayat e Sajda Padhne Ke Baad Fauran Sajda E Tilawat Karna Wajib Hota Hai?
Content: Jawab: Agar Ayat e Sajda Namaz Ke Bahar Padhi Hai. Toh Fauran Sajda Kar Lena Wajib Nahi. Haan, Behtar Hai Ki Fauran Kar Le Aur Wazu Ho Toh Takheer Makrooh Tanzeehi Hai.

Title: Agar Namaz Mein Ayat e Sajda Padhi Toh Kya Hukm Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Agar Namaz Mein Ayat e Sajda Padhi, Toh Fauran Sajda Kar Lena Wajib Hai.

Teen Aayat Se Zyaada Ki Takheer Karega Toh Gunaahgar Hoga.

Aur Agar Fauran Namaz Ka Sajda Kar Liya, Yaani Ayat e Sajda Ke Baad Teen Aayat Se Zyaada Na Padha Aur Ruku Karke Sajda Kar Liya.

Toh Agarche Sajda E Tilawat Ki Niyat Na Ho Sajda Ada Ho Jayega.

Bahar e Shari'at

Title: Kya Azaan Kehne Wala Hi Iqamat Kahe Dusra Na Kahe?
Content:
Jawab:

Haan, Azaan Kehne Wala Hi Iqamat Kahe.

Uski Ijazat Ke Bagair Dusra Na Kahe.

Agar Bagair Ijazat Dusre Ne Kahi, Aur Azaan Dene Waale Ko Nagawaar Ho, Toh Makrooh Hai!

Title: Isha Namaz Me Kitni Rakat Namaz Padhi Jati Hai ?
Content: Jawab: Isha Namaz Ke Waqt Kul Satraah (17) Rakat Padhi Jati Hai. Pehle Chaar (4) Rakat Sunnat. Phir Chaar (4) Rakat Farz. Phir Doo (2) Rakat Sunnat. Phir Doo (2) Rakat Nafl. Iske Baad Phir Teen (3) Rakat Witr Wajib. Phir Doo (2) Rakat Nafl. Chaar (4) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Kare. Niyat Ki Maine Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Sunnat Isha Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Sunnat Rasoolullah Ki Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar. Chaar (4) Rakat Farz Ki Niyat Kaise Kare. Niyat Ki Maine Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Farz Isha Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye (Muqtadi Itna Aur Kahe Peeche Iss Imam Ke) Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar! Doo (2) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Kare. Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Sunnat Isha Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Sunnat Rasoolullah Ki Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar! Doo (2) Rakat Nafl Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Kare. Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Nafl Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar! Teen (3) Rakat Namaz Wajib Witr Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Kare. Niyat Ki Maine Teen (3) Rakat Namaz Wajib Witr Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar! Doo (2) Rakat Nafl Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Kare. Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Nafl Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Isha Namaz Ki Chaar (4) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jayegi ?
Content:
Jawab:

Isha Namaz Ki Chaar (4) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat.

Niyat Ki Maine Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Sunnat Isha Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Sunnat Rasoolullah Ki Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar.

Title: Qaza Namaz Ki Niyat Ka Tarika Aur Kis Tarah Karni Chahiye ?
Content:
Jawab:

Jis Roz Aur Jis Waqt Ki Namaz Qaza Ho Uss Roz Aur Uss Waqt Ki Niyat Qaza Me Zaruri Hai.

Maslan, Agar Juma Ke Roz Fajr Ki Namaz Qaza Ho Gayi.

Toh Iss Tarah Niyat Kare Ki Niyat Ki Maine Doo Rakat Namaz Qaza Juma Ke Fajr Farz Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar.

Title: Kin Waqto Me Nafl Namaz Padhna Jaayiz Nahi ?
Content:
Jawab:

Tulu Wa Gurub (Suraj Ka Nikalna Aur Doobna) Aur Dopahar. 

Inn Teeno Waqto Me Koyi Namaz Jaayiz Nahi, Na Farz, Na Wajib Aur Na Nafl.

Haan! Agar Uss Roz Asr Ki Namaz Nahi Padhi Hai.

Toh Suraj Doobne Ke Waqt Padhle Aur Tulu-E-Fajr Se Talu-E-Aftaab (Suraj) Ke Darmiyaan.

Siwaaye Doo Rakaat Sunnat E Fajr Ke Tahiyatul Masjid Aur Tahiyatul Wuzu Wagairah Koyi Nafl Jaayiz Nahi Aur Namaz e Asr Se Magrib Ki Farz Padhne Ke Darmiyan Nafl Mana Hai Aur Khutba Ke Waqt Aur Namaz e Eidein Se Peshtar (Pehle) Nafl Makruh Hai.

Chaahe Ghar Me Padhe Ya Eidgah, Wa Masjid Me Aur Namaz e Eidein Ke Baad Bhi Nafl Makruh Hai.

Jab Ki Eidgah, Ya Masjid Me Padhe.

Ghar Me Padhna Makruh Nahi Hai!

Title: Ladka Aur Ladki Ke Aqeeqa Mein Kaunse Janwar Munasib Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Ladka Ke Aqeeqa Mein Do (2) Bakra Aur Ladki Ke Aqeeqa Mein Ek (1) Bakri Zabah Karna Munasib Hai.

Aur Ladka Ke Aqeeqa Mein Bakriyan Aur Ladki Mein Bakra Kiya Jab Bhi Harj Nahin Aur Pahunchan Na Ho Toh Ladka Mein Ek (1) Bakra Bhi Zabah Kar Sakte Hai.

Aur Aqeeqa Mein Bade Janwaron Ko Zabah Kiya Jaye.

Toh Ladka Ke Liye Saat (7) Hisse Mein Se Do (2) Hisse Aur Ladki Ke Liye Ek (1) Hissa Kaafi Hai.

Title: Sajda e Sahw Kise Kehte Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Sahw Ke Mana Hai Bhoolne Ke.

Kabhi Namaz Mein Bhool Se Koi Khaas Kharabi Paida Ho Jaati Hai.

Us Kharabi Ko Door Karne Ke Liye Qada e Akhira Mein Do (2) Sajde Kiye Jaate Hai.

Inko Sajda e Sahw Kehte Hai.

Title: Hazrat islam me khoon (blood) donate Karna kaisa hai.
Content:
Shariyat me iska kya hukm hai, aur jo shaks khoon donate karta hai uspe kya hukm hoga.

Jawab:

Insan Apne A'za ka Malik nahi hai.

Isi wajah se wo Apna khoon Atiya nahi kar sakhta ke ye NaJaayez hai.

Insan apne a'zaa (parts of body) ka malik nahi hai.

Use apne A'za bila zarurat e sharaiyah talf karna naajaayez o haraam hai.

Agar sakht zarurat ho jaise apne kisi Musalman ke jaan jaane ka khauf ho aur begair blood diye uski jaan bachana mushkil ho.

To Is surat me blood de sakta hai.

Aam taur par blood donate karna haraam hai.

Is surat me Agar use bhi khoon ke ilaawa chaara nahi.

To Kahin Se Blood Hasil karne ki koshish kare.

Agar na mile to Khud dede aur baad me Tauba o Istegfaar kare.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Hum Hajj Aur Umrah Ko Jate Hai. To Kya Waha Sohbat Kar Sakhte Hai.
Content:
Yeh Mere Dost Ka Sawal Tha Aur Mera Dost Bol Raha Tha Wah Jyada Sawab Hai

Jaise Ek Namaz Ka 1 Lakh Namaz

Jawab:

Agar ehram me na ho, to biwi se sohbat jaayez o halal hai.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Jumma Ki Namaz Farz Hai Ya Wajib?
Content:
Jawab:

Jumma ki Namaz Farz Hai Aur Uski Farjiyat Zohar ki namaz Se Zyaada Muakkad Hai.

Jumma Farz Hone Ki Gyarah (11) Shartein Hai.

(1-2) Shahar Mein Muqeem Aur Aazad Hona.

Isiliye Musafir Aur Gulam Par Jumma Farz Nahi.

(3) Sehat (Yaani Aise Mareez Par Ki Jumma Masjid Tak Na Ja Sake Jumma Farz Nahin).

(4-5-6) Mard Aur Aaqil Baligh Hona (Yaani Aurat, Pagal Aur Na'Baligh Par Jumma Farz Nahin).

(7-8) Ankhiyaara Hona Aur Chalne Par Qadir Hona.

Isiliye Andhe, Lunje Aur Falij Wale Par Ki Jo Masjid Tak Na Ja Sakta Ho Jumma Farz Nahin.

(9) Qaid Mein Na Hona. Magar Jabki Kisi (Dain) Qarz Ki Wajah Se Qaid Kiya Gaya Ho Aur Ada Karne Par Qadir Ho Toh Jumma Farz Hai.

(10) Hakim, Ya Chor Wagairah Kisi Zalim Ka Khauf Na Hona.

(11) Barish, Ya Aandhi Wagairah Ka Is Qadar Na Hona Ki Jisse Nuqsaan Ka Qawi Andesha (Sakht Khtra) Na Ho.

Title: Sadqa e Fitr Ki Miqdar Kya Hai ?
Content: Jawab: Sadqa e Fitr Ki Miqdar Yeh Hai ki Gheun. Ya Uska Aatha Adha Saa Dein Aur Khajoor, Munaqqa, Ya Jau, Ya Uska Aatha Ek Saa Dein Aur agar In Charon Ke Alawa Koi Doosra Galla Wagairah Dena Chahein. Toh Qeemat Ka Lihaz Karna. Yaani Is Cheez Ka Aadha Saa Gheun, Ya Ek Saa Jau Ki Qeemat Ka Hona Zaroori Hai.

Title: Saa Kitni Miqdar Ka Hota Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Aala Darja Ki Tehqeeq Aur Ihtiyat Yeh Hai Ki Saa Ka Wazan Teen Sau Ikkyawan (351) Rupaya Bhar Hota Hai.

Aur Aadha Saa Ek Sau Pachhattar (175) Rupaye Aththanni bhar Upar.

Naye Wazan Se Ek Saa (4) Char Kilo Aur Taqreeban 94 Gram Hota Hai.

Aur Aadha Saa (2) Do Kilo Taqreeban 47 Gram Ka Hota Hai.

Title: Jin Logo Par Jumma Ki Namaz Farz Nahin Hai
Content:
Agar Woh Log Jumma Ki Namaz Mein Sharik Ho Jaayein.

Toh Unki Namaz Ho Jaayegi Ya Nahin ?

Jawab:

Ho Jaayegi, Yaani Zohar Ki Namaz Unke Zimme Se Utar Jaayegi.

Title: Isha Namaz Ki Chaar (4) Rakat Farz Ki Niyat Kaise Kare ?
Content:
Jawab:

Isha Namaz Ki Chaar (4) Rakat Farz Ki Niyat.

Niyat Ki Maine Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Farz Isha Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye (Muqtadi Itna Aur Kahe Peeche Iss Imam Ke) Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Agar Kai Saalo Ki Namaz e Qaza Ho, Toh Niyat Kaise Kare ?
Content:
Jawab:

Aisi Surath Me Jo Namaz Maslan, Zohar Ki Qaza Padhni Hai.

Toh Iss Tarah Niyat Kare:

Niyat Ki Maine Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Qaza.

Jo Mere Zimme Baaki Hai.

Unme Se Pehle Zohar Farz Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye.

Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar.

Issi Par Dusri Qaza Namazo Ki Niyato Ko Qiyas Karna Chahiye!

Title: Paanch Waqt Ki Namazo Me Kul Kitni Rakat Qaza Padhi Jayegi ?
Content:
Jawab:

Paanch Waqt Ki Namaz Me Kul Bees (20) Rakat Namaz Hai.

Doo (2) Rakat Fajr,

Chaar (4) Rakat Zohar,

Chaar (4) Rakat Asar,

Teen (3) Rakat Maghrib,

Chaar (4) Rakat Isha Aur Teen (3) Rakat Witr.

Khulaasa Ye Ki Farz Aur Witr Ki Qaza Hai.

Sunnat Namazo Ki Qaza Nahi Hai!

Title: Jamat Choodhne Ke Ujr Kya Kya Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Jamat Choodhne Ke Ujr ye hai ke Andha, Ya Apaahij Hona,

Itna Boodha Ya Bimar Hona Ki Masjid Tak Jaane Se Majboor Ho,

Saqt Baarish, Ya Shadeed Keechad Ka Hayil Hona,

Aandhi, Ya Saqt Andheri, Ya Saqt Sardi Ka Hona,

Aur Paakhana Wa Peshaab Ki Saqt Haajat (Zarurath) Hona Wagairah!

Title: Quruja Bisunihi Kise Kehte Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Qaida-E-Aqira Ke Baad Qasdan Manafiye Namaz Koyi Kaam Karne Ko Quruja Bisunihi Kehte Hai.

Lekin Salam Ke Alaawa Koyi Dusra Munafi Qasdan Paaya Gaya.

Toh Namaz Ka Dubara Padhna Wajib Hai!

Title: Zohar Namaz Mein Kitni Rakat Namaz Padhi Jaati Hai ?
Content: Jawab: Zohar Namaz Kul Baarah (12) Rakat Namaz Hai. Pehle Chaar (4) Rakat Sunnat. Phir Chaar (4) Rakat Farz. Phir Doo (2) Rakat Sunnat. Phir Doo (2) Rakat Nafl! Pehle Chaar (4) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat Kaise Kare. Niyat Ki Maine Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Sunnat Zohar Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Sunnat Rasoolullah Ki Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar! Chaar (4) Rakat Farz Ki Niyat Kaise Kare. Niyat Ki Maine Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Farz Zohar Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye (Muqtadi Itna Aur Kahe Peeche Iss Imam Ke) Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar! Doo (2) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jaye. Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Sunnat Zohar Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Sunnat Rasoolullah Ki Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar! Doo (2) Rakat Nafl Ki Niyat Kaise Kare. Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Nafl Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Kya aise imam jinke piche namaz padne ka dil na kare kyuke wo dorane namaz harkat karte ho
Content:
Jaise khujana, Dhadi pe hath fernaa or niyat bandhte waqt hatho ka khulaa na hona.

Aise hi betawajjo niyat bandna.

Aise imam ke piche namaz hogi.

Jawab:

Agar wo Namaz me waaqai amal e kaseer karte hain.

To us imam ke peeche Namaz wajibul iaada (Repeat) hogi.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
--------------------------------------------------

Title: Kya Hum gair muslims (zinda) ke liye kisi bhi chiz ki dua kar sakte hai.
Content:
Jawab:

Hidayat ki dua ki jaaye.



--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
