Title: Janab hum jis masjid Me namaz adaa karte hai usme ek dargah bhi hai.
Content:
Kya us dargah ke sahen Me namaz adaa hogi aur jaab hum ba jamat namaz padh rahe hai.

To Bhi dargah ke sahen Mai namaz hogi.
Agar saf pehle hi khatam hogayi aur dargah ke sehen Tak nahi phochi.

Aur kuch log saafe bana kaar dargah ke sahen Me Namaz padhe rahe hai imam ke piche.

To Kya unki namaz hogi.

Jawab:

Agar Masjid Hi ke sehan me dargah hai, To Namaz ho jaayegi.

Warna Dargah me jahan saff lagaayi gayi uske aur masjid ke beech 2 saff ki jagah khali reh gayi.

To saff muttasil nahi, lehaza iqteda durust nahi.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi

Title: Isha Namaz Ki Doo (2) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jaye ?
Content:
Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Sunnat Isha Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Sunnat Rasoolullah Ki Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Isha Namaz Ki Doo (2) Rakat Nafl Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jaye ?
Content:
Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Nafl Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Isha Namaz Ki Witr Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jaye ?
Content:
Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Teen (3) Rakat Namaz Wajib Witr Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Zohar Namaz Ki Chaar (4) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jaye ?
Content:
Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Sunnat Zohar Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Sunnat Rasoolullah Ki Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Zohar Namaz Ki Chaar (4) Rakat Farz Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jaye ?
Content:
Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Chaar (4) Rakat Namaz Farz Zohar Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye (Muqtadi Itna Aur Kahe Peeche Iss Imam Ke) Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Zohar Namaz Ki Doo (2) Rakat Sunnat Ki Niyat Kis Tarah Ki Jaye ?
Content:
Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Sunnat Zohar Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Sunnat Rasoolullah Ki Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Zohar Namaz Ki Doo (2) Rakat Nafl Ki Niyat Kaise Kare ?
Content:
Jawab:

Niyat Ki Maine Doo (2) Rakat Namaz Nafl Ki ALLAH Ta’ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Taraf Ka’aba Shareef Ke Allahu Akbar!

Title: Azaan Wa Iqamat Ke Darmiyan Durood Sharif (Salaat) Padhna Kaisa Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Salaat padhna Yaani “Assalaatu Wassalaamu Alaika Ya Rasool’ALLAH” Kehna Jaayiz, Wa Mustahasan Hai.

Iss Salaat Ka Naam Istilahe Shara Me Tasweeb Hai Aur Tasweeb Namaz e Magrib Ke Alaawa Baaki Namazo Ke Liye Mustahasan Hai!

Aalamgeeri

Tambee

1) Jo Azaan Ke Waqt Baato Me Mashgool Rahe, Uss Par Maazallaah Khatima Bura Hone Ka Qauf Hai.

Bahare Shariyat Bahawala Fatwa-e-Razviya

2) Jab Azaan Qatm Hojaye Toh Muazzin Aur Azaan Sunne Waale Darood Shareef Padhe.

Fir Azaan Ke Baad Ki Ye Dua Padhe.

“Allahumma Rabba Hadhihi-D-Dawatit-Tammaa Was-Salatil Qaimah, Aati Muhammadan Al-Wasilata Wal-Fazilah, Wabaathhu Maqaman Mahmudan-Il-Ladhi Waadtah Warzuqna Shafa Atahu Youmal Qiyamati Innaka Laa Tuqliful Miaad.”

3) Jab Muazzin “Ashhadu anna Muhammedar Rasoolullah” Kahe.

Toh Sunne Waala Darood Shareef Padhe Aur Mustahab Hai Ki Angothon Ko Choom Kar Aankho Se Lagaale Aur Kahe “Qurratu Aainee Bika Ya Rasoolullahi ALLAHumma Maatiani Bissami Wal Basri”.

Bahare Shariyat Shaami

Title: Taraweeh Namaz Jamat Se Padhna Kaisa Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Taraweeh Namaz Jamat Se Padhna Sunnat e Kifaya Hai.

Yaani Agar Masjid Mein Taraweeh Namaz Ki Jamat Na Hui, Toh Muhalla Ke Sab Log Gunahgaar Huwe Aur Agar Kuch Logo Ne Masjid Mein Jamat Se Padh Li Toh Sab Log Chhutkara Paa Gaye.

Title: Taraweeh Namaz Mein Quran Majeed Khatm Karna Kaisa Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Pure Mahine Ki Taraweeh Namaz Mein Ek (1) Baar Quran Majeed Khatm Karna Sunnat e Muakkada Hai.

Aur Do (2) Baar Quran Majeed Khatm Karna Afzal Hai Aur Teen (3) Baar Quran Majeed Khatm Karna Mazeed (Zyada) Fazilat Rakhta Hai.

Ba'sharte Ki Muqtadiyon Ko Takleef Na Ho, Magar Ek (1) Baar Quran Majeed Khatm Karne Mein Muqtadiyon Ka Lihaaz Nahi Kiya Jayega.

Title: Bala Urz (Majboori) Baith Kar Taraweeh Namaz Padhna Kaisa Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Bala Uzr Baith Kar Taraweeh Namaz Padhna Makrooh Hai.

Balki Baaz Fuqaha e Kiraam Ke Nazdeek Toh Namaz Hogi Hi Nahi.

Bahare Shari'at

Title: Shariyat Me Musafir Kise Kehte Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Shariyat me Musafir Woh Shakhs Hai Jo Teen (3) Roz Ki Raah Jaane Ke Irade Se Basti (Apne Rehne Ke Stahan) Se Bahar Hua.

Title: Musafir Ke Liye Meel Ke Hisab Se Teen (3) Roz Ki Raah Ki Miqdar Kitni Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Musafir Ke liye Khushki Mein Teen (3) Roz Ke Raah Ki Miqdar 57 3/8 Meel Hai. (Yaani Taqreeban 92 Kilometer).

Title: Musafir Par Namaz Ke Baare Mein Kya Hukm Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Musafir Par Wajib Hai Ki Qasr Kare.

Yaani Zohar, Asr Aur Isha Char (4) Rakat Wali Farz Namaz Ko Do (2) Rakat Padhe Ki Uske Haq Mein Do (2) Hi Rakat Puri Namaz Hai.

Title: Why a women cannot have more than one husband in Islam?
Content:
What is the ruling of the Ulama e Deen in the following cases?

Zaid questions that, Almighty Allah has permitted a man to marry
two, three or four wives, so why have women not been permitted to
marry two, three or four (men)?

What is the Shariah ruling concerning a person who asks such a question?

The Ruling:

Almighty Allah says,

‘Undoubtedly, Allah does not command indecency (immodesty)’

Surah Al A’raf (7), Verse 28

For two men to be collectively with one woman is explicit immodesty.

Leave alone humans, even the worst amongst the animals.

i.e. the swine does not tolerate this.

The wisdom behind the forbiddance of adultery is to preserve one’s lineage, or else one will not know whom the child belongs to (i.e. who the father is).

If it were permissible for two men to be in one woman’s Nikah (at the same time), then the same harm and blemish which is found in adultery will be found here.

(In this case) it will not be confirmed as to whom of the two, is the father of the child.

(i.e. the paternity of the child will be disputed).

[And Allah Almighty Knows Best]

To ask such a question is to be clearly astray.

If Zaid is not an absolute ignorant and disrespectable person, then he is an irreligious person; and if he is not an irreligious person, then he is an absolutely ignorant, and disrespectable person.

[And Allah Almighty Knows Best]


Name of Book: Fatawa Africa
Author: Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan
Translator: Muhammad Afthab Cassim Qadiri Razvi Noori

Title: Nikah with a pregnant adulteress ‘Zaniyah’
Content:
A man got a non-Muslim woman (i.e. whom he committed adultery with) to accept Islam, and he then made Nikah to her.

The man is a Muslim. This woman is now pregnant by the same man with whom she has made Nikah.

Is this Nikah permissible (i.e. valid) or not?

Zaid says that even though she has been impregnated by the same man, Nikah with her is still impermissible.

He further says that the Nikah of the witnesses to this Nikah, and all those who were present at the Nikah, has been annulled.

It is in Majmu’a Khaani Vol.2, Page 39

'It is in Hidaya and Kaafi that if a woman comes to the Darul Islam (i.e. a territory under Islamic Rule), then Iddat is not necessary upon her, even if she became Muslim in a Darul Harb (i.e. a territory not under Islamic Rule).

This is the statement (view) of Imam Abu Hanifa Radiallaho Anhu According to Imam Abu Yusuf and Imam Mohammed, the Iddat (i.e. the prescribed term of waiting due to divorce) is necessary upon her, and there is no Iddat upon that bondswoman who was captured in a battle. All have agreed to this. Istibra (i.e. to wait until her child is born if she is pregnant) is necessary upon her.

If a woman came to the Darul Islam from a Darul Harb, then she cannot make Nikah before the child is born.

In another narration, Imam Saaheb (i.e. Imam Abu Hanifa) stated that, she can make Nikah, but intercourse with her is impermissible before she has weaned the child, just as (Nikah) with a female who is pregnant due to adultery is

permissible, but intercourse with her before the child is born is impermissible.

If from amongst the husband and the wife, one of them becomes a murtad (apostate), they will be separated, but it will not be (regarded as Talaq).

This is the view (i.e. statement) of Imam Azam Abu Hanifa and Imam Abu Yusuf Radiallaho Anhu.

According to Imam Mohammed RadiAllahu Anhu if only the husband

becomes an apostate, then there will be separation and not Talaq.

So, if after the man having become an apostate, he had intercourse with his wife, then the full Mahr is payable.

If after becoming an apostate, he did not have intercourse with her, then the Mahr and maintenance allowance are not necessary (i.e. not payable), on condition that the woman has left his home on her own accord. If she is still in his house, then the maintenance allowance is necessary (i.e. payable).

The Ruling:

Regarding a woman who is pregnant by way of adultery

ٰ

والعياذباهللتعالی

who does not already have a husband, (the ruling is that) both the adulterer and (even) anyone other than the adulterer, may make Nikah to her (i.e. anyone is permitted to make Nikah to her).

The only difference is that the one who is not the adulterer (i.e. not the one who made her pregnant), may not go to her (i.e. be intimate with her), until such time that the baby is born; and if the one who impregnated her makes Nikah to her, he is also permitted to be intimate with her.

It is in Durr e Mukhtar

صح نکاح حبلی من زنا َلحبلی من غيرہ وان رحم وطؤھا ودوا عيہ حتی تضع ولو نکحھا الزانی حل

لہ وطؤھا اتفاقا

‘Nikah is valid with one who is pregnant by way of adultery, even though touching her (i.e. any intimacy) and kissing her etc is Haraam, until such time that the child is not born. This is so that he does not

irrigate the orchard of someone else, as the hair grows from this.

However, if the adulterer himself makes Nikah to her, then it is unanimously agreed that he may be intimate with her.'

(Hence), Zaid’s statement is simply incorrect and his statement that ‘even though she has been impregnated by the same man, Nikah is still impermissible’ is an allegation upon the Shariat.

The correct and established (accepted) view is that, even though she is pregnant by someone else, Nikah with her is still permissible.

His statement about the Nikah of the witnesses and those present being annulled is a further allegation (i.e. it is a false charge).

The text which he presented from Majmu’a Khaani is clearly contrary to this, that;

ارگ وعرت را از زان لمح امدنہ اتس وخانتس اورواتس وزندیکی رکدن رواتسین اتآہکن زنادی

‘If a woman becomes pregnant by way of adultery, then Nikah with her is permissible, but intimacy (consummation) is not permissible, until such time that she does not deliver the baby.’

As for this statement which he quoted from the same that

رحہیب ہک دارااالالسم آدمہ اتس واحہلم ات زنادی اکنح ہن دنک

‘If a Harbi female enters a Darul Islam, then if she is pregnant, she

cannot make Nikah until such time that the child is born’.

This (ruling) is in the case of the pregnant wife of a Harbi kafir who came to a Darul Islam and became a Muslim, and it does not refer to the condition which is due to adultery.

[And Allah Almighty Knows Best]

Name of Book: Fatawa Africa
Author: Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan
Translator: Muhammad Afthab Cassim Qadiri Razvi Noori

Title: The Janazah Namaz of a ‘BeNamazi’
Content:
If a kafir (non-Muslim) male or female accepted Islam but did not perform even a single Sajdah (prostration) of Namaz in their entire life, will their Janazah Namaz be performed (when they pass away), and will it be permissible or not to bury them in the Muslim cemetery?

The Ruling:

Indeed, to perform his (or her) Janazah Namaz is Fard, and indeed he (or she) will be buried in the Muslim cemetery.

Rasoolullah Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam says,

‘The Janazah Namaz of every Muslim deceased is Fard upon you, be he pious or a sinner; and even if he committed Kaba’ir (major sins).’

It has been narrated by Abu Dawud, Abu Ya’la and by Baihaqi in his Sunan, from Abu Hurairah Radiallaho Anhu with its merit, which is sound according to our principal.

The five daily prayers were Fard upon him; he omitted them due to the evil of his Nafs (i.e. his inner self).

The Janazah Namaz of a Muslim is Fard upon us, so why should we omit our Fard!

[And Allah Almighty Knows Best]

Name of Book: Fatawa Africa
Author: Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan
Translator: Muhammad Afthab Cassim Qaadiri Razvi Noori

Title: How to purify hot Ghee
Content:
A baby hen (chicken) fell into hot ghee (clarified butter) and then immediately died.

Is it permissible or not to eat this ghee?

The Ruling:

The ghee has become impure (na-paak). To eat it without making it paak (i.e. purifying it) is Haraam (forbidden).

There are three methods of purifying it. The one method is to put in the same amount of water and continue to shake it until all the ghee comes to the top, and then it should be removed.

Once again more water should be put in, and the same process should be followed, and it should be removed once again.

Water should then be poured in for the third time and it should be cleaned in the same manner again. If the ghee has become solidified, then add water equivalent to it thrice, and boil it until the ghee comes to the top, then remove it.

I (Aala Hazrat) say, that it only needs to be boiled once, because thereafter the ghee will become thin, and to mix water in it and shake (stir) it, will be sufficient.

‘It is mentioned in Durar, If oil becomes impure, pour water over it and shake it, and when the oil surfaces, then use something to remove the oil and repeat this process thrice. (text ends)

This is in contrast to Imam Muhammad and is the Madhab of Imam Abu Yusuf, and this is easier, and the Fatwa (verdict) is based on this, just as it is mentioned in the Sharah (annotation) of the Shaykh as mentioned in Jaami ul Fatawa.

And in Fatawa Khairiyah it is mentioned that, a few Kitaabs have spoken about boiling it, and this appears to be added by the scribe, because I have not seen anyone stipulate ‘that boiling’ the oil is a condition, whereas this ruling is mentioned in numerous Kitaabs, so I
searched for this intensely, and found that boiling actually means to shake (stir it), just as it has been clearly explained in Majma ur Riwaya and Sharah Qudoori, that if oil becomes impure, then water should be continuously put into it and it should be stirred, hence deliberation is required at this juncture. (This text ends here) - Or the rule of boiling it is in the case when the oil becomes impure and then becomes solidified. I then noticed that the author of Durr e Mukhtar has explained this in Khaza’in, by saying that, in flowing (liquid) oil, pour in water, and in solid oil, water should be put into it, and it should be boiled, until such time that the oil surfaces [until end of text….]

The second way is that, if the impure ghee (which is kept) in a vessel is becoming solid, then melt it on some fire (stove etc), and then continue to put in the same kind of pure ghee into that vessel, until it fills up with ghee and boils over.

In this way, all the ghee will be regarded as purified. It is in Jaami ur Rumooz

‘The manner of purifying flowing agents (i.e. Liquids) such as water and grape syrup etc is that the same type of thing should be mixed in it, and it should then be made to overflow.’

The third method is to take pure ghee, and to sit on a bench etc (i.e. at a height) and to keep an empty vessel at the bottom (i.e. on the ground), and to then pour that pure ghee into something which looks like a drain-pipe (i.e. like a channel), and with it the impure ghee
should also be poured in, and then both should flow out of the channel in one strain into the vessel, in other words, put both the pure and impure ghee together in through the channel, so that all the impure ghee flows into the vessel as one strain with the pure ghee, and in this
way all of it will become pure (paak).

It is in Khazana

In the first method, there is a risk of the ghee becoming wasted (bad) if it is washed i.e. rinsed thrice with water.

In the second method, the ghee will boil and some of it will boil over and be wasted. The third method is very clear, but immense care needs to be taken in this method, wherein neither should a single drop of the impure ghee fall in before the pure ghee, nor after, and neither should a single drop of impure ghee splash whilst it is flowing through
this channel i.e. tube, and fall into the vessel, separate from the pure ghee; otherwise all which has fallen into the vessel till now, or which will fall in now, will be regarded as being impure.

[And Allah Almighty Knows Best]

Name of Book: Fatawa Africa
Author: Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan
Translator: Muhammad Afthab Cassim Qadiri Razvi Noori

Title: Hanafi & Shafa’i issues
Content:
Is the Muqtadi the adherent i.e. follower of the Imam, or is the Imam the adherent of the Muqtadi, and should a Hanafi Imam wait for a Shafa’i Muqtadi to complete Surah Fatiha or not?

Zaid says that he should wait.

The Ruling:

It is categorically impermissible for the Hanafi Imam after he has recited Surah Fatiha, to wait for any duration, thinking that it will allow his Shafa’i Muqtadi to complete his Surah Fatiha. If he does this he is regarded as being sinful, and the Namaz will be damaged and flawed.

He must complete it and then repeat that Namaz again, as for him to do so is Wajib, because it is Wajib to follow up with a Surah after reciting Surah Fatiha without giving a gap, and by
intentionally omitting this Wajib, he is liable for a sin, and the rectification of that Namaz by way of performing the Sajdah e Sahw will also not be sufficient, as this was not done in error, but it was done deliberately.

Hence, it is Wajib to repeat the Namaz.

It is in Raddul Muhtar;


لورقأھا أی الفاتحۃ فی رکعۃ من اَلولين مرتين وجب سجودالسھو لتا خيرالواجب وھوالسورۃ
،کما فی الذخيرۃ وغيرھا و کذالورقأ اکثرھا ثم أعادھا ،کما فی الظھيريۃ


If Surah Fatiha is recited again (i.e. twice) in the first or second
Raka’at, Sajdah e Sahw is Wajib, because a Wajib, in other words, the
Surah (which must follow Surah Fatiha) has been delayed. It is mentioned likewise in Zakhira etc.

Similarly (i.e. the same applies), if he read most of it and then read it again, just as it is mentioned in Fatawa Zaheeriyah.

It is also mentioned in the same;


لتا خيرالواجب وھوالسورۃ عن محلہ بفصلہ بين الفاتحۃ والسورۃ باجنبی


‘This is because there was a Wajib in it, being the Surah, which was separated from its position, for an abnormal act has brought a gap between the Surah Fatiha and the Surah With the exception of this, (doing this) is to alter a command of the Shariah.

Rasoolullah صلى الله عليه وسلم says,


انما جعل اَلمام ليؤ تم بہ


‘The Imam is appointed only so that he may be followed’ (And not so that the Imam may be compliant to the action of the Muqtadi)
فان فيہ قلب الموضوع


For in this, is to reverse the article (i.e. the stipulation of the Shariah) Zaid, who is saying that the Imam should wait (for the Shafa’i Muqtadi), is either an absolute Jaahil (ignorant) and is just saying what he has heard from someone of the Shafa’i Madhab, or from some Ghayr Muqallid (non-conformist), or he himself is a Ghayr Muqallid.

Name of Book: Fatawa Africa
Author: Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan
Translator: Muhammad Afthab Cassim Qadiri Razvi Noori

Title: Janazah & Burial of an illegitimate child
Content: Is it permissible or not to perform the Janazah Salaah of one who is born out of adultery, and to bury him in the cemetery of the Muslims? The mother of the child of adultery is an unbeliever (kafirah) and his father is a Muslim. The Ruling: If he is a Muslim, then to perform his Janazah Namaz is Fard, and it is indeed permissible to bury him in the cemetery of the Muslims, even though his mother or father, or both of them are unbelievers. The Hadith pertaining to this has already been mentioned in the answer to The Janazah Namaz a benamazi, and in this case, it is even more important to perform his Janazah Salaah, because there is no fault of his, that he is the child of adultery. Name of Book: Fatawa Africa Author: Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Translator: Muhammad Afthab Cassim Qadiri Razvi Noori

Title: Urinating while standing
Content:
Is it permissible or not for a Muslim to pass urine while standing? Zaid says that it is permissible (when) on an elevated place.

The Ruling:

To pass urine while standing is Makruh (disapproved/abhorrent) and the manner of the Christians.

Rasoolullah صلى الله عليه وسلم said,

من الجفاء ان يبول الرجل قائما

‘It is distasteful (and abhorrent), that a man should urinate while standing’

Baz-zar reported this with merit of Sahih from Buraidah RadiAllahu anhu. Detailed research on this matter, with clarification of (all) misconceptions, has

been presented in my Fatwa.

واهلل اعتٰیل ا م

Name of Book: Fatawa Africa
Author: Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan
Translator: Muhammad Afthab Cassim Qadiri Razvi Noori

Title: Use of paper for Istinja
Content:
After answering the call of nature, is it permissible or not to clean the area of impurity by using paper?

Zaid says that it is permitted in a train.

The Ruling:

To perform Istinja using paper is Makruh (disapproved) and Mamnu’ (disallowed) and this is the manner of the Christians.

We have been commanded to respect paper, even though it is plain paper, and if it has writing on it, then it must be respected to a greater extent.

It is in Durr-e-Mukhtar

‘(To perform Istinja) with some object of respect, is Makruh e Tahreemi’

It is in Raddul Muhtar

‘In this (being disallowed) is also included the (plain) page (paper). It is mentioned in Siraaj that some have said that it refers to the page of a book, and some have said it refers to the leaf of a tree, and (the use of) both are Makruh. (Ends)…. And Bahr etc have adopted this, and the reasoning in the leaf of a tree (being impermissible), is that it is the fodder of animals, so it is soft, and will thus not clean impurity, but it will spread it.

The same situation is prevalent with the paper, as it is also soft and also expensive (i.e. it bears a cost), and in the Shariat, it is also prohibited, as it is something that is used to record knowledge (on).

It is due to this that it has been stated in Tatar Khania that, to respect paper is from the respect of Deen, and it has been stated in our Madhab, that the letters are to be respected, even though they are written individually, and some Qaaris have said that the Huroof e Tahajji (letters) are a Qur’an (Heavenly Book) which was revealed upon Hazrat Hud Alaihissalam.’

How it is that this paper is only needed by Zaid when on a train, why is this not the case with other Muslims?

Can he not keep clods of clay or old fabric?

However, if the aim is to follow the way of the Christians, then this is an ailment of the heart and requires treatment.

واهلل اعتٰیل ا ملع

Name of Book: Fatawa Africa
Author: Aala Hazrat Imam Ahmed Raza Khan
Translator: Muhammad Afthab Cassim Qadiri Razvi Noori

Title: Taqbeer Yaani Iqamat Kehna Kaisa Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Iqamat Kehna Bhi Sunnat e Muakkada Hai.

Uski Taaqeed Azaan Se Ziyada Hai!

Title: Baaz Log Shab e Qadr, Ya Ramzan Ke Aakhiri Jummah Ko Qaza e Umri Ke Naam Se Do (2) Ya Char (4) Rakat Padhte Hai
Content:
Aur Yeh Samajhte Hai Ki Umar Bhar Ki Qaza Namaz Isi Ek Namaz Se Ada Ho Gayi.

Toh Uske Liye Kya Hukm Hai ?

Jawab:

Yeh Khayaal Baatil Hai.

Ta'waqte Ki Har Ek Namaz Ki Qaza Alag Alag Na Padhege, Toh Chhothkaara Na Paayege.

Title: Bees (20) Rakatein Taraweeh Ki Namaz Mein Kya Hikmatein Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Bee (20) Rakatein Taraweeh Ki Namaz Mein Hikmat Yeh Hai Ki Sunnato Se Faraiz Aur Wajibaat Ki Takmeel Hoti Hai.

Aur Subah Se Shaam Tak Farz wa Wajib Kul Bees (20) Rakatein Hai.

Toh Munasib Hua Ki Taraweeh Ki Namaz Bhi Bees (20) Rakatein Ho.

Taki Mukammal Karne Wali Sunnato Ki Rakat Aur Jinki Takmeel Hoti Hai.

Yaani Farz wa Wajib Ki Rakat Ki Tadad Barabar Ho Jaye.

Title: Azaan Ke Jawab Ka Kya Masla Hai, Hayya Alassalaat Aur Hayya Alalfalaah me kya kehna chahiye?
Content:
Jawab:

Azaan Ke Jawab Ka Masla Ye Hai Ki Azaan Kehne Waala Jo Kalimah Kahe.

Toh Sunne Waala Bhi Wahi Kalimah Kahe.

Magar Hayya Alassalaat Aur Hayya Alalfalaah Ke Jawab Me (La Hau La Walaa Quwwata Illa Billah) Kahe Aur Behtar Ye Hai Ki Doono Kahe,

Aur Fajr Ki Azaan Me Assalaatu Qairum Minannoum Ke Jawab Me (Sadaqta Wa Barrarta Wa Bil Haqiq Nataqta) Kahe!

Title: Jinn Kya Hota Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

ALLAH Ta’ala Ne Jinno Ko Aag Se Paida Kiya.

Inmein Baaz Ko Yeh Taqat Di Hai Ke Jo Shakl Chahein Bann Jaayein.

Inki Umre Bahut Zyaada Hoti Hai.

Inke Shareeron Ko Shaitaan Kehte Hai.

Yeh Sab Insaan Ki Tarah Aql Waale, Rooh Waale Aur Jism Waale Hai.

Inki Aauladein Bhi Hoti Hai.

Khaate Peete Hai, Jeete Marte Hai.

Inmein Musalman Bhi Hai Aur Kafir Bhi.

Magar Kuffar Insaano Ki Banisabat (Muqable) Zyaada Hai Aur Inmein Nek Musalman Bhi Hai Aur Fasiq Bhi Hai Aur Bad-Mazhab Bhi.

Inmein Fasiqon Ki Tadad Insaano Se Zyaada Hai.

Title: Pehli Rakat Me Jo Surat Padhi
Content: Phir Usi Ko Dusri Rakaat Me Bhool Kar Shuru Kar Di. Toh Kya Kare ? Jawab: Phir Usi Surat Ko Shuru Kar Di Toh Usi Ko Padhe Aur Qasdan (Jaan Bujkar) Aisa Karna Makrooh E Tanzeehi Hai. Haan! Agar Dusri Yaad Na Ho, Toh Harz Nahi!

Title: Dusri Rakat Me Pehli Waali Se Upar Ki Surat Padhi.
Content: Yaani Pehli Me Qul Ya Ayyuha Kafiroon Aur Dusri Me Inna Aa Taina Kal Kausar Padhi. Toh Kya Hukm Hai ? Jawab: Dusri Rakat Me Pehli Waali Se Upar Ki Surat, Ya Aayat Padhna Makrooh E Tehreemi Aur Gunaah Hai. Magar Bhool Kar Aisa Ho Toh Na Gunaah Hai Aur Na Sajda-E-Sahw!

Title: Bhool Kar Dusri Rakat Me Upar Ki Surat Shuru Kar Di Phir Yaad Aaya, Toh Kya Kare ?
Content:
Jawab:

Jo Shuru Kar Chuka Hai, Usi Ko Poori Kare.

Agarche Abhi Ek Hi Harf Padha Ho!

Title: Pehli Me Alam Tara Kaifa Aur Dusri Me Lee Ilaafi Choodh Kar Araitallazi Padhna Kaisa Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Dusri Me Ek Chooti Surat Choodh Kar Padhna Mana Hai Aur Bhool Kar Shuru Kar Di.

Toh Usi Ko Qatm Kare Choodne Ki Ijaazath Nahi!

Title: Qayamat Kise Kehte Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Qayamat Us Din Ko Kehte Hai.

Jis Din Hazrat Israfil Alaihissalam Soor Fukenge.

Soor Seeng Ke Shakl Ki Ek Cheez Hai.

Jiski Aawaz Sunkar Sab Aadmi Aur Tamam Jaanwar Mar Jayenge.

Zameen, Aasmaan, Chand, Suraj Aur Pahad Wagairah Duniya Ki Har Cheez Toot Foot Kar Fana Ho Jayengi.

Yaha Tak Ki Soor Bhi Khatm Ho Jayega Aur Hazrat Israfil Alaihissalam Bhi Fana Ho Jaayege.

Title: Qayamat Ki Nishaniyan Bayan Kijiye ?
Content:
Jawab:

Teen Kasf Honge.

Matlab Yeh Hai Ki Aadmi Zameen Mein Dhans Jayenge.

Ek Kasf Purab Mein, Doosra Paschim Mein Aur Teersa Arab Ke Jazeere Mein.

Deen Ka Ilm Uth Jayega.

Matlab Yeh Hai Ki Aalim Log Utha Liye Jayenge.

Aisa Nahi Ki Aalim Log Baqi Rahein Aur Unke Dilo Se Ilm Mit Jaye Aur Khatm Ho Jaye.

Zina Ki Zyaadti Hogi.

Mard Kam Honge Aur Aurtein Itni Zyaada Hongi Ki Ek Mard Ki Mathati Mein Pachas (50) Aurtein Hogi.

Bade Dajjal Ke Alawa Tees (30) Aur Dajjal Hoge.

Yeh Sab Nabuwwat Ka Dawa Karegein.

Jabki Nabuwwat Khatm Ho Chuki Hai.

Maal Bahut Zyaada Ho Jayega.

Yaha Tak Ki Furat Ki Nadi Mein Se Sone Ke Pahad Niklenge.

Arab Jaise Mulk Mein Kheti Bagh Aur Nehrein Hogi.

Deen Par Qaim Rehna Itna Mushkil Hoga Jaisa Ki Mutti Mein Angaara Lena Mushkil Hai.

Waqt Mein Barkat Na Hogi.

Yaha Tak Ki Ek Saal Mahine Ki Tarah, Mahina Hafte Ki Tarah, Hafta Din Ki Tarah Aur Din Aisa Ho Jayega Jaise Kisi Cheez Ko Aag Lagi Aur Jaldi Hi Bujh Gayi.

Matlab Yeh Hai Ki Waqt Bahut Jaldi Guzrega.

Logo Par Zakat Dena Bhari Hoga.

Log Zakat Ko Tawaan (Jurmana) Samjhenge.

Kuch Log Ilm e Deen Padhege, Lekin Deen Ke Liye Nahi Balki Duniya Ke Liye.

Mard Apni Aurat Ka Farmabardaar Hoga.

Aauladein Apne Maa Baap Ki Nafarmani Karegi.

Ladke Apne Doston Se Mel Jhol Rakhege Aur Maa Baap Se Juda (Alag) Ho Jayege.

Log Masjido Mein Duniya Ki Bekar Baatein Karenge Aur Chillayenge.

Gaane Bajane Ki Zyaadti Hogi.

Log Agle Logon Par Laanat Karenge Aur Unhein Bura Kahenge.

Zaleel Aur Ganwaar Log Jinhein Tan Ko Kapda Aur Paw Ki Jutiya Naseeb Na Thi Bade Bade Mahilo Mein Guroor Ke Saath Rahege, Wagairah.

Title: Farz Ki Pehli Doo Rakat Me Surat Milana Bhool Jaaye Toh Kya Kare?
Content: Jawab: Farz Ki Pehli Doo Rakato Me Surat Milana Bhool Jaaye Aur Ruku Ke Baad Yaad Aaye. Toh Pichli Doo Rakato Me Padhe Aur Sajda-E-Sahw Kare Aur Maghrib Ki Pehli Doo Rakato Me Bhool Jaaye. Toh Teesri Me Padhe Aur Ek Rakat Ki Surat Jaati Rahi, Aakhir Me Sajda-E-Sahw Kare!

Title: Agar Surah Fatiha Padhne Ke Baad Surat Milana Bhool Jaaye Aur Ruku Me Yaad Aaye
Content: Toh Kya Kare? Jawab: Agar Surat Milana Bhool Jaaye, Fir Ruku Me Yaad Aaye. Toh Khada Ho Jaaye Aur Surat Milaaye. Phir Ruku Kare Aur Aakhir Me Sajda-E-Sahw Kare!

Title: Agar Farz Ki Pehli Doo Rakato Me Se Kisi Ek Me Surat Milana Bhool Jaaye
Content: Aur Ruku Ke Baad Yaad Aaye. Toh Kya Kare? Jawab: Teesri, Ya Chouthi Me Surah E Fatiha Ke Saat Surat Milaaye Aur Sajda-E-Sahw Kare!

Title: Agar Sunnat, Ya Nafl Me Surat Milana Bhool Jaaye Aur Ruku Ke Baad Sajda Wagairah Me Yaad Aaye Toh Kya Kare?
Content: Jawab: Aakhir Me Sajda-E-Sahw Kare!

Title: Qutbe Ki Azaan Ka Jawab Dena Kaisa Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Qutbe Ki Azaan Ka Zuban Se Jawab Dena Muqtadiyo Ko Jaayiz Nahi!

Title: Imamat Ka Sabse Zyaada Haqdar Kaun Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Imamat Ka Sabse Zyaada Haqdar Woh Shakhs Hai.

Jo Namaz, Wa Tahaarat Ke Ahkaam Sab Se Zyaada Jaanta Ho.

Phir Woh Shakhs Jo Tajweed Yaani Qirat Ki Jaankaari Zyaada Rakhta Ho, Agar Koyi Shaksh Inn Baato Me Baraabar Ho.

Toh Woh Shakhs Zyaada Haqdaar Hai.

Jo Zyaada Muttaqi Ho Agar Iss Me Bhi Baraabar Ho.

Phir Zyaada Tahajjud Guzaar.

Garz Ye Ki Chand Aadmi Baraabar Ho.

Toh Unn Me Jo Sharee Tarjeeh Rakhta Ho, Wahi Zyaada Haqdaar Hai!

Title: Kisi Se Shirk, Ya Kufr Ho Jaaye Toh Kya Kare?
Content:
Jawab:

Tauba Aur Tajdeed E Imaan Kare Biwi Wala Ho.

Toh Tajdeed E Nikah Kare Aur Mureed Ho Toh Tajdeed E Bai'at (बैअत) Bhi Kare.

Jashn ka maana khushi hai, usi tarah jashn ba maana Zikr o ijlaas bhi hota hai.

Title: Eid e milad un nabi ke din bahot se log roza nahi rakhte kehte hai
Content:
Eid hai isliye, jab ki 12 rabi ul awwal ka roza hajaria (ek roze ka 1000 sawab) roza hota hai.

Saal mein 5 roze hajaria hote hai.

Unmein se 1 roza 12 rabi ul awwal ka Hai.

Lekin bahot se log isse mehroom hai, toh is baare mein rehnumai farmayega.

Jawab:

Roza 5 dino me mana o najaayez hai, Inke ilawa nahi.

Aur Eid e Milad ka Roza Rakhna khud Huzoor ﷺ ke Amaal se bhi sabit hai.

Balke ye ek gareeb o faqeer nachaar ke liye kaha jata hai.

Lehaza jabke ye sifaat e hameedah nahi hai, to iske zariye Ta'reef kis tarah mumkin hai.

Iska istemal na kiya jaaye.

Title: 4 rakat wali farz namaz imam ke peeche padhi
Content: Imam sahab 1 rakat padha chuke the Humne dusre pakdi. To imam sahab do baar qaida me baithenge, to dusre baar baithenge to hamare wo teesre rakat Hogi. Toh hum sirf Attahiyyat padhe, ya durood shar'eef or dua e masura bhi padhe. Apni teesre rakat me or imam sahab ne jo dusre raqat mai ayat milaye, to hum apni 4 wali rakat me usse pehle wali milaye, ya baad wali or agar aisa zohar or asar me ho to konse milaye. Kyuki hume pata hi nahi imam sahab ne konse Surah padhe hoge dusre rakat me. 2) Agar Maloom Ho ki Konsi surah milaye the imam ne dusre rakat me, to Kaunsi padhe uske pehle wali, ya baad wali. Rehnumaye farmaye. Jawab: Mazkoora surat me Imam ke qaada e akhira me jab baithe, to sirf Attahiyyat parh kar khamosh rahe, Ya Tashahhud dohraaye. Imam ke salam pherne ke Baad jo ek rakat apni parhe, usme surah fatiha ke sath surah milaaye. 2) Agar maloom hai ke imam ne kaun si surah dosri rekaat me parhi. To usse pehle wali yaad ho, to wo parhe warna jo surah chahe parhe. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Kya Hum Dukan Ki Chiz Me Jo Daam Hai Usse zyada Paiso Ka Bill Bana Ke Dena Kaisa Hai

Kya Aisa Karne se Gunehgaar Hoga?

Filhal Afrika Me Sab Jaga Par Aisa Chalta Hai.

Jo Right Kimat Ho Wo Usse Jayda Ka Bill Banate Hai.

Is Tarha Karna Kaisa Hai.

Rehnumayi Farmaye.

Jawab:

Khareedne wale ke hatho jis daam me bechna hai.

Wo daam use bata kar dene me harj nahi.

Agarche jitna likha hai usse zyada ho.

Haan! agar uske ilm me laaye begair zyada ka bill banaye, to Khiyanat karne wala gunahgar hoga.

Agar use musalman samajhte hue nikah ko sahi samajhte hue usme shareek hua to tauba, tajdeed e iman lazim hai.

Title: Ghar Rahen Lena kaise hai?
Content:
Sail ne zaid ko 2 lakh de kar uska ghar 2 saal ke liye Ijazat lekar ghar istimaal kar sakta hai, ya nahi?

2 saal hone ke baad 2 lakh wapas kar dena padhta hai ZAID ko?

Jawab:

Mazkoora surat me wo 2 lakh qarz hua aur ghar ba'taur e rehn aur Rehn ka saman Istemal karna jaayez nahi.

Aur agar qarz ke badle us ghar se faayeda uthaye, to ye qarz se nafa uthana hua, jo ke sood aur haraam hai.

Title: Hazrat 12 rabi ul awwal ke din roza rakh sakhte hai?
Content:
Or agar 12 rabi ul awwal peer ke din hoto roza rakhna kaisa?

Hazrat Jawab dekar rehnumai kare.

Jawab:

Uska Mamool hai ke wo har peer ke roz roza rakhta hai, to rakh sakta hai.

Title: Tayammum Mein Kitni Baatein Farz Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Tayammum Mein Teen (3) Baatein Farz Hai.

1) Niyat Karna.

2) Pura Munh Par Hath Ferna.

3) Dono Hathon Ka Kuhniyon Samet Masah Karna.

Agar Anguthi Pehne Ho Toh, Uske Neeche Hath Ferna Farz Hai!

Aur Aurat Agar Chudhi (चूड़ी), Ya Zewar (ज़ेवर) Pehne Ho Toh Usey Hatha Kar Har Hisse Par Hath Ferna Farz Hai!

Tayammum Ka Tarika Yeh Hai Ki Awwal Dil Mein Niyat Kare.

Fir Dono Hath Ki Ungliyan Kushada Karke Zameen Par Maare Aur Zyada Gard Lag Jaye Toh Jhadh Le.

Fir Usse Saare Munh Ka Masah Kare.

Fir Dobara Dono Hath Zameen Par Maarkar Dahine (Right) Hath Ko Baayein (Left) Hath Se Aur Baayein (Left) Hath Ko Dahine (Right) Hath Se Kuhniyon Samet Maley.

Tayammum Kin Cheezo Se Karna Jaayez Hai?

Jawab:

Paak Mitthi, Patthar, Reth, Multani Mitthi, Geru, Kachchi, Ya Pakki Int (ईंट), Mutthi Aur Int Patthar, Yaa Chuna Ki Deewaron Se Tayammum Karna Jaayez Hai!

Tayammum Kin Cheezo Se Karna Naajaayez Hai?

Jawab:

Sona, Chandi, Tamba, Peetal, Loha, Lakdi, Aluminium, Kapda, Raak Aur Har Qism Ke Galla Se Tayammum Karna NaaJaayez Hai!

Yaani Jo Cheezien Aag Mein Pigal Jaati Hai, Yaa Jalkar Raak Ho Jaati Hai Un Cheezon Se Tayammum Karna Naajaayez hai!

Title: Tahajjud ki namaz kitni rakat hoti hai.
Content:
Tahajjud Ki Namaz Ka Waqt Isha Ki Namaz Ke Baad So Kar Uthe Uss Waqt Se Tulu e Subah Sadiq Tak Hai.

Tahajjud Ki Namaz Kam Se Kam Doo (2) Rakat Hoti Hai Aur Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wa Sallam Se Aath (8) Rakat Tak Saabith Hai.

Hadees Shareef Me Tahajjud Namaz Ki Badi Fazilat (Badaayi) Aayi Hai.

Nasai Aur Ibn e Maaza Ne Apni Sunan Me Riwaayat Ki Ke Rasool’Allah Sallallahu Alaihi Wa Sallam Ne Farmaya:

Jo Shaks Raat Me Bedaar Ho (Jaage) Aur Apne Ahal Ko Jagaaye.

Phir Doono Doo Doo Rakaat Padhe.

Toh Kasrat Se Yaad Karne Waalo Me Likhe Jaayenge

Title: Chasht ki namaz kitni rakat hoti hai.
Content:
Chasht Ki Namaz Mustahab Hai.

Chasht ki Namaz Kam Se Kam Doo (2) Aur Ziyaada Se Ziyaada Baarah (12) Rakate Hai.

Tirmizi Aur Ibn e Maaza Me Hai Ki Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wa Sallam Ne Farmaya:

Jo Chasht Namaz Ki Doo (2) Rakaato Par Muhafazaat Kare Uske Gunaah Baksh Diye Jaayenge.

Agarche Samandar Ke Jhaag Ke Baraabar Ho.

Title: Ishraq namaz ki fazilat
Content:
Tirmizi Shareef Me Hai Ki Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wa Sallam Ne Farmaya Ki:

Jo Fajr Ki Namaz Jamaat Se Padh Kar Khuda Ka Zikr Karta Rahe.

Yaha Tak Ki Suraj Buland Ho Jaaye.

Phir Doo (2) Rakat (Namaz e Ishraq) Padhe.

Toh Usko Poore Hajj Aur Umrah Ka Sawab Milega.

Title: Agar koi sayyed bhare mazme me Aala Hazrat aur Tajushshariah ki tauheen kare, to us sayyed ki tazeem karni chahiye ya nahi?
Content:
Jawab: Kisi alim ki tauheen agar ba'wajh-e-ilm-e-deen hai. Bila shubah kufr hai aur agar be'sabab-e-zaahir ke hai. To us par kauf-e-kufr hai. Warna ashad kabeera hone me shakh nahi. Hadees me hai Nabi-e-paak صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم farmate hain: 3 aadmiyo ki tauheen munafiq hi karega.
  1. Musalman budha
  2. Sahib-e-ilm
  3. Adil hakim
Lehaza jo Aala Hazrat O Tajushshariah ki tauheen unke uloom-e-deenia ki wajah se kare to kafir. Wo sayyed hi na raha, ab uski tazeem na ki jayegi. -------------------------------------------------- Khalifa e Huzoor Tajushshariah Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi --------------------------------------------------

Title: Zaid sunni musalman hai usne shadi ki aur shadi se 1 beti jo kareeb 5 saal aur beta kareeb 2 saal ka hai.
Content:
Shadi ke takriban 6 saal baad zaid ne socha ki biwi ko deen e islam samjhaya jaye. Kyuki zaid ko ye mehsus hota tha ki biwi zyada nahi samjhti bas roza, namaz padhti hai.

Par ALLAH kya uske Rasool kya nahi samjhti, to zaid ne biwi ko ADAM alaihissalam se batana suru kiya.

Biwi ko kuch dino me kuch samajh me aa gaya tab biwi ne jaid se kaha ki mai jab apne yaha rahti thi.

Tab padhne jaate samay raste me mandir kisi devi ka tha, usse dua mang liya karti thi aur hindo ke bhagwano ko bhi bhagwan samjhti thi.

Mujhe pata nahi tha ki ye kufr tha, ab mujhe samajh me aaya.

Zaid ne biwi se kaha ki tum tauba karo aur kalma padho, ab zaid ka sawal ye hai ki zaid ka nikah kya uski biwi se shariyatan hua ya nahi?

Zaid ke bachho pe, zaid pe aur biwi pe kya huqm hoga?

Kya zaid ko apni biwi se dubara nikah karna hoga, iska tarika kya hoga.

Zaid ko agar nikah karna hoga, to zaid kya akele apne kamre me biwi ke saath bina kisi gawah ke nikah kar sakta hai aur iska tarika kya hoga?

Jawab:

Agar Is baat ke baad usne Tauba kiya aur Kalima wagaira parha hai, to wo Musalman hai.

Magar ehtiyaatan dobara wo Tauba o tajdeed e iman kare aur Tajdeed e Nikah kare.

Aur Nikah ke liye do gawaho ki maujoodgi me Miya biwi ka ijab o qubool karna zaruri hai.

Title: Juma Jayez Hone Ki Sharth Kya Hai?
Content: Juma Jayez Hone Ki Chaar (6) Sharth Hai? Juma Jayez Hone Ki Pehli Sharth Hai. Juma Jayez Hone Ki Pehli Sharth Misr Ya Fanaye Misr Hona Hai. Juma Jayez Hone Ki Doosri Sharth Hai. Doosri Sharth Yeh Hai Ki Badshah, Ya Uska Nayab Juma Qayam Kare Aur Agar Islami Hukumat Na Ho. Toh Sabse Bada Sunni Sahi Aqeeda Rakhne Wala Aalim Qaim Kare Ki Bagair Uski Ijazat Ke Juma Nahi Qayam Ho Sakta. Aur Agar Yeh Bhi Na Ho, Toh Aam Log Jis Ko Imam Banaye Woh Qayam Kare. Juma Jayez Hone Ki Teesri Aur Chawthi Sharth Hai. Teesri Sharth Zohar Ke Waqt Ka Hona Hai. Isiliye Waqt Se Pehle, Ya Baad Mein Padhi Na Huwi, Ya Darmiyaani Namaz Mein Asr Ka Waqt Aa Gaya Juma Batil Ho Gaya, Zohar Ki Qaza Padhe. Aur Chawthi Sharth Yeh Hai Ki Zohar Ke Waqt Mein Namaz Se Pehle Khutba Ho Jaaye. Juma Jayez Hone Ki Paanchwi Aur Chatthi Sharth Hai. Paanchwi Sharth Jamat Ka Hona Hai. Jiske Liye Imam Ke Alawa Kam Se Kam Teen Mard Ka Hona Zaroori Hai. Aur Chatthi Sharth Izne'aam Hai. Iska Matlab Yeh Hai Ki Masjid Ka Dawaza Khol Diya Jaaye, Taaki Jis Musalman Ka Ji Chahe Aaye Kisi Ki Rok Tok Na Ho.

Title: Juma Ke Khutba Mein Kitni Baatein Sunnat Hai ?
Content:
Jawab:

Juma Ke Khutba Me Unnees (19) Baatein Sunnat Hai.

1) Khutba Padhne Wale Ka Pak Hona.

2) Khade Hokar Khutba Padhna.

3) Khutba Se Pehle Khutba Padhne Wale Ka Baithna.

4) Khutba Padhne Wale Ka Mimbar Par Hona.

5) Aur Sunne Walo Ki Taraf Muh

6) Aur Qibla Ki Taraf Peeth Hona.

7) Hazir Rehne Walo Ka Khutba Padhne Wale Ki Taraf Mutawajjoh Hona.

8) Khutba Se Pehle Aauzu'Billah Aahista Padhna.

9) Itni Buland Aawaz Se Khutba Padhna Ki Log Sune.

10) Lafz Alhumdu Se Shuru Karna.

11) ALLAH Ta'ala Ki Sana Karna.

12) ALLAH Ta'ala Ki Wahdaniyat (Iktayi) Aur Huzoor Alaihissalatu Wasallam Ki Risaalat Ki Gawahi Dena.

13) Huzoor Par Durood Bhejna.

14) Kam se Kam Aayat Ki Tilawat Karna.

15) Pehle Khutba Mein Waaz wa Naseehat Hona.

16) Doosre Mein Humd wa Sana, Shahadat Aur Durood Ka iaada Karna.

17) Doosre Mein Musalmano Ke Liye Dua Karna.

18) Dono Khutbon Ka Halka Hona.

19) Aur Dono Khtubon Ke Beech Teen Aayat Ki Miqdar Baithna.

Title: Ladka Ke Aqeeqa Ki Kya Dua Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Ladke Ke Aqeeqa Ki Dua Yeh Hai

اَللّٰھُمَّ ھٰذِہُُِ عَقِیْقَةُ اِبْنِیْ

(Yahan par ladke ka naam liya jaaye)

۔۔۔۔ دَمُھَا بِدَمِهِ وَ لَحْمُھَا بِلَحْمِهِ وَ عَظْمُھَا بِعَظْمِهِ وَجِلْدُھَا بِجِلْدِهِ وَشَعْرُھَا بِشَعْرِهِ اَللّٰھُمَّ اجْعَلْھَا فِدَآءًلِاِبْنِی مِنَ النَّار بِسْمِ اَللّٰهِ اَللّٰهُ اَکْبَرْ

Allahumma hazihi aqeeqatu ibni (yahan par ladke ka naam liya jaaye) damuha bi damihi wa lahmuhaa bi lahmihi wa azmuhaa bi azmihi wa jilduhaa wa jildihi wa sha’aruhaa wa sha’arihi Allahumaj al haa fi daa an li ibni minan naar.

Bismillah hi Allah hu Akbar

Title: Hajate Asliya Kise Kehte Hai?

Jaise Jaadhe Aur Garmiyo Mein Pahenne Ke Kapde, Khandari Ke Samaan, Peshawaron Ke Aauzar Aur Sawari Ke Liye Cycle Aur Motor Wagairah Yeh Sab Hajate Asliya Mein Se Hai.

Title: Nisab Ke Dein Se Farigh Hone Ka Kya Matlab Hai?

Jawab:

Iska Matlab Yeh Hai Ki Malik e Nisab Par Kisi Ka Baqi Na Ho.

Ya Itna Ho Ki Agar Baqi Ada Kar De, Toh Bhi Nisab Bacha Rahe.

Toh Is Surat Mein Zakat Nikalni Wajib Hai Aur Agar Baqi Itna Ho Ki Ada Kar De.

Toh Nisab Na Rahe, Toh Is Surat Mein Zakat Wajib Nahi.

Title: Agar Kisi ilake Me Sunni Log Rehte par waha jahiliyat faili Ho Aur Log Maslak e Aala hazrat kise kehte hai ye naa jante ho
Content:
Deobandiyo Ke aqaid ke bare me ilm naa rakhte ho aur unhe achcha samjhte ho.

To agar waha par koi jalsa ho aur us jalse ke karane wale log Mukaarrir ko Radd e wahabiya karne se mana kare sirf is niyat se ki ilake ke log jahil hai aur radd e wahabiya karne se wo sunniyo ko bura samjhne lagenge.

To kya hazrat aise me radd e wahabiya se rokne wala gunahgar to naa hoga?

Jawab:

Aaj ke zamaane me kuch Muqarrireen ne gaali galoch ko radd samajh liya hai aur awam bhi radd ka yahi matlab samajhti hai,

Halaanke Aqaaid e Ahl e Sunnat ko Ahadees o Quran ki roshni me saabit karna aur wahabiyo ke aqaaid e baatila ko Quran o Hadees ki raushni me Baatil thehrana hi asl Radd hai, aur is tarah ka radd kiya jaaye.

To koi bhola bhala bhi mutanaffir na hoga, balke haq ko tasleem karega agar use Maanna ho.

Ye sarasar siyasi program hai jiski wajah se Musalmano ko behkane ki koshish ki ja rahi hai.

Title: Agar Koi Namaz Qaza Ho Jaye Jaise Farz Ki Namaz
Content:

Jawab:

Jis Roz Aur Jis Waqt Ki Namaz Qaza Ho Us Roz Aur Us Waqt Ki Niyat Qaza Mein Zaroori Hai.

Jaise Agar Juma Ke Roz Fajr Ki Namaz Qaza Ho Gayi, Toh Is Tarah Niyat Kare.

Niyat Ki Maine Do (2) Rakat Namaz Qaza Juma Ke Farz Fajr Ki ALLAH Ta'ala Ke Liye Muh Mera Kaaba Shareef Ke ALLAHU AKBAR.

Isi Par Doosri Qaza Namazo Ki Niyato Ko Samajh Lena Chahiye.

Title: Juma Ke Khutba Ki Azaan Imam Ke Samne Masjid Ke Andar Padhna Sunnat Hai Ya Bahar?
Content:
Jawab:

Juma Ke Khutba Ki Azaan Imam Ke Samne Masjid Ke Bahar Padhna Sunnat Hai Ki Huzoor Alaihissalatu Wasallam Aur Sahaba e Kiraam Ke Zamana Mein Khutba Padhne Wale Ke Samne Masjid Ke Darwaza Hi Par Hua Karti Thi.

Jaisa Ki Hadees Ki Mashoor Kitaab Abu'Dawood Jild Awwal Safa 162 Mein Hai Ki Hazrat e Saib Yazeed Radi'Allahu Ta'aala Anhu Se Riwayat Hai Unhone Farmaya Ki Jab Rasoolullah Sallallahu Ta'ala Alaihi Wassallam Juma Ke Roz Mimbar Par Tashreef Rakhte.

Toh Huzoor Ke Samne Masjid Ke Darwaze Par Azaan Hoti Aur Aisa Hi Hazrat e Abu Bakr wa Hazrat e Umar Radi'Allahu Anhuma Ke Zamane Mein.

Isi Liye Fatawa Qazi Khan, Aalamgiri , Bahrur'rahiq Aur Fathul Qadri Wagairah Mein Masjid Ke Andar Azaan Dene Ko Mana Farmaya Aur Tehtawi Alam'raqil Falah Ne Makrooh Likha.

Title: Huzoor Zaid Ke Pass 3 Lack Rupai Hai Jo Wo Apne Nikah Aur Walima Pe Karch Karne Ke Liye Rakha Hai
Content:

Title: Kya hum unhe zakat ke fund se madad kare shakte Hain.
Content:
Ek bachha Jo engineering ki padhai Kar Raha Hain aur 2nd year mein Hain. Uski fees bharne ke liye Intezam na hone par Bank ki loan ki talash main hain.

Pichhle saal bhi humne 20000 ki madad ki thi lautane ki ummid se Lekin woh 10000 hi lauta shake Hain.

Unke ghar ki maahvar income Kareeb 30000 Hain aur ek makan Hain Jo loan pe Hain.

Kisi Tarha ke bure ya najayez kharche nahin Hain nahi koi galat sohbat, ya aadat Hain.

Kya agar woh shahib e maal nahi ya utna cash, ya gold, ya silver naho ke woh zakat ke dayre main aaye.

Kya hum unhe zakat ke fund se madad kare shakte Hain.

Halaki woh zakat Lena nahin chahte. Nadamat ki vagah se. Ya fir unhe Bina kahe hum zakat de de.

Jawab:

Jo bhi kamaai hai usme se kuch bachta nahi.

Yaani Kharch ho jata hai aur Itna maal bhi nahi jo Nisaab tak pohche, to wo zakat ka haqdar hai.

Use zakat ki niyat se paise diye ja sakte hain.

Agarche use Na bataye ke ye zakat hai.

Title: Kya india me musalman ek kafir se sood le sakta hai? Aur usko sood par rupaye de sakta hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Sood lena dena haraam hai.

Quran e majeed me irshad hua ke Allah ﷻ ne khareed o farokht ko halal farmaya aur sood ko haraam farmaya.

Muslim sharif ki hadees hai ke Rasoolullah ﷺ ne laanat farmayi sood khane wale aur uske muakkil aur uske likhne wale aur uske gawaaho par aur farmaya ke ye sab barabar hai. Lehaza sood Haraam hai.

Musalman se liya jaye ya kafir se. Hindustan me ho ya arab me.

Haan! agar na sood kaha jaaye, na sood ki niyat ho. Balke ek mubaah maal samajh kar leta ho ke kafir e harbi ka maal musalman ke liye mubaah hai jab tak Ahad shikni waada khilaafi Dhoka na ho, To isme harj nahi.

Misal ke taur par kafir ko 100 rupaye diye aur apas ki raza mandi se ye thehra liya ke saal bhar ke baad 125 lunga, to jaayez hai.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Charo Mazhab Ke Charo Imamo Ke Naam Or Kaun Kiske Shagird Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

1) Hazrat Imam e Azam Abu Haneefa رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــه.

Apke asaatiza me Hazrat Hammad bin Abi Sulaiman, Ataa bin abi rubaah, zaid bin ali Imam jaafar sadiq shamil hain.

2) Hazrat Imam Malik رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــه.

Apke Asaatiza me Hazrat Naafe, ibn e shahab zohri, Abdur Rahman Awzaai, Ayyoob sakhtiyani, wagaira Ka Naam shamil hai.

3) Hazrat Imam shafai رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــه.

Apke Asaatiza me Hazrat Imam Malik bin Anas, Muhammad bin hasan shaibani, Sufiyan bin uyaina, Lais bin Saad, Wakee bin jarrah shamil hain.

4) Hazrat Imam Ahmad bin Hambal رضـــي الله تعـــالى عنــــه.

Apke asaatiza me محمد بن ادریس شافعی، سفیان بن عیینہ، عبد الرزاق بن ہمام، ابو یوسف، یحییٰ بن معین، بہز بن اسد

Hazrat Imam Shafai, Sufiyan bin uyaina, Abdur Razzaq bin humam, Imam Abu Yusuf, Yahya bin moin, wagaira shamil hain.

Wa-Allahu Ta'ala A'lam

Title: Agar Koi Baith Kar Bhi Namaz Na Padh Sakta Ho, Toh Kya Kare?
Content:
Jawab:

Agar Koi Baith Kar Bhi Namaz Na Padh Sakta Ho, Toh Aisi Surat Mein Leth Kar Namaz Padhe.

Is Tarah Ki Chit Leth Kar Qibla Ki Taraf Pao Kare.

Magar Pao Na Fhelaye, Balki Ghutne Khade Rakhe Aur Sar Ke Neeche Takiya Wagairah Rakh Kar Zara Uncha Karle Aur Ruku Sajda Sar Jhuka Kar Ishara Se Kare, Yeh Surat Afzal Hai.

Aur Yeh Bhi Jayez Hai Ki Dahine (Right) Ya Baayein (Left) Karwath Lethkar Muh Qibla Ki Taraf Karein.

Title: Ruku Ka Adna (Kam) Darja Kya Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Ruku Ka Adna Darja, Ye Hai Ki Haath Ghutne Tak Pahunch Jaaye Aur Poora Ruku Ye Hai Ki Peet Seedhi Bichaade Aur Sar Peet Ke Barabar Rakhe Ooncha Neecha Na Rakhe!

Title: Sajda e Sahw Kab Wajib Hota Hai?
Content:
Jawab:

Jo Baatein Ki Namaz Mein Wajib Hai, Unmein Se Kisi Ek Ke Bhool Kar Chooth Jaane Se Sajda e Sahw Wajib Hota Hai.

Jaise Farz Ki Pehli, Yaa Doosri Rakat Mein Alhumdu, Ya Surat Padhna Bhool Gaya.

Ya Sunnat Aur Nafl Ki Kisi Rakat Mein Alhumdu, Ya Surat Padhna Bhool Gaya.

Ya Alhumdu Se Pehle Surat Padh Di, Toh In Surato Mein Sajda e Sahw Karna Wajib Hai.

Title: Taraweeh Ki Dua Ki Halat Mein Chup Baitha Rahe Ya Kuch Padhe?
Content:
Jawab:

Ikhtiyaar Hai, Chahe Chup Baitha Rahe Chahe Kalimah, Ya Durood Shareef Padhe Aur Aam Taur Se Yeh Dua Padhi Jaati Hai.

Subha'na Zil Mulki Wal Malakoot.

Subhana Zil Izzati Wal Azamati Wal Haibati Wal Qudrati Wal Kibriya Ay Wal Jabaroot.

Subhanal Malikil Hayyil Lazee La Yanaamo Wala Yamooto Subboohun Quddoosunn Rabbona Wa Rabbul Malaaikatih War Rooh.

Allahhumma Ajirna Minan Naar Ya Mujeero Ya Mujeero Ya Mujeer.

Title: Kya Jis Par Gusl Farz Ho, Woh Masjid Mein Nahi Ja Sakta?

Jis Par Gusl Farz Ho Usey Masjid Ke Us Hisse Mein Jana Haram Hai Ki Jo Dakhil e Masjid Hai.

Yaani Namaz Ke Liye Banaya Gaya Hai.

Aur Woh Hissa Ki Jo Fanaye e Masjid Hai.

Yaani Istinja Khana, Gusl Khana Aur Wazu Gaah Wagairah Toh Us Jagah Jane Mein Koi Harj Nahi.

Ba'sharte Ki Unmein Jane Ka Rasta Dakhil e Masjid Se Hokar Na Guzarta Ho!

Title: Hadees Sharif mein hai ki Jumma momino ki eid hai
Content:
Aur dusri jagah aap ﷺ ne farmaya ki Jisne eid ko Roza rakha, usne meri na farmani ki.

To kya jumma ke din nafil Roza rakh sakte hain?

Isi tarah Jumma ko Qaza roza rakhna kaisa?

Kuch log kehte hain nafl roza single nahi rehna chahiye, 2 ya usse zyada rehna chahiye.

Kya ye sahi hai.

27 rajab ko ek hi roza nafl agar karein, to kya hoga ya nahi?

Jawab inayat farmaye meherbani hogi.

Jawab:

Jumuah Ke Din Khaas taur se Jumuah ke din ke liye Roza rakhna mana hai.

Haan! agar koi Mubarak din ho, to harj nahi.

Isi tarah jumuah ke din qaza roza rakhne me bhi harj nahi.

Nafl roza single rakha ja sakta hai.

Haan! Ashura ka roza Single na rakhe ke yahudio ki mukhalifat ho.

--------------------------------------------------
Khalifa-E-Huzoor Tajushshariah
Mufti Maqsood Akhtar Qadri Razvi Amjadi
Khadim Dar al-Ifta Ridawi Amjadi
